40001001	Iga nyigo marina ga waku wa Yesu Kristo awei o kyishari kya Dawidi na Abrahamu.
40001002	Abrahamu nalefee Isakyi, Isakyi kafee Yakobo; Yakobo kafee Yuda na wana wa wamae.
40001003	Yuda kafee Peresi na Sera ipfo ko Tamari; Peresi kafee Esiromu; Esiromu kafee Aramu.
40001004	Aramu kafee Aminadabu; Aminadabu kafee Nashon, Nashon kafee Salyimone.
40001005	Salyimone kafee Boasi ko Rahabu; Boasi kafee Obedi ko Ruti, Obedi kafee Yese.
40001006	Yese kafee Mangyi Dawidi. Dawidi kafee Solomon ko mka ulya o Uria.
40001007	Solomon kafee Rehoboamu; Rehoboamu kafee Abiya; Abiya kafee Asa.
40001008	Asa kafee Yoshafati; Yoshafati kafee Yoramu; Yoramu kafee Usia.
40001009	Usia kafee Yotamu; Yotamu kafee Ahasi; Ahasi kafee Esekyia.
40001010	Esekyia kafee Manase; Manase kafee Amon; Amon kafee Yosia.
40001011	Yosia kafee Yekonia na wana wa wamae, kyiyeri kya wana wa Isiraelyi waleṙoo wusingyenyi kulya Babelyi.
40001012	Na numa ya wusamiṟo wulya wo Babelyi, Yekonia kafee Shealyitielyi; Shealyitielyi kafee Serubabelyi.
40001013	Serubabelyi kafee Abihudi; Abihudi kafee Elyiakyimu; Elyiakyimu kafee Asori.
40001014	Asori kafee Sadokyi; Sadokyi kafee Akyimu; Akyimu kafee Elyiudi.
40001015	Elyiudi kafee Elyieseri; Elyieseri kafee Matani; Matani kafee Yakobo.
40001016	Yakobo kafee Yosefu mii o Maria alefee Yesu elago Kristo.
40001017	Koikyo marika goose wookyia Abrahamu mṟasa Dawidi nyi ikumi na gaana. Na wookyia Dawidi mṟasa kyiyeri wana wa Isiraelyi waleṙoo wusingyenyi kulya Babelyi nyi marika ikumi na gaana. Na wookyia wusamiṟo wo Babelyi mṟasa Kristo nyi marika ikumi na gaana.
40001018	Yesu Kristo nalefeo kuṙi. Maria wamae kyiyeri aweṙuṙo nyi Yosefu, walandekooyane kyimmbiu nalewono ai mlemo kui wuiṙimi wo Mumuyo Mweele.
40001019	Na Yosefu, mii okye, kyipfa kya ilyi-indi awekyeri mndu msumganyi alakunde imsutsa, kaṙumbuo imṙa kui kyiṟika.
40001020	Kyasia-ng'u kyiyeri awekusaṟa isho, malaika o Mndumii kamchia ndoṙonyi, echigamba, “Yosefu, mana o Dawidi, ulaowuoe iṙuo Maria mka opfo, kyipfa ikyo kyikyimooge kokye nyi kui wuiṙimi wo Mumuyo Mweele.
40001021	Na oe nechienengo mana o womi, na iyoe nochimlaga Yesu, kyipfa, nyi oe echiwuta wandu wakye ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo.
40001022	Isho shoose shaṟundika kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyileṙeṙo nyi Mndumii kui ndumo ya moonguo shisuku echigamba,
40001023	‘Ambuya, mana mkyega nechiira mana, na oe nechienengo mana o womi; nawo wechimlaga Imanuelyi; ikyo nyi kyimwi na igamba, Ruwa hamwi na soe.’ ”
40001024	Na Yosefu lyilya aleamka iwuka maṙoenyi, nalewuta chandu malaika o Mndumii alemmbia. Kaṙuo mka okye;
40001025	alakooyane na oe kyimmbiu maa lyimwi, mṟasa kyiyeri aleenengo mana okye; kamlaga Yesu.
40002001	Lyilya Yesu alefeo Betilehemu ya Uyuda, kacha kyiyeri kya mangyi Herode, wandu wawewoṙe wuṟango wo mbonyi tsa nyenyeri wa ura lo ngamenyi waleshika Yerusalemu, wechigamba,
40002002	“Nyi kwi ai ulya alefeo mangyi o Wayuda? Kyipfa lulewona nyenyeri yakye ura lo ngamenyi, na soe locha luchemuolokyia.”
40002003	Kyasia mangyi Herode amuicho isho, nalewoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi, na wandu wa Yerusalemu taa hamwi na oe.
40002004	Kasania wang'anyi wa makohanyi woose na walosha wa mawawaso, kapfula mbonyi kowo, Kristo nafeo kwi?
40002005	Nawo wakammbia, “Kyiiṙi kya Betilehemu ya Uyuda; kyipfa nyi wuṙo kyiwekyiṟeie nyi moonguo shisuku:
40002006	‘Na iyoe Betilehemu, urukyenyi lo Yuda, ukyeri mtutu wachilyinyi wa Yuda maa ale-pfo; kyipfa kopfo nechiwuka mochilyia uruka, echilyisa wandu wako Isiraelyi.’ ”
40002007	Numa Herode kalaga wandu walya wawoṙe wuṟango wo mbonyi tsa nyenyeri kawaṙa nawo kyisanzionyi kyiṟika kawawesa nyi indi nyenyeri-yo ilewoneka.
40002008	Kawaṙuo Betilehemu, kagamba, “Yendenyi mundewesa mnu mbonyi tsa mana; na mukommbona, ngyiendienyi mbonyi, kundu na inyi ngyindemwindia.”
40002009	Nawo waicho maṙeṙo ga mangyi, walewooka kyaro; na nyenyeri iya waleiwona ura lo ngamenyi ikawasongoya, mṟasa ikayenda ikagoṟoka wuye ya handu mana awekyeri.
40002010	Na lyilya walewona nyenyeri iya walewoṙo nyi sia ing'anyi mnu.
40002011	Wakaiṙa na numba, wakawona mana hamwi na Maria wamae, wakapfiria ndi wakamwindia; nawo wampfunguo mkunja yawo wakamwenengyia shindo sha woguru wung'anyi; sahapu na uvumba na manemane.
40002012	Nawo wammbawaso nyi Ruwa ndoṙonyi walawiyilyie Herode, wakayenda urukyenyi kowo kui njia ingyi.
40002013	Na iwo wamuyende, malaika o Mndumii nalecha na ko Yosefu ndoṙonyi kagamba, “Yenda, uṙuo mana na wamae, uṙiche na Misiri, ukae pfo mṟasa ngyikuwie; kyipfa Herode nakundi ipfula mana namrumatse.”
40002014	Kayenda kaṙuo mana na wamae kyio, kayenda Misiri,
40002015	kakaa pfo mṟasa Herode kapfa; kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyileṙeṙo nyi Mndumii kui ndumo ya moonguo shisuku, echigamba, “Iwuka Misiri ngyilelaga mono-ko.”
40002016	Naaho-ng'u Herode, ammbone kye ammbutio shindo sha ngyeṟo nyi wandu walya wawoṙe wuṟango wo mbonyi tsa nyenyeri naleicho nyashi mnu, kaṙuma wandu wakawaaga wana woose wa kyisoṟo wawekyeri kulya Betilehemu na ipfo mṟasenyi koose, wookyia wawoṙe maka iwi na wanda ya iho, ko kyiyeri kyoose alekyimanya ko wandu walya wawoṙe wuṟango wo mbonyi tsa nyenyeri.
40002017	Naaho-ng'u kyileafukyia kyindo kyilegambo nyi moonguo shisuku Yeremia, echigamba,
40002018	“Ṟui lyileaṙanyio Rama, wukyiwa, na ikapa ṟanyi lying'anyi, Raheli echifiiṟia wana wakye, alaiṙikyie iwiyiṟio moo, kyipfa woose wawepfiie.”
40002019	Kyaindi kyiyeri Herode alepfa, malaika o Mndumii nalecha na ko Yosefu ndoṙonyi ipfo Misiri,
40002020	kagamba, “Amka, uṙuo mana na wamae uwuye na kulya urukyenyi lo Isiraelyi; kyipfa wampfa walya waweikundi iwaaga mana-cho.”
40002021	Kayenda kaṙuo mana na wamae, kashika uruka lo Isiraelyi.
40002022	Kyaindi amwicho kye Arikyelao nawoṙe wuchilyi ipfo Uyuda handu ha Herode awuye, naleowuo iyenda pfo; na oe ammbawaso ndoṙonyi kayenda ngyuura tsa Galyilaya.
40002023	Kakaa mṟinyi uwekyelago Nasareti; kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyileṙeṙo nyi weonguo shisuku: “Nechilago Mnasorayo.”
40003001	Mfiri iya Yohane Mpatisi naleyenda echionguo mbonyi ngyicha nukyenyi ya Uyuda, na igamba,
40003002	“Ṙumbuyenyi wunyamaṟi; kyipfa Wumangyi wo ruwewu womshika kufuhi.”
40003003	Cha kyipfa icho nyi oe alegambo nyi moonguo shisuku echigamba, “Ṟui lya mndu aieṙia nuka, ṟeyeṟenyi njia ya Mndumii, goṟotsenyi kundu echiiṙia.”
40003004	Na Yohane naweṟee ikunya lya mapfukye ga ngamia na ukowa lo njonyi kyitsinyi kyakye; na kyelya kyakye nyi-we nzie na wukyi wo nguṙunyi.
40003005	Naaho-ng'u wandu wa Yerusalemu waleyenda kokye, na wa Uyuda koose, na wa ngyuuruka tsoose tsa mbai ya Yoridan;
40003006	na oe kawapatisa kulya mfonyi o Yoridan, wechitocha ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo.
40003007	Na lyilya alewona wafoi kyiiṙi kya Mafarisayo na Masadukayo wechicha na wupatisonyi wokye, nalewawia, “Nyoe maalea ga njoka, nyi wui alemwikyimbia nyoe iṙicha nyashi-yo iicha?
40003008	Kyasia kumbienyi ndunda tsiṙuṙanyi na iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi.
40003009	Maa mulakusaṟe mrimenyi konyu kye, ‘Muwoṙe awu, nyi oe Abrahamu; kyipfa ngammbia kye Ruwa neiṙima kyiiṙi kya magoe-ga iiria Abrahamu wana.’
40003010	Na soka lyammbikyio matsindenyi ga mashiṙi; kyasia orio ikyiṙi lyilekyekumbia ndunda ngyicha lyekyemanyo na iwiyitso moṙonyi.
40003011	Ny'kyaloi inyi ngyimpatisa kui mṟinga kyipfa kya iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi; kyaindi ulya aicha numa yako nawoṙe pfinya kuta inyi, ngyiwaṟi maa iira shiaṙu shakye-pfo; oe nechimpatisa kui Mumuyo Mweele na kui moṙo.
40003012	Indo lyakye lyeela shindo lyikyeri kuwokonyi kokye, na oe nechiaia muului oose handu hakye heelyia shindo; na isania nganu yakye kyikumbinyi, kyaindi muului nechiurumatsa moṙonyi ulekyeruma.”
40003013	Kyiyeri-kyo Yesu kacha awuka Galyilaya mṟasa Yoridan ko Yohane kundu napatiso.
40003014	Kyaindi Yohane katambagana imshingyia, echigamba, “Inyi ngyilangyie ipatiso nyi iyoe, na iyoe nuicha na koko?”
40003015	Yesu kagaluo kammbia, “Iṙikyia wulalu kuṙi; kyipfa nyi wuṙo kyiluwaṟi iafutsia wusumganyi woose.” Kyasia kamwiṙikyia.
40003016	Na Yesu ampatiso cha ilyi kaṙo iwuka kulya mṟingyenyi; na mapuchi gakaseia, kawona Mumuyo o Ruwa echisokyia wuye yakye cha mbeta.
40003017	Na ṟui lyiwukyie ruwewu lyikagamba, “Ichu nyi Mana oko, mkunde oko, ngyimchihiye kyipfa kyakye.”
40004001	Numa ya iho Yesu kaṙoo nyi Mumuyo kundu ko nuka, kundu nayesho nyi Mokyiriinzi.
40004002	Kakuretekyia mfiri makumi gaana kyio na kyingoto, mafurumionyi kawoṙo njaa.
40004003	Myeshi kacha na kokye kammbia, “Kokooya iyoe nyi mana o Ruwa, wia magoe-ga gawe mkate.”
40004004	Na oe kagaluo, kagamba, “Kyikyiṟeie, ‘Mndu echiwona moo kui mkate tikyi-pfo, kyaindi ko orio ṙeṙo Ruwa agamba.’ ”
40004005	Kyasia Mokyiriinzi kamṙuo mṟasa Yerusalemu, mṟi mweele, kammbikyia wuye ya uweri lo hekalu
40004006	kammbia, “Kokooya iyoe nyi Mana o Ruwa kuwiyitse wanda; kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, ‘Nechikuṙumia malaika wakye; na wechikuwaṙa mawokonyi gawo; ulachekapa ṙende igoenyi.’ ”
40004007	Yesu kammbia, “Ngoseṟa kyikyiṟeie, ‘Ulayeshe Mndumii Ruwa opfo.’ ”
40004008	Numa ya iho Mokyiriinzi kamṙuo fumvunyi lyileshi mnu, kamloṟa ngyuuchilyi tsoose tsa wuyana, na wung'anyi wotso,
40004009	kammbia, “Ishi shoose ngyechikuenenga, kongyiindia.”
40004010	Naaho-ng'u Yesu alemmbia, “Wuka iha, Satana, kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, ‘India Mndumii Ruwa opfo, umterewe oe amonyi.’ ”
40004011	Numa ya iho Mokyiriinzi kamleka; na malaika wakacha wakamtarama.
40004012	Yesu amwicho kye Yohane Mpatisi nampfungye, naleyenda mṟasa Galyilaya.
40004013	Kawuka Nasareti, kacha kakaa Kaperinaumu, mṟi ukyeri mbai ya ipalyipalyi, mṟasenyi o Sabulon na Naftalyi;
40004014	kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyileṙeṙo nyi moonguo shisuku Yesaya, echigamba,
40004015	“Uruka lo Sabulon na uruka lo Naftalyi, ṟuko lya ipalyipalyi, molyolya o Yoridan, Galyilaya ya wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa.
40004016	Wandu walya wakyeri meemenyi wammbona saa ing'anyi, na walya wakyeri urukyenyi lo kyirinje kya upfu, ngyeela yammboneka kowo.”
40004017	Wookyia kyiyeri-kyo Yesu nalewooka ionguo mbonyi ngyicha, na igamba, “Ṙumbuyenyi wunyamaṟi kyipfa Wumangyi wo ruwewu womtikyira kufuhi.”
40004018	Na oe kyiyeri aweichumia mbai ya ipalyipalyi lya Galyilaya, nalewona wana wa mka wawi, Simion ekyelago Petiro na Anderea mono-wamae wechiwiyitsa ndusu tseṙeia makunga ipalyipalyinyi; kyipfa wawekyeri wandu wekyeṙega makunga.
40004019	Kawawia, “Ngyioshenyi, na inyi ngyechimugaluo muwe wandu wekyeṙega wandu.”
40004020	Cha ilyi wakaṙa ndusu tsilya tsawo tseṙega makunga, wakamwosha.
40004021	Kaengyeṟa ichumia, kawona wana wengyi wa mka wawi, Yakobo mana o Sebedayo, na Yohane mono-wamae, wakyeri ngalawenyi hamwi na Sebedayo awu-yawo, wechiachikyia ndusu tsawo tseṙega makunga; kawalaga.
40004022	Cha ilyi wakaṙa ngalawa iya yawo na awu-yawo wakamwosha.
40004023	Na oe nawetenga-tenga urukyenyi lo Galyilaya loose, echilosha masinagoginyi gawo na ilosha Mbonyi Ngyicha ya Wumangyi, na ikyiṟa ndoṟe na wufafa wo orio mbaṟe wandunyi.
40004024	Na mbonyi tsakye tsikaṙunganana urukyenyi lo Shamu loose; wakamwendie woose waweluoe, wawoṙo nyi orio ndoṟe na orio ilyiso wukyiwa, wawoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho, na wekyeuma nguku, na wapfiie ngapfu ura lumwi; kawakyiṟa.
40004025	Na wuingyi wo wandu wukomwosha, iwookyia Galyilaya na Dekapolyi, na Yerusalemu na Uyuda, na molyolya o Yoridan.
40005001	Na oe kyiyeri alewona wuingyi wo wandu, naleṙo na fumvunyi; na amṙamie, wanalosho wakye walecha na kokye.
40005002	Kawooka iwalosha echigamba,
40005003	“Wagusu iwo wawoṙe wukyiwa wo mrima; kyipfa Wumangyi wo ruwewu nyi wowo.
40005004	Wagusu iwo wawasokyie nyi fowa; kyipfa iwo wechiwiyiṟio moo.
40005005	Wagusu iwo wawoṙe wuhoo; kyipfa iwo wechioṟa uruka.
40005006	Wagusu iwo wawoṙe njaa na nyoṙa ya wusumganyi; kyipfa iwo wechiigutso.
40005007	Wagusu iwo wawoṙe isaṟia; kyipfa iwo wechiwona isaṟia.
40005008	Wagusu iwo wawoṙe mrima mmbaṙami; kyipfa iwo wechiwona Ruwa.
40005009	Wagusu iwo wekyeende ufoṟo; kyipfa iwo wechilago wana wa Ruwa.
40005010	Wagusu iwo wechipfulutso nyashi kyipfa kya iwa wasumganyi; kyipfa Wumangyi wo ruwewu nyi wowo.
40005011	Wagusu nyoe ilyi wechimkapa kyipfa kya wusumganyi na impfulutsa nyashi na imuiria orio kyindo kyiwicho kui wongo, kyipfa kyako.
40005012	Chihiyonyi, na ikyesa; kyipfa wori wonyu nyi wung'anyi ruwewu. Kyipfa nyi wuṙo walepfulutsa nyashi weonguo shisuku walemusongoya nyoe.”
40005013	“Nyoe nyi munyu o wuyana. Kyaindi munyu ukyeri unyamaṟikyie owiko-kyi mṟasa uṙahie? Ochiwaṙa-se kyiira maa ale-pfo, sile iwiyitso nja na ichumo-chumo nyi wandu.
40005014	Nyoe nyi saa ya wuyana. Mṟi oiṙima ikuṟiika ukyeri wuye ya fumvu-pfo.
40005015	Maa wandu wekyekoṟa taa na iiwikyia handu hakuṟiikyie-pfo, kyaindi handu hakuirie; nayo ikalyimikyia woose wakyeri numba.
40005016	Na wuṙo ngyeela yanyu ilyimikye mbele ya wandu, waiṙime iwona mawuto ganyu mecha, waṟumishe Awu-yonyu akyeri ruwewu.”
40005017	“Mulakusaṟe kye ngyilecha iilacha mawawaso na shilya weonguo shisuku wagambie. Ote. Ngyilecha iilacha-pfo, kyaindi iichuṟia.
40005018	Kyipfa, ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, mṟasa kyiyeri ruwewu na uruka shechiwuka ho, maa kyindo kyitung'tu kya mawawaso kyechiwuka ho-pfo, mṟasa shoose shiafukyie.
40005019	Kyasia mndu oose echinyamaṟa iwawaso lyimwi kyiiṙi kya iga gai matutu, na ilosha wandu kuṙo, nechilago mtutu kuta woose Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu; kyaindi mndu echigaosha na igalosha, icho nechilago ang'anyi Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu.
40005020	Kyipfa ngammbia-kye wusumganyi wonyu wulandeng'anie wulya wo walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, mochiiṙa maa ale na Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu-pfo.”
40005021	“Mulemuicho chandu wandu wa kacha walewio ulawaage; na mndu kawaaga kyimmbaṟi ianduyo.
40005022	Kyaindi inyi ngammbia, orio mndu mokapo nyi nyashi kyipfa kya mono-wamae kyimmbaṟi ianduyo. Na mndu molahia mono-wamae, kyimmbaṟi iṙeṙio moondu. Na mndu kamlaga tondo, kyimmbaṟi ngyehena ya moṙo.
40005023	Kyasia koende kyiano kyapfo na mbele ya Ruwa, na kunu kokumbuo kye mono-womoo nawoṙe ṙeṙo na iyoe,
40005024	ṙa kyiano-kyo kyapfo mbele ya Ruwa, uyende, uachikyie kuwooka mbonyi tsapfo na mono-womoo, numa uwuye uenengyie kyiano kyapfo.
40005025	Achikyia iwinyi mbonyi tsapfo na ulya uwoṙe na oe moondu kyiyeri uṙuṙanyi na oe njienyi; ulya uwoṙe na oe moondu alachekuṙuo ko moṙumbuo moondu, na moṙumbuo moondu kakuṙuo ko asikari, kowiyitso kyipfungonyi.
40005026	Ny'kyaloi, ngakuwia, ochiwuka pfo maa ale-pfo mṟasa umarise itaa helo iya ya mafurumionyi.”
40005027	“Muleicho kye kyikyigambe, ulaṟuguye maa ulaṟuguyo.
40005028	Kyaindi inyi ngammbia orio mndu aambuya mndu mka kui imlanga, amumṟuguya ipfo mrimenyi kokye.
40005029	Riso lyapfo lya kulyoe lyikakutewe, lyikuluoe ulyiwiyitse kuleshi na iyoe; kyipfa kyikuwaṟi kyoonyi kyapfo kyimwi kyiṙekye kundu mmbiu opfo oose ulawiyitso ngyehenenyi.
40005030	Na kuwoko kopfo ko kulyoe kukokutewe, ṙumbuo kuwoko-ko uwiyitse kuleshi na iyoe. Kyipfa kyikuwaṟi kyoonyi kyapfo kyimwi kyiṙekye, kundu mmbiu opfo oose ulawiyitso ngyehenenyi.”
40005031	“Kyiwekyiṙeṙe taa, mndu kaṙa mka okye, namwenengye kyiṟeio kyelekana na oe.
40005032	Kyaindi inyi ngammbia, orio mndu aṙa mka okye, sile ko mbonyi tsa wuṟui, namgaluo mṟui; na mndu kaalyika ulya aṙio naṟuguya.”
40005033	“Ngoseṟa mulemuicho chandu wandu wa kacha walewio, ulalye nyamu kui rina lya Ruwa, kyaindi afutsia nyamu tsapfo ko Mndumii.
40005034	Kyaindi inyi ngammbia, molalye nyamu maa ale; maa kui ruwewu, kyipfa ikyo nyi kyiṙi kya Ruwa kya wuchilyi.
40005035	Maa kui uruka, kyipfa nyiho hewikyia maṙende gakye; maa kui Yerusalemu, kyipfa nyicho mṟi o mangyi ang'anyi.
40005036	Maa ulalye nyamu kui mṙoe opfo, kyipfa oiṙima igaluo uchui lumwi iwa uwiṟo ang'u njuu-pfo.
40005037	Kyaindi maṙeṙo ganyu gawe yee, yee; ote, ote; kyipfa gaelewetsie igo gawukyie ko ulya mmbicho.”
40005038	“Mulemuicho kye kyikyigambe, riso ko riso, na yego ko yego;
40005039	kyaindi inyi ngammbia, mulawingane na mndu mmbicho; kyaindi mndu akukapa nguchu ya ura lo kulyoe, mgalutsie na nguchu ya kawi.
40005040	Na mndu akundi ikulaga moondunyi na iṙuo iwale lyapfo, mṙeeye na ijoho taa.
40005041	Na mndu echikuitika uyende na oe mailyi imwi, yenda na oe tsiwi.
40005042	Akuterewa, mwenengye; na mndu akundi iakuo kopfo ulamwime.”
40005043	“Mulemuicho kye kyikyigambe, ukunde momṟasa opfo, na usuo mokyituwa opfo.
40005044	Kyaindi inyi ngammbia, kundenyi washituwa wanyu, terewienyi walya waimpfulutsa nyashi;
40005045	kundu muiṙime iwa wana wa Awu-yonyu akyeri ruwewu. Kyipfa oe nekyeenenga mmbaṟi okye wawicho na wecha, nekyeolotsia mvuo wasumganyi na walai wasumganyi.
40005046	Kyipfa mukokunda wamukundi nyoe tupu, mowona wori wuha? Maa wesania ukamba, wekyeṟunda isho isho-pfoe?
40005047	Ngoseṟa mukoiṟikyiṟa wana wa wamanyu tupu, moṟunda kyi kya ngoseṟa? Maa wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa wekyewuta cha isho-pfoe?
40005048	Kyasia nyoe mochiwa wandu walawoṙe mti, chandu Awu-yonyu o ruwewu alawoṙe mti.”
40006001	“Mulaloṟe wucha wonyu mbele ya wandu, kundu wamuambuye. Kyipfa mukoṟunda muṙo, mowona wori ko Awu-yonyu akyeri ruwewu-pfo.
40006002	Kyasia kyiyeri-kyo uienengyia kyiano kyesaṟia molakushele, chandu wakulembecheṟi wekyewuta ipfo masinagoginyi na njienyi, kundu waṟumisho nyi wandu.
40006003	Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, wammbona wori wowo. Kyaindi kyiyeri iyoe uienengyia kyiano kyesaṟia, maa kuwoko kopfo ko kumoso kulamanye kyindo kuwoko kopfo ko kulyoe kuiṟunda.
40006004	Kyiano kyapfo kyesaṟia kyiwe kui kyiṟika; na Awu-yopfo ulya ekyewona maa shilya shikuṟiikyie nechikuenenga iṟikoso.”
40006005	“Ngoseṟa kyiyeri muiterewa, mulawe cha wakulembecheṟi; kyipfa wo wakundi iterewa wagoṟokyi masinagoginyi na mbai ya njia, kundu wawono nyi wandu. Ny'kyaloi, ngyimmbia, wamuambilyia wori wowo.
40006006	Kyaindi iyoe kyiyeri-kyo uiterewa, iṙa na kyiṟinyi kyapfo uwiirie moongo, na komshinga moongo opfo, uterewe mbele ya Awu-yopfo akyeri handu hakuṟiikyie; na Awu-yopfo ekyewona maa shilya shikuṟiikyie nechikuenenga iṟikoso.
40006007	Na nyoe kyiyeri-kyo mukyeri kyiterewonyi, mulagambe shindo shifoi shilawoṙe kyiira, cha wandu walaichi Ruwa, kyipfa wo wekyekusaṟa kye wechiaṙanyio kyipfa kya maṙeṙo gawo iwa gafoi.
40006008	Kyasia mulawe cha iwo; kyipfa Awu-yonyu naichi shilya mukundi maa nyoe mulamterewa.
40006009	Kyasia nyoe terewenyi kuṙi, ‘Awu-yoṙu ukyeri ruwewu, Rina lyapfo lyitano lyiele,
40006010	Wumangyi wopfo wuche, kyindo ukundi kyiṟundikye, iha wuyanenyi cha kulya ruwewu.
40006011	Uluenengye kando kaṙu inu.
40006012	Uluhooṟie maṙeko gaṙu, chandu na soe lokyehooṟia walya wekyeluṙekyio.
40006013	Na ulaluṙuo kyiyeshionyi, kyaindi ulukyiṟe ngyeṟo tsa ulya mmbicho. [Cha kyipfa Wumangyi nyi wopfo, na pfinya, na mng'ano, mṟasa mlungana. Amen.’ ”]
40006014	“Cha kyipfa mukohooṟia wandu maṙeko gawo, na Awu-yonyu o ruwewu nechimuhooṟia nyoe.
40006015	Kyaindi mulandehooṟie wandu maṙeko gawo, maa Awu-yonyu echimuhooṟia nyoe maṙeko ganyu-pfo.”
40006016	“Ngoseṟa kyiyeri moṙumbuo ikuretekyia kundu muṟumishe Ruwa, mulawe cha wakulembecheṟi wawoṙe shaam shiwoṙe nzineeri. Kyipfa wekyenyamaṟa shaam shawo, kundu wawono nyi wandu kye wailya maa inyo-pfo. Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, wamuambilyia wori wowo.
40006017	Kyaindi iyoe kyiyeri okuretekyia, kushie mafuṙa mṙoenyi, usambe kyaam;
40006018	kundu ulawono nyi wandu kye nokuretekyia, sile nyi Awu-yopfo akyeri handu hakuṟiikyie, na Awu-yopfo ekyewona maa shilya shikuṟiikyie nechikuenenga iṟikoso.”
40006019	“Mulakoome shindo sha woguru kyipfa kyanyu iha wuyanenyi, handu mashinu na koṟa shekyenyamaṟa, na mbafu tsekyefunja na iiwa.
40006020	Kyaindi koomenyi shindo sha woguru kyipfa kyanyu ruwewu, kulekyenyamaṟika kyindo kyipfa kya mashinu maa koṟa, maa mbafu tsilekyefunja na iiwa.
40006021	Kyipfa handu kyindo kyapfo kya woguru kyikyeri na ho-ndu na mrima opfo ochikaa.”
40006022	“Taa ya mmbiu nyi riso. Kyasia riso lyapfo lyechiṟunda necha mmbiu opfo oose ochiwaṙa ngyeela.
40006023	Kyaindi riso lyapfo lyikanyamaṟika, mmbiu opfo oose ochiwaṙa meema. Kyasia ngyeela iya ikyeri kopfo ikawa meema; nyi meema ung'anyi mnu!”
40006024	“Kuwoṙe mndu echiiṙima iṟundia wandumii wawi-pfo; cha kyipfa nechisuo ichu, na ikunda ichu; ang'u nechikuwaṙa na ichu na imina ichu. Moiṙima iṟundia Ruwa na masaa-pfo.
40006025	Kyipfa kya ikyo ngammbia, mulawinie moo yanyu, mulye kyi ang'u munyo kyi; maa mmbiu yanyu muṟaae kyi. Moo chi ngoseṟa ya kyelya, na mmbiu chi ngoseṟa ya kyindo kyeṟaa?
40006026	Ambuyenyi shileye sha ngyinenyi kye shekyeṙonga-pfo, maa shekyesambuo-pfo, maa shekyesania kyikumbinyi-pfo; na awu-yonyu o ruwewu nekyeshiembeṟa shoose. Nyoe muwoṙe woguru wung'anyi kuta shileye-sho-pfoe?
40006027	Nyi wui konyu maa kakuwinisha eiṙima iengyeṟa maa ale mfiri yakye ya iha wuyanenyi?
40006028	Kyatarama kyi iwinia shindo sheṟaa? Kusaṟenyi kya shiwaṟo sha maṙemenyi, chandu shekyeṙo. Shekyeṟunda-pfo, maa shekyeoka-pfo.
40006029	Na inyi ngammbia kye maa Solomon mng'anonyi okye oose aleṟiko necha cha shiwaṟo-shi pfo.
40006030	Kyasia, kokooya Ruwa nekyeṟika kuṙo melyi tsa maṟa gai ho inu na ngama gakawiyitso moṙonyi, ngyesa echimṟika nyoe lya ngoseṟa, nyoe wa iiṙikyia lyifofo-pfoe?
40006031	Kyasia mulakuwinishe, mochigamba, lulye kyi, ang'u lunyo kyi, ang'u lpṟaae kyi?
40006032	Cha kyipfa isho shoose wandu walaṙikyie Ruwa wekyeshipfula. Na awu-yonyu o ruwewu naichi kye mukundi isho shoose.
40006033	Kyaindi pfulenyi kuwooka Wumangyi wokye, na wusumganyi wokye; na isho shoose mochiengyeṟio.
40006034	Kyasia mulakuwinishe na sha ngama; kyipfa ngama yekuwinia imonyi. Kyishikyie ikuwinisha orio mfiri na ngyuukyiwa tsa mfiri-cho.”
40007001	“Mulaanduye, mulacheanduyo nyoe.
40007002	Kyipfa chandu muianduya wengyi na wuṙo mochianduyo. Na kyiyeṟo kyilya mueṟa nakyo mochiyeṟio.
40007003	Kyasia, ny'kyilyi uiambuya kyiunana kyikyeri risonyi lya mono-womoo, na mriti-cho ukyeri ipfo risonyi lyapfo ulauambuye?
40007004	Ang'u nowia kuṙa mono-womoo, ‘Ngyileka ngyiwute kyiunana ipfo risonyi lyapfo,’ na kunu kuwoṙe mriti ipfo risonyi lyapfo?
40007005	Iyoe mkulembecheṟi, wuta kuwooka mriti-cho ipfo risonyi lyapfo; naaho-ng'u ochiwona necha iwuta kyiunana kyilya kyikyeri risonyi lya mono-womoo.
40007006	Mulaenengye shite kyilya kyikyeri kyiele. Maa mulawiyitse lulu tsanyu mbele ya nguwe. Tsilachetsichuma-chuma, tsikagaluka na imtafuo-tafuo.”
40007007	“Terewenyi na nyoe mochienengo. Pfulenyi, na nyoe mochiwona. Kape-kapenyi moongo na nyoe mochipfunguyo.
40007008	Kyipfa orio moterewa nekyeambilyia; na ulya mopfula nekyewona; na ulya mokapa-kapa moongo nechipfunguyo moongo.
40007009	Ang'u kuwoṙe mndu uha konyu, mono-kye kamterewa mkate, echimwenenga igoe?
40007010	Ang'u kamterewa ikunga, echimwenenga njoka?
40007011	Kyasia kokooya nyoe, mui wawicho, muichi ienenga wana wanyu shienengo shicha, ngyesa chi ngoseṟa mnu Awu onyu akyeri ruwewu echienenga mecha walya wekyemterewa-pfoe?
40007012	Kyasia shoose mukundi muṟundio nyi wandu, na nyoe waṟundienyi kuṙo. Kyipfa iga nyigo mawawaso na malosho ga weonguo shisuku.”
40007013	“Iṙenyi na numba kui moongo ulya msuse. Kyipfa moongo nyi umlandari, na njia iyendie wuṙetsinyi nyi ingyilandari, na nyi wafoi wekyeiṙa na numba kui moongo-cho.
40007014	Kyaindi moongo nyi umsuse, na njia iyendie moonyi o mlungana nyi ingyisuse, na wekyeiwona nyi sa waangu.”
40007015	“Kushowenyi na weonguo shisuku wa wongo, wandu wekyecha na konyu wakyeri cha moondo, kyaindi ipfo mrimenyi kowo nyi shisii shilang'a.
40007016	Mochiwamanya kui ndunda tsawo. Ngyesa wandu wekyehaa sabibu mshenyi, ang'u ndunda ngyicha tseloṙa nduonyi?
40007017	Na wuṙo orio ikyiṙi lyicha lyekyekumbia ndunda ngyicha; na ikyiṙi lyiwicho lykyekumbia ndunda ngyiwicho.
40007018	Ikyiṙi lyicha lyeiṙima ikumbia ndunda ngyiwicho maa ikyiṙi lyiwicho ndunda ngyicha-pfo.
40007019	Orio ikyiṙi lyilekyekumbia ndunda ngyicha lyekyemanyo na iwiyitso moṙonyi.
40007020	Kyasia na wuṙo kyikyeri kui ndunda tsawo mochiwamanya.”
40007021	“Chi orio mndu ekyengyiwia, ‘Mndumii, Mndumii’ echiiṙa na ipfo Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu-pfo; sile ulya ekyeosha shilya Awu oko akyeri ruwewu akundi.
40007022	Wafoi wechingyiwia mfiri ulya, ‘Mndumii, Mndumii, luleonguo shisuku kui rina lyapfo, na kui rina lyapfo iwuta waṟufui wawicho, na kui rina lyapfo iwuta shindo shifoi sha maṟiyisho?’
40007023	Naaho-ng'u ngyechiwawia na pata, ‘Ngyimuichi nyoe maa ale-pfo. Wukyenyi koko, nyoe mokyeṟunda mawicho.’ ”
40007024	“Kyasia orio mndu ekyeicho maṙeṙo-ga gako na igaosha, nechiwa cha mndu awoṙe wuṟango, alewika numba yakye wuye ya iṟaṟa.
40007025	Mvuo ikakapa, mra ung'anyi ukocha, shiwiṟi shikakuma, shikakapa numba iya, ilaolokye; kyipfa ingyiyekyie wuye ya iṟaṟa.
40007026	Na orio mndu echiicho maṙeṙo gako alagaoshe, nechiwa cha mndu mtondo, alewika numba yakye wuye ya mlelya;
40007027	mvuo ikakapa, mra ung'anyi ukocha, shiwiṟi shikakuma, shikakapa numba iya, ikaoloka, na ioloka lyayo lyikawa lying'anyi.”
40007028	Na lyilya Yesu alemarisa igamba kuṙo, wuingyi wo wandu wuleṟiyio mnu kyipfa kya malosho gakye.
40007029	Cha kyipfa naweiwalosha cha mndu awoṙe wuchilyi, maa chi cha walya wawekyelosha mawawaso-pfo.
40008001	Na oe kyiyeri alesoka kulya fumvunyi, wuingyi wufoi wo wandu wulemwosha.
40008002	Kukocha mndu awoṙo nyi ndoṟe ya taambo kamwindia echigamba, “Mndumii, kokunda, noiṙima ingyiyeṟemtsa.”
40008003	Yesu kagoṟuo kuwoko kampaaya, echigamba, “Ngyikundi; yeṟemka.” Na cha ilyi ndoṟe yakye ya taambo ikammbuka.
40008004	Yesu kammbia. “Ulawie mndu; kyaindi yenda, undekuloṟa ko mkohanyi, undeenengyia kyiano chandu Mose alegamba, kyiwe wuṟingyishi kowo.”
40008005	Na kyiyeri aleiṙa na Kaperinaumu mchilyi umwi mtutu nalecha na kokye.
40008006	Kamterewa, echigamba, “Mndumii, mṟundi oko nalee kanyi, nawoṙo nyi ndoṟe ya ipfa ngapfu ura lumwi, naiwawio mnu.”
40008007	Yesu kammbia, “Ngyeecha, ngyimkyiṟe.”
40008008	Mchilyi ulya kamgaluo, kagamba, “Mndumii, inyi ngyiwaṟi iyoe uiṙe na numba koko-pfo; kyaindi gamba ṙeṙo lyimwi tikyi, na mṟundi oko nechichia.
40008009	Cha kyipfa inyi nyi mndu ngyiwoṙe wuchilyi, ngyiwoṙe asikari wanda yako; ngawia ichu, ‘yenda’ nekyeyenda; na ichu, ‘nnjo’ nekyecha; na kyisinga kyako, ‘wuta kuṙi’, kyekyewuta.”
40008010	Kyiyeri Yesu aleicho isho, naleṟiyio, kawia walya waweimwosha, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, ngyilandewone iiṙikyia lying'anyi kuṙi, ko mndu oose kunu Isiraelyi-pfo.
40008011	Na inyi ngammbia, kye wafoi wechicha iwuka ura lo ngamenyi na ura lo kyukonyi, nawo wechiṙamia hamwi na Abrahamu, na Isakyi, na Yakobo Wumangyinyi wo Ruwewu;
40008012	kyaindi wana wa Wumangyi wechiwiyitso meemenyi o nja. Nyipfo kochiwaṙa ṟanyi na ilya ngakuru.”
40008013	Na Yesu kawia mchilyi ulya, “Yenda; kyiwe kopfo chandu oiṙikyia.” Mṟundi ulya okye kachia saa iya iya.
40008014	Kyiyeri Yesu aleshika kanyi ko Petiro, kawona mamka o Petiro, alee kyitaṟenyi nawoṙo nyi isemu.
40008015	Kampaaya kuwoko, isemu lyikamleka; na oe kafuma kawaṟundia.
40008016	Na lyilya kuleila, wakamwendie wandu wafoi wawoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho; kawuta waṟufui wawicho kui ṙeṙo lyakye, kakyiṟa woose walawekuiṙima,
40008017	kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyilya kyikyigambe nyi moonguo shisuku Yesaya, echigamba, “Oe amonyi naleṙuo wufafa woṙu, na iṙuo ndoṟe tsaṙu.”
40008018	Na kyiyeri Yesu alewona wuigyi wufoi wo wandu wochimtengyetia, nalewia wanalosho wakye handu hamwi na oe wayende molyolya.
40008019	Mlosha umwi o mawawaso kayenda kokye, kammbia, “Mlosha, ngyekuosha orio handu ochiyenda.”
40008020	Yesu kammbia, “Mapaara gawoṙe mṟeshe, na shileye sha ngyinenyi shiwoṙe singyi kyaindi Mono-Adamu awoṙe handu heonyonyia-pfo.”
40008021	Ungyi kyiiṙi kya wanalosho wakye kammbia, “Mndumii, ngyienenga momu kuwooka, ngyiyende ngyindeṟika awu-yoko.”
40008022	Kyaindi Yesu kammbia, “Ngyiosha; leka wapfu waṟikye wapfu wawo.”
40008023	Kaṙooya ngalawenyi, wanalosho wakye wakamwosha.
40008024	Kukowaṙa shiwiṟi shing'anyi kulya ipalyipalyinyi; shiwiṟi-sho shikakapa ngalawa iya ikashikyio nyi mṟinga, na oe nawelee maṙoe.
40008025	Wanalosho wakye wakayenda kokye, wakamwamtsa, wechigamba, “Mndumii, luletse, luisia.”
40008026	Kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi mowa waowu, nyoe wa iiṙikyia lyiangu?” Cha ilyi kafuma, kaṙeṙia shiwiṟi na ipalyipalyi; kukotsia sau.
40008027	Wandu walya wakaṟiyio, wechigamba, “Ichu nyi mndu o mbaṟe iha maa shiwiṟi sha ipalyipalyinyi shiosha kyilya aigamba?”
40008028	Na oe kyiyeri aleshika molyolya, urukyenyi lo Wakyerasi, wandu wawi wawoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho walekarisana na oe, wawukyie handu heṟika wandu, walang'a mnu, maa mndu alaiṙime iiṙa njia iya.
40008029	Wakakalagatsa, wechigamba, “Luwoṙe kyikyi na iyoe, Mana o Ruwa? Ngyesa nocha ichelutuura kyiyeri kyaṙu kyilashika?”
40008030	Kyasia, kuleshi nawo kuwewoṙe poo lya nguwe tsifoi tsechilya.
40008031	Waṟufui walya wawicho wakamterewa, wechigamba, “Koluwuta, luṙe luyende, lundeiṙa na kulya poonyi lya nguwe.”
40008032	Kawawia, “Yendenyi.” Wakawuka, wakaiṙa na kulya mmbiunyi ya nguwe; na poo lyilya lyoose lyikasoka halya kyiiṟimikonyi lyeṙicha mṟasa ipalyipalyinyi, lyikapfiia mṟingyenyi.
40008033	Kyaindi walya wawelyisa nguwe-tso waleṙicha, wakayenda mṟinyi, wakaonguo mbonyi-tso kundu koose, na mbonyi tsa walya wawewoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho taa.
40008034	Wandu woose wa mṟi ulya wakafuma indeambilyia Yesu; nawo lyilya walemmbona, walemterewa nawukye mṟasenyi kowo.
40009001	Kaṙooya ngalawenyi, kaambaṙa, kashika mṟinyi kowo.
40009002	Wandu wakamwendie mndu awoṙe ndoṟe ya ipfa ngapfu ura lumwi, alee kyitaṟenyi, na Yesu kyiyeri alewona iiṙikyia lyawo, nalewia ulya awoṙe ndoṟe-yo, “Kuwanze lying'anyi mrimenyi, mono-ko; omhooṟio maṙeko gapfo.”
40009003	Na numa ya iho walosha waata wa mawawaso wakagamba mrimenyi kowo, “Ichu nailahia Ruwa kyipfa naikuloṟa cha ilyi oe nyi Ruwa.”
40009004	Na Yesu, aichi makusaṟo gawo, kagamba, “Ny'kyilyi mukusaṟa shiwicho mrimenyi konyu?
40009005	Kyipfa nyi kyiha kyii kyaangu, nyi igamba, ‘Omhooṟio maṙeko gapfo,’ ang'u nyi igamba, ‘Amka, uyende?’
40009006	Kyaindi muiṙime imanya kye Mono-Adamu nawoṙe wuchilyi wuyanenyi wo hooṟia ngyuunyamaṟi, (Nawia ulya awoṙe ndoṟe ya ipfa ngapfu ura lumwi,) ‘Amka, ukuṙikye kyitaṟa kyapfo uyende kanyi kopfo.’ ”
40009007	Kaamka, kayenda kanyi kokye.
40009008	Kyiyeri wuingyi wo wandu wulemmbona, walewoṙo nyi wuowu, wakang'anyisa Ruwa, aleenenga wandu wuchilyi wo mbaṟe-i.
40009009	Na Yesu kyiyeri aweiṙa awuka pfo nalewona mndu aṙamie handu hesania ukamba mbai ya ipalyipalyi ekyelago Matayo, kammbia, “Ngyiosha.” Kaamka kamwosha.
40009010	Na kyiyeri aleṙamia kanyi nalye kyelya, wesania ukamba wafoi na wanyamaṟi walecha wakaṙamia handu hamwi na Yesu na wanalosho wakye.
40009011	Kyiyeri Mafarisayo walewona, walewia wanalosho wakye, “Ny'kyilyi mlosha onyu ailya handu hamwi na wesania ukamba na wanyamaṟi?”
40009012	Na oe kyiyeri aleicho, nalewawia, “Walya walaluoe wekyepfula mwaanga-pfo, sile walya waluoe.
40009013	Kyaindi yendenyi, mundekulosha kyitambuluo kya maṙeṙo-ga. ‘Ngyikundi isaṟia, maa chi shienengo-pfo’, kyipfa ngyilecha ilaga walya wasumganyi-pfo kyaindi wanyamaṟi.”
40009014	Kyiyeri kyilya wanalosho wa Yohane wakayenda kokye wakagamba, “Ny'kyilyi soe na Mafarisayo lokyekuretekyia kyaindi wanalosho wapfo wekyewuta kuṙo-pfo?”
40009015	Yesu kawawia, “Wawalage wolyinyi weiṙima kuṙa ikapa ṟanyi kyiyeri monyi wolyi akyeri handu hamwi nawo? Kyaindi kochicha mfiri monyi wolyi echiwuto kowo, nyilyo wechikuretekyia.
40009016	Kuwoṙe mndu ekyewika kyiṙami kya nguwo ngyihya nguwonyi ngyiku-pfo. Kyipfa ikyo kyihya kyewuta ho ikyo kyiku na handu halya harandukyie hekyeengyeṟa ing'ana.
40009017	Na wandu wekyewika mpfinyo mhya maselelenyi maku-pfo. Na wakawika pfo, maselela-go gekyepaṟika; mpfinyo ukopusuka, na maselela gakanyamaṟika. Kyaindi wekyewika mpfinyo maselelenyi mahya, shikakyia shoose.”
40009018	Kyiyeri aweiwawia isho, kukocha mchilyi umwi, kamwindia, echigamba, “Mono-ko o kyika napfa wulalu kuṙi; kyaindi nnjo, uwikyie kuwoko kopfo wuye yakye, na oe nechiwaṙa moo.”
40009019	Yesu kaamka, kamwosha, hamwi na wanalosho wakye.
40009020	Na mndu mka awewoṙe ndoṟe yechoṟa kyiyeri kya maka ikumi na iwi, kacha kyanuma kokye, kapaaya ikyechu lya ikunya lyakye.
40009021	Kyipfa nalegamba mrimenyi kokye: Ngapaaya ikyechu lya ikunya lyakye tikyi ngyechichia.
40009022	Yesu kagaluka kammbona, kammbia, “Kuwanze mnu mrimenyi, mono-ko; iiṙikyia lyapfo lyakukyiṟa.” Mndu mka ulya kachia saa iya.
40009023	Kyiyeri Yesu aleshika kanyi ko mchilyi ulya, nalewona wekapa mtoṟiṟo, na wuingyi wo wandu wochikapa ṟanyi.
40009024	Kawawia, “Wukyenyi iha, kyipfa manakye-chu apfiie-pfo, nalee tikyi.” Wakamsaaṟa mnu.
40009025	Kyaindi wuingyi wo wandu wommbuto ho, naleiṙa na numba, kammbaṙa kuwoko; manakye ulya kagoṟoka.
40009026	Mbonyi-tsi tsikaṙunganana uruka lulya loose.
40009027	Kyiyeri Yesu aweiṙa iwuka pfo, shipfupfuṟe shiwi shikamwosha, shikakuilenga, shechigamba, “Ulusaṟie, Mono-Dawidi.”
40009028	Na oe kyiyeri aleshika kanyi, shipfupfuṟe shilya shileyenda kokye na oe kashiwia, “Muiṙikyie kye ngyeiṙima iṟunda ikyi?” Shikammbia, “Yee, Mndumii.”
40009029	Naaho-ng'u kashipaaya meso, kagamba, “Kui kyiyeṟo kya iiṙikyia lyanyu wonenyi.”
40009030	Meso gasho gakatambaṟuka. Na Yesu kashiwia ko pfinya, echigamba, “Ambuyenyi maa mndu alamanye.”
40009031	Kyaindi shikafuma, shikaonguo mbonyi tsakye kulya urukyenyi koose.
40009032	Nawo kyiyeri waweiyenda, wakamwendie mndu ai ndiṟi awoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho.
40009033	Na kyiyeri mṟufui ulya mmbicho alewuto, ulya awei ndiṟi naleṙeṙa, wuingyi wo wandu wakaṟiyio, wakagamba, “Kyilandewonekye kunu Isiraelyi kyiyeri kyoose-pfo.”
40009034	Kyaindi Mafarisayo wakagamba, “Kui pfinya tsa ang'anyi o waṟufui wawicho naiwuta waṟufui wawicho.”
40009035	Na Yesu naweitenga-tenga kyiiṙi kya mṟi yoose na shikaṟo, echilosha masinagoginyi gawo, ionguo Mbonyi Ngyicha tsa Wumangyi; na ichihiṟa ndoṟe tsoose na wufafa wo orio mbaṟe.
40009036	Na kyiyeri alewona wuingyi wo wandu, nalewona wukyiwa mrimenyi kokye kyipfa wawewinie na inyanyaṟika cha moondo galawoṙe mlyisi.
40009037	Naaho-ng'u kawia wanalosho wakye, “Shilyimu nyi shifoi, kyaindi waṟundi nyi waangu.
40009038	Kyasia, terewenyi Monyi ṙema naṙikye waṟundi ṙemenyi lyakye.”
40010001	Kalaga wanalosho wakye ikumi na wawi, kawaenenga pfinya yechilyia waṟufui wawicho, wawawute, na iwuta ndoṟe tsoose na wufafa wo orio mbaṟe.
40010002	Na marina ga wasu-wo ikumi na wawi nyi iga. O kuwooka nyi Simion awekyelago Petiro, na Anderea mono-wamae; Yakobo o Sebedayo, na Yohane mono-wamae.
40010003	Filyipo, na Baritolomayo, Tomasi, na Matayo msani o ukamba; Yakobo mana o Alyifayo, na Tadayo.
40010004	Simion Mkananayo, na Yuda Isikariote, na oe nyi oe alemṟiinga.
40010005	Iwo ikumi na wawi Yesu nalewaṙuma, kawawia, “Ko walya walakyeri Wayuda mulayende, maa mulaiṙe na mṟinyi maa umwi o Wasamaria.
40010006	Nanga moyenda ko wandu wa Isiraelyi waṙekyie cha moondo.
40010007	Na ilyi moyenda, onguonyi mbonyi ngyicha, mochigamba, ‘Wumangyi wo Ruwewu womtikyira kufuhi.’
40010008	Kyiṟenyi waluoe, ṟutsenyi wapfu, yeṟemtsenyi wawoṙo nyi taambo, wutenyi waṟufui wawicho; muleenengo mulaitaa kyindo, enengyienyi mulaitoo kyindo.
40010009	Mulakuṙikye sahapu, maa heleri tsa orio mbaṟe mkunjenyi yanyu.
40010010	Maa mkunja o kyaro, maa mawale gawi, maa shiaṙu, maa upoi; kyipfa mṟundi nawaṟi kyelya kyakye.
40010011	Na orio mṟi na kyikaṟo mochiiṙa napfo, pfulenyi pfo mndu awoṙe kyienengo kyeambilyia wayenu; mkae kokye mṟasa ilyi mochiwuya na kanyi.
40010012	Na nyoe mukoiṙa na kanyi ko mndu-cho muiṟikyiṟenyi.
40010013	Na kokooya mndu-cho na walya wa kanyi kokye wawaṟi, ufoṟo lo Mndumii lukae nawo; indi kokooya walawaṟi, ufoṟo lo Mndumii lummbiyilyie nyoe.
40010014	Na mndu alandemuambilyie na iaṙanyia maṙeṙo ganyu, ilyi mowuka ipfo kokye, ang'u ipfo mṟinyi, kute-kutenyi kyilulyi ipfo maṙendenyi ganyu, iloṟa mowalega nakamwi.
40010015	Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, kyechiwa kyaangu uruka lo Sodoma na Gomora ihooṟio maṙeko mfiri ulya o ianduyo kuta mṟi-cho.”
40010016	“Inyi ngyimṙuma cha moondo ko shisii. Kyasia waṙenyi wuṟango cha njoka, na iwa wahoo cha mbuna.
40010017	Kuṟiisenyi na wandu cha kyipfa wechimṙuo mengyenyi, na masinagoginyi gawo wechimkapa.
40010018	Na nyoe wechimṙuo mbele ya wachilyi na wamangyi kyipfa kyako, iwa wuṟingyishi kowo na ko walya walai Wayuda.
40010019	Kyaindi iho-ndu wechimṙuo, mulakusaṟe-saṟe chandu mochiṙeṙa; kyipfa mochienengo saa-yo shilya mochiṙeṙa.
40010020	Kyipfa chi nyoe muiṙeṙa-pfo, indi nyi Mumuyo o Awu-yonyu aiṙeṙa kui maṙumbu ganyu.
40010021	Na mongari nechiṟiingyia mono-wamae kundu nawoogo, na awu nechiṟiingyia mana, na wana wechigaluka na iwaaga wafee wawo.
40010022	Na nyoe wandu woose wechimsuo kyipfa kya rina lyako; kyaindi ulya echikarishia mṟasa mafurumionyi nyi oe echikyia.
40010023	Kyaindi ilyi wechimfuna mṟinyi umwi, ṙichilyienyi mṟinyi ungyi. Cha kyipfa nyi loi ngammbia mochimarisa ionguo mbonyi mṟinyi ya Isiraelyi Mono-Adamu alacha-pfo.
40010024	Manalosho ekyeiṙa mlosha okye-pfo, na kyisinga kyekyeiṙa mndumii okyo-pfo.
40010025	Kyishikyie manalosho iwa cha mlosha okye, na kyisinga iwa cha mndumii okyo. Kokooya walelaga monyi kanyi Beelyisebulyi ngyesa chi ngoseṟa walya wai wa kanyi kokye-pfoe?”
40010026	“Kyasia, mulawaowuoe, cha kyipfa kuwoṙe kyindo kyikyishikyie maa kyikuṟiikyie kyilechimanyika-pfo.
40010027	Kyilya ngyimmbia nyoe meemenyi, kyigambenyi saenyi. Na kyilya moicho kui kyiṟika, kyionguonyi na pata.
40010028	Mulaowuoe iwo waiwaaga mmbiu, walaiṙime iwaaga na mrima. Nanga moowuo ulya echiiṙima irumatsa mmbiu na mrima taa ngyehenenyi.
40010029	Ngyesa, shileye shiwi shekyekumbo helo imwi-pfoe? Kyaindi maa kyimwi kyekyeṙeka Awu-yonyu alaichi-pfo.
40010030	Kyaindi nyoe maa njui tsa mṙoe yanyu tsingyitale tsoose.
40010031	Kyasia mulaowuoe, nanga nyoe kuta shileye shifoi.”
40010032	“Kyasia, orio mndu echingyiṟingyishia mbele ya wandu, na inyi ngyechimṟingyishia mbele ya Awu-yoko akyeri
40010033	Kyaindi orio mndu echingyikana mbele ya wandu, na inyi ngyechimkana mbele ya Awu-yoko akyeri ruwewu.”
40010034	“Mulakusaṟe ngyilecha iende ufoṟo wuyanenyi. Ote! Ngyilecha iende ufoṟo-pfo, indi ushu.
40010035	Cha kyipfa ngyilecha iṟiingyia mndu na awuye, na mono-waka na wamae, na mndu na mamii okye.
40010036	Na washituwa wa mndu nyi walya wa kanyi kokye.
40010037	Akundi awuye ang'u wamae kuta inyi, angyiwaṟi-pfo, maa akundi mono-kyisoṟo ang'u mono-kyika kuta inyi, angyiwaṟi-pfo.
40010038	Maa mndu alechikuṙika msalaba okye kangyiosha, angyiwaṟi-pfo.
40010039	Mokyiṟa moo okye nechiuṙetsa; na mouṙetsa kyipfa kyako nechiukyiṟa.”
40010040	“Amuambilyia nyoe nangyiambilyia inyi, na oe angyiambilyia inyi, naambilyia ulya alengyiṙuma.
40010041	Moambilyia moonguo shisuku kyipfa oe nyi moonguo shisuku nawaṙilyia wori wo ionguo shisuku; na oe echiambilyia mndu msumganyi kyipfa oe nyi mndu msumganyi, nechiwaṙilyia wori wo mndu msumganyi.
40010042	Na orio mndu echirutsa umwi o iwa watutu mṟinga uichololyia, kyipfa nyi manalosho, ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, wori wokye wochiṙeka maa ale-pfo.”
40011001	Na Yesu kyiyeri alemarisa iṙeṙa na wanalosho wakye ikumi na wawi, nalendelosha na ionguo mbonyi ngyicha mṟinyi yawo.
40011002	Na Yohane kyiyeri aleicho ipfo kyipfungonyi mawuto ga Kristo, naleṙuma wanalosho wakye, immbesa,
40011003	“Iyoe nyi ulya aicha, ang'u luweṙelyie ungyi?”
40011004	Yesu kagaluo kawawia, “Yendenyi mundeongoya Yohane shilya mushiicho na ishiwona;
40011005	shipfupfuṟe shienengo iwona, shiwete shichumia, wawoṙo nyi taambo waiyeṟemtso, wapfu maṙwi waiicho, wapfu waiṟutso, na wakyiwa waiongoyo Mbonyi Ngyicha.
40011006	Agusu orio mndu alammbihie kyipfa kyako.”
40011007	Na wanalosho wa Yohane wamuyende, Yesu nalewooka iongoya wuingyi wo wandu mbonyi tsa Yohane. “Mulefuma iyenda nuka iambuya kyikyi? Unyatsi lochiṙeṙemsho nyi mkuma?
40011008	Kyaindi mulefuma indewona kyi? Mndu amṟikye nguwo tsa wusuṟi? Wandu waṟee nguwo tsa wusuṟi wakyeri numbenyi tsa kyimangyi.
40011009	Kyaindi kyitewe mukofuma nyi kyikyi? Nyi iwona moonguo shisuku? Yee loi, ngammbia, na akyeri ang'anyi kuta moonguo shisuku.
40011010	Ichu nyi oe shiṟeio shilegamba, ‘Inyi, ngyiṙuma mndu oko mbele ya ushangu lopfo, echisungusia njia yapfo.’ ”
40011011	Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia kulandewaṙe mndu kyiiṙi kya walya wawafee nyi waka akyeri ang'anyi kuta Yohane Mpatisi-pfo. Kyaindi akyeri mtutu Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu nyi nang'anyi kuta oe.
40011012	Wookyia kyiyeri kya Yohane Mpatisi mṟasa wulalu Wumangyi wo ruwewu wokyecha ko pfinya, na iwo wawoṙe pfinya waiwurakuo.
40011013	Cha kyipfa weonguo shisuku na uwawaso waleonguo mṟasa Yohane.
40011014	Na kokooya mukundi iiṙikyia, oe nyi oe Elyiya ulya echicha.
40011015	Awoṙe maṙwi, naaṙanyie.
40011016	“Kyaindi ngyechilyingatsana na kyi rika-lyi? Lyikyeri cha wana wekyeṙamia sangaṙa, wekyelaga oṙiawo, wechigamba,
40011017	‘Lulekapa mtoṟiṟo kyipfa kyanyu, maa muletema-pfo; lulekapa ṟanyi maa mulawoṙo nyi wukyiwa.’
40011018	Kyipfa Yohane nalecha, alailya maa alainyo, wakagamba, ‘Nawoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho.’
40011019	Mono-Adamu nalecha, echilya na inyo, wakagamba, ‘Ichu nawoṙe ndewu, nyi mnanzi, mbuya ya wesania ukamba na wanyamaṟi!’ Na wuṟango wo Ruwa wochimanyika kui shindo wuṟango-wo wuiṟunda.”
40011020	Naaho-ng'u kawooka iṙeṙia mṟi iya kyiiṙi kyayo kuleṟundika shiṟiyisho shakye shifoi, kyipfa ileṙumbuya wunyamaṟi-pfo.
40011021	“Ochia lopfo, Korasini! Ochia lopfo Betisaida! Kyipfa cha kokooya shiṟiyisho shilewutika konyu shilewutika kulya Tiro na Sidon wawechiṙumbuya wunyamaṟi kyiyeri kyileshi kyileiṙa kui iṟaa masaṟa na ikushia ifui.
40011022	Kyaindi ngammbia, kyechiwa kyaangu Tiro na Sidon ikarishia ngapo tsawo mfiri o ianduyo kuta nyoe.
40011023	Na iyoe Kaperinaumu, ngyesa noching'anyiso mṟasa ruwewu? Nochisotso mṟasa ko waṟumu cha kyipfa shiṟiyisho shilewutika kopfo shiwechiwutika kulya Sodoma, mṟi-cho uwechiṙio ho mṟasa inu.
40011024	Kyaindi ngammbia, kyechiwa kyaangu ko uruka lo Sodoma ikarishia ngapo yalo mfiri o ianduyo kuta iyoe.”
40011025	Kyiyeri kyilya Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Ngakuana, Awu, Mndumii o ruwewu na uruka, kyipfa shindo-shi ulekunda ishitambuluya wawoṙe wuṟango-pfo, kyaindi kotambuluya wana watutu.
40011026	Yee, loi, Awu, kyipfa nyi wuṙo kyilechihiṟa mbele yapfo.”
40011027	Kagamba, “Ngyimṙambikye shoose na Awu-yoko, maa kuwoṙe aichi Mana, sile Awu-pfo; maa kuwoṙe aichi Awu, sile Mana-pfo, na orio oose ulya Mana akunda imtambuluya.
40011028	Nnjonyi na koko, nyoe moose muiwina na muwalemie nyi maṟio, na inyi ngyechimuonyonyisha.
40011029	Waṙilyienyi iṟunda-lyi ngyimṙambika, mukuloshe koko; kyipfa inyi ngyimhoo na muindi mrimenyi; na nyoe mochiwaṙa ufoṟo mrimenyi konyu.
40011030	Cha kyipfa kyilya ngyimmbia kyikyicha konyu, na ṟio ngyimṙika lyilyiangu.”
40012001	Kyiyeri kyilya Yesu naleiṙa maṙemenyi mfiri o onyonya. Wanalosho wakye wakawoṙo nyi njaa, wakawooka itumuo magaa ga nganu wakalya.
40012002	Na lyilya Mafarisayo walewona walemmbia, “Wanalosho wapfo waiṟunda kyindo kyilakyeri sungusinyi ikyiṟunda mfiri o onyonya.”
40012003	Kawawia, “Muichi kyindo Dawidi alewuta, lyilya alewoṙo nyi njaa, oe na woṙoe?
40012004	Chandu aleiṙa na numbenyi ya Ruwa, kalya mkate iya ngyeele, mkate kyilakyeri sungusinyi kokye maa ko woṙoe iilya, sile ko makohanyi wawenyi?
40012005	Maa muichi chandu kyikyiṟeie ipfo mawawasonyi, kye mfiri o onyonya makohanyi numbenyi ya Ruwa wekyefanyiṟa mfiri o onyonya walatalyio wunyamaṟi?
40012006	Kyaindi ngammbia, kye iha nakyeri ho ai ang'anyi kuta numba ya Ruwa.
40012007	Kyaindi kokooya muweichi kyitambuluo kya maṙeṙo-ga, ‘Ngyikundi isaṟia, maa chi shienengo-pfo,’ muwechigamba wawoṙe ṙeko iwo walawatalyie wunyamaṟi-pfo!
40012008	Cha kyipfa Mono-Adamu nyi oe Mndumii o mfiri o onyonya.”
40012009	Kawuka pfo, kaiṙa na sinagoginyi lyawo.
40012010	Na kuwewoṙe mndu awoṙe kuwoko kupfiie ngapfu. Kyasia kundu waiṙime iwona kyindo kyemmbusia wuwingo wakammbesa, “Nyi sungusinyi ikyiṟa wandu mfiri o onyonya?”
40012011	Kawawia, “Nyi mndu uha kyiiṙi kyanyu awoṙe ondo lyimwi, na ondo-lyo lyikaoloka mkuwenyi mfiri o onyonya, alechilyiwaṙa nalyikyiṟe?
40012012	Ngyesa mndu awoṙe kyiira kying'anyi kuta ondo kafong'ui-pfoe? Kyasia nyi sungusinyi iṟunda mecha mfiri o onyonya.”
40012013	Naaho-ng'u kawia mndu ulya, “Goṟuo kuwoko kopfo.” Kagoṟuo kuwoko, kukochia, kukowaṙa pfinya cha kulya ko kawi.
40012014	Kyaindi Mafarisayo walya wakalya wuṟiingyi chandu wechimrumatsa.
40012015	Na Yesu aicho isho shoose nalewuka pfo; na wandu wafoi wakamwosha; kawakyiṟa woose.
40012016	Kawaima walamṟingyishie;
40012017	kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyikyigambe nyi moonguo shisuku Yesaya, echigamba,
40012018	“Ambuya, mṟundi oko ngyilemsambuṟa; mkunde oko, mrima oko umchihiye kyipfa kyakye; ngyechimwenenga pfinya ya Mumuyo oko, na oe nechianduya wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa.
40012019	Echiṙeṙa maa ikuilenga na ṟui lyakye-pfo; maa mndu echiicho ṟui lyakye njienyi-pfo.
40012020	Echituura mndu mfafa-pfo, maa echiinyala ulya alawoṙe kyitarama-pfo, mṟasa naenengye ianduyo wuwinzi.
40012021	Na rina lyakye wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa wechilyikusuria.”
40012022	Kyiyeri kyilya kaendio mndu awoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho, kyipfupfuṟe kyiwekyeiṙima iṙeṙa; kamkyiṟa, na ulya alaweiṙima iṙeṙa kaṙeṙa na iambuo.
40012023	Wuingyi wo wandu wukoṟiyio, wakagamba, “Ichu chi mono-Dawidi-pfoe?”
40012024	Kyaindi lyilya Mafarisayo waleicho, walegamba, “Ichu naifuna waṟufui wawicho kui pfinya tsa ang'anyi o waṟufui wawicho.”
40012025	Kyasia Yesu aichi makusaṟo gawo, kawawia, “Wumangyi wukowaṙa wuṟiingyi, kokyewaṙa wukyiwa; ngoseṟa mṟi ang'u kanyi kukowaṙa wuṟiingyi kuwoṙe kyindo kyechiiṙima igoṟoka-pfo.
40012026	Na Satana kafuna Satana, nakuṟiinga oe amonyi, kyasia wumangyi wokye wochigoṟoka wuṙa?
40012027	Na inyi ngafuna waṟufui wawicho kui pfinya tsa ang'anyi o waṟufui wawicho, ngyesa wana wanyu wekyefuna waṟufui wawicho kui pfinya tsa wui? Kyipfa kya ikyo iwo nyiwo wechimuanduya.
40012028	Kyaindi inyi ngafuna waṟufui wawicho kui Mumuyo o Ruwa, kyasia Wumangyi wo Ruwa wommaa icha na konyu.
40012029	Ang'u mndu neiṙima kuṙa iiṙa na numbenyi ya mndu awoṙe pfinya na imsoka shindo shakye, alapfunga kuwooka icho awoṙe pfinya? Nyi lyo-ng'u echiiṙima iwaṙa numba-yo ko pfinya.
40012030	Mndu alakyeri hamwi na inyi ekyeoshana na inyi-pfo; na mndu alekyesania hamwi na inyi nekyeola-ola.
40012031	Kyipfa kya ikyo ngammbia, ‘Orio wunyamaṟi na orio ṙeṙo lyelahia Ruwa wandu wechihooṟio, kyaindi ko ilahia Mumuyo wechihooṟio-pfo.
40012032	Na mndu oose echiṙeṙa Mono-Adamu uwicho nechihooṟio, kyaindi ulya echiṙeṙa Mumuyo Mweele uwicho echihooṟio-pfo.’ ”
40012033	“Kundu ikyiṙi lyiwe lyicha kyiwaṟi iwaṙa ndunda ngyicha; kyaindi kokooya nuwoṙe ikyiṙi lyiwicho na ndunda tsechiwiha, cha kyipfa ikyiṙi lyekyemanyika kui ndunda tsalyo.
40012034	Nyoe maalea ga njoka, moiṙima kuṙa iṙeṙa shindo shicha, mui wawicho? Kyipfa, ṙumbu lya mndu lyekyeṙeṙa shilya shiichuṟie mrima-cho okye.
40012035	Mndu mcha kyiseyesoenyi kyicha nekyewuta shicha; na mndu mmbicho kyiseyesoenyi kyiwicho nekyewuta shiwicho.
40012036	Kyasia ngammbia, ‘Orio ṙeṙo lyilawoṙe kyiira, wandu wechilyiṙeṙa, kyiwawaṟi iwia Ruwa kyimaṙuma kyelyiṙeṙa mfiri ulya o furumia.’
40012037	Kyipfa kui maṙeṙo gapfo nochitalyio wusumganyi, na kui maṙeṙo gapfo nochianduyo.”
40012038	Iho walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo waata wakamgaluo, wakagamba, “Mlosha, lukundi iwona kyiṟingyishio kopfo.”
40012039	Kagaluo kawawia, “Rika lyiwicho lya wuṟui lyipfula kyiṟingyishio, maa lyechienengo kyiṟingyishio-pfo, sile kyiṟingyishio kya moonguo shisuku Yona.
40012040	Kyipfa chandu Yona awekyeri mfiri iṟaṟu kyingoto na kyio ndewunyi ya nyangumi, na wuṙo Mono-Adamu echikaa mfiri iṟaṟu kyingoto na kyio amṟikye terinyi.
40012041	Wandu wa Ninawi wechigoṟoka mfiri o ianduyo hamwi na wandu wa rika-lyi. Nawo wechianduya rika-lyi kye lyileṙeko. Kyipfa wo waleṙumbuya wunyamaṟi kui malosho ga Yona; na iha hakyeri ai ang'anyi kuta Yona.
40012042	Mangyi o kyika o ura lo kyaseri nechigoṟoka mfiri o ianduyo hamwi na wandu wa rika-lyi, na oe nechiwaanduya kye waleṙeko. Kyipfa oe nalecha iwuka ngyuura tsa kyishingonyi tsa wuyana kundu naicho wuṟango wo Solomon, na iha hakyeri ai ang'anyi kuta Solomon.”
40012043	“Mṟufui mmbicho, ilyi awuka ko mndu, nekyeiṙia handu halawoṙe mṟinga, echipfula handu heonyonya, alawone.
40012044	Na numa nekyegamba, ‘Ngyechiwuya na kanyi koko ngyilewuka.’ Na kacha, kawona numba iya ilawoṙe kyindo, ingyiaie, na ichopo,
40012045	cha ilyi nekyeyenda, kaṙuo handu hamwi na oe waṟufui wengyi wawicho mfungaaṙe wakyeri wawicho kuta oe amonyi, nawo wekyeiṙa na numba na ikaa pfo; na mndu ulya mafurumionyi gakye gekyewiha kuta kulya mawookyionyi. Nyi wuṙo kyechiwa, ko rika-lyi lyii lyiwicho.”
40012046	Kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa na wuingyi wo wandu, wamae na wana wa wamae wawegoṟokyi iho nja wakundi iṙeṙa na oe.
40012047	Mndu umwi kammbia, “Womoo na wana wa wama wapfo wagoṟokyi iho nja, wakundi iṙeṙa na iyoe.”
40012048	Kagaluo, kawia mndu ulya alemwendie mbonyi, “Wama oko nyi wui? Na wana wa wama wako nyi wakyi?”
40012049	Kagoṟuya wanalosho wakye kuwoko, kagamba, “Wonenyi wama oko na wana wa wama wako!
40012050	Cha kyipfa orio oose echiṟunda shilya Awu-yoko akyeri ruwewu akundi, ichu nyi oe mono-wama oko, na mshikyi oko, na wama oko.”
40013001	Mfiri ulya Yesu kawuka kanyi kaṙamia mbai ya ipalyipalyi.
40013002	Wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wukokuumbia kufui na oe, mṟasa kaṙooya ngalawenyi, kaṙamia, na wuingyi wulya woose wukogoṟoka mbai ya ipalyipalyi.
40013003	Kawawia shindo shifoi kui mfano, echigamba, “Moolyia mbeu nalefuma indewaaya.
40013004	Na kyiyeri aweiwaaya, mbeu tsingyi tsileoloka kufui na njia, shileye shikacha shikatsilya.
40013005	Tsingyi tsikaoloka handu hawoṙe iṟaṟa, halawoṙe teri ishikyie. Cha ilyi tsikaṙo, na kyipfa halawewoṙe teri ishikyie;
40013006	mui ukowaa ukotsikoṟa; na kyipfa tsilawewoṙe mri tsikauma.
40013007	Tsingyi tsikaoloka handu hawoṙe msha. Msha iya ikaṙo ikatsiilama.
40013008	Tsingyi tsikaoloka handu hawoṙe teri ngyicha, tsikakumbia, imwi igana, imwi makumi gaṟandaaṟu, imwi makumi gaṟaaṟu.
40013009	Awoṙe maṙwi naaṙanyie.”
40013010	Wanalosho wakacha, wakammbia, “Kyitewe uiṙeṙa nawo kui mfano ny'kyi?”
40013011	Kagaluo kawawia, “Nyoe muwaenengye imanya shiṟika sha Wumangyi wo ruwewu, kyaindi wo wawaenengye-pfo.
40013012	Cha kyipfa orio oose awoṙe kyindo nechienengo, na oe nechipfumbutsio pacha; kyaindi orio oose alawoṙe kyindo, maa kyilya awoṙe nechisoko.
40013013	Kyipfa kya ikyi ngyiṙeṙa nawo kui mfano; cha kyipfa wakaambuo wawonyi-pfo, na wakaaṙanyia waiicho maa imanya-pfo.
40013014	Na ṙeṙo lya moonguo shisuku Yesaya lyaafukyia kowo, lyechigamba, ‘Iicho mochiicho, maa mochimanya-pfo, iambuo mochiambuo, maa mochiwona-pfo.
40013015	Kyipfa mrima ya wandu-wa yawa ngyiumu, na kui maṙwi gawo wekyeicho necha-pfo, na washingyie meso gawo; walachewona kui meso gawo, walaicho kui maṙwi gawo, wakamanya kui mrima yawo, wakangyigalukyia, ngawakyiṟa.’ ”
40013016	“Kyaindi, agusu meso ganyu, cha kyipfa gawonyi; na maṙwi ganyu, cha kyipfa gaiicho.
40013017	Cha kyipfa, ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, weonguo shisuku wafoi na wasumganyi walelanga iwona ishi mushiwonyi nyoe, walashiwone; na iicho ishi muicho nyoe walashiicho.”
40013018	“Kyasia nyoe aṙanyienyi mfano o moolyia mbeu.
40013019	Orio mndu kaicho ṙeṙo lya Wumangyi wo ruwewu alalyimanye, mmbicho ulya nekyecha, karakuo kyilya kyikyiṙongye mrimenyi kokye. Iyi nyiyo mbeu iya ingyiṙongye mbai ya njia.
40013020	Na mbeu iya ingyiṙongye iṟaṟenyi, nyi mndu ulya ekyeicho ṙeṙo lyilya, kalyiambilyia cha ilyi na sia.
40013021	Kyaindi lyekyewaṙa mri mrimenyi kokye-pfo, na lyekyekaa kyiyeri kyifuhi. Kukocha wukyiwa ang'u matuuro kyipfa kya ṙeṙo-lyo, cha ilyi, lyekyekaa kokye-pfo.
40013022	Na iya ingyiṙongye mshenyi, icho nyi mndu ekyeicho ṙeṙo lyilya; na mawino ga wuyana, na wulembi wo masaa wokyeilama ṙeṙo lyilya; lyilawaṙe ndunda.
40013023	Na iya ingyiṙongye terinyi ngyicha, icho nyi oe ekyeicho ṙeṙo lyilya, na ilyimanya. Icho nyi oe ekyekumbia ndunda, ichu igana, na ichu makumi gaṟandaaṟu, na ichu makumi gaṟaaṟu.”
40013024	Kawaenenga mfano ungyi, echigamba, “Wumangyi wo ruwewu wufananyi na mndu alewaaya mbeu ngyicha ṙemenyi lyakye.
40013025	Kyaindi wandu wamlae, mokyituwa okye kacha kawaaya makacha nganunyi, kaṙicha.
40013026	Numa kyiyeri nganu ileṙo na ikumbia, kukowoneka makacha.
40013027	Shisinga sha monyi kanyi shikayenda shikammbia, ‘Mndumii, ulewaaya mbeu ngyicha ṙemenyi lyapfo-pfoe? Nyi kwi lyileende makacha?’
40013028	Kashiwia, ‘Mokyituwa nyi oe aleṟunda kuṙi.’ Shisinga shikammbia, ‘Kyasia nukundi luyende lundegasania?’
40013029	Kagamba, ‘Ote, mulachesania makacha, na ikuluo nganu hamwi nago.
40013030	Ṙenyi shoose shing'ane mṟasa kyiyeri kyesambuo. Na kyiyeri kyesambuo ngyechiwia iwo waisambuo, sanienyi makacha kuwooka, mugapfungye shikonde shikonde mugakoṟe; kyaindi nganu isanienyi kyikumbinyi kyako.’ ”
40013031	Kawaenenga mfano ungyi, echigamba, “Wumangyi wo ruwewu wufananyi na mbeu ya haradalyi, mndu aleiwuta na iiwaaya ṙemenyi lyakye.
40013032	Nayo nyi ingyitutu kuta mbeu tsoose. Kyaindi ikamṙo, yekyeng'ana kuta mashiṙi goose, ikawa ikyiṙi, maa shileye sha ngyinenyi shekyecha na iṙamia mbagenyi tsayo.”
40013033	Kawawia mfano ungyi. “Wumangyi wo ruwewu wufananyi na chachu ilewuto nyi mndu mka, kaikooma shitelenyi shiṟaaṟu sha mso, mṟasa mso-cho ukoshimba oose taa.”
40013034	Isho shoose Yesu nalewia wuingyi wo wandu kui mfano, maa kulawoṙe mfano alewawia kyindo-pfo.
40013035	Kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyikyiṙeṙe nyi moonguo shisuku echigamba, “Ngyechiṙeṙa nawo kui mfano, ngyechigamba shikuṟiikyie wookyia mawookyionyi.”
40013036	Numa ya iho Yesu kasamana na wuingyi wo wandu. Kaiṙa na kanyi, wanalosho wakye wakayenda kokye, wakagamba, “Lutambuluye mfano o makacha ga ṙemenyi.”
40013037	Kagaluo, kagamba, “Ekyewaaya mbeu tsilya ngyicha nyi Mono-Adamu.
40013038	Ṙema-lyo nyi wuyana. Mbeu tsilya ngyicha nyi wana wa Wumangyi wo ruwewu, na makacha-go nyi wana wa mmbicho ulya.
40013039	Mokyituwa ulya alewaaya nyi Mokyiriinzi. Kyilyimu nyi mafurumionyi ga wuyana; na wesambuo nyi malaika.
40013040	Kyasia, chandu makacha gekyesanio na ikoṟo moṙonyi; nyi wuṙo kyechiwa mafurumionyi ga wuyana.
40013041	Mono-Adamu nechiṙuma malaika wakye, nawo wechisania iwuka ipfo Wumangyinyi wokye, woose wekyeende wunyamaṟi, na iwo wekyefunja mawawaso,
40013042	na iwawiyitsa moṙonyi ung'anyi. Nyi pfo-ndu kochiwaṙa wukyiwa na ilya ngakuru.
40013043	Nyilyo wasumganyi wechiaka-aka cha mnengyeṟi Wumangyinyi wo Awu-yawo. Awoṙe maṙwi, naaṙanyie.”
40013044	“Lyingyi-se Wumangyi wo ruwewu wufananyi na kyindo kya woguru wung'anyi kyikyiṟikye ṙemenyi. Kyiyeri mndu alewona kyindo-kyo, nalekyiṟika; na kyipfa alechihiyo mnu naleyenda kakumba shoose awewoṙe, kaguṟa ṙema lyilya.”
40013045	“Lyingyi-se Wumangyi wo ruwewu wufananyi na mndu o mbucha, awekyepfula lulu ngyicha.
40013046	Na oe kyiyeri alewona lulu imwi ngyicha ya woguru wung'anyi, naleyenda kakumba shoose awewoṙe kaiguṟa.”
40013047	“Lyingyi-se Wumangyi wo ruwewu wufananyi na iṟambika, lyilewiyitso ipalyipalyinyi, lyikasania wa orio mbaṟe.
40013048	Na lyilya lyileichuo, walelyikuruo na mbai ya ipalyipalyi; wakaṙamia, wakasania wai wecha ngalawenyi, kyaindi wai wawicho wakawawiyitsa.
40013049	Nyi wuṙo kyechiwa mafurumionyi ga wuyana. Malaika wechiwoneka, wewikyia wawicho kuleshi na wasumganyi,
40013050	na iwawiyitsa moṙonyi ung'anyi. Nyi pfo-ndu kochiwaṙa wukyiwa na ilya ngakuru.”
40013051	Yesu nalewawesa, “Momanya isho shoose?” Wakammbia, “Yee.”
40013052	Kawawia, “Kyipfa kya ikyo, orio mlosha o mawawaso awoṙe wuṟango wo malosho ga Wumangyi wo ruwewu nafananyi na monyi kanyi ekyewuta kyindonyi kyakye kya woguru wung'anyi shindo shihya na sha kacha.”
40013053	Na kyiyeri Yesu alemarisa ilosha kui mfano-yo, nalefuma kayenda.
40013054	Na lyilya aleshika urukyenyi lokye, nalewalosha sinagoginyi lyawo, mṟasa wakaṟiyio, wakagamba, “Ichu nyi kwi aleende wuṟango-wu na maṟiyisho-ga?
40013055	Ichu chi mana o ulya ekyepacha mbau? Wamae chi ulya ekyelago Maria? Na wana wa wamae chi Yakobo, na Yosefu, na Simion, na Yuda?
40013056	Na washikyi wakye woose wakyeri iha koṙu-pfoe? Kyasia ichu nyi kwi alewona ishi shoose?”
40013057	Wakawihiyo kyipfa kyakye. Yesu kawawia, “Moonguo shisuku nekyeindio kundu koose sile urukyenyi lokye, na kanyi kokye amonyi.”
40013058	Maa aleṟunda shindo shifoi sha maṟiyisho ipfo-pfo, kyipfa walemwiṙikyia-pfo.
40014001	Kyiyeri kyilya mangyi Herode naleicho mbonyi tsa Yesu.
40014002	Kawia waṟundi wakye, “Ichu nyi oe Yohane Mpatisi. Naṟuka ko wapfu. Nyikyo kyitewe awoṙe pfinya tseṟunda ishi shoose.”
40014003	Kyipfa Herode nalekoawaṙa Yohane, kampfunga, kammbika kyipfungonyi, kyipfa kya Herodia, mka o Filyipo mono-wamae.
40014004	Kyipfa Yohane nalemmbia, “Chi sungusinyi ikaa na oe-pfo.”
40014005	Na oe kyiyeri awekundi immbaaga, naleowuo wandu, kyipfa walewona Yohane cha moonguo shisuku.
40014006	Na kyiyeri mfiri ung'anyi o ifeo lya Herode uleshika mana o Herodia o waka naletema mbele ya wandu, kachihiṟa Herode,
40014007	mṟasa Herode kawika kyaasa kui ilya nyamu kye nechimwenenga kyindo kyoose echikyiterewa.
40014008	Na oe, kunu echilosho nyi wamae, kagamba, “Ngyienenga wulalu kuṙi iha ipongonyi mṙoe o Yohane Mpatisi.”
40014009	Na mangyi kawona fowa mrimenyi. Kyaindi kyipfa kya nyamu tsakye, na kyipfa kya walya waweilya handu hamwi na oe, kagamba naenengo.
40014010	Kaṙuma mndu, kaṙumbuo Yohane mṙoe kulya kyipfungonyi.
40014011	Mṙoe okye ukoendo ukyeri ipongonyi, mana ulya o waka kauenengo; kauṙuo ko wamae.
40014012	Wanalosho wakye wakayenda, wakaṙuo mnying'a ulya, wakamṟika; numa wakayenda wakaongoya Yesu mbonyi.
40014013	Na Yesu kyiyeri aleicho isho, nalewuka ipfo ngalawenyi, kayenda handu halawoṙe wandu, hatsie sau. Na wuingyi wo wandu kyiyeri waleicho, walemwosha wechumia na maṙende wawuka mṟinyi kowo.
40014014	Yesu kafuma, kawona wuingyi wo wandu wung'anyi, kawona wukyiwa mrimenyi kyipfa kyawo, kawakyiṟa ndoṟe tsawo.
40014015	Na kyiyeri kuleila, wanalosho wakye waleyenda kokye, wakagamba, “Handu ha nyi nuka mreesi, na kyiyeri kyamwiṙa. Samana na wuingyi wo wandu, wayende shikaṟonyi, wandeguṟa shelya.”
40014016	Yesu kawawia, “Wawoṙe kyitewe kyeyenda-pfo. Waenengyenyi kyelya.”
40014017	Wakammbia, “Luwoṙe kyindo iha sile mkate itanu na makunga gawi-pfo.”
40014018	Kagamba, “Ngyiendienyi.”
40014019	Kagamba wuingyi wo wandu waṙamie maṟenyi. Kaira mkate iya itanu na makunga galya gawi, kaambuya wuye ruwewu, kawikyia mboṟa, kafunja mkate iya, kaenengyia wanalosho, wanalosho wakaenengyia wuingyi wulya wo wandu.
40014020	Wakalya woose wakaiguṙa. Wakasania matsugaṟo ga shipeṟengu sha mkate iya, mkunja ikumi na iwi, iichuo.
40014021	Nawo walelya wawekyeri wasoṟo washikyie shiku shitaanu, kulawoṙe waka na wana watutu.
40014022	Cha ilyi kaitika wanalosho wakye waṙooye ngalawenyi wasonguo mbele yakye iyenda molyolya, kyiyeri oe aweisamana na wuingyi wo wandu.
40014023	Na oe amsamane na wuingyi wo wandu, naleṙooya fumvunyi handu halawoṙe wandu, indeterewa. Na kyiyeri kuleila, nawekyeri pfo amonyi.
40014024	Na ngalawa iya ilekoyamshika makyiṙi-gawi ga ipalyipalyi, yechilya wukyiwa mnu kyipfa shiwiṟi shiweikapa.
40014025	Na kyiyeri kya iringa lya kaana lya kyio Yesu naleyenda ko wanalosho walya, echichumia wuye ya ipalyipalyi.
40014026	Kyiyeri wanalosho walemmbona echichumia wuye ya ipalyipalyi, walewoṙo nyi wuowu, wechigamba, “Nyi kyirinje”; wakafiiṟa kui wuowu.
40014027	Cha ilyi Yesu kaṙeṙa, kawawia, “Kuwanzenyi mrimenyi; nyi inyi, mulaowuoe.”
40014028	Petiro kamgaluo, kagamba, “Kokooya nyi iyoe, ngyiwia ngyiche na kopfo wuye ya mṟinga.”
40014029	Kagamba, “Nnjo.” Petiro kasoka kulya ngalawenyi, kachumia na maṙende wuye ya mṟinga, kundu nayende ko Yesu.
40014030	Kyaindi kyiyeri alewona kyiwiṟi, kaowuo; kawooka isoṟowia; kafiiṟa, echigamba, “Mndumii, ngyiletsa.”
40014031	Cha ilyi Yesu kagoṟuo kuwoko kokye, kammbia, “Iyoe uwoṙe iiṙikyia lyaangu, ny'kyilyi ulaleiṙikyia kye ngyeiṙima ikuenenga wuiṙimi wo chumia wuye ya mṟinga?”
40014032	Nawo wakaṙooya ngalawenyi, kyiwiṟi kyikatsia.
40014033	Na walya wawekyeri kulya ngalawenyi wakamwindia, wechigamba, “Ny'kyaloi iyoe nui Mono-Ruwa.”
40014034	Na wamuambaṙe, waleshika uruka lo Kyenesareti.
40014035	Na wandu wa handu halya kyiyeri walemmanya, waleṙuma wandu iyenda ngyuuruka tsikyeri mṟasenyi, wakamwendie woose walawekuiṙima.
40014036	Nawo wakamterewa wapaaye maa ikyechu lya ikunya lyakye tupu; na woose walepaaya wakakyiṟo piu.
40015001	Naaho-ng'u Mafarisayo na walosha wa mawawaso wawukyie Yerusalemu waleyenda ko Yesu wechigamba,
40015002	“Ny'kyilyi wanalosho wapfo wainyamaṟa shilya shileambilyio ko waku waṙu? Cha kyipfa wekyesamba mawoko ilyi wailya-pfo.”
40015003	Kagaluo, kawawia, “Ny'kyi kyitewe na nyoe mokyenyamaṟa iwawaso lya Ruwa kyipfa kya shilya muleambilyia ko waku wanyu?
40015004	Cha kyipfa Ruwa nalegamba, ‘India awuyo na womoo,’ na ‘Alahia awuye ang'u wamae ipfa napfe.’
40015005	Kyaindi nyoe mokyegamba, ‘Echiwia awuye ang'u wamae, ikyo kyoose kyikuwaṟi inyi ngyikutarame nyi kyiṙaso,’
40015006	kyasia alaindie awuye ang'u wamae. Mukoilacha ṙeṙo lya Ruwa kyipfa kya shilya muleambilyia ko waku wanyu.
40015007	Nyoe wakulembecheṟi, nyi necha chandu Yesaya aleonguo shisuku kyipfa kya mbonyi tsanyu, echigamba,
40015008	‘Wandu-wa wekyengyiindia kui maṙumbu; kyaindi mrima yawo ikyeri kuleshi na inyi.
40015009	Nawo wekyengyiana na ingyiterewa kya maai, wechilosha malosho gakyeri mawawaso ga wandu.’ ”
40015010	Kalaga wuingyi wo wandu, kawawia.
40015011	“Aṙanyienyi, mumanye. Kyekyefanyiṟa mndu kyimṟumoe chi kyilya kyekyeiṙa na ṙumbunyi-pfo. Indi kyilya kyekyewuka ṙumbunyi ny'kyo kyekyefanyiṟa mndu.”
40015012	Naaho-ng'u wanalosho wakye waleyenda kokye wakammbia, “Uichi kye Mafarisayo kyiyeri waleicho ṙeṙo lyilya walewihiyo?”
40015013	Kagaluo, kawawia, “Orio kyindo Awu-yoko o ruwewu alalekyiṙonga nechikyikuluo.
40015014	Walekyenyi. Iwo nyi shipfupfuṟe wai wasongoru wa shipfupfuṟe. Na kyipfupfuṟe kyikasongoya kyipfupfuṟe oṙoe, sheoloka mkuwenyi shoose shishiwi.”
40015015	Kyasia Petiro kagaluo, kammbia, “Lutambuluye mfano-chu.”
40015016	Yesu kagamba, “Mṟasa wulalu maa nyoe muwoṙe wuṟango-pfoe?
40015017	Mulandemanye kye orio kyindo kyekyeiṙa na ṙumbunyi kyekyeiṙa ndewunyi, kyikawiyitso choṟonyi?
40015018	Kyaindi shekyewuka ṙumbunyi shawuka mrimenyi; nasho nyisho shekyefanyiṟa mndu kyimṟumoe.
40015019	Cha kyipfa mrimenyi kokyewuka makusaṟo mawicho, uwaagi, wuṟui, wuiwi, wuṟingyishi wo wongo, na shilahio.
40015020	Igo nyigo gekyefanyiṟa mndu kyimṟumoe. Kyaindi ilya ulasamba mawoko kokyefanyiṟa mndu-pfo.”
40015021	Yesu kawuka handu halya, kayenda mbai ura lo Tiro na Sidon.
40015022	Na mndu mka Mkananayo o ura lulya kacha, kakuilengakyika echigamba, “Ungyisaṟie, Mndumii, Mono-Dawidi; mana oko o waka nawoṙo kyetse nyi mṟufui mmbicho.”
40015023	Maa oe alemgaluo kyindo-pfo. Na wanalosho wakye wakayenda kokye wakamterewa, wechigamba, “Mlekye nayende; cha kyipfa naikalagatsa numa yaṙu.”
40015024	Kagaluo, kagamba, “Ngyileṙumo ko wandu wengyi sile ko wana wa Isiraelyi waṙekyie cha moondo-pfo.”
40015025	Na oe kacha kamwolokyia, echigamba, “Mndumii, ungyitarame.”
40015026	Kagaluo, kagamba, “Chi necha iwuta kyelya kya wana na iwiyitsia shite-pfo.”
40015027	Mndu mka ulya kagamba, “Yee, Mndumii. Kyaindi maa shite shekyelya matsugaṟo gekyeoloka mesenyi ko wandumii washo.”
40015028	Naaho-ng'u Yesu kagaluo kammbia, “Mama, iiṙikyia lyapfo nyi lying'anyi; na kyiwe kopfo chandu ukundi.” Mana ulya okye o kyika kachia cha ilyi.
40015029	Yesu kawuka handu halya, kashika mbai ya ipalyipalyi lya Galyilaya, kaṙooya fumvunyi, kaṙamia ho.
40015030	Wuingyi wufoi wo wandu wukoyenda kokye, wechimwendie shiwete, shipfupfuṟe, wai ndiṟi, wafiri shiwungo, na wengyi wafoi, wakawawikyia maṙendenyi gakye; kawakyiṟa;
40015031	mṟasa wuingyi wulya wo wandu wakaṟiyio, kyiyeri walewona wai ndiṟi waiṙeṙa, wawoṙe shiwungo shifiri waichia, shiwete shichumia na shipfupfuṟe shiwona, wakang'anyisa Ruwa o Isiraelyi.
40015032	Yesu kalaga wanalosho wakye, kagamba, “Ngawoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi kyipfa kya wuingyi-wu wo wandu, cha kyipfa wulalu nyi mfiri iṟaṟu wakyeri hamwi na inyi, maa wawoṙe kyindo kyelya-pfo. Ngoseṟa isamana nawo walalyiie kyindo ngyikundi-pfo, walacheoloka njienyi.”
40015033	Wanalosho wakye wakammbia, “Lowona kwi mkate ifoi iha nuka, mṟasa iigutsa wuingyi wung'anyi kuṙi?”
40015034	Yesu kawawia, “Muwoṙe mkate inga?” Wakagamba, “Mfungaaṙe, na shikunga shaangu.”
40015035	Kagamba wuingyi wo wandu wuṙamie wanda.
40015036	Kawaṙa mkate iya na shikunga shilya, kaana, kashifunja-funja, kaenengyia wanalosho wakye, nawo wanalosho wakaenenga wuingyi wo wandu.
40015037	Wakalya woose wakaiguṙa. Wakasania matsugaṟo ga shifunjoe sha mkate, mkunja mfungaaṙe, iichuo.
40015038	Nawo walelya wawekyeri wasoṟo shiku shiina, kulawoṙe waka na wana watutu.
40015039	Kasamana na wuingyi wo wandu, kaṙooya ngalawenyi, kayenda ngyuura tsa Makadan.
40016001	Mafarisayo na Masadukayo wakacha na kokye, wakamwesha, wakamterewa nawaloṟe kyiṟingyishio kyiwukyie ruwewu.
40016002	Kagaluo, kawawia, “Kukoila, mokyegamba, ‘Kochiwa mfiri mcha; cha kyipfa ruwewu ifanyi kyimaande.’
40016003	Na ngamenyi, mokyegamba, ‘Inu kochiwaṙa shiwiṟi; cha kyipfa ruwewu ifanyi kyimaande; lyingyi-se kushimbi.’ Nyoe wakulembecheṟi, muichi imanya fana ya ruwewu, kyaindi, ngyesa, shiṟingyishio sha shiyeri-shi moiṙima ishimanya?
40016004	Rika lyiwicho na lya wuṟui lyikundi kyiṟingyishio, maa lyechienengo kyiṟingyishio-pfo, sile kyiṟingyishio kya Yona.” Kalekana nawo, kayenda.
40016005	Na wanalosho wakayenda mṟasa molyolya, wakawaṙima iṙuo mkate.
40016006	Yesu kawawia, “Kushowenyi na chachu ya Mafarisayo na Masadukayo.”
40016007	Wakagaluana wo wenyi ko wenyi, wechigamba, “Nyi kyipfa kya ilyi lulaende mkate.”
40016008	Na Yesu kamanya, kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi muigaluana nyoe wenyi ko wenyi, nyoe wa iiṙikyia lyaangu? Nyi kyipfa nyoe mulawoṙe mkate?
40016009	Maa mulandemanye maa mukumburie mkate iya itanu ko walya shiku shitaanu, na nyi mkunja inga mulesania-pfoe?
40016010	Maa mkate iya mfungaaṙe ko walya shiku shiina, na nyi mkunja inga mulesania-pfoe?
40016011	Kyawa kuṙa mulalemanya kye chi kyipfa kya mkate ngyilemmbia-pfo? Kyaindi kushowenyi na chachu ya Mafarisayo na Masadukayo.”
40016012	Naaho-ng'u walemanya kye alewawia ikuringa na chachu ya mkate, indi na malosho ga Mafarisayo na Masadukayo-pfo.
40016013	Kyasia Yesu kayenda ngyuura tsa Kaisaria-Filyipi, kawesa wanalosho wakye, kagamba, “Wandu wekyegamba Mono-Adamu nyi wui?”
40016014	Wakagamba, “Wengyi wekyegamba nui Yohane Mpatisi, wengyi Elyiya, wengyi Yeremia ang'u umwi o weonguo shisuku.”
40016015	Kawawia, “Aa nyoe mokyegamba inyi nyi wui?”
40016016	Simion Petiro kagaluo, kagamba, “Iyoe nyi oe Kristo, Mono-Ruwa ai na moo mlungana.”
40016017	Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Agusu iyoe Simion Mono-Yona, cha kyipfa chi pfinya ang'u wuṟango wo kyimndu shakutambuluya ikyi-pfo; indi Awu-yoko akyeri ruwewu.
40016018	Na inyi ngakuwia, iyoe nyi oe Petiro, na kyiyeri-kyo ngyechiwika Siṟi yako iyoe nyilyo iṟaṟa handu ngyechiiyekyia; maa pfinya tsa upfu tseiwinga-pfo.
40016019	Na inyi ngyechikuenenga iyoe ngyuupfunguo tsa Wumangyi wo ruwewu na orio kyindo ochikyipfunga iha wuyanenyi, kyewa kyikyipfungye ruwewu; na orio kyindo ochikyipfunguo wuyanenyi, kyechiwa kyikyipfunguoe ruwewu.”
40016020	Naaho-ng'u kaima mnu wanalosho wakye walawie mndu oose kye oe nyi oe Kristo.
40016021	Wookyia kyiyeri-kyo Yesu nalewooka iwia na pata wanalosho wakye kye kyimmbaṟi iyenda Yerusalemu na iambilyia matuuro gafoi iwuka ko wameeku wa mengye, na wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na walosha wa mawawaso, na iwoogo, na mfiri o kaṟaaṟu iṟuka.
40016022	Petiro kamṙuo mbai, kawooka imṙeṙia, echigamba, “Maa ale, Mndumii, isho shechikukooya-pfo.”
40016023	Kagaluka, kawia Petiro, “Wuka koko, Satana, nungyishingyia; kyipfa uikusaṟa shikyeri sha Ruwa-pfo, indi sha wandu.”
40016024	Kyiyeri-kyo Yesu nalewia wanalosho wakye, “Mndu oose kakunda ingyiosha, nakulege amonyi, nakuṙikye msalaba okye, nangyioshe.
40016025	Cha kyipfa mndu akundi ikyiṟa mrima okye, nechiuṙetsa; na mndu echiṙetsa mrima okye kyipfa kyako, nechiukyiṟa.
40016026	Kyipfa mndu nechiiria ho kyi kaenengo wuyana woose, na iṙetsa mrima okye? Ang'u mndu nechienengyia kyi handu ha mrima okye?
40016027	Cha kyipfa Mono-Adamu nechicha mng'anonyi o Awu-yokye hamwi na malaika wakye. Naaho-ng'u echitaa orio mndu iṙuana na mmbutie yakye.
40016028	Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, hawoṙe wandu kyiiṙi kya iwa wagoṟokyie iha, walechiwona upfu maa ale mṟasa kyiyeri wechiwona Mono-Adamu echicha Wumangyinyi wokye.”
40017001	Na mfiri iṟandaaṟu yamuiṙe Yesu kaṙuo Petiro na Yakobo, na Yohane mono-wamae, kawaende mṟasa wuye ya fumvu lyileshi handu halawoṙe wandu.
40017002	Kailachika fana yakye mbele yawo; kyaam kyakye kyikaaka-aka cha mnengyeṟi; mkoṟoṟi okye ukoila cha ngyesa.
40017003	Mose na Elyiya wakacha na kowo wakaṙeṙa na Yesu.
40017004	Petiro kagaluo, kawia Yesu, “Mndumii, nyi kyicha soe ikaa iha. Kokunda, ngyechiachikyia matengo gaṟaaṟu iha. Lyimwi lyapfo iyoe, na lyimwi lya Mose, na lyimwi lya Elyia.”
40017005	Kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa, ipuchi lyiilyi lyikawaendie mrinje; na ṟui lyikawuka kulya ipuchinyi, lyikagamba, “Ichu nyi Mono-ko, mkunde oko, ngyimchihiye kyipfa kyakye; muaṙanyienyi oe.”
40017006	Na kyiyeri wanalosho walya waleicho, waleoloka na ndewu, wakaowuo mnu.
40017007	Yesu kacha, kawapaaya, kagamba, “Amkyenyi, maa mulaowuoe.”
40017008	Wakaambuo, walawone mndu sile Yesu amonyi.
40017009	Na kyiyeri waweisoka fumvunyi, Yesu nalewawia, “Mulawie mndu oose mbonyi tsa isho moloṟo, mṟasa kyiyeri Mono-Adamu echiṟuka ko wapfu.”
40017010	Wanalosho wakye wakammbesa, wechigamba, “Kyasia ny'kyilyi walosha wa mawawaso wekyegamba kye Elyia nawaṟi icha kuwooka?”
40017011	Na oe kagaluo, kawawia, “Loi Elyia naicha kuwooka, na oe nechiachikyia shoose;
40017012	kyaindi ngammbia kye Elyiya amcha, walammanye, kyaindi wakammbutia orio kyindo walekunda. Na wuṙo Mono-Adamu na oe aindelyiso wukyiwa kowo.”
40017013	Naaho-ng'u wanalosho walya walemanya kye naṙeṙa nawo mbonyi tsa Yohane Mpatisi.
40017014	Nawo kyiyeri waleshika kyisanzionyi, mndu umwi kacha na kokye, kampfiria ndi, echigamba,
40017015	“Mndumii, usaṟie mono-ko, cha kyipfa nawoṙo nyi iuma nguku, na ilyiso wukyiwa wuwicho; kyipfa kafoi nekyeoloka moṙonyi, na kafoi mṟingyenyi.
40017016	Ngamwende na ko wanalosho wapfo, walaiṙime imkyiṟa.”
40017017	Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Nyoe rika lyilawoṙe iiṙikyia, lyiendie njia ilawaṟi, ngyechikaa hamwi na nyoe mṟasa indi? Ngyeṙuana na nyoe mṟasa indi? Mwendenyi na kunu koko.”
40017018	Yesu kaṙeṙia mṟufui ulya mmbicho, kawuka mana ulya. Manakye ulya kyakyia wookyia kyiyeri kyilya.
40017019	Numa wanalosho walya wakayenda ko Yesu kui kyiṟika, wakagamba, “Ny'kyilyi soe lulaiṙima immbuta?”
40017020	Yesu kawawia, “Kyipfa kya wufofo wo iiṙikyia lyanyu. Cha kyipfa, ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, mukowaṙa iiṙikyia lyishikyie cha mbeu ya haradalyi mochiwia fumvu-lyi, ‘Wuka iha uyende kulya;’ nalyo lyechiwuka ho; maa kochiwaṙa kyindo kyilechiiṙimika konyu-pfo. [
40017021	Kyaindi mbaṟe-i yekyewuka sile kui iterewa na ikuretekyia-pfo.]”
40017022	Nawo kyiyeri wawekyeri Galyilaya, Yesu kawawia. “Mono-Adamu naindewiko mawokonyi ga wandu, nawo wechimmbaaga, na mfiri o kaṟaaṟu nechiṟuka”.
40017023	Wakawoṙo nyi fowa mnu mrimenyi kowo.
40017024	Na kyiyeri waleshika Kaperinaumu, walya wawekyesania kyifunjoe kya shekyelyi waleyenda ko Petiro, wakagamba, “Ngyesa mlosha onyu aienengyia kyifunjoe kya shekyelyi-pfoe?” Kagamba, “Nekyeenengyia.”
40017025	Na oe kyiyeri aleiṙa na kanyi Yesu nalesonguo immbesa, echigamba, “Nuwonyi kuṙa, Simion? Wamangyi wa wuyana wekyeambilyia kodi ang'u ukamba ko wandu waha? Ko wana wawo ang'u ko wayenu?”
40017026	Na oe kyiyeri alegamba, “Ko wayenu,” Yesu nalemmbia, “Kyasia, kokooya nyi wuṙo, wana wawaṟi itaa ukamba-pfo.
40017027	Kyaindi kundu lulachewawutia kyindo lukowawihiṟa, yenda ipalyipalyinyi undewiyitsa-pfo ndoana uwaṙe ikunga lyilya lyawoneka kuwooka, na kotambaṟuo ṙumbu lyalyo nowona shekyelyi yetaa ukamba lo hekalu. Ṙuo iyo undewaenengyia kyipfa kyako na kyipfa kyapfo.”
40018001	Kyiyeri kyilya wanalosho wakayenda ko Yesu, wechigamba,
40018002	“Kyasia nyi wui-ng'u ai ang'anyi Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu?” Kalaga mana umwi mtutu, kammbikyia makyiṙi-gawi gawo,
40018003	kagamba, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, mulandegalukye na iwa cha shiwana shitutu, mochiiṙa maa ale na Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu-pfo.
40018004	Kyasia, orio oose echikukyiwasha amonyi cha mana-chu, icho nyi oe ai ang'anyi Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu.
40018005	Na orio oose echiambilyia mana umwi mfano o ichu kui rina lyako, nangyiambilyia inyi.”
40018006	“Kyaindi echitewe umwi o iwa watutu wangyiiṙikyie, kyimmbaṟi napfungyio nzingonyi ikyesa na iwiyitso kyitsindenyi kya ipalyipalyi.
40018007	Ochia nyi lo wuyana kyipfa kya shindo shetewe! Kyipfa shindo shetewe icha shechicha; kyaindi ochia lokye mndu ulya aende kyindo kyetewe!
40018008	Kyasia kuwoko kopfo ang'u kuṙende kopfo kukokutewe; ṙumbuo kuwoko-ko ang'u kuṙende-ko uwiyitse kuleshi na iyoe. Nyi nanga iiṙa na moonyi o mlungana ulawoṙe kuwoko ang'u kuṙende, kuta iwaṙa mawoko gawi na maṙende gawi, na iwiyitso moṙonyi o mlungana.
40018009	Na riso lyapfo lyikakutewe; lyikuluoe, ulyiwiyitse kuleshi na iyoe. Nyi nanga iiṙa na moonyi o mlungana uwoṙe riso lyimwi, kuta iwaṙa meso gawi na iwiyitso ngyehenenyi ya moṙo.”
40018010	“Mulamine umwi o iwa watutu, cha kyipfa ngammbia kye malaika wawo ruwewu mfiri yoose wekyeambuya kyaam kya Awu-yoko akyeri ruwewu. [
40018011	Cha kyipfa Mono-Adamu nalecha iletsa kyiṙekyie.]
40018012	Muwonyi muṙa? Mndu awoṙe moondo igana, lyimwi lyikaṙeka, ngyesa ekyeṙa galya makumi kyenda na kyenda, kayenda mafumvunyi, na ipfula lyilya lyaṙeka-pfoe?
40018013	Na kaiṙima ilyiwona, ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, nekyechihiyo kyipfa kya ilyo ngoseṟa, kuta galya makumi kyenda na kyenda galaṙekyie.
40018014	Na wuṙo kyilachihiṟie ushangunyi lo Awu-yonyu akyeri ruwewu kye umwi o iwa watutu naṙekye.”
40018015	“Na mono-womoo kakuṙekyio, yenda umṙeṙie kya ṙeko lyakye, iyoe na oe tupu. Kakuaṙanyia, nowona mono-womoo.
40018016	Ote, kokooya alaaṙanyia, ṙuo handu hamwi na iyoe mndu umwi ang'u wawi, kundu kui maṙumbu ga waṟingyishi wawi ang'u waṟaaṟu orio ṙeṙo lyimanyikye na pata.
40018017	Na alandemuaṙanyie nyoe, wia siṟi; na alandeaṙanyie siṟi taa, na nawe kopfo cha mndu alaiṙikyie Ruwa na mosania ukamba.”
40018018	“Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, shoose mochishipfunga wuyanenyi shechiwa shishipfungye ruwewu; na shoose mochishipfunguo wuyanenyi shechiwa shishipfunguoe ruwewu.
40018019	Lyingyi-se ngammbia, kyiyeri wawi wanyu wechisanza kyindonyi kyoose wechikyiterewa, wewutio nyi Awu-yoko akyeri ruwewu.
40018020	Cha kyipfa hai wawi waṟaaṟu wasanzie kui rina lyako, na inyi ngyikyeri iho makyiṙi-gawi gawo.”
40018021	Numa ya iho Petiro kayenda kokye kammbia, “Mndumii, mono-wama oko nangyiṙekyio kyenga na inyi ngyimhooṟie? Nyi ka mfungaaṙe ngyesa?”
40018022	Yesu kammbia, “Ngyikuwia ka mfungaaṙe tupu-pfo, indi umhooṟie makumi mfungaaṙe, ka mfungaaṙe.
40018023	Kyipfa kya ikyo Wumangyi wo ruwewu wukyeri cha mangyi umwi alekunda isungusia matala na waṟundi wakye.
40018024	Kyiyeri alewooka iṟunda-lyo naleendio mndu umwi airiko sile ya talanta shiku ikumi.
40018025	Na oe kyiyeri aleuṟa kyetaa, mndumii okye kagamba nakumbo, oe na mka okye na wana wakye, na shindo shoose awoṙe, sile iya itoo.
40018026	Kyasia mṟundi ulya kaoloka, kamwindia echigamba, ‘Mndumii, ngyiweṙa, na inyi ngyechikutaa sile yoose taa.’
40018027	Mndumii o mṟundi ulya kammbonia wukyiwa kampfunguo, kamhooṟia sile iya.
40018028	Mṟundi ulya kafuma, kawona umwi o mbuya tsakye, awemmbesa dinari igana. Kamtirimisha, kammbaṙa maṟoo, echigamba, ‘Ngyitaa sile iya uriko.’
40018029	Kyasia mbuya iya oṙoe ikaoloka maṙendenyi gakye, ikamterewa, yechigamba, ‘Ngyiweṙa, na inyi ngyechikutaa sile yoose taa.’
40018030	Kyaindi alekunda-pfo. Kayenda, kammbiyitsa kyipfungonyi, mṟasa ilyi echitaa sile-yo.
40018031	Kyasia kyiyeri mbuya tsakye tsilewona shilya shileṟundika, tsilewihiyo mnu mrimenyi, tsikayenda tsikaongoya Mndumii otso shoose shileṟundika.
40018032	Naaho-ng'u Mndumii okye kamlaga, kammbia, ‘Iyoe mṟundi mmbicho, ngyilekuhooṟia iyoe sile iya yoose, lyilya ulengyiterewa;
40018033	na iyoe, ngyesa kyiwekuwaṟi isaṟia mbuya yapfo, chandu inyi ngyilekusaṟia iyoe-pfoe?’
40018034	Mndumii okye kasuo, kamṙuo ko watuuri, mṟasa kyiyeri echitaa sile iya yoose.
40018035	Na wuṙo Awu-yoko a ruwewu echimmbutia nyoe, mulandehooṟie kui mrima yanyu orio mndu mono-wamae.”
40019001	Na lyilya Yesu alemarisa ionguo maṙeṙo-go nalefuma Galyilaya kayenda kaiṙa na urukyenyi lo Uyuda, molyolya o Yoridan.
40019002	Wuingyi wufoi wo wandu wulemuosha, kawakyiṟia pfo.
40019003	Kyasia Mafarisayo wakayenda kokye, wakamwesha, wechimmbia, “Ngyesa nyi sungusinyi mndu iṙa mka okye chandu akukundia?”
40019004	Kagaluo, kawawia, “Muichi kye ulya alewagumba mawookyionyi, nalegumba mndu msoṟo na mndu mka?”
40019005	Kaengyeṟa igamba, “Kyipfa kya ikyo, mndu nechiṙa awuye na wamae, nawaṙane tapu na ioshana na mka okye; na iwo wawi wechiwa mmbiu umwi.
40019006	Kyasia wakyeri wawi-se-pfo, indi mmbiu umwi. Kyasia walya Ruwa awalunga, mndu alawaletsane.”
40019007	Wakammbia, “Kyasia nyi wuṙa-ng'u Mose alegamba kye mka-cho naenengo kyiṟeio kyeletsana wolyi, na imṙa?”
40019008	Kawawia, “Mose, kyipfa kya wuumu wo mrima yanyu, nalemuenenga momu o lekana na waka wanyu; kyaindi wookyia mawookyionyi kyiwekyeri kuṙo-pfo.
40019009	Na inyi ngammbia nyoe, orio mndu echiṙa mka okye, sile nyi kyipfa kya wuṟui, kaalyika ungyi, naṟuguya. Na ulya aalyika ulya aṙio naṟuguya.”
40019010	Wanalosho wakye wakammbia, “Mbonyi tsa mndu na mka okye tsikawa kuṙo, kuwoṙe kyiira ialyika-pfo.”
40019011	Kyaindi oe kawawia, “Chi woose weiṙima iambilyia ṙeṙo-lyi-pfo, sile walya wawaenengye wuiṙimi.
40019012	Kyipfa kuwoṙe wandu walekyekuwinisha na mbonyi tsa wolyi kyipfa wawafee mbaṟe-yo iyo. Lyingyi-se kuwoṙe wandu wawaime nyi wandu wengyi pfinya tsekuwinisha na mbonyi tsa wolyi. Ngoseṟa kuwoṙe wandu waleṙumbuo wo wawenyi iṙa ikuwinisha na mbonyi tsa wolyi kyipfa kya Wumangyi wo ruwewu. Eiṙima iambilyia ṙeṙo-lyi, nalyiambilyie.”
40019013	Naaho-ng'u kaendio wana watutu kundu nayekyie mawoko wuye yawo na iwaterewia; wanalosho wakye wakaṙeṙia walya walewaende.
40019014	Kyaindi Yesu kagamba, “Lekyenyi wana watutu wache na koko; maa mulawashingyie; cha kyipfa wafananyi na iwo, Wumangyi wo ruwewu nyi wowo.”
40019015	Kayekyia mawoko gakye wuye yawo kawuka pfo.
40019016	Na mndu umwi kayenda kokye kammbia, “Mlosha, ngyiwute kyindo kyiha kyicha, kundu ngyiwone moo o mlungana?”
40019017	Kammbia, “Ny'kyi kyitewe ungyiwesa mbonyi tsa wucha? Ai mcha nyi umwi. Kyaindi kokunda iiṙa na moonyi o mlungana, osha kyilya mawawaso gakundi.”
40019018	Kammbia, “Mawawaso gaha?” Yesu kagamba, “Nyi iga: Ulawaage, Ulaṟuguye maa Ulaṟuguyo, Ulaiwe, Ulaṟingyishie wongo.
40019019	India awuyo na womoo, Kunda momṟasa opfo chandu ukukundi iyoe kumonyi.”
40019020	Manakye ulya kammbia, “Igo goose ngyekyeosha kyilya gakundi. Ny'kyikyi ngyiwuṟie-se?”
40019021	Yesu kammbia, “Kokunda iwa mndu aafutsie shoose yenda undekumba shoose uwoṙe, uenengye wakyiwa, na iyoe nochiwaṙa kyiseyesoe ruwewu, numa nnjo ungyioshe.”
40019022	Kyiyeri manakye ulya aleicho ṙeṙo-lyo, kawuka ho akuinyaṙie; kyipfa nawewoṙe masaa gafoi.
40019023	Yesu kawia wanalosho wakye, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia kye kyechiwa kyilemeri mnjama iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo ruwewu.
40019024	Lyingyi-se ngammbia, nyi kyaangu ngoseṟa ngamia iiṙa ṟochonyi lya sindanu, kuta mnjama iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa.”
40019025	Kyiyeri wanalosho waleicho, waleṟiyio mnu, wechigamba, “Nyi wui-ng'u echiiṙima ikyia?”
40019026	Yesu kawaitukuya na pfinya, kawawia, “Ko wandu ikyo kyeiṙimika-pfo; kyaindi ko Ruwa shoose shekyeiṙimika.”
40019027	Naaho-ng'u Petiro kagaluo, kammbia, “Soe luleṙa shoose lukokuosha; lochienengo kyi?”
40019028	Yesu kawawia “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia kye nyoe mulengyiosha inyi, wuyanenyi wuhya, kyiyeri Mono-Adamu echiṙamia kyiṙinyi kya mng'ano okye, na nyoe mochiṙamia shiṙinyi ikumi na shiwi, mochianduya mbaṟe ikumi na tsiwi tsa wandu wa Isiraelyi.
40019029	Na orio mndu aleṙa numba, ang'u mono-wamae o kyisoṟo ang'u o kyika, ang'u awuye, ang'u wamae, ang'u wana, ang'u maṙema, kyipfa kya rina lyako, nechiambilyia ka igana, na ioṟa moo o mlungana.
40019030	Kyaindi wafoi wai wa kuwooka wechiwa wefurumia, na wai wefurumia wechiwa wa kuwooka.”
40020001	“Cha kyipfa Wumangyi wo ruwewu wufananyi na monyi kanyi, alefuma ngamenyi utuko indeṟeia waṙemi nawaṙuo ṙemenyi lyakye lya msabibu.
40020002	Na oe ammarise iiṙikyiana woguru na waṙemi walya iwaenenga dinari ko mfiri umwi, nalewaṙuo kulya ṙemenyi lyakye.
40020003	Kafuma kyiyeri kya saa tsiṟaaṟu tsa ngamenyi, kawona wengyi wagoṟokyi sangaṙa walawoṙe kyindo kyeṟunda.
40020004	Na iwo kawawia, ‘Na nyoe yendenyi ṙemenyi lyako lya msabibu, na kyilya kyiwaṟi ngyechimuenenga.’ Wakayenda.
40020005	Kafuma-se kyiyeri kya saa tsiṟandaaṟu na saa kyenda, kawuta wuṙo.
