40020006	Na kyiyeri kya saa kumi na imwi kafuma, kakooya wengyi wagoṟokyi, kawawia, ‘Ny'kyilyi mugoṟokyi iha kyingoto puti kulawoṙe maṟunda?’
40020007	Wakammbia, ‘Ny'kyipfa kuwoṙe mndu aluṟeie iṟunda-pfo.’ Kawawia, ‘Na nyoe yendenyi ṙemenyi lyako lya msabibu.’
40020008	Kyiyeri kuleila, monyi ṙema ulya kawia mchilyi o waṙemi wakye, ‘Laga waṙemi, uwataae wori wowo, ochiwooka na o mafurumionyi mṟasa o kuwooka.’
40020009	Na kyiyeri walecha walya wa saa kumi na imwi, waleambilyia orio mndu dinari.
40020010	Na walya wa kuwooka kyiyeri walecha, walekusaṟa kye weambilyia ngoseṟa. Kyaindi na iwo taa wakaambilyia oṙio mndu dinari.
40020011	Kyasia wamuambilyie, wakanunuwia monyi kanyi,
40020012	wechigamba, ‘Iwo wa mafurumionyi waṟunda saa imwi tupu, na iyoe nowalyingatsana na soe lokarishia ngyuukyiwa na mui o mfiri puti.’
40020013	Na oe kagaluo umwi owo, kammbia, ‘Mbuya yako, ngakuima kyilya uwaṟi-pfo. Oiṙikyiana na inyi iambilyia dinari?
40020014	Ṙuo kyii kyapfo, uyende; ngakunda ienenga ichu o mafurumionyi kyilyingananyi na iyoe.
40020015	Chi sungusinyi iwuta na shilya shii shako chandu ngyikundi-pfoe? Ang'u riso lyapfo lyanyeng'a kyipfa kya inyi iwa mcha?’
40020016	Na wuṙo wa mafurumionyi wechiwa wa kuwooka, na wa kuwooka wechiwa wa mafurumionyi.”
40020017	Na lyilya Yesu aweiṙo echiyenda Yerusalemu, kaṙuo wanalosho walya ikumi na wawi handu halawoṙe wandu; na njienyi kawawia,
40020018	“Luiṙo iyenda Yerusalemu; na Mono-Adamu nechiwiko mawokonyi ga wang'anyi wa makohanyi na walosha wa mawawaso; nawo wemwanduya napfe.
40020019	Numa ya iho wechimṙuo ko masanga waiṙime imkapa makuukuu, na imkapa na ngowa, na imkapia msalabenyi; na mfiri o kaṟaaṟu neṟuka.”
40020020	Naaho-ng'u mama o wana wa Sebedayo kayenda ko Yesu hamwi na wana wakye kamwindia, na imterewa kyindo.
40020021	Yesu kammbia, “Nukundi kyikyi?” Kammbia, “Gamba kye wana-wa wako wawi waṙamie umwi kuwoko kopfo ko kulyoe na umwi kuwoko kopfo ko kumoso, Wumangyinyi wopfo.”
40020022	Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Muichi kyindo muiterewa-pfo. Ngyesa moiṙima iiṙia matuuro-ga gaingyiweṙa?” Wakammbia, “Loiṙima.”
40020023	Kawawia, “Kyaloi mochiiṙima ituuro cha inyi, kyaindi iṙamia kuwoko koko ko kulyoe na kuwoko koko ko kumoso, ngyiwoṙe pfinya yemuenenga-pfo, indi weenengo walya wawaṟeyeṟie nyi Awu-yoko.”
40020024	Na kyiyeri walya ikumi waleicho walesuuya wana walya wa mka wawi.
40020025	Kyaindi Yesu kawalaga, kagamba, “Muichi kye wang'anyi wa wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa wekyechilyia wandu wawo kui pfinya, na wang'anyi wawo wakawagaluo waṟundi.
40020026	Kyaindi kyechiwa kuṙo konyu-pfo. Mndu oose akundi iwa ang'anyi konyu, na nawe mṟundi onyu;
40020027	na mndu oose akundi iwa o kuwooka konyu nawe kyisinga kyanyu.
40020028	Chandu Mono-Adamu alalecha iṟundio, kyaindi iṟunda, na ireka moo uwe kyindo kyekyiṟa wanyamaṟi.”
40020029	Na lyilya waweiwuka Yeriko wandu wa kyisanzionyi kying'anyi wakamwosha.
40020030	Na shipfupfuṟe shiwi shiweṙamie mbai ya njia, nasho kyiyeri shileicho kye Yesu naiiṙa, shilekuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi, shechigamba, “Ulusaṟie, Mndumii, mono-Dawidi.”
40020031	Wandu wa kyisanzionyi kyilya wakashiṙeṙia, kundu shitsie. Kyaindi sho shikaengyeṟa ikuilenga na maṟui gang'anyi, shechigamba, “Ulusaṟie, Mndumii, mono-Dawidi!”
40020032	Yesu kagoṟoka, kashilaga, kagamba, “Mukundi ngyimmbutie kyi?”
40020033	Shikammbia, “Lukundi meso gaṙu gatambaṟukye luwone.”
40020034	Yesu kashiwonia wukyiwa, kapaaya meso gasho; cha ilyi shikaiṙima iwona, shikamwosha.
40021001	Na lyilya waleshika kufuhi na Yerusalemu, na ishika Betifage, kyikaṟo kyiwekyeri msaṟinyi o mashiṙi ga mseituni, naaho-ng'u Yesu aleṙuma wanalosho wawi, echiwawia,
40021002	“Yendenyi mṟasa kyikaṟo kyilya kyikyeri mbele ya ushangu lonyu, na cha ilyi mowona nzoi ingyipfungye, na igache lya nzoi hamwi nayo; tsipfunguonyi mungyiendie.
40021003	Na kokooya mndu ammbesa kyindo, gambenyi, ‘Mndumii nawoṙe kyindo akundi iwuta natso,’ na kulawoṙe iṙetsa kyiyeri nechitsiende.”
40021004	Ishi shoose shechiwa, kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyilya kyileṙeṙo nyi moonguo shisuku echigamba,
40021005	“Wienyi mṟi o Sion, mangyi opfo naicha na kopfo, namhoo, na oe naṙamie wuye ya nzoi. Na igache lya nzoi, mana o nzoi.”
40021006	Wanalosho walya wakayenda, wakawuta chandu Yesu alewawia.
40021007	Wakaende nzoi iya na igache lya nzoi, wakawikyia nguwo tsawo wuye yatso, na oe kaṙamia wuye yayo.
40021008	Wandu wafoi wa kyisanzionyi kyilya wakaala nguwo tsawo njienyi; na wengyi wakamanya maṟamba ga mashiṙi, wakagaala njienyi.
40021009	Na wuingyi wo wandu wawesongoi, na walya walemwosha, wakakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi wechigamba, “Hosiana, Mono-Dawidi! Nyi oe ammbikyie mboṟa, ulya aicha kui rina lya Mndumii, Hosiana wuye ruwewu.”
40021010	Na lyilya aleiṙa na Yerusalemu, mṟi oose ukowaṙa ndiṟimo tsing'anyi, wandu wechigamba, “Nyi wui ichu?”
40021011	Wuingyi wo wandu wukogamba, “Ichu nyi moonguo shisuku ulya, Yesu o Nasareti ya Galyilaya.”
40021012	Yesu kaiṙa na hekalunyi, kafuna woose wawekapa mbucha kulya hekalunyi, kapfuluo mesa tsa weilacha heleri, na shiṙi sha walya waweikumba mbeta.
40021013	Kawawia, “Kyikyiṟeie, ‘Numba yako yechilago numba ya kyiterewionyi,’ kyaindi nyoe moigaluo iwa usanja lo wasokyi.”
40021014	Na shipfupfuṟe na shiwete shikayenda kokye akyeri kulya hekalunyi, kashikyiṟa.
40021015	Kyaindi wang'anyi wa makohanyi na walosha wa mawawaso kyiyeri walewona maṟiyisho alewuta, na kyiyeri wana walekuilenga na maṟui gawo hekalunyi, wechigamba, “Hosiana, Mono-Dawidi” walesuo,
40021016	wakammbia, “Uichuoe chandu iwa waigamba?” Yesu kawawia, “Yee loi. Mulandeicho kye ‘Kui maṙumbu ga wana wanangu na waionga nuleafutsia kyiṟumi?’ ”
40021017	Kalekana nawo, kayenda nja ya mṟi mṟasa Betania, kalaa pfo.
40021018	Na lyilya kulekya kyiyeri aweiyenda mṟinyi, nalewoṙo nyi njaa.
40021019	Kawona mfumu umwi mbai ya njia, kayenda halya-ndu uwekyeri, alawone pfo kyindo sile maṟa tupu. Kauwia, “Kulawonekye ndunda kopfo wookyia inu mṟasa mlungana.” Mfumu ukouma cha ilyi.
40021020	Kyiyeri wanalosho walewona, waleṟiyio, wechigamba, “Nyi wuṙa mfumu ouma cha ilyi?”
40021021	Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, mukowaṙa iiṙikyia, mulandewe wandu weilacha-ilacha kyilya moiṙikyia, mochiṟunda chi ilyo lya mfumu tupu-pfo, kyaindi maa mukowia fumvu-lyi, ‘Kuluka, uwiyitso ipalyipalyinyi,’ kyechiṟundika.
40021022	Na shoose mochishiterewa kyiterewonyi mochiiṙikyia, mochiambilyia.”
40021023	Na kyiyeri amwiṙe na hekalunyi wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wasongoru wa wandu wakayenda kokye kyiyeri aweilosha, wakagamba, “Nyi kui wuchilyi wuha uiwuta shindo-shi? Na oe nyi wui alekuenenga wuchilyi-wu?”
40021024	Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Na inyi ngyemmbesa kyindo kyimwi na nyoe mukongyigaluo, inyi ngyechimmbia nyi kui wuchilyi wuha ngyiwuta ishi.
40021025	Wupatiso wa Yohane wulewuka kwi? Wulewuka ruwewu, ang'u ko wandu?” Wakawesana wo wenyi ko wenyi, wechigamba, “Lukogamba, wulewuka ruwewu, neluwia, ‘Ny'kyilyi-ng'u mulalemwiṙikyia?’
40021026	Na lukogamba, ‘Wulewuka ko wandu,’ luiowuo kyisanzionyi; kyipfa wandu woose wawonyi Yohane nyi moonguo shisuku.”
40021027	Wakagaluo Yesu, wakagamba, “Luichi-pfo.” Na oe kawawia, “Maa inyi ngyimmbia nyoe nyi kui wuchilyi wuha ngyiwuta ishi-pfo.”
40021028	“Kyaindi muwonyi kuṙa? Mndu umwi nawewoṙe wana wawi. Kayenda ko ulya o kuwooka, kagamba, ‘Mono-ko, inu yenda undeṟunda ṙemenyi lya msabibu.’
40021029	Kagaluo kagamba, ‘Ngyiyenda, Mndumii,’ alayende.
40021030	Kayenda ko ulya o kawi, kagamba wuṙo. Na oe kagaluo, kagamba, ‘Ngyikundi-pfo.’ Numa ya iho katerewa ihooṟio, kayenda.
40021031	Ngyesa kyiiṙi kya iwo wawi nyi uha aleṟunda kyilya awuye akundi?” Wakammbia, “Nyi ulya o kawi.” Kyasia Yesu kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, wesania ukamba na maṟai waimusongoya iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa.
40021032	Cha kyipfa Yohane nalecha na konyu kui njia ya wusumganyi, nyoe mulamwiṙikyie. Kyaindi wesania ukamba na maṟai walemwiṙikyia; na nyoe maa lyilya mulewona, muleṙumbuya kundu mumwiṙikyie-pfo.”
40021033	“Aṙanyienyi mfano ungyi. Kuwewoṙe mndu umwi monyi kanyi, na oe nalewaaya sabibu ṙemenyi lyakye, kalyiringyichia uṟigo, kasuma rina lyekamia mpfinyo makyiṙi-gawi galyo, kawika kyitaanga, kagawia waṙemi ṙema lyilya, kayenda kyaro.
40021034	Ilyi kyiyeri kyesambuo kyiletikyira kufuhi, kaṙuma waṟundi wakye ko waṙemi walya, waambilyie ndunda tsakye.
40021035	Waṙemi walya wakawaṙa waṟundi walya, ichu wakamkapa, na ichu wakammbaaga, na ichu wakamkapa na magoe.
40021036	Kaṙuma-se waṟundi wengyi wafoi kuta walya wa kuwooka, wakawawutia wuṙo.
40021037	Mafurumionyi kaṙuma mono-kye o womi kowo, echigamba, weindia mono-ko.
40021038	Kyaindi waṙemi walya kyiyeri walewona mana ulya, wakaṙeṙa wo wenyi ko wenyi, wechigamba, ‘Ichu nyi mokyioṟa. Sindenyi lummbaage, luṙuo kyooṟa kyakye.’
40021039	Wakammbaṙa, wakammbiyitsa nja ya ṙema lya msabibu wakammbaaga.
40021040	Kyasia kyiyeri echicha mndumii ulya o ṙema lya msabibu nechiwutia kyi waṙemi-wo?”
40021041	Wakammbia, “Nechirumatsa uwicho walya wawicho; na ṙema lya msabibu nechigawia waṙemi wengyi, wechimtaa ndunda kui kyiyeri kyiwaṟi.”
40021042	Yesu kawawia, “Muichi chandu kyikyeri shiṟeionyi: ‘Igoe walelyilega wewika numba, ilyo lyawa igoe lying'anyi lya ndumbenyi; ṙeṙo-lyi lyiwukyie ko Mndumii, nalyo nyi kyiṟiyisho mesonyi gaṙu?’ ”
40021043	Kyipfa kya ikyo ngammbia, “Wumangyi wo Ruwa wochiwuto konyu, na ienengo isanga lyingyi lyekyekumbia ndunda tsa Wumangyi-wo. [
40021044	Na icho echioloka wuye ya igoe-lyo nechifinjika-finjika; na ulya lyechimwolokyia, lyechimsaa lyimmamiṟe.]”
40021045	Wang'anyi wa makohanyi na Mafarisayo, kyiyeri waleicho mfano yakye, walemanya kye nyi kyawo aiṙeṙa.
40021046	Nawo kyiyeri walepfula immbaṙa, waleowuo wuingyi wo wandu, cha kyipfa wo walemmbona nai moonguo shisuku.
40022001	Yesu kagaluo, kawawia-se kui mṙeṙie, echigamba,
40022002	“Wumangyi wo ruwewu wufananyi na mangyi umwi aleachikyia mono-kye wolyi.
40022003	Kaṙuma shisinga shakye shilage walya wawewalage na kulya wolyinyi; nawo wakalega icha.
40022004	Kaṙuma-se shisinga shingyi, echigamba, ‘Wienyi walya wawalage, kye ngyiṟeyeṟie shelya shako; umbe tsako na orio kyindo kyinoru shamshinjo, na shoose shammba; nnjonyi na wolyinyi.’
40022005	Kyaindi wakamina, wakayenda, umwi ṙemenyi kokye, umwi mbuchenyi yakye;
40022006	na walya waletsugaa wakawaṙa shisinga shilya shakye, wakashiwutia shindo shiwicho, na ishiwaaga.
40022007	Kyasia mangyi ulya kakapo nyi nyashi; kaṙika mbaganyi tsakye, karumatsa wawaagi walya, karumatsa mṟi owo kui moṙo.
40022008	Numa ya iho kawia shisinga shakye, ‘Wolyi wommba, kyaindi walya wawalage wawaṟi-pfo.
40022009	Kyasia yendenyi mṟasa handu mtandaṟa ikooyanyi na woose mowawona walagenyi na wolyinyi.’
40022010	Shisinga shilya shikafuma shikayenda njienyi ing'anyi, shikasania woose walewawona, wawicho na wecha; wolyi wukoichuo wayenu.
40022011	Kyaindi kyiyeri mangyi ulya aleiṙa na numba kundu naambuye wayenu wakye, kawona pfo mndu umwi alaṟee mkoṟoṟi o wolyi.
40022012	Kammbia, ‘Mbuya-ko, noiṙa kuṙa na kunu na iyoe uwoṙe mkoṟoṟi o wolyi-pfo?’ Na oe kauṟa kyegamba.
40022013	Mangyi kawia waṟundi, ‘Mpfungyenyi mawoko na maṙende, mṙuonyi mundemmbiyitsa meemenyi o nja. Nyipfo kochiwaṙa ṟanyi na ilya ngakuru.
40022014	Cha kyipfa walage nyi wafoi, indi wasambuṟe nyi waangu.’ ”
40022015	Naaho-ng'u Mafarisayo wakayenda wakalya njama, chandu wemṙega kui maṙeṙo.
40022016	Wakaṙuma kokye wanalosho wawo hamwi na Maherodi, wakagamba, “Mlosha, luichi kye iyoe nyi mndu o loi, na njia ya Ruwa nokyeilosha kui wuloi, maa okyesaṟa rina lya mndu oose-pfo, cha kyipfa okyeambuya fana tsa wandu-pfo.
40022017	Kyasia luwie, nuwonyi kuṙa? Nyi sungusinyi ienenga Kaisari kodi, ang'u chi wuṙo-pfo?”
40022018	Kyaindi Yesu kamanya wuwicho wowo, kagamba, “Ny'kyilyi mungyiyesha, nyoe wakulembecheṟi?
40022019	Ngyiloṟenyi heleri ya kodi.” Nawo wakamwendie dinari.
40022020	Kawawia, “Nyi ya wui sanamu-i na kyiṟeio-kyi?”
40022021	Wakammbia, “Nyi ya Kaisari.” Kawawia, “Kyasia, enengyenyi Kaisari shikyeri sha Kaisari, na Ruwa shikyeri sha Ruwa.”
40022022	Kyiyeri waleicho waleṟiyio, wakamṙa wakayenda.
40022023	Mfiri ulya Masadukayo, wandu wekyegamba kye kuwoṙe iṟuka lya wapfu-pfo, waleyenda kokye, wakammbesa,
40022024	wechigamba, “Mlosha, Mose nalegamba, ‘Mndu kapfa, alawoṙe wana, mono-wamae naalyikye mka ulya okye, kundu mono-wamae nawone mana.’
40022025	Kyasia koṙu kuwewoṙe wana wa mka mfungaaṙe. O kuwooka kaalyika, kapfa, na kyipfa alawoṙe mana, kaṙeeya mono-wamae mka okye.
40022026	Na wuṙo o kawi na oe, na o kaṟaaṟu, mṟasa woose mfungaaṙe.
40022027	Mafurumionyi ga woose mndu mka ulya na oe kapfa.
40022028	Kyasia, kyiyeri kya iṟuka lya wapfu, nechiwa mka o uha kyiiṙi kya walya mfungaaṙe? Kyipfa woose wawekyeri na oe.”
40022029	Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Muiṙeka, cha kyipfa muichi shiṟeio maa wuiṙimi wo Ruwa-pfo.
40022030	Cha kyipfa walya wekyeṟuka ko wapfu wekyealyika maa ialyiko-pfo, kyaindi wekyewa cha malaika wa ruwewu.
40022031	Lyingyi-se ko mbonyi tsa iṟuka lya wapfu, muichi kyindo kyilya kyileṙeṙo nyi Ruwa, echigamba,
40022032	‘Inyi nyi Ruwa o Abrahamu, na Ruwa o Isakyi na Ruwa o Yakobo?’ Ruwa chi Ruwa o wapfu-pfo, indi o wai na moo.”
40022033	Na kyiyeri wuingyi wo wandu waleicho waleṟiyio, kyipfa kya malosho gakye.
40022034	Na kyiyeri Mafarisayo waleicho kye nalegaluo ndiṟi Masadukayo walya, waleṙamia kyiṙombo handu hamwi.
40022035	Umwi owo, aichi mawawaso, kammbesa, echimwesha,
40022036	“Mlosha, kyiiṙi kya mawawaso nyi lyiha lying'anyi kuta goose?”
40022037	Yesu kammbia, “Kunda Mndumii Ruwa opfo kui ngoo yapfo yoose, na kui mrima opfo oose, na kui wuṟango wopfo woose.
40022038	Ilyi nyilyo iwawaso lying'anyi kuta goose, nalyo nyi lya kuwooka.
40022039	Na lya kawi lyifananyi nalyo, nalyo nyi ilyi, ‘Kunda momṟasa opfo cha mrima opfo.’
40022040	Mawawaso goose na malosho ga weonguo shisuku gakyeri kyiiṙi kya mawawaso-ga gawi.”
40022041	Na kyiyeri Mafarisayo walesanzia handu hamwi, Yesu nalewawesa, echigamba, “Muwonyi kuṙa mbonyi tsa Kristo?
40022042	Nyi mono-wui?” Wakammbia, “Nyi o Dawidi.”
40022043	Kawawesa, “Kyasia kyawa-ng'u kuṙa Dawidi kyiiṙi kya Mumuyo ilaga Mndumii, echigamba,
40022044	‘Mndumii nalewia Mndumii oko, uṙamie kuwoko koko ko kulyoe, mṟasa kyiyeri ngyechiwika washituwa wapfo, wanda ya wuchilyi wopfo?’ ”
40022045	“Kyasia, Dawidi kamlaga Mndumii, nawa-se kuṙa mono-kye?”
40022046	Maa kulewaṙa mndu aleiṙima imgaluo kyindo-pfo; maa kuwoṙe mndu oose alekaria wookyia mfiri ulya immbesa kyindo-se-pfo.
40023001	Numa ya iho Yesu kaṙeṙa na wuingyi wo wandu na wanalosho wakye, echigamba,
40023002	“Walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo wawoṙe wuiṙimi wo tambuluo mawawaso ga Mose.
40023003	Kyasia, shoose wechimmbia, mushiwute; kyaindi kui mfano o mawuto gawo, mulawute; kyipfa wo wekyeṙeṙa kyaindi wekyewuta-pfo.
40023004	Wo wekyepfunga maṟio malemeri na iṙika wandu mayewenyi gawo; walakunde wo wawenyi igapaaya na kyimnyoe kyawo.
40023005	Lyingyi-se mmbutie yawo yoose nyi kundu wawono nyi wandu; cha kyipfa shichonyi-sho shishiṟeie maṙeṙo ga Ruwa wekyeṟaa shaamunyi shawo na mawoko nyi shing'anyi mnu, na makyechu ga mkoṟoṟi yawo gangyilesheṟe mnu.
40023006	Wakundi iṙamia shiṙi sha mbele handu hawoṙe shelya, na iṙamia mbele masinagoginyi,
40023007	na iiṟikyiṟo sangaṙa, na ilago nyi wandu ‘Rabi.’
40023008	Kyaindi nyoe mulalago ‘Rabi,’ kyipfa mlosha onyu nyi umwi, na nyoe moose nyi wana wa mka.
40023009	Maa mulalage mndu awu wuyanenyi, kyipfa Awu-yonyu nyi umwi, ai o ruwewu.
40023010	Maa mulalago wasongoru; kyipfa msongoru onyu nyi umwi, na oe nyi oe Kristo.
40023011	Na oe ai ang'anyi onyu nechiwa mṟundi onyu.
40023012	Na orio oose echikung'anyisa amonyi nechititiṟo, na orio oose echikutitiṟa amonyi neching'anyiso. ”
40023013	“Ochia lonyu walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, wakulembecheṟi! Cha kyipfa mokyeshingyia wandu moongo o Wumangyi wo ruwewu; nyoe muwenyi mulaiṙe napfo, maa walya waiiṙa mulawalekyie waiṙe napfo. [
40023014	“Ochia lonyu walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, wakulembecheṟi! Cha kyipfa mokyesoka wakusu orio kyindo wawoṙe, na kui wukulembecheṟi mokyewika shiterewo shileshi; kyipfa kya ikyo mochiambilyia ianduyo lying'anyi ngoseṟa.]
40023015	“Ochia lonyu walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, wakulembecheṟi! Cha kyipfa mokyetenga-tenga mapalyipalyinyi na urukyenyi lugaṙutsu kundu mugaluoe mndu umwi nawaṙe iiṙikyia, na kammboneka, mokyemgaluo kawa mana o ngyehena ammbicho kuta nyoe kawi.
40023016	“Ochia lonyu wasongoru mui shipfupfuṟe. Nyoe mokyegamba, ‘Mndu echilya nyamu kui hekalu chi kyindo-pfo, indi mndu kalya nyamu kui shindo sha sahapu shikyeri hekalunyi, kyimmbaṟi iwuta shilya ateṟia.’
40023017	Nyoe matondo na shipfupfuṟe. Kyipfa nyi kyiha kying'anyi kuta kyingyi, nyi sahapu iya, ang'u hekalu-lyo lyekyeyeṟemtsa sahapu-yo?
40023018	Lyingyi-se, ‘Mndu echilya nyamu kui alyitaṟe, chi kyindo-pfo; indi mndu echilya nyamu kui kyienengo kyikyeri iho wuye ya alyitaṟe-yo, kyimmbaṟi iwuta shilya ateṟia.’
40023019	Shipfupfuṟe nyoe. Kyipfa nyi kyiha kying'anyi kuta kyingyi, kyienengo-kyo, ang'u alyitaṟe-yo yekyeyeṟemtsa kyienengo-kyo?
40023020	Kyasia ulya alya nyamu kui alyitaṟe, nekyelya nyamu nayo na shindo shoose shikyeri wuye yayo.
40023021	Na ulya alya nyamu kui hekalu, nekyelya nyamu nalyo, na ilya nyamu kui Ruwa ulya ekyekaa pfo.
40023022	Na ulya ekyelya nyamu kui ngyina, nekyelya nyamu kui kyiṙi kya mng'ano kya Ruwa, na ilya nyamu kui Ruwa ulya akyiṙamilyie.
40023023	“Ochia lonyu walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, wakulembecheṟi! Cha kyipfa mokyetaa orio kyifunjoe kya ikumi kya maṟa gelotsiṟa kyelya, kyaindi mukoṙa mbonyi tsing'anyi tsa mawawaso, cha iṙumbuo moondu kulawoṙe ikundia, na isaṟia, na iiṙikyia. Isho muwaṟi ishiwuta, maa shilya shingyi mulashiṙe.
40023024	Wasongoru shipfupfuṟe, mokyefifina kyitsina shindonyi shanyu shenyo kyaindi mkomeṟa ngamia.”
40023025	“Ochia lonyu walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, wakulembecheṟi! Cha kyipfa mokyesanja kyiṙoo na kyitela ipfo kyanja kyaindi shindo muwikyie pfo nyi sha wusokyi na ikukunda nyoe muwenyi.
40023026	Iyoe Mfarisayo kyipfupfuṟe. Sanja kyiṙoo kuwooka ipfo kyanumba, kundu na ipfo kyanja kuiṙime iila.
40023027	“Ochia lonyu, walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, wakulembecheṟi! Cha kyipfa mufananyi na shilome shishishie kyindo kya uwiṟo, nasho kya ipfo nja shekyewoneka shii shicha, kyaindi ipfo kyanumba shiichuo mafuo ga wapfu; na orio kyindo kyiporu.
40023028	Na wuṙo na nyoe; ipfo kyanja muwono nyi wandu cha muwoṙe wusumganyi, kyaindi ipfo kyanumba muichuo wukulembecheṟi na ifunja mawawaso lya orio mbaṟe.”
40023029	“Ochia lonyu, walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, wakulembecheṟi! Cha kyipfa mokyewika shilome shicha sheṟika weonguo shisuku na waṟundi wengyi wasumganyi wa Ruwa na shilome-sho mkoshichopa mnu,
40023030	na igamba, ‘Kokooya soe luwekyeri pfo kyiyeri kya kacha kya waku waṙu, luwechisanza nawo ipusuo samu ya weonguo shisuku-pfo.’
40023031	Kuṙi muikuṟingyishia muwenyi, kye nyoe nyi wana wa walya walewaaga weonguo shisuku.
40023032	Afutsienyi-ng'u kyila waku wanyu walewooka.
40023033	Nyoe njoka, wana wa manjoka, moṙicha kuṙa ngapo ya ngyehena?
40023034	Kyipfa kya ikyo, inyi ngyiṙuma konyu weonguo shisuku na wawoṙe wuṟango na walosha wa mawawaso na wengyi kyiiṙi kyawo mochiwawaaga na iwakapia msalabenyi, wengyi kyiiṙi kyawo mochiwakapa wakyeri masinagoginyi ganyu na iwafuna mṟi kui mṟi.
40023035	Na mochiwona ngapo kyipfa kya samu ya wandu wasumganyi mulewaaga, wookyia samu ya Abelyi, ulya msumganyi, mṟasa samu ya Sakaria, mono-Barakyia, mulemmbaagia kyiiṙi kya haele na alyitaṟe.
40023036	Ny'kyaloi, ngammbienyi, ngapo-tso tsoose tsechiolokyia rika-lyi.”
40023037	“Iyoe Yerusalemu, Yerusalemu, uiwaaga weonguo shisuku na ikapa na magoe walya wawaṙume kopfo! Nyi kyenga ngyilekunda ikusania hamwi na wana wapfo, chandu nguku yekyesania handu hamwi maalea gayo wanda ya makungo gayo, kyaindi mulekunda-pfo?
40023038	Ruwa akyeri-se numbenyi yanyu yeterewia-pfo.
40023039	Cha kyipfa ngammbia, mochingyiwona-se maa ale wookyia wulalu-pfo, mṟasa kyiyeri mochigamba, ‘Namwenengye mboṟa ulya aicha kui rina lya Mndumii.’ ”
40024001	Yesu kayenda, kawuka hekalunyi. Wanalosho wakye wakayenda kokye wamloṟe numba tsa hekalu.
40024002	Na oe kagaluo, kawawia, “Muwonyi ishi shoose? Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, hechitsugaa igoe wuye ya igoe lyingyi lyilechiolotso-pfo.”
40024003	Na lyilya aweṙamie fumvunyi lya mashiṙi ga mseituni, wanalosho wakye wakayenda kokye kui kyiṟika, wechigamba, “Luwie, mbonyi-tsi tsechiwa indi? Na kyiṟingyishio kya icha lyapfo na kya mafurumionyi ga wuyana nyi kyikyi?”
40024004	Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Mndu alamlembe.
40024005	Cha kyipfa wafoi wechicha kui rina lyako, wechigamba, ‘Inyi nyi Kristo;’ nawo wechilemba wafoi.
40024006	Na nyoe mochiicho mbonyi tsa shiṙa na iweweṙo lya shiṙa. Maa mulaowesho; kyipfa isho shiwaṟi iwa kuṙo; kyaindi mafurumionyi galya galandeshikye-pfo.
40024007	Cha kyipfa isanga lyechiwuka ikapana na isanga, na wumangyi ikapana na wumangyi. Kochiwaṙa njaa, na shiriinza handu kui handu.
40024008	Isho shoose nyisho mawookyionyi ga iwawio lying'anyi.
40024009	Kyiyeri-kyo wechimṟiinga nyoe muwoṙo nyi wukyiwa, nawo wechimmbaaga, na nyoe mochiwa wandu wawasuoe nyi masanga goose kyipfa kya rina lyako.
40024010	Naaho-ng'u wafoi wechikapa tuulyia, nawo wechiṟiingana, na isuana.
40024011	Na weonguo shisuku wa wongo wechiwoneka na ilemba wafoi.
40024012	Na kyipfa kya iengyeṟika inyamaṟa mawawaso, ikunda lya wandu wafoi lyechiololyia.
40024013	Kyaindi ulya echikarishia mṟasa mafurumionyi, nyi oe echikyia.
40024014	Lyingyi-se mbonyi ngyicha tsa Wumangyi tsechiongoyo wuyanenyi koose, iwa wuṟingyishi wo masanga goose. Iho nyiho mafurumionyi galya gechicha.”
40024015	“Kyasia kyiyeri-kyo mochiwona ulya ekyenyamaṟa na ifunja orio kyindo kyiele, ulya amgambe nyi moonguo shisuku Danielyi, agoṟokyi handu haele (aikulosha na namanye).
40024016	Naaho-ng'u wakyeri urukyenyi lo Uyuda waṙichilyie mafumvunyi.
40024017	Na ai kai alasokye iṙuo shilya shikyeri kanyi kokye.
40024018	Maa akyeri mṙemenyi alawuye na numa ionduo nguwo yakye.
40024019	Ochia lo iwo wai wanene na waionza mfiri-yo!
40024020	Terewenyi, kundu iṙicha lyanyu kulawe kyiyeri kya mbeho, maa mfiri o onyonya.
40024021	Cha kyipfa kyiyeri-kyo kochiwaṙa wukyiwa wung'anyi, mbaṟe yakye ilandewonekye wookyia mawookyionyi ga wuyana mṟasa wulalu, maa mbaṟe-yo iyo yechiwono-se maa ale-pfo.
40024022	Na kokooya mfiri-yo ilawechifuhiṟo, mndu oose awechikyia-pfo; kyaindi kyipfa kya wasambuṟe mfiri-yo yechifuhiṟo.
40024023	Kyiyeri-kyo mndu kammbia, ‘Kristo nakyeri iha, ang'u nakyeri kulya,’ mulaiṙikyie.
40024024	Cha kyipfa wechiwoneka makristo wa wongo, na weonguo shisuku ga wongo, nawo wechiwuta ṟigo tsing'anyi na shiṟiyisho; waiṙime imuṙetsa, cha kyikaiṙimika, mṟasa wai wasambuṟe.
40024025	Ngammuikyimbia.
40024026	Kyasia wakammbia, ‘Nakyeri kundu ko nuka kuumu suwaa kulawoṙe maa mṟinga,’ mulafume; ‘Nakyeri kanyi,’ mulaiṙikyie.
40024027	Cha kyipfa chandu mbawa yekyewaṟuka iwuka ura lo ngamenyi mṟasa ikawono ura lo kyukonyi, nyi wuṙo kochiwa kyiyeri kya icha lya Mono-Adamu.
40024028	Cha kyipfa handu mnying'a ukyeri nyi ho-ndu mbeṟo tsekyekuumbia.”
40024029	“Kyaindi cha ilyi, numa ya wukyiwa wo mfiri iya, mnengyeṟi ochiwiko meema, na mori ochiloṟa ngyesa yacho-pfo, na nyenyeri tsechioloka iwuka ruwewu, na shindo shingyi sha ruwewu shekupaaya-paya na inyanyaṟika.
40024030	Naaho-ng'u yechiwonekana ṟigo ya Mono-Adamu ruwewu; na masanga goose ga wuyana gechikapa ṟanyi; nago gechiwona Mono-Adamu echicha mapuchinyi ga ruwewu hamwi na pfinya na mng'ano ung'anyi.
40024031	Na oe nechiṙuma malaika wakye hamwi na ṟui lying'anyi lya iganda, nawo wechisania wasambuṟe wakye iwuka ngyuura tsoose tsa wuyana.”
40024032	“Kyasia ko mfumu kuloshenyi mfano. Mbaga yakye ikammarisa ioṟia na iwaṙa maṟa, mokyemanya kye kyiyeri kya isambuo kyikyeri kufuhi.
40024033	Na nyoe taa, ilyi mowona isho shoose, manyenyi kye Mono-Adamu nakyeri kufuhi, moongonyi.
40024034	Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, rika-lyi lyechiiṙa-pfo, mṟasa kyiyeri isho shechiafukyia.
40024035	Ngyina na uruka shechiiṙa, kyaindi, maṙeṙo gako gechiiṙa maa ale-pfo.”
40024036	“Kyaindi mbonyi tsa mfiri ulya na saa iya kuwoṙe aichi-pfo, maa malaika wakyeri ruwewu, maa Mana, sile Awu amonyi.
40024037	Cha kyipfa chandu kyiwekyeri kyiyeri kya Noe, nyi wuṙo kochiwa kyiyeri kya icha lya Mono-Adamu.
40024038	Cha kyipfa chandu kyiwekyeri mfiri iya ilesongoya Mfu wandu waweilya na inyo, wechialyika na ialyiko, mṟasa mfiri ulya Noe aleiṙa na safinenyi
40024039	walamanye mṟasa Mfu ukocha, ukowarumatsa woose. Nyi wuṙo kochiwa kyiyeri kya icha lya Mono-Adamu.
40024040	Kyiyeri-kyo wandu wawi wekooya wai ṙemenyi; umwi nawuto ho, umwi naṙio ho.
40024041	Waka wawi wekooya wesaa; umwi nawuto ho, umwi naṙio ho.”
40024042	“Kyasia laenyi kyiṙombo; kyipfa muichi nyi mfiri uha Mndumii onyu echicha-pfo.
40024043	Kyaindi manyenyi kyindo-kyi; kokooya monyi kanyi aweichi kyiyeri mbafu yechicha, nawelaa kyiṙombo, maa awechiṙa numba yakye ifunjo-pfo.
40024044	Kyipfa kya ikyo na nyoe kuṟeyeṟenyi; cha kyipfa saa mulaikusaṟie Mono-Adamu naicha.”
40024045	“Kyasia nyi wui-ng'u mṟundi muyendelyi, awoṙe wuṟango, mndumii okye alemwenenga wuchilyi kanyi kokye, naenengye wandu kyelya kyiyeri kyiwaṟi?
40024046	Agusu mṟundi ulya, mndumii okye echicha namkooye ewuta kuṙo.
40024047	Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, nechimwenenga ichilyia shindo shakye shoose.
40024048	Kyaindi mṟundi ulya mmbicho kagamba mrimenyi kokye, ‘Mndumii oko naikyelyio,’
40024049	kawooka ikapa woṙoe, na ilya na inyo hamwi na wananzi.
40024050	Mndumii o mṟundi-cho neecha mfiri mṟundi-cho alaukusaṟie, na saa alaichi;
40024051	nechimṙumbuo mateng'eta gawi na immbutia chandu wakulembecheṟi wekyewutio. Nyi lyo-ndu kochiwaṙa wukyiwa na ilya ngakuru.”
40025001	“Naaho-ng'u Wumangyi wo ruwewu wochifanana na wana wa kyika ikumi, waleira taa tsawo, wakafuma indeambilyia monyi wolyi.
40025002	Wataanu wawekyeri matondo, na wataanu wawewoṙe wuṟango.
40025003	Walya wawekyeri matondo waleira taa tsawo, walaṙuo mafuṙa;
40025004	indi walya wawoṙe wuṟango waleṙuo mafuṙa shindonyi shawo shewika mafuṙa hamwi na taa tsawo.
40025005	Na lyilya monyi wolyi alekyelyio, woose wakarengyera wakalaa maṙoe.
40025006	Kyaindi kyio kya mayeleyele, hakawaṙa iiṟuka lya mndu aigamba, ‘Aulya, monyi wolyi; fumenyi mundemwambilyia.’
40025007	Cha ilyi wana walya wa kyika woose wakafuma, wakaṟeyeṟa taa tsawo.
40025008	Walya wai matondo wakawia walya wawoṙe wuṟango, ‘Luenengyenyi shifuṙa shanyu; kyipfa taa tsaṙu tsiruma.’
40025009	Kyaindi walya wawoṙe wuṟango wakawagaluo, wechigamba, ‘Chi wuṙo-pfo; gelushika soe na nyoe-pfo. Nanga moyenda ko walya wekyekumba mafuṙa mundeguṟa pfo ganyu.’
40025010	Nawo kyiyeri waweiyenda iguṟa, monyi wolyi kacha, na walya wawekuṟeyeṟie wakaiṙa na oe na wolyinyi; moongo ukoshingo.
40025011	Numa wana walya wa kyika wengyi wakacha, wakagamba, ‘Mndumii, Mndumii, lupfunguye moongo.’
40025012	Kagaluo kagamba, ‘Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, ngyimuichi nyoe-pfo.’
40025013	Kyasia laenyi kyiṙombo, cha kyipfa muichi mfiri-cho maa saa-pfo.”
40025014	“Kyipfa nyi cha mfano o mndu akundi iyenda kyaro. Nalelaga waṟundi wakye, kawaṙambika masaa gakye.
40025015	Kaenenga umwi talanta tsitaanu, na umwi talanta tsiwi, na umwi talanta imwi; orio mndu iṙuana na wuiṙimi wokye; kayenda kyaro.
40025016	Cha ilyi ulya aleambilyia talanta tsitaanu kayenda, kakapa natso mbucha, kawona ho kyiira talanta tsingyi tsitaanu.
40025017	Na wuṙo taa ulya awoṙe tsiwi; oe kawona ho kyiira talanta tsiwi.
40025018	Kyaindi ulya aleambilyia imwi, naleyenda kasuma wanda terinyi, kaṟika pfo heleri iya ya mndumii okye.
40025019	Mfiri ifoi yamuiṙe mndumii o waṟundi walya kacha, kaachikyia matala hamwi nawo.
40025020	Ulya aleambilyia talanta tsitaanu kacha kaende talanta tsingyi tsitaanu, echigamba, ‘Mndumii, nulekooma koko talanta tsitaanu; aitsi talanta tsingyi tsitaanu ndewona ho kyiira.’
40025021	Mndumii okye kammbia, ‘Necha, mṟundi mcha na mwendelyi. Nokuloṟa kye numwendelyi maa shindonyi shitutu. Ngyechikuwika mchilyi o shindo shifoi. Iṙa na sienyi ya mndumii opfo.’
40025022	Na ulya aleambilyia talanta tsiwi kacha, kagamba, ‘Mndumii, nulekooma koko talanta tsiwi; aitsi, talanta tsingyi tsiwi ndewona ho kyiira.’
40025023	Mndumii okye kammbia, ‘Necha, mṟundi mcha na mwendelyi. Nokuloṟa kye numwendelyi maa shindonyi shitutu. Ngyechikuwika mchilyi o shindo shifoi. Iṙa na sienyi ya mndumii opfo.’
40025024	Na ulya aleambilyia talanta imwi, kagamba, ‘Mndumii, ngyilemanya kye iyoe nyi mndu muumu. Nokyesambuo handu ulawaaya, nokyesania handu ulaolyie mbeu.
40025025	Kyasia ngaowuo, ngayenda ngaṟika talanta yapfo terinyi. Wulalu nuwoṙe kyilya kyikyeri kyapfo.’
40025026	Mndumii okye kagaluo, kagamba, ‘Iyoe mṟundi mmbicho na mṙoko. Nulemanya kye ngyekyesambuo handu ngyilawaaya, ngyekyesania handu ngyilaolyia mbeu.
40025027	Kyasia, kyiwekuwaṟi ikooma heleri yako ko walya wekyeilacha heleri; na inyi ngacha ngyiwewona kyilya kyikyeri kyako na heleri ya ngoseṟa.
40025028	Kyasia, msokyenyi talanta-yo enengyenyi ulya awoṙe talanta ikumi.
40025029	Cha kyipfa ulya awoṙe kyindo nechienengo, na iengyeṟio pacha; kyaindi alawoṙe kyindo, maa kyilya awoṙe nechisoko.
40025030	Na mṟundi-cho alawoṙe kyiira, mmbiyitsenyi kuleshi meemenyi o nja. Nyi pfo-ndu kochiwaṙa wukyiwa na ilya ngakuru.’ ”
40025031	“Kyiyeri-kyo Mono-Adamu echicha mng'anonyi okye na malaika waele woose hamwi na oe, nyi lyo-ndu echiṙamia kyiṙinyi kya mng'ano okye.
40025032	Na masanga goose gechisanzia mbele yakye; na oe nechiwasawuo chandu mlyisi ekyesawuo moondo na mburu.
40025033	Nechiwika moondo kuwoko kokye ko kulyoe, na mburu kuwoko kokye ko kumoso.
40025034	Numa ya iho mangyi nechiwia walya wakyeri kuwoko kokye ko kulyoe, ‘Nnjonyi, nyoe muwawikyie mboṟa nyi Awu-yoko, oṟenyi Wumangyi muleṟeyeṟio wookyia itsano lya wuyana.
40025035	Cha kyipfa ngyiwewoṙo nyi njaa, mkongyienenga kyelya; ngyiwemwangari mukongyienenga mṟinga o nyo; ngyiwekyeri muyenu, mukongyiambilyia cha mndu onyu;
40025036	ngyiwemkuuye, mukongyienenga nguwo tseṟaa; ngyiweluoe, mukochengyiwia hai; ngyiwekyeri kyipfungonyi mukochengyisaia.’
40025037	Naaho-ng'u wasumganyi wechimgaluo, wechigamba, ‘Mndumii, nyi indi lulekuwona uwoṙo nyi njaa, lukokuenenga kyelya, ang'u umwangari lukokuenenga mṟinga o nyo?
40025038	Lyingyi-se nyi indi lulekuwona ukyeri muyenu, lukokuambilyia cha mndu oṙu, ang'u umkuuye, lukokuenenga nguwo tseṟaa?
40025039	Nyi indi-se lulekuwona uluoe, ang'u ukyeri kyipfungonyi, lukokusaia?’
40025040	Na Mangyi nechigaluo, echiwawia, ‘Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, chandu mulewutia umwi o wana wa wama-wo wako wai watutu, mulengyiwutia inyi.’
40025041	Numa ya iho nechiwia na walya wakyeri kuwoko kokye ko kumoso, ‘Wukyenyi koko, nyoe muwasese, muyende moṙonyi o mlungana, umṟeyeṟie Mokyiriinzi na malaika wakye.
40025042	Cha kyipfa nyiwewoṙo nyi njaa, mulangyienengye kyelya; ngyiwemwangari, mulangyienengye mṟinga o nyo;
40025043	ngyiwekyeri muyenu, mulangyiambilyie cha mndu onyu; ngyiwemkuuye, mulangyienengye nguwo tseṟaa; ngyiweluoe, na ngyiwekyeri kyipfungonyi, mulachengyisaia.’
40025044	Naaho-ng'u na iwo taa wechigaluo, wechigamba, ‘Mndumii, nyi indi lulekuwona iyoe uwoṙo nyi njaa, ang'u umwangari, ang'u ukyeri muyenu, ang'u umkuuye, ang'u uluoe, ang'u ukyeri kyipfungonyi, lulakupfuṟukanie?’
40025045	Na oe newagaluo, echigamba, ‘Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, chandu mulalewutia umwi o iwo wai watutu, mulengyiwutia inyi-pfo.’
40025046	Na iwo wechiyenda na iiṙa na ngaponyi ya mlungana; indi wasumganyi wechiyenda moonyi o mlungana.”
40026001	Na lyilya Yesu alemarisa ionguo shindo-sho shoose, nalewia wanalosho wakye,
40026002	“Muichi kye numa ya mfiri iwi kochiwa pasaka, na Mono-Adamu nechiṟiingo nakapio msalabenyi.”
40026003	Kyiyeri kyilya wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na wasongoru wa wandu, wakasanzia numbenyi ya Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose ekyelago Kayafa;
40026004	wakachila handu hamwi, kundu wawaṙe Yesu kui ngyeṟo na immbaaga.
40026005	Kyaindi wakagamba, “Kyilawe kyiyeri kya mfiri ung'anyi, kulacheamka kyituṟu wandunyi.”
40026006	Na Yesu kyiyeri awekyeri Betania numbenyi ko Simion awewoṙo nyi taambo,
40026007	mndu mka awewoṙe kyimkyepe kyiwoṙe mafuṙa mecha gekushia ga woguru wung'anyi naletikyira kufuhi na oe, kagaletsia mṙoenyi kokye kyiyeri aweṙamie echilya.
40026008	Wanalosho wakye kyiyeri walewona, wakasuo, wakagamba, “Iola-ola-lyi ilyi nyi lya kyikyi?
40026009	Kyipfa mafuṙa-ga gaweiṙima ikumbo ko heleri tsifoi wakyiwa waenengo.”
40026010	Yesu kamanya, kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi muilyisa mndu mka-chu wukyiwa? Kyipfa nyi iṟunda lyicha angyiṟundia inyi.
40026011	Cha kyipfa mfiri yoose muwoṙe wakyiwa hamwi na nyoe; kyaindi inyi mungyiwoṙe mfiri yoose-pfo.
40026012	Kyipfa kui ipusia mmbiu oko mafuṙa-go, nawuta aṙo ingyiṟeyeṟa ko iṟiko lyako.
40026013	Ny'kyaloi, ngammbienyi orio handu ndumi-i ngyicha yechiongoyo wuyanenyi koose, kyindo-kyo mndu mka-chu aṟunda na kyakye kyegambo kyipfa-kya imkumbuo.”
40026014	Kyiyeri-kyo umwi o walya ikumi na wawi, awekyelago Yuda Isikariote naleyenda ko wang'anyi wa makohanyi,
40026015	kagamba, “Ny'kyikyi mochingyienenga, ngamtarama muiṙime immbaṙa?” Wakamteṟia rupia makumi gaṟaaṟu.
40026016	Wookyia kyiyeri kyilya Yuda kapfula ṙaawa lyicha lyemṟiinga.
40026017	Na mfiri o kuwooka o mkate ilangyitarang'ishe, wanalosho walya waleyenda ko Yesu, wakammbia, “Nyi hanga ukundi lukuṟeyeṟie ulyiie ho Pasaka?”
40026018	Kagamba, “Yendenyi mṟinyi ko mndu mlyiwe, mundemmbia, ‘Mlosha nagamba, kyiyeri kyako kyikyisaangye kyikyeri kufuhi; kopfo ngyechiachikyia Pasaka hamwi na wanalosho wako.’ ”
40026019	Wanalosho wakawuta chandu Yesu alewawia, wakaṟeyeṟa Pasaka.
40026020	Kyasia kyiyeri kuleila naleṙamia ilya kyelya hamwi na walya ikumi na wawi.
40026021	Nawo kyiyeri waweilya, nalegamba, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, umwi onyu nechingyiṟiinga.”
40026022	Wanalosho wakye wakawoṙo nyi fowa mnu, wakawooka immbesa umwi, umwi, “Nyi inyi, Mndumii?”
40026023	Kagaluo, kagamba, “Icho awika kuwoko kokye hamwi na inyi kyitelenyi, nyi oe echingyiṟiinga.
40026024	Mono-Adamu naindepfa, chandu kyikyiṟeie; kyaindi ochia lokye mndu ulya echiṟiinga Mono-Adamu! Kyiwechiwa nanga mndu-cho alawefeo.”
40026025	Yuda, ulya momṟiinga, kagaluo, kagamba, “Nyi inyi, Mlosha?” Kammbia, “Iyoe nogamba.”
40026026	Nawo kyiyeri waweilya, Yesu naleira mkate, kauwikyia mboṟa, kaupeṟenguo, kaenengyia wanalosho wakye, kagamba, “Waṙilyienyi, mulye. Ichu nyicho mmbiu oko.”
40026027	Kaira kyiṙoo, kaana, kawaenengyia, echigamba, “Nyonyi moose kyilya kyikyeri kunu
40026028	cha kyipfa iyi nyi samu yako ya mma, ipusuka kyipfa kya wafoi ko iwuto wunyamaṟi.
40026029	Kyaindi ngammbia, ngyechinyo-se mpfinyo maa ale-pfo mṟasa kyiyeri ngyechiunyo na nyoe wuyanenyi wuhya wo Awu-yoko.”
40026030	Nawo kyiyeri walemarisa iimba, wakafuma na nja iyenda fumvunyi lya mashiṙi ga mseituni.
40026031	Naaho-ng'u Yesu kawawia, “Nyoe moose mochiwihiyo kyipfa kyako kyio-kyi; cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, ‘Ngyechiwaaga mlyisi, na moondo ga poo gechinyanyaṟika.’
40026032	Kyaindi numa ya iṟuka lyako, ngyechimusongoya iyenda Galyilaya.”
40026033	Petiro kagaluo, kammbia, “Wakawihiyo woose kyipfa kyapfo, inyi ngyechiwihiyo maa ale-pfo.”
40026034	Yesu kammbia, “Ny'kyaloi ngakuwia iyoe, kyio-kyi ilying'onyi lyilafuga, nongyikana kaṟaaṟu.”
40026035	Petiro kammbia, “Maa kokooya ngyechipfa na iyoe, ngyechikukana maa ale-pfo.” Na wanalosho woose wakagamba wuṙo.
40026036	Numa ya iho Yesu kayenda hamwi nawo mṟasa handu hekyelago Getisemane, kawia wanalosho wakye, “Ṙamienyi iha, mṟasa ngyiyende kulya ngyindeterewa.”
40026037	Kaṙuo Petiro na wana walya wawi wa Sebedayo, kawooka iiṟewe na iwona fowa mrimenyi.
40026038	Naaho-ng'u kawawia, “Mrima oko uwoṙo nyi iiṟewe lying'anyi mnu ngyeiṙima maa ipfa. Kaenyi iha, mulae kyiṙombo hamwi na inyi.”
40026039	Kayenda mbele kyitutu, kaoloka na ndewu, katerewa, echigamba, “Awu-yoko, kyikaiṙimika, ṙombo-lyi lya matuuro lyiiṙe kuleshi na inyi. Kyaindi chi chandu ngyikundi inyi-pfo, indi nyi chandu ukundi iyoe.”
40026040	Kacha na ko wanalosho walya, kawakooya walee, kawia Petiro, “Ngyesa moiṙima ilaa kyiṙombo na inyi maa saa imwi-pfoe?
40026041	Laenyi kyiṙombo, muterewe, mulacheiṙa na kyiyeshionyi. Mrima ukundi; kyaindi mmbiu uwoṙe pfinya-pfo.”
40026042	Kayenda-se lya kawi, katerewa, echigamba, “Awu-yoko kokooya kyilechiiṙimika ṙombo-lyi lya matuuro lyiiṙe kuleshi na inyi, kyilya ukundi kyiwe kuṙo.”
40026043	Kacha-se, kawakooya walee; kyipfa meso gawo gawewoṙo nyi maṙoe malemeri.
40026044	Kawaṙa-se, kayenda, katerewa lya kaṟaaṟu, echigamba maṙeṙo galya galya.
40026045	Numa ya iho kacha na ko wanalosho wakye, kawawia, “Laenyi wulalu, muonyonye. Saa yamtikyira kufuhi, na Mono-Adamu nechiwiko mawokonyi ga wanyamaṟi.
40026046	Amkyenyi, sindenyi! Ulya aingyiṟiinga amtikyira kufuhi.”
40026047	Kyasia kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa, Yuda, umwi o walya ikumi na wawi, kacha, aṙuṙanyi na ṟiima lying'anyi lya wandu wawoṙe ngyuushu na ṟungu, wawuka ko wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wasongoru wa wandu.
40026048	Na ulya momṟiinga nalekoamuwaenenga kyiṟingyishio, echigamba, “Icho ngyechimkomba, nyi oe; mmbaṙenyi.”
40026049	Cha ilyi kayenda ko Yesu, kagamba, “Ngakuiṟikyiṟa, Mlosha.” Kamkomba.
40026050	Yesu kammbia, “Mbuya yako, ṟunda ikyo kyakuende.” Wakayenda, wakagoṟuo mawoko gawo wakawaṙa Yesu.
40026051	Na umwi o walya wawekyeri hamwi na Yesu kagoṟuo kuwoko kokye, kawuta ushu lokye, kamanya isinga lya Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, kalyiṙumbuo kuṙwi.
40026052	Naaho-ng'u Yesu alemmbia, “Wiyiṟa ushu lopfo na halya-ndu luwekyeri; kyipfa woose wekyekapana kui ushu wechirumatso kui ushu.
40026053	Ang'u nokusaṟa kye inyi ngyechiiṙima iterewa Awu-yoko, na oe nangyiendie wulalu kuṙi ngyuulyimalyi tsa malaika tsifoi kuta ikumi na tsiwi-pfoe?
40026054	Kyasia kokooya Ruwa aṙika ngyuulyimalyi tsengyikapania shiṟeio shechiafutsio kuṙa kye isho nyisho shiwaṟi iwa?”
40026055	Saa iya Yesu kawia wuingyi wo wandu, “Ngyesa mofuma cha ilyi mundewaṙa msokyi, muwoṙe ngyuushu na ṟungu, ingyiwaṙa? Orio mfiri ngyileṙamia hekalunyi ngyechilosha, mulangyiwaṙe.
40026056	Kyaindi ishi shoose shawa, kundu shiṟeio sha weonguo shisuku shiwe chandu shigambie.” Naaho-ng'u wanalosho woose wakamṙa wakaṙicha.
40026057	Nawo wakawaṙa Yesu wakamṙuo ko Kayafa, Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, handu wawesanzie walosha wa mawawaso na wasongoru.
40026058	Na Petiro kamwosha ai kuleshi mṟasa numba ya Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, kaiṙa na numba, kaṙamia hamwi na waṟundi, nawone mafurumionyi.
40026059	Kyasia wang'anyi wa makohanyi na mengye yoose wakapfula wandu weṟingyishia Yesu shindo sha wongo, waiṙime immbaaga;
40026060	walawone, maa chandu waṟingyishi wa wongo wafoi walecha.
40026061	Kyaindi numa ya iho kukocha waṟingyishi wawi, wakagamba, “Ichu nalegamba, ‘Ngyeiṙima ifunja hekalu lya Ruwa, na ilyiwika-se numa ya mfiri iṟaṟu.’ ”
40026062	Kyasia Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose kammbia, “Ugaluo kyindo? Iwa nyi kyikyi waikuṟingyishia?”
40026063	Kyaindi Yesu katsia sau. Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose kammbia, “Ngakututuma ulye nyamu kui rina lya Ruwa ai na moo, uluwie kokooya iyoe nyi oe Kristo, Mono-Ruwa.”
40026064	Yesu kammbia, “Iyoe nogamba; kyaindi ngammbia, wookyia wulalu mochiwona Mono-Adamu aṙamie kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa echicha mapuchinyi ga ruwewu.”
40026065	Naaho-ng'u Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose karanduo mkoṟoṟi okye, echigamba, “Nalahia Ruwa. Lukundi-se wuṟingyishi wo ngoseṟa maa ale-pfo. Wulalu momuicho chandu alahia Ruwa.
40026066	Muwonyi kuṙa nyoe?” Wakagaluo, wakagamba, “Nawaṟi iwoogo.”
40026067	Naaho-ng'u wakampuchia maṙa ipfo kyaam, wakamkapa nzina; wengyi wakamkapa ngofi,
40026068	wechigamba, “Iyoe Kristo lutambuluye; nyi wui akukapa?”
40026069	Na Petiro naweṙamie nja ya numba iya. Kyisinga kyimwi kyikayenda kokye, kyikagamba, “Na iyoe nuwekyeri hamwi na Yesu o Galyilaya.”
40026070	Kakana mbele ya woose, echigamba, “Ngyiichi ikyo uigamba-pfo.”
40026071	Na oe kyiyeri alefuma na nja mṟasa kyichuminyi kyisinga kyingyi kyikammbona, kyikawia wandu wawekyeri pfo, “Ichu nawekyeri hamwi na Yesu o Nasareti.”
40026072	Kakana-se kui nyamu, “Ngyiichi mndu-chu-pfo.”
40026073	Halaiṙa kyiyeri kyileshi, walya walecha na halya wakayenda kokye, wakammbia, “Petiro, ny'kyaloi iyoe nyi umwi owo; kyipfa maa mṙeṙie opfo ukumanyisha.”
40026074	Naaho-ng'u Petiro kagamba, “Ngalya nyamu ngyigamba kya loi! Ruwa nangyikape kokooya ngyilaigamba kya loi! Ngyiichi mndu-chu-pfo!” Na cha ilyi ilying'onyi lyikafuga.
40026075	Petiro kakumbuo kyindo kyilya Yesu alegamba, “Ilying'onyi lyilafuga, nongyikana kaṟaaṟu.” Kafuma na nja katonyitsa mcheṟeṟe ya fowa.
40027001	Na kyiyeri kulekya, wang'anyi wa makohanyi woose na wasongoru wa wandu wakaṙamia kyama chandu weiṙima iwaaga Yesu.
40027002	Wakampfunga, wakammbuta halya, wakamṙambika ko Pilato awekyeri mchilyi o uruka lulya.
40027003	Numa ya iho Yuda, ulya momṟiinga, kyiyeri alewona kye amwanduyo kamanya wuwicho wo kyilya aleṟunda, kawiyiṟia wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wasongoru rupia tsilya makumi gaṟaaṟu, kagamba, “Ngyileṙeko kyiyeri ngyileṟiinga mndu alawoṙe ṙeko.”
40027004	Wakagamba, “Kyasia, soe luwoṙo pfo-pfo. Isho nyi shapfo kumonyi.”
40027005	Kawiyitsa rupia tsilya hekalunyi kafuma, kandekuwika kyigowo kapfa.
40027006	Wang'anyi wa makohanyi wakasania rupia tsilya, wakagamba, “Chi sungusinyi itsisanza na shienengo sha numbenyi ya Ruwa-pfo, cha kyipfa nyi wori wo ipusuo samu.”
40027007	Wakaṙamia kyiṙombo, wakaṙumbuo iguṟa ṙema lya mndu ekyeachikyia shinungu na heleri tsilya, hakawa handu heṟika wayenu wapfa.
40027008	Koikyo ṙema-lyo lyekyelago ṙema lya samu mṟasa inu.
40027009	Naaho-ng'u kyikaafukyia kyindo kyilya kyileṙeṙo nyi moonguo shisuku Yeremia, echigamba, “Walewuta rupia makumi gaṟaaṟu, kyindo wandu waata wa Isiraelyi waleiṙikyiana na oe imtaa;
40027010	wakaguṟa natso ṙema lya mndu ekyeachikyia shinungu chandu Mndumii alengyiwia.”
40027011	Na Yesu kagoṟoka mbele ya ulya awekyechilyia uruka lulya. Mchilyi-cho kammbesa, kagamba, “Iyoe nyi oe mangyi o Wayuda?” Yesu kammbia, “Iyoe nogamba.”
40027012	Kyaindi kyiyeri wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wasongoru walewia Yesu kye nammbicho alegaluo kyindo-pfo.
40027013	Naaho-ng'u Pilato kammbia, “Uichuo mawicho-ga goose waikusendia?”
40027014	Alamgaluo maa kyindo kyimwi mṟasa mchilyi ulya kaṟiyio mnu.
40027015	Kyasia kyiyeri kya mfiri ung'anyi o Pasaka, mchilyi ulya naweichiwie ipfunguo mpfungo umwi wandu wamkunda.
40027016	Kyasia kuwewoṙe mpfungo orio mndu awemwichi kyipfa kya wuwicho wokye, ekyelago Baraba.
40027017	Kyasia kyiyeri wandu walesanzia handu hamwi Pilato kawawia, “Mukundi ngyimpfunguye wui? Baraba ulya, ang'u Yesu ekyelago Kristo?”
40027018	Cha kyipfa nalemanya kye walemṙambika kokye kui wunyenyi.
40027019	Na kyiyeri Pilato aweṙamie kyiṙinyi kyakye echiṙumbuo moondu, mka okye nalemṙumia ndumo, immbia, “Ulawutie mndu-cho msumganyi kyindo kyoose; cha kyipfa kyio-kyi kyaamkyia inu ngyileloṙo kyakye ngawihiyo mnu.”
40027020	Na wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wasongoru wa wandu wakawanzia wuingyi wulya wo wandu wuwie Pilato napfunguo Baraba, na iwaaga Yesu.
40027021	Kyasia mchilyi ulya kagaluo, kawawia, “Mukundi ngyimpfunguye wui kyiiṙi kya iwa wawi?” Wakagamba, “Baraba.”
40027022	Pilato kawawia, “Kyasia, Yesu-chu ekyelago Kristo ngyimmbutie kyi?” Wakagamba woose, “Nakapio msalabenyi.”
40027023	Kagamba, “Ny'kyi? Wuwicho wokye nyi kyikyi?” Wakaengyeṟa mnu ikalagatsa, wechigamba, “Nakapio msalabenyi.”
40027024	Kyasia kyiyeri Pilato alewona kuwoṙe kyiira kyoose-pfo, indi kyituṟu kyikundi iamka, kaira mṟinga, kasamba mawoko gakye mbele ya wuingyi wulya wo wandu, kagamba, “Inyi ngyiwoṙe ṙeko samunyi ya mndu-chu msumganyi-pfo. Ilyi nyi iṟunda lyanyu nyoe.”
40027025	Wandu woose wakagaluo wakagamba, “Leka samu ya mndu-chu iwe wuye yaṙu na ko wana waṙu.”
40027026	Naaho-ng'u kawapfunguya Baraba; na ammarise igamba Yesu nakapo na ngowa, kamṙambika ko ngyuulyimalyi tsakye wandemkapia msalabenyi.
40027027	Naaho-ng'u asikari wa mchilyi o uruka lulya wakaṙuo Yesu mṟasa Praitorio ngyuulyimalyi tsingyi tsoose tsikakuumbia halya-ndu awekyeri.
40027028	Wakammbuta nguwo, wakamṟika ikunya lyifanyi kyimaande.
40027029	Wakaoka oṟo ya msha, wakamṟika mṙoenyi kokye, wakammbikyia upoi lo wuchilyi kuwokonyi kokye ko kulyoe; wakapfiria ndi mbele yakye, wakamkapa makuukuu, wechigamba, “Lokuiṟikyiṟa, Mangyi o Wayuda!”
40027030	Numa ya iho wakampuchia maṙa, wakaira upoi lulya, wakamkapa mṙoenyi.
40027031	Wammarise imkapa makuukuu, wakawuta ikunya lyilya, wakamṟika mkoṟoṟi okye, wakamṙuo imkapia msalabenyi.
40027032	Na lyilya waweiwuka kulya mṟinyi wakawona mndu o Kyirene, ekyelago Simion; ichu wakamwitika nakuṙikye msalaba okye.
40027033	Na kyiyeri waleshika handu hekyelago Golyigota, kyimwi na igamba, “Ipoṟong'u,”
40027034	wakamwenenga mpfinyo umsanze-sanze na mṟinga o nduu nanyo; kyaindi oe kyiyeri aleukomba na ulumi lokye alakunde inyo.
40027035	Wammarise imkapia msalabenyi, wakagawa mkoṟoṟi okye wechikapa kuṟu kuha; kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyilya kyileṙeṙo nyi moonguo shisuku, “Walegawiana nguwo tsako; na kyipfa kya ikunya lyako walekapa kuṟu kuha.”
40027036	Wakaṙamia wakamringa halya.
40027037	Wakawikyia wuye ya mṙoe okye kyindo kyeloṟa kyimaṙuma kyewoogo, kyindo kyikyiṟeie: “ICHU NYI YESU, MANGYI O WAYUDA.”
40027038	Kyiyeri kyilya kyilya wasokyi wawi wakakapio msalabenyi hamwi na oe, umwi kuwoko kokye ko kulyoe, na umwi kuwoko kokye ko kumoso.
40027039	Na wandu wawekuiṙia wakamlahia, wechisunza-sunza mṙoe yawo, na igamba,
40027040	“Iyoe ochiiṙima ifunja hekalu na ilyiwika-se numa ya mfiri iṟaṟu, kukyiṟe mrima opfo. Kokooya iyoe nyi mono-Ruwa, soka iho msalabenyi.”
40027041	Na wang'anyi wa makohanyi taa wakamkapa makuukuu hamwi na walosha wa mawawaso wechigamba, “Nalekyiṟa wengyi, aiiṙima ikukyiṟa amonyi-pfo.
40027042	Oe nyi mangyi o Isiraelyi; wulalu nasokye msalabenyi, na soe lochimwiṙikyia.
40027043	Nalekuwaṙa na Ruwa; namkyiṟe wulalu, kokooya namkundi; cha kyipfa nalegamba, ‘Inyi nyi Mono-Ruwa.’ ”
40027044	Na wasokyi walya walekapio msalabenyi hamwi na oe walemlahia wuṙo.
40027045	Kyasia wookyia saa tsiṟandaaṟu kulewaṙa meema wuye ya uruka loose mṟasa saa kyenda.
40027046	Na cha saa kyenda, Yesu kakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi echigamba, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakyitani?” Kyimwi na igamba, “Ruwa oko, Ruwa oko, ny'kyilyi ongyiṙa?”
40027047	Na kyiyeri wandu waata wawekyeri halya waleicho, walegamba, “Ichu nailaga Elyiya.”
40027048	Cha ilyi umwi owo kayenda eṙicha, kaira kyindo kyekyeongyia mṟinga, kakyiichuṟa mṟinga okyetarang'ia, kakyipfungyia upoinyi, kamrutsa.
40027049	Walya wengyi wakagamba, “Leka luwone kokooya Elyiya nechicha imkyiṟa.”
40027050	Na Yesu amkuilengye-se na ṟui lyakye ko pfinya, kalekyia moo.
40027051	Na isulyia lyeshingyia ipfo hekalunyi lyikaranduka kawi wookyia wuye mṟasa wanda. Uruka lukoṙeṙema; na maṟaṟa gang'anyi gakapaṟika.
40027052	Shilome shikaṟuguka; mmbiu ifoi ya waele wapfiie ikaamka.
40027053	Nawo wammbukye shilomenyi shawo, numa ya iṟuka lyakye, wakaiṙa na mṟinyi mweele, wandu wafoi wakawawona.
40027054	Kyasia mchilyi ulya, na iwo wawekyeri hamwi na oe wechiringa Yesu, kyiyeri walewona kyiriinza na chandu mbonyi tsilewa, wakaowuo mnu, wechigamba, “Ny'kyaloi ichu nawekyeri Mono-Ruwa.”
40027055	Hawewoṙe na waka wafoi halya wechiambuya wakyeri kuleshi. Iwo nyiwo waleosha Yesu iwuka Galyilaya, na imṟundia.
40027056	Kyiiṙi kyawo nawekyeri ho Maria Makyidalena, na Maria mama o Yakobo na Yosefu na mama o wana wa Sebedayo.
40027057	Na lyilya kuleila mndu mnjama o Arimataya ekyelago Yosefu kacha, na oe nawekyeri manalosho o Yesu.
40027058	Mndu-chu naleyenda ko Pilato, katerewa mmbiu o Yesu. Naaho-ng'u Pilato kagamba naenengo mmbiu-cho.
40027059	Yosefu kaira mmbiu ulya, kauaṟahia sandenyi ya uwiṟo,
40027060	kauwikyia kyilomenyi kyakye kyihya, awekyiachikyie igoenyi; kaiṟimitsia igoe lying'anyi mbele ya moongo o kyilome, kawuka ho.
40027061	Na halya wawekyeri ho Maria Makyidalena, na Maria ulya o kawi, waṙamie weambuyana na kyilome kyilya.
40027062	Na Mfiri o kawi, numa ya mfiri o ikuṟeyeṟa lya mfiri o onyonya, wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na Mafarisayo walekooyana na Pilato,
40027063	wakagamba, “Mndumii, lokumbuo kye ulya ekyeṙeṙa wongo nalegamba kyiyeri-kyo awei na moo, ‘Numa ya mfiri iṟaṟu nechiṟuka!’
40027064	Kyasia gamba kye kyilome-kyi kyiringo necha mṟasa mfiri o kaṟaaṟu; wanalosho wakye walachemwiwa, na iwia wandu, ‘Naṟuka ko wapfu; na wulembi wo mafurumionyi wukong'ana kuta wulya wo mawookyionyi.’ ”
40027065	Pilato kawawia, “Muwoṙe asikari; yendenyi munderinga necha kyilome chandu muichi.”
40027066	Wakayenda, wakaringa kyilome necha, kui iwikyia igoe lyilya kyiṟingyishio kyiwoṙe mfano owo, hamwi na asikari walya waringyi.
40028001	Na lyilya mfiri o onyonya uleiṙa, ochikya mfiri o kuwooka o juma Maria Makyidalena, na Maria ulya o kawi, waleyenda indeambuya kyilome kyilya.
40028002	Na hawewoṙe kyiriinza kying'anyi kya uruka; kyipfa malaika o Mndumii nalesoka iwuka ruwewu, kacha kaiṟimitsa igoe lyilya kalyiṙamilyia.
40028003	Na fana yakye iwekyeri cha mbawa, na mkoṟoṟi okye mwiilyi cha Kyipoo.
40028004	Na kui imwowuo, waringyi walya wakaṙeṙema, wakawa cha wapfu.
40028005	Malaika kagaluo, kawia waka walya, “Mulaowuoe, cha kyipfa ngyiichi kye muipfula Yesu alekapio msalabenyi.
40028006	Akyeri iha-pfo; kyipfa amṟuka, chandu alegamba. Nnjonyi, muambuye handu awemlaṟe.
40028007	Na nyoe yendenyi faṟa, mundewia wanalosho wakye, amṟuka ko wapfu. Naimusongoya iyenda Galyilaya. Nyi pfo-ndu mochimmbona. Aikyonyi-ng'u, ngamummbia.”
40028008	Wakafuma iwinyi iwuka kyilomenyi, kui wuowu na sia ing'anyi, wakayenda weṙicha iongoya wanalosho wakye mbonyi.
40028009	Na Yesu kakarisana nawo, echigamba, “Ngamuiṟikyiṟa!” Wakatikyira kufuhi wakammbaṙa maṙende, wakamwindia.
40028010	Numa ya iho Yesu kawawia, “Mulaowuoe. Yendenyi, mundewia wana wa wama wako wayende Galyilaya. Nyi pfo-ndu wechingyiwona.”
40028011	Na walya kyiyeri waweiyenda, asikari waata waleiṙa na mṟinyi, wakaongoya wang'anyi wa makohanyi mbonyi tsa shindo shoose shileṟundika.
40028012	Wakasanza hamwi na wasongoru, wakachila, wakaenenga asikari heleri tsifoi,
40028013	wechigamba, “Gambenyi kye wanalosho wakye walecha kyio, wakamwiwa, kyiyeri soe luwelee.
40028014	Na mbonyi-tsi tsikamanyika ko mchilyi o uruka-lu, soe loṙeṙa na oe, na echimmbutia kyindo kyiwicho-pfo.”
40028015	Kyasia wakaambilyia heleri tsilya, wakawuta chandu walelosho. Na mbonyi-tso tsikaṙunganana ko Wayuda mṟasa inu.
40028016	Na wanalosho walya ikumi na umwi wakayenda Galyilaya mṟasa fumvu lyilya Yesu alewawia.
40028017	Nawo kyiyeri walemmbona, walemwindia; kyaindi waata walewaṙa iiṙikyia lyaangu.
40028018	Yesu kacha na kowo, kaṙeṙa nawo, kawawia, “Ngyimṙambikye wuchilyi woose ruwewu na wuyanenyi.
40028019	Kyasia, yendenyi, mundegaluo masanga goose iwa wanalosho, mochiwapatisa kui rina lya Awu, na Mana, na Mumuyo Mweele;
40028020	na iwalosha iosha shoose ngyilemmbi nyoe. Na inyi ngyikyeri na nyoe mfiri yoose, mṟasa mafurumionyi ga wuyana.”
41001001	Iyi nyi Ndumi Ngyicha ya Yesu Kristo, Mono-Ruwa,
41001002	chandu ingyiṟeie nyi moonguo shisuku Yesaya, “Ambuya, ngyiṙuma mndu awoṙe ulogo loko, mbele ya ushangu lopfo, echiachikyia njia yapfo,
41001003	Ṟui lya mndu aipoṟogoṟia nuka, reyeṟenyi njia ya Mndumii, Goṟotsenyi kundu echiiṙia.”
41001004	Yohane nalewoneka, echipatisia kundu ko nuka, na ionguo mbonyi, kundu wandu waṙumbuye wunyamaṟi na ipatiso; na Ruwa nawahooṟie maṙeko.
41001005	Wandu wafoi mnu wa uruka lo Uyuda wakayenda kokye, na wandu wa Yerusalemu, wakapatiso mfonyi o Yoridan, wechitocha wunyamaṟi wowo.
41001006	Na Yohane naweṟee mapfukye ga ngamia na ukowa lo njonyi kyitsinyi kyakye, kalya nzie na wukyi wo nguṙunyi.
41001007	Kalosha echigamba, “Numa yako kuicha awoṙe pfinya kuta inyi. Icho inyi ngyiwaṟi iarama na ituruchuo ngowa tsa shiaṙu shakye-pfo.
41001008	Inyi ngyilempatisa nyoe kui mṟinga; indi oe nechimpatisa nyoe kui Mumuyo Mweele.”
41001009	Kyasia mfiri iya, Yesu nalecha awuka Nasareti ya Galyilaya, kapatiso nyi Yohane kulya Yoridan.
41001010	Na chailyi kyiyeri aleṙo awuka mṟingyenyi, kawona mapuchi geseia na Mumuyo, cha mbuna, echimsokyia.
41001011	Na ṟui lyikawuka ruwewu, lyikagamba, “Iyoe nyi oe Mono-ko, mkunde oko; ngyimchihiye kyipfa kyapfo.”
41001012	Cha ilyi Mumuyo kammbuta nayende kundu ko nuka.
41001013	Kakaa ipfo nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga mfiri makumi gaana, echiyesho nyi Satana. Na oe nawekyeri hamwi na mando ga saka, na malaika wawemṟundia.
41001014	Kyasia Yohane ammbiko kyipfungonyi, Yesu kayenda Galyilaya, echionguo Mbonyi Ngyicha tsa Ruwa,
41001015	echigamba, “Kyiyeri kyamshika, na Wumangyi wo Ruwa womtikyira kufuhi; ṙumbuyenyi wunyamaṟi na iiṙikyia Ndumi Ngyicha.”
41001016	Na oe kyiyeri aweiiṙa mbai ya ipalyipalyi lya Galyilaya, kawona Simion na Anderea, mono-wamae, wechiwiyitsa iṟambika ipalyipalyinyi; cha kyipfa wawekyeri wandu wekyeṙeia makunga.
41001017	Yesu kawawia, “Nnjonyi mungyioshe, na inyi ngyemugaluo wandu wekyeṙega wandu.”
41001018	Cha ilyi wakaṙa ngowa tsawo tseṙega makunga, wakamwosha.
41001019	Kayenda mbele kyitutu, kawona Yakobo o Sebedayo na Yohane, mono-wamae; nawo taa wawei ngalawenyi, wechiachikyia ngowa tsawo tseṙega makunga.
41001020	Cha ilyi kawalaga, wakaṙa awu-yawo Sebedayo ngalawenyi hamwi na wandu wa wori, wakayenda, wakamwosha.
41001021	Wakayenda mṟasa Kaperinaumu, na cha ilyi mfiri o onyonya kaiṙa na sinagoginyi, kalosha.
41001022	Wakaṟiyio mnu kyipfa kya malosho gakye; cha kyipfa naweiwalosha cha mndu awoṙe wuchilyi, maa chi cha walosha wa mawawaso-pfo.
41001023	Na cha ilyi hawewoṙe sinangoginyi lyawo mndu awoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho. Kakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi,
41001024	echigamba, “Luwoṙe kyi na iyoe, Yesu o Nasareti? Ngyesa nocha ilurumatsa?
41001025	Ngyikuichi iyoe nyi Mweele o Ruwa.” Yesu kamṙeṙia, echigamba, “Tsia sau, uwukye ko mndu-chu.”
41001026	Mṟufui ulya mmbicho kamṙeṙemsha cha mndu ekyeuma nguku, kafiiṟa na ṟui lying'anyi, kammbuka.
41001027	Wakaṟiyio woose, mṟasa wakawesana, wechigamba, “Ny'kyikyi ikyi? Nyi wuṟango wuhya! Kyipfa kui wuchilyi naiṙeṙia maa waṟufui wawicho, nawo wakamwindia!”
41001028	Cha ilyi mbonyi tsakye tsikaṙunganana orio handu ngyuurukyenyi tsoose tsa mṟasenyi o Galyilaya.
41001029	Na kyiyeri walewuka sinagoginyi, waleshika kanyi ko Simion na Anderea, hamwi na Yakobo na Yohane.
41001030	Na mamka o Simion, nawekyeri kyitaṟenyi, nawoṙo nyi isemu; na cha ilyi wakammbia mbonyi tsakye.
41001031	Katikyira kufuhi na oe, kammbaṙa kuwoko kokye kamwira, isemu lyikamleka, kawaṟundia.
41001032	Kyasia kyiyeri kuleila, na mnengyeṟi omwolokyie, wawemwendie woose walawekuiṙima, na wawoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho.
41001033	Na wandu wafoi mnu wa mṟi ulya wawekuumbie moongonyi.
41001034	Kakyiṟa wafoi wawewoṙe ndoṟe tsa orio mbaṟe, kawuta waṟufui wafoi wawicho, maa alelekyia waṟufui wawicho iṙeṙa-pfo, cha kyipfa wawemwichi.
41001035	Kyasia ngamenyi utuko, kafuma kayenda handu halawoṙe wandu, kandeterewa.
41001036	Simion na oṙoe wakamwosha.
41001037	Nawo kyiyeri walemmbona wakammbia, “Wandu woose waikupfula.”
41001038	Kawawia, “Sindenyi handu hengyi, mṟasa shikaṟo shikyeri kufuhi, na ipfo ngyiiṙime ionguo pfo mbonyi; kyipfa ikyo nyikyo kyilengyiende.”
41001039	Kayenda echionguo mbonyi masinagoginyi gawo, urukyenyi loose lo Galyilaya, na iwuta waṟufui wawicho.
41001040	Mndu awoṙo nyi taambo kacha na kokye, echimpfiria ndi, na imterewa, echigamba, “Kokunda noiṙima ingyulyisha na ingyiwuta ndoṟe-i.”
41001041	Na oe kawona fowa mrimenyi kyipfa kyakye, kalesha kuwoko kokye, kampaaya, kammbia, “Ngyikundi, ila.”
41001042	Na cha ilyi taambo lyakye lyikammbuka, kaila.
41001043	Kamwima na pfinya, kammbuta ho cha ilyi,
41001044	kammbia, “Ulawie mndu kyindo kyoose, indi yenda undekuloṟa ko mkohanyi, undeenengyia kyiṙaso chandu Mose alegamba kyipfa kya iila lyapfo, kyiwe wuṟingyishi kowo.”
41001045	Kyaindi kafuma, kuwooka iṙeṙa maṙeṙo gafoi, na igamba kyindo kyilya, mṟasa Yesu alaiṙime-se iiṙa na mṟinyi kulawoṙe ikuṟiika; indi nawekyeri nja handu halawoṙe wandu. Wandu wakayenda kokye wawuka ngyuura tsoose.
41002001	Kaiṙa-se na Kaperinaumu hamwiṙe mfiri ifoi, kyikamanyika kye nakyeri kanyi.
41002002	Halya kanyi hakasanzia wandu wafoi halatsugae maa ṙaawa moongonyi. Kawaongoya Ṙeṙo lyakye.
41002003	Kukocha wandu wechimwendie mndu apfiie ngapfu, aṙuṙo nyi wandu waana.
41002004	Na kyiyeri walelemo itikyira kufuhi na oe kyipfa kya wuingyi wo wandu, waletocha kai halya-ndu awekyeri; na wammarise iifunja walesotsa ikondoṟo mndu ulya apfiie ngapfu awelyilaaye.
41002005	Na Yesu, kyiyeri alewona iiṙikyia lyawo, kawia ulya apfiie ngapfu, “Mono-ko, omhooṟio ngyuunyamaṟi tsapfo.”
41002006	Na walosha waata wa mawawaso wawekyeri pfo, waṙamie, wechikusaṟa mrimenyi kowo,
41002007	“Ny'kyilyi ichu aigamba kuṙi? Nailahia Ruwa. Nyi wui echiiṙima ihooṟia wunyamaṟi sile umwi tupu, nyi oe Ruwa?”
41002008	Cha ilyi Yesu kamanya mrimenyi kokye kye waikusaṟa kuṙo mrimenyi kowo, kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi muikusaṟa kuṙi mrimenyi konyu?
41002009	Kyii kyaangu nyi kyiha, iwia apfiie ngapfu, ‘Nohooṟio ngyuunyamaṟi tsapfo’, ang'u igamba, ‘Amka ukuṙikye ikondoṟo lyapfo uyende?’
41002010	Kyaindi muiṙime imanya kye Mono-Adamu nawoṙe wuchilyi wuyanenyi wo ihooṟia wunyamaṟi.” Iho naiwia ulya apfiie ngapfu,
41002011	“Ngakuwia, amka, ukuiṙikye ikondoṟo lyapfo uyende kanyi kopfo.”
41002012	Cha ilyi kaamka, kakuṙika ikondoṟo lyakye, kawuka mbele yawo woose; mṟasa wakaṟiyio woose, wakang'anyisa Ruwa, wechigamba, “Mbaṟe-i iyi lulandeenengo iiwona maa ale-pfo.”
41002013	Kafuma-se kayenda mbai ya ipalyipalyi, wandu woose wa kyisanzionyi wakayenda kokye kawalosha.
41002014	Na kyiyeri aweiiṙa, kawona Lewi, mana o Alyifayo, aṙamie handu hesania ukamba mbai ya ipalyipalyi, kammbia, “Ngyiosha.” Kaamka kamwosha.
41002015	Na kyiyeri aweṙamie kanyi kokye echilya, wesania ukamba wafoi na wanyamaṟi waleṙamia hamwi na Yesu na wanalosho wakye; cha kyipfa wawei wafoi wechimwosha.
41002016	Na walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo kyiyeri walemmbona echilya hamwi na wesania ukamba na wanyamaṟi, walewia wanalosho wakye, “Ny'kyilyi ailya hamwi na wesania ukamba na wanyamaṟi?”
41002017	Kyiyeri Yesu aleicho nalewawia, “Walaluoe wekyepfula mganga-pfo, kyaindi walya walaikuiṙima. Ngyilecha ilaga wasumganyi-pfo, indi wanyamaṟi.”
41002018	Na wanalosho wa Yohane na Mafarisayo wawekyekuretekyia. Kyasia walecha, wakammbia, “Ny'kyilyi wanalosho wa Yohane na wanalosho wa Mafarisayo wekyekuretekyia, indi wanalosho wapfo wekyewuta kuṙo-pfo?”
41002019	Yesu kawawia, “Walage wolyinyi weiṙima kuṙa ikuretekyia kyiyeri monyi wolyi akyeri hamwi nawo? Kyiyeri kyoose monyi wolyi akyeri hamwi nawo wechiiṙima ikuretekyia-pfo.
41002020	Kyaindi kuicha mfiri monyi wolyi echiwuto kowo, nyi lyo-ndu wechiṙa ikuretekyia mfiri-cho.
41002021	Kuwoṙe mndu ekyewika kyiṙami kya nguwo ngyihya ikunyenyi lyiku-pfo; kawika kuṙo, kyilya kyihya kyawiko ho kyechinyamaṟa ikunya-lyo lyiku, na halya-ndu harandukyie hekyeengyeṟika.
41002022	Maa kuwoṙe mndu ekyewika mpfinyo shisagenyi shiku-pfo. Kokooya awika, mpfinyo ulya ochipaṟa shisaga-sho, mpfinyo ukopusuka, shisaga shilya shikanyamaṟika. Indi nekyewika mpfinyo shisagenyi shihya.”
41002023	Kyiyeri aweiiṙa maṙemenyi mfiri o onyonya wanalosho wakye wai kyaronyi walewooka iṙumbuo magaa ga nganu.
41002024	Mafarisayo wakammbia, “Ny'kyilyi waiwuta kyindo kyilai kya sungusinyi mfiri o onyonya?”
41002025	Kawawia, “Muichi chandu Dawidi aleṟunda, kyiyeri awemfooye, na iwoṙo nyi njaa, oe na oṙoe?
41002026	Chandu aleiṙa na numbenyi ya Ruwa, kacha kyiyeri kya Abiatari, Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, kalya mkate iya Ngyeele, ilawaṟi ilyio nyi mndu sile makohanyi, kaenenga na oṙoe?”
41002027	Kawawia, “Mfiri o onyonya ulewiko kyipfa kya mndu, chi mndu kyipfa kya mfiri o onyonya-pfo.
41002028	Kyasia Mono-Adamu nyi oe Mndumii o mfiri o onyonya taa.”
41003001	Kaiṙa-se na sinagoginyi; napfo kuwewoṙe mndu awoṙe kuwoko kupfiie ngapfu.
41003002	Wakamwowelyia kundu wawone kokooya nemkyiṟa mfiri o onyonya; waiṙime imṙuo mengyenyi.
41003003	Kawia ulya awoṙe kuwoko kupfiie ngapfu “Goṟoka makyiṙi-gawi.”
41003004	Kawawesa, “Nyi sungusinyi mfiri o onyonya iwuta shicha ang'u iwuta shiwicho? Ikyiṟa mrima ang'u iuwaaga?” Wakatsia.
41003005	Kawaitukuya ngyuura tsoose ko nyashi, echiwoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi kyipfa kya wuumu wo mrima yawo. Kawia mndu ulya, “Goṟuo kuwoko kopfo.” Na oe kagoṟuo kuwoko; kuwoko kokye kukowaṙa-se pfinya.
41003006	Cha ilyi Mafarisayo walya wakayenda, wakachila mbonyi tsakye hamwi na Maherodi, chandu wechimrumatsa.
41003007	Na Yesu kakaa kuleshi, oe na wanalosho wakye, kayenda ipalyipalyinyi. Wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wukomwosha, iwuka Galyilaya na Uyuda,
41003008	na Yerusalemu, na Idumaya, na molyolya o Yoridan, na ngyuura tsa Tiro na Sidon. Wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu kyiyeri waleicho mbonyi tsoose tsa shindo awekyeri iṟunda, wakayenda kokye.
41003009	Kawia wanalosho wakye kye kyingalawa kyitutu kyikae kufuhi na oe, kundu wuingyi wo wandu wulampeṟeetse.
41003010	Cha kyipfa nalekyiṟa wafoi, mṟasa woose wawewoṙe ngyuukyiwa wakamraia waiṙime impaaya.
41003011	Na waṟufui wawicho, orio kyiyeri walemmbona, waleoloka mbele yakye, wakafuga, wechigamba, “Iyoe nyi oe Mono-Ruwa.”
41003012	Kawaima mnu walamṟingyishie.
41003013	Kaṙooya fumvunyi, kalaga walya alekunda oe amonyi; wakayenda kokye.
41003014	Kawika wandu ikumi na wawi, waiṙime iwa hamwi na oe, na nawaṙume ionguo Mbonyi Ngyicha.
41003015	Ngoseṟa wawe na wuchilyi wo iwuta waṟufui wawicho.
41003016	Kawika walya ikumi na wawi. Simion kamlaga Petiro;
41003017	na Yakobo kamlaga mono-Sebedayo, na Yohane, mono-wama o Yakobo, kawalaga Bonerikye, kyimwi na igamba, wana wa ikuṟuṟuma.
41003018	Na Anderea, Filyipo, Baritolomayo, Matayo, Tomasi, Yakobo o Alyifayo, Tadayo, na Simion Mkananayo.
41003019	Na Yuda Isikariote, nyi oe alemṟiinga.
41003020	Numa ya iho kayenda kanyi. Wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wukosanza-se, mṟasa Yesu na wanalosho wakye walaiṙime maa ilya mkate.
41003021	Wandu wakye kyiyeri waleicho mbonyi wakafuma indemmbaṙa; kyipfa walegamba, “Nasuko.”
41003022	Na walosha wa mawawaso walesoka iwuka Yerusalemu wakagamba, “Nawoṙe Beelyisebulyi, na kui ang'anyi o waṟufui wawicho naiwuta waṟufui wawicho.”
41003023	Kawalaga, kawawia kui mfano, “Satana neiṙima kuṙa ifuna Satana?
41003024	Na wumangyi wukokuṟiinga wumonyi, wochiiṙima igoṟoka-pfo.
41003025	Na kanyi kukokuṟiinga kumonyi, kanyi-ko koiṙima igoṟoka-pfo.
41003026	Na kokooya Satana afuma kakapana na mrima okye amonyi, kakuṟiinga, eiṙima igoṟoka-pfo, indi neshika mafurumionyi.
41003027	Mndu echiiṙima iiṙa na numbenyi ya mndu awoṙe pfinya, na imsoka shindo shakye, sile apfunga kuwooka ulya awoṙe pfinya, naaho-ng'u echiṙuo ko pfinya numba yakye.
41003028	Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, wandu wechihooṟio ngyuunyamaṟi tsoose, na ilahia Ruwa lyawo lyoose;
41003029	indi mndu echilahia Mumuyo Mweele echihooṟio mṟasa mlungana-pfo; kyaindi nechiwaṙa ṙeko lyilechisia”;
41003030	kyipfa kya ilyi walegamba, “Nawoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho.”
41003031	Wamae na wana wa wamae wakacha; wakagoṟoka nja, wakaṙuma mndu imlaga.
41003032	Na wuingyi wo wandu waweṙamie, wechimwiṟiwia; wakammbia, “Ambuya, womoo na wana wa wama wapfo wai iho nja, waikupfula.”
41003033	Kawagaluo, echigamba, “Wama oko na wana wa wama wako nyi wakyi?”
41003034	Kaambuya walya waweṙamie wamwiṟiwie ngyuura tsoose, kagamba, “Ambuya wama oko na wana wa wama wako!
41003035	Cha kyipfa orio mndu echiṟunda shilya Ruwa akundi, icho nyi oe mono-wama oko, na mshikyi oko, na wama oko.”
41004001	Kawooka-se iloshia mbai ya ipalyipalyi. Wuingyi wung'anyi mnu wo wandu wukokuumbia kokye, mṟasa oe kaṙooya ngalawenyi, kakaa ipalyipalyinyi. Wuingyi woose wo wandu wuwei handu hagaṙutsu mbai ya ipalyipalyi.
41004002	Kawalosha shindo shifoi kui mfano. Kawawia maloshonyi gakye,
41004003	“Aṙanyienyi. Moolyia mbeu nalefuma indewaaya.
41004004	Na kyiyeri aweiwaaya, mbeu ingyi ileoloka mbai ya njia, shileye shikacha shikailya.
41004005	Ingyi ikaoloka handu hawoṙe iṟaṟa, halawoṙe teri ishikyie. Cha ilyi ikaṙo kyaindi kyipfa kya iwuṟa teri ishikyie,
41004006	kyiyeri mui ulewaa ukoikoṟa, na kyipfa ilawoṙe mri ikauma.
41004007	Ingyi ikaoloka handu hawoṙe msha; msha iya ikaṙo, ikaipfumba, ilakumbie ndunda.
41004008	Ingyi ikaoloka handu hawoṙe teri ngyicha, tsikakumbia ndunda, tsechiṙo na ing'ana, na ikumbia, imwi makumi gaṟaaṟu, imwi makumi gaṟandaaṟu, na imwi igana.”
41004009	Kagamba, “Awoṙe maṙwi geaṙanyia, naaṙanyie.”
41004010	Na oe kyiyeri awekyeri amonyi, wandu walya wawemwiṟiwie, na walya ikumi na wawi, walemmbesa mbonyi tsa mfano iya.
41004011	Kawawia, “Nyoe muwaenengye imanya kyiṟika kya Wumangyi wo Ruwa, indi ko walya wai nja ya Wumangyi-wo shoose shekyeṟundika kui mfano,
41004012	‘Kundu wakaambuya waambuye walawone; na wakaaṙanyia waicho, walamanye; walachengyiwiyilyia, na ihooṟio.’ ”
41004013	Kawawia, “Muichi mfano-chu? Kyasia mfano yoose moimanya kuṙa?
41004014	Moolyia mbeu-cho nekyewaaya Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
41004015	Iwa nyiwo wai mbai ya njia, Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyekyewooyo kowo. Nawo wakamuicho, cha ilyi Satana nekyecha, kawuta ho Ṙeṙo lyilya lya Ruwa lyileṙongo mrimenyi kowo.
41004016	Na wuṙo iwa nyiwo wekyeṙongo handu hawoṙe maṟaṟa. Nyiwo wakammaa iicho Ṙeṙo lyilya lya Ruwa, cha ilyi wekyelyiambilyia na sia.
41004017	Kyaindi wawoṙe mri makyiṙi-gawi gawo-pfo, indi lyekyekaa kowo kyiyeri kyifuhi. Numa ya iho kukocha wukyiwa na ipfulutso nyashi kyipfa kya Ṙeṙo lyilya lya Ruwa, cha ilyi wekyekapa tuulyia.
41004018	Na iwa nyiwo walya wekyeṙongo handu hawoṙe msha. Nyi wandu wekyeicho Ṙeṙo lyilya lya Ruwa,
41004019	kyaindi ikuwinisha lya kyiwuyana, na wulembi wo masaa, na lango tsa shindo shingyi tsikacha, shekyepfumba Ṙeṙo lyilya lya Ruwa lyilakumbie.
41004020	Na iwa nyiwo wawaṙongye handu hawoṙe teri ngyicha. Nyi wandu wekyeicho Ṙeṙo lyilya lya Ruwa na ilyiambilyia, na ikumbia ndunda, umwi makumi gaṟaaṟu, umwi makumi gaṟandaaṟu, na umwi igana.”
41004021	Kawawia, “Muwonyi kuṙa? Taa yekyekoṟo kundu iwikyio wanda ya kyitela, ang'u wanda ya kyitaṟa? Chi yekyewikyio handu hakuirie-pfoe?
41004022	Cha kyipfa kuwoṙe kyindo kyikuṟiikyie kyilechimanyika-pfo; maa kuwoṙe kyindo kyikyiṟikye, kyilechiwoneka na pata-pfo.
41004023	Mndu kawaṙa maṙwi geaṙanyia, naaṙanyie.”
41004024	Kawawia, “Aṙanyienyi kyindo-kyi. Kyindo kyilya muianduya nakyo oṙianyu ny'kyo Ruwa echimuanduya nakyo, kyaindi na wulang'a ngoseṟa.
41004025	Cha kyipfa awoṙe kyindo nechienengo, na oe alawoṙe kyindo kying'anyi, maa kyilya kyitutu awoṙe nechisoko.”
41004026	Kagamba, “Wumangyi wo Ruwa, mfano okye nyi cha mndu aleola mbeu wuye ya uruka.
41004027	Kawamolaa na iamka, kyio na kyingoto, na mbeu iya ikaṙo na ing'ana, alaichi oe.
41004028	Kyipfa uruka lokyeṙosa shindo lumonyi; kuwooka iṟa, kawi igaa lya nganu, numa nganu ikoṟie igaenyi.
41004029	Na ndunda tsikammba tsesambuo, cha ilyi nekyeira ishami, cha kyipfa kyilyimu kyamwafukyia.”
41004030	Kagamba, “Lulyingatsane Wumangyi wo Ruwa na kyikyi? Ang'u luuwikye mfanonyi uha?
41004031	Nyi cha ndunda ya haradalyi. Kyiyeri yekyeṙongo urukyenyi, maa chandu ikyeri ngyitutu kuta mbeu tsoose tsikyeri urukyenyi,
41004032	ikamṙongo yekyeng'ana, ikawa ing'anyi kuta mashiṙi goose gawoṙe maṟa gekyelyio nyi wandu, ikawaṙa mbaga tsing'anyi; mṟasa shileye sha ngyinenyi shikaiṙima ikaa wanda ya mrinje oyo.”
41004033	Kui mfano ifoi ya mbaṟe-i naweiwaongoya Ṙeṙo lyakye, iṙuana na chandu waleiṙima ilyiaṙanyia.
41004034	Maa aleṙeṙa nawo kulawoṙe mfano-pfo; kyaindi kaongoya wanalosho wakye amonyi mbonyi tsoose kui kyiṟika.
41004035	Mfiri ulya kyiyeri kya kyukonyi kawawia, “Luambaṙe mṟasa molyolya.”
41004036	Wakaṙa wuingyi wulya wo wandu, wakamṙuo wuṙo chandu awekyeri ngalawenyi. Na ngalawa tsingyi tsiwekyeri hamwi na oe.
41004037	Kukocha kyiwiṟi kying'anyi kya mkuma, mṟinga uiyenda na pfinya ukokapa ngalawa iya mṟasa ikawooka iichuo mṟinga.
41004038	Na oe amonyi nawekyeri ura lo numa lo ngalawa, alee wuye ya mto. Wakamwamtsa, wakammbia, “Mlosha, chi kyindo kopfo iluṙa lurumare-pfoe?”
41004039	Kaamka, kaṙeṙia mkuma, kawia ipalyipalyi, “Tsia, ulakupaaye!” Mkuma ukotsia, kukowaṙa itsia sau lying'anyi.
41004040	Kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi mowa waowu? Mulandewaṙe iiṙikyia-pfoe?”
41004041	Wakawoṙo nyi wuowu wung'anyi, wakawiana, “Nyi wui ichu-ng'u, maa mkuma na ipalyipalyi shimwindia?”
41005001	Wakashika molyolya o ipalyipalyi mṟasa uruka lo Wakyerasi.
41005002	Na amsokye ngalawenyi, cha ilyi nalekarisana na mndu, awewukyie handu heṟika wandu wapfiie, awoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho.
41005003	Kanyi kokye kuwei handu halya heṟika wandu wapfiie; maa kuwoṙe mndu oose aleiṙima impfunga-se maa kui mshe-pfo,
41005004	cha kyipfa nawekyepfungo kafoi ko pingu na mshe; kaṙumbuo-ṙumbuo mshe iya na ifunja-funja pingu tsilya; maa kuwoṙe mndu awewoṙe pfinya tsemmbinga-pfo.
41005005	Na mfiri yoose, kyio na kyingoto, nawekyeri kulya kundu koṟika wandu wapfiie na mafumvunyi, ekalagatsa na ikuwega-wega na magoe.
41005006	Na kyiyeri alewona Yesu ai kuleshi, nalekapa mteeṟa, kamwindia.
41005007	Kakalagatsa kui ṟui lying'anyi, kagamba, “Lekana na inyi, Yesu, Mono-Ruwa akyeri ruwewu. Kui rina lya Ruwa ulangyilyise wukyiwa.”
41005008	Cha kyipfa nalemmbia, “Iyoe mṟufui mmbicho, wuka mndu-chu.”
41005009	Kammbesa, “Rina lyapfo nyi wui?” Kamgaluo, kagamba, “Rina lyako nyi ‘Wandu Walang'a’, cha kyipfa lui wafoi.”
41005010	Kamterewa mnu alawaṙuo nja ya uruka lulya.
41005011	Na iho mafumvunyi hawewoṙe poo lying'anyi lya nguwe, tsechilyiso.
41005012	Waṟufui wawicho woose wakamterewa, wechigamba, “Luṙuo ko nguwe, luiṙime iiṙa na mmbiunyi yatso.”
41005013	Kawaenenga momu. Waṟufui walya wawicho wakafuma, wakaiṙa na mmbiunyi ya nguwe tsilya; na poo lyilya lyoose lyikaseṟemka kyiiṟimikonyi lyeṙicha, tsikaiṙa na ipalyipalyinyi, cha nguwe shiku shiwi; tsikapfiia ipalyipalyinyi.
41005014	Walyisi wa nguwe tsilya wakaṙicha, wakaonguo mbonyi-tso mṟinyi na kundu kulai mṟinyi. Wandu wakafuma wawone kyindo kyilewutika.
41005015	Wakayenda ko Yesu, wakawona ulya awewoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho, aṙamie, aṟee nguwo, alamsuko-se, na oe nyi oe awewoṙo nyi poo lyilya lya waṟufui wawicho; wakaowuo.
41005016	Na walya walekowawona walewaongoya mbonyi tsilewutikyia ulya awewoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho, na mbonyi tsa nguwe.
41005017	Wakawooka imterewa nawukye kulya kowo.
41005018	Na oe kyiyeri aweiṙooya ngalawenyi, ulya awewoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho nalemterewa nayende na oe.
41005019	Kyaindi alemlekyia-pfo, indi nalemmbia, “Yenda kanyi kopfo, ko wandu wa kopfo, ndewaongoye shindo shilya shing'anyi Mndumii alekuwutia, na chandu alekusaṟia.”
41005020	Kafuma kawooka ionguo mṟinyi ung'anyi uwoṙe shikaṟo ikumi okyelago Dekapolyi, shindo shilya shing'anyi Yesu alemmbutia; wandu woose wakaṟiyio.
41005021	Na kyiyeri Yesu amwambaṙe iwuya na molyolya akyeri kulya ngalawenyi, wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wukokuumbia kufuhi na oe; na oe nawekyeri mbai ya ipalyipalyi.
41005022	Kukocha mndu umwi kyiiṙi kya wang'anyi wa sinagogi, ekyelago Yairo; na kyiyeri alemmbona, kaoloka maṙendenyi gakye,
41005023	echimterewa mnu, echigamba, “Mono-ko mtutu o kyika naipfa. Ngyikuterewa uche, uwikyie kuwoko kopfo wuye yakye, naiṙime ikyia, na iwaṙa moo.”
41005024	Kayenda hamwi na oe. Wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wukomwosha, wechimpeṟeetsa-peṟeetsa.
41005025	Kuwewoṙe mndu mka umwi awoṙe ndoṟe yechoṟa kyiyeri kya maka ikumi na iwi,
41005026	maa chandu alelyiso wukyiwa kafoi echiṟundio nyi waganga wafoi. Shindo shoose awewoṙe shileenengyio shemṟundia, kyaindi shilamtarame maa ale, indi ndoṟe yakye ikaengyeṟa ing'ana.
41005027	Kyiyeri aleicho mbonyi tsa Yesu, naleiṙa wuingyinyi wulya wo wandu kakaa numa ya Yesu, kapaaya ikunya lyakye,
41005028	kyipfa nalegamba, “Ngapaaya maa mawale gakye tikyi, ngyechikyiṟo.”
41005029	Cha ilyi shoka ya samu yakye ikauma, na oe kamanya mmbiunyi okye kye amkyia wukyiwa wulya.
41005030	Cha ilyi Yesu, aichi mrimenyi kokye kye pfinya yammbuka, kaambuya numa kulya wuingyinyi wo wandu, kagamba, “Nyi wui angyipaaya mawale gako?”
41005031	Wanalosho wakye wakammbia, “Nuwewonyi chandu wuingyi wo wandu waikupeṟeetsa-peṟeetsa, na iyoe nuigamba, ‘Nyi wui angyipaaya?’ ”
41005032	Kaambuya ngyuura tsoose kundu nawone ulya aleṟunda kyindo-kyo.
41005033	Na mndu mka ulya kawoṙo nyi wuowu na iṙeṙema, aichi kyammbutikyia, kacha kamwolokyia, kamwongoya wuloi woose.
41005034	Kammbia, “Mono-ko o kyika, iiṙikyia lyapfo lyakukyiṟa, yenda na ufoṟo, ndoṟe-yo ilawe-se wukyiwa wopfo.”
41005035	Na kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa, kukocha wandu wawuka ko ulya ang'anyi o sinagogi, wechigamba, “Mono-pfo o kyika ampfa. Kuwoṙe kyiira kyiha iengyeṟa ituura mlosha?”
41005036	Kyaindi Yesu, kyiyeri aleicho mbonyi-tso, kawia ang'anyi ulya o sinagogi, “Ulaowuoe, waṙa iiṙikyia tupu.”
41005037	Maa alelekyia mndu ioshana na oe-pfo, sile Petiro, Yakobo, na Yohane, mono-wama o Yakobo.
41005038	Wakashika kanyi ko ang'anyi ulya o sinagogi, kawona kyituṟu, na wandu wechifiiṟa, wechikapa ṟanyi ing'anyi.
41005039	Amwiṙe na numba, kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi muwoṙe kyituṟu na ifiiṟa? Mana alandepfe-pfo, indi nalee tupu.”
41005040	Wakamsaaṟa mnu. Na oe amwafune na nja woose, kaṙuo awu o mana ulya na wamae, na walya wakyeri hamwi na oe, kaiṙa na halya-ndu mana ulya awekyeri.
41005041	Kawaṙa mana ulya kuwoko, kammbia, “Talyita, kumi”; kyitambuluo kyakye nyi “Mono-waka, ngakuwia, amka.”
41005042	Cha ilyi mana ulya kagoṟoka, kayenda, cha kyipfa nawewoṙe maka ikumi na iwi. Cha ilyi wakaṟiyio lying'anyi.
41005043	Kawatutuma mnu, mndu alamanye mbonyi tsilya, kagamba mana ulya naenengo kyelya.
41006001	Kawuka pfo, kayenda mṟasa uruka lo kowo; wanalosho wakye wakamwosha.
41006002	Kyiyeri mfiri o onyonya ulecha, nalewooka iloshia sinagoginyi. Wandu wafoi kyiyeri waleicho wakaṟiyio, wechigamba, “Ichu nyi kwi alewona ishi? Nyi wuṟango wuha amwenengye? Nyi kuṙa aiwuta shindo shing'anyi kuṙi sha maṟiyisho?
41006003	Ichu chi ulya ekyepacha mbau, mana o Maria, na mono-wama o wako-Yakobo, Yose, Yuda, na Simion-pfoe? Na washikyi wakye wakyeri iha koṙu-pfoe?” Koikyo wakammina.
41006004	Yesu kawawia, “Moonguo shisuku ekyewuṟa iindio, sile urukyenyi lokye amonyi-pfo, ko wandu wakye, na kanyi kokye.”
41006005	Maa aleiṙima iṟunda kyiṟiyisho kyoose ipfo-pfo, sile nalewikyia mawoko gakye wuye ya wandu waangu waluoe, kawakyiṟa.
41006006	Kaṟiyio kyipfa kya iiṙikyia lyawo lyaangu. Katenga-tenga kulya shikaṟonyi, echilosha.
41006007	Kalaga walya ikumi na wawi, kawooka iwaṙuma wawi wawi, kawaenenga pfinya yechilyia waṟufui wawicho.
41006008	Kawaima walaṙuo kyindo kyoose kyewatarama njienyi sile upoi tupu; maa mkate, maa mkunja, maa heleri tsa kyiseyesoe;
41006009	kyaindi waṟae shiaṙu. Kagamba, “Mulaṟae mawale gawi.”
41006010	Kawawia, “Handu hoose mochiiṙa na numba, kaenyi pfo mṟasa kyiyeri mochiwuka handu-ho.
41006011	Na handu hoose walandemuambilyie nyoe maa imuaṙanyia, kyiyeri mowuka ho, kute-kutenyi kyilulyi kyikyeri maṙendenyi ganyu, kundu wamanye wuwicho wo kyilya wawuta.”
41006012	Wakafuma, wakaonguo kye wandu waṙumbuye wunyamaṟi.
41006013	Wakafuna waṟufui wawicho wafoi; wakashia mafuṙa wandu wafoi waweluoe, wakawakyiṟa.
41006014	Na Mangyi Herode kaicho mbonyi, cha kyipfa rina lya Yesu lyiwesendo orio handu, kagamba, “Yohane Mpatisi naṟuka ko wapfu, koikyo pfinya-tsi tsiṟunda kyiiṙi kyakye.”
41006015	Wengyi walegamba, “Nyi Elyia.” Wengyi walegamba, “Ichu nyi moonguo shisuku, ang'u nyi cha umwi o weonguo shisuku.”
41006016	Kyaindi kyiyeri Herode aleicho nalegamba, “Yohane, ulya ngyilemṙumbuo mṙoe, naṟuka.”
41006017	Cha kyipfa Herode amonyi nalekoaṙuma wandu, kawaṙa Yohane, kammbika kyipfungonyi, kyipfa kya Herodia, mka o Filyipo, mono-wamae; cha kyipfa Herode nawemwalyikyie.
41006018	Cha kyipfa Yohane nalewia Herode, “Chi sungusinyi kopfo ialyika mka o mono-womoo-pfo.”
41006019	Na Herodia naweimwotia, kapfula immbaaga, alaiṙime.
41006020	Cha kyipfa Herode naleouwuo Yohane; amwichi kye nyi mndu o wusumganyi, mweele, kamringa. Na kyiyeri ammwaṙanyie nalewoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi mnu; na oe nawemwaṙanyia na sia.
41006021	Na lyilya ṙaawa lyicha lyilewoneka, na Herode, mfiri ung'anyi o iwoneka lyakye, kyiyeri aleachikyia wang'anyi wakye shelya, na wasongoru wa asikari wa shiṙa, na wandu wawoṙe kyiṟumi wa Galyilaya;
41006022	nyi lyo-ndu mono-kyika o Herodia aleiṙa na numba, katema, kachihiṟa Herode na walya waweilya handu hamwi na oe. Mangyi kawia mana ulya, “Ngyiterewa kyoose ukundi, ngyechikuenenga.”
41006023	Kammbia, “Kyoose ochingyiterewa ngyekuenenga, maa kokooya nyi igawana wumangyi woko.”
41006024	Kyasia kafuma kawesa wamae, “Ngyiterewe kyi?” Na wamae kagamba, “Mṙoe o Yohane Mpatisi.”
41006025	Cha ilyi kayenda faṟa ko mangyi, katerewa echigamba, “Ngyikundi ungyienengye wulalu kuṙi ipongonyi mṙoe o Yohane Mpatisi.”
41006026	Mangyi kawihiyo mnu mrimenyi, kyaindi kyipfa kya nyamu tsakye, na kyipfa kya walya waweilya na oe, alekunda imlegia-pfo.
41006027	Cha ilyi mangyi kaṙuma asikari, kagamba mṙoe okye uendo. Asikari ulya kayenda, kaṙumbuo Yohane mṙoe kulya kyipfungonyi,
41006028	Kaende mṙoe okye ipongonyi, kaenengyia mana ulya, na oe kaenengyia wamae.
41006029	Kyiyeri wanalosho wa Yohane waleicho mbonyi, waleyenda, wakaṙuo mmbiu okye, wakauṟika kyilomenyi.
41006030	Na wanalosho wakasanza mbele ya Yesu, wakamwongoya mbonyi tsa shindo shoose waleṟunda, na shindo shoose walelosha.
41006031	Kawawia, “Nnjonyi nyoe muwenyi, na handu halawoṙe wandu, mucheonyonya kyitutu.” Cha kyipfa hawewoṙe wandu wafoi, wechicha, wechiyenda, mṟasa ṙaawa lyelya lyikawuṟika.
41006032	Wakayenda handu hakuṟiikyie ngalawenyi, handu halawoṙe wandu.
41006033	Wandu wakawawona wechiyenda, na wafoi wakamanya, wakayenda pfo mteeṟa ko maṙende, iwuka mṟi yoose, wakawooka ishika.
41006034	Na oe kyiyeri alesoka ngalawenyi, kawona wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu, kawawonia wukyiwa; cha kyipfa wawekyeri cha moondo galawoṙe mlyisi; kawooka iwalosha shindo shifoi.
41006035	Na lyilya kyiyeri kying'anyi kya kyingoto kyileiṙa, wanalosho wakye waleyenda kokye, wakagamba, “Handu-ha nyi nuka mreesi, na wulalu kuila.
41006036	Sama wandu-wa, kundu wayende, maṙemenyi na shikaṟonyi sha kufuhi na iha, wandeguṟa kyelya.”
41006037	Kagaluo, kawawia, “Waenengyenyi kyelya.” Wakammbia, “Ngyesa, luende lundeguṟa mkate ya woguru wo dinari magana gawi kundu luwaenengye walye?”
41006038	Kawawia, “Muwoṙe mkate inga? Yendenyi mundeambuya.” Wammanye, wakagamba, “Itanu na makunga gawi.”
41006039	Kawawia wawaṟamiṟe woose, shiṙombo shiṙombo, handu hawoṙe maṟa mawishi.
41006040	Wakaṙamia nzengye nzengye, iha igana, iha makumi gataanu.
41006041	Kawaṙa mkate iya itanu na makunga galya gawi, kaambuya ruwewu, kaana, kapeṟenguo mkate iya, kaenengyia wanalosho wakye wawagawie; na makunga galya gawi kawagawia woose.
41006042	Wakalya woose wakaiguṙa.
41006043	Wakasania shipeṟengu sheiṙima iichuṟa mkunja ikumi na iwi; na shipeṟengu sha makunga taa.
41006044	Na walelya mkate iya nyi cha wasoṟo shiku shitaanu.
41006045	Cha ilyi kaitika wanalosho wakye waṙooye ngalawenyi, wasonguo iyenda molyolya mṟasa Betisaida, kyiyeri oe aweisama wuingyi wulya wo wandu.
41006046	Na amwasame kayenda fumvunyi indeterewa.
41006047	Na kyiyeri kuleila ngalawa iwekyeri makyiṙi-gawi ga ipalyipalyi, na oe nakyeri amonyi urukyenyi lugaṙutsu.
41006048	Kawawona wechilya wukyiwa kyipfa kya ikuruo makasia, cha kyipfa kyiwiṟi kyiwekyilang'a. Na lyilya kulewa (cha kamba lya kaana lyeringa kyio) naleyenda ko wanalosho echumia wuye ya ipalyipalyi; kawa cha ilyi nakundi iwaiṙa.
41006049	Nawo kyiyeri walemmbona echumia wuye ya ipalyipalyi, walekusaṟa kye nyi kyirinje, wakafuga.
41006050	Cha kyipfa woose walemmbona, wakawoṙo nyi wuowu, cha ilyi kaṙeṙa nawo, kawawia, “Kuwanzenyi nyi inyi, mulaowuoe.”
41006051	Kaṙooya kulya ngalawenyi kundu wakyeri; kyiwiṟi kyikatsia. Wakaṟiyio mnu mrimenyi kowo;
41006052	cha kyipfa walemanya mbonyi tsa mkate iya-pfo, kyaindi mrima yawo iwengyiumu.
41006053	Na wamuambaṙe, waleshika uruka lo Kyenesareti, wakatirimisha ngalawa.
41006054	Nawo wammbukye ngalawenyi, cha ilyi wandu walemmanya.
41006055	Wakakapa mteeṟa, wechitenga uruka lulya loose, wakawooka iṙuo wandu waluoe walee shitaṟenyi, iyenda orio handu waleicho kye nakyeri.
41006056	Na orio handu aleyenda, echiiṙa na shikaṟonyi, ang'u maṙemenyi, wakawikyia wandu waluoe sangaṙa, wakamterewa wapaaye maa ikyechu lya ikunya lyakye. Na woose walempaaya wakachia.
41007001	Numa ya iho Mafarisayo na walosha waata wa mawawaso wawewukyie Yerusalemu, wakakuumbia mbele yakye.
41007002	Wakawona wengyi kyiiṙi kya wanalosho wakye, wechilya shelya na mawoko galamasanje kyimṟumoe chandu Mafarisayo wawekyewuta.
41007003	Cha kyipfa Mafarisayo na Wayuda woose, walandesanje mawoko mṟasa ukokuo wekyelya-pfo, wechiindia shilya waleambilyia ko waku wawo.
