41007004	Lyingyi-se wakawuka sangaṙa walandesambe, wekyelya-pfo. Na kuwoṙe shido shingyi waleshiambilyia ko waku wawo wawekyeshiindia, cha isanja shiṙoo, na shinungu, na shindo cha piṟika.
41007005	Kyasia Mafarisayo na walosha walya wa mawawaso wakammbesa, “Ny'kyilyi wanalosho wapfo walekyeindia shilya luleambilyia ko waku waṙu, indi wekyelya na mawoko gafanyi?”
41007006	Kawawia, “Yesaya nalesonguo ionguo necha mbonyi tsanyu nyoe wakulembecheṟi, chandu kyikyiṟeie, ‘Wandu-wa wekyengyiindia kui maṙumbu indi mrima yawo ikyeri kuleshi na inyi;
41007007	Nawo wekyengyiana na ingyiterewa wulya, wechilosha malosho gakyeri mawawaso ga wandu.’ ”
41007008	Nyoe mokyemina iwawaso lya Ruwa, na iwaṙa shilya wandu waambilyie ko waku wawo.
41007009	Kawawia, “Necha! Muilega iwawaso lya Ruwa muiṙime iindia shindo muleambilyia ko waku wanyu.
41007010	Kyipfa Mose nalegamba, ‘India awuyo na womoo’, na, ‘Alahia awuye ang'u wamae ipfa na napfe.’
41007011	Kyaindi nyoe mokyegamba, ‘Mndu kawia awuye ang'u wamae, kyindo ngyikundi ikuenenga uwone ho kyiira nyi Koriban’, kyimwi na igamba, kyindo kyikyiwikyie mboṟa ko maṟunda ga Ruwa, kyekyewa kuṙo.
41007012	Maa numa ya iho mokyeenenga mndu-cho momu iṟundia awuye ang'u wamae kyindo-pfo;
41007013	kunu mochilega kyilya Ruwa agambie kui shindo nyoe cha Wayuda muleambilyia ko waku wanyu na iwia wana wanyu ishiṟunda.Lyingyi-se mokyeṟunda shindo shifoi shilyingananyi na isho.”
41007014	Kalaga-se wuingyi wo wandu, kawawia, “Ngyiaṙanyienyi moose na imanya.
41007015	Kuwoṙe kyindo kyikyeri nja ya mndu kyekyeiṙa na kokye kyikaiṙima imfanyiṟa kyimṟumoe-pfo. Indi shilya shekyewuka kokye, nyisho shekyefanyiṟa mndu ulya. [
41007016	Mndu kawaṙa maṙwi geaṙanyia, na naaṙanyie.]”
41007017	Na lyilya aleiṙa na kanyi, nalekana na wuingyi wo wandu, wanalosho wakye wakammbesa mbonyi tsa mfano ulya.
41007018	Kawawia, “Maa nyoe muwoṙe wuṟango-pfoe? Muichi kye orio kyindo kyikyeri nja ya mndu, kyikaiṙa na kokye, kyeiṙima imfanyiṟa-pfo;
41007019	cha kyipfa kyekyeiṙa na mrimenyi kokye-pfo, indi ndewunyi tikyi; numa ya iho kyekyefuma iyenda choṟonyi?” Kui igamba kuṙo naleloṟa kye kuwoṙe kyelya kyiwicho-pfo.
41007020	Kagamba, “Kyekyewuka ko mndu nyikyo kyekyemfanyiṟa kyimṟumoe.
41007021	Cha kyipfa mrimenyi ko wandu kokyewuka makusaṟo mawicho, wuṟui,
41007022	wuiwi, uwaagi, lango ngyiwicho, wulang'a, ngyeṟo, ukoe, wunyeng'i, shilahio, ikuṙosa na wutondo.
41007023	Ishi shoose shekyewuka ko mndu, nasho shekyefanyiṟa mndu kyimṟumoe.”
41007024	Kawuka pfo, kayenda mṟasa uruka lo Tiro na Sidon. Kaiṙa na numba, alakunde kyimanyikye; kyaindi aleiṙima ikuṟiika-pfo.
41007025	Cha ilyi mndu mka, mono-kye awoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho, naleicho mbonyi tsakye, kacha kamwolokyia maṙendenyi gakye.
41007026	Na mndu mka ulya nyi Mkyiṟikyi, amfee ko Wasirofoinikye. Kamterewa nawute mana ulya okye o kyika mṟufui mmbicho.
41007027	Kammbia, “Leka wana waiguṙe kuwooka; kyipfa chi necha iwuta kyelya kya wana na iwiyitsia shite-pfo.”
41007028	Na oe kagaluo, kammbia, “Yee, Mndumii, kyaindi maa shite shikyeri wanda ya mesa shekyelya matsugaṟo ga wana.”
41007029	Kammbia, “Kyipfa kya ṙeṙo-lyo, yenda; mṟufui mmbicho ammbuka ko mono-opfo.”
41007030	Kayenda kanyi kokye, kakooya mana ulya amlaṟe kyitaṟenyi, na mṟufui ulya mmbicho amwummbuka.
41007031	Kawuka-se urukyenyi lo Tiro, kaiṙa makyiṙi-gawi ga Sidon, kayenda mṟasa ipalyipalyi lya Galyilaya, mṟasenyi na uruka luwoṙe mṟi ung'anyi uwoṙe shikaṟo ikumi okyelago Dekapolyi.
41007032	Wakamwendie mndu mpfu maṙwi, alawekyeiṙima iṙeṙa, wakamterewa namwekyie mawoko.
41007033	Kammbikyia kuleshi na wuingyi wo wandu handu hakuṟiikyie. Kawika shimnyoe shakye maṙwinyi gakye, kapucha maṙa, kampaaya ulumi.
41007034	Kaambuya wuye ruwewu, katerewa Ruwa kui isumkyia lying'anyi, kammbia, “Efata”, kyimwi na igamba, “Tambuluka.”
41007035	Cha ilyi maṙwi gakye gakaṟusuka, ulumi lokye lukoṟengyeṟa, kaṙeṙa necha.
41007036	Kawaima walaongoye mndu; kyaindi chandu aleengyeṟa iwaima, nyi wuṙo waleengyeṟa ionguo mbonyi.
41007037	Wakaṟiyio mnu, wechigamba, “Naṟunda shindo shoose necha. Wapfu maṙwi naiwaenenga iicho, na wai ndiṟi iṙeṙe.”
41008001	Mfiri iya, chandu wuingyi wulya wo wandu wuweng'anyi-se nawo wauṟa kyindo kyelya, kalaga wanalosho wakye, kawawia,
41008002	“Ngawonia wuingyi-wu wo wandu wukyiwa cha kyipfa nyi mfiri iṟaṟu wakyeri na inyi, maa wawoṙe kyindo kyelya-pfo;
41008003	na inyi ngawasama wayende kanyi kowo na kunu wakuretekyie, wechioloka njienyi; na waata wawukyie kuleshi.”
41008004	Wanalosho wakye wakamgaluo, “Ngyesa mndu neiṙima kuṙa iigutsa iwa kui mkate iha nuka?”
41008005	Kawawesa, “Muwoṙe mkate inga?” Wakagamba, “Mfungaaṙe.”
41008006	Kagamba wuingyi wo wandu waṙamie wanda. Kaira mkate iya mfungaaṙe, kaana, kaipeṟenguo, kaenengyia wanalosho wakye wawagawie; wakagawia wuingyi wulya wo wandu.
41008007	Wawewoṙe shipere shaangu; kashiwikyia mboṟa, kagamba wagawio na isho taa.
41008008	Wakalya, wakaiguṙa, wakasania matsugaṟo ga shipeṟengu sha mkate, mkunja mfungaaṙe ikaichuo.
41008009	Na wandu walelya waweshikyie shiku shiina. Kawasama.
41008010	Cha ilyi kaṙooya ngalawenyi hamwi na wanalosho wakye, kayenda mṟasa ura lo Dalyimanuta.
41008011	Mafarisayo wakacha, wakawooka igaluana na oe; wechipfula kokye kyiṟingyishio kyiwukyie ruwewu; wechimyesha.
41008012	Kawona fowa mrimenyi kokye, kagamba, “Ny'kyilyi rika-lyi lyipfula kyiṟingyishio? Ny'kyaloi, ngammbienyi, rika-lyi lyechienengo kyiṟingyishio kyiwukyie ruwewu-pfo.”
41008013	Kalekana nawo, kaṙooya-se ngalawenyi, kayenda mṟasa molyolya.
41008014	Wakawaṙima iṙuo mkate, maa ngalawenyi wawewoṙe kyindo sile mkate umwi tupu-pfo.
41008015	Kawaikyimbia, kagamba, “Kushowenyi na chachu ya Mafarisayo na chachu ya Herode.”
41008016	Wakagaluana wo wenyi ko wenyi, cha kyipfa walawewoṙe mkate.
41008017	Na Yesu kamanya, kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi muigaluana kyipfa mulawoṙe mkate? Maa mulandemanye-pfoe? Ngyesa mrima yanyu nyi ingyiumu?
41008018	Muwoṙe meso, muwonyi-pfo. Muwoṙe maṙwi, muichuoe-pfoe? Maa mukumburie-pfoe?
41008019	Kyiyeri ngyilepeṟenguo mkate iya itanu na ienengyia walya shiku shitaanu, muleira mkunja inga iichuo shipeṟengu?” Wakammbia, “Ikumi na iwi.”
41008020	“Na iya mfungaaṙe ienengyia walya shiku shiina, muleira mkunja inga iichuo shipeṟengu?” Wakammbia, “Mfungaaṙe.”
41008021	Kawawia, “Mulandemanye-pfoe?”
41008022	Wakashika Betisaida, wakamwendie kyipfupfuṟe wakamterewa nakyipaaye.
41008023	Kawaṙa kyipfupfuṟe kyilya kuwoko, kakyiṙuo nja ya kyikaṟo, kakyipuchia maṙa mesonyi, kakyiyekyia mawoko, kakyiwesa, “Nuwonyi kyindo?”
41008024	Kyikaambuya wuye, kyikagamba, “Ngyiwonyi wandu cha mashiṙi, gaiyenda.”
41008025	Naaho-ng'u kawika-se mawoko gakye wuye ya meso gakyo, nakyo kyikaambuya mnu; kyikachia, kyikawona shoose na pata.
41008026	Kakyiwia kyiyende kanyi, echigamba, “Maa kyikaṟonyi ulaiṙe napfo.”
41008027	Yesu kafuma na wanalosho wakye, wakayenda shikaṟonyi sha Kaisaria-Filyipi na njienyi kawesa wanalosho wakye, kagamba, “Wandu wekyegamba kye inyi nyi wui?”
41008028	Wakamgaluo, “Yohane Mpatisi; wengyi Elyia; wengyi, umwi o waikyimbi.”
41008029	Na oe kawawesa, “Na nyoe muigamba kye inyi nyi wui?” Petiro kamgaluo, kammbia, “Iyoe nyi oe Kristo.”
41008030	Kawatutuma walawie mndu mbonyi tsakye.
41008031	Kawooka iwalosha kye Mono-Mndu nawaṟi iwona matuuro gafoi, na ilego nyi wasongoru, na wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na walosha wa mawawaso, na iwoogo, na numa ya mfiri iṟaṟu iṟuka.
41008032	Na oe naweionguo mbonyi-tso na pata. Petiro kamṙuo, kawooka imṙeria.
41008033	Kagaluka, kaambuya wanalosho wakye, kaṙeṙia Petiro, kagamba, “Wuka koko, Satana; kyipfa uikusaṟa shii sha Ruwa-pfo, indi sha wandu.”
41008034	Kalaga wuingyi wo wandu hamwi na wanalosho wakye, kawawia, “Mndu oose akundi ingyiosha nakulege amonyi, nakuṙikye msalaba okye, nangyioshe.
41008035	Cha kyipfa mndu akundi ikyiṟa moo okye, nechiuṙetsa, na mndu echiṙetsa moo okye kyipfa kyako na kyipfa kya Ndumi Ngyicha, ichu nechiukyiṟa.
41008036	Cha kyipfa mndu nechiiria ho kyi iwona wuyana woose, echiṙetsa mrima okye?
41008037	Ang'u mndu naenengyie kyi handu ha moo okye?
41008038	Kyipfa orio mndu echirigo nyi sonu kyipfa kyako, na malosho gako, kyiiṙi kya rika-lyi lya wuṟui na wunyamaṟi, Mono-Adamu nechirigo nyi sonu kyipfa kya mndu-cho, kyiyeri echicha mng'anonyi o Awu okye hamwi na malaika waele.”
41009001	Kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, kuwoṙe wandu kyiiṙi kya iwa wagoṟokyi iha, wechiwaṙa moo, mṟasa kyiyeri wechiwona Ruwa echichilyia.”
41009002	Na lyilya mfiri iṟandaaṟu ileiṙa Yesu kaṙuo Petiro, na Yakobo, na Yohane, kawaṙuo wuye ya fumvu lyileshi handu hakuṟiikyie, wo wawenyi; kailachika fana mbele yawo.
41009003	Mawale gakye gechikyema-kyema, gameelyi mnu, kulawoṙe mndu wuyanenyi koose eiṙima igasanja gaile kuṙo.
41009004	Elyia hamwi na Mose wakacha na handu halya, nawo waweiṙeṙa na Yesu.
41009005	Petiro kawia Yesu, “Mlosha, nyi kyicha soe ikaa iha. Luwikye matengo gaṟaaṟu, lyimwi lyapfo iyoe, lyimwi lya Mose, na lyimwi lya Elyia.”
41009006	Petiro alemanya kyeṙeṙa-pfo, cha kyipfa walewoṙo nyi wuowu wung'anyi.
41009007	Numa ya iho hakawoneka ipuchi, lyikawaendie kyirinje. Ṟui lyikawuka kulya ipuchinyi, “Ichu nyi Mono-ko, mkunde oko, mwaṙanyienyi oe.”
41009008	Cha ilyi kyiyeri waleambuya kunu na kunu, walawone mndu akyeri nawo sile Yesu amonyi tupu.
41009009	Na lyilya waweisoka fumvunyi nalewaima walaongoye mndu shilya walewona, mṟasa kyiyeri Mono-Mndu echiṟuka ko wapfu.
41009010	Wakawuta kyilya walewio, wechiwesana wo wenyi ko wenyi, “Iṟuka-lyo ko wapfu lyagamba kyi?”
41009011	Wakammbesa, wechigamba, “Ny'kyilyi walosha wa mawawaso wekyegamba kye kyiwaṟi Elyia icha kuwooka?”
41009012	Kagaluo kawawia, “Nyi loi Elyia naicha kuwooka, na iwiyiṟia wuhya shindo shoose, kyaindi, hamwi na isho, kyikyiṟeie kuṙa kye Mono-Mndu nechiwona matuuro gafoi na imino?
41009013	Kyaindi ngammbia, Elyia amcha, nawo wakammbutia shoose walekunda chandu kyiwekyiṟeie.”
41009014	Na lyilya walekooyana na wanalosho, walewona wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wuwaiṟiwie na walosha wa mawawaso wechigaluana nawo.
41009015	Cha ilyi kyiyeri wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu walemmbona waleṟiyio, wakakapa mteeṟa, wakamwiṟikyiṟa.
41009016	Kawawesa, “Ny'kyikyi muigaluana nawo?”
41009017	Mndu umwi wuingyinyi wulya wo wandu kagaluo kagamba, “Mlosha, ngaende mono-ko na kopfo, nawoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho ekyemwima iṙeṙa.
41009018	Na orio kyiyeri ammbaṙa, nekyemwolotsa wanda, na oe nekyeṙosa mawia na ilya ngakuru na imwumiṟa ng'ashu. Ngaṙeṙa na wanalosho wapfo wammbute mṟufui-cho mmbicho walaiṙime.”
41009019	Kawagaluo, kagamba, “Nyoe rika lyiwoṙe iiṙikyia lyifofo, ngyikae na nyoe mṟasa indi? Ngyiṙuane na nyoe mṟasa indi? Muendenyi na koko.”
41009020	Wakamwende na kokye. Na lyilya alemmbona, cha ilyi mṟufui ulya nalemṙeṙemsha, na oe kaoloka wanda, kakuoṟoosa-oṟoosa, echiṙosa mawia.
41009021	Kawesa awuye, “Ishi shimmbookyie indi?” Kagamba, “Wookyia wututunyi.
41009022	Na kafoi nekyemmbiyitsa moṙonyi, na mṟingyenyi, namrumatse. Kyaindi koiṙima, luwonie wukyiwa, na ilutarama.”
41009023	Yesu kammbia, “Koiṙima! Shoose shekyeiṙimika ko ulya aiṙikyie.”
41009024	Cha ilyi awu o manakye ulya kakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi, kagamba, “Ngaiṙikyia, ngyitarama kundu ngyiiṙikyie.”
41009025	Na Yesu awonyi kye wuingyi wo wandu wuisanza iwinyi, kaṙeṙia mṟufui ulya mmbicho, kammbia, “Iyoe mṟufui mmbicho moima iṙeṙa na iaṙanyia, inyi ngakuwia, wuka ko ichu, maa ulaiṙe-se na kokye.”
41009026	Kafuga, kamṙeṙemsha mnu, kammbuka; na oe kawa cha ilyi apfiie; mṟasa wafoi wakagamba, “Napfa.”
41009027	Kyaindi Yesu kammbaṙa kuwoko kamwira; na oe kagoṟoka.
41009028	Na lyilya aleiṙa na kanyi, wanalosho wakye wakammbesa kui kyiṟika, “Kyitewe soe lulaleiṙima immbuta ny'kyi?”
41009029	Kawawia, “Mbaṟe-i yeiṙima iwuka kui ṙeṙo lyoose, sile kui iterewa-pfo.”
41009030	Wakawuka pfo, wakaiṙa makyiṙi-gawi ga Galyilaya; na oe alekunda mndu namanye-pfo.
41009031	Cha kyipfa naweilosha wanalosho wakye, kawawia, “Mono-Mndu naindewiko mawokonyi ga wandu, nawo wechimmbaaga; na kammboogo, numa ya mfiri iṟaṟu nechiṟuka.”
41009032	Kyaindi walemanya ṙeṙo lyilya-pfo, wakaowuo immbesa.
41009033	Wakashika Kaperinaumu; na lyilya awekyeri kanyi, kawawesa, “Ny'kyikyi muweiṙeṙa njienyi?”
41009034	Wakatsia; cha kyipfa njienyi waweigaluana wo wenyi ko wenyi, nyi wui akyeri ang'anyi.
41009035	Kaṙamia wanda, kalaga walya ikumi na wawi, kawawia, “Mndu akundi iwa o kuwooka nechiwa o mafurumionyi kuta woose, na mṟundi o woose.”
41009036	Kaira kyikoku, kakyiwikyia makyiṙi-gawi gawo, kakyichunguṟia, kawawia,
41009037	“Mndu kaambilyia mana umwi o mbaṟe-i kui rina lyako, nangyiambilyia inyi; na mndu kangyiambilyia inyi, naambilyia, chi inyi-pfo, indi ulya alengyiṙuma.”
41009038	Yohane kamgaluo, kammbia, “Mlosha, lulewona mndu echiwuta waṟufui wawicho kui rina lyapfo, alekyeoshana na soe; lukomwima, cha kyipfa ekyeoshana na soe-pfo.”
41009039	Yesu kagamba, “Mulamwime-pfo, cha kyipfa kuwoṙe mndu echiwuta kyindo kya kyiṟiyisho kui rina lyako kaweiṙima na iṙeṙa kyiwicho kyako-pfo.
41009040	Cha kyipfa ai ura loṙu, nyi oṙu.
41009041	Orio mndu echimrutsa nyoe kyiṙoo kya mṟinga, cha kyipfa nyoe nyi wandu wa Kristo, ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, easha wori wokye-pfo.”
41009042	“Na mndu echitewe umwi o iwa watutu wangyiiṙikyie, nanga apfungyio ikyesa nzingonyi kokye, na iwiyitso ipalyipalyinyi.
41009043	Na kuwoko kopfo kukokutewe, ṙumbuo kuwoko-ko. Nyi nanga iiṙa na moonyi o mlungana uwoṙe kuwoko kumwi, kuta iwaṙa mawoko gawi na iyenda ngyehenenyi, kundu kuwoṙe moṙo ulekyeruma; [
41009044	kulya-ndu mashinu gekyelya mawoko-ga galekyepfa, maa moṙo ulekyeruma.]
41009045	Na kuṙende kopfo kukokutewe, ṙumbuo kuṙende-ko. Nyi nanga iiṙa na moonyi o mlungana, ui kyiwete, kuta iwaṙa maṙende gawi na iwiyitso ngyehenenyi; [
41009046	kulya-ndu mashinu gekyelya maṙende-ga galekyepfa, maa moṙo ulekyeruma.]
41009047	Na riso lyapfo lyikakutewe, lyikuluoe, ulyiwiyitse. Nyi nanga iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa, uwoṙe riso lyimwi, kuta iwaṙa meso gawi, na iwiyitso ngyehenenyi
41009048	kulya-ndu mashinu gekyelya meso-ga galekyepfa, maa moṙo ulekyeruma.”
41009049	“Cha kyipfa iiṙikyia lya orio mndu lyechilotsiṟo nyi moṙo chandu munyu okyelotsiṟa shindo.
41009050	Munyu nyi kyindo kyicha, kyaindi munyu ukowa chi munyu-se-pfo, mochiuwika kyi uṙahie? Waṙenyi munyu mrimenyi konyu, mukae na ufoṟo nyoe wenyi ko wenyi.”
41010001	Kawuka pfo kashika mṟasenyi ya Uyuda, na molyolya o Yoridan. Wuingyi wufoi wukosanza-se wakayenda kokye, kawalosha-se chandu aweichiwie.
41010002	Kyasia Mafarisayo wakayenda kokye, wakammbesa, “Ngyesa nyi sungusinyi mndu iṙa mka okye?” kunu wechimyesha.
41010003	Na oe kagaluo, kawawia, “Mose nalemmbia kyi?”
41010004	Wakagamba, “Mose naleenenga momu iṟeia kyiṟeio kyelekana na imṙa.”
41010005	Yesu kawawia, “Kyipfa kya wuumu wo mrima yanyu nalemuenenga iwawaso-lyi.
41010006	Kyaindi wookyia mawookyionyi ga igumbo wuyana, nalegumba mii na mka.
41010007	Kyipfa kya ikyo mndu nechilekana na awuye na wamae, naawishane na mka okye;
41010008	na iwo wawi wechiwa mmbiu umwi; kyasia wai-se wawi-pfo, indi mmbiu umwi.
41010009	Kyasia ikyo Ruwa akyilunga, mndu alakyiletsane.”
41010010	Na lyilya walewuya na kanyi wanalosho wakammbesa mbonyi tsa ṙeṙo-lyo.
41010011	Kawawia, “Orio mndu echiṙa mka okye na ialyika ungyi nawa mṟui;
41010012	na mka, kaṙa mii okye na ialyiko nyi mndu ungyi, nawa mṟui.”
41010013	Kyasia wakaendie Yesu wana watutu kundu nawapaaye; wanalosho wakye wakawaṙeṙia.
41010014	Indi Yesu kyiyeri alewona kasuo mnu, kawawia, “Lekyenyi wana watutu wache na koko, mulawashingyie-pfo; cha kyipfa wana cha iwa Wumangyi wo Ruwa nyi wowo.
41010015	Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, orio oose alechiiṙikyia Wumangyi wo Ruwa cha mana mtutu echiiṙa napfo maa ale-pfo.”
41010016	Kawachunguṟia, kayekyia mawoko gakye wuye yawo, kawawikyia mboṟa.
41010017	Na lyilya awefuma iyenda njienyi, mndu umwi kacha eṙicha, kampfiria ndi, kammbesa, “Mlosha mcha, ngyiwute kyi ngyiiṙime ioṟa moo o mlungana?”
41010018	Yesu kammbia, “Ny'kyilyi uigamba ngyimcha? Kuwoṙe ai mcha sile umwi tupu-pfo, nyi oe Ruwa.
41010019	Nuichi mawawaso: Ulawaage, Ulaṟuguye maa Ulaṟuguyo, Ulaiwe, Ulaṟingyishie wongo, Ulalembe, India awuyo na womoo.”
41010020	Kammbia, “Mlosha, iga goose ngyekyegaosha wookyia wututu woko.”
41010021	Yesu kamwitukuya ko pfinya kamkunda, kammbia, “Nuuṟie kyindo kyimwi. Yenda, undekumba shoose uwoṙe, uenengye wakyiwa, na iyoe nochiwaṙa kyiseyesoe ruwewu; numa ya iho nnjo ungyioshe.”
41010022	Kyaindi oe kalema nzineeri kyipfa kya ṙeṙo-lyo, kawuka halya ammbihie mrimenyi; cha kyipfa nawewoṙe masaa gafoi.
41010023	Yesu kaambuya ngyuura tsoose, kawia wanalosho wakye, “Kyechiwa kyuumu ko wawoṙe masaa iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa!”
41010024	Wanalosho wakaṟiyio kyipfa kya malosho gakye. Yesu kagaluo-se kawawia, “Wana, kyikyilemeri iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa!
41010025	Kyikyeri kyaangu ngamia iiṙa ṟochonyi lya sindanu kuta mnjama iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa.”
41010026	Nawo wakaṟiyio mnu, wechimmbia, “Nyi wui-ngu ngyesa, echiiṙima ikyia?”
41010027	Yesu kawaitukuya, kagamba, “Ko wandu kyechiiṙimika-pfo, indi ko Ruwa chi wuṙo-pfo; kyipfa shoose shekyeiṙimika ko Ruwa.”
41010028	Petiro kawooka immbia, “Ambuya, soe luleṙa shoose lukokuosha iyoe.”
41010029	Yesu kagamba, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, kuwoṙe mndu aleṙa numba, ang'u wana wa wama wa kyisoṟo, ang'u washikyi, ang'u mama, ang'u awu, ang'u wana, ang'u maṙema kyipfa kyako, na kyipfa kya Ndumi Ngyicha-pfo,
41010030	alechienengo ka igana kyiyeri-kyi kya wulalu, numba, na wana wa wama wa kyisoṟo, na washikyi, na mama, na wana, na maṙema, hamwi na ngapo, na kulya wuyanenyi wuicha moo o mlungana.
41010031	Kyaindi wafoi wakyeri wa kuwooka wechiwa wa mafurumionyi; na wa mafurumionyi wechiwa wa kuwooka.”
41010032	Nawo wawekyeri njienyi, kunu wechiṙo iyenda Yerusalemu; na Yesu nawewasongoye. Wakaṟiyio, nawo wechiosha wakaowuo. Kawuta-se walya ikumi na wawi, kawooka iwawia mbonyi tsa shindo shechimmbutikyia,
41010033	echigamba, “Ambuyenyi luiṙo iyenda Yerusalemu; na Mono-Mndu nechiwiko mawokonyi ga wang'anyi wa makohanyi na walosha wa mawawaso. Nawo wechimwanduya napfe, wechimmbika mawokonyi ga masanga,
41010034	nawo wechimtaluo, na impuchia maṙa, na imkapa na ngowa, na immbaaga, na numa ya mfiri iṟaṟu nechiṟuka.”
41010035	Na Yakobo na Yohane, wana wa Sebedayo, wakayenda kokye, wakammbia, “Mlosha, lukundi uluwutie ikyo kyoose lochikuterewa.”
41010036	Kawawia, “Mukundi ngyimmbutie kyi?”
41010037	Wakammbia, “Uluenengye soe luṙamie, umwi kuwoko kopfo ko kulyoe, na umwi kuwoko kopfo ko kumoso, mng'anonyi opfo.”
41010038	Yesu kawawia, “Muichi kyindo muiterewa-pfo. Moiṙima iiṙia matuuro ngyigaiṙia, ang'u ipatiso wupatiso ngyipatiso inyi?”
41010039	Wakammbia, “Loiṙima.” Yesu kawawia, “Matuuro ngyigaiṙia, mochigaiṙia, na wupatiso ngyipatiso inyi mochipatiso,
41010040	kyaindi mbonyi tsa iṙamia kuwoko koko ko kulyoe ang'u kuwoko koko ko kumoso chi momu oko imuenenga-pfo, sile wechienengo iwo wamuṟeyeṟio.”
41010041	Na kyiyeri walya ikumi waleicho wakawooka isuuya Yakobo na Yohane.
41010042	Yesu kawalaga, kawawia, “Muichi kye walya wawatale iwa wang'anyi wa masanga wekyemuchilyia kui pfinya, na wasongoru wawo wekyemugaluo nyoe waṟundi wawo.
41010043	Kyaindi kyechiwa kuṙo konyu-pfo; indi mndu akundi iwa ang'anyi konyu, nechiwa mṟundi onyu,
41010044	na mndu akundi iwa o kuwooka konyu, nechiwa isinga lya woose.
41010045	Cha kyipfa Mono-Adamu alecha icheṟundio-pfo, indi iṟundia wengyi, na ireka moo okye uwe kyindo kyekyiṟa wengyi.”
41010046	Wakashika Yeriko; na kyiyeri aweiwuka pfo, hamwi na wanalosho wakye, na kyisanzionyi, mana o Timayo, Baritolomayo, kyipfupfuṟe kyilya kyiwekyeeṟeṟa, kyiweṙamie mbai ya njia.
41010047	Nakyo kyiyeri kyileicho kye nyi Yesu o Nasareti, kyilewooka ikuilenga, na igamba, “Mono-Dawidi, Yesu, ungyisaṟie.”
41010048	Na wandu wafoi wakakyiṙeṙia kundu kyitsie, kyaindi kyikaengyeṟa ikuilenga, “Mono-Dawidi, ungyisaṟie.”
41010049	Yesu kagoṟoka, kagamba, “Kyilagenyi.” Wakalaga kyipfupfuṟe kyilya, wakakyiwia, “Kuwanze mrimenyi; goṟoka, naikulaga.”
41010050	Kyikawiyitsa ikunya lyakyo, kyikatoola, kyikayenda ko Yesu.
41010051	Yesu kakyigaluo, kakyiwia, “Nukundi ngyikuwutie kyi?” Kyipfupfuṟe kyilya kyikammbia, “Mlosha oko, ngyikundi ngyiiṙime iwona.”
41010052	Yesu kakyiwia, “Yenda, iiṙikyia lyapfo lyakukyiṟa.” Cha ilyi kyikaenengo iwona; kyikamwosha njienyi.
41011001	Na kyiyeri wawei kufuhi na Yerusalemu, kufuhi na Betifage na Betania, iambuyana na fumvu lya mashiṙi ga mseituni, naleṙuma wawi kyiiṙi kya wanalosho wakye,
41011002	kawawia, “Yendenyi mṟasa kyikaṟo kyilya kyiambuyanyi na nyoe; na mukoiṙa napfo, cha ilyi mochiwona igache lya nzoi, lyilandeṙamilyio nyi mndu; lyipfunguonyi, mulyiende.
41011003	Na mndu kammbia, ‘Ny'kyilyi muiwuta kuṙi?’ gambenyi ‘Mndumii kuwoṙe kyindo aindeṟunda nalyo, na cha ilyi nechilyiwiyiṟa-se na iha.’ ”
41011004	Wakayenda, wakawona igache lya nzoi lyilyipfungye moongonyi, njienyi ing'anyi.
41011005	Wandu waata wawegoṟokyi halya-ndu waleṙumo wakawawia, “Ny'kyilyi muipfunguo igache-lyi lya nzoi?”
41011006	Wakawawia chandu Yesu alewawia, nawo wakawaenenga momu.
41011007	Wakaendie Yesu igache lyilya lya nzoi, wakaala mawale gawo wuye yalyo; kalyiṙamilyia.
41011008	Wandu wafoi wakaala mawale gawo njienyi, na wengyi maṟamba walefunja maṙemenyi.
41011009	Na wandu wawesongoye na walya wawei numa wakakuilenga wechigamba, “Hosiana; nyi oe ammbikyie mboṟa ulya aicha kui rina lya Mndumii.
41011010	Wumangyi wuicha wo awu-yoṙu Dawidi wuwuwikyie mboṟa. Hosiana wuye ruwewu.”
41011011	Na oe kaiṙa na Yerusalemu mṟasa hekalunyi; na kyiyeri amwambuye shoose ngyuura tsoose, cha kyipfa nyi kyiyeri kya kyukonyi, kafuma, kayenda Betania hamwi na walya ikumi na wawi.
41011012	Na lyilya kulekya kyiyeri walewuka Betania nalewoṙo nyi njaa.
41011013	Kuleshi na oe kawona mfumu uwoṙe maṟa, kayenda kundu nawone kokooya uwoṙe ndunda; na kyiyeri aleshika halya-ndu uwekyeri alewona kyindo sile maṟa-pfo; kyipfa chi kyiyeri kya ikumbia ndunda-pfo.
41011014	Kagaluo kauwia, “Wookyia inu mṟasa mlungana mndu alalye ndunda kopfo.” Wanalosho wakye wakaicho.
41011015	Wakashika Yerusalemu, na oe kaiṙa na hekalunyi, kawooka ifuna walya waweikapa mbucha kulya hekalunyi, kapfuluo mesa tsa weilacha heleri, na shiṙi sha walya wekyekumba mbeta.
41011016	Maa aleenenga mndu momu o iitsia kyindo kulya hekalunyi-pfo.
41011017	Kalosha, kagamba, “Ngyesa kyikyiṟeie kye numba yako yechiwa yeterewia masanga goose-pfoe? Indi nyoe moigaluo iwa usanja lo wasokyi.”
41011018	Wang'anyi wa makohanyi na walosha wa mawawaso wakamanya mbonyi wakapfula chandu wechimrumatsa; kyipfa walemwowuo, cha kyipfa wuingyi woose wo wandu waleṟiyio kyipfa kya malosho gakye.
41011019	Na lyilya kuleila kawuka kulya mṟinyi.
41011020	Na ngamenyi kyiyeri waweiṙa, walewona mfumu ulya uumie nakamwi.
41011021	Petiro kakumbuo mbonyi tsa mfumu ulya, kammbia, “Mlosha, ambuya, mfumu ulya uleusesa omwuuma.”
41011022	Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Iṙikyienyi Ruwa.
41011023	Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, orio oose echiwia fumvu-lyi, kuluka undewiyitso ipalyipalyinyi, maa alawe moilacha-ilacha kyilya aiṙikyie mrimenyi, indi naiṙikyie kye isho agamba shaafukyia, shechiwa kuṙo.
41011024	Kyipfa kya ikyo ngammbia, orio kyoose moterewa ilyi muiterewa iṙikyienyi kye moshiambilyia, nasho shechiwa shanyu.
41011025	Na nyoe orio kyiyeri mogoṟoka na iterewa, hooṟienyi, orio ṙeṙo muwoṙe na mndu; kundu na Awu-yonyu akyeri ruwewu namuhooṟie nyoe maṙeko ganyu. [
41011026	Kyaindi kokooya nyoe mulaihooṟia, maa Awu-yonyu akyeri ruwewu echimuhooṟia nyoe maṙeko ganyu-pfo.]”
41011027	Wakashika-se Yerusalemu. Na kyiyeri aweichumia hekalunyi, wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na walosha wa mawawaso na wasongoru wa wandu waleyenda kokye.
41011028	Wakammbia, “Nyi kui wuchilyi wuha uiṟunda shindo-shi? Na nyi wui alekuenenga wuchilyi uṟunde ishi?”
41011029	Yesu kawawia, “Ngyechimmbesa kyindo kyimwi, na nyoe mungyigaluoe; naaho-ng'u ngyechimmbia nyi kui wuchilyi wuha ngyiṟunda ishi.
41011030	‘Wupatiso wo Yohane wulewuka ruwewu, ang'u ko wandu?’ Ngyigaluonyi.”
41011031	Wakawesana wo wenyi ko wenyi, wechigamba, “Kokooya logamba wulewuka ruwewu negamba, ‘Ny'kyilyi-ng'u mulalemwiṙikyia?’
41011032	Indi lukogamba, ‘Wulewuka ko wandu...’ ”, waleowuo wandu, kyipfa wandu walewona Yohane cha mwikyimbi nakamwi.
41011033	Wakagaluo Yesu wakagamba, “Luichi-pfo.” Yesu kawawia, “Maa inyi ngyimmbia nyoe nyi kui wuchilyi wuha ngyiṟunda ishi-pfo.”
41012001	Kawooka iṙeṙa nawo kui mfano. “Mndu umwi naleṙonga ṙema lya msabibu, karingyichia uṟigo, kasuma rina lyekamia mafuṙa, kawika kyitaanga, kagawia waṙemi, kayenda kyaro.
41012002	Na kui kyiyeri kyakye kaṙuma mtumo ko waṙemi walya, kundu naambilyie ko waṙemi ndunda tsa msabibu.
41012003	Wakammbaṙa, wakamkapa, wakammbiyitsa nja, alawoṙe kyindo.
41012004	Kawaṙumia-se mtumo ungyi, na oe wakamfaṟa mṙoenyi, wakammbutia shindo shiwicho.
41012005	Kaṙuma ungyi, icho wakammbaaga; na wengyi wafoi, iwa wechiwakapa na iwa wechiwawaaga.
41012006	Kyasia nawewoṙe umwi-se, mana mkunde okye. Ichu na oe kamṙuma kowo mafurumionyi, echigamba, ‘Wechiindia mono-ko.’
41012007	Kyaindi waṙemi walya wakawiana, ‘Ichu nyi mokyioṟa, lummbaage, na kyioṟa kyechiwa kyaṙu.’
41012008	Wakammbaṙa, wakammbaaga, wakammbiyitsa nja ya ṙema lya msabibu.
41012009	Kyasia monyi ṙema lya msabibu newuta kyi? Neecha na irumatsa waṙemi walya, na ṙema lyilya lya msabibu neenengyia wengyi.
41012010	Maa mulandesome shiṟeionyi shiele, ‘Igoe wewika numba walelyilega lyo lyawa igoe lying'anyi lya ndumbenyi.
41012011	Ṙeṙo-lyi lyiwukyie ko Mndumii, nalyo nyi kyiṟiyisho mbele yaṙu?’ ”
41012012	Nawo wakapfula immbaṙa, wakaowuo wandu wa kyisanzionyi; kyipfa walemanya kye kui mfano ulya naleṙeṙa mbonyi tsawo. Wakamṙa wakayenda.
41012013	Wakaṙuma kokye Mafarisayo waata na Maherodi, kundu wamṙege kui maṙeṙo.
41012014	Na kyiyeri waleafukyia walemmbia, “Mlosha, luichi kye iyoe nyi mndu o loi, maa okyesaṟa kyiṟumi kya mndu-pfo; cha kyipfa okyeambuya fana tsa wandu-pfo kyaindi kyiiṙi kya wuloi nokyelosha njia ya Ruwa. Ngyesa nyi sungusinyi ienenga Kaisari kodi ang'u ote?
41012015	Lumwenengye, ang'u lulamwenengye?” Na oe, aichi wukulembecheṟi wowo, kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi mongyiyesha? Ngyiendienyi dinari ngyiiwone.”
41012016	Wakaiende. Kawawia, “Nyi ya wui sanamu-i na kyiṟeio-kyi?” Wakammbia, “Nyi ya Kaisari.”
41012017	Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Enengyenyi Kaisari shikyeri sha Kaisari, na shikyeri sha Ruwa enengyienyi Ruwa.” Wakaṟiyio mnu kyipfa kyakye.
41012018	Naaho-ng'u Masadukayo, wandu wekyegamba kye kuwoṙe iṟuka lya wapfu-pfo, wakayenda kokye, wakammbesa, wachigamba,
41012019	“Mlosha, Mose naleluṟeia kye mono-wama o mndu kapfa, kaṙa mka okye alawoṙe mana, mono-wamae naṙuo mka ulya okye nawonie mono-wamae mana.
41012020	Kyasia kuwewoṙe wana wa mka mfungaaṙe. O kuwooka kaalyika mka, kapfa, alaṙe mana.
41012021	O kawi na oe kamwalyika kapfa, maa oe aleṙa mana-pfo. Na o kaṟaaṟu na wuṙo taa;
41012022	mṟasa woose mfungaaṙe, walaṙe mana. Mafurumionyi ga woose mndu mka ulya na oe kapfa.
41012023	Kyasia, kyiiṙi kya iṟuka lya wapfu nechiwa mka o uha kyiiṙi kya iwo? Kyipfa woose mfungaaṙe walekaa na oe.”
41012024	Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Ngyesa muiṙeka kyipfa kya ikyi, cha kyipfa mulaichi shiṟeio maa wuiṙimi wo Ruwa?
41012025	Cha kyipfa kyiyeri wechiṟuka ko wapfu, wekyealyika maa ialyiko-pfo, indi wekyewa cha malaika wakyeri ruwewu.
41012026	Na ko mbonyi tsa wapfu kye wekyeṟutso, mulandesome kyitapunyi kya Mose, halya-ndu haṙeṙie mbonyi tsa kyinguṙu, chandu Ruwa alemmbia echigamba, ‘Inyi nyi Ruwa o Abrahamu, na Ruwa o Isakyi, na Ruwa o Yakobo?’
41012027	Oe chi Ruwa o wapfu-pfo, indi o wai na moo. Koikyo muiṙeka mnu.”
41012028	Na umwi o walosha wa mawawaso kacha, kaicho weṙeṙa na oe, kamanya kye nawagaluo necha, kammbesa, “Kyiiṙi kya mawawaso goose nyi lyiha lyikyeri lya kuwooka?”
41012029	Yesu kamgaluo, “Lya kuwooka nyilyo ilyi, ‘Aṙanyia, Isiraelyi, Mndumii Ruwa oṙu nyi Mndumii umwi.
41012030	Na iyoe kunda Mndumii Ruwa opfo kui ngoo yapfo yoose, na kui mrima opfo oose, na kui wuṟango wopfo woose, na kui pfinya tsapfo tsoose.’
41012031	Na lya kawi nyilyo ilyi. ‘Kunda momṟasa opfo chandu ukukundi iyoe kumonyi.’ Kuwoṙe iwawaso lying'anyi kuta iga-pfo.”
41012032	Mlosha ulya o mawawaso kammbia, “Ny'kyaloi, Mlosha, nogamba necha kye Ruwa nyi umwi, kuwoṙe ungyi sile oe-pfo.
41012033	Na imkunda oe kui ngoo yoose, na kui wuṟango woose, na kui pfinya tsoose, na ikunda momṟasa chandu ukukundi kumonyi kuwoṙe kyiira kuta shiṙaso shoose na shienengo taa.”
41012034	Na Yesu, kyiyeri alewona kye nagaluo kui wuṟango, nalemmbia, “Iyoe ukyeri kuleshi na Wumangyi wo Ruwa-pfo.” Maa mndu alekaria-se immbesa kyindo wookyia iho-pfo.
41012035	Na kyiyeri Yesu aweiloshia hekalunyi nalegaluo, kagamba, “Walosha wa mawawaso wekyegamba kuṙa kye Kristo nyi Mono-Dawidi?
41012036	Dawidi amonyi nalegamba, kui wuiṙimi wo Mumuyo Mweele, ‘Mndumii nalewia mndumii oko, uṙamie kuwoko koko ko kulyoe, mṟasa ngyechiwikyia washituwa wapfo ikaa wanda ya wuchilyi wopfo.’ ”
41012037	“Dawidi amonyi nagamba nyi Mndumii; kyasia nawa kuṙa mono-kye?” Na wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu waweimwaṙanyia kui sia.
41012038	Kawawia maloshonyi gakye, “Kushowenyi na walosha wa mawawaso wakundi ichumia waṟee magale maleshi, na iiṟikyiṟo sangaṙa,
41012039	na iṙamia mbele masinagoginyi, na shiṙi sha mbele shelyenyi.
41012040	Wekyesoka wakusu shindo shawo, na kui wukulembecheṟi iterewa shiterewo shileshi. Iwa wechiwona ianduyo lying'anyi.”
41012041	Na Yesu aṙamie kufuhi na halya-ndu wandu wawekyewika heleri, kaambuya chandu wuingyi wo wandu wawewika heleri handu halya. Wanjama wakawika shifoi.
41012042	Mndu mka umwi mkusu, mkyiwa kacha, kawika helo tsiwi, tsilyingananyi na kyindo kyilashikyie maa dinari.
41012043	Kalaga wanalosho wakye, kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, mkusu-chu mkyiwa nawika ngoseṟa kuta woose waiwika handu-ha hewika heleri;
41012044	kyipfa iwo woose walewika shindo wawuta ngoseṟenyi ya masaa gawo.”
41013001	Na kyiyeri aweiwuka hekalunyi, umwi o wanalosho wakye nalemmbia, “Mlosha, ambuya, chandu magoe-ga na numba-tsi shikyeri!”
41013002	Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Uwonyi manumba-ga gang'anyi? Hechitsugaa igoe wuye ya igoe lyilechiolotso-pfo.”
41013003	Na kyiyeri aweṙamie fumvunyi lya mashiṙi ga mseituni; iambuyana na hekalu, Petiro, na Yakobo, na Yohane, na Anderea walemmbesa handu halawoṙe wandu,
41013004	“Luwie, mbonyi-tsi tsechiwa indi? Na nyi kyikyi kyiṟingyishio kya kyiyeri, isho shoose shechiwa kufuhi iafukyia?”
41013005	Yesu kawooka iwawia, “Kuṟiisenyi, mndu alamlembe.
41013006	Wandu wafoi wechicha kui rina lyako, wechigamba, ‘Inyi nyi oe Kristo’, nawo wechilemba wafoi.
41013007	Na nyoe kyiyeri mochiicho mbonyi tsa shiṙa, na iweweṙo lya shiṙa mulakangaṟikye. Isho shiwaṟi iwoneka, kyaindi mafurumionyi galya galandeche-pfo.
41013008	Cha kyipfa isanga lyechiamka ikapana na isanga, na wumangyi ikapana na wumangyi. Kochiwaṙa shiṙiinza handu kui handu na kochiwaṙa njaa. Igo nyigo mawookyionyi ga iwawio lying'anyi.
41013009	“Na nyoe kuṟiisenyi mrima yanyu. Kyipfa wechimṙuo nyoe mengyenyi; na masinagoginyi wechimkapa; na nyoe mochiṙoo mbele ya wachilyi na wamangyi kyipfa kyako, iwa wuṟingyishi kowo.
41013010	Na kyiwaṟi Ndumi Ngyicha iongoyo kuwooka masangyenyi koose.
41013011	Na kyiyeri wechimsuo nyoe, na imṟiinga, mulakusaṟe kuwooka shilya mochigamba, kyaindi orio kyindo mochienengo saa iya, kyigambenyi cha kyipfa chi nyoe muiṙeṙa-pfo, indi nyi Mumuyo Mweele.
41013012	Na mndu nechiṟiinga mono-wamae kundu nawoogo, na awu nechiṟiinga mana, na wana wechigalukyia wafee wawo, na iwawaaga.
41013013	Na nyoe mochiwa muwasuoe nyi wandu woose kyipfa kya rina lyako; kyaindi mokarishia mṟasa mafurumionyi, nyi oe echikyia.”
41013014	“Kyaindi mukowona ulya aoweshie, na ekyenyamaṟa shindo shiele agoṟokyi handu halawaṟi, (aisoma namanye), nyi lyo-ng'u wakyeri urukyenyi lo Uyuda waṙichilyie mafumvunyi.
41013015	Na mndu akyeri kai alasokye pfo, maa alaiṙe na kanyi kokye iṙuo kyindo.
41013016	Na akyeri mṙemenyi alawuye na numa iṙuo ikunya lyakye.
41013017	Kyaindi ochia lowo iwo wai wanene, nawo waionza mfiri-yo!
41013018	Indi terewenyi isho shilawutikye kyiyeri kya mbeho.
41013019	Cha kyipfa mfiri-yo yechiwaṙa wukyiwa, chandu kyilandewe wookyia mawookyionyi ga Ruwa igumba mṟasa wulalu, maa kyechiwa maa ale-pfo.
41013020	Na kokooya Mndumii alalefuiṟa mfiri-yo mndu oose awechikyia-pfo; kyaindi kyipfa kya wasambuṟe alewasambuṟa nalefuhiṟa mfiri-yo.
41013021	Na kyiyeri-kyo mndu kammbia, ‘Kristo nakyeri iha’, ang'u ‘nakyeri kulya’, maa mulaiṙikyie.
41013022	Cha kyipfa kochiwoneka Makristo ga wongo, na weonguo shisuku wa wongo, wechiloṟa shiṟingyishio na maṟiyisho, waiṙime imlemba, kokooya kyaiṙimika, maa iwo wasambuṟe.
41013023	Indi nyoe kuṟiisenyi; ngamumuikyimbia shoose.”
41013024	“Kyaindi mfiri iya, numa ya wukyiwa-wo, mnengyeṟi oshikyio nyi meema, na mori ochiwuta ngyeela yacho-pfo,
41013025	na nyenyeri tsa ruwewu tsechioloka, shindo shingyi shikyeri ruwewu shechikupaaya-paya.
41013026	Iho nyilyo wechiwona Mono-Adamu echicha mapuchinyi kui pfinya tsifoi na mng'ano.
41013027	Nyilyo echiṙuma malaika na isania wasambuṟe wakye iwuka ngyuura tsoose tsiina tsa wuyana, iwuka ura lo kyishingonyi kya uruka mṟasa matsitsionyi ga ruwewu.”
41013028	“Ko mfumu kuloshenyi mfano. Kyiyeri mbaga yacho yawiṟa-wiṟa, na ioṟia maṟa, mokyemanya kye kyiyeri kya kyilyimu kyikyeri kufuhi.
41013029	Na nyoe taa, mukowona mbonyi-tso tsewooka, manyenyi kye nai kufuhi moongonyi.
41013030	Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, rika-lyi lyechiiṙa-pfo, mṟasa isho shoose shiafukyie.
41013031	Ruwewu na uruka shechiiṙa; kyaindi maṙeṙo gako gechiiṙa maa ale-pfo.”
41013032	“Kyaindi mbonyi tsa mfiri ulya na saa iya kuwoṙe aichi-pfo, maa malaika wakyeri ruwewu, maa Mana, sile Awu.
41013033	Ambuyenyi necha, laenyi kyiṙombo, terewenyi, cha kyipfa muichi kyiyeri kyechiwa indi-pfo.
41013034	Mfano okye nyi cha mndu aiyenda kyaro, kawia watumo wakye waambuye numba yakye, na ienenga orio mndu iṟunda lyakye, na oe kawia mringyi o moongonyi nalae kyiṙombo.
41013035	Kyasia, laenyi-ng'u kyiṙombo, cha kyipfa muichi kyiyeri monyi kanyi aicha-pfo, kye nyi kyukonyi, ang'u kye nyi kyio kya mayeleyele, ang'u kyiyeri ilying'onyi lyifuga, ang'u ngamenyi;
41013036	alache kyituukyia namukooye mulee.
41013037	Na ikyo ngyimmbia nyoe, ngammbia moose, laenyi kyiṙombo.”
41014001	Numa ya mfiri iwi kuwekyeri mfiri ung'anyi o Pasaka na mkate ilawengyitarang'ishe wang'anyi wa makohanyi na walosha wa mawawaso wakapfula njia ya immbaṙa kui ngyeṟo na immbaaga.
41014002	Cha kyipfa walegamba, “Kyilacheewa kyiyeri kya mfiri ung'anyi, kulachewaṙa kyituṟu wandunyi.”
41014003	Na oe kyiyeri awekyeri Betania, kanyi ko Simion awewoṙo nyi taambo, echilya kyelya, mndu mka awoṙe kyimkyepe kya mafuṙa mecha ga woguru wung'anyi kacha, kapfunuo kyimkyepe kyilya kagaletsia mṙoenyi kokye.
41014004	Hawewoṙe na wandu walesuo wechigamba, “Kyitewe nyi kyikyi iṙetsa mafuṙa mecha ga woguru wung'anyi mbaṟe-i iyi?
41014005	Cha kyipfa mafuṙa-ga gaweiṙima ikumbo ko dinari magana gaṟaaṟu na ngoseṟa, wakyiwa wakaenengo. Wakanuṟia mnu kyipfa kya mka ulya.”
41014006	Yesu kagamba, “Mlekyenyi. Ny'kyilyi mumlyisa wukyiwa? Nangyiṟundia kyindo kyicha.
41014007	Kyipfa mfiri yoose muwoṙe wakyiwa hamwi na nyoe, na orio kyiyeri mukokunda moiṙima iwaṟundia mecha; kyaindi inyi mungyiwoṙe mfiri yoose-pfo.
41014008	Naṟunda chandu aiṙima. Nasonguo ishia mmbiu oko mafuṙa mecha kyipfa kya iṟiko.
41014009	Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, orio kyiyeri Ndumi Ngyicha yaongoyo wuyanenyi koose, ikyi ichu aṟunda kyechisendo imkumbuo.”
41014010	Yuda Isikariote, umwi o walya ikumi na wawi, kayenda mṟasa ko wang'anyi wa makohanyi, naiṙime imṟiinga kowo.
41014011	Nawo kyiyeri waleicho walechihiyo, wakateṟia imwenenga heleri. Kapfula kyiyeri kyicha kyemṟiinga.
41014012	Na mfiri o kuwooka o mkate ilangyitarang'ishe kyiyeri waleshinja shimana sha moondo ga Pasaka, wanalosho wakye wakammbia, “Nyi kwi ukundi luyende lukuṟeyeṟie ulye pasaka?”
41014013	Kaṙuma wawi kyiiṙi kya wanalosho wakye, kawawia, “Yendenyi mṟinyi, mndu msoṟo akuṙikyie kyigondi kya mṟinga nechikarisana na nyoe, muoshenyi.
41014014	Na handu hoose echiiṙa naho wienyi monyi kanyi, ‘Mlosha nagamba, nyi hanga kyiṟi kyako kya wayenu kyikyeri, ngyilyiie pfo pasaka, hamwi na wanalosho wako?’
41014015	Na oe amonyi nechimloṟa, kai ing'anyi, ingyichope, ipfo luṟeyeṟienyi.”
41014016	Wanalosho wakafuma, wakayenda mṟinyi, wakawona chandu alewawia, wakaṟeyeṟa pasaka.
41014017	Kyasia kyiyeri kuleila Yesu kacha hamwi na walya ikumi na wawi.
41014018	Kyiyeri waweilya, Yesu nalegamba, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, umwi onyu, na oe nailya hamwi na inyi nechingyiṟiinga.”
41014019	Wakawooka iwona fowa mrimenyi, wakammbia umwi umwi, “Ngyesa, nyi inyi?”
41014020	Kawawia, “Nyi umwi o iwo ikumi na wawi, aikapa itongye hamwi na inyi kyitelenyi.
41014021	Cha kyipfa Mono-Mndu naindepfa chandu shiṟeio shigambie; kyaindi ochia lokye mndu ulya echiṟiinga Mono-Mndu! Kyiwechiwa nanga kokye mndu-cho alawefeo.”
41014022	Nawo kyiyeri waweilya, kaira mkate, kawikyia mboṟa, kaupeṟenguo, kawaenenga, kagamba, “Ambilyienyi; ichu nyicho mmbiu oko.”
41014023	Kaira kyiṙoo, kaana, kawaenengyia; wakaikanana kyiṙoo kyilya woose.
41014024	Kawawia, “Iyi nyiyo samu yako ya mma, ipusuka kyipfa kya wafoi.
41014025	Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia nyoe, ngyechinyo-se mpfinyo-pfo, mṟasa mfiri ulya ngyechiunyo uhya Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa.”
41014026	Nawo wamuimbe walefuma iyenda fumvunyi lya mashiṙi ga mseituni.
41014027	Yesu kawawia, “Kyio-kyi nyoe moose mochiṙicha mungyiṙe ngyimonyi, cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, ‘Ngyechikapa mlyisi, na moondo gechinyanyaṟika.’
41014028	Kyaindi numa ya iṟuka lyako, ngyechimusongoya iyenda Galyilaya.”
41014029	Petiro kammbia, “Wechiṙicha woose, kyaindi chi inyi-pfo.”
41014030	Yesu kammbia, “Ny'kyaloi, ngakuwia iyoe, inu, kyio-kyi, ilying'onyi lyilafuga kawi, nochingyikana kaṟaaṟu.”
41014031	Na oe kaengyeṟa mnu igamba, “Maa kyikangyikooya ipfa na iyoe, ngyechikukana maa ale-pfo.” Na woose wakawegamba kuṙo.
41014032	Numa ya iho wakacha mṟasa bustanyi yekyelago Getisemane; kawia wanalosho wakye, “Ṙamienyi iha kyiyeri-kyo ngyiterewa.”
41014033	Kaṙuo Petiro na Yakobo na Yohane hamwi na oe, kawooka iiṟewe mnu na ikutuura.
41014034	Kawawia, “Mrima oko uiṟewe cha mndu aipfa. Kaenyi iha mulae kyiṙombo.”
41014035	Katikyira mbele kyitutu, kaoloka wanda, echiterewa kye, kyikaiṙimika, saa iya ya matuuro immbukye.
41014036	Kagamba, “Awu, Awu-yoko, shoose shekyeiṙimika kopfo. Ungyiwute matuuro-ga; kyaindi, chi chandu ngyikundi inyi-pfo, indi chandu ukundi iyoe.”
41014037	Kacha kawakooya walee maṙoe, kawia Petiro, “Ngyesa, Simion, nulee? Oiṙima ilaa kyiṙombo maa saa imwi-pfoe?
41014038	Laenyi kyiṙombo muterewe, mulacheyesho. Mrima ukundi indi mmbiu umfafa.”
41014039	Kayenda-se, katerewa, echigamba kyindo kyilya kyilya.
41014040	Kacha-se kawakooya walee, kyipfa meso gawo gawa malemeri, maa walamanye kyemgaluo.
41014041	Kacha lya kaṟaaṟu, kawawia, “Laenyi wulalu, muonyonye. Kyishikyie. Saa yamcha. Ambuya, Mono-Adamu naiwiko mawokonyi ga wandu wawoṙe wunyamaṟi.
41014042	Amkyenyi, sindenyi. Ambuya ulya aingyiṟiinga amshika kufuhi.”
41014043	Kyasia kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa, cha ilyi Yuda nalecha, umwi o walya ikumi na wawi, na hamwi na oe ṟiima lya wandu, wawoṙe ngyuushu na maṟeta, wawukyie ko wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na walosha wa mawawaso, na wasongoru wa wandu.
41014044	Na ulya momṟiinga nalekoawaenenga kyiṟingyishio, echigamba, “Icho ngyechimkomba, icho nyi oe; mmbaṙenyi, mumṙuo mochimringa.”
41014045	Kyasia kyiyeri alecha, cha ilyi kayenda kokye, kagamba, “Rabi,” kamkomba.
41014046	Wakagoṟuo mawoko gawo wakammbaṙa.
41014047	Na umwi o walya wawekyeri ho kaira ushu, kakapa mtumo o Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, kamṙumbuo kurwi.
41014048	Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Ngyesa, nyi cha msokyi mofuma muwoṙe ngyuushu na maṟeta, ingyiwaṙa inyi?
41014049	Orio mfiri ngyiwekyeri mbele yanyu hekalunyi ngyechilosha, mulangyiwaṙe; kyaindi ishi shawa kundu shiṟeio shiiṙime iafukyia.”
41014050	Naaho-ng'u wakamṙa, wakaṙicha woose.
41014051	Na manakye umwi kamwosha, alaṟee kyindo sile iwale lya uwiṟo, wakammbaṙa.
41014052	Na oe kaṙa iwale lyilya, kaṙicha ai kyiṟanguoe.
41014053	Nawo wakaṙuo Yesu ko Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose wakakuumbia kufuhi na oe, wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wasongoru wa wandu na walosha wa mawawaso.
41014054	Na Petiro kamwosha akyeri kuleshi, mṟasa numbenyi ya Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose; kaṙamia hamwi na waṟundi, echioṙa moṙo.
41014055	Kyasia wang'anyi wa makohanyi na woose halya mengyenyi wakapfula wuṟingyishi waiṙime iwaaga Yesu; walawone.
41014056	Cha kyipfa wafoi walemṟingyishia wongo, kyaindi wuṟingyishi wowo wulaṙuane.
41014057	Mṟasa wengyi wakagoṟoka, wakamṟingyishia wongo, wechigamba,
41014058	“Soe lulemwicho echigamba, ‘Inyi ngyechiunduo hekalu-lyi lyilyiachikyie kui mawoko, na kyiiṙi kya mfiri iṟaṟu ngyechiwika lyingyi lyilalyiachikyie kui mawoko.’ ”
41014059	Maa kuṙo wuṟingyishi wowo wuleṙuana-pfo.
41014060	Naaho-ng'u Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose kagoṟoka makyiṙi-gawi, kawesa Yesu, echigamba, “Ugaluo kyindo? Iwa waikuṟingyishia kyi?”
41014061	Kyaindi katsia tsi, maa alegaluo kyindo-pfo. Mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi kuta woose kammbesa-se kammbia, “Iyoe nyi oe Kristo, Mana o ulya awoṙe mng'ano?”
41014062	Yesu kagamba, “Inyi nyi oe, na nyoe mochiwona Mono-Adamu aṙamie kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa monyi pfinya, echicha na mapuchi ga ruwewu.”
41014063	Mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi kuta woose karanduo mawale gakye, echigamba, “Kuwoṙe-se kyimaṙuma kya kyikyi ipfula waṟingyishi?
41014064	Momuicho chandu alahia Ruwa. Muwonyi kuṙa nyoe?” Woose wakamwanduya kye kyimmbaṟi iwoogo.
41014065	Wengyi wakawooka impuchia maṙa, wakamshikyia kyaam, na imkapa nzina, na immbia, “Lasha. Maa waṟundi nawo wakamkapa ngofi.”
41014066	Na Petiro nawekyeri halya-ndu aweioṙia moṙo. Umwi o shisinga sha Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose kacha,
41014067	kawona Petiro eoṙa moṙo kamwitukuya, kagamba, “Maa iyoe nuwekyeri hamwi na Yesu, Mnasareti ulya.”
41014068	Kakana kagamba, “Ngyiichi maa ngyimanya isho ugamba iyoe-pfo.” Kafuma na nja, ilying'onyi lyikafuga.
41014069	Na kyisinga kyilya kyikammbona-se, kyikawooka-se iwia walya wawegoṟokyi halya, “Ichu nyi umwi owo.”
41014070	Kakana-se. Numa ya kyiyeri kyifuhi-se walya wawegoṟokyi halya wakawia Petiro, “Loi nui umwi owo, cha kyipfa iyoe nui Mgalyilaya.”
41014071	Kawooka ilya nyamu, “Ngyiichi mndu-chu mumsenda-pfo.”
41014072	Na cha ilyi ilying'onyi lyikafuga lya kawi. Petiro kakumbuo kyindo kyilya alewio nyi Yesu, “Ilying'onyi lyilafuga kawi, nochingyikana kaṟaaṟu.” Na kyiyeri alekusaṟa kyipfa kya ṙeṙo-lyo, kalyia.
41015001	Na kyiyeri kulekya wang'anyi wa makohanyi walewaṙa kyisanzionyi hamwi na wasongoru wa wandu na walosha wa mawawaso na mengye yoose, wakapfunga Yesu, wakamṙuo mbele ya Pilato.
41015002	Pilato kammbesa, “Iyoe nyi oe mangyi o Wayuda?” Kagaluo, kammbia, “Iyoe nogamba.”
41015003	Na wang'anyi wa makohanyi wawemwanduya shindo shifoi.
41015004	Pilato kammbesa-se, echigamba, “Ugaluo kyindo? Ambuya nyi shindo shinga waikuanduya!”
41015005	Maa Yesu alegaluo kyindo-se-pfo, mṟasa Pilato kaṟiyio.
41015006	Kyasia kyiyeri kya mfiri ung'anyi nekyewapfunguya mpfungo umwi wamkundi.
41015007	Hawewoṙe mndu umwi ekyelago Baraba, nampfungye hamwi na walya walelya wuṟiingyi, na iwaaga kyiiṙi kya wuṟiingyi-wo.
41015008	Wandu wa kyisanzionyi wakacha wakawooka iterewa nawawutie chandu aweichiwie.
41015009	Pilato kawagaluo, echigamba, “Ngyesa, mukundi ngyimpfunguye mangyi o Wayuda?”
41015010	Cha kyipfa nalemanya kye wang'anyi wa makohanyi wamṙambika kokye kui wunyenyi.
41015011	Kyaindi wang'anyi wa makohanyi wakaamtsa kyituṟu kyiiṙi kya walya wawesanzie halya, kye nanga wapfunguyo Baraba.
41015012	Pilato kagaluo-se, kawawia, “Kyasia ngyimmbutie kyi ichu mugamba kye nyi mangyi o Wayuda?”
41015013	Wakakalagatsa-se, “Mkapie msalabenyi.”
41015014	Pilato kawawia, “Nyi wuwicho wuha alewuta?” Wakaengyeṟa mnu ikalagatsa, “Mkapie msalabenyi.”
41015015	Pilato akundi ichihiṟa walya wasanzie halya, kawapfunguya Baraba; kawuta Yesu, numa ya igamba nakapo na ngowa, kundu nakapio msalabenyi.
41015016	Na asikari wakamṙuo mṟasa Praitorio (kyimwi na igamba numba ya wuchilyi), wakasanzia ho asikari walya wengyi woose.
41015017	Wakamṟika iwale lya kyimaande-maande, wakaoka oṟo ya msha, wakaimṟika mṙoenyi.
41015018	Wakawooka imwiṟikyiṟa, “Lokuiṟikyiṟa, Mangyi o Wayuda!”
41015019	Wakamkapa na upoi mṙoenyi, wakampuchia maṙa, wakapfiria ndi, wakamwindia.
41015020	Na wamumkape makuukuu, wakammbuta iwale lyilya lyakye lya kyimaande-maande, wakamṟika mawale gakye amonyi; wakamṙuo nja kundu wamkapie msalabenyi.
41015021	Wakaitika mndu aweiiṙa, awukyie mṙemenyi, Simion o Kyirene, awu-yawo Iskanda na Ṟufo, kundu naṙuo msalaba okye.
41015022	Wakamwende mṟasa handu hekyelago Golyigota, kyimwi na igamba, “Ipoṟong'u.”
41015023	Wakamwenenga mpfinyo ummbikye manemane, alaambilyie.
41015024	Wakamkapia msalabenyi, wakagawa mawale gakye, wakagakapia kuṟu kuha orio mndu naṙuo kyi.
41015025	Kyasia kyiwekyeri kyiyeri kya saa tsiṟaaṟu, nawo wakamkapia msalabenyi.
41015026	Hawewoṙe na kyiṟeio kya ianduyo lyakye kyigambie, “MANGYI O WAYUDA.”
41015027	Na hamwi na oe walekapia msalabenyi wasokyi wawi, umwi kuwoko kokye ko kulyoe na umwi kuwoko kokye ho kumoso. [
41015028	Kyasia kyiṟeio kyikaafutsio kyigambie, “Naletalo hamwi na wefunja mawawaso.]”
41015029	Na wandu waweiṙa njienyi wakamlahia, wechisunza-sunza mṙoe, wechigamba, “Mwambuye! Iyoe mounduo hekalu na ilyiwika mfirinyi iṟaṟu,
41015030	kukyiṟe mrima opfo, usokye msalabenyi.”
41015031	Na wuṙo na wang'anyi wa makohanyi wakamkapa makuukuu, hamwi na walosha wa mawawaso, wechigamba, “Nalekyiṟa wengyi, aiiṙima ikukyiṟa amonyi-pfo.
41015032	Kristo, mangyi o Isiraelyi, nasokye wulalu msalabenyi luiṙime iwona na iiṙikyia. Maa walya walekapio msalabenyi hamwi na oe wakamṙeṙia maṙeṙo mawicho.”
41015033	Na kyiyeri kulewa saa tsiṟandaaṟu, kukowaṙa meema urukyenyi koose, mṟasa saa kyenda.
41015034	Na saa kyenda Yesu kakuilenga na ṟui lyakye ko pfinya, “Eloi, eloi, lama sabakyitani?” Ikyo kyagamba, “Ruwa oko, Ruwa oko, ny'kyilyi ongyiṙa?”
41015035	Na wandu waata wawegoṟokyi halya, walegamba, “Nailaga Elyiya.”
41015036	Na umwi kakapa mteeṟa, kaichuṟa kyindo kyekyetarang'ia kyindonyi kyekyeongyia mṟinga, kakyiwikyia upoinyi, kamrutsa, echigamba, “Lekyenyi, luwone kokooya Elyiya neecha imsotsa msalabenyi.”
41015037	Na Yesu kafiiṟa na pfinya kalekyia moo.
41015038	Isulyia lyeshingyia hekalunyi lyikaranduka kawi wookyia wuye mṟasa wanda.
41015039	Kyasia mchilyi ulya, awegoṟokyi ho iambuyana na oe, kyiyeri alewona kye nalelekyia moo mbaṟe-yo, kagamba, “Loi mndu-chu nawekyeri Mono-Ruwa.”
41015040	Hawewoṙe na waka waiambuya wakyeri kuleshi; kyiiṙi kyawo hawewoṙe Maria Makyidalena, na Maria wama o Yakobo ulya mtutu na Yose, na Salome.
41015041	Iwo nyiwo waleoshana na oe ipfo Galyilaya, na imṟundia; na wengyi wafoi waleṙo hamwi na oe mṟasa Yerusalemu.
41015042	Na kommbe kyukonyi, cha kyipfa nyi Ikuṟeyeṟa, nyicho mfiri osongoya mfiri o onyonya,
41015043	Yosefu, mndu o Arimataya, mndu ekyeindio, mndu o mengye yeanduya wandu, na oe naweiweṙelyia iafukyia lya Wumangyi wo Ruwa; kayenda kulawoṙe wuowu, mṟasa mbele ya Pilato katerewa mmbiu o Yesu.
41015044	Kyaindi Pilato kaṟiyio, kye ampfa. Kalaga mchilyi ulya kammbesa kokooya ampfa kyiyeri kyileshi kyamwiṙe.
41015045	Na ammbone wuṟingyishi ko mchilyi ulya, kaenenga Yosefu mnying'a ulya.
41015046	Na oe kaguṟa sanda, kamsotsa msalabenyi, kamwaṟahia sanda iya, kammbika kyilomenyi kyiwekyiachikyie iṟaṟenyi; kawikyia igoe mbele ya moongo o kyilome.
41015047	Na Maria Makyidalena na Maria mama o Yose wakaambuya handu alewikyio.
41016001	Na mfiri o onyonya omwiṙe Maria Makyidalena na Maria mama o Yakobo na Salome waleguṟa mafuṙa gekyepfaama necha waiṙime indemshia.
41016002	Na ngamenyi utuko, mfiri o kuwooka o juma, wakayenda kyilomenyi, kyiyeri mnengyeṟi uweiṙo;
41016003	wakawesana wo wenyi ko wenyi, “Nyi wui echiwuta igoe lyilya halya moongonyi o kyilome?”
41016004	Na lyilya waleambuya walewona kye igoe lyilya lyammbuto ho; nalyo lyiweng'anyi mnu.
41016005	Wakaiṙa na kyilomenyi wakawona manakye aṙamie kuwoko ko kulyoe, aṟee iwale lya uwiṟo; wakaṟiyio.
41016006	Na oe kawawia, “Mulaṟiyio. Muipfula Yesu Mnasareti; alekapio msalabenyi. Amṟuka; akyeri iha-pfo. Ambuyenyi handu walemmbikyia.
41016007	Kyaindi yendenyi, mundewia wanalosho wakye, na Petiro, kye namsongoi iyenda Galyilaya; ipfo mochimmbona, chandu alemmbia.”
41016008	Wakafuma na nja, iwuka kulya kyilomenyi weṙicha; cha kyipfa walewoṙo nyi iṙeṙema na iṟiyio. Maa walewia mndu kyindo-pfo, kyipfa waleowuo. [
41016009	Na oe kyiyeri aleṟuka mfiri o kuwooka o juma, nalewoneka ko Maria Makyidalena kuwooka, ulya alemmbuta waṟufui wawicho mfungaaṙe.
41016010	Icho naleyenda kaongoya mbonyi walya wawekyeri hamwi na oe, nawo waweikapa ṟanyi na ifiiṟa.
41016011	Kyaindi iwo kyiyeri waleicho kye nai na moo, na oe nammbona, waleiṙikyia-pfo.
41016012	Numa ya isho kawoneka ko wandu wawi kyiiṙi kyawo, nawoṙe fana ingyi; nawo waweiyenda mṙemenyi.
41016013	Na iwo wakayenda wakaongoya mbonyi walya wengyi; maa iwo walewairikyia-pfo.
41016014	Numa ya iho kawono nyi walya ikumi na umwi kyiyeri waweilya. Kawaṙeṙia kyipfa kya iiṙikyia lyawo lyaangu na wuumu wo mrima yawo, cha kyipfa waleiṙikyia walya walemmbona kyiyeri aleṟuka ko wapfu-pfo.
41016015	Kawawia, “Yendenyi wuyanenyi koose, mundeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha ko orio kyigumbe.
41016016	Aiṙikyia na ipatiso nechikyia; alaiṙikyia, nechianduyo.
41016017	Na shiṟingyishio-shi shechioshana na iwo waiṙikyie. Kui rina lyako wechifuna waṟufui wawicho; wechiṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie ngyihya.
41016018	Wechiwaṙa njoka; maa wakanyo kyindo kya wuṟoi; kyechiwawutia kyindo maa ale-pfo. Wechiyekyia mawoko gawo wuye ya waluoe, nawo wechiwaṙa pfinya.”
41016019	Kyasia Mndumii Yesu, amṙeṙe nawo, kaṙoo wuye ruwewu, kaṙamia kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa.
41016020	Na walya wakafuma, wakaonguo Ndumi Ngyicha kundu koose, Mndumii echiṟunda maṟunda hamwi nawo, na iṟingyishia mbonyi tsilya kui shiṟingyishio shileoshana natso.]
42001001	Kyipfa kya ilyi wandu wafoi waletambagana iṟeia necha mbonyi tsilya tsilewutika koṙu,
42001002	chandu walya waleṟingyishia na iwona mbonyi-tsi waleluongoya, hamwi na waṟundi wa Ṙeṙo lyilya wookyia mawookyionyi,
42001003	ngawona nyi necha inyi, kyipfa kya ilyi ngyilepfula wuṟingyishi wo mbonyi-tso wookyia mawookyionyi, ikuṟeia necha, Tofilo Monyi Kyiṟumni,
42001004	umanye necha mbonyi tsilya ulelosho.
42001005	Kacha kyiyeri kya Herode, mangyi o Wayuda, kuwewoṙe mkohanyi umwi, ekyelago Sakaria, o kamba lya Abiya, na mka okye nawei umwi o kyishari kya Aron, ekyelago Elyisapeti.
42001006	Na woose wewawi wawewoṙe wusumganyi mbele ya Ruwa, wechiosha mawawaso goose ga Mndumii na shilya atutumie kulawoṙe igambo kye wawoṙe kyindo kyoose kyiwicho.
42001007	Nawo wawewoṙe mana-pfo, kyipfa Elyisapeti nawei muumba na woose wewawi wawewaku mnu.
42001008	Kyasia kyiyeri kya kamba lyakye lyeṟunda cha mkohanyi mbele ya Ruwa,
42001009	chandu kyiwekyeri kyiṙo kya wukohanyi, kaolokyio nyi kuṟu kuha iiṙa na hekalunyi lya Mndumii indekoṟa uvumba.
42001010	Na wuingyi woose wo wandu wawekyeri iterewa Ruwa nja ya hekalu kyiyeri kya ikoṟa uvumba.
42001011	Malaika o Mndumii kacha na kokye agoṟokyi ura lo kulyoe lo mesa ya Mndumii yekoṟia shindo shekyeṙutsa mtsu.
42001012	Kyiyeri Sakaria alemmbona naleiṟewe, kawoṙo nyi wuowu.
42001013	Kyaindi malaika ulya kammbia, “Ulaowuoe, Sakaria, kyipfa kyiterewo kyapfo kyaaṙanyio, na mka opfo, Elyisapeti, nechifee mana o kyisoṟo, na nochimlaga Yohane.
42001014	Na iyoe nochiwaṙa sia na ichihiyo lying'anyi, na wandu wafoi wechichihiyo kyiyeri mana-cho echifeo.
42001015	Kyipfa nechiwa ang'anyi mbele ya Ruwa. Echinyo mpfinyo maa kyindo kya wunanzi-pfo; na oe nechiichuṟo nyi Mumuyo Mweele wookyia wosinyi ko wamae.
42001016	Na oe nechiwiyiṟa wandu wafoi wa Isiraelyi na ko Mndumii Ruwa owo.
42001017	Nechisonguo mbele yakye awoṙe pfinya tsa mrima cha tsilya tsa Elyiya, kundu nagaluo waawu wasanze na wana, na ienenga wawicho wuṟango wo wandu wasumganyi, na iṟeyeṟia Mndumii wandu wawaṟeyeṟie Wumangyi wo Ruwa.”
42001018	Sakaria kawia malaika, “Ngyechimanya kuṙa wuloi wo mbonyi-tsi? Inyi ngyimku na mka oko nyi mkyeku o mfiri ifoi.”
42001019	Malaika kamgaluo, kammbia, “Inyi nyi Kapreelyi, ngekyegoṟoka mbele ya Ruwa; na inyi ngaṙumo ngyiṙeṙe na iyoe na ikuwia mbonyi-tsi ngyicha.
42001020	Nochiwa ndiṟi, ulechiiṙima iṙeṙa, mṟasa mfiri ulya shechiṟundika isho, kyipfa oiṙikyia maṙeṙo gako-pfo, nago gechiafukyia kui kyiyeri kyago.”
42001021	Na wandu walya waweiweṙelyia Sakaria, wakaṟiyio kya ifurumia lyakye kulya hekalunyi.
42001022	Na lyilya alefuma pfo alaiiṙima iṙeṙa nawo, walemanya kye nalewona shindo shilandewono akyeri cha mndu ailoṙo kulya hekalunyi, na oe kawatsinia kaṙio ai ndiṟi.
42001023	Kyasia na lyilya mfiri ya kamba lyakye ileafukyia kayenda kanyi kokye.
42001024	Na numa ya mfiri iya mka okye, Elyisapeti, naleira mana kakaa numba mori itanu, echigamba,
42001025	“Kuṙi nyi wuṙo Mndumii alengyiwutia mfiri iya alengyiambuya kundu nangyiwute sonu mbele ya wandu.”
42001026	Mori iṟandaaṟu wookyia kyiyeri Elyisapeti aleira mana, malaika Kapreelyi naleṙumo nyi Ruwa nayende mṟasa mṟi o Galyilaya okyelago Nasareti,
42001027	ko mana mkyega aweṙuṙo nyi mndu awekyelago Yosefu, o kyishari kya Dawidi; na rina lya mana-cho mkyega nyi Mariamu.
42001028	Kaiṙa na kanyi kokye, kagamba, “Ngakuiṟikyiṟa, iyoe umwenengye isaṟia, Mndumii nai hamwi na iyoe.”
42001029	Na oe kaiṟewe mnu mrimenyi kyipfa kya maṙeṙo ga malaika ulya kakusaṟa mrimenyi, “Kyiiṟikyiṟo-kyi nyi kya mbaṟe iha?”
42001030	Malaika kammbia, “Ulaowuoe, Maria, kyipfa nowona isaṟia ko Ruwa.
42001031	Nochiira mana na nofee mana o kyisoṟo; na nochimlaga Yesu.
42001032	Icho nechiwa ang'anyi. Nechilago Mana o ulya ai wuye, na Mndumii Ruwa nemwenenga kyiṙi kya wuchilyi kya Dawidi, awuye.
42001033	Nechichilyia numba ya Yakobo mlungana, na Wumangyi wokye wochisia-pfo.”
42001034	Maria kawia malaika ulya, “Kyechiwa kuṙa kyindo-kyi, na inyi ngyilamwalyikye?”
42001035	Malaika kagaluo, kammbia, “Mumuyo Mweele necha na kopfo na pfinya tsa icho ai wuye tsekushikyia cha kyirinje. Kyipfa kya ikyo, ikyo kyechifeo kyelago nyi kyiele, Mana o Ruwa.
42001036	Lyingyi-se, mshari opfo, Elyisapeti, na oe naleira mana o kyisoṟo wukunyi wokye; na mori-chu nyi o kaṟandaaṟu ko icho alelago muumba.
42001037	Kyipfa kuwoṙe kyindo kyilekyeiṙimika ko Ruwa-pfo.”
42001038	Maria kagamba, “Inyi nyi kyisinga kya Mndumii; kyiwe koko chandu ogamba.” Numa ya iho malaika kawuka halya kayenda.
42001039	Kyasia, mfiri-yo Maria kafuma, kayenda faṟa mṟasa uruka lo mafumvunyi mṟinyi umwi o Yuda,
42001040	kaiṙa na kanyi ko Sakaria, kaiṟikyiṟa Elyisapeti.
42001041	Na lyilya Elyisapeti aleicho kyiiṟikiṟo kyilya kya Maria, kyikoku kyikakupaaya wosinyi kokye. Elyisapeti kaichuṟo Mumuyo Mweele
42001042	kaṙeṙa kui ṟui lying'anyi, echigamba, “Nummbikyie mboṟa iyoe kyiiṙi kya waka, na mono-pfo nechiwikyio mboṟa.
42001043	Mbonyi-tsi tsangyiwutikyia kuṙa, utane mama o Mndumii oko acha na koko inyi?
42001044	Kyipfa ilyi ṟui lyapfo lyeiṟikyiṟa lyileiṙa na maṙwinyi gako, kyikoku kyilekupaaya kui sia wosinyi-koko.
42001045	Na agusu icho aleiṙikyia; kyipfa isho alewio nyi Mndumii shechiafukyia.”
42001046	Maria kagamba,
42001047	“Mrima oko ong'anyisa Mndumii, na ngoo yako yachihiyo kyipfa kya Ruwa, Mkyiṟa oko.
42001048	Kyipfa naambuya wufofo wo kyisinga kyakye. Kyipfa, ambuya, wookyia wulalu marika goose gengyilaga ammbikyie mboṟa.
42001049	Kyipfa awoṙe pfinya nangiwutia maṟiyisho, na rina lyakye lyilyiele.
42001050	Na isaṟia lyakye lyekyekaa marika mṟasa marika ko iwo wekyemwowuo na imwindia.
42001051	Nawoṙe pfinya yewuta shindo sha maṟiyisho; naleola-ola walekyeicho makusaṟonyi ga ngoo tsawo.
42001052	Naleolotsa wang'anyi shiṙinyi shawo sha wuchilyi, na wafofo kawang'anyisa.
42001053	Wawoṙo nyi njaa kawaigutsa mecha, na wanjama kawaima iwona kyiira.
42001054	Naleikanyia Isiraelyi, mṟundi okye; kundu nakumbuo isaṟia lyakye.
42001055	Chandu alewia waku waṙu, Abrahamu na ushari lokye mṟasa mlungana.”
42001056	Maria kakaa na oe cha mori iṟaṟu, numa ya iho kawuya na kanyi kokye.
42001057	Na kyiyeri mfiri ya Elyisapeti yesaṟio mana ileafukyia, naleenengo mana o kyisoṟo.
42001058	Wamṟasa na wa kyishari kyakye wakaicho kye Mndumii namwengyeṟia isaṟia lyakye, wakachihiyo hamwi na oe.
42001059	Mfiri o nyanya wakacha icheṙina mana; wakakunda imṙumbuya rina lya awuye, Sakaria.
42001060	Wamae kagaluo, kagamba, “Chi wuṙo-pfo; nechilago Yohane.”
42001061	Wakammbia, “Kuwoṙe mndu ekyelago kuṙo kunu kyisharinyi kyapfo-pfo.”
42001062	Wakatsinia awuye wamanye chandu echimlaga.
42001063	Kawawia wamwenenge handu heṟeia, kaṟeia kye rina lyakye nyi Yohane. Wakaṟiyio woose.
42001064	Iho iho ṙumbu lyakye lyikatambuluka na ulumi lokye taa, kawooka iṙeṙa echiṟumisha Ruwa.
42001065	Woose wawei kufuhi wakawoṙo nyi wuowu; na mbonyi-tso tsoose tsikaongoyo urukyenyi loose lo Uyuda luwewoṙe mafumvu.
42001066	Na woose waleicho wakawika mbonyi-tso mrimenyi kowo, wechigamba, “Mana-chu nechiwa o mbaṟe iha? Kyipfa pfinya ya Mndumii iwei hamwi na oe.”
42001067	Na Sakaria, awuye, kaichuṟo Mumuyo Mweele kaonguo shisuku, kagamba,
42001068	“Naṟumisho Mndumii, Ruwa o Isiraelyi, kyipfa nalecha na ko wandu wakye, na iwakyiṟa.
42001069	Nalelugoṟotsia membe ya wukyiṟo moongonyi o Dawidi, mṟundi okye.
42001070	Chandu agambie wookyia mawookyionyi kui ṙumbu lya weonguo shisuku wakye waele;
42001071	Lukyiṟo iwuka ko washituwa waṙu na mawokonyi ga woose walusuuye.
42001072	Kundu nawutie waku waṙu, isaṟia na ikumbuo mma okye mweele.
42001073	Nyamu alelyiia Abrahamu awu-yoṙu,
42001074	kye nechilutarama soe, lukyiṟo iwuka mawokonyi ga washituwa waṙu, na imṟundia kulawoṙe wuowu,
42001075	ko wuele na wusumganyi mbele yakye mfiri yaṙu yoose.
42001076	Na iyoe, mana, nolago moonguo shisuku o icho ai wuye, kyipfa nochisonguo mbele ya Mndumii umṟeyeṟie njia tsakye;
42001077	umanyishe wandu wakye wukyiṟo, kyiiṙi kya ihooṟio ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo.
42001078	Kui njia ya isaṟia lya Ruwa oṙu, na kui njia-tso ngyeela iwukyie wuye yacha na koṙu.
42001079	Ilyimikyia wai meemenyi na kyirinjenyi kya upfu, na isongoya maṙende gaṙu kui njia ya ufoṟo.”
42001080	Mana ulya kang'ana, kaengyeṟika pfinya mrimenyi. Kakaa kundu ko nuka kuumu suwaa kulawoṙe maa mṟinga mṟasa mfiri o kuloṟa ko Waisiraelyi.
42002001	Mfiri iya iwawaso lyilewuka ko Kaisari Agusto kye kuṟeio marina ga wandu woose wa wuyana.
42002002	Marina-ga nyigo ga kuwooka galeṟeio kyiyeri Kyirenio awekyeri mchilyi o Shamu.
42002003	Wandu woose wakandeṟeio, orio mndu mṟinyi kokye.
42002004	Yosefu na oe nalefuma Galyilaya, awuka mṟi o Nasareti, kaṙo kayenda Uyuda mṟasa mṟi o Dawidi, okyelago Betilehemu, kyipfa oe nyi o kyishari kya Dawidi;
42002005	kundu naṟeio hamwi na Maria awekyeri tindi yakye na oe nawei mnene.
42002006	Na kyiiṙi kya ikaa-pfo, mfiri yakye yesaṟio mana ikaafukyia,
42002007	kafee mono-kye mmbele, kamṟika nguwo tsa kyikoku, kamlaṟa mugondinyi o umbe, kyipfa walewona ṙaawa numbenyi ya wayenu-pfo.
42002008	Na kulya urukyenyi kuwewoṙe walyisi wawekyeri mapatenyi wechiringa mapoo gawo kyio kui iseiyana.
42002009	Malaika o Mndumii kacha na kowo walakuṟeyeṟie, mng'ano o Mndumii ukowaa ngyuura tsoose, wakaowuo mnu.
42002010	Malaika kawawia, “Mulaowuoe; kyipfa inyi ngyimuendie mbonyi ngyicha tsa sia ing'anyi yechiwa ko wandu woose.
42002011	Kyipfa inu mṟinyi o Dawidi nafeo, kyipfa kyanyu, Mkyiṟa, nyi oe Kristo Mndumii.
42002012	Na ikyi nyikyo kyiṟingyishio konyu; mochikooya mana aionga amṟikye nguwo tsa kyikoku, alee mgondinyi o umbe.”
42002013	Cha ilyi wawei hamwi na malaika-cho, wuingyi o ngyuulyimalyi tsa ruwewu, wechiṟumisha Ruwa na igamba,
42002014	“Naṟumisho Ruwa wuye Ruwewu, na wuyanenyi kuwe ufoṟo ko wandu awakundi.”
42002015	Na lyilya malaika-wo walelekana nawo wechiyenda ruwewu, walyisi walya walewiana, “Luyende mṟasa Betilehemu lundewona kyindo-kyo Ruwa aleluwia.”
42002016	Wakayenda faṟa wakakooya Maria na Yosefu, na mana ulya aionga alee mgondinyi.
42002017	Wamummbone wakaonguo mbonyi tsakye chandu walekowaongoyo.
42002018	Woose waleicho wakaṟiyio kyipfa kya isho walewio nyi walyisi.
42002019	Kyaindi Maria kakumbuo shindo-sho shoose, echikusaṟa mrimenyi kokye.
42002020	Walyisi walya wakawuya weching'anyisa na iṟumisha Ruwa kyipfa kya mbonyi tsoose waleicho na iwona chandu walewio.
42002021	Hamwiṙe mfiri nyanya, kyiyeri kyeṙina mana kyamwafukie, nalelago nyi Yesu, chandu Malaika alekoamlaga kyiyeri alandemogo.
42002022	Numa ya iho lyilya kyiyeri kya iilyiro lyawo kyileafukyia, chandu mawawaso ga Mose gagambie, waleyenda na oe mṟasa Yerusalemu, wammṙambikye ko Mndumii,
42002023	Chandu kyikyiṟeie mawawasonyi ga Mndumii: “Orio mana o kyisoṟo mmbele ko wamae nalago mweele ko Mndumii.”
42002024	Wandewuta kyiano chandu kyikyigambe mawawasonyi ga Mndumii, “Mbuna tsiwi ang'u maalea gawi ga mbeta.”
42002025	Na halya Yerusalemu hawewoṙe mndu ekyelago Simion, na oe nyi mndu msumganyi, akundi na iowuo Ruwa, echiweṙelyia kyiyeri kya Waisiraelyi, iwiyiṟio moo na Mumuyo Mweele nawei na oe.
42002026	Na oe nawemmbie nyi Mumuyo Mweele kye echipfa alawona Kristo o Mndumii-pfo.
42002027	Kyasia kacha na hekalunyi echisongoyo nyi Mumuyo; na lyilya wafee waleende mana ulya Yesu na numba, kundu wammbutie chandu kyiwekyigambe.
42002028	Oe amonyi nalemwambilyia kaana Ruwa, echigamba,
42002029	“Wulalu Mndumii, noenenga kyisinga kyapfo momu, kui ufoṟo chandu ugambie.
42002030	Kyipfa meso gako gawona wukyiro wopfo,
42002031	ulewuṟeyeṟia wandu woose;
42002032	Ngyeela yelyimika Masanga, na iwa mng'ano o wandu wapfo Isiraelyi.”
42002033	Na awuye na wamae waweiṟiyio kyipfa kya isho shileṙeṙo kyipfa kyakye.
42002034	Simion kawawikyia mboṟa, kawia Maria, wamae, “Ichu nammbikye kyipfa kya ioloka na igoṟoka lya wandu wafoi wakyeri Isiraelyi, na iwa kyindo kya maṟiyisho kyechiṙeṙo uwicho.
42002035	Na iyoe kumonyi, kyechiwa cha ilyi ushu loiṙa na mrimenyi kopfo, kundu mrima ya wandu wafoi igalutso.”
42002036	Kuwewoṙe moonguo shisuku o kyika, ekyelago Ana, mana o Fanuelyi, o ushari lo Asheri, na maka yakye iwefoi. Nalekoamkaa na mii maka mfungaaṙe wookyia kyiyeri alealyiko.
42002037	Na oe nyi mka mkusu o maka makumi nyanya na ina, ekyewuka hekalunyi-pfo, indi nyi iterewa Ruwa kyio na kyingoto echikuretekyia na iterewa.
42002038	Ichu nalecha kyiyeri kyilya kyilya kaana Ruwa, na woose waweiweṙelyia wukyiṟo kulya Yerusalemu kawawia mbonyi tsakye.
42002039	Na kyiyeri walemarisa iwuta shoose chandu kyikyigambe mawawasonyi ga Mndumii, walewuya na Galyilaya mṟasa mṟinyi kowo, Nasareti.
42002040	Mana ulya kang'ana, kaengyeṟika pfinya, aichuo wuṟango na isaṟia lya Ruwa lyiwei wuye yakye.
42002041	Kyasia, wafee wakye wekyeyenda Yerusalemu orio maka, kyiyeri kya mfiri ung'anyi o Pasaka.
42002042	Na kyiyeri alesutsa maka ikumi na iwi, waleṙo chandu kyiwekyeri mwichiwie o mfiri ung'anyi.
42002043	Na mfiri yawo yekaa Yerusalemu yamsie, kyiyeri kya iwuya lyawo, mana ulya Yesu naleṙio numa kulya Yerusalemu, na wafee wakye waweichi-pfo.
42002044	Nawo wakakusaṟa kye nakyeri wandunyi, wakayenda handu ha mfiri umwi, wechimpfula wandunyi wa kyishari kyakye na woṙiao,
42002045	na lyilya walalemmbona, wakawuya na Yerusalemu wechimpfula.
42002046	Na hamwiṙe mfiri iṟaṟu wakammbona hekalunyi, aṙamie makyiṙi-gawi ga walosha, echiwaaṙanyia na iwawesa shindo.
42002047	Na woose waleicho shilya awegamba waleṟiyio kyipfa kya wuṟango wokye na chandu aweiwagaluo.
42002048	Lyilya walemmbona waleṟiyio, na wamae kammbia, “Mono-ko, ny'kyilyi oluwutia kuṙi? Awuyo na inyi luwekupfula luwoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi.”
42002049	Kawawia, “Kyitewe mungyipfula ny'kyi? Muichi kyangyikooya ikaa numbenyi ya Awu oko?”
42002050	Nawo walemanya kyindo-kyo alewawia-pfo.
42002051	Kayenda nawo mṟasa Nasareti, na oe nawekyewaindia; na wamae kawika isho shoose mrimenyi kokye.
42002052	Na Yesu kang'ana, echiengeṟika wuṟango, echichihiṟa Ruwa na wandu.
42003001	Maka o ikumi na kataanu o ichilyia lya Kaisari Tiberia, kyiyeri Pontio Pilato awei mchilyi o Uyuda, na Herode mangyi o Galyilaya, na Filyipo, mana o wamae, mangyi o Iturea na uruka lo Tirakoniti, na Lyisania, mangyi o Abilene,
42003002	kyiyeri kya wukohanyi wung'anyi wo Anasi na Kayafa, Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyileshika ko Yohane mana o Sakaria, kundu kuumu suwaa kulawoṙe maa mṟinga.
42003003	Kashika urukyenyi loose lukyeri kufuhi na Yoridan echionguo mbonyi tsa wupatiso wokyeende iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi na ihooṟio maṙeko.
42003004	Chandu kyikyiṟeie kyitapunyi kya moonguo shisuku Yesaya, “Ṟui lya mndu aieṟeṟia nuka, ‘Ṟeyeṟenyi njia ya Mndumii, goṟotsenyi kundu echiiṙia.
42003005	Orio pichi lyechiichuṟo, na orio fumvu na kyifumvu kyechititiṟo; handu haleme hechigoṟoka, na halaharendekyeri herendekyia.
42003006	Na wandu woose wechiwona wukyiṟo wo Mndumii.’ ”
42003007	Kyasia kawia wuingyi wo wandu walya waleyenda kokye kundu nawapatise, “Nyoe maalea ga njoka, nyi wui alemuikyimbia nyoe iṙicha nyashi-yo iicha?
42003008	Kyasia kumbienyi ndunda tsifananyi na iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi; maa mulagambe mrimenyi konyu kye muwoṙe awu, nyi oe Abrahamu, kyipfa ngammbia kye, iwuka kunu magoenyi Ruwa nechiiṙima ienenga Abrahamu wana.
42003009	Na wulalu kuṙi soka lyilyiwikyie matsindenyi ga mashiṙi. Kyasia orio ikyiṙi lyilaikumbia ndunda ngyicha lyechimanyo na iwiyitso moṙonyi.”
42003010	Wuingyi wulya wo wandu wukommbesa, “Kyasia luwikye kuṙa?”
42003011	Kagaluo, echiwawia, “Awoṙe kanzu tsiwi naenengye ulya alawoṙe kanzu; na awoṙe shelya nawewute kuṙo.”
42003012	Wesania ukamba nawo wakacha ipatiso, wakammbesa, “Mlosha, luwikye kuṙa soe?”
42003013	Kawawia, “Maa mularikye ngoseṟa ya ikyo muwawie.”
42003014	Asikari nawo wakammbesa, wechigamba, “A soe luwikye kuṙa?” Kawawia, “Mulaṙuo kyindo kya mndu ko pfinya, maa mulaṙuo mndu mengyenyi kyipfa kya shindo sha wongo, ngoseṟa shikonyi na shilya muitoo cha wori wonyu.”
42003015	Kyasia, lyilya wandu waweiweṙelyia kyindo kyechiwutika, woose wechikusaṟa mrimenyi kowo mbonyi tsa Yohane, kokooya oe nyi oe Kristo,
42003016	Yohane nalegaluo kawia woose, “Loi inyi ngyimupatisa kui mṟinga, kyaindi naicha mndu awoṙe pfinya kuta inyi, ngilechiiṙima maa ituruchuo ngowa tsa shiaṙu shakye. Oe nemupatisa kui Mumuyo Mweele na kui moṙo.
42003017	Oe indo lyakye lyeela shindo lyikeri kuwokonyi kokye, na oe nechiaia muului oose handu hakye heelyia shindo, na isania nganu yakye kyikumbinyi indi muului nechiurumatsa moṙonyi ulekyeruma.”
42003018	Kyasia, kui shindo shifoi shetutuma naleongoya wandu mbonyi ngyicha.
42003019	Kyaindi lyilya mangyi Herode aleṙeṙio nyi Yohane kyipfa kya Herodia, mka o mono-wamae, na mawicho goose Herode alewuta,
42003020	naleengyeṟa-se na wuwicho wungyi wuye ya shoose, kawika Yohane kyipfungonyi.
42003021	Kyikawa-ng'u wandu woose wampatiso, na Yesu ampatiso na oe naiterewa, mapuchi galeseia.
42003022	Mumuyo Mweele kasokyia wuye yakye kui mfano o mmbiu cha mbuna; ṟui lyikawuka Ruwewu, “Iyoe nyi Mana oko, mkunde oko, ngyimchihiye kyipfa kyapfo.”
42003023	Na Yesu amonyi, kyiyeri alewooka ilosha, nawewoṙe cha maka makumi gaṟaaṟu, echikusaṟo kye nyi mana o Yosefu, o Elyi.
42003024	O Matati, o Lewi, o Melyikyi, o Yana, o Yosefu.
42003025	O Matatia, o Amosi, o Nahomu, o Esilyi, o Nakai.
42003026	O Maati, o Matatia, o Semei, o Yosefu, o Yuda.
42003027	O Yoana, o Resa, o Serubabelyi, o Shealyitielyi, o Neri.
42003028	O Melyikyi, o Adi, o Kosamu, o Elyimadamu, o Eri.
42003029	O Yosua, o Elyieseri, o Yorimu, o Matati, o Lewi.
42003030	O Simion, o Yuda, o Yosefu, o Yonamu, o Elyiakyimu.
42003031	O Melea, o Mena, o Matata, o Natan, o Dawidi.
42003032	O Yese, o Obedi, o Boasi, o Salyimone, o Nashon.
42003033	O Aminadabu, o Aramu, o Hesiron, o Peresi, o Yuda.
42003034	O Yakobo, o Isakyi, o Abrahamu, o Tera, o Nahori.
42003035	O Seṟuikyi, o Rakau, o Pelekyi, o Eberi, o Sala.
42003036	O Kyenan, o Arifakyisadi, o Semu, o Noe, o Lamekyi.
42003037	O Metusela, o Enokyi, o Yaredi, o Mahalalelyi, o Kyenan.
42003038	O Enosi, o Seti, o Adamu, o Ruwa.
42004001	Na Yesu, amwichuṟo nyi Mumuyo Mweele nalewuya iwuka Yoridan, kaṙoo nyi Mumuyo Mweele kyiyeri kya mfiri makumi gaana kundu ko nuka,
42004002	echiyesho nyi Mokyiriinzi. Na mfiri-yo nawekuretekyia; na kyiyeri mfiri yekuretekyia ilesia nalewoṙo nyi njaa.
42004003	Mokyiriinzi kammbia, “Kokooya iyoe nyi mana o Ruwa, wia igoe-lyi lyiwe mkate.”
42004004	Yesu kamgaluo, “Kyikyiṟeie kye mndu echiwona moo kui mkate tikyi-pfo.”
42004005	Kamṙosia wuye, kamloṟa ngyuuchilyi tsoose tsa wuyana ko kyiyeri kyifuhi.
42004006	Mokyiriinzi kammbia, “Ishi shoose ngyechikuenenga, na wung'anyi wosho kyipfa nyi shako na inyi ngyekyeenenga orio mndu chandu ngakunda.
42004007	Kyasia iyoe kongyiindia shoose shechiwa shapfo.”
42004008	Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Kyikyiṟeie ‘India Mndumii Ruwa opfo, umterewe oe amonyi.’ ”
42004009	Kamṙuo mṟasa Yerusalemu, kammbikyia wuye ya uweri lo hekalu, kammbia, “Kokooya iyoe nyi mana o Ruwa kuwiyitse wanda;
42004010	kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, ‘Nechikuṙikyia malaika wakye wakuringye;’ ”
42004011	na kye, “Mawokonyi gawo wechikuwaṙa ulachekapa ṙende igoenyi.”
42004012	Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, kyikyigambe, “Ulayeshe Mndumii Ruwa opfo.”
42004013	Kyasia Mokyiriinzi ammarise shiyesho shoose, kamleka ko kyiyeri kyifuhi.
42004014	Yesu kawuya kui pfinya tsa Mumuyo, kayenda Galyilaya; mbonyi tsakye tsikaṙunganana ngyuurukyenyi tsoose tsa mṟasenyi.
42004015	Na oe naweiloshia masinagoginyi gawo, echiṟumisho nyi wandu woose.
42004016	Kayenda Nasareti, halya-ndu aleembeṟio na mfiri o onyonya kaiṙa na sinagoginyi chandu aweichiwie, kagoṟoka kundu nasome.
42004017	Kaenengyio kyitapu kya moonguo shisuku Yesaya, kakyitaṟahuo, kapfula handu haṟeie,
42004018	“Mumuyo o Mndumii nai wuye yako, kyipfa nalengyishumbuo iongoya wakyiwa mbonyi ngyicha nalengyiṙuma iongoya wapfungo kya ilekyio lyawo, na shipfupfuṟe iiṙima iwona-se. Na iashuo walya wawailame.
42004019	Na ionguo kya maka o Mndumii umteseṟe.”
42004020	Kapfunga kyitapu kyilya kakyienengyia mṟundi ulya, kaṙamia; na wandu woose wawei kulya sinagoginyi wakamwitukuya karii.
42004021	Kawooka iwawia, “Inu shiṟeio-shi shaafukyia maṙwinyi ganyu.”
42004022	Wakamṟingyishia woose, wechiṟiyio kyipfa kya shindo sha isaṟia aleṙeṙa, wakagamba, “Ichu chi mana o Yosefu-pfoe?”
42004023	Kawawia, “Nyi loi mochingyiwia mṙeṙie-chu kye mganga, kukyiṟe kumonyi; mbonyi tsoose luleicho kye tsilewutika Kaperinaumu, uwetsiwute taa iha urukyenyi lopfo kumonyi.”
42004024	Kagamba, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia kye, kuwoṙe moonguo shisuku ekyeiṙikyio urukyenyi lokye amonyi-pfo.”
42004025	Kyaindi, kyaloi ngyimmbia, “Kuwewoṙe waka wakusu wafoi urukyenyi lo Isiraelyi kacha kyiyeri kya Elyiya, lyilya ngyina tsileshingo tsilawute mvuo kyiyeri kya maka iṟaṟu na mori iṟandaaṟu, uruka loose lukowaṙa njaa ing'anyi.
42004026	Maa Elyiya aleṙumo ko umwi o wakusu-wo-pfo, indi ko mka umwi mkusu o Serepta urukyenyi lo Sidon.
42004027	Ngoseṟa, kuwewoṙe wandu wafoi wawewoṙo nyi taambo urukyenyi lo Isiraelyi nyi kacha kyiyeri kya moonguo shisuku Elyisha, maa kuwoṙe aleilyish sile nyi Naiman, mndu o Shamu-pfo.”
42004028	Wakaicho nyashi woose wawei kulya sinagoginyi kyiyeri waleicho isho.
42004029	Wakamfuna na nja ya mṟi, wakamṙuo mṟasa wuye ya fumvu handu mṟi owo ummbikye kundu wammbiyitse wanda.
42004030	Kyaindi oe naleiṙa makyiṙi-gawi gawo kayenda.
42004031	Kasoka mṟasa Kaperinaumu, mṟi o Galyilaya, kawalosha mfiri o onyonya.
42004032	Wakaṟiyio mnu kyipfa kya malosho gakye, kyipfa ṙeṙo lyakye lyiwewoṙe pfinya.
42004033	Na kulya sinagoginyi kuwewoṙe mndu awewoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho. Kafiiṟa kui ṟui lying'anyi,
42004034	echigamba, “Leka! Lokukyi, Yesu o Nasareti? Nocha ilurumatsa? Ngyikuichi iyoe nyi wui, Mweele o Ruwa.”
42004035	Yesu kamṙeṙia echigamba, “Tsia, mmbukye.” Naaho-ng'u mṟufui ulya mmbicho kamwolotsa makyiṙi-gawi kammbuka kulawoṙe immbutia kyindo kyiwicho.
42004036	Wakaṟiyio woose, wakawesana, wechigamba, “Kyindo-kyi nyi kya mbaṟe iha, kyipfa naiṙeṙia waṟufui wawicho ko pfinya na wuiṙimi, wakawuka.”
42004037	Mbonyi tsakye tsikaṙunganana koose kulya urukyenyi.
42004038	Kawuka kulya sinagoginyi, kaiṙa na kanyi ko Simion. Na mamka o Simion, nawewoṙo nyi isemu, wakamterewa kyipfa kyakye.
42004039	Kagoṟoka kufuhi na oe, kaṙeṙia isemu lyilya, lyikamleka; cha ilyi kafuma, kawaṟundia.
42004040	Na lyilya kuleila, wandu woose wawewoṙe wandu waluoe ndoṟe tsa mbaṟe tsoose walewaende na kokye, kayekyia mawoko wuye ya orio umwi owo kawakyiṟa.
42004041	Waṟufui wawicho nawo wakawuka ko wandu wafoi; wechikalagatsa na igamba, “Iyoe nyi Mana o Ruwa.” Kawaṙeṙia, alawalekyie iṙeṙa, kyipfa walemmanya kye oe nyi Kristo.
42004042	Na lyilya kulekya nalefuma kayenda handu halawoṙe wandu, wuingyi wo wandu waweimpfula wakashika kokye, wakatambagana imshingyia alawukye kowo.
42004043	Kawawia, “Kyangyikooya ionguo Mbonyi Ngyicha tsa Wumangyi wo Ruwa mṟi ingyi taa, kyipfa nyi kyipfa kya ikyo ngyileṙumo.”
42004044	Kyasia, naweionguo Mbonyi Ngyicha masinagoginyi ga Galyilaya.
42005001	Kyiyeri awekyeri mbai ya ipalyipalyi lya Kyenesareti wuingyi wo wandu wukokuumbia kufui iaṙanyia Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na oe alawone maa handu hegalukyia.
42005002	Kawona ngalawa tsiwi tsikyeri mbai ya nduwa, kyaindi weṙeia makunga waweisanja ndusu tsawo.
42005003	Kaiṙa na ngalawenyi imwi, nayo nyi ya Simion, kammbia, naiṙuo kuleshi kyitutu na halya mbai ya nduwa iya. Kaṙamia, kalosha wuingyi wo wandu akyeri ngalawenyi.
42005004	Na ammarise iṙeṙa, nalewia Simion, “Ṙuonyi ngalawa mṟasa handu nduwa iyendie wanda kuta hengyi, musotse ndusu tsanyu muwaṙe makunga.”
42005005	Simion kagaluo, kagamba, “Mndumii, ang'anyi, luwinie kyio kyoose lulawone kyindo, kyaindi kui ṙeṙo lyapfo ngyesotsia ndusu nduwenyi.”
42005006	Kyasia; wammbute kuṙo wakawaṙa makunga gafoi mnu, ndusu tsawo tsikawooka iṙumbuka.
42005007	Wakatsinia walya waweiṟunda nawo wawekyeri kulya ngalawenyi ya kawi, wachewatarama. Wakacha, wakaichuṟa ngalawa tsilya tsitsiwi, mṟasa tsikakyiṟesoṟowia.
42005008	Simion Petiro ammbone kuṙo, naleoloka maṙendenyi ga Yesu, echigamba, “Wuka koko, kyipfa inyi nyi mndu mnyamaṟi, Mndumii.”
42005009	Kyipfa naleṟiyio, oe na walya wawei na oe woose, kyipfa kya chandu walewaṙa makunga gafoi.
42005010	Na wuṙo taa kyilewa ko wana wa Sebedayo, wawekyeṟunda hamwi na Simion. Yesu kawia Simion, “Ulaowuoe. Wookyia wulalu nowamoṙega wandu.”
42005011	Na wammbikyie ngalawa tsawo mbai ya ipalyipalyi, wakaṙa shoose wakamwosha.
42005012	Na kyiyeri awei mṟinyi umwi kyiiṙi kya mṟi iya hawewoṙe mndu awoṙo nyi taambo. Na oe lyilya alewona Yesu naleoloka na ndewu, kamterewa echigamba, “Mndumii, kokunda, nochiiṙima ingyiilyisha.”
42005013	Na oe kagoṟuo kuwoko kokye, kampaaya echigamba, “Ngyikundi, ila.” Cha ilyi taambo lyakye lyikammbuka.
42005014	Kamwima alawie mndu, indi kammbia, “Yenda undekuloṟa ko mkohanyi; undewuta ko iilyiro lyapfo chandu Mose agambie, kyiwe wuṟingyishi kowo.”
42005015	Kyaindi mbonyi tsakye tsikaengyeṟa iṙunganana, wuingyi wufoi wo wandu wakasanzia handu hamwi, wamwaṙanyie na ikyiṟo ndoṟe tsawo.
42005016	Kyaindi oe nalelekana nawo, kayenda handu halawoṙe wandu, kandeterewa.
42005017	Na kyiyeri kyilya naweilosha, na Mafarisayo na walosha wa uwawaso waweṙamie ho, wawewukyie orio kyikaṟo kya Galyilaya, na Uyuda, na Yerusalemu. Na pfinya tsa Mndumii tsiwekyeri ho kundu naiṙime ikyiṟa.
42005018	Wakacha wandu waṙuṙe mndu kyitaṟenyi awoṙe ndoṟe ya ipfa ngapfu ura lumwi wakundi imṙuo numba wammbikyie mbele yakye.
42005019	Na lyilya waleuṟa ṙaawa lyemṙuo numba kyipfa kya wuingyi wulya wo wandu, waleṙooya kai, wakatocha kai iya, wakamsotsa oe na kyitaṟa kyakye makyiṙi-gawi mbele ya Yesu.
42005020	Na oe lyilya alewona iiṙikyia lyawo, nalewia ulya aluoe, “Mbuya-ko, omhooṟio maṙeko gapfo.”
42005021	Kyasia walosha walya wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo wakawooka iwesana, wechigamba, “Nyi wui ichu ailahia Ruwa? Nyi wui echiiṙima ihooṟia ngyuunyamaṟi sile nyi Ruwa amonyi?”
42005022	Na Yesu aichi makusaṟo gawo, kagamba, “Ny'kyilyi mukusaṟa shiwicho mrimenyi konyu?
42005023	Kyipfa nyi kyiha kyii kyaangu, nyi igamba ‘Omhooṟio ngyuunyamaṟi tsapfo,’ ang'u nyi igamba, ‘Amka uyende?’
42005024	Kyaindi muiṙime imanya kye Mono-Adamu nawoṙe wuchilyi wuyanenyi wo hooṟia ngyuunyamaṟi, (nalewia ulya awoṙe ndoṟe ya ipfa ngapfu ura lumwi) ‘Ngakuwia, amka ukuṙikye kyitaṟa kyapfo uyende kanyi kopfo.’ ”
42005025	Cha ilyi kagoṟoka mbele yawo, kakuṙika kyilya awelee wuye yakyo, kayenda kanyi kokye, echiana Mndumii.
42005026	Wakaṟiyio woose, wakang'anyisa Ruwa; wakawoṙo nyi wuowu, wechigamba, “Inu lowona mbonyi tsa maṟiyisho.”
42005027	Numa ya isho kawuka pfo kawona mosania ukamba, ekyelago Lewi, aṙamie handu hesania ukamba, kammbia, “Ngyiosha.”
42005028	Kaṙa shoose, kaamka kamwosha.
42005029	Na Lewi kamwachikyia shelya shifoi kanyi kokye. Napfo kuwewoṙe wuingyi wufoi wo wesania ukamba na wandu wengyi waweilya hamwi nawo.
42005030	Mafarisayo na walosha wawo wa mawawaso wakanunuwia wanalosho wakye, wechigamba, “Ny'kyilyi muilya na inyo hamwi na wesania ukamba na wanyamaṟi?”
42005031	Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Walya walaluoe wekyepfula mganga-pfo, sile walya waluoe.
42005032	Ngyilecha ilaga walya wasumganyi-pfo indi wanyamaṟi waiṙime iṙumbuya.”
42005033	Nawo wakammbia, “Wanalosho wa Yohane wekyekuretekyia kafong'ui na iterewa. Na wuṙo taa wanalosho wa Mafarisayo; kyaindi wanalosho wapfo wekyelya na inyo!”
42005034	Kyaindi Yesu kawawia, “Mochiiṙima kuṙa iwia wandu walage wolyinyi wakuretekyie wakyeri na monyi wolyi?
42005035	Kyaindi kochicha mfiri monyi wolyi echiwuto kowo; nyi lyo-ndu wechikuretekyia.”
42005036	Kawawia mfano, “Kuwoṙe mndu ekyewika kyiṙami kya nguwo ngihya nguwonyi ngyiku-pfo. Na kokooya awika naṙumbuo iya ngyihya, na kyiṙami kya nguwo iya ngyihya kyechiwa cha kyilya kyiku-pfo.
42005037	Maa kuwoṙe mndu ekyewika mpfinyo mhya maselelenyi maku-pfo. Na kokooya awika pfo, mpfinyo ulya mhya opaṟa maselela galya, mpfinyo-cho ukopusuka, na maselela gakanyamaṟika.
42005038	Kyaindi kyiwaṟi iwika mpfinyo mhya maselelenyi mahya.
42005039	Maa kuwoṙe mndu ekyenyo mpfinyo o kacha kalanga mhya-pfo; kyipfa negamba ulya o kacha nyicho ui mcha.”
42006001	Kyasia mfiri o onyonya Yesu naweiiṙa maṙemenyi na wanalosho wakye wakawooka itumuo magaa ga nganu na igasusa-susa mawokonyi gawo wakalya.
42006002	Naaho-ng'u Mafarisayo waata wakawawia, “Ny'kyilyi muiṟunda kyilai kya sungusinyi mfiri o onyonya?”
42006003	Yesu kawagaluo, kawawia, “Mulekulosha ikyo Dawidi alewuta, lyilya alewoṙo nyi njaa, oe na oṙoe?
42006004	Chandu aleiṙa na numbenyi ya Ruwa, kalya mkate iya ngyiele, kaenenga na oṙoe kyilawaṟi iilya sile nyi makohanyi wawenyi.”
42006005	Kawawia, “Mono-Adamu nyi oe Mndumii o mfiri o onyonya.”
42006006	Kyasia mfiri ungyi o onyonya naleiṙa na sinagoginyi kalosha, napfo kuwewoṙe mndu awewoṙe kuwoko ko kulyoe kupfiie ngapfu.
42006007	Na walosha wa mawawaso hamwi na Mafarisayo waweimṙega kundu wawone kokooya nekyiṟa mndu mfiri a onyonya; kundu waiṙime iwona kyindo kyemmbusia uwingo.
42006008	Kyaindi oe kamanya makusaṟo gawo, kawia ulya awoṙe kuwoko kupfiie ngapfu, “Nnjo goṟoka iha makyiṙi-gawi.” Kagoṟoka.
42006009	Naaho-ng'u Yesu kawawesa, “Nyi sungusinyi iṟunda mecha mfiri o onyonya, ang'u iṟunda mawicho? Ikyiṟa mrima ang'u iurumatsa?”
42006010	Kawaitukuya woose echiambuya ngyuura tsoose, kawia mndu ulya, “Goṟuo kuwoko kopfo.” Kagoṟuo kuwoko, kukochia na iwaṙa pfinya cha kuwooka.
42006011	Wakasuo mnu, wakawesana wo wenyi ko wenyi wawutie kyi Yesu.
42006012	Kyasia mfiri iya naleyenda fumvunyi kundu nandeterewa, kalaa kyiṙombo kyio kyoose echiterewa Ruwa.
42006013	Na kyiyeri kya kyingoto kalaga wanalosho wakye; kasambuṟa ikumi na wawi kyiiṙi kyawo, kawalaga wasu.
42006014	Simion, ulya alemlaga rina lya kawi Petiro, Anderea, mono-wamae, Yakobo na Yohane, Filyipo na Baritolomayo.
42006015	Na Matayo, Tomasi, Yakobo o Alyifayo, na Simion ekyelago Selote.
42006016	Na Yuda o Yakobo, na Yuda Isikariote, na oe nyi oe alemṟiinga.
42006017	Kasoka hamwi nawo, kagoṟoka handu ha rendewele, hamwi na wanalosho wakye wafoi. Na wuingyi wo wandu walewuka Uyuda koose na Yerusalemu, na mbai ya Tiro na Sidon; walecha imwaṙanyia na ikyiṟo ndoṟe tsawo.
42006018	Na walya waweituuro nyi waṟufui wawicho walekyiṟo.
42006019	Na wuingyi wulya woose wuwekundi impaaya kyipfa pfinya tsekyiṟa tsiwewuka kokye na ikyiṟa woose.
42006020	Kapaluo meso kaambuya wanalosho wakye, kagamba, “Wagusu nyoe mui wakyiwa wa mrima, kyipfa Wumangyi wo Ruwewu nyi wonyu.
42006021	Wagusu nyoe muwoṙo nyi njaa wulalu, kyipfa mochiiguṙa. Wagusu nyoe muifiiṟa wulalu, kyipfa mochiseka.”
42006022	“Wagusu nyoe ilyi wandu wemsuo, na imshingyia nja, na imlahia, na inyamaṟa rina lyanyu, kyipfa kya Mono-Adamu.
