42006023	Chihiyonyi mfiri-cho na ishoonga-shonga, kyipfa wori wonyu wung'anyi Ruwewu, kyipfa nyi wuṙo waawu wawo walewutia weonguo shisuku.
42006024	Kyaindi, ochia lonyu muwoṙe masaa, kyipfa wori wonyu mulemuambilyia.
42006025	Ochia lonyu nyoe muigutsu wulalu kyipfa mochiicho njaa. Ochia lonyu nyoe muiseka wulalu, kyipfa mochikapa ṟanyi na ifiiṟa.
42006026	Ochia lonyu nyoe ilyi wandu woose wechimuenenga kyiṟumi, kyipfa nyi wuṙo waku wawo walewutia weonguo shisuku wa wongo.”
42006027	“Kyaindi ngyimmbia nyoe muingyiaṙanyia, kundenyi washituwa wanyu, wutienyi mecha walya wamsuuye nyoe.
42006028	Wikyienyi mboṟa walya waimpfulutsa nyashi, terewienyi walya waimuilama nyoe.
42006029	Mndu kakukapa ura lumwi, mgalutsie ura lo kawi, na mndu akusoka ijoho lyapfo, ulamwime maa iwale.
42006030	Enenga orio mndu akuterewa, na mndu akusoka shindo shapfo maa ulalangye nakuwiyiṟie.
42006031	Na kyilya mukundi wandu wammbutie nyoe, na wuṙo mochiwawutia.
42006032	Kyipfa mukokunda walya wamukundi nyoe, moloṟa kyi? Kyipfa maa wanyamaṟi na wuṙo wekyekunda walya wawakundi.
42006033	Na nyoe mukowutia shicha walya wekyemmbutia shicha moloṟa kyi? Maa wanyamaṟi na wuṙo wekyewuta.
42006034	Mukoakuya mndu kyindo na kunu mukundi iwona kyindo kowo moloṟa kyi? Maa wanyamaṟi wekyeakuya wanyamaṟi kundu wawiyiṟio wuṙo.
42006035	Indi kundenyi washituwa wanyu. Wutenyi shicha, na mukoakuya mulakunde itoo kyindo, na wori wonyu woching'ana. Na nyoe mochiwa wana wa ai wuye, kyipfa oe namcha ko walya walekyemwana, na wawicho.
42006036	Kyasia, wenyi wandu wekyehooṟia chandu Awu-yonyu ai mohooṟia.”
42006037	“Maa mulaanduye, na nyoe mochianduyo-pfo. Mulagambe kye wandu wengyi wawawicho kundu mulagambo kye muwawicho. Lekyienyi na nyoe mochilekyio.
42006038	Enengyenyi wandu shindo, na nyoe mochienengo. Kyiyeṟo kyiichuo na itsindo, na ipaayo-payo mṟasa ipusuka, nyikyo wandu wechimuenenga nyoe. Kyipfa kyiyeṟo kyilya kyilya mochiyeṟa ny'kyo mochiyeṟio.”
42006039	Kawawia mṙeṙie, “Ngyesa kyipfupfuṟe kyechiiṙima isongoya kyipfupfuṟe? Shechioloka mkuwenyi shoose shishiwi-pfoe?
42006040	Manalosho ekyeng'ania mlosha okye-pfo, kyaindi orio mndu aafutsia nechiwa cha mlosha okye.
42006041	Kyasia, ny'kyilyi uiambuya kyiunana kyikyeri risonyi lya mono-womoo, na mriti-cho ukyeri ipfo risonyi lyapfo ulauambuye?
42006042	Ang'u nowia kuṙa mono-womoo, ngyileka ngyiwute kyiunana ipfo risonyi kopfo ulaiambuya mriti ukyeri ipfo risonyi lyapfo kumonyi? Iyoe mkulembecheṟi, wuta kuwooka mriti-cho ipfo risonyi lyapfo, naaho-ng'u ochiwona necha iwuta kyiunana kyilya kyikyeri risonyi lya mono-womoo.”
42006043	“Kyipfa kuwoṙe ikyiṙi lyicha lyekyekumbia ndunda ngyiwicho-pfo; maa ikyiṙi lyiwicho lyekyekumbia ndunda ngyicha-pfo.
42006044	Kyipfa orio ikyiṙi lyekyemanyika kui ndunda tsalyo; kyipfa wandu wekyehaa sabibu mshenyi ang'u ndunda ngyicha tseloṙa nduonyi-pfo.
42006045	Mndu mcha kyiseyesoenyi kyicha nekyewuta shicha. Na mndu mmbicho kyiseyesoenyi kyiwicho nekyewuta shiwicho. Kyipfa ṙumbu lya mndu lyekyeṙeṙa shilya shiichuṟie mrima okye.”
42006046	“Ny'kyilyi mungyilaga, Mndumii, Mndumii, kyaindi mulawute shilya ngyigamba?
42006047	Orio mndu echa na koko na iaṙanyia maṙeṙo gako na igaosha, ngyemuloṟa mfano okye.
42006048	Mfano okye nyi cha mndu alewika numba, kasuma wanda na iwika urende wuye ya iṟaṟa; na kyiyeri kulecha mra ung'anyi, mfu ukokapa numba iya ko pfinya, ulaiṙime iiolotsa, kyipfa ingyiwikye necha.
42006049	Kyaindi ulya aleicho alawute kuṙo, mfano okye nyi cha mndu alewika numba handu halawoṙe iṟaṟa, mfu ukosoka ko pfinya, ikaoloka cha ilyi; na inyamaṟo lyayo lyikawa lying'anyi.”
42007001	Na kyiyeri alemarisa iwawia maṙeṙo gakye goose naleiṙa na Kaperinaumu.
42007002	Na mṟundi o mchilyi umwi naweluoe mnu, kufuhi na ipfa; na oe nawemkundi mnu.
42007003	Kyiyeri aleicho mbonyi tsa Yesu, naleṙuma wameeku wa Kyiyuda kokye imterewa nache nakyiṟe mṟundi okye.
42007004	Nawo kyiyeri waleshika ko Yesu, walemterewa mnu, wechigamba, “Ichu nawaṟi ummbutie kyindo-kyi,
42007005	kyipfa nakundi mnu wandu waṙu na oe naleluwikyia sinagogi.”
42007006	Kyasia Yesu kayenda hamwi nawo. Na lyilya awei kufuhi na numba ya mchilyi ulya, mchilyi ulya naleṙuma mbuya yakye ko Yesu, kammbia, “Mndumii, maa ulakuwinishe, kyipfa inyi ngyiwaṟi iyoe uiṙe na numba koko-pfo.
42007007	Koikyo ngyilewona kyingyiwaṟi icha ngyimonyi na kopfo-pfo; kyaindi gamba ṙeṙo lyimwi tikyi, na mṟundi oko nechichia.
42007008	Cha kyipfa inyi nyi mndu ngyiwoṙe wuchilyi. Ngyiwoṙe asikari wanda yako; ngawia ichu ‘yenda’; na ichu ‘nnjo’ nekyecha; na kyisinga kyako, ‘wuta kuṙi’, kyekyewuta.”
42007009	Kyiyeri Yesu aleicho isho, naleṟiyio, kaindukyia wuingyi wulya wo wandu, kawia walya wawemwosha, “Ngammbia ngyilandewone iiṙikyia lying'anyi kuṙi, kunu Isiraelyi-pfo.”
42007010	Na walya waleṙumo kyiyeri walewuya na kanyi, wakakooya mṟundi ulya amchia.
42007011	Numa ya iho naleyenda mṟasa mṟi umwi okyelago Nain, na wanalosho wakye hamwi na wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wukooshana na oe.
42007012	Na kyiyeri aletikyira kufuhi na moongo o mṟi, hawewoṙe mndu apfiie aweiṙoo nja, nyi kyimuumwi kya mndu mka umwi mkusu, na wandu wafoi wa mṟi ulya wawei hamwi na oe.
42007013	Kyiyeri Mndumii alemmbona nalewoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi kammbia, “Maa ulafiiṟe.”
42007014	Katikyira, kapaaya jeneza lyilya; walya wawelyiṙuṙe wakatirima. Kagamba, “Manakye, ngakuwia, amka.”
42007015	Ulya awepfiie kaamka, kaṙamia, kawooka iṙeṙa. Kamwenengyia wamae.
42007016	Wuowu wukowawaṙa woose, wakaṟumisha Ruwa, wechigamba, “Moonguo shisuku ang'anyi nacha na koṙu, na Ruwa naambuya wandu wakye.”
42007017	Mbonyi-tsi tsakye tsikaṙunganana Uyuda koose, na ngyuuruka tsoose tsa mṟasenyi.
42007018	Wanalosho wa Yohane wakamwendie mbonyi tsa isho shoose.
42007019	Naaho Yohane kalaga wawi kyiiṙi kya wanalosho wakye, kawaṙuma ko Yesu, echiwesa, “Iyoe nyi ulya aicha, ang'u luweṙelyie ungyi?”
42007020	Nawo kyiyeri waleshika kokye, walegamba, “Yohane Mpatisi naluṙuma kopfo, echigamba, ‘Iyoe nyi ulya aicha, ang'u luweṙelyie ungyi?’ ”
42007021	Na kyiyeri kyilya kyilya nalekyiṟa wandu wafoi ndoṟe tsawo, na wawaolokyie nyi ngyuukyiwa, na waṟufui wawicho, na shipfupfuṟe shifoi shikaiṙima iwona.
42007022	Naaho-ng'u kagaluo, kawawia, “Yendenyi mundeongoya Yohane shilya mushiicho na ishiwona. Shipfupfuṟe shienengo iwona, shileeta shichumia, wawoṙo nyi taambo waiilyiṟo, wapfu maṙwi waiicho, wapfu waiṟutso, na wakyiwa waiongoyo Mbonyi Ngyicha.
42007023	Agusu orio mndu alammbihie kyipfa kyako.”
42007024	Kyasia wanalosho wa Yohane wamuyende, Yesu nalewooka iongoya wuingyi wo wandu mbonyi tsa Yohane, “Mulefuma iyenda nuka iambuya-pfo kyi? Unyatsi lochiṙeṙemsho nyi mkuma?
42007025	Kyaindi mulefuma indewona kyi? Mndu amṟikye nguwo tsa wusuṟi? Manyenyi kye wandu waṟee nguwo tsa wusuṟi wakyeri numbenyi tsa kyimangyi.
42007026	Kyaindi mulefuma indewona kyikyi? Nyi iwona moonguo shisuku? Yee loi ngammbia, na akyeri ang'anyi kuta moonguo shisuku.
42007027	Ichu nyi oe shiṟeio shilegamba, ‘Ngyiṙuma mndu oko mbele ya ushangu lopfo, echisungusia njia yapfo mbele yapfo.’ ”
42007028	“Inyi ngammbia, kyiiṙi kya walya wawafee nyi waka kuwoṙe ang'anyi kuta Yohane Mpatisi-pfo. Kyaindi akyeri mtutu Wumangyinyi wo Ruwewu nang'anyi kuta oe.”
42007029	Wandu woose na wesania ukamba kyiyeri waleicho isho, waleṟingyishia loi ya Ruwa kyipfa walepatiso wupatiso wo Yohane.
42007030	Kyaindi Mafarisayo na walosha wa mawawaso, walelega iwuta kyilya Ruwa awekundi wawute, kyipfa wawewapatise nyi Yohane-pfo.
42007031	Mndumii kagamba, “Ngyilyingatsane na kyikyi wandu wa rika-lyi? Nyi kyikyi kyikyeri chawo?
42007032	Wakyeri cha wana waṙamie sangaṙa na ilagana, wechigamba, ‘Lulekapa mtoṟiṟo maa muleshina-pfo. Lulekapa ṟanyi, maa mulefiiṟa-pfo.’
42007033	Kyipfa Yohane Mpatisi nalecha alailya mkate maa alainyo mpfinyo, na nyoe mukogamba, nawoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho.
42007034	Mana o Adamu nalecha echilya na inyo; na nyoe mukogamba, ichu nawoṙe ndewu, na nekyenyo mpfinyo, mbuya ya wesania ukamba na wanyamaṟi.
42007035	Na wuṟango wo Ruwa womanyika kye wuwoṙe wuloi ko wana wakye woose.”
42007036	Mndu umwi kyiiṙi kya Mafarisayo nalemlaga nalye kyelya kanyi kokye. Kaiṙa na numba ko Mfarisayo ulya, kaṙamia ilya kyelya.
42007037	Na mndu mka umwi o mṟi ulya, awei mnyamaṟi, kyiyeri aleicho kye naṙamie numba ko Mfarisayo ulya, naleende kyimkyepe kyiwewoṙe mafuṙa gekyepfaama necha.
42007038	Kagoṟoka numa kufuhi na maṙende gakye, echifiiṟa, kawooka itonyitsia Yesu mcheṟeṟe maṙendenyi gakye, na imwanguo kui njui tsakye echimkomba-komba maṙende na imshia mafuṙa galya.
42007039	Kyasia, Mfarisayo ulya alemlaga ammbone kuṙo, nalegamba mrimenyi kokye, mndu-chu kokooya awei moonguo shisuku, naweimanya mndu mka-chu aimpaaya nyi wui, na oe nyi o mbaṟe iha, kye nyi mnyamaṟi.
42007040	Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Simion, ngiwoṙe kyindo ngikundi ikuwia.” Kagamba, “Mlosha, gamba.”
42007041	Kagamba, “Mndu umwi ekyeakuya nawewoṙe wasile wawi, umwi naweriko dinari magana gataanu, na o kawi makumi gataanu.
42007042	Nawo kyiyeri walawewoṙe kyemtaa nalewahooṟia woose wewawi. Kyiiṙi kya iwo wawi nyi wui emkunda ngoseṟa?”
42007043	Simion kagaluo kagamba, “Ngakusaṟa nyi ulya alemhooṟia tsifoi.” Kammbia, “Nogaluo necha.”
42007044	Kagalukyia mndu mka ulya kawia Simion, “Uwonyi mndu mka-chu? Ngyileiṙa na kanyi kopfo, ulengyienenga mṟinga o sanja maṙende gako-pfo; indi ichu naitonyitsia mcheṟeṟe maṙende gako na ianguo maṙende gako kui njui tsakye.
42007045	Iyoe ongyikomba-pfo; kyaindi ichu wookyia ngashika iha aṙa ingyikomba maṙende gako-pfo.
42007046	Oshia mṙoe oko mafuṙa-pfo; indi ichu nashia maṙende gako mafuṙa gekyepfaama necha.
42007047	Kyipfa kya ikyo ngakuwia, nahooṟio ngyuunyamaṟi tsakye tsifoi, kyipfa nakunda mnu, kyaindi ulya ahooṟio kyitutu, icho nekyekunda kyitutu.”
42007048	Naaho kawia mndu mka ulya, “Nohooṟio ngyuunyamaṟi tsapfo.”
42007049	Nyi lyo-ng'u walya waweilya hamwi na oe walewooka ikusaṟa mrimenyi kowo, “Nyi wui ichu tane ahooṟia ngyuunyamaṟi?”
42007050	Kawia mndu mka ulya, “Iiṙikyia lyapfo lyakukyiṟa. Yenda na ufoṟo.”
42008001	Kyikawa-ng'u numa ya iho naweitenga-tenga mṟinyi na shikaṟonyi echionguo mbonyi tsa Wumangyi wo Ruwa, na walya ikumi na wawi wawei hamwi na oe.
42008002	Na waka waata wawewoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho na ndoṟe wakakyiṟo; nawo nyi Maria ekyelago Makyidalena, alewuto waṟufui wawicho mfungaaṙe,
42008003	na Yoana, mka o Kusa, mṟundi mṟango o Herode, na Susana, na wengyi wafoi, wawemṟundia kui masaa gawo.
42008004	Kyiyeri wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wulekuumbia na wandu walya walewuka orio mṟi wechicha na kokye, nalewawia kui mfano,
42008005	“Moolyia mbeu nalefuma indewaaya mbeu tsakye. Na oe kyiyeri aweiwaaya, tsingyi tsileoloka kufuhi na njia, tsikachumo-chumo, na shileye sha ngyinenyi shikatsilya.
42008006	Tsingyi tsikaoloka handu hawoṙe iṟaṟa; kyiyeri tsilewooka iṙo tsikauma ko iuṟa teri ngyicha.
42008007	Tsingyi tsikaoloka handu hawoṙe msha, na msha iya ikaṙo hamwi natso ikatsiilama.
42008008	Tsingyi tsikaoloka handu hawoṙe teri ngyicha; tsikaṙo, tsikakumbia orio imwi igana.” Kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa isho naleṙeṙa na ṟui lying'anyi echigamba, “Awoṙe maṙwi geaṙanyia naaṙanyie.”
42008009	Wanalosho wakye wakammbesa kyimaṙuma kya mfano-cho.
42008010	Kagamba, “Nyoe muwaenengye imanya shiṟika sha Wumangyi wo Ruwa; indi wengyi nyi kui mfano, kundu wakaambuya walawone, na wakaicho walamanye.
42008011	Na mfano-cho kyitambuluo kyacho nyi ikyi, mbeu nyi Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
42008012	Walya wa kufuhi na njia nyi walya wekyeicho, numa Satana nekyecha karakuo Ṙeṙo lyilya lya Ruwa mrimenyi kowo, walacheiṙikyia na ikyia.
42008013	Na walya wa iṟaṟenyi nyi walya wekyeicho na iambilyia Ṙeṙo-lyo lya Ruwa kui sia; nawo wawoṙe mri-pfo. Wekyeiṙikyia kyiyeri kyifuhi, na kyiyeri kya iyesho wekyewuya na numa.
42008014	Na tsileoloka mshenyi, nyi walya waleicho na kyiiṙi kya iyenda wakailamo nyi wulembi wo masaa, na ichihiyo lya wuyana, walakumbie ndunda ngyicha.
42008015	Na tsilya tsa terinyi ngyicha nyi walya wekyeicho na iambilyia Ṙeṙo lyilya lya Ruwa mrimenyi kowo na kui iindia wekyelyiaṙanyia na ilyiwaṙa, numa wekyekumbia ndunda wechikarishia.”
42008016	“Kuwoṙe mndu ekyekoṟa taa na iishikyia na kyindo numa kaiwikyia handu hakuṟiikyie-pfo, indi nekyeiwikyia handu hakuirie, kundu ilyimikyie woose wechiiṙa na ipfo numba.
42008017	Cha kyipfa kuwoṙe kyindo kyikyishikyie maa kyikuṟiikyie kyilechimanyika-pfo.
42008018	Ambuyenyi-ng'u chandu muiaṙanyia, kyipfa awoṙe kyindo nechienengo, na ulya alawoṙe kyindo nechisoko maa kyilya kyitutu awoṙe.”
42008019	Wamae na wana wa wamae wakayenda kokye, walaiṙime ishika kufuhi na oe kyipfa kya wuingyi wo wandu.
42008020	Kaendio mbonyi, echiwio, “Womoo na wana wa womoo wagoṟokyi nja wakundi ikuwona.”
42008021	Kagaluo, kawawia, “Wama oko na wana wa wama wako nyi iwo waiaṙanyia Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na iosha kyilya lyikundi.”
42008022	Kyikawa-ng'u kyiyeri kyimwi kyiiṙi kya mfiri iya naleṙooya ngalawenyi hamwi na wanalosho wakye, kawawia, “Luambaṙe mṟasa molyolya o nduwa.” Wakayenda.
42008023	Nawo kyiyeri waweiyenda, oe nalelaa maṙoe. Kukocha kyiwiṟi kulya nduwenyi, kyikashikyia ngalawa iya, ikawooka iichuo mṟinga, wakawa ndengyenyi.
42008024	Wakayenda kokye wakamwamtsa, wechigamba, “Mndumii, ung'anyi, Mndumii ung'anyi, luisia.” Kaamka, kaṙeṙia kyiwiṟi na mṟinga ulya o nduwa shikatsia sau, kukowaṙa itsia lying'anyi.
42008025	Kawawia, “Lyookwi iiṙikyia lyanyu?” Wakaowuo, wakatandiṟi, wechigamba wo wenyi ko wenyi, “Ichu nyi wui aṙeṙia shiwiṟi na mṟinga, nasho shikamwaṙanyia?”
42008026	Wakashika mbai ya ipalyipalyi lya uruka lo Wakyerasi, iambuyana na Galyilaya.
42008027	Na oe kyiyeri alesoka ngalawenyi, nalekarisana na mndu awewoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho; alawendeṟae nguwo mfiri ifoi, maa awekyekaa kanyi-pfo, indi kundu awekyelaa nyi kundu kuwekuṟikye wandu wapfiie.
42008028	Na kyiyeri alewona Yesu nalekalagatsa na ioloka wanda mbele yakye na iṙeṙa na ṟui lying'anyi, echigamba, “Ngyiwoṙe kyikyi na iyoe, Yesu, Mana o Ruwa ai wuye? Ngyikuterewa ulangyituure.”
42008029	Kyipfa nalekoaṙeṙia mṟufui ulya mmbicho nawukye mndu ulya. Kyipfa nawekyemmbaṙa kyiyeri kyifoi, mṟasa kawamoringo kyipfungonyi, echipfungo na mshe na ngowa; kaṙumbuo shipfungo shilya, kaṟichiṟo nyi mṟufui ulya mmbicho mṟasa nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga.
42008030	Yesu kammbesa, “Rina lyapfo nyi wui?” Kagamba, “Rina lyako nyi ulyimalyi.” Kyipfa waṟufui wawicho wafoi wawemmboṙe.
42008031	Wakamterewa kawawuta alawafune wayende ṟungunyi.
42008032	Kyasia, iho hawewoṙe poo lya nguwe tsifoi tsiweilyiso fumvunyi, wakamterewa nawaenengye momu waiṙe na kulya nguwenyi. Kawaiṙikyia.
42008033	Waṟufui walya wawicho wakawuka mndu ulya wakaiṙa na kulya nguwenyi, na poo lyilya lyikaiṟimika iwinyi, tsikasokyia nduwenyi, tsikapfiia mṟingyenyi.
42008034	Kyiyeri walyisi walewona kyindo kyilewutika, waleṙicha, wakaonguo mbonyi-tso mṟinyi na handu hengyi hoose.
42008035	Wandu wakafuma indewona ikyo kyilewutika, wakayenda ko Yesu, wakawona mndu ulya alewuto waṟufui wawicho aṙamie maṙendenyi ga Yesu, aṟee nguwo na makusaṟo gakye gai mecha, wakaowuo.
42008036	Walya walekowammbona waleonguo chandu ulya awewoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho alekyiṟo.
42008037	Na wandu wa uruka lo Wakyerasi lui mbai ya halya walemterewa nawukye kowo, kyipfa walewoṙo nyi wuowu wung'anyi. Kyasia na oe kaṙooya ngalawenyi, kawuya.
42008038	Na mndu ulya alewuto waṟufui wawicho nalemterewa naoshane na oe; kyaindi oe nalesamana na oe echigamba,
42008039	“Wuya na kanyi kopfo; undeonguo maṟiyisho Ruwa alekuwutia.” Kayenda echionguo kulya mṟinyi koose, maṟiyisho gang'anyi Yesu alemmbutia.
42008040	Kyasia kyiyeri Yesu alewuya wuingyi wo wandu wulemwambilyia kui sia, kyipfa waweimmbeṙelyia woose.
42008041	Na mndu umwi ekyelago Yairo kacha, na oe nawei ang'anyi o sinagogi. Kaoloka maṙendenyi ga Yesu, kamterewa naiṙe na kanyi kokye;
42008042	kyipfa mana okye o kyika nawei kufuhi na ipfa, na nyi mana kyimuumwi kokye, awewoṙe cha maka ikumi na iwi. Na kyiyeri aweiyenda wuingyi wo wandu wulemwiṟiwia.
42008043	Na mndu mka umwi, awekyechoṟa kyiyeri kya maka ikumi na iwi, [alekoammbuta masaa gakye goose echienenga waanga] alaiṙime ikyiṟo nyi mndu oose,
42008044	nalekaa kyanuma ko Yesu kapaaya ikyechu lya iwale lyakye; na cha ilyi ichoṟa lyakye lyikaṙumbuka.
42008045	Yesu kagamba, “Nyi wui angyipaaya?” Kyasia kyiyeri wandu woose wamlege, Petiro nalemmbia, “Mndumii ang'anyi, wuingyi-wu wo wandu wukuiṟiwie na ikupeṟeetsa.”
42008046	Yesu kagamba, “Kuwoṙe mndu angyipaaya, kyipfa ngyikuichuoe pfinya tsangyiwuka.”
42008047	Mka ulya ammbone kye echiiṙima ikuṟiika-pfo, kacha eṙeṙema, kaoloka mbele yakye, kamwongoya mbele ya wandu woose, kyimaṙuma kya impaaya, na chandu alewekyiṟo cha ilyi.
42008048	Kammbia, “Mana, iiṙikyia lyapfo lyakukyiṟa. Yenda na ufoṟo.”
42008049	Kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa isho, kukocha mndu awuka kanyi ko ulya ang'anyi o sinagogi, kammbia, “Mana opfo ampfa; maa ulawinishe mlosha.”
42008050	Kyaindi lyilya Yesu aleicho isho, nalemgaluo, “Maa ulaowuoe. Iṙikyia tupu, na oe nechichia.”
42008051	Kyiyeri aleshika kanyi ko ulya ang'anyi o sinagogi alelekyia mndu iiṙa na kulya numba sile nyi Petiro, Yohane, Yakobo, na awu o mana ulya na wamae-pfo.
42008052	Na wandu woose wawefiiṟa na ikapa ṟanyi. Kawawia, “Maa mulafiiṟe, ichu apfa-pfo, indi nalaa maṙoe tupu.”
42008053	Wakamseka mnu, kyipfa walemanya kye awempfa.
42008054	Kammbaṙa kuwoko, kaṙeṙa na ṟui lying'anyi, echigamba, “Mana, goṟoka.”
42008055	Moo okye ukommbiyilyia na oe cha ilyi kagoṟoka. Kagamba naenengo kyelya.
42008056	Wafee wakye wakaṟiyio mnu, kyaindi kawaima walawie mndu kyindo kyilewutika.
42009001	Yesu kalaga walya ikumi na wawi kawaenenga wuiṙimi na pfinya yechilyia waṟufui woose wawicho na ikyiṟa ndoṟe.
42009002	Kawaṙuma waonguo Wumangyi wo Ruwa, na ikyiṟa waluoe.
42009003	Kawawia, “Mulaṙuo kyindo ilyi moyenda kyaro, upoi maa kyikuchu, maa mkate, maa heleri; maa umwi onyu alaṙuo kanzu tsiwi.
42009004	Na orio numba mochiiṙa napfo kaenyi pfo mṟasa kyiyeri mochiwuka pfo iyenda mṟi ungyi.
42009005	Na walya walechimuambilyia, ilyi mochiwuka ipfo mṟinyi, kute-kutenyi kyilulyi kyikyeri maṙendenyi ganyu, kyiwe wuṟingyishi kowo.”
42009006	Wakayenda wakatenga-tenga shikaṟonyi, wechionguo Ndumi Ngyicha, na ikyiṟa wandu handu hoose.
42009007	Na Mangyi Herode kaicho mbonyi tsa isho shoose shilewutika, kaiṟewe mnu kyipfa wandu wengyi walegamba kye Yohane naṟuka ko wapfu;
42009008	na wengyi kye nyi Elyiya awoneka, na wengyi kye nyi umwi o weonguo shisuku wa kacha aṟuka.
42009009	Kyaindi Herode kagamba, “Yohane ngyilemṙumbuo mṙoe, kyasia nyi wui ichu ngyiichuoe mbonyi-tsi tsake?” Kakunda immbona.
42009010	Kyasia kyiyeri wasu walya walewuya walemwongoya mbonyi tsoose tsilewutika; kawaṙuo kayenda nawo handu hakuṟiikyie mṟasa mṟi umwi okyelago Betisaida.
42009011	Na kyiyeri wuingyi wo wandu wulemanya, wulemwosha, kawaambilyia, kawamoṙeṙa nawo mbonyi tsa Wumangyi wo Ruwa, kakyiṟa walya wawelangyie ikyiṟo.
42009012	Na mnengyeṟi ukowooka iolokyia, walya ikumi na wawi wakayenda kokye, wakammbia, “Samana na wuingyi-wu wo wandu kundu wayende shikaṟo sha mṟasenyi na iha, wawone handu helaa na shelya kyipfa iha handu lukyeri nyi nuka mreesi.”
42009013	Kawawia, “Waenengyenyi kyelya.” Wakagamba, “Luwoṙe kyindo kya ngoseṟa sile nyi mkate itanu na makunga gawi-pfo; ang'u lundewuṟa shelya ko wandu-wa woose.”
42009014	Kyipfa wasoṟo wawekyeri ho wawei cha shiku shitaanu. Kawia wanalosho wakye, “Ṟamiṟenyi wandu kui nzengye, orio nzengye wandu makumi gataanu.”
42009015	Wakawuta kuṙo, wakawaṟamiṟa woose.
42009016	Kawuta mkate iya itanu na makunga galya gawi, kaambuya wuye ruwewu kashiwikyia mboṟa, kapeṟenguo, kaenengyia wanalosho wakye kundu wagawie wuingyi wulya wo wandu.
42009017	Wakalya, wakaiguṙa woose; na shipeṟengu shilya shiletsugaa walesania shikaichuo mkunja ikumi na iwi.
42009018	Kyasia kyiyeri aweiterewa handu hakuṟiikyie, wanalosho wakye wawei hamwi na oe, kawawesa, “Wuingyi-wo wo wandu waigamba inyi nyi wui?”
42009019	Wakamgaluo, wechigamba, “Yohane Mpatisi; kyaindi wengyi, Elyia; na wengyi kye nyi umwi o weonguo shisuku wa kacha aṟuka.”
42009020	Kawawia, “Aa nyoe mokyegamba inyi nyi wui?” Petiro kamgaluo, kagamba, “Iyoe nyi Mshumbuoe o Ruwa.”
42009021	Kawawawasa, kawaima walawie mndu kyindo-kyi;
42009022	echigamba, “Kyakooya Mana o Adamu iwona matuuro gafoi na ilego nyi wameeku wa mengye na wang'anyi wa makohanyi na walosha wa mawawaso, na iwoogo na mfiri o kaṟaaṟu iṟuka.”
42009023	Kawawia woose, “Mndu oose kakunda ingyiosha nakulege amonyi, nakuṙikye msalaba okye orio mfiri nangyioshe.
42009024	Kyipfa mndu mokunda ikyiṟa moo okye nechiuṙetsa, na mndu echiṙetsa moo okye kyipfa kyako nyi oe echiukyiṟa.
42009025	Cha kyipfa nyi kyiira kyiha mndu echiwona kawona wuyana woose; kokooya aṙetsa moo okye na ikuṙetsa amonyi?
42009026	Cha kyipfa orio mndu echingyiwonia sonu inyi na maṙeṙo gako, Mana o Adamu nechiwonia sonu mndu-cho kyiyeri echicha mng'anonyi okye na o Awu na malaika waele.
42009027	Na inyi ngyimmbia loi, kuwoṙe wandu wagoṟokyi iha, walechiwona upfu maa ale, mṟasa wawone kuwooka Wumangyi wo Ruwa.”
42009028	Numa ya mbonyi-tso, hamwiṙe mfiri nyanya, naleṙuo Petiro na Yohane na Yakobo, kaṙo na fumvunyi kundu nandeterewa.
42009029	Kyiyeri aweiterewa fana ya kyaam kyakye ikailachika, mawale gakye gakailachika gakaila peṟu gakakyema-kyema.
42009030	Na wandu wawi waweiṙeṙa na oe, nawo nyi Mose na Elyiya;
42009031	walewono mng'anonyi, wakaṙeṙa mbonyi tsa ipfa lyakye echilyiafutsia Yerusalemu.
42009032	Petiro hamwi na walya wawei na oe wawewalemie nyi maṙoe; kyaindi kyiyeri wamuamkye walewona mng'ano okye, na walya wawi walegoṟoka hamwi na oe.
42009033	Kyasia kyiyeri waweilekana na oe, Petiro nalewia Yesu, “Mndumii, ung'anyi, kyachia ilyi lui iha. Luachikyie matengo gaṟaaṟu, lyimwi lyapfo iyoe, na lyimwi lya Mose, na lyimwi lya Elyiya”; alaichi kyindo aweiṙeṙa.
42009034	Kyiyeri aweigamba isho, kulewoneka ipuchi lyikawashikyia, wakaowuo lyilya waleiṙa na ipfo ipuchinyi.
42009035	Ṟui lyikawuka kulya ipuchinyi, lyechigamba, “Ichu nyi Mono-ko, msambuṟe oko, mwaṙanyienyi oe.”
42009036	Na kyiyeri ṟui-lyo lyiletsia, Yesu kawoneka akyeri amonyi. Nawo wakatsia, walaongoye mndu isho shoose walewona mfiri iya yoose.
42009037	Kyikawa-ng'u ilya-ngama, lyilya walesoka kulya fumvunyi, wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wulekarisana na oe.
42009038	Na mndu umwi kyiiṙi kya kyisanzionyi naleiṟuka, echigamba, “Mlosha, ngyikuterewa usaṟie mono-ko, kyipfa oe nyi mono-ko kyimuumwi.
42009039	Na mṟufui mmbicho nekyemmbaṙa, na cha ilyi nekyekalagatsa; kamtewe kauma nguku, echiṙosa mawia, maa ekyemṙa sile kui imtuura lying'anyi na impirichuo-pirichuo-pfo.
42009040	Ngaterewa wanalosho wapfo wammbute, walaiṙime.”
42009041	Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Nyoe rika lyilawoṙe iiṙikyia, lyiyendie njia ilawaṟi, ngyechikaa hamwi na nyoe na iṙuana na nyoe mṟasa indi? Ende mana-cho na iha.”
42009042	Kyiyeri aweiyenda kokye, mṟufui mmbicho ukomwolotsa wanda, kauma nguku. Yesu kaṙeṙia mṟufui ulya mmbicho, kakyiṟa mana ulya, kammbiyiṟia awuye.
42009043	Woose wakaṟiyio, wechiwona mng'ano o Ruwa. Nawo kyiyeri waweiṟiyio kyipfa kya shindo shoose aleshiwuta, nalewia wanalosho wakye,
42009044	“Aṙanyienyi necha mbonyi-tsi ngyimmbia, cha kyipfa Mana o Adamu naindewiko mawokonyi ga wandu.”
42009045	Kyaindi walemanya kyindo kyilya-pfo, kyikaṟiko kowo walakyimanye; wakaowuo immbesa kyitambuluo kya kyindo-kyo.
42009046	Wakawooka iwesana, nyi wui echiwa ang'anyi kyiiṙi kyawo.
42009047	Na Yesu kyiyeri alemanya kyindo wawekusaṟie mrimenyi kowo, nalewuta mana mtutu kammbikyia kufuhi na oe,
42009048	kawawia, “Mndu oose echiambilyia mana-chu kui rina lyako nangyiambilyia inyi; na mndu oose echingyiambilyia inyi naambilyia ulya alengyiṙuma. Kyipfa ai mtutu kyiiṙi kyanyu moose icho nyi oe ang'anyi.”
42009049	Yohane kagaluo, kammbia, “Mndumii, ung'anyi, lulewona mndu aiwuta waṟufui wawicho kui rina lyapfo, lukomwima, kyipfa ekyeoshana na soe-pfo.”
42009050	Yesu kammbia, “Maa mulamwime, cha kyipfa icho alaiwingana na nyoe nakyeri ura lonyu.”
42009051	Kyikawa-ng'u, kyiyeri mfiri yakye yeṙo na Ruwewu iletikyira kufuhi, nalekuṟeyeṟa iyenda Yerusalemu.
42009052	Kaṙuma wandu wasonguo mbele yakye, wakayenda wakaiṙa na kyikaṟonyi kya Wasamaria, kundu wamwachikyie handu echikaa.
42009053	Kyaindi wandu wa ipfo walelega imwambilyia kyipfa kya ilyi awekuṟeyeṟie iyenda Yerusalemu.
42009054	Wanalosho wakye, Yakobo na Yohane, wammbone isho, walegamba, “Mndumii, nukundi lugambe moṙo usokye iwuka ruwewu, uwarumatse; [chandu na Elyiya alewuta?]”
42009055	Kawaindukyia, kawaṙeṙia, [kagamba, “Muichi nyi mrima o mbaṟe iha muwoṙe-pfo.]
42009056	Kyipfa Mana o Adamu alecha irumatsa mrima ya wandu-pfo, indi iikyiṟa.” Wakafuma wakayenda kyikaṟonyi kyingyi.
42009057	Nawo kyiyeri wawekyeri njiyenyi, mndu umwi nalemmbia, “Ngyekuosha orio handu ochiyenda.”
42009058	Yesu kammbia, “Mapaara gawoṙe mṟeshe, na shileye sha ngyinenyi shiwoṙe singyi, kyaindi Mana o Adamu awoṙe handu heonyonyia-pfo.”
42009059	Kawia ungyi, “Ngyiosha.” Kagamba, “Mndumii, ngyienenga momu kuwooka ngyindeṟika awu oko.”
42009060	Kammbia, “Leka wapfu waṟikye wapfu wawo; indi iyoe yenda undeonguo Wumangyi wo Ruwa.”
42009061	Mndu ungyi-se kammbia, “Mndumii, ngyekuosha; indi ngyienenga momu kuwooka ngyindesamana na wandu wa kanyi koko.”
42009062	Yesu kammbia, “Mndu akuṟeyeṟa iṙema, naaho kaambuya numa, awaṟi Wumangyi wo Ruwa-pfo.”
42010001	Kyasia, numa ya isho Mndumii nalewika wandu wengyi makumi mfungaaṙe, kawaṙuma wawi wawi wamsongoye iyenda orio mṟi na orio handu awekusurie iyenda amonyi.
42010002	Kawawia, “Shilyimu nyi shifoi, kyaindi waṟundi nyi waangu. Kyasia terewenyi Mndumii o shilyimu naṙikye waṟundi shilyimunyi shakye.
42010003	Yendenyi; ngyimṙuma nyoe cha shiondo shikyeri na shisii.
42010004	Maa mulaṙuo mkunja, maa kyikuchu, maa shiaṙu. Maa mulaiṟikiṟe mndu njienyi.
42010005	Na orio numba mochiiṙa napfo, gambenyi kuwooka kye ufoṟo lukae kunu kanyi.
42010006	Na kukowaṙa mndu echiiṙima iambilyia ufoṟo, ufoṟo lonyu lochikaa na oe. Kyaindi kokooya kulawoṙe, ufoṟo lonyu lochiwuya na konyu.
42010007	Kyasia, kaenyi ipfo numbenyi, mochilya na inyo sha kowo; kyipfa mṟundi nawaṟi ienengo wori wokye. Maa mulakyame-kyame iwuka numba imwi iyenda numba ingyi.
42010008	Na orio mṟi mochiiṙa napfo, wakamuambilyia, lyenyi shelya shechiwikyio mbele yanyu.
42010009	Kyiṟenyi wandu woose waluoe wakyeri pfo. Wawienyi, ‘Wumangyi wo Ruwa womtikyira kowo.’
42010010	Na orio mṟi mochiiṙa napfo, nawo walamuambilyie, wukyenyi pfo, na nyoe mukoiṙa njienyi tsa mṟi-cho gambenyi,
42010011	‘Maa kyilulyi kya mṟi onyu kyikuwoṙe maṙendenyi gaṙu luikyimukutia-kutia.’ Kyaindi manyenyi kye Wumangyi wo Ruwa womtikyira kufuhi.
42010012	Ngammbia kye mfiri ulya kyechiwa kyaangu uruka lo Sodoma ihooṟio maṙeko kuta mṟi-cho.”
42010013	“Ochia lopfo, Korasini! Ochia lopfo Betisaida! Kyipfa kokooya shiṟiyisho shilewutika konyu shilewutika kulya Tiro na Sidon, wawechiṙumbuya wunyamaṟi wookyia iho, wechiṟaa masaṟa ga makunyia na iṙamia ifunyi.
42010014	Kyaindi, mfiri o ianduyo kyechiwa kyaangu wandu wa Tiro na Sidon ikarishia ngapo tsawo kuta nyoe.
42010015	Na iyoe Kaperinaumu, ochienengo kyiṟumi-pfo indi nochisotso mṟasa ko waṟumu.
42010016	Momuaṙanyia nyoe, nangyiaṙanyia inyi; na amulega nyoe nangyilega inyi; na angyilega inyi nalega ulya alengyiṙuma.”
42010017	Naaho-ng'u walya makumi mfungaaṙe walewuya na sia, wechigamba, “Mndumii, maa waṟufui wawicho wailuindia kui rina lyapfo.”
42010018	Kawawia, “Ngyilewona Satana, echioloka iwuka ruwewu cha mbawa.
42010019	Ngamuenenga pfinya yechuma njoka na shisheshe, na pfinya tsoose tsa mokyituwa ulya, maa kuwoṙe kyindo kyemmbutia kyindo kyiwicho-pfo.
42010020	Kyaindi mulachihiyo kyipfa kya ilyi waṟufui wawicho waimuindia; indi chihiyonyi kyipfa marina ganyu gamaṟeie ruwewu.”
42010021	Kyiyeri kyilya kyilya Yesu kachihiyo Mumuyonyi Mweele, kagamba, “Ngakuana, Awu, Mndumii o ruwewu na uruka, kyipfa shindo-shi, uleshitambuluya wandu waṟango-pfo indi nuleshitambuluya wana watutu. Yee, loi Awu, kyipfa nyi wuṙo kyilekuchihiya.”
42010022	Kagamba, “Ngyimwenengye shoose nyi Awu-yoko, maa kuwoṙe aichi Mana, sile Awu-pfo; maa kuwoṙe aichi Awu, sile Mana-pfo, na orio oose ulya mana akundi imshukuya.”
42010023	Kaindukyia wanalosho wakye, kaṙeṙa nawo kyiṟika, kawawia, “Wagusu meso ganyu gaiwona isho muwonyi nyoe.
42010024	Cha kyipfa ngammbia kye weonguo shisuku wafoi na wamangyi walelanga iwona ishi muwonyi nyoe walashiwone; na iicho isho mushiichuoe nyoe walashiicho.”
42010025	Na mlosha umwi o mawawaso nalegoṟoka nayeshe Yesu, echigamba, “Mlosha, ngyiwute kyi kundu ngyioṟe moo o mlungana?”
42010026	Kammbia, “Kyikyiṟeie kuṙa uwawasonyi? Nosoma ho kuṙa?”
42010027	Kagaluo, kagamba, “Kunda Mndumii Ruwa opfo kui ngoo yapfo yoose, na kui mrima opfo oose, na kui pfinya tsapfo tsoose, na kui wuṟango wopfo woose; na momṟasa opfo cha iyoe kumonyi.”
42010028	Kammbia, “Nogaluo necha; wuta kuṙo na iyoe nochiwaṙa moo.”
42010029	Na oe akundi ikuloṟa kye nai msumganyi, kawesa Yesu, “Aa momṟasa oko nyi wui?”
42010030	Yesu kagaluo kagamba, “Mndu umwi nalesoka iwuka Yerusalemu echiyenda Yeriko, kakarisana wasokyi, wakammbuta mawale gakye, wakamkapa, wakayenda, wakamṙa kufuhi na ipfa.
42010031	Mkohanyi umwi naweiiṙia njia iya; na lyilya alemmbona naleiṙa mbai.
42010032	Na Mlewi wuṙo, kyiyeri aleshika halya kammbona, kaiṙa mbai.
42010033	Kyaindi Msamaria umwi echiyenda kyaro naleshika halya-ndu awei; na lyilya alemmbona nalemmbonia wukyiwa.
42010034	Katikyira kufuhi, kampfunga shifaṟa shakye, kashishia mafuṙa na mpfinyo, kamṙosia wuye ya nzoi yakye, kamṙuo mṟasa numbenyi ya wayenu, kamwonduṟa necha.
42010035	Na ilya-ngama kawuta dinari tsiwi, kaenengyia ulya monyi numba ya wayenu, echigamba, ‘Onduṟa necha mndu-chu, na kokooya kuwoṙe kyindo kya ngoseṟa ochimwenenga, ilyi ngyechiwuya ngyekutaa.’
42010036	Nuwonyi kuṙa iyoe, kyiiṙi kya iwo waṟaaṟu, nyi wui awei momṟasa o ulya alekarisana wasokyi?”
42010037	Kagamba, “Nyi ulya alemmbonia wukyiwa.” Yesu kammbia, “Yenda na iyoe undewuta wuṙo.”
42010038	Kyasia kyiyeri waweiyenda naleiṙa kyikaṟonyi kyimwi; mndu mka umwi ekyelago Marita kamlaga na kanyi kokye.
42010039	Na oe nawewoṙe mono-wamae o kyika ekyelago Maria, aleṙamia maṙendenyi ga Yesu, kaaṙanyia maṙeṙo gakye.
42010040	Kyaindi Marita naweikuwinisha na maṟunda gafoi, kayenda ko Yesu, kammbia, “Mndumii, uwonyi uwicho chandu mono-wama-chu oko angyiṙa ngyiṟunde ngyimonyi-pfoe? Kyasia mmbie nangyitarame.”
42010041	Mndumii kagaluo kammbia, “Marita, Marita, nukuwinisha na iiṟewe kyipfa kya shindo shifoi;
42010042	kyaindi nyi kyindo kyimwi tikyi kyikyikunde; na Maria nasambuṟa ṙombo lyicha lyilechiwuto kokye.”
42011001	Kyasia kyiyeri awei handu halyiwe echiterewa, ammarise, umwi o wanalosho wakye nalemmbia, “Mndumii, luloshe iterewa chandu Yohane alelosha wanalosho wakye.”
42011002	Kawawia, “Kyiyeri muiterewa, gambenyi ‘Awu [oṙu ukyeri ruwewu], rina lyapfo lyitano lyiele, Wumangyi wopfo wuche, [kyindo ukundi, kyiṟundikye iha wuyanenyi cha ipfo ruwewu.]
42011003	Uluenengye kando kaṙu mfiri yoose.
42011004	Uluhooṟie ngyuunyamaṟi tsaṙu, kyipfa na soe lokyehooṟia orio mndu ekyeluṙekyio. Na ulaluṙuo kyiyeshionyi indi ulukyiṟe ngyeṟo tsa mmbicho ulya.’ ”
42011005	Kawawia, “Nyi wui konyu awoṙe mbuya, kayenda kokye kyio, na immbia; ‘Mbuya-yako, ngyiakuya mkate iṟaṟu,
42011006	kyipfa mbuya yako yashika koko, yawuka kyaro, na inyi ngyiwoṙe kyindo kyeienenga-pfo,’
42011007	na ulya ai numba namgaluoe echigamba, ‘Maa ulangyiwinishe; moongo omshingo, na soe lomlaa hamwi na wana wako, ngyechiiṙima iamka ngyikuenengye-pfo?’
42011008	Ngammbia kye, maa chandu alaiamka namwenengye kyipfa kya ilyi akyeri mbuya yakye, chandu alaiṙa imterewa, nechiamka namwenengye kyilya aiterewa.
42011009	Na inyi ngyimmbia, ‘Terewenyi na nyoe mochienengo; pfulenyi, na nyoe mochiwona; kape-kapenyi moongo, na nyoe mochipfunguyo.’
42011010	Kyipfa orio moterewa nekyeambilyia; na ulya mopfula nekyewona; na ulya mokapa-kapa moongo nechipfunguyo.
42011011	Kyipfa nyi wui konyu akyeri awu, mono-kye kamterewa mkate, echimwenenga igoe? Ang'u kamterewa ikunga, namwenengye njoka?
42011012	Ang'u kamterewa iyai, namwenengye kyisheshe?
42011013	Kyasia, kokooya nyoe mui wawicho muichi ienenga wana wanyu shisumbo shicha, ngyesa chi ngoseṟa mnu awu onyu akyeri ruwewu echienenga Mumuyo Mweele walya wekyemterewa-pfoe?”
42011014	Na oe naweiwuta mṟufui mmbicho ko mndu awei ndiṟi. Kyiyeri mṟufui ulya mmbicho alewuka, mndu ulya kaṙeṙa wuingyi wo wandu wukoṟiyio.
42011015	Wengyi wakagamba, “Naifuna waṟufui wawicho kui pfinya tsa Beelyisebulyi, ang'anyi o waṟufui wawicho.”
42011016	Wengyi walemyesha wepfula kokye kyiṟingyishio kyiwukyie ruwewu.
42011017	Na oe kamanya makusaṟo gawo, kawawia, “Orio wumangyi wukowaṙa wuṟiingyi kokyewaṙa wukyiwa; na wandu wa nja imwi wakaṟiingana wekyenyanyaṟika.
42011018	Kyasia, kokooya Satana nakuṟiinga oe amonyi, wumangyi wokye wochigoṟoka kuṙa? Kyipfa nyoe mugamba kye ngyifuna waṟufui wawicho kui Beelyisebulyi,
42011019	Kyasia, kokooya ngafuna waṟufui wawicho kui Beelyisebulyi, ngyesa wana wanyu wekyewafuna kui pfinya tsa wui? Kyipfa kya ikyo iwo nyiwo wechimuanduya.
42011020	Kyaindi kokooya inyi ngyifuna waṟufui wawicho kui kyimnyoe kya Ruwa, kyasia Wumangyi wo Ruwa womcha na konyu.
42011021	Mndu awoṙe pfinya aṟee shisha shakye, karinga numba yakye, shindo shakye shechikaa necha.
42011022	Kyaindi mndu awoṙe pfinya kuta oe kyiyeri ayenda kokye na imkapa, nemsoka shisha shakye shoose awekusurie, na igawia wandu wakye shoose awewoṙe.
42011023	Mndu alai hamwi na inyi naiwingana na inyi; na mndu alaisania hamwi na inyi nekyeola-ola.”
42011024	“Mṟufui mmbicho ilyi awuka ko mndu, nekyeiṙia handu halawoṙe mṟinga, echipfula handu heonyonya, alandewone nekyegamba,
42011025	‘Ngyechiwiyilyia numba yako ngyilewuka.’
42011026	Na kashika, kawona ingyiaie na ichopo, nyi lyo-ng'u ekyeyenda kaṙuo handu hamwi na oe waṟufui wengyi wawicho mfungaaṙe wakyeri wawicho kuta oe amonyi, wakaiṙa na ikaa pfo; na mndu ulya mafurumionyi gakye gekyewiha kuta kulya mawookyionyi.”
42011027	Kyikawa-ng'u kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa mbonyi-tso, mndu mka umwi wandunyi wa kyisanzionyi, naleṙeṙa na ṟui lying'anyi kammbia, “Agusu mndu-mka-cho alekufee na mawee uleonga.”
42011028	Kyaindi oe nalegamba, “Nanga, wagusu walya wekyeicho Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na iosha shilya lyikundi.”
42011029	Na kyiyeri wuingyi wo wandu wulekuumbia halya-ndu Yesu awei nalewooka igamba, “Rika-lyi nyi rika lyiwicho. Lyipfula kyiṟingyishio, maa lyechienengo kyiṟingyishio-pfo, sile nyi kyiṟingyishio kya Yona.
42011030	Kyipfa, chandu Yona alewa kyiṟingyishio ko Waninawi, nyi wuṙo echiwa Mana o Adamu ko rika-lyi.
42011031	Mangyi o kyika o ura lo kyaseri nechigoṟoka mfiri o ianduyo hamwi na wandu wa rika-lyi, na oe nechiwaanduya kye waleṙeko; kyipfa oe nalecha iwuka ngyuura tsa kyishingonyi tsa wuyana kundu naicho wuṟango wo Solomon, na iha hakyeri ai ang'anyi kuta Solomon.
42011032	Wandu wa Ninawi wegoṟoka mfiri o ianduyo hamwi na rika-lyi, nawo wechiwaanduya kye waleṙeko; kyipfa wo waleṙumbuya wunyamaṟi kyipfa kya mbonyi Yona aleonguo, na iha hakyeri ang'anyi kuta Yona.”
42011033	“Kuwoṙe mndu ekyekoṟa taa kaiwikyia handu hakuṟiikyie, ang'u wanda ya kyitela-pfo indi nekyeiwikyia handu hakuirie, kundu iwo wechiiṙa napfo wawone ngyeela.
42011034	Taa ya mmbiu nyi riso. Kyasia riso lyapfo lyechiwona necha mmbiu opfo oose ochiwaṙa ngyeela. Kyaindi lyikanyamaṟika, mmbiu opfo oose ochiwaṙa meema.
42011035	Kyasia, ambuya-ng'u, ngyeela iya ikyeri kopfo ilacheewa meema.
42011036	Kokooya ngyeela yaṙunganana mmbiunyi opfo oose, maa kuwoṙe handu hawoṙe meema-pfo, mmbiu opfo oose ochiwaṙa ngeela tupu; chandu na taa yekyekulyimika kui ngyeela yayo.”
42011037	Kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa, Mfarisayo umwi nalemlaga nache na kokye nalye kyelya. Kaiṙa, kaṙamia nalye kelya.
42011038	Kyiyeri Mfarisayo ulya alemmbona, naleṟiyio kyipfa alesamba mawoko kyimṟumoe kuwooka alalya-pfo.
42011039	Mndumii kammbia, “Nyoe Mafarisayo mokyesanja kyiṙoo na kyitela kyanja, indi mrimenyi konyu muichuo wusokyi na wuwicho.
42011040	Nyoe matondo; icho aleachikyia isho sha nja chi oe aleachikyia isho shikyeri shiṙoonyi na shitelenyi taa-pfoe?
42011041	Kyaindi wutenyi kyiano shilya sha kyanumba, na shoose shechiwa shicha konyu.
42011042	“Indi ochia lonyu, Mafarisayo, cha kyipfa mokyewuta shiano shishiwawase na mboka tsa maṟa tsa orio mbaṟe, na kunu mochiṙa shilya shiwaṟi, na ikunda lya Ruwa. Kyamukooya iwuta isho sha kuwooka kulawoṙe iṙa isho sha kawi.
42011043	Ochia lonyu, Mafarisayo, cha kyipfa mukundi iṙamia mbele masinagoginyi na iiṟikyiṟo sangaṙa.
42011044	Ochia lonyu, cha kyipfa mukyeri cha shilome shilekyewono, shikyeri kye wandu wakaiṙa mbai yasho waichi mbonyi tsasho-pfo.”
42011045	Mndu umwi kyiiṙi kya walosha wa mawawaso kagaluo, kammbia, “Mlosha, kui igamba isho noluṙeṙia uwicho maa soe.”
42011046	Kagamba, “Na nyoe walosha wa mawawaso, ochia lonyu, cha kyipfa mokyeṙika wandu maṟio malemeri maa nyoe muwenyi mokyepaaya maṟio-go maa na kyimnyoe kyanyu-pfo.
42011047	Ochia lonyu, cha kyipfa muichopa shilome sha weonguo shisuku walya waku wanyu walewawaaga.
42011048	Kyasia muṟingyishia na iiṙikyiana na kyilya waku wanyu walewuta; kyipfa wo walewaaga weonguo shisuku-wo, na nyoe muchopa shilome shawo.
42011049	Na kyipfa kya ikyo wuṟango wo Ruwa wulegamba, ‘Ngyeṙuma kowo weonguo shisuku na wasu, nawo wewaaga waata kyiiṙi kyawo na iwafuna,’
42011050	kundu rika-lyi lyiweso samu ya weonguo shisuku woose, ilepusuka wookyia igumbo lya wuyana;
42011051	wookyia samu ya Abelyi mṟasa samu ya Sakaria, ulya alewoogio kyiiṙi kya mesa ya Mndumii na hekalu. Yee, ngyimmbia kye rika-lyi lyechiweso samu-yo.
42011052	Ochia lonyu, nyoe walosha wa mawawaso, kyipfa muleṟika upfunguo lo halya-ndu wandu weiṙima iwona wuṟango nyoe muwenyi mulaiṙe napfo, na walya waweiṙa mukowashingyia.”
42011053	Kyiyeri alewuka pfo, walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo walewooka imringyichia uwicho na imsouo kui immbesa shindo shifoi,
42011054	wemṙega kundu waicho ṙeṙo lyawuka ṙumbunyi kokye.
42012001	Kyiyeri-kyo, wuingyi wo wandu wulesanza shiku kui shiku, mṟasa wakachumana, kawooka iwia wanalosho wakye kuwooka, “Kuringyenyi na chachu ya Mafarisayo, ya wukulembecheṟi.
42012002	Kyaindi kuwoṙe kyindo kyikuṟiikyie kyilechiloṟo na pata, maa kyikyiṟikye kyilechimanyika-pfo.
42012003	Kyasia orio kyindo muleṙeṙa meemenyi kyemanyika saenyi; na kyindo muleweweṙia mndu shiṟinyi sha numba shegambo iwuka kai.”
42012004	“Na inyi ngyimmbia nyoe mbuya tsako, maa mulaowuoe iwo wekyewaaga mmbiu, na numa ya iho wawoṙe kyindo kya ngoseṟa weiṙima iwuta-pfo.
42012005	Kyaindi ngyemmbia mochimwowuo. Owuonyi ulya akyeri kye kammbaaga mndu nechiiṙima immbiyitsa Ngyehenenyi. Yee ngyimmbia, owuonyi icho.
42012006	Ngyesa shilepuru shitaanu shekyekumbo helo tsiwi-pfoe? Maa kuwoṙe maa kyimwi kyekyewaṙimika mbele ya Ruwa-pfo.
42012007	Kyaindi maa njui tsa mṙoe yanyu tsingyitale tsoose. Kyasia mulaowuoe; nanga nyoe kuta shilepuru shifoi.”
42012008	“Na inyi ngyimmbia, orio mndu echingyiṟingyishia mbele ya wandu, Mana o Adamu nemṟingyishia mbele ya malaika wa Ruwa.
42012009	Na echingyikana mbele ya wandu, icho nekano mbele ya malaika wa Ruwa.
42012010	Na orio mndu echiṙeṙa kyindo kyiwicho kya Mana o Adamu nechihooṟio, indi mndu alahia Mumuyo Mweele echihooṟio-pfo.
42012011	Na ilyi wemuṙuo mbele ya Masinagogi na wachilyi na wawoṙe pfinya ya ichilyia, maa mulaiṟewe mochikusaṟa maṙeṙo ganyu chandu mogaluo ang'u iṙeṙa.
42012012	Cha kyipfa Mumuyo Mweele nemulosha saa iya iya kyilya muwaṟi iṙeṙa.”
42012013	Mndu umwi halya kyisanzionyi kammbia, “Mlosha, wia mono-wama oko nangyigawie kyioṟa kyaṙu.”
42012014	Kammbia, “Iyoe mndu, nyi wui alengyiwika inyi ngyiwe moṙumbuo moondu yanyu ang'u mogawa shindo shanyu?”
42012015	Kawawia, “Kushowenyi na wuneesi, kyipfa moo o mndu ukyeri shindonyi shakye awoṙe-pfo.”
42012016	Kawawia mfano, echigamba, “Ṙema lya mndu umwi mnjama lyiwewoṙe shilyimu shifoi mnu.
42012017	Kawooka ikusaṟa mrimenyi kokye, echigamba, ‘Ngyiwikye kuṙa, kyipfa ngyiwoṙe handu ngyekooma shilyimu shako-pfo?’
42012018	Kagamba, ‘Ngyewika kuṙi, ngyeunduo shikumbi shako ngyiwikye shingyi shing'anyi kuta ishi, na ipfo ngyechikooma kyilyimu kyako kyoose na shindo shako.
42012019	Numa ya iho ngyegamba, iyoe mrima oko, nuwoṙe shindo shicha shifoi ukoomie ko maka ifoi. Onyonya-ng'u, ulye, unyo, uchihiyo.’
42012020	Kyaindi Ruwa kammbia, ‘Iyoe tondo, kyio-kyi kya inu wakundi mrima opfo. Na shindo-sho ukoomie shewa sha wui?’
42012021	Nyi wuṙo akyeri mndu ekyekoomia mrima okye kyiseyesoe alakusurie Ruwa.”
42012022	Kawia wanalosho wakye, “Kyipfa kya ikyo ngyimmbia, maa mulawinie moo yanyu, mochilya kyi; maa mmbiu yanyu mochiṟaa kyi.
42012023	Cha kyipfa iwaṙa moo nyi kyindo kying'anyi kuta kyelya, na mmbiu nyi ngoseṟa kuta nguwo.
42012024	Kusaṟenyi mbonyi tsa makuru, kye gekyewaaya maa isambuo-pfo; gawoṙe shikumbi maa handu hekooma shindo-pfo, indi Ruwa nekyegaenenga kyelya. Nanga nyoe kafoi kuta shileye!
42012025	Nyi wui konyu kakuwinisha echiiṙima iengyeṟa moo okye maa mfiri umwi?
42012026	Kyasia, kokooya mulechiiṙima iwuta maa kyindo kyitutu, ny'kyilyi mukuwinisha kya shilya shingyi?
42012027	Kusaṟenyi mbonyi tsa shiwaṟo chandu shekyeṙo. Shekyeṟunda kyindo kyoose-pfo; indi inyi ngyimmbia kye maa Solomon mng'anonyi okye oose aleṟiko necha cha kyiwaṟo kyimwi kya isho-pfo.
42012028	Kyasia kokooya Ruwa nekyeṟika kuṙo maṟa ga ipfo ṙemenyi, gakyeri ho inu na ngama gakawiyitso moṙonyi ngyesa emmbutia ngoseṟa, nyoe wa iiṙikyia lyaangu?
42012029	Nyoe mulapfule mulye kyi ang'u munyo kyi-pfo. Maa mulaiṟewe mrimenyi,
42012030	kyipfa isho shoose nyisho masanga ga wuyana gekyepfula, kyaindi Awu onyu naichi kye mukundi isho.
42012031	Indi pfulenyi Wumangyi wo Ruwa, na isho mochiengyeṟio.”
42012032	“Maa mulaowuoe nyoe poo lyitutu, cha kyipfa Awu onyu nawona nyi kyicha imuenenga Wumangyi wulya.
42012033	Kumbenyi isho muwoṙe, muwute kyiano. Achikyienyi shikuchu shilekyekuo, koomenyi kyiseyesoe kyanyu ruwewu handu kyechiengyeṟika, handu halekyeshika mbafu, maa shinu lyilekyenyamaṟa.
42012034	Cha kyipfa handu kyiseyesoe kyanyu kyikyeri nyi ho-ndu na mrima yanyu yechikaa.”
42012035	“Mukuṟeyeṟe, mukuinewie kyitsinyi, na taa tsanyu tsikae tseaka;
42012036	muwe cha wandu waiweṙelyia mndumii owo, ilyi ewuya iwuka wolyinyi, kundu kyiyeri echicha na ikapa-kapa moongo, wampfunguye moongo cha ilyi.
42012037	Wagusu waṟundi walya, kyiyeri mndumii owo echicha nawakooye walee kyiṙombo. Loi ngyimmbia, nekuinewa na iwaenenga kyelya, na iwaṟundia.
42012038	Na oe kacha lya kawi, ang'u kacha lya kaṟaaṟu, na iwakooya kuṙi, wagusu waṟundi-wo.
42012039	Kyaindi manyenyi kyindo-kyi kye monyi kanyi awemanya kyiyeri mbafu yechicha, nawelaa kyiṙombo, maa aweṙa numba yakye ifunjo-pfo.
42012040	Na nyoe kuṟeyeṟenyi, cha kyipfa kyiyeri mulaichi nyi lyo-ndu Mana o Adamu echicha.”
42012041	Petiro kammbia, “Mndumii, mfano-cho noluwia soe tikyi, ang'u wandu woose taa?”
42012042	Mndumii kagamba, “Kyasia, nyi wui-ng'u akyeri mṟundi msimiri, amṟango, ulya mndumii okye echimmbika nasongoye maṟunda gakye goose, naenengye wandu shelya kui kyiyeri kyiwaṟi?
42012043	Agusu mṟundi ulya mndumii okye echicha namkooye echiwuta kuṙo.
42012044	Loi ngyimmbia, nemmbika nachilyie shindo shakye shoose.
42012045	Kyaindi, mṟundi ulya kagamba mrimenyi kokye, ‘Mndumii oko naikyelyio icha’, kawooka ikapa walya wekyeṟunda na oe, wasoṟo na waka, echilya na inyo na inango;
42012046	Mndumii o mṟundi-cho nechicha mfiri alaukusaṟie na kyiyeri alaichi, nemṙumbuo mateng'eta gawi na immbikyia hamwi na walaiṙikyie.
42012047	Na mṟundi ulya alemanya kyindo mndumii okye akundi, alakuṟeyeṟe, maa alawute kyilya mndumii okye akundi, nechikapo mnu.
42012048	Na ulya alaichi na oe nawuta kyiwaṟi ikapo, nekapo kyitutu. Na orio mndu aleenengo shifoi, icho neweso shifoi, na ulya alekoomio shindo shifoi, kokye werika na ngoseṟa.”
42012049	“Ngyilecha iwiyitsa moṙo wuyanenyi; na moṙo-cho wukomwaka ny'kyikyi ngyikundi ngoseṟa?
42012050	Kyaindi ngyiwoṙe wupatiso ngyiwaṟi ipatiso, na inyi ngyiwoṙo fowa ing'anyi mṟasa wupatiso-wo wuafutsio!
42012051	Ngyesa mokusaṟa kye ngyilecha iende ufoṟo wuyanenyi? Ngyimmbia, ote, chi wuṙo-pfo, indi maletsano.
42012052	Cha kyipfa wookyia wulalu numbenyi imwi kowaṙa wandu wataanu walekanyi, waṟaaṟu wewingana na wandu wawi, wawi wewingana na wandu waṟaaṟu.
42012053	Awu na mono-kye wechilekana, na mana na awuye; mama o mndu na mono-kye o kyika, na mana o kyika na wamae; mndu na watoe okye na watoe na watoe o mndu.”
42012054	Yesu kawia-se wuingyi wulya wo wandu, “Orio kyiyeri mokyewona ipuchi ura lo kyukonyi cha ilyi mokyegamba, ‘Mvuo iicha’; kyikawa kuṙo.
42012055	Na ilyi kokyecha mkuma owuka ura lo kyawuye, mokyegamba, ‘Kowaṙa mrikye’; na nyi wuṙo kyikyeri.
42012056	Nyoe wakulembecheṟi mokyeiṙima imanya chandu kochiwa urukyenyi na ngyinenyi; kyasia, kyawa kuṙa-ng'u kye moiṙima imanya kyiyeri-kyi-pfo?”
42012057	“ Ny'kyilyi nyoe muwenyi kui mrima yanyu mulekyeṙumbuo iwuta shikyeri sha sungusinyi?
42012058	Kokooya ooshana na ulya uwoṙe na oe moondu iyenda ko moṙumbuo moondu, ipfo njienyi pfuṟukana isanza na oe, alachekukuruo mṟasa ko mchilyi, mchilyi ulya kakuṙambika mawokonyi ga ulya ekyeṙumbuo moondu, kakuwiyitsa kyipfungonyi.
42012059	Ngyikuwia, owuka pfo mṟasa umarise itaa helo ya mafurumionyi-pfo.”
42013001	Na kyiyeri kyilya kyilya kuwewoṙe wandu walemwendie mbonyi tsa Wagalyilaya walya Pilato alewawaaga kyiyeri waweiṙasa.
42013002	Kawagaluo, kawawia, “Ngyesa mokusaṟa kye Wagalyilaya-wo wawewoṙe maṙeko kuta Wagalyilaya wengyi woose, mṟasa wakawutio kuṙo?
42013003	Ngyimmbia, chi wuṙo-pfo; kyaindi mulandeṙumbuye wunyamaṟi, nyoe moose mowerumatso mbaṟe-yo iyo.
42013004	Ang'u walya ikumi na nyanya, waleolokyio nyi numba ipfo Siloamu, ikawawaaga, mokusaṟa kye wawewanyamaṟi kuta wandu woose wawekyeri Yerusalemu?
42013005	Ngyimmbia, chi wuṙo-pfo, kyaindi mulandeṙumbuye wunyamaṟi, nyoe moose mochirumatso mbaṟe-yo iyo.”
42013006	Yesu kawawia mfano chu: “Mndu umwi nawewoṙe mfumu umṙongye ṙemenyi lyakye lya msabibu, kayenda indepfula pfo ndunda alawone.
42013007	Kawia ulya awekyeambuya ṙema-lyo lya msabibu, ‘Maka-i iṟaṟu ngyekyecha ipfula ndunda kunu mfumunyi, ngyilawone kyindo. Umanye, kyipfa uinyamaṟa teri.’
42013008	Kagaluo, kammbia, ‘Mndumii uṙe maka-chu, ngyiukawilyie, ngyiuwikye sari;
42013009	nacho ukowika ndunda, nyi kyicha, ote, numa ya iho ulandewikye ndunda, uumanye-ng'u.’ ”
42013010	Mfiri o onyonya naweiloshia sinagoginyi lyimwi.
42013011	Naaho hawewoṙe mndu mka awewoṙo nyi waṟufui wa wufafa kyiyeri kya maka ikumi na nyanya, na oe nalemekyie, eiṙima igoṟoka-pfo.
42013012	Kyiyeri Yesu alemmbona nalemlaga, kammbia, “Mama, nowuto wufafenyi wopfo.”
42013013	Kayekyia mawoko wuye yakye, na oe kagoṟoka cha ilyi kaṟumisha Ruwa.
42013014	Kyasia ang'anyi o sinagogi nalesuo kyipfa Yesu nakyiṟa mndu mfiri o onyonya. Kagaluo, kawia walya wawesanzie halya, “Kuwoṙe mfiri iṟaandaṟu iwaṟi iṟunda, kyasia nnjonyi mukyiṟo mfiri-yo, maa chi mfiri o onyonya-pfo.”
42013015	Kyaindi Mndumii kagaluo, kagamba, “Nyoe wakulembecheṟi, orio umwi onyu, ngyesa ekyepfunguo umbe yakye ang'u nzoi yakye mfiṟigenyi mfiri o onyonya nandeirutsa mṟinga-pfoe?
42013016	Na mndu mka-chu, akyeri o kyishari kya Abrahamu, ichu Satana alempfunga maka-i ikumi na nyanya, kyiwewaṟi nawuto kyipfungo-kyi mfiri o onyonya-pfoe?”
42013017	Kyiyeri alegamba ikyo walewoṙo nyi sonu woose wawewingana na oe. Kyisanzionyi kyoose kyikachihiyo kyipfa kya mbonyi tsa mng'ano tsileṟundo nyi oe.
42013018	Numa ya iho kagamba, “Wumangyi wo Ruwa wukyeri cha kyikyi? Na inyi ngyiwulyingatsane na kyikyi?
42013019	Wukyeri cha mbeu ya haradalyi mndu alewuta kaiolyia ṙemenyi lyakye; ikaṙo, ikawa ikyiṙi, shileye sha ngyinenyi shikaṙamia mbagenyi tsalyo.”
42013020	Kagamba lya kawi, “Ngyilyingatsane na kyikyi Wumangyi wo Ruwa?
42013021	Wukyeri cha chachu mndu mka alewuta kaisanzia shitelenyi shiṟaaṟu sha mso, mṟasa ukotarang'aa woose taa.”
42013022	Na oe naweiiṙa mṟinyi na shikaṟonyi echilosha, kyaronyi kyakye kya iyenda Yerusalemu.
42013023	Mndu umwi kammbesa, “Ngyesa Mndumii, wandu waikyiṟo nyi waangu?” Kawawia,
42013024	“Pfuṟukanenyi iiṙia moongonyi msuse, cha kyipfa ngyimmbia kye wafoi wechikunda iiṙa walaiṙime.
42013025	Kyiyeri monyi kanyi echigoṟoka na ishinga moongo, na nyoe mukowooka igoṟoka nja na ikapa-kapa moongo, mochigamba, ‘Hoi Mndumii, lupfunguye moongo’; oe negaluo na immbia, ‘Ngyiichi kundu muwukyie-pfo’.
42013026	Nyi lyo-ndu mowooka igamba, ‘Lulelya na inyo mbele yapfo, na iyoe nulelosha njienyi tsaṙu.’
42013027	Na oe negamba, ‘Ngammbia, ngyiichi kundu muwukyie-pfo; wukyenyi koko nyoe moose mokyeṟunda mawicho.’
42013028	Nyi lyo-ndu kochiwaṙa kyifiiṟo na ilya ngakuru, kyiyeri mochiwona Abrahamu, Isakyi na Yakobo na weonguo shisuku woose Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa, na nyoe muwenyi muwawiyitse nja.
42013029	Na kochicha wandu iwuka ura lo ngamenyi na lo kyukonyi, na iwuka ura lo kyawuye na lo kyaseri, nawo weṙamia wechilya kyelya Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa.
42013030	Kuwoṙe wakyeri wa mafurumionyi wechiwa wa kuwooka, na wa kuwooka wechiwa wa mafurumionyi.”
42013031	Kyiyeri kyilya kyilya Mafarisayo waata wakayenda kokye, wakammbia, “Wuka iha, uyende handu hengyi, cha kyipfa Herode nakundi ikuwaaga.”
42013032	Kawawia, “Yendenyi mundewia ipaara lyilya, ‘Ambuya, inu na ngama ngyiwuta waṟufui wawicho na ikyiṟa waluoe, mfiri o kaṟaaṟu ngyemarisa iṟunda lyako.’
42013033	Hamwi na isho, ngama na kyilalau, kyangyikooya iengyeṟa iwa mokyaro. Kyipfa chi kyicha moonguo shisuku nawoogo ai nja ya Yerusalemu-pfo.
42013034	Iyoe Yerusalemu, Yerusalemu, uiwaaga weonguo shisuku na ikapa na magoe walya waleṙumo kopfo, nyi kyenga ngyilekunda isania wana wapfo chandu nguku yekyesania shiwana shayo makungonyi gayo, maa mulekunda-pfo.
42013035	Moṙeeyo numba yanyu ilawoṙe mndu! Na inyi ngyimmbia, mochingyiwona-se maa ale-pfo mṟasa kyiyeri mochigamba, ‘Nammbikyie mboṟa ulya aicha kui rina lya Mndumii.’ ”
42014001	Kyikawa-ng'u kyiyeri aleiṙa na numbenyi ya mndu umwi kyiiṙi kya wang'anyi wa Mafarisayo mfiri o onyonya, nalye kyelya, wawemlaalyia.
42014002	Na mbele yakye hawewoṙe mndu awoṙe ndoṟe ya safura.
42014003	Yesu kagaluo, kawia walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo, “Ngyesa nyi sungusinyi ikyiṟa mndu mfiri o onyonya ang'u chi wuṙo-pfo?”
42014004	Wakatsia. Kammbaṙa kamkyiṟa, kamwenenga momu nayende.
42014005	Kawawia, “Nyi wui kyiiṙi kyanyu, kokooya umbe yakye ang'u nzoi yakye yaoloka kyisimenyi alechiiwuta-pfo mfiri o onyonya?”
42014006	Nawo waleiṙima igaluo maṙeṙo-ga-pfo.
42014007	Kawia mfano walya wawewalage, kyiyeri alewona chandu walesambuṟa shitima sha mbele; echigamba,
42014008	“Mndu kakulaga na wolyinyi, ulaṙamie kyitimenyi kya mbele. Kyilawe kye mndu ekyeindio kuta iyoe namlage,
42014009	na ulya awekulagie iyoe kacha na ikuwia, ‘Seiya ichu!’ Nyi lyo-ndu ochiwooka iṙamia handu ha numa kui sonu.
42014010	Indi kolago, yenda undeṙamia handu ha numa, kundu ulya alekulaga kacha nakuwie, ‘Mbuya-yako, nnjo na kunu mbele ngoseṟa.’ Nyi lyo-ndu owaṙa kyiṟumi mbele ya woose waṙamie hamwi na iyoe.
42014011	Cha kyipfa orio mokung'anyisa nechititiṟo na ulya mokutitiṟa neching'anyiso.”
42014012	Kawia ulya alemlaga, “Kyiyeri okoṟa kyelya kya kyingoto ang'u kya kyukonyi, maa ulalage mbuya tsapfo maa wana wa wama wapfo, maa kyishari kyapfo, maa wamṟasa wapfo wawoṙe masaa; kundu wo walachekulaga iyoe kotoo.
42014013	Indi kyiyeri okoṟa shelya laga wakyiwa, wawoṙe shiwungo shifiri, shileeta, shipfupfuṟe,
42014014	na iyoe nochiwa nanga, cha kyipfa iwo wawoṙe kyekutaa-pfo; kyipfa nochitoo kyiyeri kya iṟuka lya wasumganyi.”
42014015	Kyasia kyiyeri aleicho isho umwi o walya waweilya hamwi na oe nalemmbia, “Agusu ulya echilya mkate Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa.”
42014016	Kammbia, “Mndu umwi naleachikyia karama ing'anyi kalaga wandu wafoi.
42014017	Kaṙuma mṟundi okye kyiyeri kya ilya kyelya nawie walya wawewalage, ‘Nnjonyi, cha kyipfa shindo shoose shamuṟeyeṟo.’
42014018	Wakawooka woose iloṟa chandu walechiiṙima iyenda: O kuwooka nalemmbia, ‘Ngyileguṟa ṙema, kyangyikooya iyenda ngyindelyiambuya; ngyiterewa ungyihooṟie.’
42014019	Ungyi kagamba, ‘Ngyileguṟa umbe ikumi tseṙema, ngyindetsiyesha; ngyiterewa ungyihooṟie.’
42014020	Ungyi kagamba, ‘Ngyilealyika mka, na kyipfa kya ikyo ngyechiiṙima icha-pfo.’
42014021	Mṟundi ulya kayenda, kaenenga mndumii okye mbonyi tsa shindo-sho. Kyasia, ulya monyi kanyi kasuo, kawia mṟundi okye, ‘Fuma iwinyi, uyende njienyi ing'anyi na shimṟaṟu sha mṟi, uende wakyiwa na iha, na wawoṙe shiwungo shifiri, na shipfupfuṟe, na shileeta.’
42014022	Mṟundi kagamba, ‘Mndumii, isho ogamba shamṟundika. Kyaindi maa wulalu kuwoṙe ṙaawa.’
42014023	Mndumii kawia mṟundi, ‘Fuma na nja uyende mtandaṟenyi na mṟasenyi, undewaitika iiṙa na numba, numba yako iiṙime iichuo.
42014024	Kyipfa ngyimmbia kye kyiiṙi kya walya wawewalage, kuwoṙe maa umwi esonja karama yako-pfo.’ ”
42014025	Kyiyeri wuingyi wufoi wo wandu wuweoshana na oe, naleinduka kawawia,
42014026	“Kokooya mndu acha na koko na oe asuuye awuye maa wamae, na mka okye, na wana wakye, na wana wa wamae wa kyisoṟo na wa kyika; yee maa mrima okye amonyi, echiiṙima iwa manalosho oko-pfo.
42014027	Mndu oose alechiṙuo msalaba okye na ingyiosha, echiiṙima iwa manalosho oko-pfo.
42014028	Kyipfa nyi wui kyiiṙi kyanyu, kokooya akundi iwika numba, alechiṙamia na itala woguru, kye nawoṙe sheimarisia?
42014029	Alachelemo iimarisia ammbikye urende, wandu woose wawonyi wakawooka imwinyala,
42014030	wechigamba, ‘Mndu-chu nalewooka iwika numba, kyikawa awoṙe pfinya tseimarisia-pfo.’
42014031	Ang'u kuwoṙe mangyi uha, akundi indekapana na mangyi ungyi, alechiṙamia kuwooka na ikusaṟa kye oe na wandu shiku ikumi nechiiṙima ikapana na ulya awoṙe wandu shiku makumi gawi?
42014032	Na kokooya awona echiiṙima-pfo, nekyeṙuma ndumi iterewa ufoṟo, mndu ulya akyeri kuleshi.
42014033	Kyasia, na wuṙo orio umwi onyu alandeṙe shoose awoṙe, eiṙima iwa manalosho oko-pfo.”
42014034	“Munyu nyi kyindo kyicha. Kyaindi munyu ukomnyamaṟika owiko-kyi uiṙime ilotsiṟa?
42014035	Ochiwaṙa-se kyiira ko kyindo kyoose-pfo. Wandu wekyeuwiyitsa nja. Awoṙe maṙwi geaṙanyia, naaṙanyie.”
42015001	Kyasia wesania ukamba woose na wanyamaṟi wawetikyira kufuhi na oe wamwaṙanyie.
42015002	Mafarisayo na walosha wa mawawaso wakamnunuwia, wechigamba, “Mndu-chu nekyeambilyia wanyamaṟi, na ngoseṟa nekyelya nawo.”
42015003	Kawawia mfano-chu, echigamba,
42015004	“Nyi wui konyu, awoṙe moondo igana, lyimwi lyikaṙeka ho, alechiṙa galya makumi kyenda na kyenda patenyi, nandepfula lyilya lyiṙekyie mṟasa nalyiwone?
42015005	Na oe kamlyiwona, nekyelyiwika mayewenyi gakye amchihiye.
42015006	Na kamshika kanyi kokye, nekyelaga mbuya tsakye na wamṟasa wakye, kawawia, ‘Chihiyonyi hamwi na inyi, cha kyipfa ngammbona ondo lyako lyiweṙekyie.’
42015007	Ngyimmbia nyi wuṙo kochiwaṙa sia ruwewu kyipfa kya mnyamaṟi umwi echiṙumbuya wunyamaṟi, kuta kyipfa kya wasumganyi makumi kyenda na kyenda walawaṟi iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi.”
42015008	“Ang'u kuwoṙe mndu mka uha awoṙe shilyingyi ikumi, kaṙetsa imwi alechikoṟa taa na iaiya numba, na ipfula kui wuragari mṟasa naiwone?
42015009	Na kamwiwona, nekyelaga mbuya tsakye na wamṟasa wakye, kawawia, ‘Chihiyonyi hamwi na inyi, cha kyipfa ngawona-se shilyingyi iya iweṙekyie.’
42015010	Ngyimmbia, ‘Nyi wuṙo kuwoṙe sia mbele ya malaika wa Ruwa kyipfa kya mnyamaṟi umwi aṙumbuya wunyamaṟi.’ ”
42015011	Kagamba, “Mndu umwi nawewoṙe wana wawi.
42015012	Ulya mtutu kawia awuye, ‘Papa, ngyienenga ugawi loko lungyiwaṟi.’ Kawagawia shindo shakye.
42015013	Na komiiṙe mfiri ngyaangu, ulya mtutu kasania shoose, kayenda kyaro uruka lo kuleshi; kaola-ola masaa gakye mbonyinyi tsa wuṟui.
42015014	Na amwole-ole shoose, kukocha njaa ing'anyi kulya urukyenyi, na oe kawooka iuṟa kyindo kyelyio.
42015015	Kandeterewa kyiṟundio ko mndu umwi o uruka lulya, na oe kamṙuo ṙemenyi lyakye iambuya nguwe.
42015016	Kalanga ilya makanda gawekyelyio nyi nguwe, maa kuwoṙe mndu alemwenenga kyindo-pfo.
42015017	Kyiyeri alekusaṟa mrimenyi kokye, nalegamba, ‘Nyi waṟundi wenga wa awu oko wekyelya shelya na itsugaṟa, na inyi iha ngyiipfa njaa?’
42015018	Ngyefuma, ngyiyende ko awu oko ngyimmbie, ‘Papa, ngyileṙekyio Ruwa na iyoe.
42015019	Ngyiwaṟi ngyilago mono-pfo-se-pfo. Ngyigaluo cha umwi o waṟundi wapfo.’
42015020	Kafuma kayenda ko awuye. Kyiyeri awekyeri kuleshi, awuye nalemmbona, kamsaṟia, kakapa mteeṟa, kamwolokyia ipfo nzingonyi kamkomba mnu.
42015021	Mana ulya kammbia, ‘Papa, ngyileṙekyio Ruwa na iyoe; ngyiwaṟi ngyilago-se mana opfo-pfo.’
42015022	Kyaindi awuye nalewia waṟundi wakye, ‘Endenyi iwinyi nguwo ngyicha, mumṟikye; mṟikyenyi na peti kyimnyoenyi, na shiaṙu maṙendenyi.
42015023	Endenyi ngache iya ngyinoru muishinje; na soe lulye na ichihiyo.
42015024	Cha kyipfa mana-chu oko nawepfiie, na oe naṟuka; naweṙekyie, na oe nawono.’ Wakawooka ianga na ichihiyo.
42015025	Kyasia, mana ulya okye mmbele nawekyeri ṙemenyi na lyilya aweicha na itikyira kufuhi na numba, naleicho ṟui lya shiimbo na temo.
42015026	Kalaga mṟundi umwi, kammbesa, ‘Mbonyi-tso tsaloṟa-kyi?’
42015027	Kammbia, ‘Mono-womoo nacha, na awuyo namshinjia ngache gyinoru, kyipfa nammbona-se ai na moo.’
42015028	Kasuo, kalega iiṙa na numba. Kyasia awuye kafumia nja, kamterewa.
42015029	Kagaluo awuye, kagamba, ‘Inyi ngyilekuṟundia maka-i yoose, maa ngyilandekuṙekyio-pfo, kyaindi ulandengyienengye maa kyiṙaina, ngyichihiyo na mbuya tsako-pfo.
42015030	Kyaindi, kyiyeri mana-chu opfo acha, alelya shindo shapfo hamwi na maṟai nomshinjia ngache gyinoru.’
42015031	Kammbia, ‘Mono-ko, iyoe nukyeri na inyi mfiri yoose, na shoose ngyiwoṙe nyi shapfo.
42015032	Lyingyi-se, ichihiyo na ishina kyiwaṟi cha kyipfa mono-wama-chu opfo nawepfiie, na oe naṟuka; naweṙekyie, na oe nawono.’ ”
42016001	Lyingyi-se nalewia wanalosho wakye. “Kuwewoṙe mndu umwi, mnjama, awewoṙe mringyi okye o masaa. Ichu naleshitakyio kokye kye naiola-ola masaa gakye.
42016002	Kamlaga, kammbia, ‘Nyi mbonyi tsa mbaṟe iha itsi ngyiichuoe tseṙeṙo kyipfa kyapfo? Loṟa matala ga iṟunda lyapfo, cha kyipfa uiṙima iwa-se mringyi o masaa-pfo.’
42016003	Mringyi ulya kagamba mrimenyi kokye, ‘Ngyiwikye kuṙa? Kyipfa mndumii oko naingyifuna kyiṟundionyi kyako. Iṙema ngyeiṙima-pfo, iterewa, ngiwona sonu.
42016004	Ngammanya kyindo ngyechiwuta, kundu ngamfuno kyiṟundionyi kyako, wangyiambilyie kanyi kowo.’
42016005	Kalaga walya waweriko na mndumii okye, umwi umwi; kawia o kuwooka, ‘Nuriko kyi na mndumii oko?’
42016006	Kagamba, ‘Shiyeṟo igana sha mafuṙa.’ Kammbia, ‘Wuta kyiṟeio kyapfo, ṙamia iwinyi, ṟeia makumi gataanu.’
42016007	Numa kawia ungyi, ‘Aa iyoe nuiriko kyi?’ Kagamba, ‘Makunyia igana ga nganu.’ Kammbia, ‘Wuta kyiṟeio kyapfo, ṟeia makumi nyanya.’
42016008	Mndumii ulya kaṟumisha mringyi ulya mmbicho kyipfa ilyi alewuta kui wuṟango; cha kyipfa wana wa wuyana-wu rikyenyi lyawo wawenyi waṟango kuta wana wa saa.
42016009	Na inyi ngyimmbia, waṙenyi mbuya na shindo sha wuyana, kundu kyiyeri shewuṟika wamuambilyie kulya-ndu mochikaa mlungana.
42016010	Mndu moringa necha kyilya kyitutu amwenengye, neringa necha na shilya shing'anyi taa.
42016011	Kyasia, kokooya nyoe mulechiiṙima iringa shindo sha wuyana, nyi wui emuenenga iringa shilya sha wuloi?
42016012	Na kokooya mulechiiṙima iringa shindo sha mndu ungyi, nyi wui echimuenenga shilya shikyeri shanyu muwenyi.
42016013	Kuwoṙe mṟundi eiṙima iṟundia wandumii wawi-pfo; cha kyipfa, nechisuo ichu na ikunda ichu, ang'u newaṙana na ichu na imina ichu. Mochiiṙima iṟundia Ruwa na masaa-pfo.”
42016014	Kyasia Mafarisayo, wakyeri kye wo wawenyi nyi wandu wakundi heleri, waleicho isho shoose, wakamtaluo.
42016015	Kawawia, “Nyoe mokyekushelyia wusumganyi mbele ya wandu, kyaindi Ruwa naichi mrima yanyu; cha kyipfa kyindo kyang'anyiso ko wandu kyekyewa wusutsu mbele ya Ruwa.
42016016	Uwawaso na weonguo shisuku shiwekyeri-pfo mṟasa Yohane, wookyia kyiyeri-kyo ulogo lucha lo Wumangyi wo Ruwa lokyeongoyo, na orio mndu nekyeiṙa napfo ko pfinya.
42016017	Kyaindi nyi kyaangu Ruwewu na uruka shiwukye ho, kuta kyindo kyitung'tu kya uwawaso kyechiwuka ho.
42016018	Orio mndu echiṙa mka okye na ialyika ungyi naṟuguya; na mndu moalyika ulya aṙio nyi mii okye naṟuguya.”
42016019	Kagamba, “Kuwewoṙe mndu umwi, mnjama, awekyeṟaa nguwo tsa kyimaande-maande na kyimari-mari kyicha, echilya mfiri yoose kui wunjama.
42016020	Na mkyiwa umwi, ekyelago Lasaro, awewoṙe mapee gafoi, nawekyeṟamiṟo moongonyi o mnjama-cho,
42016021	na oe nawekyelanga iigutso kui shelya-sho shiwekyetonyika mesenyi ko mnjama ulya; mṟasa shite shikachemkomba mapee gakye.
42016022	Kyikawa kye mkyiwa ulya nalepfa, malaika wakamṙuo wakammbikyia kufuhi na Abrahamu. Mnjama ulya na oe kapfa, kaṟiko.
42016023	Kyasia, akyeri matuuronyi kulya ko wapfu kawona Abrahamu akyeri kuleshi, na Lasaro kufuhi na oe.
42016024	Kafiiṟa, kagamba, ‘Hoi papa Abrahamu, ngyiwonia wukyiwa, uṙume Lasaro nawikye kyimnyoe kyakye mṟingyenyi naoloṟe ulumi loko, kyipfa ngyituuro kunu moṙonyi.’
42016025	Abrahamu kagamba, ‘Mono-ko, kumbuo kye iyoe nuleambilyia mecha gapfo kyiyeri uwekyeri na moo, na Lasaro nyi wuṙo alewona mawicho; na wulalu oe nakyeri iha naiwiyiṟio moo, na iyoe nutuuro.
42016026	Na ngoseṟa ya isho, makyiṙi-gawi gaṙu soe na nyoe hawikye mkuwa ung'anyi, kundu wakundi iwuka kunu wache na konyu walaiṙime; maa wandu wa konyu walaambaṙe icha na koṙu.’
42016027	Kagamba, ‘Kyasia-ng'u papa, ngyikuterewa, uṙume kanyi ko awu oko,
42016028	cha kyipfa ngyiwoṙe wana wa wama wataanu, kundu nawaṟingyishie, kundu maa wo taa walacheecha na handu-ha ha matuuro.’
42016029	Abrahamu kagamba, ‘Wawoṙe Mose na weonguo shisuku; wawaaṙanyie wo.’
42016030	Kagamba, ‘Ote, papa Abrahamu, kyaindi kokooya mndu awukyie ko wapfu ayenda kowo, weṙumbuya.’
42016031	Kammbia, ‘Walandeaṙanyie Mose na weonguo shisuku, wesaṟa kyindo maa mndu kaṟuka ko wapfu-pfo.’ ”
42017001	Kawia wanalosho wakye, “Shindo shetewe shiwaṟi icha, kyaindi ochia lo mndu ulya shiicha kyipfa kyakye!
42017002	Nanga mndu-cho awepfungyio ikyesa nzingonyi kokye, nandewiyitso ipalyipalyinyi, kuta itewe umwi o iwa watutu.
42017003	Kuṟiisenyi! Kokooya mono-wama opfo akuṙekyio mṙeṙie; kaṙumbuya wunyamaṟi mhooṟie.
42017004	Na kokooya akuṙekyio ka mfungaaṙe mfiri umwi, na iwuya na kopfo ka mfungaaṙe, kagamba, ‘Ngaṙumbuya’, mhooṟie.”
42017005	Wasu wakammbia, “Mndumii, luengyeṟie iiṙikyia.”
42017006	Mndumii kagamba, “Kokooya muwewoṙe iiṙikyia lyitutu cha mbeu ya haradalyi, muwewia mkuu-chu, ‘Kuluka, undeṙongo ipalyipalyinyi’, nakyo kyiwechiwa kuṙo.”
42017007	“Kyaindi, nyi wui konyu awoṙe mṟundi moṙema ang'u molyisa umbe, echimmbia ilyi awuka patenyi, ‘Nnjo iwinyi, ṙamia, ulye kyelya?’
42017008	Ngyesa emmbia, ‘Ngyiachikyia kyelya, ngyilye; kuṟeyeṟe ungyiṟundie, mṟasa ngyimarise ilya na inyo, nyilyo na iyoe ochilya na inyo-pfoe?’
42017009	Ngyesa nemmbia haika mṟundi ulya, kyipfa awuta shilya alewio?
42017010	Nyi wuṙo maa nyoe, mukommarisa iwuta shoose mulewio, gambenyi, ‘Soe nyi waṟundi walawoṙe kyiira, loṟunda shilya shiweluwaṟi iwuta tikyi.’ ”
42017011	Kyiyeri waweiyenda Yerusalemu, naweiṙa makyiṙi-gawi ga Samaria na Galyilaya.
42017012	Na kyiyeri aleiṙa na kyikaṟonyi kyimwi, nalekarisana na wandu ikumi wawoṙo nyi taambo; wakagoṟoka kuleshi.
42017013	Wakakuilenga wechigamba, “Hoi Yesu, Mndumii ung'anyi, ulusaṟie!”
42017014	Kyiyeri alewawona nalewawia, “Yendenyi mundekuloṟa ko makohanyi.” Kyiyeri waweiyenda, waleila.
42017015	Na umwi owo ammbone kye nachia, nalewuya, echiana Ruwa kui ṟui lying'anyi.
42017016	Kakuolotsa wanda maṙendenyi gakye, kamwana; na oe nyi-we Msamaria.
42017017	Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Waleilyisho woose ikumi-pfoe? Walya kyenda wookwi?
42017018	Ngyesa kuwoṙe walewuya icheenenga Ruwa mng'ano sile myenu-chu?”
42017019	Kammbia, “Goṟoka, yenda, iiṙikyia lyapfo lyakukyiṟa.”
42017020	Na kyiyeri aleweso nyi Mafarisayo Wumangyi wo Ruwa wochicha indi nalegaluo, kawawia, “Wumangyi wo Ruwa wuicha kui iwusoruo-pfo.
42017021	Maa wechigamba, ‘Ambuya, wukyeri kunu, ang'u kulya-pfo;’ cha kyipfa Wumangyi wo Ruwa wukyeri kyiiṙi kyanyu.”
42017022	Kawia wanalosho wakye, “Mfiri iicha kyiyeri mochilanga iwona mfiri umwi kyiiṙi kya mfiri ya Mana o Adamu, mulechiuwona.
42017023	Lyingyi-se wemmbia, ‘Ambuya, kulya! Ambuya, kunu!’ Maa mulawukye handu mukyeri, maa mulawaoshe.
42017024	Cha kyipfa, chandu mbawa tsekyelyimika iwuka ura-lu mṟasa ura-lu wanda ya ngyina, nyi wuṙo kyechiwa ko Mana o Adamu kyiyeri echicha lya kawi.
42017025	Kyaindi kuwooka, kyamkooya iwona matuuro gafoi, na ilego nyi rika-lyi.
42017026	Na chandu kuwei kyiyeri kya Noe, nyi wuṙo kochiwa mfiri Mana o Adamu echicha lya kawi.
42017027	Waweilya na inyo, waweialyika na ialyiko, mṟasa mfiri ulya Noe aleiṙa na Safinenyi, ngapo ikacha ikawarumatsa woose.
42017028	Nyi wuṙo taa, chandu kuwekyeri mfiri iya ya Loti, weweilya na inyo, waweiguṟa na ikumba, waweiwaaya na iwika numba;
42017029	kyaindi mfiri ulya Loti alewuka Sodoma kuleoloka moṙo na kyipiriti iwuka ruwewu, shikawarumatsa woose.
42017030	Nyi wuṙo kochiwa mfiri ulya o iwoneka lya Mana o Adamu.
42017031	Mfiri ulya, akyeri kai na shindo shakye shikyeri numba, alasokye icheshionduo. Nyi wuṙo taa, akyeri mṙemenyi alaambuye numa.
42017032	Kumbuonyi mka o Loti.
42017033	Mndu oose echikyiṟa mrima okye, neuṙetsa, na oose echiuṙetsa neukyiṟa.
42017034	Ngyimmbia, kyio-kyo wandu wawi wechikooyo kyitaṟenyi kyimwi; umwi neṙoo na umwi neṙio.
42017035	Waka wawi wekooyo wesaa handu hamwi; umwi neṙoo na umwi neṙio.” [
42017036	“Wandu wawi wekooyo mṙemenyi, umwi neṙoo, umwi neṙio.”]
42017037	Wakagaluo, wakammbesa, “Ny'kwi, Mndumii?” Kawawia, “Handu hawoṙe mnying'a nyi ho-ndu hechikuumbia mtonyi.”
42018001	Kawawia mfano, kye kyawakooya iterewa Ruwa mfiri yoose, maa walapfiio nyi mṙoe.
42018002	Kagamba, “Kuwewoṙe moanduo moondu mṟinyi mlyiwe, alekyeindia Ruwa, maa iwutia wandu mecha.
42018003	Na ipfo mṟinyi kuwewoṙe mndu mka mkusu, awekyeyenda-yenda kokye, echigamba, ‘Ngyienenga kyilya kyingyiwaṟi inyi na mokyituwa oko.’
42018004	Na oe kui kyiyeri kyifuhi nalelega. Numa ya iho kagamba mrimenyi kokye, ‘Maa chandu ngyilaiṙikyie Ruwa, maa iwutia wandu mecha,
42018005	kyipfa mka-chu mkusu naingyipfulutsa nyashi ngyemwenenga kyilya kyimmbaṟi, alechengyiwinisha kui icha na koko shiyeri shoose.’ ”
42018006	Mndumii kagamba, “Aṙanyienyi chandu aigamba moanduo moondu ulya mmbicho.
42018007	Ngyesa Ruwa, echiwaenenga kyilya kyiwawaṟi wasambuṟe wakye wekyemfiiṟia kyio na kyingoto- pfoe? Ngyesa nechikyelyio iwatarama?
42018008	Ngyimmbia, newaenenga kyilya kyiwaṟi iwinyi; kyaindi, kyiyeri Mana o Adamu echicha, ngyesa newona iiṙikyia wuyanenyi?”
42018009	Kawia mfano wandu walekuloṟa kye wo nyi wandu wawoṙe wusumganyi, wechipiṟa wengyi woose.
42018010	“Wandu wawi waleṙo iyenda hekalunyi indeterewa, umwi Mfarisayo, na o kawi mosania ukamba.
42018011	Mfarisayo ulya kagoṟoka echiterewa kuṙi mrimenyi kokye, ‘Hoi Ruwa, ngakuana kyipfa inyi chi kyimwi na wandu wengyi, wasokyi, wawicho, waṟui maa cha mosania ukamba-chu-pfo.
42018012	Inyi ngyekyekuretekyia kawi ko juma. Ngyekyewuta kyiano iwuka shienengonyi shako shoose.’
42018013	Kyaindi mosania ukamba ulya nalegoṟoka kuleshi maa alekaria iambuya ruwewu-pfo, indi nalekapa-kapa kyipoota echigamba, ‘Hoi Ruwa, ungyihooṟie inyi mnyamaṟi.’
42018014	Ngyimmbia, ichu nalesoka iyenda kanyi kokye amtalyie wusumganyi kuta ulya; cha kyipfa orio mokung'anyisa nechititiṟo, na ulya mokutitiṟa neching'anyiso.”
42018015	Wakamwendie wana wanangu kundu nawapaaye; kyaindi kyiyeri wanalosho walewona walewatuukyia.
42018016	Indi Yesu kawalaga wache na kokye, kagamba, “Lekyenyi wana-wa wache na koko, maa mulawashingyie, cha kyipfa wandu cha iwa Wumangyi wo Ruwa nyi wowo.
42018017	Kyaloi, ngyimmbia, mndu oose alandeambilyie Wumangyi wo Ruwa cha mana mtutu echiiṙa napfo maa kyitutu-pfo.”
42018018	Lyingyi-se, mndu umwi msongoru nalemmbesa, echigamba, “Mlosha mcha, ngyiwute kyi kundu ngyiiṙime ioṟa moo o mlungana?”
42018019	Yesu kammbia, “Ny'kyilyi ungyilaga mcha? Kuwoṙe akyeri mcha sile umwi-pfo, na oe nyi Ruwa.
42018020	Nuichi mawawaso: Ulaṟuguye maa Ulaṟuguyo, Ulawaage, Ulaiwe; Maa ulaṟingyishie wongo, India awuyo na womoo.”
42018021	Kagamba, “Isho shoose ngyekyeshiosha wookyia wututunyi woko.”
42018022	Kyiyeri Yesu aleicho ikyo nalemmbia, “Nuwuṟie kyindo kyimwi. Kumba shoose uwoṙe, undegawia wakyiwa, na iyoe nochiwaṙa kyiseyesoe ruwewu, numa ya iho nnjo ungyioshe.”
42018023	Indi kyiyeri aleicho ikyo nalewihiyo mrimenyi mnu, kyipfa nawewoṙe masaa gafoi.
42018024	Kyiyeri Yesu alewona kuṙo nalegamba, “Nyi kui wukyiwa wo mbaṟe iha wanjama wechiiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa!
42018025	Cha kyipfa nyi kyaangu ngamia iiṙa ṟochonyi lya sindanu kuta mnjama iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa.”
42018026	Na walya waleicho walegamba, “Nyi wui-ng'u echiiṙima ikyia?”
42018027	Kagamba, “Shilekyeiṙimika ko wandu shekyeiṙimika ko Ruwa.”
42018028	Petiro kagamba, “Soe luleṙa shindo shoose na ikuosha.”
42018029	Kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi ngyimmbia, kuwoṙe mndu aleṙa numba, ang'u mka, ang'u wana wa wamae, ang'u wafee, ang'u wana, kyipfa kya Wumangyi wo Ruwa,
42018030	alechiambilyia ngoseṟa mnu kyiyeri-kyi na wuyanenyi wuicha moo o mlungana-pfo.”
42018031	Kaṙuo walya ikumi na wawi, kawawia, “Luiṙo iyenda Yerusalemu, na mbonyi tsoose tsa Mana o Adamu weonguo shisuku waleṟeia tseafukyia.
42018032	Cha kyipfa newiko mawokonyi ga wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa. Wechimwinyala; wemtaluo, na impuchia maṙa.
42018033	Nawo wemkapa na msharite, na numa ya iho wemmbaaga; na mfiri o kaṟaaṟu neṟuka.”
42018034	Kyaindi walemanya mbonyi-tso maa ale-pfo, na kyindo-kyo kyiwekyiṟikye kowo, maa walemanya kyileṙeṙo-pfo.
42018035	Kyiyeri aleshika kufuhi na Yeriko, mndu umwi kyipfupfuṟe, naweṙamie mbai ya njia, eterewa shienengo.
42018036	Na lyilya aleicho wuingyi wo wandu wochiiṙa, nalewesa, “Kuwoṙe kyikyi?”
42018037	Wakammbia, “Yesu o Nasareti aiiṙa.”
42018038	Kalaga ṟui lying'anyi, echigamba, “Yesu, Mana o Dawidi, ungyisaṟie.”
42018039	Kyasia walya wawesongoi wakamtuukyia kundu natsie; kyaindi oe naleengyeṟa mnu ilaga na ṟui lying'anyi, “Hoi Mana o Dawidi, ungyisaṟie.”
42018040	Yesu kagoṟoka, kagamba naendo na kokye, na kyiyeri alecha na kufuhi Yesu nalemmbesa,
42018041	“Nukundi ngyikuwutie kyi?” Kagamba, “Mndumii, ngyiiṙime iwona.”
42018042	Yesu kammbia, “Enengo iwona. Iiṙikyia lyapfo lyakukyiṟa.”
42018043	Cha ilyi kaenengo iwona, kamwosha kunu echiana Ruwa. Na wandu woose wammbone isho waleṟumisha Ruwa.
42019001	Na oe kyiyeri aleiṙa na Yeriko, naleiṙa makyiṙi-gawi ga mṟi-cho.
42019002	Na hawewoṙe mndu ekyelago Sakayo, msongoru umwi kyiiṙi kya wesania ukamba, na oe nyi mnjama.
42019003	Ichu naweipfula iwona Yesu nyi mndu o mbaṟe iha, alaiṙime kyipfa kya wuingyi wo wandu, kyipfa nawemfuhi.
42019004	Kasonguo eṙicha, kaṙooya mkuunyi naiṙime immbona, cha kyipfa Yesu nawecheiṙia njia iya.
42019005	Na kyiyeri Yesu aleshika handu halya, naleambuya wuye, kammbia, “Sakayo, soka iwinyi, cha kyipfa inu kyangyikooya itsinda kanyi kopfo.”
42019006	Kasokyia wanda faṟa, kamwambilyia, kui sia.
42019007	Lyilya wandu walewona, walenunuwa woose, wechigamba, “Nayenda kanyi ko mndu mnyamaṟi.”
42019008	Sakayo kagoṟoka, kawia Mndumii, “Mndumii, masaa gako goose ngyechigagawa kawi na kyifunjoe kyimwi ngyienengye wakyiwa, na kokooya ngyisokyie mndu kyindo kui ngyeṟo ngyemmbiyiṟia kaana.”
42019009	Yesu kammbia, “Inu wukyiṟo woshika kunu kanyi, kyipfa ichu na oe nyi mana o Abrahamu.
42019010	Cha kyipfa Mana o Adamu nalecha ipfula na ikyiṟa kyilya kyiweṙekyie.”
42019011	Kyiyeri waleicho isho, naleengyeṟa iṙeṙa kui mfano, kyipfa nawekyeri kufuhi na Yerusalemu, nawo walekowakusaṟa kye Wumangyi wo Ruwa wowono cha ilyi.
42019012	Kyasia kagamba, “Mndu umwi, awoṙe rina nalepfunga kyaro iyenda kuleshi kundu nandeambilyia wumangyi na iwuya.
42019013	Kalaga wandu ikumi kyiiṙi kya waṟundi wakye kaenenga orio umwi owo heleri, kawawia, ‘Kapenyi natso mbucha mṟasa ilyi ngyechicha.’
42019014	Kyaindi wandu wa uruka lokye walemsuo, wakaṙuma wandu imwosha na igamba, ‘Lukundi ichu naluchilyie-pfo.’
42019015	Kyiyeri alewuya, amwambilyie wumangyi wokye, nalegamba waṟundi walya alewaenenga heleri walago kundu namanye kyiira walewona orio mndu mbuchenyi yakye.
42019016	Kacha o kuwooka, kagamba, ‘Mndumii, kyiira ngyilewona halya helerinyi nyi mafungu ikumi.’
42019017	Kammbia, ‘Necha, mṟundi mcha. Kyipfa uleringa necha kyilya kyitutu uleenengo chilyia mṟi ikumi.’
42019018	Kacha o kawi, kagamba, ‘Heleri ulengyienenga tsileengyeṟika ngawona ho kyiira mafungu gataanu.’
42019019	Kawia ichu na oe, ‘Iyoe nochilyia mṟi itanu.’
42019020	Kacha ungyi, kagamba, ‘Mndumii, ilyi nyilyo fungu lyapfo ngyilepfungyia kyitambeenyi.
42019021	Cha kyipfa ngyilekuowuo kyipfa iyoe nyi mndu muumu, nokyeambilyia kyilakyeri kyapfo, na isambuo ulawaaya.’
42019022	Kammbia, ‘Iyoe mṟundi mmbicho. Ngyekuanduya kui maṙeṙo gapfo. Nulemanya kye inyi nyi mndu muumu, ngyekyeambilyia kyilakyeri kyako na isambuo ngyilawaaya.
42019023	Kyasia, ny'kyilyi ulalekooma heleri tsako ko walya wekyewuta heleri tsa ngoseṟa, kundu ilyi ngyechicha ngyitsiambilyie hamwi na itso tsa ngoseṟa?’
42019024	Kawia walya wawegoṟokyi kufuhi, ‘Msokyenyi fungu-lyo, muenengye ulya awoṙe mafungu ikumi.’
42019025	Wakammbia, ‘Mndumii, nawoṙe ikumi.’
42019026	Ngyimmbia, ‘Orio mndu awoṙe kyindo nechienengo, indi ulya alawoṙe kyindo nesoko maa kyilya awoṙe.
42019027	Lyingyi-se, washituwa walya wako, walakundi ngyiwachilyie, waendenyi na iha muwawaage mbele yako.’ ”
42019028	Na kyiyeri amgambe isho, nalesonguo mbele echiṙo iyenda Yerusalemu.
42019029	Na lyilya aleshika kufuhi na Betifage na Betania, fumvunyi lyekyelago lya Mseituni, naleṙuma wawi kyiiṙi kya wanalosho walya,
42019030	echigamba, “Yendenyi mṟasa kyikaṟo kyilya kyiambuyanyi na iha, na ilyi mochiiṙa napfo mowona igache lya nzoi lyilyipfungye, lyilandeṙamilyio nyi mndu oose. Lyipfunguonyi mulyiende na iha.
42019031	Na kokooya mndu ammbesa, ny'kyilyi mulyipfunguo gambenyi kuṙi: ‘Mndumii nawoṙe nalyo iṟunda.’ ”
42019032	Na walya waleṙumo wakayenda wakawona chandu alewawia.
42019033	Na kyiyeri wawepfunguo igache lyilya lya nzoi, wenyi walyo walewawia, “Ny'kyilyi mupfunguo igache lya nzoi?”
42019034	Wakagamba, “Mndumii nawoṙe nalyo iṟunda.”
42019035	Wakalyiṙuo ko Yesu, wakaala nguwo tsawo wuye ya igache-lyo lya nzoi, wakaṙosia ho Yesu.
42019036	Na kyiyeri aweiyenda waleala nguo tsawo njienyi.
42019037	Na kyiyeri awei kufuhi na mseṟemko ya fumvu lya Mseituni, wanalosho wakye woose walewooka ichihiyo na iṟumisha Ruwa na ṟui lying'anyi, kyipfa kya maṟunda goose ga maṟiyisho walegawona,
42019038	wechigamba, “Nyi oe ammbikyie mboṟa Mangyi aicha kui rina lya Mndumii. Ufoṟo ruwewu, na mng'ano ipfo wuye.”
42019039	Mafarisayo waata wawekyeri wuingyinyi wo wandu wakammbia, “Mlosha, wia wanalosho wapfo watsie.”
42019040	Kagaluo, “Ngyimmbia, wakatsia iwa, magoe gekalagatsa.”
42019041	Kyiyeri aleshika kufuhi nalewona mṟi, kaufiiṟia
42019042	echigamba, “Kokooya uwemanya, maa iyoe, kyiiṙi kya mfiri-chu, kyiwaṟi ufoṟo! Kyaindi wulalu uiṙima iwona-pfo.
42019043	Cha kyipfa mfiri iicha, kyiyeri washituwa wapfo wechikuwikyia moombo ukuringyichie. Wechikuiṟiwia na ikushingyia ngyuura tsoose.
42019044	Wekuolotsa wanda iyoe na wana wapfo wakyeri ipfo moombonyi, walechikuṙeeya igoe wuye ya igoe, kyipfa ulemanya kyiyeri kya Ruwa icha na kopfo-pfo.”
42019045	Kaiṙa na hekalunyi, kawooka ifuna na nja walya waweikapa mbucha,
42019046	echiwawia, “Kyikyiṟeie, ‘Numba yako yechiwa numba ya kyiterewo’; kyaindi nyoe moigaluo usanja lo wasokyi.”
42019047	Na oe kawamolosha mfiri yoose hekalunyi. Indi wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na walosha wa mawawaso, na wang'anyi wa wandu waweipfula njia ya imrumatsa.
42019048	Walawone kyewuta, cha kyipfa wandu woose waweoshana na oe, wemwaṙanyia.
42020001	Mfiri umwi, kyiyeri aweilosha wandu hekalunyi, na ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha, wang'anyi wa makohanyi na walosha wa mawawaso hamwi na wasongoru wa wandu wakacha na kokye kyituukyia.
42020002	Wakammbesa, “Luwie, nuiwuta shindo-sho kui wuchilyi wo wui? Lyingyi-se nyi wui alekuenenga wuchilyi-wu?”
42020003	Kagaluo, kawawia, “Na inyi ngyemmbesa nyoe kyindo kyimwi.
42020004	Wupatiso wo Yohane, ngyesa wulewuka ruwewu ang'u nyi ko wandu?”
42020005	Wakawesana wo wenyi ko wenyi, wechigamba, “Kokooya logamba wulewuka ruwewu, negamba, ‘Kyasia ny'kyilyi mulalemwiṙikyia?’
42020006	Na lukogamba wulewuka ko wandu, wandu woose welukapa na magoe, cha kyipfa waleiṙikyia Yohane kye nyi moonguo shisuku.”
42020007	Wakagaluo, “Luichi kundu wulewuka-pfo.”
42020008	Yesu kawawia, “Maa inyi ngyimmbia nyoe nyi kui wuchilyi wuha ngyiwuta shindo-shi-pfo.”
42020009	Kawooka iwia wandu mfano-chu: “Mndu umwi nalewaaya ṙema lya msabibu; kalyiṙambika waṙemi, kayenda kandekaa uruka lungyi kyiyeri kyileshi.
42020010	Na kyiyeri kya shilyimu naleṙuma mṟundi ko waṙemi walya kundu wamwenengye ndunda ngyaata tsa msabibu; indi waṙemi wakamkapa wakamfuna alawoṙe kyindo.
42020011	Kaṙuma-se mṟundi ungyi. Ichu na oe wakamkapa, wakamsutsa, wakamfuna alawoṙe kyindo.
42020012	Kaṙuma na o kaṟaaṟu. Ichu na oe wakamfaṟa, wakammbiyitsa nja.
42020013	Kyasia, mndumii o ṙema lya msabibu nalegamba, ‘Ngyiwikye kuṙa? Ngyeṙuma mono-ko, mkunde oko; kofia wemwindia oe.’
42020014	Kyaindi, waṙemi walya lyilya walemmbona, wakawiana wo wenyi ko wenyi, wechigamba, ‘Ichu nyi oe mokyioṟa. Lummbaage kundu kyioṟa kyiwe kyaṙu.’
42020015	Wakammbiyitsa nja ya ṙema lya msabibu, wakammbaaga. Kyasia, mndumii o ṙema lya msabibu newawutia kuṙa?
42020016	Nechicha na irumatsa waṙemi walya, na ṙema lyilya lya msabibu nechienenga wandu wengyi.” Kyiyeri waleicho isho, walegamba, “Ote! Shilawutikye isho!”
42020017	Kawaitukuya, kagamba, “Kyasia kyindo-kyi kyagamba-kyi chandu kyikyiṟeie, ‘Igoe walelega wewika numba ilyo lyilewa igoe lying'anyi lya ndumbenyi.’ ”
42020018	“Orio mndu echioloka wuye ya igoe-lyo nefunjika-funjika; na oose lyechimwolokyia lyemmamiṟa.”
42020019	Na walosha wa mawawaso na wang'anyi wa makohanyi walepfula immbaṙa kyiyeri kyilya kyilya, wakaowuo wandu, kyipfa walemanya kye mfano-cho alewawia naleṙeṙa kyipfa kyawo.
42020020	Wakamwowelyia wakaṙuma shisookyi shilekuloṟa cha wandu wasumganyi, kundu wammbaṙe maṙeṙonyi gakye, waiṙime imṙuo ko mchilyi.
42020021	Wakammbesa, wechigamba, “Mlosha, luichi kye nuiṙeṙa na ilosha gakyeri ga wusumganyi, maa okyesaṟa wung'anyi wo mndu-pfo, indi nuilosha njia ya Ruwa kui wuloi.
42020022	Ngyesa nyi sungusinyi luenengye Kaisari kodi ang'u ote?”
42020023	Kyaindi oe nalemanya ngyeṟo tsawo, kawawia,
42020024	“Ngyiloṟenyi dinari. Iwoṙe fana na kyiṟeio kya wui?”
42020025	Wakamgaluo, “Kya Kaisari.” Kawawia, “Kyasia, sha Kaisari enengyenyi Kaisari, na sha Ruwa enengyenyi Ruwa.”
42020026	Maa waleiṙima immbaṙa kui maṙeṙo gakye mbele ya wandu-pfo; wakaṟiyio chandu alewagaluo wakatsia.
42020027	Numa ya iho Masadukayo waata wakayenda kokye, walya wekyegamba kye kuwoṙe iṟutso lya wapfu-pfo, wakammbesa,
42020028	wechigamba, “Mlosha, Mose naleluṟeia kye mndu awoṙe mono-wamae awoṙe mka, kyaindi awoṙe mana-pfo, naṙuo mka-chu, nawonie mono-wamae mana.
42020029	Kyasia, kuwewoṙe wana wa mka mfungaaṙe. O kuwooka nalealyika mka kapfa alawoṙe mana;
42020030	na o kawi [kaṙuo mka ulya, kapfa alawoṙe mana.]
42020031	Mṟasa o kaṟaaṟu kamwalyika, na wuṙo woose mfungaaṙe, wakapfa, walaṙe wana.
42020032	Lyefurumia mka ulya na oe kapfa.
42020033	Kyasia, kyiyeri kya iṟutso lya wapfu nechiwa mka o wui? Kyipfa nalealyiko na woose mfungaaṙe.”
42020034	Yesu kawawia, “Wana wa wuyana-wu wekyealyika na ialyiko;
42020035	kyaindi, walya wekyetalo kye wawaṟi iambilyia wuyana wulya, na kulya iṟuka ko wapfu, wekyealyika maa ialyiko-pfo.
42020036	Maa weiṙima ipfa-se-pfo; cha kyipfa wekyewa cha malaika, nawo nyi wana wa Ruwa, kyipfa kya ilyi wakyeri wana wa iṟutso.
42020037	Kyaindi kye wapfu wekyeṟutso, maa Mose naleloṟa kyiṟeionyi kya kyiṙi iho-ndu alegamba kya Mndumii kye nyi Ruwa o Abrahamu, na Ruwa o Isakyi, na Ruwa o Yakobo.
42020038	Na oe chi Ruwa o wapfu-pfo, indi o wakyeri na moo; cha kyipfa woose wekyewaṙa moo kokye.”
42020039	Walosha wengyi wa mawawaso wakagaluo, wakammbia, “Mlosha, nogamba necha.”
42020040	Maa walekaria immbesa kyindo numa ya isho-pfo.
42020041	Kawawia, “Wandu waigamba kuṙa kye Kristo nyi Mono-Dawidi?
42020042	Kyipfa Dawidi oe amonyi naigamba kyitapunyi kya Shiimbo, ‘Mndumii nalewia Mndumii oko, uṙamie kuwoko koko ko kulyoe,
42020043	mṟasa ngyiwikye washituwa wapfo iwa kyitima kyewikyia maṙende gapfo.’ ”
42020044	“Kyasia Dawidi naimlaga ‘Mndumii,’ nawa-se kuṙa mana okye?”
42020045	Na kyiyeri wandu woose wawemwaṙanyia, nalewia wanalosho wakye,
