42020046	“Kushowenyi na walosha wa mawawaso, wakundi ichumia waṟee nguwo ngyileshi, na iiṟikyiṟo sangaṙenyi, na iṙamia mbele masinagoginyi, na shitima sha mbele karamenyi.
42020047	Wekyesoka waka wakusu masaa gawo, na kui wukulembecheṟi wekyeterewa shiterewo shileshi. Iwo wewona ianduyo lying'anyi.”
42021001	Kapaluo meso kawona wanjama wewika shiano shawo sandukunyi ya shiano.
42021002	Kawona mndu mka umwi mkusu na mkyiwa ewika pfo helo tsiwi.
42021003	Kagamba, “Kyaloi ngyimmbia, mndu mka-chu mkusu na mkyiwa nawika ngoseṟa kuta woose;
42021004	kyipfa, iwo woose wawika shindo wawuta ngoseṟenyi ya masaa gawo indi ichu wukyiwenyi wokye nawika shoose awoṙe.”
42021005	Na kyiyeri wandu waata waweiṙeṙa mbonyi tsa Hekalu, chandu lyiwelyichope kui magoe mecha na shiano sha wandu, nalegamba,
42021006	“Ishi muishiambuya, kuicha mfiri halechiṙio igoe wuye ya igoe lyingyi indi geolo-olo goose.”
42021007	Wakammbesa, wechigamba, “Mlosha, shindo-sho shechiwa indi? Na nyi kyiṟingyishio kyiha kyeloṟa kye shindo-sho shikyeri kufuhi na icha?”
42021008	Kagamba, “Ambuyenyi, mulachelembo, cha kyipfa wafoi wechicha kui rina lyako, wechigamba, ‘Inyi nyi oe.’ Lyingyi-se, ‘Kyiyeri kyamshika.’ Kyasia, maa mulawaoshe.
42021009	Na nyoe kyiyeri mochiicho mbonyi tsa shiṙa na wuṟiingyi, maa mulaowesho; kyipfa isho shoose kyakooya icha kuwooka, indi mafurumionyi galya gecha iwinyi-pfo.”
42021010	Numa ya iho kawawia, “Isanga lyefuma ikapana na isanga, na wumangyi ikapana na wumangyi.
42021011	Kowaṙa shiriinza shing'anyi na njaa na ndoṟe ya tauni; na shindo sheowesha na shiṟingyishio shing'anyi iwuka ruwewu.
42021012	Kyaindi, maa kyiyeri shoose shilandewono, wemmbaṙa na imsuiṟa; wemṙuo mbele ya masinagogi, na immbika kyipfungonyi, mochiṙoo mbele ya wamangyi na wachilyi kyipfa kya rina lyako.
42021013	Na isho sheewa kyiṟingyishio konyu.
42021014	Kyasia, maa mulakusaṟe-saṟe mrimenyi konyu chandu mochiṙeṙa;
42021015	cha kyipfa inyi ngyemuenenga maṙeṙo na wuṟango watuuri wanyu woose walechiiṙima iwingana nawo maa imulega.
42021016	Na nyoe mochiṟiingyio nyi wafee wanyu, na wana wa wama wanyu, na wa kanyi konyu, na mbuya tsanyu, na wafoi wanyu mochiwoogo.
42021017	Na nyoe wandu woose wemusuo kyipfa kya rina lyako.
42021018	Kyaindi maa uchui lumwi lo mṙoe yanyu loṙeka-pfo.
42021019	Na nyoe kui wusimiri wonyu mochikyiṟa mrima yanyu.”
42021020	“Kyaindi, kyiyeri-kyo mochiwona mṟi o Yerusalemu umringyichie nyi wamesa, manyenyi-ng'u kye irumatso lyacho lyatikyira.
42021021	Nyi lyo-ndu wakyeri urukyenyi lo Uyuda waṙichilyie fumvunyi, na wakyeri makyiṙi-gawi gacho waṙichilyie nja, na wakyeri maṙemenyi walaiṙe na mṟinyi.
42021022	Cha kyipfa mfiri-yo nyiyo yetaa kyiṟaache, kundu shiafukyie shoose shishiṟeie.
42021023	Ochia lo iwo wawanene na waionza mfiri-yo! Cha kyipfa kochiwaṙa wukyiwa wung'anyi urukyenyi, na nyashi kyipfa kya isanga-lyi.
42021024	Wechiwoogo kui ushu, nawo wewoṙo na iṙoo masangyenyi koose, na mṟi o Yerusalemu ochichilyio nyi walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa mṟasa kyiyeri kya walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa kyechiafukyia.”
42021025	“Lyingyi-se, kochiwaṙa kyiṟingyishio mnengyeṟinyi, na morinyi, na nyenyerinyi, na urukyenyi wukyiwa wung'anyi wo masanga gechiṟiyio kyipfa kya ndiṟimo tsing'anyi tsa ipalyipalyi.
42021026	Wandu wechiuma wechiweṙelyia shindo shewutikyia wuyana. Cha kyipfa shindo shikyeri ruwewu shekupaaya-paya.
42021027	Iho nyiho wewona Mana o Adamu echicha ipuchinyi hamwi na pfinya na mng'ano ung'anyi.
42021028	Kyasia kyiyeri shindo-sho shechiwooka icha, kaṟamkyenyi mochiira mṙoe yanyu, cha kyipfa wukyiṟo wonyu womtikyira.”
42021029	Kawawia mfano, “Ambuyenyi mfumu na mashiṙi gengyi goose.
42021030	Kyiyeri gamuoṙie, mokyewona na imanya muwenyi kye kyiyeri kyesambuo kyamtikyira kufuhi.
42021031	Na nyoe taa, mukowona shindo-sho shewooka icha, manyenyi kye Wumangyi wo Ruwa wukyeri kufuhi.
42021032	Ny'kyaloi, ngyimmbia, rika-lyi lyechiiṙa-pfo mṟasa isho shoose shiafukyie.
42021033	Ngyina na uruka shechiiṙa, kyaindi maṙeṙo gako gechiiṙa maa ale-pfo.”
42021034	“Kyasia ringyenyi mrima yanyu ilachelemeṟo nyi shindo shelya, na wunanzi, na iwinia shindo sha wuyanenyi; mfiri ulya ukocha na konyu kyituukyia chandu mṙego okyetalasuka.
42021035	Cha kyipfa nyi wuṙo mfiri ulya ochicha ko wandu woose wakyeri wuyanenyi koose.
42021036	Kyasia, nyoe laenyi kyiṙombo orio kyiyeri, mochiterewa kundu muiṙime ikyia kyiiṙi kya isho shoose shewutika, na igoṟoka mbele ya Mana o Adamu.”
42021037	Kyasia, orio kyingoto nawekyeloshia hekalunyi, na kyio nawekyendelaa fumvunyi lyiwekyelago Mseituni.
42021038	Na wandu woose wawekyeamka ngamenyi utuko iyenda hekalunyi kundu wamwaṙanyie.
42022001	Mfiri ung'anyi o mkate ilangyitarang'ishe, okyelago Mfiri ung'anyi o Pasaka, uletikyira kufuhi.
42022002	Na wang'anyi wa makohanyi na walosha wa mawawaso waweipfula njia ya immbaaga; kyipfa wawekyeowuo wandu.
42022003	Satana kacha na ko Yuda, ekyelago Isikariote, na oe nyi umwi o walya ikumi na wawi.
42022004	Kafuma kandeṙeṙa na wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na wang'anyi wa asikari wa shiṙa, chandu eiṙima immbika mawokonyi gawo.
42022005	Wakachihiyo, wakaiṙikyiana na oe imwenenga heleri.
42022006	Kaiṙikyia, kapfula ṙaawa lyemṟiinga kowo kyiyeri wandu wa kyisanzionyi walaichi.
42022007	Mfiri o mkate ilangyitarang'ishe ukoshika na mfiri-cho kyiwewaṟi ishinja Kyiondo kya Pasaka.
42022008	Kaṙuma Petiro na Yohane, echigamba, “Yendenyi, mundeluṟeyeṟia Pasaka luiṙime ilya.”
42022009	Wakammbia, “Nukundi lukuṟeyeṟie hanga?”
42022010	Kawawia, “Ilyi muiṙa na mṟinyi mokarisana msoṟo akuṙikyie kyitongoṟima. Muoshenyi muiṙe na numba-yo echiyenda.
42022011	Na mowia monyi numba, ‘Mlosha nakuwia, kyookwi kyiṟi kya wayenu ngyilyiie-pfo pasaka hamwi na wanalosho wako?’
42022012	Na oe nemuloṟa kyiṟi kying'anyi kyikyeri kai, kyamchopo; ṟeyeṟenyi pfo.”
42022013	Wakayenda, wakawona chandu alewawia, wakaṟeyeṟa pasaka.
42022014	Lyilya kyiyeri kyileshika nalewooka ilya, oe hamwi na wasu walya.
42022015	Kawawia, “Ngalanga mnu ilya pasaka-i hamwi na nyoe ituuro lyako lyilandeshikye.
42022016	Cha kyipfa ngyimmbia kye ngyechilya-se mṟasa kyiyeri yeafutsio Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa-pfo.”
42022017	Kaambilyia kyiṙoo, kaana, echigamba, “Ambilyienyi ikyi, mugawane nyoe wenyi ko wenyi.
42022018	Kyipfa ngyimmbia kye wookyia wulalu ngyechinyo-se kyindo kyawuka msabibunyi sile mṟasa kyiyeri Wumangyi wo Ruwa wochicha-pfo.”
42022019	Kaambilyia mkate, kaana, kaupeṟenguo, kawaenengyia echigamba, “Ichu nyicho mmbiu oko uiwuto kyipfa kyanyu. Wutenyi kuṙi kui ingyikumbuo.”
42022020	Kyiṙoo nakyo na wuṙo amlye; kagamba, “Kyiṙoo-kyi nyi mma mhya samunyi yako, ipusuka kyipfa kyanyu.
42022021	Kyaindi kuwoko ko ulya aingyiṟiinga kukyeri hamwi na inyi iha mesenyi.
42022022	Cha kyipfa Mana o Adamu naindepfa chandu kyiwaṟi kyaindi ochia lokye mndu ulya momṟiinga!”
42022023	Wakawooka iwesana wo wenyi ko wenyi, nyi wui kyiiṙi kyawo ewuta kyindo-kyo.
42022024	Kukowaṙa iwingana kyiiṙi kyawo, kye nyi wui aitalo nang'anyi.
42022025	Kawawia, “Wamangyi wa walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa wekyemchilyia, na walya wamchilyie wekyelago nyi wesaṟia;
42022026	kyaindi konyu nyoe chi wuṙo-pfo, indi ang'anyi konyu nawe cha akyeri mtutu; na mochilyia nawe cha ulya aiṟundia wengyi.
42022027	Kyipfa ang'anyi nyi uha? Ulya aṙamie echilya ang'u nyi ulya aiṟundia wengyi? Chi ulya aṙamie echilya-pfoe? Kyaindi inyi kyiiṙi kyanyu nyi cha mndu aiṟundia wengyi.
42022028	Na nyoe muleṙio hamwi na inyi kyiyeri kyoose kya iyesho lyako.
42022029	Chandu alengyienenga inyi Wumangyi, na wuṙo ngyechimuenenga nyoe Wumangyi;
42022030	muiṙime ilya na inyo mesenyi yako Wumangyinyi woko; na iṙamia shitimenyi sha mng'ano, kunu mochianduya wandu wa mbaṟe ikumi na tsiwi tsa Isiraelyi.”
42022031	Kagamba, “Simion, Simion; Satana namlanga nyoe namuele cha nganu.
42022032	Kyaindi ngakuterewia iyoe kundu iiṙikyia lyapfo lyilawe lyifofo; na iyoe ilyi okyiṟo ukarishe wana wa womoo.”
42022033	Kammbia, “Mndumii, kyiyeri ngyikyeri hamwi na iyoe, ngyikuṟeyeṟie iyenda kyipfungonyi ang'u upfunyi.”
42022034	Kagamba, “Ngakuwia, Petiro, ilying'onyi lyechifuga inu, iyoe ulangyikana kaṟaaṟu kye ungyiichi-pfo.”
42022035	Kawawesa, “Ngyesa lyilya ngyilemuṙuma mulawoṙe kyikuchu, maa mkunja, maa shiaṙu, muleuṟa kyindo?” Wakagamba, “Ote.”
42022036	Kawawia, “Kyaindi wulalu mndu awoṙe kyikuchu nakyiṙuo, na mkunja na wuṙo; na alawoṙe ushu, nakumbe ijoho lyakye nandeguṟa.
42022037	Cha kyipfa ngyimmbia, isho shileṟeio kyakooya iafutsio koko, kye naletalyio hamwi na wanyamaṟi. Cha kyipfa isho shingyiwaṟi shiwoṙe mafurumionyi gasho.”
42022038	Wakagamba, “Mndumii, iha hawoṙe mapanga gawi.” Kawawia, “Lekyenyi, kyishikyie.”
42022039	Kafuma kayenda mṟasa fumvunyi ya Mseituni chandu aweichiwie, wanalosho wakye wakaoshana na oe.
42022040	Kyiyeri aleshika handu halya nalewawia, “Terewenyi kundu mulacheṙoo kyiyeshionyi.”
42022041	Oe amonyi kalekana nawo cha handu hewiyitsa igoe, kapfiria ndi katerewa,
42022042	echigamba, “Hoi Awu, kokooya nyi wuṙo ukundi ungyiwute kyiṙoo-kyi. Indi chi chandu ngakunda inyi-pfo, kyaindi kyilya ukundi kyiwutikye.”
42022043	Malaika iwuka ruwewu kacha na kokye kamkarisha.
42022044	Na oe kyipfa awekyeri wukyiwenyi wung'anyi, kaengyeṟa mnu iterewa; msino okye ukowa cha maṙonyi ga samu gechitonyika wanda.
42022045	Kyiyeri alewuka kyiterewonyi, kacha na ko wanalosho wakye, kawakooya walee maṙoe kui fowa.
42022046	Kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi molaa maṙoe? Amkyenyi, mundeterewa, mulacheiṙa na kyiyeshionyi.”
42022047	Kyasia, kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa, wuingyi wo wandu, na ulya ekyelago Yuda, umwi o walya ikumi na wawi, nawewasongoye. Katikyira ko Yesu kundu namkombe.
42022048	Yesu kammbia, “Yuda, noṟiinga Mana o Adamu kui imkomba?”
42022049	Na walya wawekyeri kufuhi na oe kyiyeri walewona kyindo kyichewutika, walegamba, “Mndumii, lukowakapa na ushu?”
42022050	Umwi owo kakapa mṟundi o Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose kamṙumbuo kuṙwi ko kulyoe.
42022051	Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Lekyenyi, kuwoṙe ikapana-se-pfo.” Kampaaya kuṙwi kamkyiṟa.
42022052	Yesu kawia wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na wasongoru wa hekalu, na wasongoru wa wandu, walecha kyipfa kyakye, “Ngyesa mocha muwoṙe ngyuushu na ṟungu cha ilyi muichewaṙa msokyi?
42022053	Orio mfiri ngyiwekyeri na nyoe hekalunyi kyaindi mulengyileshia kuwoko-pfo, indi ikyi nyikyo kyiyeri kyanyu, na wuchilyi wo meema.”
42022054	Wakammbaṙa, wakamṙuo, wakayenda na oe kanyi ko Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose. Na Petiro nalemwosha ai kuleshi.
42022055	Na kyiyeri wamuatse moṙo makyiṙi-gawi ga pata, waleṙamia handu hamwi, na Petiro kaṙamia kyiiṙi kyawo.
42022056	Nyi lyo-ndu kyisinga kyimwi kyilemmbona aṙamie saenyi, kyikamwambuya karii, kyikagamba, “Na ichu nawekyeri hamwi na oe.”
42022057	Kakana, echigamba, “Iyoe mndu mka, ngimwichi-pfo.”
42022058	Hamwiṙe kyiyeri kyitutu mndu ungyi nalemmbona, kagamba, “Na iyoe nyi umwi owo.” Petiro kagamba, “Iyoe mndu, chi inyi-pfo.”
42022059	Numa ya iho cha saa imwi, mndu ungyi kapfuṟukana igamba, “Kyaloi na ichu nawei hamwi na oe, cha kyipfa oe taa nyi Mgalyilaya.”
42022060	Petiro kagamba, “Iyoe mndu, ngyiichi kyindo uigamba-pfo.” Na kyiyeri aweiṙeṙa kuṙo, ilying'onyi lyilefuga.
42022061	Mndumii kainduka kaambuya Petiro. Petiro kakumbuo kyindo kyilya Mndumii alemmbia, “Inu ilying'onyi lyilafuga, nongyikana kaṟaaṟu.”
42022062	Kafuma na nja kafiiṟa mnu.
42022063	Na wandu walya waweiweṙa Yesu walemtaluo na imkapa.
42022064	Wakamshikyia meso, numa wakammbesa-wesa, wechigamba, “Manya nyi wui akukapa?”
42022065	Wakammbia na shindo shingyi shifoi shemlahia.
42022066	Kyiyeri kulekya, wasongoru wa wandu walewaṙa kyisanzionyi na wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na walosha wa mawawaso, wakamwende na mengyenyi kowo, wechigamba,
42022067	“Kokooya iyoe nyi oe Kristo, luwie.” Kawawia, “Maa ngammbia, mochiiṙikyia maa ale-pfo.
42022068	Lyingyi-se, ngammbesa mongyigaluo-pfo.
42022069	Kyaindi wookyia wulalu Mana o Adamu nechiṙamia ura lo kulyoe lo Ruwa Mopfinya.”
42022070	Wakagamba woose, “Kyasia, iyoe nyi oe Mono-Ruwa-ng'ue?” Kawawia, “Nyoe mogamba kye inyi nyi oe.”
42022071	Wakagamba, “Kyasia, lukundi-se wuṟingyishi wokyi? Kyipfa, soe luwenyi loicho maṙeṙo ga ṙumbu lyakye.”
42023001	Wandu woose wa kyisanzionyi wakagoṟoka wakamṙuo ko Pilato.
42023002	Wakawooka imshitakyi, wechigamba, “Lulewona ichu eṙetsa wandu waṙu, na iima wandu walatae kodi ko Kaisari, echigamba kye oe amonyi nyi Kristo, mangyi.”
42023003	Pilato kammbesa, echigamba, “Iyoe nyi oe mangyi o Wayuda?” Kagaluo, kammbia, “Iyoe nogamba.”
42023004	Pilato kawia wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wuingyi wo wandu, “Ngyiwonyi kyindo kyiwicho ko mndu-chu-pfo.”
42023005	Nawo wakaengyeṟa mnu, wechigamba, “Nekyeṙetsa wandu elosha urukyenyi lo Uyuda loose wookyia Galyilaya mṟasa kunu.”
42023006	Kyiyeri Pilato aleicho isho nalewesa kokooya nyi-we mndu o Galyilaya.
42023007	Na kyiyeri alemanya kye nakyeri wuchilyinyi wo Herode, nalemṙika ko Herode, kyipfa maa oe nawekyeri Yerusalemu mfiri iya.
42023008	Na kyiyeri Herode alewona Yesu nalechihiyo mnu, cha kyipfa nawekundi immbona wookyia mfiri ifoi, kyipfa awemwicho mbonyi tsakye, kalanga iwona kyiṟingyishio kyilewuto nyi oe.
42023009	Kammbesa shindo shifoi, oe alamgaluo kyindo kyoose.
42023010	Wang'anyi wa makohanyi na walosha wa mawawaso wakagoṟoka wakamshitakyi ko pfinya mnu.
42023011	Kyasia Herode kammina, hamwi na asikari wakye, kamtaluo, na imṟika nguwo ngyicha, numa kammbiyiṟa na ko Pilato.
42023012	Kyasia mfiri ulya ulya Herode na Pilato wakaiṙikyiana iwaṙa umbuya, cha kyipfa ipfo mawookyionyi wawesuanyi.
42023013	Na Pilato kasanzia handu hamwi na wang'anyi wa makohanyi, wasongoru wa wandu, na wandu,
42023014	kawawia, “Mndu-chu momuende na koko mochigamba kye naiṙetsa wandu; na inyi ngaaṙanyia mbonyi tsakye mbele yanyu, indi ngawona ṙeko lyoose kokye ko shindo shilya shamuenenga imshitakyi-pfo.
42023015	Maa Herode, cha kyipfa nammbiyiṟa na koṙu. Kyasia kuwoṙe kyindo kyoose awutie kyemwenenga ianduyo ipfa-pfo.
42023016	Koikyo ngyigamba nakapo, numa ya iho ngyimlekyie nayende.” [
42023017	Kyipfa kyilemkooya iwapfunguya mpfungo umwi kyiyeri kya mfiri ung'anyi.]
42023018	Wakakalagatsa woose, wechigamba, “Mmbaage ichu, ulupfunguye Baraba.”
42023019	Na oe nyi mndu alewiko kyipfungonyi kyipfa kya wuṟiingyi wulecha mṟinyi, na wuwaagi.
42023020	Kyasia Pilato naleṙeṙa nawo lya kawi, kyipfa kya chandu awekundi ipfunguo Yesu.
42023021	Kyaindi wakakalagatsa, wechigamba, “Mkapie msalabenyi! Mkapie msalabenyi!”
42023022	Kawawia lya kaṟaaṟu, “Kyipfa kya kyikyi? Ichu nawuta wuwicho wuha? Ngawona nawoṙe kyindo kyechimwenenga ipfa-pfo. Kyasia ngamumkapa ngyemlekyia.”
42023023	Kyaindi wakaṙeṙa na pfinya wakundi nawoogo. Maṟui gawo gakawinga.
42023024	Pilato kaanduo kye kyilya wakundi kyiṟundikye.
42023025	Kapfunguo ulya awempfungye kyipfa kya wuṟiingyi na wuwaagi, ulya wawemkundi, kawuta Yesu wammbutie chandu wawekundi.
42023026	Na kyiyeri wawemṙuo walekarisana mndu umwi ekyelago Simion Mkyirene, alekoawuka ṙemenyi, wakamṙika msalaba, nauṙuo numa ya Yesu.
42023027	Wuingyi wung'anyi wo wandu wukomwosha, na waka wawekapa-kapa shipoota na ikapa ṟanyi kyipfa kyakye.
42023028	Yesu kawaindukyia, echigamba, “Nyoe waka wa Yerusalemu, maa mulangyilyilyie inyi, indi lyilyienyi mrima yanyu na wana wanyu.
42023029	Cha kyipfa mfiri iicha, wechigamba, ‘Nanga walawoṙe wana na waumba, na mawee galekyeonza.’
42023030	Nyi lyo-ndu wewooka iwia mafumvu, ‘Luolokyienyi’, na shifumvu ‘Lushikyienyi.’
42023031	Cha kyipfa kokooya wawutia ikyiṙi lyiwishi shindo-shi, kyechiwa kuṙa ikyiṙinyi lyiumu?”
42023032	Wakaṙoo na wandu wengyi wawi, wandu wanyamaṟie, wawoogo hamwi na oe.
42023033	Na lyilya waleshika handu hekyelago, “Ipoṟong'u,” nyi ho-ndu walemkapia msalabenyi, oe na walya wengyi wawi, umwi ura lo kulyoe, na umwi ura lo kumoso.
42023034	Yesu kagamba, “Awu, uwahooṟie, kyipfa waichi kyindo waiwuta-pfo.” Wakagawana nguwo tsakye, wechikapa kuṟu kuha.
42023035	Wandu wakagoṟoka wechiambuya. Wasongoru walya nawo wawemtaluo, wegamba, “Nalekyiṟa wengyi; nakukyiṟe amonyi, kokooya oe nyi Kristo o Ruwa, msambuṟe okye.”
42023036	Asikari walya wakawemtaluo, wechiyenda kokye na imwendie kyindo kyekyetarang'ia,
42023037	wechigamba, “Kokooya iyoe nyi mangyi o Wayuda, kukyiṟe kumonyi.”
42023038	Na wuye yakye hawewoṙe kyiṟeio: “ICHU NYI OE MANGYI O WAYUDA.”
42023039	Na umwi o wanyamaṟi walya wawewamanyikye msalabenyi nalemlahia, echigamba, “Ngyesa iyoe chi Kristo-pfoe? Kyiṟa mrima opfo na soe.”
42023040	Kyaindi ulya o kawi kamgaluo, kamṙeṙia, echigamba, “Iyoe uowuye maa Ruwa, na iyoe nukyeri kyiiṙi kya ianduyo-lyo ilyo?
42023041	Nakyo nyi sungusinyi koṙu soe, cha kyipfa luambilyia wori wuwaṟi mawuto gaṙu; indi ichu alewuta kyindo kyoose kyiwicho-pfo.”
42023042	Numa kagamba, “Hoi Yesu, ungyikumbuo ilyi ochiiṙa na Wumangyinyi wopfo.”
42023043	Yesu kammbia, “Ny'kyaloi, ngakuwia, inu kuṙi nochikaa hamwi na inyi paradiso heonyonya mlungana.”
42023044	Kuwekyeri cha saa tsiṟandaaṟu, kukowaṙa meema urukyenyi koose mṟasa saa kyenda.
42023045	Ngyeela ya mnengyeṟi ikatitia; isulyia lyeshingyia hekalunyi lyikaranduka makyiṙi-gawi.
42023046	Yesu kakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi, kagamba, “Hoi Awu, mawokonyi gapfo ngawika mrima oko.”
42023047	Amgambe kuṙo nalelekyia moo. Kyiyeri mchilyi ulya alewona shindo shilewutika, naleana Ruwa, echigamba, “Loi mndu-chu nawekyeri msumganyi.”
42023048	Na wandu wa kyisanzionyi kyoose walekowakuumbia iambuya shindo-sho, wammbone kyindo kyilewutika, wakayenda kowo wechikapa-kapa shipoota.
42023049	Na woose wawemwichi, na waka walya waleoshana na oe iwuka Galyilaya, wakagoṟoka kuleshi weambuya shindo-sho.
42023050	Kukocha mndu umwi, ekyelago Yosefu, awekyeri nyi mndu o mengye ya Wayuda, mndu mcha, awoṙe wusumganyi.
42023051	(Maa aleiṙikyiana na kyilya walewuta-pfo), na oe nyi mndu o Arimataya, mṟi umwi o Wayuda, lyingyi-se naweiweṙelyia Wumangyi wo Ruwa.
42023052	Mndu-cho naleyenda ko Pilato, kakunda naenengo mmbiu o Yesu.
42023053	Kasotsa mmbiu-cho iwuka msalabenyi, kauaṟahia sanda, kauwika kyilomenyi kyiwekyipache iṟaṟenyi, nakyo kyilawendeṟiko mndu-pfo.
42023054	Na mfiri ulya uwekyeri mfiri o ikuṟeyeṟa, na mfiri o onyonya ukowooka iafukyia.
42023055	Na waka walya walecha na oe iwuka Galyilaya waleosha, wakawona kyilome, na chandu mmbiu okye uwemmbikyie.
42023056	Wakawuya wakaṟeyeṟa mafuṙa gekyepfaama necha. Na mfiri o onyonya walechihiyo chandu kyiwekyigambe.
42024001	Mfiri o kuwooka o juma, kyiyeri kulewooka ikya, waleyenda kyilomenyi, wechiende mafuṙa galya waweṟeyeṟie.
42024002	Wakakooya igoe lyilya lyilyiimbiṟitsie kuleshi na kyilome,
42024003	wakaiṙa napfo walawone mmbiu o Mndumii Yesu.
42024004	Kyiyeri waweiṟewe kyipfa kya kyindo-kyo, wandu wawi walegoṟoka kufuhi nawo, waṟee nguwo tsikyema-kyema.
42024005	Nawo kyiyeri walewoṙo nyi fowa na iarama mṟasa wanda, iwo walewawia, “Ny'kyilyi muipfula ai na moo ko wapfu?
42024006	Akyeri iha-pfo, amṟuka. Kumbuonyi chandu aleṙeṙa na nyoe kyiyeri awekyeri Galyilaya,
42024007	echigamba, ‘Kyakooya Mana o Adamu iwiko mawokonyi ga wanyamaṟi, na iwoogo, na iṟuka mfiri o kaṟaaṟu.’ ”
42024008	Wakakumbuo maṙeṙo gakye.
42024009	Wakawuka kyilomenyi, wakawuya; wakawia walya ikumi na umwi na wengyi woose mbonyi-tso tsoose.
42024010	Nawo nyi Maria Makyidalena, na Yoana, na Maria, wama o Yakobo, na waka walya wengyi wawekyeri nawo;
42024011	iwo walewia wasu mbonyi tsa shindo-sho.
42024012	Maṙeṙo gawo gakawa cha kyindo kyerooiya kowo, maa walewaiṙikyia-pfo. Indi Petiro nalefuma kakapa mteeṟa mṟasa kyilomenyi, kaarama kaimemia pfo, kawona nguwo iya awemwaṟahie, kayenda echiṟiyio ko isho shilewutika.
42024013	Na mfiri ulya ulya wandu wawi kyiiṙi kyawo waweiyenda kyikaṟo kyimwi, kyekyelago Emau, kyiwekyeri kuleshi na Yerusalemu cha handu ha kyaro kya saa tsiwi.
42024014	Nawo waweiṙeṙa wo wenyi ko wenyi mbonyi tsa shindo-sho shoose shilewutika.
42024015	Na kyiiṙi kya ikapa sumu na iwesana lyawo, Yesu amonyi naletikyira kufuhi, kaoshana nawo.
42024016	Meso gawo gakashingo walammanye.
42024017	Kawawia, “Nyi maṙeṙo ga mbaṟe iha muwiana kuṙi ilyi muichumia?” Wakagoṟoka walemie nzineeri.
42024018	Kagaluo umwi owo, ekyelago Kyileopa, kammbia, “Ngyesa nyi iyoe kumonyi ukyeri myenu kulya Yerusalemu, mṟasa ulamanye shilewutika pfo mfiri-i?”
42024019	Kawawesa, “Mbonyi tsiha?” Wakammbia, “Mbonyi tsa Yesu o Nasareti, awekyeri moonguo shisuku awewoṙe wuiṙimi kyiiṙi kya iwuta na iṙeṙa mbele ya Ruwa na wandu woose.
42024020	Lyingyi-se chandu wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na wasongoru waṙu walemwanduya ipfa, wakammbaaga.
42024021	Na soe luwekusurie kye oe nyi oe echikyiṟa Isiraelyi. Ngoseṟa ya isho shoose, inu nyi mfiri o kaṟaaṟu wookyia shilewutika isho.
42024022	Lyingyi-se, waka waata wa koṙu waleluowesha, waleyenda kyilomenyi ngamenyi utuko,
42024023	walawone mmbiu okye; wakachegamba kye walechio nyi malaika walegamba kye nakyeri na moo.
42024024	Na wengyi wawekyeri hamwi na soe waleyenda kyilomenyi wakawewona kuṙo chandu waka walya walegamba, indi oe walemmbona-pfo.”
42024025	Kawawia, “Nyoe wandu mulaichi, muwoṙe mrima ngyilemeri iiṙikyia shoose weonguo shisuku walegamba!
42024026	Ngyesa kyilekooya Kristo iwona matuuro-ga na iiṙa na mng'anonyi okye-pfoe?”
42024027	Kawooka wookyia Mose na weonguo shisuku woose, kawaongoya shiṟeionyi shoose, mbonyi tsakye oe amonyi.
42024028	Wakatikyira kufuhi na kyikaṟo kyilya waweiyenda, na oe kawa cha ilyi naweiyenda mbele.
42024029	Wakamterewa, wechigamba, “Kaa hamwi na soe, cha kyipfa komiila na kyio kyamcha.” Kaiṙa na numba ikaa nawo.
42024030	Na kyiyeri aweṙamie nawo echilya, naleira mkate, kauwikyia mboṟa, kaupeṟenguo.
42024031	Meso gawo gakatambaṟuka, wakammanya; numa ya iho kawuka mbele yawo.
42024032	Wakawiana, “Ngyesa mrima-i yaṙu yaluloṟa ilyi aweiṙeṙa na soe njienyi, na ilutambuluya shiṟeio-pfoe?”
42024033	Wakaamka saaiya-iya, wakawuya na Yerusalemu, wakakooya walya ikumi na umwi wakusanie, wo na walya wawekyeri hamwi nawo,
42024034	wechigamba, “Mndumii amṟuka loi loi, na oe nawonekyia Simion.”
42024035	Nawo wakawawia mbonyi tsilya tsa njienyi, na chandu alemanyika kowo kyiyeri alepeṟenguo mkate.
42024036	Na lyilya waweiṙeṙa mbonyi-tso oe amonyi nalegoṟoka makyiṙi-gawi gawo, kawawia, “Ufoṟo lukae konyu.”
42024037	Wakaṙumbuko nyi maṙima wakaowuo mnu, wekusaṟa kye wawonyi mumuyo.
42024038	Kawawia, “Ny'kyilyi muiṟewe? Na kyitewe mokapa kawi mrimenyi konyu ny'kyi?
42024039	Ambuyenyi mawoko gako na maṙende gako, kye nyi inyi ngyimonyi. Ngyiwaṙe-waṙenyi muwone; cha kyipfa mumuyo uwoṙe mmbiu na mafuo chandu mungyiwonyi ngyiwoṙe-pfo.”
42024040	Amgambe isho nalewaloṟa mawoko gakye na maṙende gakye.
42024041	Kyasia kyiyeri walelemo iiṙikyia kyipfa kya sia, na kunu wechiṟiyio, nalewawia, “Muwoṙe kyelya kyoose iha?”
42024042	Wakamwenenga kyipeṟengu kya ikunga kyiwekyikagaṟe.
42024043	Kakyiambilyia, kalya mbele yawo.
42024044	Numa ya iho kawawia, “Igo nyigo maṙeṙo gako ngyilemmbia lyilya ngyiwekyeri hamwi na nyoe, kye kyakooya shiafutsio shoose Mose aleṟeia Uwawasonyi kyipfa kyako na shilya weonguo shisuku waleṟeia na shilya shishiṟeie shiimbonyi.”
42024045	Nyi lyo-ng'u aletambuluo ngyuuṟango tsawo waiṙime imanya shiṟeio.
42024046	Kawawia, “Nyi wuṟo kyiwekyiṟeie, kye Kristo nechituuro na iṟuka mfiri o kaṟaaṟu.
42024047	Na kye masanga goose geongoyo mbonyi ngyicha kui rina lyakye, mbonyi tsa iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi na ihooṟio gyuunyamaṟi, iwookyia Yerusalemu.
42024048	Na nyoe nyi waṟingyishi wa mbonyi-tsi.
42024049	Na inyi ngyimuendie kyaasa kya Awu oko; kyaindi ṙionyi kunu mṟinyi, mṟasa muṟiko pfinya tsiwukyie wuye.” Mṟi o Yerusalemu (Luk 24:47,52)
42024050	Kawasongoya mṟasa Betania, kaira mawoko gakye kawawikyia mboṟa.
42024051	Na kyiyeri aweiwawikyia mboṟa, nalelekana nawo; kaṙoo wuye ruwewu.
42024052	Wakamwindia; numa ya iho wakawuya na Yerusalemu wawoṙo nyi sia ing'anyi.
42024053	Nawo kyiyeri kyoose wawekyeri hekalunyi, weṟumisha Ruwa.
43001001	Ipfo mawookyionyi wuyana wulandegumbo kuwewoṙe Ṙeṙo, na Ṙeṙo nawekyeri ko Ruwa, na Ṙeṙo nawei Ruwa.
43001002	Ipfo mawookyionyi nawekyeri ko Ruwa.
43001003	Shoose shilewutika kui oe; maa kuwoṙe kyindo kyileiṙima iwutika nja yakye-pfo.
43001004	Oe nyi-we shoka ya moo, na moo-cho uwei ngyeela ya wandu.
43001005	Na ngyeela-yo yekyelyimika meemenyi, maa meema uleiṙima iirumisha-pfo.
43001006	Hawewoṙe mndu, amṙume iwuka ko Ruwa, ekyelago Yohane.
43001007	Icho nalecha iṟingyishia, kundu naṟingyishie ngyeela-yo, wandu woose waiṙime iiṙikyia.
43001008	Mndu-cho awei ngyeela-yo-pfo, indi nalecha kundu naiṟingyishie.
43001009	Kuwewoṙe Ngyeela ya loi, ekyeenenga orio mndu saa, echicha na wuyanenyi.
43001010	Nawekyeri wuyanenyi, na kui oe wuyana wulegumbo kyaindi wuyana wulemmanya-pfo.
43001011	Nalecha na urukyenyi kokye, kyaindi maa walya wai wakye walemwambilyia-pfo.
43001012	Indi woose walemwambilyia nalewaenenga wuiṙimi wo iwa wana wa Ruwa; nyi walya waiṙikyie rina lyakye.
43001013	Wandu-wa wawafee, chi kui pfinya tsa mndu, maa chi kui ikunda lya mmbiu, maa kui chandu mndu akundi-pfo, indi kui pfinya tsa Ruwa.
43001014	Na Ṙeṙo nalewa mndu, kakaa koṙu; na soe lukowona mng'ano okye, mng'ano cha o Mana kyimuumwi awukyie ko Awu; naichuo isaṟia na wuloi.
43001015	Yohane nalemṟingyishia, kakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi, kagamba, “Ichu nyi oe ngyileonguo mbonyi tsakye kye, ‘Aicha numa yako nawekyeri mbele yako; kyipfa nawekyeri pfo maa inyi ngyilafeo.’ ”
43001016	Kyipfa awoṙe mboṟa tsifoi soe loose luleambilyia isaṟia lying'anyi.
43001017	Cha kyipfa uwawaso luleṙiko iiṙia Mose; isaṟia na wuloi shilecha iiṙia Yesu Kristo.
43001018	Kuwoṙe mndu alemmbona Ruwa kyiyeri kyoose-pfo. Mana kyimuumwi ai cha Ruwa nyi oe aleshukuo mbonyi tsakye.
43001019	Na iwu nyiwo wuṟingyishi wo Yohane, kyiyeri Wayuda waleṙuma makohanyi kokye na Walewi iwuka Yerusalemu kundu wammbese, “Iyoe nukyeri wui?”
43001020	Na oe naleiṙikyia, maa alekana-pfo. Naleiṙikyia kye, “Inyi chi Kristo-pfo.”
43001021	Nawo wakammbesa, “Nyi wui-ng'u? Iyoe nyi Elyiya?” Kagamba, “Inyi chi oe-pfo.” “Iyoe nyi moonguo shisuku ulya?” Kagaluo, “Ote.”
43001022	Naaho wakammbia, “Nui wui? Luiṙime igaluo walya waluṙuma. Nuigamba iyoe nyi wui?”
43001023	Kagamba, “Inyi nyi ṟui lya mndu aieṙia kundu ko nuka, ‘Goṟotsenyi mṟaṟu o Mndumii!’ Chandu moonguo shisuku Yesaya alegamba.”
43001024	Na walya walekowaṙumo wawewukyie ko Mafarisayo.
43001025	Wakammbesa, wakammbia, “Ny'kyilyi-ng'u uipatisa kokooya iyoe chi Kristo, maa Elyiya, maa moonguo shisuku ulya-pfo?”
43001026	Yohane kawagaluo, echigamba, “Inyi ngyimupatisa kui mṟinga, kyaindi kyiiṙi kyanyu hagoṟokyi mndu mulamuichi nyoe.
43001027	Nyi oe ulya aicha numa yako, inyi ngyilawaṟi ituruchuo ukowa lo kyiaṙu kyakye.”
43001028	Isho shilewutika kulya Betania molyolya o Yoridan, kundu Yohane aweipatisia.
43001029	Ilya-ngama kawona Yesu echicha na kokye, kagamba, “Aikyi Kyiondo kya Ruwa, kyechiwuta ngyuunyamaṟi tsa wuyana!
43001030	Ichu nyi oe ngyileṙeṙa mbonyi tsakye kye, ‘Kuicha mndu numa yako, alengyisongoya; kyipfa nawekyeri pfo ngyilafeo.’
43001031	Maa inyi ngyiwemwichi-pfo; kyaindi kundu naṟingyishio ko wandu wa Isiraelyi inyi ngyilecha ngyechipatisa kui mṟinga.”
43001032	Lyingyi-se Yohane kaṟingyishia, echigamba, “Ngyilewona Mumuyo echisoka cha mbeta awuka ruwewu; na oe kaṙamia wuye yakye.
43001033	Maa inyi ngyilemmanya-pfo; kyaindi oe alengyiṙuma ipatisa kui mṟinga nalengyiwia, ‘Ulya ochiwona Mumuyo echisoka na iṙamia wuye yakye, icho nyi oe ekyepatisa kui Mumuyo Mweele.’
43001034	Na inyi ngammbona, lyingyi-se ngaṟingyishia kye ichu nyi Mana o Ruwa.”
43001035	Ilya-ngama-se Yohane nawegoṟokyi hamwi na wanalosho wawi kyiiṙi kya wanalosho wakye.
43001036	Kaambuya Yesu echumia, kagamba, “Aikyi Kyiondo kya Ruwa!”
43001037	Wanalosho walya wawi wakaicho eṙeṙa wakayenda halya-ndu Yesu awekyeri.
43001038	Yesu kainduka, kawawona wechicha na kokye, kawawia, “Muipfula kyi?” Wakammbia, “Rabi (kyimwi na igamba, Mlosha), nyi kwi okyekaa?”
43001039	Kawawia, “Nnjonyi, na nyoe mowona.” Wakayenda, wakawona handu ekyekaa, wakakaa kokye mfiri ulya. Na nyi-we cha kyiyeri kya saa kumi.
43001040	Anderea, mono-wama o Simion Petiro, nawei umwi o wanalosho walya wawi waleicho ulogo lo Yohane na iosha Yesu.
43001041	Icho nalewona Simion kuwooka mono-wama okye oe amonyi, kammbia, “Lommbona Mesia.” (Kyimwi na igamba, Kristo).
43001042	Kamṙuo ko Yesu. Na Yesu kamwambuya, kammbia, “Iyoe nyi Simion, mana o Yohane; na iyoe nochilago Kyefa (kyimwi na igamba Petiro ang'u Igoe)”
43001043	Ilya-ngama nawekundi iyenda Galyilaya, na oe kawona Filyipo. Yesu kammbia, “Ngyiosha.”
43001044	Na Filyipo nawekyeri mndu awukyie Betisaida, mṟi Anderea na Filyipo wawekyekaa.
43001045	Filyipo kawona Natanaelyi kammbia, “Lommbona ulya mbonyi tsakye tsingyiṟeie mawawasonyi ga Mose na weonguo shisuku, Yesu mana o Yosefu, mndu o Nasareti.”
43001046	Natanaelyi kammbia, “Kyindo kyicha kyeiṙima iwuka Nasareti?” Filyipo kammbia, “Nnjo uwone.”
43001047	Kyasia Yesu kawona Natanaelyi echicha na kokye, kaonguo mbonyi tsakye, “Aichu Muisiraelyi loi loi, awoṙe ngyeṟo maa ale-pfo.”
43001048	Natanaelyi kammbia, “Noiṙima kuṙa ingyimanya?” Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Kyiyeri Filyipo alandekulage ukyeri halya wanda ya mfumu ngyilekuwona.”
43001049	Natanaelyi kamgaluo, kagamba, “Rabi, iyoe nyi Mana o Ruwa, nyi oe mangyi o Isiraelyi.”
43001050	Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Kyipfa ngyilekuwia, ngyilekuwona wanda ya mfumu, noiṙikyia? Nochiwona shindo shing'anyi kuta ishi.”
43001051	Kammbia, “Loi, loi ngammbia, mochiwona mapuchi geseia na malaika wa Ruwa wechiṙooya na isokyia wuye ya Mana o Adamu.”
43002001	Na mfiri o kaṟaaṟu kuwewoṙe wolyi kulya Kana, mṟi o Galyilaya; na mama o Yesu nawekyeri ho.
43002002	Na Yesu nalekoalago na wolyinyi hamwi na wanalosho wakye.
43002003	Na kyiyeri mpfinyo uleṙumbukyia, mama o Yesu kammbia, “Wawoṙe mpfinyo-pfo.”
43002004	Yesu kammbia, “Mama, ny' kyikyi luwoṙe inyi na iyoe? Kyiyeri kyako kyilandeshikye-pfo.”
43002005	Wamae kawia waṟundi, “Kyindo kyoose echimmbia, wutenyi.”
43002006	Kyasia kuwewoṙe shigondi shiṟandaaṟu sha magoe, shiweshiwikye pfo kui muichiwie o Wayuda o samba kyimṟumoe, orio kyimwi kyiwoṙe cha madewe gaṟaaṟu.
43002007	Yesu kawawia, “Ichuṟenyi shigondi-shi mṟinga.” Nawo wakashiichuṟa pacha.
43002008	Kawawia, “Wulalu ṙahienyi, muṙooye monyi kyila.” Wakaṙuo.
43002009	Na kyiyeri monyi kyila aleria mṟinga ulya ulewa mpfinyo, (maa alamanye kundu ulecha kyaindi waṟundi waweichi, walya waleṙahia mṟinga-cho) nalelaga monyi wolyi,
43002010	kammbia, “Orio mndu mawookyionyi nekyeṟeyeṟa mpfinyo mcha; na wandu wakamnyo nakamwi nekyeende mpfinyo umwipale. Iyoe nokooma mpfinyo mcha mṟasa wulalu.”
43002011	Kyindo-kyi kya kuwooka kya kyiṟiyisho Yesu nalekyiwuta kulya Kana ya Galyilaya, kaṟingyishia mng'ano okye, na wanalosho wakye wakamwiṙikyia.
43002012	Numa ya isho kasoka mṟasa Kaperinaumu, oe na wamae na wana wa wamae na wanalosho wakye; wakakaa pfo mfiri ngyaangu.
43002013	Na Pasaka ya Wayuda iwekyeri kufuhi; na Yesu kaṙo mṟasa Yerusalemu.
43002014	Kawona halya hekalunyi wandu waweikumba umbe na moondo na mbeta, na weilacha heleri waṙamie.
43002015	Kaachikyia msharite, kawafuna woose kulya hekalunyi, na moondo na umbe; kaola-ola heleri tsa weilacha heleri, kapfuluo mesa tsawo;
43002016	kawia walya waweikumba mbeta, “Wutenyi ishi iha. Mulagaluo numba ya Awu oko iwa numba ya mbucha.”
43002017	Wanalosho wakye wakakumbuo kye kyikyiṟeie, “Ikunda lyako ko mbonyi tsapfo lyechingyirumatsa.”
43002018	Kyasia Wayuda wakagaluo wakammbia, “Nyi kyiṟingyishio kyiha ululoṟa kye nuiwuta ishi?”
43002019	Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Unduonyi hekalu-lyi na inyi ngyelyiwika mfirinyi iṟaṟu.”
43002020	Kyasia Wayuda wakagamba, “Hekalu-lyi lyilewiko kyiyeri kya maka makumi gaana na iṟandaaṟu, na iyoe nochilyiwika mfirinyi iṟaṟu?”
43002021	Kyaindi oe naleonguo mbonyi tsa hekalu lya mmbiu okye.
43002022	Koikyo kyiyeri aleṟuka ko wapfu, wanalosho wakye wakakumbuo kye nalegamba kuṙo, wakaiṙikyia kyiṟeio na kyindo kyilya Yesu alekyionguo.
43002023	Na kyiyeri awekyeri Yerusalemu kyiyeri kya Pasaka wandu wafoi waleiṙikyia rina lyakye, kyiyeri walewona shiṟiyisho alewuta.
43002024	Kyaindi Yesu alewaiṙikyia-pfo kyipfa nalemanya kyikyeri mrimenyi kowo;
43002025	kyipfa kuwewoṙe kyimaṙuma kya mndu iṟingyishia mbonyi tsa mndu-pfo; kyipfa oe amonyi nalemanya shikyeri mrimenyi ko mndu.
43003001	Kuwewoṙe mndu umwi kyiiṙi kya Mafarisayo ekyelago Nikodemo, awei msongoru o Wayuda.
43003002	Mndu-cho nalecha na ko Yesu kyio, kammbia, “Rabi, luichi kye iyoe nyi mlosha uwukyie ko Ruwa; cha kyipfa kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima iwuta shiṟiyisho-shi uiwuta iyoe-pfo, sile kokooya Ruwa nakyeri na mndu-cho.”
43003003	Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Ny'kyaloi, ngakuwia, mndu alandefeo lya kawi echiiṙima iwona Wumangyi wo Ruwa-pfo.”
43003004	Nikodemo kammbia, “Mndu neiṙima kuṙa ifeo amku? Neiṙima iwuya na wosinyi ko wamae nafeo-se lya kawi?”
43003005	Yesu kamgaluo, “Ny'kyaloi, ngakuwia, mndu alandefeo kui mṟinga na Mumuyo echiiṙima iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa-pfo.
43003006	Kyikyifee nyi mmbiu nyi mmbiu; na kyikyifee kui Mumuyo nyi mumuyo.
43003007	Ulaṟiyio kyipfa ngakuwia, kyikuwaṟi ifeo lya kawi.
43003008	Mkuma okyekuma handu ukundi, na ṟui lya mkuma-cho nokyelyiicho, kyaindi uichi kundu owuka ang'u uiyenda-pfo. Na wuṙo mbonyi tsa orio mndu afeo kui Mumuyo.”
43003009	Nikodemo kagaluo, kammbia, “Mbonyi-tsi tseiṙimika kuṙa?”
43003010	Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Iyoe nyi mlosha o Isiraelyi na mbonyi-tsi utsiichi-pfo?
43003011	Ny'kyaloi ngakuwia kye, kyilya lukyiichi lukyionguo, na kyilya lulekyiwona lukyiṟingyishia. Kyaindi maa wuṟingyishi woṙu muwuiṙikyia-pfo.
43003012	Kokooya ngamuongoya mbonyi tsa wuyanenyi mulaiṙikyie, moiṙikyia kuṙa ngamuongoya mbonyi tsa ruwewu?
43003013	Maa kuwoṙe mndu alemṙo na ruwewu sile Mana o Adamu ulya alesoka iwuka ruwewu-pfo.”
43003014	“Na chandu Mose aleira njoka iya kulya nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga, na wuṙo Mana o Adamu awaṟi iiro;
43003015	kundu orio mndu aiṙikyie nawaṙe moo o mlungana kui oe.
43003016	Cha kyipfa nyi wuṙo Ruwa alekunda wuyana, katana awuta Mana okye kyimuumwi, kundu orio mndu amwiṙikyie alaṙekye, indi nawaṙe moo o mlungana.
43003017	Cha kyipfa Ruwa aleṙuma Mana wuyanenyi kundu naanduye wuyana-pfo, indi wuyana wukyiṟo kui oe.
43003018	Amwiṙikyie oe echianduyo-pfo; alaiṙikyie amwanduyo; cha kyipfa aiṙikyia rina lya Mana kyimuumwi o Ruwa-pfo.
43003019	Na ilyi nyilyo ianduyo; kye ngyeela ilecha na wuyanenyi, na wandu wakakunda meema kuta ngyeela; kyipfa mawuto gawo gawemawicho.
43003020	Kyipfa orio mndu ekyewuta shindo shiwicho nasuuye ngyeela, maa ekyecha na ngyeelenyi-pfo, mawuto gakye galachemanyika naṟoṟomo.
43003021	Indi ulya ekyewuta kyindo kya loi nekyecha na ngyeelenyi, kundu mawuto gakye gawono na pata kye gawuto kui Ruwa.”
43003022	Numa ya isho Yesu na wanalosho wakye waleyenda mṟasa uruka lo Uyuda; katsinda pfo hamwi nawo, echipatisa.
43003023	Yohane na oe naweipatisa ipfo Ainon, kufuhi na Salyimu, kyipfa ipfo kuwewoṙe mṟinga ushikyie; na wandu wakayenda kokye, wakapatiso.
43003024	Cha kyipfa Yohane alekoawiko kyipfungonyi-pfo.
43003025	Kyasia wanalosho wa Yohane wakagaluana na Myuda umwi kya mbonyi tsa isanjo mrima.
43003026	Wakayenda ko Yohane, wakammbia, “Rabi, ulya awekyeri hamwi na iyoe molyolya o Yoridan, ulya uleṟingyishia mbonyi tsakye, naipatisa, na wandu woose waiyenda kokye.”
43003027	Yohane kagaluo, kagamba, “Kuwoṙe mndu echiiṙima imanya kyindo kyoose sile Ruwa amwenenga wuiṙimi-pfo.
43003028	Nyoe mungyiṟingyishia kye ngyilegamba ‘Inyi chi oe Kristo-pfo, indi ngileṙiko oe alacha.’
43003029	Ulya awoṙe mono-kyika ailayiko nyi monyi wolyi; kyaindi mbuya ya monyi wolyi, ulya ekyegoṟoka na imwaṙanyia, nekyechihiyo kyipfa kya ṟui lya monyi wolyi. Kyasia sia yako yaafukyia.
43003030	Kyiwaṟi oe iwaṙa kyiṟumi kying'anyi na kyako ititia.”
43003031	“Ulya acha awuka wuye, icho nakyeri wuye ya shoose. Ulya akyeri o wuyana, kanyi kokye nyi wuyanenyi, na oe nekyeṙeṙa shindo sha wuyanenyi. Ulya aicha awuka ruwewu nakyeri wuye ya shoose.
43003032	Shilya aleshiwona na ishiicho nyisho aiṟingyishia, kyaindi maa kuwoṙe mndu aiiṙikyia wuṟingyishi wokye-pfo.
43003033	Ulya aleiṙikyia wuṟingyishi wokye naloṟa na pata kye Ruwa nyi loi.
43003034	Cha kyipfa ulya amṙume nyi Ruwa nekyeonguo mbonyi tsa Ruwa; cha kyipfa ekyeenengyia Mumuyo kui iehia-pfo.
43003035	Awu nakundi Mana, na oe nawikyie shoose mawokonyi gakye.
43003036	Aiṙikyie Mana nawoṙe moo o mlungana; alaiṙikyie Mana echiwona moo-pfo, indi nyashi ya Ruwa yechimwolokyia.”
43004001	Kyiyeri Mndumii alemanya kye Mafarisayo wamuicho kye Yesu naigalutsia wandu wafoi ura lokye na iwapatisa kuta Yohane,
43004002	(kyaindi Yesu alepatisa-pfo, indi wanalosho wakye),
43004003	nalewuka Uyuda, kayenda-se mṟasa Galyilaya.
43004004	Na oe kyiwemmbaṟi naiṙe kyiiṙi kya Samaria.
43004005	Kyasia kashika mṟinyi o Samaria, okyelago Sikari, kufuhi na ṙema lyilya Yakobo alekoaenenga Yosefu mono-kye.
43004006	Na iho hawewoṙe kyisima kya Yakobo. Kyasia Yesu, kyipfa kyaro kyilekokyamwenenga iwina, kaṙamia halya kyisimenyi. Na nyi-we cha saa tsiṟandaaṟu tsa kyingoto.
43004007	Mndu mka o kyisamaria kacheṙahia mṟinga. Yesu kammbia, “Ngyienenga mṟinga ngyinyo.”
43004008	Cha kyipfa wanalosho wakye waweiyenda mṟinyi iguṟa kyelya.
43004009	Kyasia mndu mka ulya o Kyisamaria kammbia, “Kyawa kuṙa iyoe Myuda iterewa mṟinga koko na inyi nyi mndu mka o Kyisamaria?” (Kyipfa Wayuda na Wasamaria wekyekaa handu hamwi-pfo).
43004010	Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Kokooya uweichi kyindo Ruwa ekyeenengyia, na nyi wui aikuwia ‘Ngyienenga mṟinga ngyinyo’, nuwechimterewa oe, na oe nawechikuenenga mṟinga uwoṙe moo.”
43004011	Mndu mka ulya kammbia, “Mndumii, uwoṙe kyindo kyeṙahia-pfo, na kyisima kyikyileshi. Nyi kwi owona mṟinga-cho uwoṙe moo?
43004012	Ngyesa iyoe nung'anyi kuta awu oṙu, Yakobo, aleluenenga kyisima-kyi, na oe kanyo pfo mṟinga, na wana wakye taa, na shima shakye?”
43004013	Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Orio mndu anyo mṟinga-chu nechiwoṙo-se nyi nyoṙa;
43004014	kyaindi orio mndu echinyo mṟinga ulya ngyechimwenenga inyi echiwoṙo nyoṙa nyi mṟasa mlungana-pfo. Indi mṟinga ulya ngyechimwenenga ochiwa shoka ya mṟinga ochimwenenga moo o mlungana.”
43004015	Mndu mka ulya kammbia, “Mndumii, ngyienenga mṟinga-cho, ngyilawoṙo nyi nyoṙa, maa ngyilache-se iṙahia iha.”
43004016	Yesu kammbia, “Yenda undelaga mii opfo, uche na oe na iha.”
43004017	Mndu mka ulya kagaluo, kagamba, “Ngyiwoṙe mii-pfo.” Yesu kammbia, “Nogamba necha, ‘Ngyiwoṙe mii-pfo’;
43004018	kyipfa ulemkaa na wasoṟo wataanu, na ulya ukyeri na oe wulalu chi mii opfo-pfo. Iho nogamba loi.”
43004019	Mndu mka ulya kammbia, “Mndumii, ngyiwonyi kye nui moonguo shisuku!
43004020	Waku waṙu waleindia Ruwa iha fumvunyi, na nyoe mokyegamba kye ipfo Yerusalemu nyi handu luwaṟi iindia pfo Ruwa.”
43004021	Yesu kammbia, “Mama, ngyiiṙikyia. Kyiyeri kyiicha mulechiiṙima iindia Ruwa iha fumvunyi, maa kulya Yerusalemu.
43004022	Nyoe muindia kyindo mulakyiichi; soe luindia kyindo lukyiichi; cha kyipfa wukyiṟo wuwukyie ko Wayuda.
43004023	Kyaindi kyiyeri kyiicha, na wulalu kyikyeri ho, wandu wechiindia necha Awu mumuyonyi na wuloinyi. Cha kyipfa Awu naipfula wandu cha iwo wamwindie.
43004024	Ruwa nyi Mumuyo na iwo wekyemwindia kyiwawaṟi imwindia mumuyonyi na wuloinyi.”
43004025	Mndu mka ulya kammbia, “Ngyiichi kye Mesia naicha (ekyelago Kristo); na oe ilyi echicha, nechilutambuluya shindo shoose.”
43004026	Yesu kammbia, “Inyi ngyiṙeṙa na iyoe nyi oe.”
43004027	Kyiyeri kyilya kyilya wanalosho wakye wakacha, wakaṟiyio kyipfa naweiṙeṙa na mndu mka; kyaindi kuwoṙe alegamba, “Nuipfula kyi?” Ang'u “Ny'kyilyi uiṙeṙa na oe-pfo?”
43004028	Kyasia mndu mka ulya kaṙa kyitongoṟima kyilya kyakye, kayenda mṟinyi, kawia wandu,
43004029	“Nnjonyi muwone mndu angyiwia shindo shoose ngyilewuta. Ngyesa ichu chi oe Kristo-pfoe?”
43004030	Kyasia wandu wakawuka mṟinyi wakayenda ko Yesu.
43004031	Kyiyeri-kyo ikyo wanalosho wakye walemterewa, wechigamba, “Rabi, lya kyelya.”
43004032	Kawawia, “Inyi ngyiwoṙe kyelya mulakyiichi nyoe.”
43004033	Kyasia wanalosho wakye wakawesana wo wenyi ko wenyi, “Ngyesa kuwoṙe mndu amwendie kyelya?”
43004034	Yesu kawawia, “Kyelya kyako ny'kyo ikyi, ngyiwute shilya ulya alengyiṙuma akundi, ngyiafutsie iṟunda lyakye.
43004035	Ngyesa mokyegamba, ‘Hatsugai mori ina kyiyeri kyesambuo kyishikye-pfoe?’ Inyi ngammbia, kye maṙema gamshika kyiyeri kyesambuo.
43004036	Na ulya mosambuo nekyeambilyia wori, na isania shilyimu kyipfa kya moo o mlungana; kundu ulya ekyewaaya na ulya ekyesambuo waiṙime ichihiyo handu hamwi.
43004037	Cha kyipfa iho ṙeṙo-lyo lyekyewa loi, ‘Umwi nekyewaaya ungyi kasambuo.’
43004038	Inyi ngyilemṙuma musambuo shilya mulaleshiwinia. Wengyi walewina, nyoe mowona kyiira kyipfa waleṟunda kui wuragari.”
43004039	Na kulya mṟinyi Wasamaria wafoi walemwiṙikyia kyipfa kya ulogo lo mndu mka ulya, aleṟingyishia kye, “Nalengyiwia shindo shoose ngyilewuta.”
43004040	Kyasia Wasamaria walya kyiyeri waleyenda kokye, wakamterewa nakae kowo; na oe kakaa pfo mfiri iwi.
43004041	Wandu wafoi ngoseṟa wakawaṙa iiṙikyia kyipfa kya ulogo lokye.
43004042	Wakawia mndu mka ulya, “Wulalu loiṙikyia, maa chi kyipfa kya maṙeṙo gapfo tupu-pfo, maa soe loicho luwenyi. Lyingyi-se luichi kye kyaloi ichu nyi oe Mkyiṟa o wuyana.”
43004043	Na numa ya mfiri iya iwi nalewuka pfo, kayenda Galyilaya.
43004044	Cha kyipfa Yesu amonyi naleṟingyishia kye moonguo shisuku nekyeindio kundu koose sile kulya urukyenyi kokye.
43004045	Kyasia kyiyeri aleshika Galyilaya, Wagalyilaya walemwambilyia; cha kyipfa walewona shindo shoose alewuta ipfo Yerusalemu kyiyeri kya mfiri ung'anyi; kyipfa Wagalyilaya-wo walekowayenda Yerusalemu kyipfa kya mṟumoe o Pasaka.
43004046	Kyasia naleshika-se Kana ya Galyilaya, halya-ndu alekoagaluo mṟinga ukowa mpfinyo. Na kuwewoṙe mchilyi umwi mono-kye aweluoe kulya Kaperinaumu.
43004047	Mchilyi-cho kyiyeri aleicho kye Yesu nacha awuka uruka lo Uyuda mṟasa Galyilaya, naleyenda kokye, kamterewa nandekyiṟa mono-kye; kyipfa nawekyeri kufuhi na ipfa.
43004048	Kyasia Yesu kammbia, “Mulandewone shiṟiyisho na ṟigo tsifoi maa ale-pfoe?”
43004049	Mchilyi ulya kammbia, “Mndumii, nnjo mono-ko alapfa.”
43004050	Yesu kammbia, “Yenda; mono-pfo nai na moo.” Mndu ulya kaiṙikyia kyindo kyilya alewio nyi Yesu, na oe kayenda.
43004051	Na kyiyeri aweiyenda, masinga gakye gakamwambilyia, gechigamba kye mono-kye nai na moo.
43004052	Kyasia kawawesa mbonyi tsa saa alewooka iwa ungyi-ungyi; nawo wakammbia, “Ukou, saa mfungaaṙe, isemu lyilemleka.”
43004053	Kyasia awuye kamanya kye nyi saa iya iya Yesu alemmbia, “Mono-pfo nai na moo.” Kaiṙikyia oe na woose wa kanyi kokye.
43004054	Ikyo nyi kyiṟiyisho kya kawi Yesu alekyiwuta, kyiyeri alekoawuka uruka lo Uyuda ishika Galyilaya.
43005001	Numa ya isho, Yesu kayenda Yerusalemu mṟumoenyi o Wayuda.
43005002	Na ipfo Yerusalemu kufuhi na moongo o moondo hawewoṙe iruwa lya mṟinga, lyekyelago Betisata ko mṙeṙie o Kyiebrania, nalyo lyiwewoṙe mbuo tsitaanu.
43005003	Ipfo mbuonyi kuwewoṙe wandu wafoi mnu waluoe wawelee pfo, shipfupfuṟe, shiwete, na wapfiie ngapfu, [wechiweṙa mṟinga uchemkye.
43005004	Cha kyipfa kuwewoṙe kyiyeri malaika ekyesoka awuka ruwewu, kaiṙa na kulya iruwenyi lya mṟinga kapaaya na ifoga mṟinga ulya. Kyasia ulya echiwa o kuwooka iiṙa napfo numa ya mṟinga-cho ifoika nawekyekyia ndoṟe ilekoyammbaṙa.]
43005005	Na iho hawewoṙe mndu aweluoe kyiyeri kya maka makumi gaṟaaṟu na nyanya.
43005006	Kyiyeri Yesu alewona mndu-chu alee, na Yesu aichi kye nawekyeri kuṙo mfiri ifoi, nalemmbia, “Nukundi ichia?”
43005007	Mndu ulya aweluoe kagaluo, kagamba, “Mndumii, inyi ngyiwoṙe mndu mongyiwikyia ipfo iruwenyi lya mṟinga kyiyeri malaika ekyepaaya na ifoga mṟinga-pfo. Kyiyeri inyi ngacha, mndu ungyi nekyesonguo isokyia pfo.”
43005008	Yesu kammbia, “Goṟoka, ukuṙikye ikondoṟo lyapfo, uyende.”
43005009	Cha ilyi mndu ulya kawaṙa pfinya, kakuṙika ikondoṟo lyakye, kayenda. Na mfiri-cho nyi-we mfiri o onyonya.
43005010	Kyipfa kya ikyo Wayuda wakawia ulya alekyiṟo, “Inu nyi mfiri o onyonya, maa chi sungusinyi kopfo ikuṙika ikondoṟo-pfo.”
43005011	Kawagaluo kagamba, “Ulya angyikyiṟa nyi oe angyiwia, ‘Kuṙikye ikondoṟo lyapfo, uyende.’ ”
43005012	Kyasia wakammbesa, “Ulya akuwia ‘Kuṙikye, uyende,’ nyi wui?”
43005013	Kyaindi ulya alekyiṟo alemmanya nyi wui-pfo; kyipfa Yesu nalekoamlekana nawo, cha kyipfa handu halya hawewoṙe wandu wafoi.
43005014	Numa ya isho Yesu kamkooya hekalunyi, kammbia, “Ambuya, ommbaṙa pfinya; ulawute-se wunyamaṟi, ulacheolokyio nyi kyindo kyiwicho ngoseṟa.”
43005015	Mndu ulya kayenda, kaongoya Wayuda kye nyi Yesu amkyiṟa.
43005016	Cha kyipfa kya ikyo Wayuda wakalyisa Yesu wukyiwa, kyipfa nalewuta isho mfiri o onyonya.
43005017	Kawagaluo, kawawia, “Awu oko naiṟunda mṟasa wulalu, na inyi ngyiṟunda.”
43005018	Kyasia kyipfa kya ikyo Wayuda wakaengyeṟa ilanga immbaaga, chi kyipfa alefunja iwawaso lya mfiri o onyonya tupu-pfo, indi hamwi na isho nalelaga Ruwa Awu okye, echikuloṟa kye nalyingananyi na Ruwa.
43005019	Kyasia Yesu kagaluo kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, Mana eiṙima iwuta kyindo amonyi sile kyilya awonyi Awu ewuta-pfo; cha kyipfa shoose ekyewuta oe, nyisho Mana ekyewuta.
43005020	Cha kyipfa Awu nakundi Mana na oe nekyemloṟa shoose ekyewuta; maa maṟunda gang'anyi kuta isho ngoseṟa nechimloṟa, kundu nyoe muiṙime iṟiyio.
43005021	Kyipfa chandu Awu ekyeṟutsa wapfu na iwaenenga moo, na wuṙo Mana echienenga moo walya akundi iwawutia kuṙo.
43005022	Lyingyi-se Awu ekyeanduya mndu oose-pfo, indi naenengyie Mana ianduya lyoose;
43005023	kundu wandu woose waindie Mana chandu wekyeindia Awu. Mndu alekyeindia Mana ekyeindia Awu ulya alemṙuma-pfo.
43005024	Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, ulya aicho ṙeṙo lyako na iiṙikyia ulya alengyiṙuma nawoṙe moo o mlungana; maa echianduyo-pfo, indi ammbuka upfunyi na iira na moonyi o mlungana.
43005025	Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, kyiyeri kyiicha, nakyo kyamcha, wapfu wechiicho ṟui lya Mono-Ruwa, na walya wechilyiaṙanyia wechiwaṙa moo.
43005026	Kyipfa chandu Awu awoṙe moo o mlungana, na wuṙo aleenenga mana wuiṙimi wo waṙa moo o mlungana.
43005027	Na oe kamwenenga wuchilyi wo ianduya kyipfa nyi Mono-Adamu.
43005028	Mulaṟiyio kyipfa kya maṙeṙo-ga; cha kyipfa kyiyeri kyiicha, kyiyeri wandu woose wakyeri shilomenyi wechiicho ṟui lyakye.
43005029	Nawo wechiwuka shilomenyi; walya walewuta shindo shicha wawone moo o mlungana na walya walewuta shiwicho waanduyo.”
43005030	“Inyi ngyeiṙima iwuta kyindo ngyimonyi-pfo. Chandu ngyekyeicho nyi wuṙo ngyekyeanduya; na ianduya lyako nyi lya sungusinyi, cha kyipfa ngyekyewuta kyilya ngyikundi inyi-pfo, indi kyilya ulya alengyiṙuma akundi.
43005031	Inyi ngakuṟingyishia ngyimonyi wuṟingyishi woko chi loi-pfo.
43005032	Kuwoṙe ungyi aingyiṟingyishia; na inyi ngyiichi kye kyilya aingyiṟingyishia nyi kya loi.
43005033	Nyoe muleṙuma wandu ko Yohane, na oe kaṟingyishia wuloi.
43005034	Kyaindi inyi ngyiambilyia wuṟingyishi ko wandu-pfo; indi ngyigamba ishi kundu nyoe muiṙime ikyia.
43005035	Yohane nawekyeri cha taa iwuta ngyeela, na nyoe mulechihiyo kyipfa kya kyilya alegamba.
43005036	Kyaindi wuṟingyishi ngyiwoṙe inyi wung'anyi kuta wulya wo Yohane; cha kyipfa maṟunda galya Awu alengyienenga ngyigaṟunde gangyiṟingyishia kye Awu nalengyiṙuma.
43005037	Na Awu ulya alengyiṙuma nangyiṟingyishia. Ṟui lyakye mulandelyiicho kyiyeri kyoose maa fana yakye muleiwona-pfo.
43005038	Maa ulogo lokye lukyeri mrimenyi konyu-pfo, cha kyipfa nyoe muiṙikyie ulya oe alemṙuma-pfo.
43005039	Mokyekulosha mbonyi tsa shiṟeio shiele, cha kyipfa mokyekusaṟa kye kyiiṙi kyasho mochiwona moo o mlungana; na shiṟeio-sho shagamba mbonyi tsako.
43005040	Maa mukundi icha na koko muwone moo o mlungana-pfo.
43005041	Inyi ngyipfula iṟumisho nyi wandu-pfo.
43005042	Kyaindi ngamanya kye nyoe muwoṙe ikunda lya Ruwa mrimenyi konyu-pfo.
43005043	Inyi ngyilecha kui rina lya Awu oko kyaindi nyoe muingyiambilyia-pfo; ungyi kacha kui rina lyakye amonyi, icho mochimwambilyia.
43005044	Moiṙima kuṙa iiṙikyia nyoe muiṟumishana nyoe wenyi ko wenyi, na kyiṟumi kyilya kyiwukyie ko Ruwa alawoṙe amng'anyie muikyipfula-pfo?
43005045	Mulakusaṟe kye inyi ngyechimshitakyi mbele ya Awu; kuwoṙe echimshitakyi, nyi oe Mose, ulya muikusaṟa nechimtarama.
43005046	Cha kyipfa kokooya muleiṙikyia Mose, muwechingyiiṙikyia inyi; cha kyipfa Mose naleṟeia mbonyi tsako.
43005047	Kyaindi mulandeiṙikyie shiṟeio shakye, mochiiṙikyia kuṙa ulogo loko?”
43006001	Numa ya isho Yesu naleyenda molyolya o Nduwa ya Galyilaya iwekyelago Tiberia.
43006002	Na kyisanzionyi kying'anyi kya wandu kyikamwosha, cha kyipfa walewona shiṟiyisho alewutia wandu waluoe.
43006003	Na Yesu kaṙooya fumvunyi, kaṙamia pfo hamwi na wanalosho wakye.
43006004	Na Pasaka, mfiri ung'anyi o Wayuda, uwekyeri kufuhi.
43006005	Kyasia kyiyeri Yesu alewona ṟiima lying'anyi lya wandu lyechicha na kokye nalewia Filyipo, “Luguṟe kwi mkate kundu wandu-wa waiṙime ilya?”
43006006	Na naleṙeṙa kuṙo kundu namyeshe; cha kyipfa naweichi kyindo echiwuta.
43006007	Filyipo kamgaluo, kagamba, “Mkate ya woguru wo dinari magana gawi gewashika maa kokooya orio umwi alya kyitung'tu-pfo.”
43006008	Anderea, umwi o wanalosho wakye, mono-wama o Simion Petiro, kammbia,
43006009	“Iha hawoṙe mana awoṙe mkate itanu na makunga gawi, kyaindi ishi ny'kyikyi ko wandu wafoi cha iwa?”
43006010	Yesu kagamba, “Wienyi wandu waṙamie.” Na handu halya hawewoṙe maṟa gafoi. Kyasia wasoṟo wakaṙamia, cha shiku shitaanu woose piu.
43006011	Yesu kaira mkate iya, kaana, kagawia walya waweṙamie; kagawa na makunga galya taa chandu orio mndu alekunda.
43006012	Nawo kyiyeri waleiguṙa, nalewia wanalosho wakye, “Sanienyi shifunjoe-sho shatsugaa, kyilaṙekye maa kyimwi.”
43006013	Kyasia wakasania shifunjoe sha mkate iya itanu shiletsugaa wandu wamlye, wakaichuṟa mkunja ikumi na iwi.
43006014	Kyasia kyiyeri wandu walya walewona kyiṟiyisho alewuta, walegamba, “Loi ichu nyi moonguo shisuku ulya aicha wuyanenyi.”
43006015	Naaho-ng'u, aichi kye wawekundi ichemmbaṙa kundu wamgaluo mangyi, nalelekana nawo, kayenda-se fumvunyi alaṙuṙanyi na mndu.
43006016	Kyiyeri kya kyukonyi wanalosho wakye wakasoka na kulya nduwenyi,
43006017	wakaṙooya ngalawenyi, wakawooka iambaṙa iyenda Kaperinaumu. Napfo kuwemmbaṙa meema, kyaindi Yesu alekoamcha-pfo.
43006018	Na nduwa ikawooka ifoika kyipfa mkuma ung'anyi uweikuma.
43006019	Wanalosho walekowamuyenda cha mailyi tsiṟaaṟu tsiina kyiyeri walewona Yesu echumia wuye ya mṟinga na itikyira kufuhi na ngalawa iya; wakaowuo.
43006020	Na oe kawawia, “Nyi inyi, mulaowuoe.”
43006021	Kyasia wakamwitsa na kulya ngalawenyi; na cha ilyi ngalawa iya ikashika uruka lulya waweiyenda.
43006022	Mfiri ulya uleosha kyisanzionyi kya wandu wawegoṟokyi molyolya o nduwa walewona kye kuwewoṙe ngalawa ingyi kulya sile imwi tupu-pfo. Ngoseṟa walewona kye Yesu aleiṙa na kulya ngalawenyi hamwi na wanalosho wakye-pfo, indi wanalosho waleyenda wo wawenyi.
43006023	(Kyaindi kukocha ngalawa tsingyi iwuka Tiberia mṟasa kufuhi na handu halya walekowalyiia mkate, kyiyeri Mndumii Yesu aleana).
43006024	Kyasia wandu wa kyisanzionyi, kyiyeri walewona kye Yesu akyeri pfo maa wanalosho wakye-pfo, waleiṙa na ngalawenyi wo wawenyi, wakayenda Kaperinaumu wechipfula Yesu.
43006025	Na kyiyeri walemmbona molyolya o nduwa, walemmbia, “Rabi, iyoe nocha indi na iha?”
43006026	Yesu kawagaluo, kagamba, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, nyoe muingyipfula, chi kyipfa mulewona shiṟiyisho-pfo, indi kyipfa mulelya mkate iya mukoiguṙa.
43006027	Mulapfuṟukane ipfula kyelya kyekyenyamaṟika, indi pfulenyi kyelya kyilekyesia kyekyeende moo o mlungana; kyelya kyilya Mana o Adamu echimuenenga cha kyipfa icho nyi oe aṟingyishio nyi Ruwa kye nyi o sungusinyi.”
43006028	Kyasia wakammbia, “Luwikye kuṙa kundu luiṙime iṟunda maṟunda ga Ruwa?”
43006029	Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Ilyi nyilyo iṟunda lya Ruwa, mumwiṙikyie ulya aleṙumo nyi oe.”
43006030	Wakammbia, “Kyasia nuiwuta kyiṟingyishio kyiha, kundu luwone lukuiṙikyie? Nuiṟunda kyi?
43006031	Waku waṙu walelya Manna kulya nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga, chandu kyikyiṟeie, ‘Nalewaenenga kyelya kya ruwewu kundu walye.’ ”
43006032	Yesu kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, ‘Chi Mose alewaenenga kyelya kyilya kya ruwewu-pfo, indi Awu oko naimuenenga nyoe kyelya kya loi kyiwukyie ruwewu.
43006033	Cha kyipfa kyelya kya Ruwa nyi kyilya kyisokyie iwuka ruwewu na ienenga wuyana moo o mlungana.’ ”
43006034	Kyasia wakammbia, “Mndumii, mfiri yoose uluenengye kyelya-kyi.”
43006035	Yesu kawawia, “Inyi nyi kyelya kya moo; ulya acha na koko echiicho njaa maa ale-pfo; na ulya angyiiṙikyie echiwoṙo nyi nyoṙa-pfo.
43006036	Kyaindi ngyilemmbia kye momngyiwona indi muiṙikyia-pfo.
43006037	Walya Awu angyienenga wechicha na koko; maa kuwoṙe mndu echicha na koko ngyimmbiyitse nja maa ale-pfo.
43006038	Cha kyipfa inyi ngyilesoka iwuka ruwewu kundu ngyiwute kyilya ngyikundi-pfo, indi kyilya ulya alengyiṙuma akundi.
43006039	Na kyilya ulya alengyiṙuma akundi nyi ikyi, kye kyiiṙi kya woose angyienengyie ngyilaṙetse maa umwi, indi ngyimṟutse mfiri ulya o furumia.
43006040	Cha kyipfa kyilya Awu oko akundi nyi ikyi, kye orio mndu mokusuria Mana na imwiṙikyia, nawaṙe moo o mlungana; na inyi ngyechimṟutsa mfiri ulya o furumia.”
43006041	Kyasia Wayuda wakamnunuwia, cha kyipfa nalegamba, “Inyi nyi kyelya kyilesoka iwuka ruwewu.”
43006042	Wakagamba, “Ichu chi Yesu, mana o Yosefu, ulya luichi awuye na wamae? Wulalu naigamba kuṙa, ‘Ngyilesoka iwuka ruwewu? ’ ”
43006043	Kyasia Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Mulanunuwiane nyoe wenyi ko wenyi.
43006044	Kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima icha na koko sile Ruwa ulya alengyiṙuma amsongoya-pfo; na inyi ngyechimṟutsa mfiri o furumia.
43006045	Kyikyiṟeie maloshonyi ga weonguo shisuku, ‘Na woose wekowamlosho nyi Ruwa.’ Kyasia orio mndu aicho na ikulosha ko Awu nekyecha na koko.
43006046	Chi kye mndu nawona Awu sile ulya awukyie ko Ruwa-pfo. Icho nyi oe alewona Awu.
43006047	Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, ‘Ulya aiṙikyie nawoṙe moo o mlungana.’
43006048	Inyi nyi kyelya kya moo.
43006049	Waku wanyu walelya Manna kulya nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga, wakapfa.
43006050	Indi ikyi nyi kyelya kyisokyie iwuka ruwewu, kye mndu kakyilya alapfe.
43006051	Ikyi nyi kyelya kyiwoṙe moo kyilesoka iwuka ruwewu; mndu kalya kyelya-kyo, nechiwaṙa moo mlungana. Na kyelya ngyechienengyia inyi nyi mmbiu oko, kundu wuyana wuwaṙe moo.”
43006052	Kyasia Wayuda kui nyashi walegaluana wo wenyi ko wenyi wechigamba, “Mndu-chu neiṙima kuṙa iluenenga mmbiu okye luulye?”
43006053	Naaho Yesu kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, mulandelye mmbiu o Mana o Adamu na inyo samu yakye, muwoṙe moo mrimenyi konyu-pfo.
43006054	Mndu alya mmbiu oko na inyo samu yako nawoṙe moo o mlungana; na inyi ngyechimṟutsa mfiri o furumia.
43006055	Cha kyipfa mmbiu oko nyi kyelya kya loi, na samu yako nyi kyindo kyenyo kya loi.
43006056	Mndu alya mmbiu oko na inyo samu yako nekyekaa kyiiṙi kyako na inyi ngyekyekaa kyiiṙi kyakye.
43006057	Chandu Awu ai na moo alengyiṙuma inyi, na inyi ngyiwoṙe moo kyipfa kyakye, na wuṙo taa ulya alya mmbiu oko echiwaṙa moo kyipfa kyako.
43006058	Ikyi nyikyo kyelya kyisokyie iwuka ruwewu; chi chandu waku walelya wakapfa-pfo; indi mndu alya kyelya-kyo nechiwaṙa moo mlungana.”
43006059	Mbonyi-tsi naletsionguo akyeri sinagoginyi, kyiyeri aweilosha, kulya Kaperinaumu.
43006060	Kyasia kyiyeri wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kya wanalosho wakye waleicho, walegamba, “Kyindo-kyi kyikyiumu; nyi wui eiṙima ikyiiṙikyia?”
43006061	Na Yesu aichi mrimenyi kokye kye wanalosho wakye walenunuwa kyipfa kya kyindo-kyo, kawawia, “Ngyesa kyindo-kyi kyimutewe iilacha iiṙikyia lyanyu?
43006062	Kyechiwa-se kuṙa kyiyeri mochiwona Mana o Adamu echiṙo na ruwewu kulya-ndu awekyeri?
43006063	Mumuyo o Ruwa nyi oe ekyeenenga wandu moo, pfinya ya mndu iwoṙe kyiiṙa kyoose-pfo. Mbonyi-tsi ngamuongoya nyi Mumuyo, ngoseṟa nyi moo.
43006064	Kyaindi kuwoṙe wengyi kyiiṙi kyanyu walawoṙe iiṙikyia.” Cha kyipfa Yesu nalemanya wookyia mawookyionyi nyi wakyi walawoṙe iiṙikyia, na nyi wui echimṟiinga.
43006065	Kagamba, “Kyipfa kya ikyo ngammbia kye kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima icha na koko sile Awu amwenenga wuiṙimi-pfo.”
43006066	Kyipfa kya isho wandu wafoi wanaloshonyi wakye wakawuya na numa, walaoshane na oe-se.
43006067	Kyasia Yesu kawia walya ikumi na wawi, “Ngyesa na nyoe mukundi ilekana na inyi?”
43006068	Simion Petiro kagaluo, kagamba, “Mndumii! Luyende ko wui? Iyoe nuwoṙe maṙeṙo ga moo o mlungana.
43006069	Na soe lommbaṙa iiṙikyia; lyingyi-se lomanya kye iyoe nyi oe Mweele o Ruwa.”
43006070	Yesu kawagaluo, kagamba, “Ngyesa ngyilemusambuṟa nyoe ikumi na wawi kyaindi umwi onyu nyi Satana?”
43006071	Naleṙeṙa mbonyi tsa Yuda, mana o Simion Isikariote; kyipfa icho nyi oe echimṟiinga; na oe nyi umwi o walya ikumi na wawi.
43007001	Numa ya isho Yesu naweichumia urukyenyi lo Galyilaya; kyipfa alekunda iyenda uruka lo Uyuda-pfo, cha kyipfa Wayuda wawekundi immbaaga.
43007002	Na mfiri ung'anyi o Wayuda, mfiri ung'anyi o matengo, uwekyeri kufuhi.
43007003	Kyasia wana wa wamae wakammbia, “Wuka iha, uyende uruka lo Uyuda, kundu wanalosho wapfo nawo waiṙime iwona maṟunda gapfo.
43007004	Cha kyipfa kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima iwuta kyindo kui kyiṟika kokooya nakundi imanyika-pfo. Kyipfa kowuta shindo-shi kuṟingyishie ko wandu wa wuyana.”
43007005	Kyipfa maa wana wa wamae walemwiṙikyia-pfo.
43007006	Kyasia Yesu kawawia, “Kyiyeri kyako kyilandeafukyie-pfo; indi kyiyeri kyanyu orio mfiri kyikyeri ho.
43007007	Wandu wa wuyana weiṙima imsuo nyoe-pfo; indi wangyisuuye inyi, cha kyipfa inyi ngyiṟingyishia kye mawuto gawo gamawicho.
43007008	Yendenyi mundechihiyo ipfo mṟumoenyi o mfiri ung'anyi; inyi ngyiyenda pfo-pfo; cha kyipfa kyiyeri kyako kyilandeshikye-pfo.”
43007009	Na oe amwawie isho, kakaa mfiri ngyaangu kulya Galyilaya.
43007010	Na wana wa wamae wamndechihiyo halya-ndu mṟumoe uwekyeri, na oe kayenda ho kui kyiṟika.
43007011	Kyasia Wayuda wakampfula kulya mṟumoenyi, wakagamba, “Nyi kwi ai mndu ulya?”
43007012	Kukowaṙa mnunuwo ifoi kyipfa kya Yesu kyiiṙi kya walya wawesanzie halya. Wengyi wakagamba, “Nyi mndu mcha.” Na wengyi wakagamba, “Chi wuṙo-pfo; nailemba walya wasanzie iha.”
43007013	Kyaindi kuwoṙe mndu alemsenda na pata-pfo, kyipfa kya iowuo Wayuda.
43007014	Na makyiṙi-gawi ga mṟumoe ulya Yesu kaiṙa na hekalunyi kalosha.
43007015	Wayuda wakaṟiyio, wechigamba, “Ichu nawaṙa kuṙa wuṟango na oe asomie-pfo?”
43007016	Kyasia Yesu kawagaluo, kagamba, “Malosho gako chi gako inyi-pfo, indi nyi ga ulya alengyiṙuma.
43007017	Mndu kakunda iwuta kyilya Ruwa akundi, nechimanya mbonyi tsa malosho-ga, kye gawukyie ko Ruwa, ang'u kye inyi ngyiṙeṙa kui wuchilyi woko inyi ngyimonyi tupu.
43007018	Ulya aṙeṙa kui wuchilyi wokye amonyi tupu nekyepfula kyiṟumi kyakye amonyi; indi ulya apfula kyiṟumi kya ulya alemṙuma, icho nyi o loi, maa mrimenyi kokye kuwoṙe wunyamaṟi-pfo.
43007019	Ngyesa Mose alemuenenga uwawaso-pfoe? Maa kuwoṙe umwi onyu aiosha uwawaso-pfoe. Ny'kyilyi mukundi ingyiwaaga.”
43007020	Wandu wawesanzie halya wakagaluo, wakagamba, “Loi, nuwoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho! Nyi wui akundi ikuwaaga?”
43007021	Yesu kagaluo kawawia, “Inyi ngyilewuta kyindo kyimwi, na nyoe moose muiṟiyio kyipfa kya kyindo-kyo.
43007022	Mose nalemuenenga mṟumoe o iṙino kyaindi mṟumoe-cho chi uwukyie ko Mose-pfo, indi nyi ko waku wanyu; na nyoe mfiri o onyonya mokyeṙina mndu.
43007023	Kyasia kokooya mndu nekyeṙino mfiri o onyonya, kundu uwawaso lo Mose lulachenyamaṟika, ny'kyilyi mungyisuuya inyi kyipfa ngyilekyiṟa mndu mfiri o onyonya?
43007024	Kyasia mulaanduye mndu kui imwambuya ipfo kyanja, indi anduyenyi wandu kui sungusinyi.”
43007025	Kyasia wandu waata wa Yerusalemu wakagamba, “Ichu chi ulya wandu waimpfula kundu wammbaage-pfoe?
43007026	Kyeambuya chandu aiṙeṙa kulawoṙe iṟikyia kyindo kyaindi wasongoru wa Wayuda waimmbutia kyindo-pfo. Ngyesa kyeiṙima iwa wasongoru-wo wa Wayuda waichi kye ichu nyi oe Kristo?
43007027	Ichu luichi nyi kwi awukyie; indi kyiyeri Kristo echicha kuwoṙe aichi kundu awukyie-pfo.”
43007028	Kyasia Yesu kakuilenga kulya hekalunyi, kalosha echigamba, “Inyi mungyiichi, na kundu ngyiwukyie muichi; maa ngyilecha kui wuchilyi woko ngyimonyi-pfo. Ulya alengyiṙuma nyi o loi indi mumwichi-pfo.
43007029	Inyi ngyimwichi, cha kyipfa ngyiwukyie kokye, na oe nyi oe alengyiṙuma.”
43007030	Kyasia wakakunda immbaṙa; kyaindi kuwoṙe mndu alegoṟuo kuwoko kokye immbaṙa-pfo, kyipfa kyiyeri kyakye kyewutio kuṙo kyilekokyamshika-pfo.
43007031	Na wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kya walya wawesanzie halya wakamwiṙikyia, wakagamba, “Ngyesa kyiyeri Kristo echicha nechiwuta shindo shifoi sha maṟiyisho kuta ishi ichu aiwuta?”
43007032	Mafarisayo wakaicho wandu walya wechinunuwa kyipfa kya Yesu. Kyasia wang'anyi wa makohanyi na Mafarisayo wakaṙuma waṟundi kundu wammbaṙe.
43007033	Kyasia Yesu kagamba, “Hatsugai kyiyeri kyifuhi ngyikyeri hamwi na nyoe; numa ya iho ngyechiyenda ko ulya alengyiṙuma.
43007034	Mochingyipfula maa mochingyiwona-pfo; na inyi handu ngyikyeri nyoe moiṙima icha na ho-pfo.”
43007035	Kyasia Wayuda wakawesana, “Ichu nechiyenda kwi mṟasa lulechimmbona? Ngyesa nechiyenda mṟinyi ikyeri nja ya uruka loṙu kulya-ndu wandu walai Wayuda wekyekaa na iwalosha?
43007036	Nyi kyindo kya mbaṟe iha ikyo aigamba, ‘Mochingyipfula maa mochingyiwona-pfo; na handu ngyikyeri nyoe moiṙima icha na ho-pfo?’ ”
43007037	Na mfiri o furumia, mfiri ulya ung'anyi o mṟumoe, Yesu kagoṟoka, kakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi, echigamba, “Mndu kawoṙo nyi nyoṙa, nache na koko nawone kyindo kyenyo.
43007038	Ulya angyiiṙikyia inyi, chandu kyikyiṟeie ipfo shiṟeionyi shiele, mfo ya mṟinga uwoṙe moo yechiwuka mrimenyi kokye.”
43007039	Kyiyeri Yesu aweiṙeṙa naweionguo mbonyi tsa Mumuyo o Ruwa, walya wamwiṙikyie wechimwambilyia kyiyeri kya numa; cha kyipfa Mumuyo o Ruwa alekoamcha-pfo, cha kyipfa Yesu alekoamwirio wuye na ienengo kyiṟumi-pfo.
43007040	Kyasia wandu wengyi kyiiṙi kya walya wawesanzie halya kyiyeri waleicho mbonyi-tso, walegamba, “Loi, ichu nyi oe moonguo shisuku ulya.”
43007041	Wengyi walegamba, “Ichu nyi oe Kristo.” Wengyi wakagamba, “Ngyesa Kristo nechiwuka Galyilaya?
43007042	Kyikyiṟeie kyiṟeionyi kyiele kye Kristo nechiwuka kyisharinyi kya Dawidi, na iwuka Betilehemu, mṟi ulya Dawidi awekyekaa?”
43007043	Kyasia wandu waata kyiiṙi kya walya wawesanzie halya wakaṙeṙa Yesu necha, wengyi wakamṙeṙa uwicho.
43007044	Waata wakakunda immbara kyaindi kuwoṙe mndu alegoṟuo mawoko gakye kundu nammbaṙe-pfo.
43007045	Kyasia waṟundi walya wakayenda ko wang'anyi wa makohanyi na Mafarisayo. Nawo wakawawesa, “Ny'kyilyi mulamwende?”
43007046	Waṟundi walya wakagaluo, wakagamba, “Kuwoṙe mndu oose alemgamba shindo-sho ichu agamba-pfo.”
43007047	Kyasia Mafarisayo wakawagaluo, wakagamba, “Namlemba maa nyoe?
43007048	Nyi wui kyiiṙi kya wasongoru ang'u Mafarisayo amwiṙikyie?”
43007049	Kyaindi wandu-wa wasanzie iha walaichi uwawaso wawasese.
43007050	Nikodemo (ulya alekoayenda ko Yesu kyiyeri kya ipfo numa, kyipfa nyi umwi o wasongoru-wo) kawawia,
43007051	“Iṙuana na uwawaso loiṙima ianduya mndu lulaaṙanyia ny'kyikyi awoṙe kyegamba-pfo; hamwi na ipfula imanya ny'kyikyi akundi iwuta.”
43007052	Wakagaluo wakammbia, “Ngyesa na iyoe nuwukyie Galyilaya? Pfula shiṟeionyi shiele umanye kye Galyilaya kochiwuka moonguo shisuku-pfo.”
43008001	Waleyenda orio mndu kanyi kokye, na Yesu kayenda mṟasa fumvunyi lya Mseituni.
43008002	Na kyiyeri kya ngamenyi lyilya kulekya kaiṙa-se na hekalunyi, na wandu woose wakayenda kokye. Na oe kaṙamia, kawooka iwalosha.
43008003	Walosha wa mawawaso na Mafarisayo wakamwendie mndu mka alekooyo wuṟuinyi, wakammbikyia makyiṙi-gawi.
43008004	Wakammbia, “Mlosha, mndu mka-chu nakooyo eṟuguyo.
43008005	Kyasia, uwawasonyi, Mose naleluwia lukape na magoe waka wa mbaṟe-i iyi. Iyoe nogamba kyi?”
43008006	Nawo walegamba kuṙo wechimyesha, kundu wawone kyimaṙuma kyemshitakyi. Kyaindi Yesu kaarama, kaṟeia na kyimnyoe kyakye iho terinyi.
43008007	Na kyiyeri waleengyeṟa immbesa, nalewawia “Ulya alawoṙe wunyamaṟi kyiiṙi kyanyu nawe o kuwooka imkapa na igoe.”
43008008	Kaarama-se kaṟeia na kyimnyoe kyakye iho terinyi.
43008009	Nawo kyiyeri waleicho, wakafuma soṟom soṟom, wechiwooka na ulya mku kuta woose; Yesu kaṙio amonyi, na mndu mka ulya agoṟokyi halya.
43008010	Yesu kaamkyia wuye alawone mndu sile mndu mka ulya. Kammbia, “Mndu mka, wookwi walya waweigamba kye numnyamaṟi? Kuwoṙe maa umwi aṙio iha igamba kye nuwaṟi iwoogo?”
43008011	Mndu mka ulya kagamba, “Kuwoṙe-pfo, Mndumii.” Yesu kammbia, “Maa inyi ngyikuanduya-pfo. Yenda kyaindi ulawute-se wunyamaṟi.”]
43008012	Kyasia Yesu kawia-se Mafarisayo walya, “Inyi nyi ngyeela ya wuyana. Ulya angyiosha inyi nechiwaṙa ngyeela yekyeenenga wandu moo, na echichumia handu hawoṙe meema-pfo.”
43008013	Mafarisayo wakammbia, “Iyoe nuikuṟingyishia kumonyi; wuṟingyishi wopfo chi loi-pfo.”
43008014	Yesu kagaluo kawawia, “Inyi maa chandu ngyikuṟingyishia ngyimonyi, wuṟingyishi woko nyi wo loi; cha kyipfa ngyiichi kundu ngyiwukyie na kundu ngyiyenda; kyaindi nyoe muichi kundu ngyiwukyie maa kundu ngyiyenda-pfo.
43008015	Nyoe mokyeanduya kui iambuya mbonyi tsa mmbiu; inyi ngyekyeanduya mndu-pfo.
43008016	Na kokooya ngyiwechianduya, ianduya lyako lyechiwa lya loi; cha kyipfa inyi ngyikyeri ngyimonyi-pfo, indi ngyikyeri na ulya alengyiṙuma.
43008017	Lyingyi-se uwawasonyi lonyu kyikyiṟeie kye ‘Wuṟingyishi wo wandu wawi nyi wo loi.’
43008018	Inyi ngyikuṟingyishia ngyimonyi, na Awu ulya alengyiṙuma naingyiṟingyishia.”
43008019	Kyasia wakammbia, “Ookwi Awu opfo?” Yesu kagaluo kagamba, “Inyi mungyiichi-pfo; maa Awu oko mumwichi-pfo. Kokooya muwengyiichi inyi, muwechimanya na Awu oko.”
43008020	Mbonyi-tsi naletsiṙeṙa kyiyeri aweilosha hekalunyi, kyiṟinyi kyekooma heleri; maa kuwoṙe mndu alemmbaṙa-pfo, cha kyipfa kyiyeri kyakye kyewutio kuṙo kyilekokyamshika-pfo.
43008021	Yesu kawawia-se, “Inyi ngyiwuka iha, na nyoe mochingyipfula; na nyoe mochipfa mowuta wunyamaṟi; na inyi kundu ngyiyenda moiṙima iyenda pfo-pfo.”
43008022	Kyasia Wayuda wakagamba, “Ngyesa nechikuwaaga? Cha kyipfa naigamba, ‘Kundu ngyiyenda nyoe moiṙima iyenda pfo-pfo.’ ”
43008023	Kawawia, “Nyoe nyi wa iha wanda wuyanenyi, inyi nyi o wuye ruwewu. Nyoe nyi wa wuyana-wu, inyi chi o wuyana-wu-pfo.
43008024	Koikyo ngammbia kye mochipfa mowuta wunyamaṟi; cha kyipfa mulandeiṙikyie kye inyi nyi oe ulya ngyigamba kye inyi nyi oe mochipfa mowuta wunyamaṟi.”
43008025	Kyasia wakammbia, “Iyoe nyi wui?” Yesu kawawia, “Inyi nyi ulya ngammbia wookyia mawookyionyi kye inyi oe.
43008026	Ngyiwoṙe shindo shifoi shegamba na sheanduya kyipfa kyanyu; kyaindi ulya alengyiṙuma nyi o loi, na inyi shilya ngyileicho kokye nyisho ngyishionguo iha wuyanenyi.”
43008027	Maa walemanya kye naweiwaongoya mbonyi tsa Awu-pfo.
43008028	Kyasia Yesu kawawia, “Kyiyeri-kyo mochimarisa iwikyia Mana o Adamu msalabenyi nyi lyo-ndu momanya kye inyi nyi oe ulya ngammbia kye inyi nyi oe; na kye inyi ngyekyewuta kyindo kui iambuya kyilya ngyikundi-pfo, indi chandu Awu alengyilosha nyi wuṙo ngyekyeonguo.
43008029	Na ulya alengyiṙuma nakyeri hamwi na inyi; angyiṙeeye ngyimonyi-pfo; cha kyipfa mfiri yoose ngyekyewuta shilya shimchihiṟie.”
43008030	Na oe kyiyeri aweionguo isho, wandu wafoi wakamwiṙikyia.
43008031	Kyasia Yesu kawia Wayuda walya wawemwiṙikyie, “Mukoosha shilya ngyimulosha, mochiwa wanalosho wako loi loi;
43008032	lyingyi-se mochimanya wuloi wo mbonyi tsa Ruwa, na wuloi-wo wochimmbuta wusingyenyi.”
43008033	Wakamgaluo, wakagamba, “Soe nyi kyishari kya Abrahamu, maa lulandewe watumo wa mndu kyiyeri maa kyimwi-pfo; na iyoe nuigamba, ‘Mochiwuto wusingyenyi?’ ”
43008034	Yesu kawagaluo, kagamba, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, ‘Orio mndu ekyewuta wunyamaṟi nyi mtumo o wunyamaṟi.’
43008035	Mtumo akyeri mndu o mfiri yoose o numba iya ekyeiṟundia-pfo; indi mana nyi mndu o numba-yo mfiri yoose.
43008036	Kyasia Mana kammbuta wusingyenyi, mochiwuka wusingyenyi loi loi.
43008037	Ngyiichi kye nyoe nyi kyishari kya Abrahamu; kyaindi mukundi ingyiwaaga cha kyipfa kyilya ngyimlosha kyikyeri mrimenyi konyu-pfo.
43008038	Shilya ngyileshiwona ko Awu nyisho ngyionguo; na nyoe na wuṙo muwuta shilya muleicho ko awu onyu.”
43008039	Wakagaluo, wakammbia, “Awu oṙu nyi oe Abrahamu!” Yesu kawawia, “Kokooya muwei wana wa Abrahamu, muweṟunda maṟunda ga Abrahamu.
43008040	Kyaindi wulalu mukundi ingyiwaaga, mndu ammbia kyikyeri kya loi, ngyilekyiicho ko Ruwa. Abrahamu alewuta kuṙo-pfo.
43008041	Nyoe muiṟunda maṟunda ga awu onyu.” Nyi lyo-ndu walemmbia, “Soe lulefeo wuṟuinyi-pfo. Soe luwoṙe Awu umwi, nyi oe Ruwa.”
43008042	Yesu kawawia, “Kokooya Ruwa awekyeri awu onyu, muwengyikunda inyi; cha kyipfa ngyilewuka ko Ruwa, na inyi ngyilecha; maa ngyilecha kui ikunda lyako ngyimonyi-pfo, indi oe nyi oe alengyiṙuma.
43008043	Kyitewe mulaimanya ikyo ngyigamba ny'kyi? Nyi kyipfa nyoe mulaiiṙima imanya malosho gako.
43008044	Nyoe nyi wa awu onyu Mokyiriinzi, na lango tsa awu onyu nyitso mukundi itsiosha. Oe nyi mmbaagi wookyia mawookyionyi; maa alandekae ura lo wuloi-pfo, cha kyipfa kokye kuwoṙe wuloi-pfo. Kyiyeri aṙeṙa wongo, nekyeṙeṙa shikyeri shakye amonyi; cha kyipfa oe nekyeṙeṙa wongo na nyi awu o wongo.
43008045	Na inyi, cha kyipfa ngyiṙeṙa kyikyeri loi, mungyiiṙikyia-pfo.
43008046	Nyi wui kyiiṙi kyanyu angyiṟingyishia kye ngyiwoṙe wunyamaṟi? Na inyi ngaṙeṙa loi, ny'kyilyi nyoe mulaingyiiṙikyia?
43008047	Ulya ai o Ruwa nekyeaṙanyia malosho ga Ruwa. Koikyo nyoe muiaṙanyia-pfo cha kyipfa nyoe chi wana wa Ruwa-pfo.”
43008048	Wayuda wakagaluo, wakammbia, “Ngyesa soe luigamba loi kye iyoe nyi mndu o Samaria, na iyoe nuwoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho-pfoe?”
43008049	Yesu kawagaluo, kagamba, “Inyi ngyiwoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho-pfo; kyaindi inyi ngyiindia Awu oko, na nyoe mungyiindia-pfo.
43008050	Maa inyi ngyipfula kyiṟumi kyako-pfo; kuwoṙe mopfula kyiṟumi na ianduya.
43008051	Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia ‘Mndu kaosha kyilya malosho gako gagamba mrima okye ochiwaṙa moo mlungana.’ ”
43008052	Kyasia Wayuda wakammbia, “Wulalu lomanya kye nuwoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho. Abrahamu alempfa, na weonguo shisuku walempfa; na iyoe nugamba, ‘Mndu kaosha kyilya malosho gako gagamba mrima okye ochiwaṙa moo mlungana.’
43008053	Iyoe nung'anyi kuta awu oṙu Abrahamu, alempfa? Weonguo shisuku nawo walempfa. Nukundi ikuloṟa iyoe nyi wui?”
43008054	Yesu kagaluo kagamba, “Ngakuṟumisha inyi ngyimonyi, kyiṟumi kyako chi kyindo-pfo. Ekyengyiṟumisha nyi Awu oko, ulya nyoe muigamba kye nyi Ruwa onyu.
43008055	Maa nyoe mulemmanya-pfo; kyaindi inyi ngyimwichi. Ngagamba kye ngyimwichi-pfo ngyechiwa mndu ekyeṙeṙa wongo cha nyoe; kyaindi ngyimwichi, na malosho gakye ngyekyegaosha.
43008056	Abrahamu, awu onyu, nalechihiyo chandu echiwona mfiri o icha lyako; na oe kauwona kachihiyo.”
43008057	Kyasia Wayuda wakammbia, “Nuwewona kuṙa Abrahamu na iyoe ulandewaṙe maa maka makumi gataanu-pfo?”
43008058	Yesu kawawia, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, Abrahamu alafeo, inyi ngyikyeri pfo.”
43008059	Kyasia wakaira magoe kundu wamkape nago; kyaindi Yesu kakuṟiika, kawuka kulya hekalunyi.
43009001	Na kyiyeri aweiiṙa nalewona mndu awei kyipfupfuṟe wookyia ifeo lyakye.
43009002	Wanalosho wakye wakammbesa, wechigamba, “Rabi, nyi wui alewuta wunyamaṟi, mndu-chu ang'u wafee wakye, mṟasa nafeo ai kyipfupfuṟe?”
43009003	Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Ichu alewuta wunyamaṟi maa wafee wakye-pfo; indi nalefeo ai kyipfupfuṟe kundu wandu waiṙime iwona maṟunda galya Ruwa tupu eiṙima iṟunda.
43009004	Kyiwaṟi iṟunda maṟunda ga ulya alengyiṙuma kyiyeri kuwoṙe ngyeela; kyio kyiicha kyiyeri mndu alechiiṙima iṟunda.
43009005	Kyiyeri ngyikyeri wuyanenyi, inyi nyi ngyeela ya wuyana.”
43009006	Kyiyeri alemarisa igamba isho, nalepuchia maṙa iho wanda, kaachikyia toombo na maṙa galya. Kashia mndu ulya awei kyipfupfuṟe toombo ipfo mesonyi,
43009007	kammbia, “Yenda undesamba kulya iruwenyi lya Siloamu.” (Kyimwi na igamba, “Aleṙumo.”) Kyasia mndu ulya awei kyipfupfuṟe kayenda na isamba; kawuya ewona.
43009008	Wamṟasa wakye, na walya walekowammbona mfiri ya numa echieṟeṟa, wakagamba, “Ichu chi ulya awekyeeṟeṟa-pfoe?”
43009009	Wengyi wakagamba, “Nyi oe.” Wengyi wakagamba, “Ote; kyaindi nafananyi na oe.” Oe amonyi kagamba, “Nyi oe.”
43009010	Kyasia wakammbia, “Meso gapfo gaiṙima kuṙa iwona?”
43009011	Oe kawagaluo, kagamba, “Mndu ulya ekyelago Yesu naleachikyia toombo, kangyishia mesonyi kangyiwia, ‘Yenda Siloamu undesamba.’ Koikyo ngayenda na isamba, ngaiṙima iwona.”
43009012	Wakammbia, “Ny'kwi akyeri?” Kagamba, “Inyi ngyiichi-pfo.”
43009013	Kyasia wakaṙuo ko Mafarisayo mndu ulya awekyeri kyipfupfuṟe mfiri ya numa.
43009014	Na nyi-we mfiri o onyonya, kyiyeri kyilya Yesu aleachikyia toombo na ienenga mndu ulya iwona.
43009015	Kyasia Mafarisayo nawo wakammbesa-se chandu aleiṙima iwona. Kawawia, “Nalengyishia toombo mesonyi, na inyi ngasamba, na wulalu ngyiwona.”
43009016	Kyasia Mafarisayo waata wakagamba, “Mndu-cho awukyie ko Ruwa-pfo, cha kyipfa nekyewuta kyilya kyilawaṟi iwuta mfiri o onyonya.” Wengyi wakagamba, “Mndu mnyamaṟi neiṙima kuṙa iwuta shiṟiyisho cha isho?” Walawaṙe makusaṟo gamwi.
43009017	Kyasia lya kawi wakawia ulya awei kyipfupfuṟe, “Mbonyi tsiha uigamba tsa ichu akuenenga wuiṙimi wo iwona?” Kagamba, “Nyi moonguo shisuku.”
43009018	Kyasia Wayuda walaiṙikyie mbonyi tsilya aweigamba, kye nawei kyipfupfuṟe na numa ya iho kaenengo iwona; mṟasa wakalaga wafee wakye.
43009019	Wakawawesa, “Ichu nyi oe mana onyu, ulya mulegamba kye nalefeo ai kyipfupfuṟe? Wulalu naiṙima kuṙa iwona?”
43009020	Wafee wakye wakagaluo, wakagamba, “Luichi kye ichu nyi oe mana oṙu, lyingyi-se kye nalefeo ai kyipfupfuṟe;
43009021	kyaindi chandu aiwona wulalu luichi-pfo; maa luichi nyi wui alemwenenga wuiṙimi wo iwona-pfo. Mmbesenyi oe amonyi; oe nyi mndu apfulukyie, neiṙima ionguo amonyi.”
43009022	Wafee wakye walegamba kuṙo kui iowuo Wayuda; cha kyipfa Wayuda walekowaiṙikyiana kye mndu echigamba kye nyi Kristo, nechiimo momu o yenda sinagoginyi.
43009023	Nyikyo kyitewe wafee walya walegamba, “Nyi mndu apfulukyie, mmbesenyi oe.”
43009024	Kyasia lya kawi Mafarisayo wakalaga mndu ulya awei kyipfupfuṟe, wakammbia, “Enenga Ruwa kyiṟumi. Soe luichi kye mndu-chu nyi mnyamaṟi.”
43009025	Kyasia mndu ulya kagaluo, kagamba, “Kye oe nyi mnyamaṟi ngyiichi-pfo. Ngyiichi kyindo kyimwi tupu: kye inyi ngyiwei kyipfupfuṟe na wulalu ngyiwona.”
43009026	Kyasia wakammbia, “Ny'kyikyi alekuwutia? Nalekuenenga kuṙa wuiṙimi wo iwona?”
43009027	Kawagaluo, kagamba, “Ngamummbia, maa moiṙikyia-pfo. Ny'kyilyi mukundi iwio-se? Na nyoe mukundi iwa wanalosho wakye?”
43009028	Kyasia wakamnyeṟie, wechigamba, “Iyoe nyi manalosho okye; soe nyi wanalosho wa Mose.
43009029	Soe luichi kye Ruwa naleṙeṙa na Mose; indi icho luichi kundu awukyie-pfo.”
43009030	Mndu ulya kagaluo, kawawia, “Ikyi nyi kyindo kyeṟiyisha! Kye nyoe muichi kundu awukyie-pfo, na oe nalengyienenga wuiṙimi wo iwona!
43009031	Luichi kye Ruwa ekyeaṙanyia wanyamaṟi-pfo; indi mndu kawa naowuye na ikunda Ruwa, na iosha kyilya Ruwa akundi, Ruwa nekyemwaṙanyia.
43009032	Wookyia kyiyeri-kyo kyilandegambo kye mndu naenenga kyipfupfuṟe wuiṙimi wo iwona, ulya alefeo mbaṟe-yo iyo-pfo.
43009033	Kokooya icho alawewukyie ko Ruwa, aweiṙima iwuta kyindo kyoose-pfo.”
43009034	Wakagaluo, wakammbia, “Iyoe nulefeeyo wunyamaṟinyi nakamwi, na iyoe nuilulosha soe?” Kui nyashi wakamtsindikyia nja ya sinagogi.
43009035	Yesu kaicho kye wamtsindikyia nja; na oe kyiyeri alemmbona nalegamba, “Iyoe nuiṙikyie Mana o Ruwa?”
43009036	Na oe kagaluo, kagamba, “Nyi wui, Mndumii, ngyiiṙime imwiṙikyia?”
43009037	Yesu kammbia, “Omummbona, na oe aiṙeṙa na iyoe nyi oe.”
43009038	Kagamba, “Ngaiṙikyia, Mndumii.” Kamwindia.
43009039	Yesu kagamba, “Inyi ngyilecha na kunu wuyanenyi ianduya, kundu iwo walaiwona wawone, na walya waiwona wawe shipfupfuṟe.”
43009040	Mafarisayo waata wawekyeri hamwi na oe wakaicho isho, wakammbia, “Ngyesa na soe nyi shipfupfuṟe?”
43009041	Yesu kawawia, “Kokooya muwei shipfupfuṟe muweiwaṙa wunyamaṟi-pfo; kyaindi wulalu muigamba, ‘Luwonyi,’ kyasia wunyamaṟi wonyu wuengyeṟa ikaa ho.”
43010001	Yesu nalewawia, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, ulya alaiiṙa na mfiṟigenyi o moondo kui iiṙia moongonyi, kyaindi kaiṙia handu hengyi, icho nyi mbafu na oe nyi msokyi.
43010002	Aiṙia moongonyi nyi mlyisi o moondo.
43010003	Mringyi o moongo nekyepfunguya mlyisi-cho moongo, na moondo gekyemanya ṟui lyakye; na oe nekyelaga moondo gakye kui marina gawo, na igafumiṟia nja.
43010004	Na oe kyiyeri afumiṟia nja moondo-go gakye goose, nekyegasongoya; na moondo galya gekyemwosha, cha kyipfa gaichi ṟui lyakye.
43010005	Myenu gechimwosha maa ale-pfo, indi gechimṙicha; cha kyipfa gaichi maṟui ga wayenu-pfo.”
43010006	Mfano-cho Yesu nalewawia; kyaindi wo walemanya kyindo aweiwawia-pfo.
43010007	Kyasia Yesu kawawia-se, “Ny'kyaloi, ngammbia, inyi nyi moongo o moondo.
43010008	Walya walengyisongoya nyi mbafu na wasokyi; kyaindi moondo galewaaṙanyia-pfo.
43010009	Inyi nyi moongo. Mndu kaiṙia koko, nechikyia. Nechiiṙa na numba na ifumia nja, na oe nechiiguṙa kando.
43010010	Mbafu yekyecha ikusaṟie kyindo kyingyi sile iiwa na iwaaga na inyamaṟa-pfo. Inyi ngyilecha kundu wawaṙe moo, ngoseṟa wauwaṙe pacha.
43010011	“Inyi nyi mlyisi mcha. Mlyisi mcha nekyereka moo okye kyipfa kya moondo.
43010012	Mndu o wori, maa chi mlyisi-pfo, ulya moondo galai gakye, nekyewona kyisii kyeecha, kaṙa moondo na iṙicha, na kyisii kyekyerakuo ho ondo lyimwi na inyanyaṟitsa igo gengyi.
43010013	Icho nekyeṙicha cha kyipfa nyi mndu o wori; maa mbonyi tsa moondo chi kyindo kokye-pfo.
43010014	Inyi nyi mlyisi mcha; na walya wakyeri wako ngyiwaichi; na walya wai wako wangyiichi inyi;
43010015	chandu Awu angyiichi na chandu ngyiichi Awu. Na inyi ngyekyereka moo oko kyipfa kya moondo.
43010016	Ngyiwoṙe na moondo gengyi, galakyeri ga mfiṟiga-chu; na igo nago kyingyiwaṟi igaende na kunu mfiṟigenyi, na ṟui lyako gechilyiaṙanyia. Naaho-ng'u kochiwaṙa poo lyimwi na mlyisi umwi.
43010017	Awu nagyikundi, cha kyipfa ngyekyereka moo oko kundu ngyiuambilyie-se numa.
43010018	Kuwoṙe mndu ekyengyiwuta moo-chu-pfo, indi inyi ngyimonyi ngyekyeureka. Inyi ngyiwoṙe wuiṙimi wo iureka; ngyiwewoṙe taa wuiṙimi wo iuambilyia-se. Iwawaso-lyi ngyilelyiambilyia ko Awu oko.”
43010019	Lyingyi-se kulawaṙe makusaṟo gamwi kyiiṙi kya Wayuda, kyipfa kya mbonyi tsilya Yesu aleonguo.
43010020	Wengyi wakagamba, “Ichu nawoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho, ngoseṟa nyi msuko; ny'kyilyi muimwaṙanyia?”
43010021	Wengyi wakagamba, “Maṙeṙo-ga chi ga mndu awoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho-pfo. Ngyesa mṟufui mmbicho neiṙima ienenga shipfupfuṟe wuiṙimi wo iwona?”
43010022	Kyasia kulya Yerusalemu kuwewoṙe mṟumoe o iwikyia hekalu mboṟa lya kawi; na nyi-we kyiyeri kya mbeho.
43010023	Na Yesu naweichumia-chumia kulya hekalunyi handu hesanzia hawekyelago Solomon.
43010024	Kyasia Wayuda wakamwiṟiwia, wakammbia, “Nolyisa mrima yaṙu wukyiwa mṟasa indi? Kokooya iyoe nyi oe Kristo uluwie na pata.”
43010025	Yesu kawagaluo, kawawia, “Ngyilemmbia, kyaindi nyoe mulaiṙikyie. Maṟunda-ga ngyiṟunda kui rina lya Awu oko nyigo gaingyiṟingyishia.
43010026	Kyaindi nyoe muiṙikyia-pfo, cha kyipfa mukyeri poonyi lya moondo gako-pfo.
43010027	Moondo gako gekyemanya ṟui lyako; na inyi ngyiichi moondo-go, nago gekyengyiosha.
43010028	Na inyi ngyekyegaenenga moo o mlungana; maa gechiṙeka maa ale-pfo; maa kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima igangyisoka-pfo.
43010029	Awu oko alegangyienenga nang'anyi kuta woose; maa kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima igawuta mawokonyi ga Awu oko-pfo.
43010030	Inyi na Awu lukyeri kyindo kyimwi.”
43010031	Kyasia Wayuda wakaira-se magoe kundu wamkape nago.
43010032	Yesu kawagaluo, kawawia, “Ngyilemumloṟa maṟunda mecha gafoi gawukyie ko Awu, nyi lyiha lyamuenenga ilanga ingyikapa na magoe?”
43010033	Wayuda wakamgaluo, wakagamba, “Luikukapa na magoe kyipfa kya kyindo kyicha uleṟunda-pfo; indi kyipfa kya ilahia Ruwa, na kyipfa nyi mndu uikuloṟa kye nui Ruwa.”
43010034	Yesu kawagaluo, kagamba, “Ngyesa uwawasonyi kyikyiṟeie kye Ruwa nagamba, ‘Nyoe nyi waruwa?’
43010035	Kokooya nalelaga waruwa wandu walya waleambilyia shiṟeio shiele; (na shiṟeio shiele sheiṙima iilachika-pfo);
43010036	ngyesa ulya Awu alemwilyisha, kamṙuma wuyanenyi, nyoe mummbia ‘Nulahia Ruwa’ cha kyipfa ngyilegamba, ‘Inyi nyi Mono-Ruwa?’
43010037	Kokooya ngyilaiṟunda maṟunda ga Awu oko, mulangyiiṙikyie.
43010038	Kyaindi ngagaṟunda, maa kokooya mulangyiiṙikyia inyi, iṙikyienyi maṟunda-go; muiṙime imanya kye Awu nai kyiiṙi kyako, na inyi ngyii kyiiṙi kya Awu.”
43010039	Wakalanga-se immbaṙa, kyaindi kakuashuo mawokonyi gawo.
43010040	Kayenda-se molyolya o Yoridan, mṟasa handu halya Yohane awekyepatisia wandu kyiyeri kya ipfo numa, kakaa pfo.
43010041	Na wandu wafoi wakayenda kokye wakagamba, “Loi Yohane alewuta kyiṟingyishio kyoose-pfo, kyaindi mbonyi tsoose Yohane aleonguo tsa ichu tsiwei tsa loi.”
43010042	Wandu wafoi wakamwiṙikyia.
43011001	Mndu umwi awekyelago Lasaro, awekyekaa Betania, naweluoe. Lasaro-cho nyi-we msacha o Maria na Marita.
