43011002	Maria nyi oe ulya aleshia Mndumii Yesu mafuṙa gekyepfaama necha, kamwanguo maṙende kui njui tsakye. Nyi oe Lasaro msacha okye aweluoe.
43011003	Kyasia washikyi walya wakaṙuma ndumo ko Yesu wakagamba, “Mndumii, ulya umkundi naluoe.”
43011004	Na Yesu kyiyeri aleicho, nalegamba, “Ndoṟe-i yechiende upfu-pfo, indi yacha kyipfa kya mng'ano o Ruwa, kundu Mono-Ruwa nang'anyiso kui ndoṟe-yo.”
43011005	Na Yesu nawekundi Marita na Maria na Lasaro.
43011006	Kyasia kyiyeri aleicho kye naluoe, nalekaa halya-ndu awekyeri mfiri iwi ya ngoseṟa.
43011007	Numa ya iho, kawia wanalosho wakye, “Sindenyi-se uruka lo Uyuda.”
43011008	Wanalosho walya wakammbia, “Rabi, nyi icho-lyi tikyi Wayuda wawekundi ikukapa na magoe, na iyoe nukundi iyenda-se pfo?”
43011009	Yesu kagaluo, kawawia, “Ngyesa saa tsa kyingoto chi ikumi na tsiwi-pfoe? Mndu kachumia kyingoto ekyekapa tuulyia-pfo; cha kyipfa nawonyi ngyeela ya mnengyeṟi.
43011010	Indi kachumia kyio nekyekapa tuulyia; cha kyipfa ngyeela ikyeri kokye-pfo.”
43011011	Nalegamba isho, na numa ya iho kawawia, “Mbuya yaṙu, Lasaro, nalee; kyaindi ngyiyenda ngyiiṙime imwamtsa.”
43011012	Kyasia wanalosho walya wakammbia, “Mndumii, kokooya nalee, nechia.”
43011013	Kyaindi Yesu naweiwawia mbonyi tsa upfu lokye; nawo wakakusaṟa kye naṙeṙa mbonyi tsa ilaa maṙoe.
43011014	Kyasia iho Yesu kawawia na pata, “Lasaro napfa.
43011015	Inyi ngachihiyo kyipfa kyanyu kye ngyiwekyeri ipfo-pfo, kundu muiṙikyie. Kyaindi sindenyi kokye.”
43011016	Kyasia Tomasi, awekyelago (Wana wawi wawafee kyiyeri kyimwi), kawia wanalosho woṙoe, “Na soe sindenyi, kundu lupfe hamwi na oe.”
43011017	Kyasia kyiyeri Yesu aleshika kulya, nalekooya Lasaro amkaa kyilomenyi cha mfiri ina.
43011018	Na Betania nyi-we kufuhi na Yerusalemu, cha mailyi tsiwi kuṙi.
43011019	Na wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kya Wayuda walekowacha na ko Marita na Maria, kundu wawawiyiṟie moo kyipfa kya upfu lo msacha owo.
43011020	Kyasia, Marita kyiyeri aleicho kye Yesu naicha, naleyenda imwambilyia; na Maria naleṙio kanyi.
43011021	Kyasia Marita kawia Yesu, “Mndumii, kokooya uwekyeri iha, msacha-chu oko aweipfa-pfo.
43011022	Kyaindi maa wulalu ngyiichi kye orio kyindo oterewa Ruwa nechikuenenga.”
43011023	Yesu kammbia, “Msacha opfo nechiṟuka.”
43011024	Marita kammbia, “Ngyiichi kye nechiṟuka kyiyeri kya wuṟutsi wo mfiri o furumia.”
43011025	Yesu kammbia, “Inyi nyi ulya ekyeende wuṟutsi-wo, na moo. Ulya angyiiṙikyie inyi, maa kapfa, nechiwaṙa moo o mlungana.
43011026	Na orio mndu awoṙe moo na ingyiiṙikyia inyi echipfa kyimrima mṟasa mlungana-pfo. Ngyesa nuiṙikyie isho?”
43011027	Kammbia, “Yee, Mndumii, inyi ngyiiṙikyie kye iyoe nyi oe Kristo, Mono-Ruwa, ulya aicha na wuyanenyi.”
43011028	Marita amgambe kuṙo kayenda; kaṙuo Maria mbai kagamba, “Mlosha naikulaga.”
43011029	Na oe kyiyeri aleicho naleamka faṟa, kayenda ko Yesu.
43011030	Na Yesu alekoamwiṙa na kulya kyikaṟonyi-pfo; kyaindi nawekyeri halya-ndu Marita alekoandemwambilyia.
43011031	Kyasia Wayuda walya wawekyeri na Maria kanyi, wechimmbiyiṟia moo, kyiyeri walewona chandu aamka faṟa na iyenda, walemwosha; kunu wechikusaṟa kye naweiyenda kyilomenyi nandelyilyia pfo.
43011032	Kyasia kyiyeri Maria aleshika halya-ndu Yesu awekyeri, na immbona, naleoloka maṙendenyi gakye, kammbia, “Mndumii, kokooya uwekyeri iha, msacha oko awechipfa-pfo.”
43011033	Kyasia kyiyeri Yesu alemmbona echilyia, na Wayuda walya waweiṙuṙanyi na oe welyia, nalewoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi, mrima okye ukoiṟewe,
43011034	kagamba, “Ny'kwi mommbikyia?” Wakammbia, “Mndumii, nnjo uwone.”
43011035	Yesu katonyitsa mcheṟeṟe.
43011036	Kyasia Wayuda wakagamba, “Ambuyenyi chandu awemkundi.”
43011037	Indi wengyi wakagamba, “Ngyesa ichu aleenenga kyipfupfuṟe kyilya wuiṙimi wo iwona, aleiṙima ishingyia ichu alapfe-pfoe?”
43011038	Kyasia Yesu, awoṙo-se nyi fowa mrimenyi, kashika halya kyilomenyi. Nakyo kyiwekyeri usanja, na igoe lyiwelyiyekyie wuye yakyo.
43011039	Yesu kagamba, “Wutenyi ho igoe-lyo.” Marita, mshikyi o ulya alepfa, kammbia, “Mndumii, naiṙaa wulalu; kyipfa ammba mnying'a mfiri ina.”
43011040	Yesu kammbia, “Inyi ngyilekuwia kye koiṙikyia nochiwona mng'ano o Ruwa?”
43011041	Kyasia wakawuta ho igoe lyilya. Yesu kaambuya wuye, kagamba, “Awu, ngakuana cha kyipfa nongyiaṙanyia.
43011042	Na inyi ngyilemanya kye uyoe nokyengyiaṙanyia mfiri yoose, kyaindi kyipfa kya wandu-wa waisanzia iha ngyilegamba ishi, kundu waiṙime iiṙikyia kye nyi iyoe ulengyiṙuma.”
43011043	Na oe amgambe isho, kalaga na ṟui lying'anyi, “Lasaro nnjo na kunu nja!”
43011044	Ulya awepfiie kafumia nja, ampfungye sanda maṙende na mawoko, na kyaam kyakye kyikyipfungye na kyitambaa. Na Yesu kawawia “Mpfunguonyi, mumlekye nayende.”
43011045	Kyasia Wayuda wafoi kyiiṙi kya walya walecha na ko Maria, na iwona shilya alewuta, wakamwiṙikyia.
43011046	Kyaindi wengyi wakayenda ko Mafarisayo, wakawawia shilya Yesu alewuta.
43011047	Kyasia wang'anyi wa makohanyi na Mafarisayo wakalaga wandu na mengyenyi, wakagamba, “Ny'kyikyi luiwuta? Kyipfa mndu-chu naiwuta shindo shifoi sha maṟiyisho.
43011048	Lukomṙa kuṙi kuṙi, wandu woose wemwiṙikyia; na Waroma weecha walusokye handu haṙu hamwi na uruka loṙu.”
43011049	Mndu umwi, kyiiṙi kyawo, Kayafa, awekyeri Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose maka ulya, kawawia, “Nyoe muichi kyindo kyoose-pfo;
43011050	maa mukusaṟa kye kyiwaṟi mndu umwi ipfa kyipfa kya wandu, kundu uruka loose lularumare-pfo.”
43011051	Na oe aleṙeṙa kuṙo echigamba mbonyi tsakye amonyi-pfo; indi kyipfa awei Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose maka ulya, naleonguo shisuku kye Yesu nechipfa kyipfa kya uruka lulya.
43011052	Maa chi kyipfa kya uruka-lo tupu-pfo; kyaindi hamwi na isho nasanie wana woose wa Ruwa wanyanyaṟikyie; kundu wawe wamwi.
43011053	Kyasia wookyia mfiri-cho walewika kyikweena kyemmbaaga.
43011054	Koikyo Yesu aleyenda-se handu hoose kyiiṙi kya Wayuda orio mndu echimmbona-pfo; indi nalewuka urukyenyi lo Wayuda, kayenda kufuhi na nuka ingyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga, mṟasa mṟi okyelago Efraimu; kakaa pfo hamwi na wanalosho wakye.
43011055	Na Pasaka ya Wayuda iwekyeri kufuhi, na wandu wafoi wakawuka maṙemenyi wakaṙo iyenda Yerusalemu, mfiri o Pasaka ulandeshikye, kundu wawute kyilya kyechiwailyiṟa kyimṟumoe mesonyi ga Ruwa.
43011056	Kyasia wakapfula Yesu, wakawesana kunu wagoṟokyi hekalunyi, wechigamba, “Muwonyi kuṙa? Aicha na kunu mṟumoenyi-pfoe?”
43011057	Na wang'anyi wa makohanyi na Mafarisayo walekowagamba kye mndu kamanya handu akyeri, naende mbonyi, kundu waiṙime immbaṙa.
43012001	Kyasia hatsugae mfiri iṟandaaṟu mṟumoe o Pasaka uafukyie, Yesu naleshika Betania, halya-ndu Lasaro awekyeri, ulya Yesu alemṟutsa ko wapfu.
43012002	Kyasia wakamwachikyia shelya ipfo Betania; na Marita naweiṟunda pfo, na Lasaro nawekyeri umwi o walya waweilya hamwi na Yesu.
43012003	Kyasia Maria kaira panti ya mafura gekyepfaama necha, na ga woguru wung'anyi, kashia Yesu maṙende, kaanguo maṙende-go kui njui tsakye. Numba iya yoose ikaichuo mpfaamo o mafuṙa-go gekyepfaama necha.
43012004	Kyasia Yuda Isikariote, umwi o wanalosho wakye, ulya awekundi imṟiinga, kagamba,
43012005	“Ny'kyilyi mafuṙa-ga gekyepfaama necha galakumbo dinari magana gaṟaaṟu tsikaenengo wakyiwa?”
43012006	Na oe nalegamba kuṙo, chi kyipfa alewonia wakyiwa wukyiwa-pfo; indi kyipfa oe nawei mbafu, na oe nyi oe awekyekooma kyikuchu kya heleri, kakuwutia pfo heleri chandu alekunda.
43012007	Kyasia Yesu kagamba, “Mlekyenyi nakumbuo ikyo awuta, kyipfa kyawuto kui ikumbuo mfiri o iṟiko lyako.
43012008	Cha kyipfa mfiri yoose muwoṙe wakyiwa; indi mochikaa na inyi mfiri yoose-pfo.”
43012009	Kyasia wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kya Wayuda walemanya kye nawekyeri kulya Betania; wakacha, chi kyipfa kya Yesu tikyi-pfo, indi kundu wawone na Lasaro, ulya Yesu alekoamṟutsa ko wapfu.
43012010	Na wang'anyi wa makohanyi wakawika kyikweena kyewaaga Lasaro;
43012011	cha kyipfa kyipfa kya Lasaro wandu wafoi walelekana na wang'anyi-wo wa makohanyi, wakaiṙikyia Yesu.
43012012	Ilya-ngama wandu wafoi walekowacha kyipfa kya mṟumoe waleicho kye Yesu naicha na Yerusalemu.
43012013	Wakafunja maṟamba ga mashiṙi gai cha makangachi, wakafumia nja indemwambilyia. Wakakalagatsa, wechigamba, “Mndumii naṟumisho! Ulya ammbikyie mboṟa aicha kui rina lya Mndumii, Mangyi o Isiraelyi!”
43012014	Na Yesu nalekoammbona nzoi, kaṙamia wuye yayo, chandu kyikyiṟeie,
43012015	“Mulaowuoe wandu wa Yerusalemu; mangyi onyu naicha, naṙamilyie nzoi.”
43012016	Mbonyi-tso wanalosho wakye waletsimanya ipfo mawookyionyi-pfo; kyaindi kyiyeri Yesu aleng'anyiso nyi lyo-ndu walekumbuo kye shiṟeio shiwegambie mbonyi tsakye kuṙo, na kye walemmbutia isho.
43012017	Wandu walya wawei na Yesu kyiyeri kyilya alelaga Lasaro na imṟutsa iwuka upfunyi walekowammbia ny'kyikyi kyilekokyawutika.
43012018	Na kyipfa kya ikyo wandu wafoi wa kyisanzionyi wakayenda imwambilyia, cha kyipfa waleicho kye nawuta kyindo-kyo kya kyiṟiyisho.
43012019	Kyasia Mafarisayo wakawiana wo wenyi ko wenyi, “Kuwoṙe kyindo luiria iha-pfo; wandu woose waimwosha.”
43012020	Kuwewoṙe Wakyiṟikyi waata kyiiṙi kya wandu walekowayenda Yerusalemu iterewa Ruwa kyiyeri kya mṟumoe ulya o Pasaka.
43012021	Kyasia Wakyiṟikyi-wo waleyenda ko Filyipo (awewukyie Betisaida urukyenyi lo Galyilaya), wakamterewa, wechigamba, “Mndumii, soe lukundi iwona Yesu.”
43012022	Filyipo kayenda, kawia Anderea; numa ya iho Anderea na Filyipo wakawia Yesu.
43012023	Yesu na oe kawagaluo, kagamba, “Kyiyeri kyamshika. Mana o Adamu naṟumisho.
43012024	Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, mbeu ya nganu ilandeolokye terinyi, ikapfa, yekyekaa wuṙo chandu iwekyeri; indi ikapfa yekyekumbia ndunda tsifoi.
43012025	Ulya akundi mrima okye nechiuṙetsa; na ulya asuuye mrima okye kyiyeri-kyo akyeri kunu wuyanenyi nechiukyiṟa mṟasa moo o mlungana.
43012026	Mndu kangyiṟundia nangyioshe; na inyi handu ngyikyeri nyi ho-ndu na mṟundi oko echikaa. Lyingyi-se mndu kangyiṟundia, Awu nechimwindia.”
43012027	“Wulalu mrima oko uiṟewe; na inyi ngyigambe kyi? Ngyigambe ‘Awu ungyiwute kyiyeri-kyi kya iyesho lying'anyi?’ Kyaindi ngyilecha na kunu wuyanenyi kyipfa kya kyiyesho-kyi.
43012028	Awu, ng'anyisa rina lyapfo.” Kyasia kukocha ṟui lyawuka ruwewu lyikagamba, “Ngalying'anyisa, na inyi ngyechilying'anyisa-se.”
43012029	Kyasia wandu wa kyisanzionyi kyiwekyeri kufuhi wakaicho, wakagamba, “Kowaṙa ndiṟimo.” Wengyi wakagamba, “Malaika aṙeṙa na oe.”
43012030	Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Ṟui-lyo lyacha kyipfa kyako-pfo, indi kyipfa kyanyu.
43012031	Wulalu nyi kyiyeri kyeanduya wuyana. Wulalu Satana, mchilyi o wuyana-wu, nechiwiyitso nja.
43012032	Na inyi ngairo iwuka kunu urukyenyi ngyechikuruo woose wache na koko.”
43012033	Nalegamba isho echiloṟa nyi upfu lo mbaṟe iha echipfa.
43012034	Kyasia wandu wa kyisanzionyi wakamgaluo, wakagamba, “Soe luleicho uwawasonyi kye Kristo nai pfo mṟasa mlungana; na iyoe nugamba kuṙa kye Mana o Adamu nawaṟi iirio wuye? Mana-cho o Adamu nyi wui?”
43012035	Kyasia Yesu kawawia, “Ngyeela ikyeri na nyoe kyiyeri kyifuhi. Yendenyi kyiyeri-kyo muwoṙe ngyeela, meema ulachemuolokyia; kyipfa aichumia meemenyi aichi kundu aiyenda-pfo.
43012036	Iṙikyienyi ulya ekyeende ngyeela, kyiyeri-kyo akyeri na nyoe, kundu muiṙime iwa wana wa ngyeela.” Isho Yesu naleonguo, kayenda kakuṟiika wandu walammbone.
43012037	Maa chandu alewuta shindo shifoi kuṙo sha kyiṟiyisho mbele yawo wandu walemwiṙikyia-pfo;
43012038	kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyilya moonguo shisuku Yesaya alegamba, “Mndumii, nyi wui aleiṙikyia mbonyi tsaṙu; na nyi wui Ruwa alemloṟa pfinya tsakye?”
43012039	Nyikyo kyitewe wo walaleiṙima iiṙikyia; cha kyipfa Yesaya nalegamba-se,
43012040	“Nalewagaluo shipfupfuṟe, mrima yawo kaiumiṟa; kundu meso gawo galawone, na mṙoe yawo ilamanye; wakangyigalukyia, ngawakyiṟa.”
43012041	Mbonyi-tsi Yesaya naletsionguo, cha kyipfa nalewona mng'ano okye, kasenda mbonyi tsakye.
43012042	Kyaindi maa kyiiṙi kya wandu wawoṙe rina kyiiṙi kya Wayuda kuwewoṙe wafoi walemwiṙikyia; indi kyipfa kya Mafarisayo waleonguo mbonyi tsakye kulawoṙe iṟikyia-ṟikyia-pfo, kundu walacheimo ikulunga na walya wawekyeyenda sinagoginyi.
43012043	Cha kyipfa walekunda iṟumisho nyi wandu kuta iṟumisho nyi Ruwa.
43012044	Yesu kakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi kagamba, “Ulya angyiiṙikyia inyi, angyiiṙikyia inyi-pfo indi naiṙikyia ulya alengyiṙuma.
43012045	Na ulya angyiambuya inyi naambuya ulya alengyiṙuma.
43012046	Inyi ngyilecha kundu ngyiwe ngyeela ya wuyana, kundu orio mndu angyiiṙikyia inyi alakae meemenyi.
43012047	Na mndu kaicho malosho gako alagaoshe, inyi ngyechimwanduya-pfo; kyipfa ngyilecha kundu ngyianduye wuyana-pfo, indi ngyikyiṟe wuyana.
43012048	Ulya angyilega inyi, alaambilyie malosho gako, nawoṙe momwanduya; mbonyi-tso ngaonguo nyitso tsechimwanduya mfiri o furumia.
43012049	Cha kyipfa inyi ngyileonguo mbonyi tsa mrima oko tupu-pfo; indi Awu alengyiṙuma, oe nalengyiwia shindo ngyechigamba.
43012050	Na inyi ngyiichi iwawaso lyakye nyi moo o mlungana. Kyasia isho ngyionguo inyi, chandu Awu alengyiwia, nyisho ngyionguo.”
43013001	Kyasia, mṟumoe o Pasaka ulandeafukyie Yesu nalemanya kye kyiyeri kyakye kyewuka kunu wuyanenyi iyenda ko Awu, kyiwemshika. Na nalekunda walya wawekyemwosha kunu wuyanenyi, kawakunda mnu.
43013002	Na kyiyeri kya kyelya kya kyukonyi; Mokyiriinzi naleenenga Yuda, mana o Simion Isikariote, ngoo yemṟiinga.
43013003	Yesu aichi kye Awu namṙambikyie shoose na kye nawukyie ko Ruwa na oe naiyenda ko Ruwa,
43013004	nalewuka halya shelyenyi, kayenda mbai kawuta pfo nguwo tsakye, kaira kyitambaa, kakuinewa kyitsinyi.
43013005	Numa ya iho kawika mṟinga pakulyinyi, kawooka isanja wanalosho wakye maṙende, na igaanguo kui kyitambaa kyilya awekuinewie.
43013006	Kashika ko Simion Petiro na oe kammbesa, “Mndumii! Iyoe nungyisanja maṙende?”
43013007	Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Kyindo ngyiwuta ochikyimanya wulalu-pfo; kyaindi nochikyimanya numa ya iha.”
43013008	Petiro kammbia, “Iyoe ochingyisanja maṙende maa ale-pfo.” Yesu kammbia, “Ngyilandekusanje maṙende, ukyeri ura loko-pfo.”
43013009	Simion Petiro kammbia, “Mndumii, chi maṙende gako tupu-pfo, indi sanja na mawoko gako na mṙoe oko taa.”
43013010	Yesu kammbia, “Ulya amsambe awoṙe-se kyimaṙuma kyesamba maṙende-pfo, kyipfa namwilyi mmbiu oose; na nyoe momuila kyaindi chi moose-pfo.”
43013011	Cha kyipfa nalemanya ulya echimṟiinga; nyikyo kyitewe alegamba, “Chi moose muweelyi-pfo.”
43013012	Kyasia amuwasanje maṙende, na iṟaa nguwo tsakye na iṙamia-se halya-ndu waweilyiia kyelya, nalewawia, “Ngyesa momanya isho ngammbutia?”
43013013	Nyoe muingyilaga, “Mlosha” na “Mndumii;” moṙeṙa necha, kyipfa nyi wuṙo ngyikyeri.
43013014	Kyasia kokooya inyi, ngyikyeri Mndumii na Mlosha, ngamusanja maṙende, na wuṙo kyimmbari isanjana maṙende nyoe wenyi ko wenyi.
43013015	Cha kyipfa ngamumloṟa chandu mowuta; kundu chandu ngammbutia, na nyoe muwute kuṙo.
43013016	Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, mtumo ang'anyi kuta mndumii okye-pfo; maa moṙiko ndumo ang'anyi kuta ulya amṙuma-pfo.
43013017	Wulalu momanya isho ngammbia; agusu nyoe kokooya moshiwuta!
43013018	Ngyiṙeṙa mbonyi tsa nyoe moose-pfo. Ngyiichi walya ngyilewasambuṟa; kyaindi kyiṟeio kyiiṙime iafukyia; kyiṟeio kyilya kyigambie, “Ulya alelya kyelya kyako nawa mokyituwa oko.”
43013019	“Wookyia wulalu ngammbia shilya shechiwutika, kyiyeri-kyi shilandewutikye; kundu ilyi shechiwutika muiṙime iiṙikyia kye inyi nyi oe ulya ai pfo wookyia mlungana.
43013020	Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, ulya aambilyia mndu oose ngamṙuma, nangyiambilyia inyi; na ulya angyiambilyia inyi naambilyia ulya alengyiṙuma.”
43013021	Na Yesu amwonguo isho, naleiṟewe mrimenyi, kaṟingyishia echigamba, “Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, umwi onyu nechingyiṟiinga.”
43013022	Wanalosho wakaambuyana, walamanye nyi wui aweimsenda.
43013023	Na kuwewoṙe umwi o wanalosho wakye, aweṙamie kufuhi na Yesu; Yesu awemkundi.
43013024	Kyasia Simion Petiro kamtsinia, kammbia, “Wesa, nyi wui amsenda?”
43013025	Kyasia manalosho ulya katikyira kaaramia ura lo Yesu, kammbesa, “Mndumii, nyi wui?”
43013026	Kyasia Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Nyi mndu ulya ngyechikapa itongye kyitelenyi na imwenengyia.” Kakapa itongye kyitelenyi kalyienengyia Yuda, mana o Simion Isikariote.
43013027	Yuda amwambilyie itongye lyilya Satana kaiṙa na mrimenyi kokye. Kyasia Yesu kammbia, “Shindo uiwuta shiwute iwinyi.”
43013028	Maa kuwoṙe mndu oose kyiiṙi kya walya waweṙamie halya alemanya kyitewe kya immbia kuṙo-pfo.
43013029	Cha kyipfa walekusaṟa, kyipfa Yuda awekyekooma kyikuchu kya heleri, Yesu nammbia kye, guṟa shilya lukundi kyipfa kya mṟumoe-chu; ang'u nammbia kye naenengye wakyiwa kyindo.
43013030	Kyasia Yuda, amwambilyie itongye lyilya, kawuka halya kyiyeri kyilya kyilya. Na nyi-we kyio.
43013031	Yuda amfumie nja, Yesu nalegamba, “Wulalu Mana o Adamu nang'anyiso, na Ruwa nang'anyiso kyiiṙi kyakye.
43013032	Ruwa nechimng'anyisa mrimenyi kokye; na oe nechimng'anyisa cha ilyi.
43013033	Nyoe wana wako, hatsugai kyiyeri kyitutu ngyikyeri hamwi na nyoe; mochingyipfula; na chandu ngyilewia Wayuda kye, ‘Kulya-ndu ngyiyenda moiṙima icha na pfo-pfo’; na wuṙo wulalu ngyimmbia nyoe.
43013034	Ngyimuenenga iwawaso lyihya: ‘Mukundane.’ Chandu ngyilemukunda nyoe, na nyoe mukundane wuṙo.
43013035	Kuṙo wandu woose wechimanya kye nyoe mowa wanalosho wako, kokooya mokundana nyoe wenyi ko wenyi.”
43013036	Simion Petiro kammbia, “Mndumii, ny'kwi uiyenda?” Yesu kamgaluo, kagamba, “Kulya-ndu ngyiyenda oiṙima ingyiosha wulalu-pfo; kyaindi nongyiosha numa.”
43013037	Petiro kammbia, “Mndumii, ny'kyilyi inyi ngyilechiiṙima ikuosha wulalu? Inyi ngyechireka moo oko kyipfa kyapfo.”
43013038	Yesu kamgaluo, kammbia, “Ngyesa iyoe nochireka moo opfo kyipfa kyako? Ny'kyaloi ngakuwia, ilying'onyi lyechifuga ulangyikana kaṟaaṟu-pfo.”
43014001	“Maa mulaiṟewe mrimenyi konyu; muiṙikyie Ruwa, ngyiiṙikyienyi na inyi.
43014002	Kanyi ko Awu oko kuwoṙe kundu kufoi kokaa. Kyilawei kuṙo ngyiwechimmbia; kyipfa ngyindemuṟeyeṟia handu hekaa.
43014003	Kyasia inyi ngyindemuṟeyeṟia handu hekaa. Ngyechicha-se ngyimuṙuo koko; kundu handu ngyikyeri, na nyoe mukae ho.
43014004	Na kundu ngyiyenda nyoe muichi njia.”
43014005	Tomasi kammbia, “Mndumii, soe luichi kundu uiyenda-pfo; luichi kuṙa njia?”
43014006	Yesu kammbia, “Inyi nyi njia, na wuloi na moo. Mndu ekyecha na ko Awu, sile kui iiṙia koko-pfo.
43014007	Kokooya muwengyiichi inyi, muwechimanya Awu. Wookyia wulalu mumwichi, lyingyi-se momummbona.”
43014008	Filyipo kammbia, “Mndumii luloṟe Awu, kyilushikyie.”
43014009	Yesu kammbia, “Inyi ngyiwekyeri hamwi na nyoe mfiri yoose, iyoe ulangyimanye Filyipo? Angyiwona inyi nawona Awu. Kyasia iyoe nuigamba kuṙa ‘ululoṟe Awu?’
43014010	Uiṙikyie kye inyi ngyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Awu, na Awu nakyeri kyiiṙi kyako? Isho ngyimuongoya wulalu chi makusaṟo gako inyi-pfo kyaindi nyi Awu ulya akyeri kyiiṙi kyako aiṟunda shilya akundi iṟunda.
43014011	Iṙikyienyi kye inyi ngyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Awu, na Awu nakyeri kyiiṙi kyako. Mulandeiṙikyie kyipfa kya ikyo iṙikyienyi kyipfa kya shilya ngyiwuta.
43014012	Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, ulya angyiiṙikyia inyi, shindo shilya ngyiwuta, na oe nechishiwuta; yee, na shing'anyi kuta isho nechiwuta cha kyipfa inyi ngyiyenda ko Awu.
43014013	Na nyoe, mukoterewa kyindo kyoose kyipfa mukyeri wanalosho wako, ikyo ngyechikyiwuta, kundu Awu nang'anyiso kyiiṙi kya Mana.
43014014	Mukoterewa kyindo kyoose kyipfa mukyeri wanalosho wako ngyechikyiwuta.”
43014015	“Mukongyikunda mochiosha kyilya mawawaso gako gakundi.
43014016	Na inyi ngyechiterewa Awu, na oe nechimuenenga Mtarami ungyi, kundu nakae na nyoe mṟasa mlungana.
43014017	Nyi oe Mumuyo o loi; ulya wandu wa wuyana walechiiṙima imwambililyia, cha kyipfa wammbonyi maa wamwichi-pfo; indi nyoe mumwichi, kyipfa nekyekaa konyu; na oe nechikaa mrimenyi konyu.
43014018	Ngyechimṙa ngoṙa-pfo. Ngyiicha na konyu.
43014019	Hatsugae kyiyeri kyitutu wandu wa wuyana walechingyiwona-se; indi nyoe mungyiwonyi. Na kyipfa inyi ngyiwoṙe moo, maa nyoe mochiwaṙa moo.
43014020	Mfiri ulya mochimanya kye inyi na Awu oko nyi kyindo kyimwi, na inyi na nyoe nyi kyindo kyimwi.
43014021	Ulya aambilyia mawawaso gako na igaosha, icho nyi oe angyikundi; na ulya angyikundi Awu oko nechimkunda; na inyi ngyechimkunda na imloṟa mbonyi tsako na pata.”
43014022	Yuda (chi oe Yuda Isikariote-pfo) kammbia, “Mndumii, kyawa kuṙa ukundi iṟingyishia mbonyi tsapfo koṙu na chi ko wandu wa wuyana-pfo?”
43014023	Yesu kagaluo, kammbia, “Mndu kangyikunda nechiosha kyilya malosho gako gakundi; na Awu oko nechimkunda; na soe lochicha na kokye, na iwika kyiṟaṟo kokye.
43014024	Mndu alangyikundi, ekyeosha kyilya malosho gako gakundi-pfo; na malosho-go mugaichuoe chi gako-pfo, indi nyi ga ulya alengyiṙuma.”
43014025	“Isho nyisho ngyilemuongoya kyiyeri-kyo ngyiwekyekaa konyu.
43014026	Kyaindi Mtarami-cho, Mumuyo-cho Mweele, ulya Awu echimṙika kui rina lyako, nechimulosha shoose, na imukumbuṟa shoose ngyilemmbia.
43014027	Ngamṙeeya ufoṟo. Ufoṟo loko ngamuenenga. Chandu ngyimuenenga chi wuṙo wuyana wokyeenenga-pfo. Mulaiṟewe mrimenyi konyu, maa mulawaṙe wuowu.
43014028	Muleicho kye inyi ngyilemmbia, ‘Ngyiyenda na ngyiicha-se na konyu.’ Kokooya muwengyikundi, muwechichihiyo kyipfa ngyiyenda ko Awu; cha kyipfa Awu nang'anyi kuta inyi.
43014029	Na wulalu ngamuongoya isho shilaafukyia kundu ilyi shechiafukyia muiṙime iiṙikyia.
43014030	Inyi ngyechiṙeṙa-se na nyoe shindo shifoi-pfo, cha kyipfa Satana, mchilyi o wuyana-wu naicha, na echiiṙima ingyiwutia kyindo-pfo.
43014031	Kyaindi wandu wa wuyana wamanye kye ngyikundi Awu; na shilya Awu alengyiwia, nyisho ngyiwuta. Nnjonyi luwukye iha.”
43015001	“Inyi nyi msabibu o loi, na Awu oko nyi oe mṙemi.
43015002	Orio mbaga ilekyekumbia ndunda ngyekyeimanya; na orio mbaga yekyekumbia ndunda ngyekyeianguo, kundu iengyeṟe ikumbia ndunda.
43015003	Nyoe momuila kyipfa kya mbonyi-tsi ngammbia.
43015004	Nyoe na inyi luwe kyindo kyimwi. Chandu mbaga ilechiiṙima ikumbia ndunda ilakuwoṙe msabibunyi; na wuṙo taa kyechiwa konyu mulandewe kyindo kyimwi na inyi.
43015005	Inyi nyi msabibu; nyoe nyi mbaga; ulya awa kyindo kyimwi na inyi, nekumbia ndunda tsifoi mnu; kyipfa ngyilai ho inyi moiṙima iwuta kyindo kyoose-pfo.
43015006	Mndu alandewe kyindo kyimwi na inyi nekyewiyitso cha mbaga na iuma; wandu wakatsisania na itsiwiyitsa moṙonyi tsikasenekyia.
43015007	Nyoe mukowa kyindo kyimwi na inyi, na malosho gako gakakaa mrimenyi konyu, terewenyi kyindo kyoose mukundi na nyoe mochienengo.
43015008	Kuṙo Awu oko neching'anyiso, kyipfa muikumbia ndunda tsifoi mnu; na nyoe mochiwa wanalosho wako.
43015009	“Chandu Awu alengyikunda inyi, na chandu ngyilemukunda nyoe, kaenyi ikundenyi lyako.
43015010	Mukoosha kyilya mawawaso gako gakundi, mochikaa ikundenyi lyako; chandu inyi ngyekyeosha mawawaso ga Awu oko na ikaa ikundenyi lyakye.
43015011	Ngamuongoya isho, kundu sia yako ikae mrimenyi konyu, na sia yanyu iafutsio.
43015012	Iwawaso lyako nyi ilyi, mukundane, chandu ngyilemukunda nyoe.
43015013	Kuwoṙe awoṙe ikunda lying'anyi kuta ilyi, lya mndu ireka moo okye kyipfa kya mbuya tsakye-pfo.
43015014	Nyoe mochiwa mbuya tsako, mukowuta shilya ngammbia.
43015015	Ngyimulaga-se watumo-pfo; cha kyipfa mtumo aichi kyindo mndumii okye ekyewuta-pfo; kyaindi ngamlaga mbuya; cha kyipfa shoose ngyileshiicho ko Awu oko ngamuongoya.
43015016	Chi nyoe mulengyisambuṟa inyi-pfo, indi nyi inyi ngyilemusambuṟa nyoe; kundu mundekumbia ndunda; na ndunda tsanyu tsiiṙime ikaa ho mfiri yoose; kundu orio kyindo moterewa Awu kui rina lyako namuenengye.
43015017	Ishi ngammbia nyoe, muiṙime ikundana.”
43015018	“Kokooya wandu wa wuyana wamsuo, manyenyi kye walengyisuo inyi kuwooka.
43015019	Kokooya nyoe muwei wandu wa wuyana, wawechimukunda; kyaindi kyipfa nyoe mulakyeri wandu wa wuyana, indi inyi ngyilemusambuṟa nyoe iwuka wandu wa wuyana, kyipfa kya ikyo wandu wa wuyana wamusuuye.
43015020	Kumbuonyi mbonyi tsilya ngyilemuongoya, kye mtumo ang'anyi kuta mndumii okye-pfo. Kokooya walengyipfulutsa nyashi, wechimpfulutsa nyashi nyoe; kokooya waleosha malosho gako, wechiosha ganyu taa.
43015021	Kyaindi ishi shoose wechimmbutia kyipfa kya rina lyako, cha kyipfa waichi ulya alengyiṙuma-pfo.
43015022	Kokooya ngyilalecha na iṙeṙa nawo wawechikumbuṟo kya wunyamaṟi wowo-pfo; kyaindi wulalu wekaria igamba kye waichi kye isho wawekyewuta nyi wunyamaṟi-pfo.
43015023	Ulya angyisuuye inyi nasuuye na Awu oko.
43015024	Wawechikumbuṟo kya wunyamaṟi wowo kokooya ngyilalewuta kyiiṙi kyawo shindo shilandewuto mndu ungyi oose-pfo; kyaindi wulalu wammbona shilya ngawuta, wakangyisuo inyi na Awu oko.
43015025	Kyaindi kundu kyindo kyilya kyikyiṟeie uwawasonyi lowo kyiafukyie, kyindo kyigambie, ‘Walengyisuo wulya.’
43015026	Kyaindi kyiyeri-kyo Mtarami-cho echicha, ngyechimṙika iwuka ko Awu, Mumuyo-cho o loi awukyie ko Awu, oe nechingyiṟingyishia.
43015027	Na nyoe taa muingyiṟingyishia, cha kyipfa wookyia mawookyionyi muwekyeri hamwi na inyi.
43016001	“Mbonyi-tso ngamuongoya kundu mulacheṙetsa iiṙikyia.
43016002	Wechimuletsana na walya wekyeyenda masinagoginyi; yee loi kyiyeri kyiicha orio mndu aimbaaga echikusaṟa kye naiindia Ruwa kui iwuta kuṙo.
43016003	Na isho wechimmbutia cha kyipfa waichi Awu maa inyi-pfo.
43016004	Kyaindi ngamuongoya isho, kundu kyiyeri kyiyeri-kyo kyechicha mukumbuo kye inyi nyilemmbia. Ngyilemmbia isho wookyia mawookyionyi-pfo, cha kyipfa ngyiwekyeri hamwi na nyoe.”
43016005	“Kyaindi wulalu inyi ngyiyenda ko ulya alengyiṙuma, maa kuwoṙe umwi onyu aingyiwesa ny'kwi ngyiyenda-pfo.
43016006	Indi cha kyipfa ngammmbia isho fowa iichuo mrimenyi konyu.
43016007	Kyaindi inyi ngammbia shii loi; mochiwona kyiira inyi ngayenda; cha kyipfa inyi ngyilandeyende, Mtarami-cho echicha na konyu-pfo; indi inyi ngayenda, ngyechimṙika konyu.
43016008	Na oe kamcha nechiloṟa wandu wa wuyana kye wekyeṙeko kyiyeri wekyegamba kye waichi mbonyi tsa wunyamaṟi. Kye waichi kyiha kyikyeri kya sungusinyi na kye waichi mbonyi tsa ianduyo nyi Ruwa.
43016009	Oe nechiloṟa wandu wa wuyana kye wawoṙe wunyamaṟi, kyipfa walengyiiṙikyia inyi-pfo.
43016010	Kye wawoṙe ṙeko kui igamba waichi kyikyeri kya sungusinyi kyipfa ngyiyenda ko Awu, maa mochingyiwona-se-pfo.
43016011	Kye wechianduyo kyipfa Satana, mchilyi o wuyana-wu, amwanduyo.
43016012	Ngyiwoṙe shindo shifoi shemuongoya, kyaindi moiṙima ishienenga ṙaawa makusaṟonyi ganyu wulalu-pfo.
43016013	Kyaindi kyiyeri oe echicha, Mumuyo-cho o loi, nechimusongoya, namushukuye wuloi woose; cha kyipfa echiṙeṙa kui wuchilyi wokye amonyi-pfo, indi shoose echiicho neshionguo, na shindo shiicha nechimuongoya mbonyi tsakye.
43016014	Oe nechingying'anyisa inyi; cha kyipfa nechiicho shilya ngyekyegamba na imuongoya.
43016015	Na shoose Awu awoṙe nyi shako. Ny'kyo kyitewe ngagamba nechiicho shilya ngyekyegamba na imuongoya.”
43016016	“Hatsugae kyiyeri kyitutu na nyoe mochingyiwona-pfo; lyingyi-se hatsugae kyiyeri kyitutu na nyoe mochingyiwona.”
43016017	Kyasia wanalosho wakye waata wakawesana, “Mbonyi tsiha itso aigamba, ‘Hatsugae kyiyeri kyitutu na nyoe mochingyiwona-pfo, na lyingyi-se hatsugae kyiyeri kyitutu na nyoe mongyiwona?’ Na ‘Cha kyipfa ngyiyenda ko Awu?’ ”
43016018	Kyasia wakagamba, “Mbonyi tsiha itso aigamba, ‘hatsugae kyiyeri kyitutu?’ Luichi kyindo aigamba-pfo.”
43016019	Yesu nalemanya kye wawekundi immbesa; kawawesa, “Ny'kyo muiwesana, kye ngyilegamba, ‘hatsugae kyiyeri kyitutu na nyoe mochingyiwona-pfo; na lyingyi-se hatsugae kyiyeri kyitutu na nyoe mochingyiwona?’
43016020	Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, nyoe mochilyia na ikapa ṟanyi, indi wandu wa wuyana wechichihiyo. Nyoe mochiwoṙo nyi fowa, kyaindi nyi fowa yanyu yechiwa sia.
43016021	Mndu mka kyiyeri-kyo aienengo mana, nekyewoṙo nyi fowa kyipfa kyiyeri kyakye kyelya wukyiwa kyaafukyia; kyaindi kamwenengo mana, ekyekumbuo-se wukyiwa wulya-pfo, kyipfa kya sia ya ifeo mndu wuyanenyi.
43016022	Kyasia nyoe wulalu muwoṙo nyi fowa; kyaindi inyi ngyechimmbona-se; na mrima yanyu yechichihiyo, na sia yanyu kuwoṙe mndu echimusoka-pfo.
43016023	Lyingyi-se mfiri ulya mochingyiwesa kyindo kyoose-pfo. Ny'kyaloi ngammbia, mukoterewa Awu kyindo kyoose nechimuenenga kui rina lyako.
43016024	Mṟasa wulalu mulandeterewe kyindo kui rina lyako-pfo. Terewenyi, na nyoe mochienengo; kundu muchihiyo nakamwi.”
43016025	“Isho ngamuongoya kui mbia. Kyiyeri kyiicha ngyilechiṙeṙa-se na nyoe kui mbia; kyaindi mbonyi tsa Awu ngyechimuongoya na pata.
43016026	Na mfiri-cho mochiterewa kui rina lyako; maa ngyimmbia kye inyi ngyechimuterewia ko Awu-pfo;
43016027	cha kyipfa Awu namukundi kyipfa nyoe mongyikunda inyi, na iiṙikyia kye inyi ngyilewuka ko Awu.
43016028	Ngyilewuka ko Awu, na inyi ngyilecha na kunu wuyanenyi. Lyingyi-se ngyiwuka kunu wuyanenyi; na iyenda ko Awu.”
43016029	Kyasia wanalosho wakye wakagamba, “Wulalu nuionguo na pata; uiṙeṙa-se kui mbia-pfo.
43016030	Wulalu lomanya kye nuichi shindo shoose; kuwoṙe kyimaṙuma kya mndu ikuwesa kyindo-pfo. Koikyo loiṙikyia kye nulewuka ko Ruwa.”
43016031	Yesu kawagaluo, kawawia, “Ngyesa moiṙikyia wulalu?
43016032	Kyiyeri kyiicha, nakyo kyamcha, kyiyeri mochinyanyaṟika orio mndu kanyi kokye, na ingyiṙa ngyimonyi. Kyaindi inyi ngyikyeri ngyimonyi-pfo, cha kyipfa Awu nakyeri hamwi na inyi.
43016033	Isho ngammbia muiṙime iwaṙa ufoṟo muwaṙanyi na inyi. Kunu wuyanenyi muwoṙe fowa; kyaindi kuwanzenyi; inyi ngyilewinga wuyana.”
43017001	Yesu nalegamba mbonyi-tso, kaambuya ruwewu, kagamba, “Awu, kyiyeri kyamshika. Ng'anyisa Mono-pfo, kundu Mono-pfo nakung'anyise iyoe;
43017002	chandu ulemwenenga momu o ichilyia wandu, kundu woose ulemwenenga nawaenengye moo o mlungana.
43017003	Na moo o mlungana nyi: ‘Wakumanye iyoe, Ruwa o loi kulawoṙe ungyi; na Yesu Kristo ulemṙuma.’
43017004	Inyi ngyilekung'anyisa wuyanenyi, iṟunda ulengyiwia ngyiṟunde ngyilelyimarisa.
43017005	Na wulalu, Awu, ungying'anyise inyi hamwi na iyoe, kui kyiṟumi kyilya ngyiwewoṙe kyiyeri wuyana wulagumbo.
43017006	Walya ulengyienenga kunu wuyanenyi ngyilewashukuya kyiṟumi kyapfo. Wawekyeri wapfo, kowangyienenga, na malosho gapfo wekyegaosha.
43017007	Wulalu waichi kye shoose ungyienengyie shiwukyie kopfo.
43017008	Cha kyipfa malosho ulengyienenga ngyilewaṙambika; nawo wakagaambilyia, wakamanya loi kye ngyilewuka kopfo, wakaiṙikyia kye nyi iyoe ulengyiṙuma.
43017009	Inyi ngyiwaterewia iwo; ngyiterewia wandu wa wuyana-pfo; indi iwo ulengyienenga, cha kyipfa iwo nyi wako;
43017010	na woose wai wako nyi wapfo; na wai wapfo nyi wako, na inyi ngaṟumisho mrimenyi kowo.
43017011	“Maa inyi ngyikyeri-se wuyanenyi-pfo, kyaindi wo wakyeri wuyanenyi, na inyi ngyiicha na kopfo. Awu mweele, kui rina lyapfo ulengyienenga uwaringye iwa, kundu wawaṙane tapu chandu soe lukyeri.
43017012	Kyiyeri ngyiwekyeri hamwi nawo, inyi ngyilewaringa kui rina lyapfo ulengyienenga, ngawaambuya; maa kuwoṙe umwi owo aleṙeka-pfo, sile mana ulya o wuṙetsi, kundu kyiṟeio kyiafukyie.
43017013	Na wulalu ngyiicha na kopfo; na mbonyi-tsi ngyitsionguo wuyanenyi, kundu sia yako iafutsio mrimenyi kowo.
43017014	Inyi ngyilewaṙambika malosho gako; na wandu wa wuyana walewasuo kyipfa wo chi wa wuyana-pfo, chandu inyi ngyilakyeri o wuyana.
43017015	Inyi ngyiterewa kye uwawute kunu wuyanenyi-pfo indi uwaringye walaolotso nyi Satana.
43017016	Wo chi wandu wa wuyana-pfo, chandu inyi ngyilakyeri o wuyana.
43017017	Uwailyishe kui Ṙeṙo lyapfo. Mbonyi tsapfo nyitso wuloi.
43017018	Chandu ulengyiṙuma inyi wuyanenyi, na inyi nyi wuṙo ngyilewaṙuma wuyanenyi.
43017019	Na kyipfa kyawo ngakuṙambika kopfo ngyikuṟundie, kundu nawo wakuṙambikye kopfo wakuṟundie, wailyisho nyi Ṙeṙo lyapfo lyii lya loi.
43017020	“Maa chi iwo tupu ngyiwaterewia-pfo; kyaindi ngyiterewia na walya wechingyiiṙikyia kyipfa kya malosho gawo.
43017021	Woose wawaṙane tapu; chandu iyoe, Awu, ukyeri kyindo kyimwi na inyi, na inyi kyindo kyimwi na iyoe; iwo nawo wawe kyindo kyimwi na soe; kundu wandu wa wuyana waiṙime iiṙikyia kye nyi iyoe ulengyiṙuma.
43017022	Na inyi mng'ano ulya ulengyienenga ngyilewaenenga; kundu wawaṙane tapu chandu soe luwaṙanyi tapu.
43017023	Inyi ngyiwe kyindo kyimwi nawo, na iyoe uwe kyindo kyimwi na inyi, kundu wawaṙane tapu; na wandu wa wuyana wamanye kye nyi iyoe ulengyiṙuma, kowakunda wo chandu ulengyikunda inyi.
43017024	Awu, iwo ulengyienenga ngyikundi wakae handu hamwi na inyi orio handu ngyikyeri, waiṙime iwona mng'ano ulengyienenga; cha kyipfa nulengyikunda wookyia wuyana wulagumbo.
43017025	Awu, iyoe okyeanduya kulawoṙe ikundia, wandu wa wuyana walekumanya-pfo; kyaindi inyi ngyilekumanya, na iwo wamanya kye nyi iyoe ulengyiṙuma.
43017026	Na inyi ngyilewaloṟa iyoe nyi wui, lyingyi-se ngyechiengyeṟa iwuta kuṙo, kundu ikunda lyilya ulyiwoṙe koko lyikae mrimenyi kowo na inyi ngyiwe kyindo kyimwi nawo.”
43018001	Kyiyeri amwonguoe isho, Yesu nalefuma hamwi na wanalosho wakye iyenda molyolya o kyimfo kyekyelago Kyediron, handu hawewoṙe bustanyi, kaiṙa na ipfo bustanyinyi hamwi na wanalosho wakye.
43018002	Na Yuda, ulya awekundi imṟiinga, naweichi handu halya; cha kyipfa Yesu kafoi nawekyeyenda pfo hamwi na wanalosho wakye.
43018003	Kyasia Yuda, aṙuṙanyi na asikari na waṟundi wawewukyie ko wang'anyi wa makohanyi na Mafarisayo, kayenda pfo, waṙuṙe taa na shimii na shisha.
43018004	Kyasia Yesu, aichi shoose shechimmbutikyia, kafuma kulya bustanyinyi, kawawia, “Nyi wui muimpfula?”
43018005	Wo wakamgaluo, wakagamba, “Nyi Yesu o Nasareti.” Yesu kawawia, “Nyi inyi.” Yuda ulya alemṟiinga nawegoṟokyi hamwi nawo.
43018006	Kyasia kyiyeri alewawia, “Nyi inyi,” walewuya na numa, wakaoloka wanda.
43018007	Kawawesa-se, “Muipfula wui?” Wakagamba, “Yesu o Nasareti.”
43018008	Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Ngamummbia kye nyi inyi. Kyasia kokooya muingyipfula inyi, lekyienyi iwa wayende.”
43018009	Kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyilya alekoagamba, “Walya ulengyienenga ngyileṙetsa maa umwi-pfo.”
43018010	Kyasia Simion Petiro nawewoṙe ushu, kalusoṟomuo, kamanya nalo mtumo o Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, kamṙumbuo kuṙwi ko kulyoe. Na mtumo ulya nawekyelago Malyiko.
43018011	Kyasia Yesu kawia Petiro, “Wiyiṟia ushu-lo ipfo kyiṟandenyi. Ngyesa, nokusaṟa ngyikundi ituurika chandu Awu angyiṟeyeṟie ngyituurikye-pfoe?”
43018012	Kyasia asikari walya na msongoru o wayuda walewaṙa Yesu, wakampfunga.
43018013	Wakamṙuo ko Anasi kuwooka, cha kyipfa nawekyeri watoe o Kayafa, ulya awekyeri Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose maka ulya.
43018014	Na Kayafa nyi oe alewia Wayuda kye kyiwechia mndu umwi napfe kyipfa kya wandu wengyi.
43018015	Petiro na manalosho ungyi wakayenda ko Yesu. Na manalosho-cho naweichio nyi Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose. Kyipfa kya ikyo oe na Yesu wakaiṙa na handu hesanzia ha numba ya Mkohanyi-cho ang'anyi kuta woose.
43018016	Kyaindi Petiro kagoṟoka nja moongonyi. Kyasia manalosho ulya ungyi aweichio nyi Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose kafuma, kaṙeṙa na kyisinga kyekyeringa moongo, kaitsa Petiro na numba.
43018017	Kyasia kyisinga kyilya, kyiwewoṙe iṟunda lyeringa moongo, kyikawia Petiro, “Ngyesa iyoe ui umwi o wanalosho wa mndu-chu-pfoe?” Na oe kagamba, “Chi inyi-pfo.”
43018018	Na watumo walya wa waṟundi wawegoṟokyi mbai weoṙa moṙo; kyipfa kuwewoṙe mbeho. Petiro na oe nawekyeri hamwi nawo, echioṙa moṙo.
43018019	Kyasia Mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi kuta woose kawesa Yesu mbonyi tsa wanalosho wakye, na mbonyi tsa malosho gakye.
43018020	Yesu kamgaluo, kagamba, “Inyi ngaṙeṙa na wandu wa wuyana na pata. Mfiri yoose ngyileloshia sinagoginyi na hekalunyi, handu Wayuda woose wekyesanzia; maa ngyileonguo kyindo kyoose kui kyiṟika-pfo.
43018021	Ny'kyilyi ungyiwesa inyi? Wesa walya waleicho ny'kyikyi ngyilewawia; wo waichi kyindo ngyileonguo.”
43018022	Kyasia kyiyeri alegamba isho, mṟundi umwi kyiiṙi kya walya wawegoṟokyi kufuhi kakapa Yesu ukofi, echigamba, “Nuigaluo kuṙo Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose?”
43018023	Yesu kamgaluo, kagamba, “Kokooya ngaṙeṙa uwicho, uṟingyishie wuwicho woko; indi kokooya ngaṙeṙa necha, ny'kyilyi ongyikapa ukofi?”
43018024	Kyasia Anasi kamṙuo ko Kayafa ampfungye.
43018025	Simion Petiro nawekyeri pfo echioṙa moṙo. Kyasia wakammbia, “Ngyesa iyoe ui umwi o wanalosho wakye-pfoe?” Na oe kakana, kagamba, “Chi inyi-pfo.”
43018026	Mtumo umwi kyiiṙi kya walya wa Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, na oe nyi o kyishari kya ulya Petiro alemṙumbuo kuṙwi, kagamba, “Ngyilekuwona kulya bustanyinyi hamwi na oe-pfoe?”
43018027	Kyasia Petiro kakana-se, na cha ilyi ilying'onyi lyikafuga.
43018028	Kyasia wakawuta Yesu ko Kayafa wakamṙuo mṟasa numba ya wuchilyi iwekyelago Praitorio. Napfo kukokya, kyaindi wo waleiṙa na kulya numbenyi-pfo, walachefana kyimṟumoe, wachelemo ilya shelya sha mṟumoe ulya o Pasaka.
43018029	Kyasia Pilato kafumia nja, kagamba, “Mogamba wuwicho wo mndu-chu ny'kyikyi?”
43018030	Wakamgaluo, wakammbia, “Kokooya ichu alawewoṙe wuwicho luwechimwende na kopfo-pfo.”
43018031	Kyasia Pilato kawawia, “Mṙuonyi nyoe, mundemwanduya chandu uwawaso lonyu luwawasie!” Wayuda wakammbia, “Soe luwoṙe momu o iwaaga mndu-pfo.”
43018032	Kundu kyiafukyie kyindo kyilya Yesu alekyigamba, echiloṟa nyi upfu lo mbaṟe iha echipfa.
43018033	Kyasia Pilato kaiṙa-se na kulya numbenyi ya wuchilyi, kalaga Yesu, kammbia, “Ngyesa iyoe nyi Mangyi o Wayuda?”
43018034	Yesu kamgaluo, kagamba, “Iyoe nuigamba kuṙo kui makusaṟo gapfo, ang'u wandu wengyi walekuwia mbonyi tsako?”
43018035	Pilato kagaluo, kagamba, “Nokusaṟa kye inyi nyi Myuda? Wandu wa uruka lopfo na wang'anyi wa makohanyi nyiwo walekuende na koko. Ny'kyikyi ulewuta?”
43018036	Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Wumangyi woko chi wo wuyana-wu-pfo. Kokooya Wumangyi woko wuwekyeri wo wuyana-wu, waṟundi wako wawechikapana kyipfa kyako, kundu wasongoru wa Wayuda walaiṙime ingyiwaṙa. Kyaindi Wumangyi woko chi wo iha-pfo.”
43018037	Kyasia Pilato kammbia, “Kokooya nyi wuṙo iyoe nyi Mangyi-ng'ue?” Yesu kagaluo, kagamba, “Nogamba kye inyi nyi Mangyi. Ngyilefeo kunu wuyanenyi kyipfa kya kyindo kyimwi tupu, ionguo mbonyi tsa loi. Orio mndu aichi mbonyi-tso tsa loi nekyeosha shilya ngyekyegamba.”
43018038	Pilato kammbia, “Mbonyi tsa loi ny'kyikyi?” Pilato amṙeṙe na Yesu kawuya-se na ko Wayuda, kawawia, “Inyi ngyiwonyi ṙeko lyoose ko mndu-chu-pfo.
43018039	Kyaindi muichiwie inyi ngyimpfunguye mndu umwi kyiyeri kya Pasaka. Kyasia mukundi ngyimpfunguye Mangyi o Wayuda?”
43018040	Wakakalagatsa-se, wakagamba, “Chi ichu-pfo! Lukundi Baraba.” Na Baraba-cho nawei msokyi.
43019001	Kyasia Pilato kawia asikari wawute Yesu halya wandemkapa na ngowa.
43019002	Na asikari-wo wakaoka oṟo ya msha wakaṟika Yesu mṙoenyi kokye, wakamṟika na nguwo ya kyimaande-maande.
43019003	Wakayenda halya-ndu awekyeri, wechigamba, “Lokuiṟikyiṟa, Mangyi o Wayuda!” Wakamkapa ngofi.
43019004	Numa ya iho Pilato kafumia-se nja, kawawia, “Mndu-chu ngyimwende na konyu, muiṙime imanya kye inyi ngyiwonyi ṙeko lyoose kokye-pfo.”
43019005	Naaho-ng'u Yesu kafumia nja, aṟee oṟo iya ya msha, na nguwo iya ya kyimaande-maande. Pilato kawawia, “Lanyoe! Mndu ulya aichu iha!”
43019006	Kyasia wang'anyi walya wa makohanyi na waṟundi wawo kyiyeri walemmbona, walekalagatsa, wechigamba, “Mkapie msalabenyi! Mkapie msalabenyi!” Pilato kawawia, “Mṙuonyi nyoe, mundemkapia msalabenyi; cha kyipfa ngyiwonyi ṙeko kokye-pfo.”
43019007	Wayuda wakamgaluo, wakagamba, “Koṙu soe mndu o mbaṟe-i nawaṟi ipfa, cha kyipfa nalekuloṟa oe nyi Mono-Ruwa.”
43019008	Kyasia kyiyeri Pilato aleicho mbonyi-tso kaengyeṟa iowuo.
43019009	Kaiṙa-se na kulya numbenyi ya wuchilyi, kawia Yesu, “Iyoe nuwukyie kwi?” Kyaindi Yesu alemgaluo kyindo-pfo.
43019010	Kyasia Pilato kammbia, “Uiṙeṙa na inyi-pfoe? Uichi ngyiwoṙe wuiṙimi wo ikupfunguo hamwi na wuiṙimi wo ikukapia msalabenyi?”
43019011	Yesu kamgaluo, kagamba, “Iyoe uwechiwaṙa wuiṙimi woose wo ingyichilyia, kokooya Ruwa alawekuenengyie wuchilyi-wo-pfo. Koikyo icho angyiende na kopfo nawoṙe ṙeko lying'anyi kuta.”
43019012	Na wookyia kyiyeri-kyo Pilato kakunda impfunguo; kyaindi Wayuda wakakalagatsa, wechigamba, “Kopfunguo ichu, iyoe chi mbuya ya Kaisari-pfo. Orio mndu aikuloṟa cha ilyi oe nyi mangyi akyeri ura lo Kaisari-pfo.”
43019013	Kyasia kyiyeri Pilato aleicho mbonyi-tso, nalefumiṟia Yesu nja, kaṙamia kyiṙinyi kyakye kyeanduya, handu hawehaale magoe gang'anyi, hekyelago Gabata, ko mṙeṙie o Kyiebrania.
43019014	Na nyi-we mfiri o ikuṟeyeṟa ko mṟumoe o Pasaka, kyiyeri kya saa tsiṟandaaṟu tsa kyingoto. Kawawia, “Lanyoe, Wayuda. Aichu Mangyi onyu!”
43019015	Kyasia wakakalagatsa, wechigamba, “Mmbute iha! Mmbute iha! Mkapie msalabenyi!” Pilato kawawia, “Ngyesa mangyi onyu ngyimkapie msalabenyi!” Wang'anyi wa makohanyi wakamgaluo, wakammbia, “Soe luwoṙe mangi sile Kaisari-pfo.”
43019016	Kyasia Pilato kawaṙambika Yesu kundu nakapio msalabenyi; nawo wakamwambilyia.
43019017	Yesu kafuma, akuṙikyie msalaba okye, mṟasa handu hawekyelago, “Ipoṟong'u” ang'u kui mṙeṙie o Kyiebrania, Golyigota.
43019018	Wakamkapia msalabenyi ipfo Golyigota, hamwi na wandu wengyi wawi, umwi ura-lu na umwi ura-lu, na Yesu makyiṙi-gawi.
43019019	Na Pilato kaachikyia kyiṟeio, kakyiwikyia halya msalabenyi, kyigambie: “YESU O NASARETI, MANGYI O WAYUDA.”
43019020	Kyasia kyiṟeio-kyo kyilewono nyi wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kya Wayuda, kyipfa halya-ndu Yesu alekapio msalabenyi nyi-we kufuhi na mṟi; na kyiṟeio-kyo kyiwekyeri kui mṙeṙie iṟaṟu: Kyiebrania, Kyilatin na Kyikyiṟikyi.
43019021	Kyasia wang'anyi wa makohanyi na Wayuda wakawia Pilato, “Ulaṟeie ‘Mangyi o Wayuda’; ṟeia chandu alegamba ‘Inyi nyi mangyi o Wayuda.’ ”
43019022	Pilato kagaluo, kagamba, “Ngyeilacha kyilya ngamṟeie-pfo.”
43019023	Na asikari walya kyiyeri walekapia Yesu msalabenyi, waleira nguwo tsakye, wakatsigawa kaana, orio asikari ugawi lokye; na kanzu taa. Kyasia kanzu iya iwengyishone-pfo, iwengyilungye-lungye tupu wookyia wuye mṟasa wanda.
43019024	Kyasia wakawiana, “Lulairanduo, kyaindi luikapie kuṟu kuha, lumanye yechiwa ya wui. Kundu kyiṟeio kyiafukyie, kyilya kyigambie, ‘Walegawa nguwo tsako, na ikunya lyako walelyikapia kuṟu kuha.’ ” Nyi wuṙo asikari walya walewuta.
43019025	Na halya-ndu msalaba o Yesu uwekyeri hawegoṟokyi mama o Yesu na mono-wama o wamae, Maria, mka o Kyileopa, na Maria Makyidalena.
43019026	Kyasia kyiyeri Yesu alewona wamae, na manalosho ulya awemkundi agoṟokyi kufuhi, nalewia wamae, “Mama, mmbutie cha nyi mono-pfo.”
43019027	Numa ya iho kawia manalosho ulya, “Mmbutie cha nyi womoo.” Na wookyia kyiyeri kyilya manalosho ulya kamṙuo kanyi kokye.
43019028	Isho shoose shammbutikye, na Yesu aichi kye shoose shammbutika kundu kyiṟeio kyiafukyie, nalegamba, “Ngyiwoṙo nyi nyoṙa.”
43019029	Na halya hawewoṙe pakulyi iwoṙe mpfinyo uwetarang'ia. Kyasia wakawika mpfinyo ulya uwetarang'ia indonyi lyekyeongyia mṟinga wakalyiwikyia kyiṙinyi kyikyeri cha mtemu, wakawikyia Yesu ṙumbunyi kokye.
43019030	Yesu amwambilyie mpfinyo ulya uwetarang'ia na iunyo, nalegamba, “Kyammba chandu kyiwaṟi iwa.” Kaaramtsa mṙoe okye, kalekyia moo.
43019031	Kyasia Wayuda, kyipfa nyi mfiri o ikuṟeyeṟa lya mfiri o onyonya, na kundu mmbiu ilakae msalabenyi mfiri o onyonya, (cha kyipfa mfiri ulya o onyonya uweng'anyi), waleterewa Pilato maṙende ga Yesu na ga walya wawewakapie halya msalabenyi gafunjo-funjo, wawuto halya msalabenyi.
43019032	Kyasia asikari wakayenda, wakafunja maṙende ga wandu walya wawi wawewakapie msalabenyi hamwi na Yesu.
43019033	Kyaindi kyiyeri waleyenda halya-ndu Yesu awekyeri na iwona kye ampfa, walemfunja maṙende-pfo;
43019034	kyaindi asikari umwi nalemkapa pfumu uwarinyi kokye; na cha ilyi hakawuka samu na mṟinga.
43019035	(Na ulya alewona kaṟingyishia, na wuṟingyishi wokye nyi wo loi, na oe naichi kye nagamba loi kundu na nyoe muiṙime iiṙikyia).
43019036	Cha kyipfa isho shilewutika kundu kyiṟeio kyiafukyie, “Kuwoṙe fuo lyakye lyechifunjo-pfo.”
43019037	Lyingyi-se kyiṟeio kyingyi kyagamba, “Wechiwona ulya walemkapa pfumu.”
43019038	Isho shoose shammbutikye Yosefu awukyie Arimataya, na oe nyi manalosho o Yesu, (kyaindi kui kyiṟika, kyipfa kya iowuo Wayuda), naleterewa Pilato momu kundu nawute mmbiu o Yesu halya msalabenyi. Na Pilato kamwenenga momu. Kyasia kayenda, kawuta mbiu ulya halya msalabenyi.
43019039	Nikodemo na oe kayenda, (ulya alekoayenda ko Yesu mfiri ya numa), aṙuṙe cha shilo makumi gaṟaaṟu sha shindo shekyeshio shindonyi shingyi kundu shilanyamaṟikye.
43019040	Kyasia wakaṙuo mmbiu ulya o Yesu, wakauaṟahia sanda na iushia mafuṙa gekyepfaama necha, chandu Wayuda waweichiwie iwuta kyiyeri-kyo waiṟika mndu.
43019041	Na halya-ndu alekapio msalabenyi hawewoṙe bustanyi, na ipfo bustanyinyi kuwewoṙe kyilome kyihya, kyilawendeṟiko mndu.
43019042	Kyipfa Wayuda waweikuṟeyeṟa ko mfiri o onyonya, wakawika Yesu kulya kyilomenyi, kyipfa kyiwekyeri kufuhi.
43020001	Na mfiri o kuwooka o juma Maria Makyidalena naleyenda kulya kyilomenyi, ngamenyi utuko, kyiyeri kulandekye necha; kawona igoe lyilya lyilyiwute halya kyilomenyi.
43020002	Kyasia kayenda eṙicha, kashika ko Simion Petiro na ko manalosho ulya ungyi Yesu awemkundi, kawawia, “Wawuta Mndumii Yesu kulya kyilomenyi; maa luichi kundu wammbikyia-pfo.”
43020003	Petiro kafuma na manalosho ulya ungyi, wakayenda kulya kyilomenyi.
43020004	Wakayenda weṙicha woose wewawi; na manalosho ulya ungyi kaṙicha kuta Petiro, kawa o kuwooka ishika halya kyilomenyi.
43020005	Kaarama na iimemia kulya kyilomenyi, kawona pfo shiṙami shilya sha sanda; kyaindi aleiṙa napfo-pfo.
43020006	Kyasia Simion Petiro kacha numa yakye, kaiṙa na kulya kyilomenyi; kaambuya shiṙami shilya shiwekyeri pfo;
43020007	na kyitambaa kyilya kyiwekyeri mṙoenyi kokye kyiwekyeri handu hamwi na shiṙami shilya-pfo, indi kyiwekyiumbie-umbie haleshi.
43020008	Naaho manalosho ulya ungyi awekyeri o kuwooka ishika halya kyilomenyi na oe kawona na iiṙikyia.
43020009	Cha kyipfa walekowammanya kyiṟeio kyiwegambie kye Yesu nawaṟi iṟuka-pfo.
43020010	Kyasia wanalosho wakayenda-se kanyi kowo.
43020011	Kyaindi Maria nawegoṟokyi kufuhi na kyilome kyilya, ura lo nja, echilyia. Kyasia echilyia kuṙo, nalearama na iimemia kulya kyilomenyi.
43020012	Kawona malaika wawi, waṟee nguwo ngiilyi, waṙamie, umwi ura lo mṙoenyi na umwi ura lo maṙende lo halya-ndu mmbiu o Yesu uwemlaṟe.
43020013	Nawo wakammbia, “Nuilyilyia kyi?” Kawawia, “Kyipfa wawuta Mndumii oko iha; maa ngyiichi kundu wammbikyia-pfo.”
43020014	Na amgambe kuṙo, kainduka, kawona Yesu agoṟokyi, indi alamanye kye nyi Yesu.
43020015	Yesu kammbia, “Nulyilyia kyi? Nupfula wui?” Na Maria, akusaṟie kye nyi moambuya bustanyi, kammbia, “Mndumii, kokooya nyi iyoe ommbuta kunu kyilomenyi, ngyiwia nyi kwi ommbikyia, na inyi ngyechimmbuta pfo.”
43020016	Yesu kammbia, “Maria.” Oe kainduka, kammbia kui mṙeṙie o Kyiebrania “Raboni! Kyimwi na igamba, ‘Mlosha oko.’ ”
43020017	Yesu kammbia, “Ulangyipaaye, cha kyipfa ngyilandeṙo na ruwewu ko Awu-pfo. Kyaindi yenda ko wana wa wama wako uwawie ngyiiṙo na ruwewu ko Awu oko na oe nyi Awu onyu, ko Ruwa oko na oe nyi Ruwa onyu.”
43020018	Maria Makyidalena kayenda, kaongoya wanalosho mbonyi kagamba, “Ngawona Mndumii Yesu, na nyi oe angyiwia ishi ngyimuongoya.”
43020019	Kyukonyi, mfiri ulya o kuwooka o juma; na halya-ndu wanalosho wawekyeri moongo iwengyishingye kyipfa kya iowuo Wayuda, Yesu kacha kagoṟoka makyiṙi-gawi gawo, kawawia, “Ufoṟo lukae konyu.”
43020020	Na oe amgambe kuṙo, kawaloṟa mawoko gakye na uwari lokye. Kyasia wanalosho walya wakachihiyo kyiyeri walewona Mndumii Yesu.
43020021	Yesu kawawia-se “Ufoṟo lukae konyu. Chandu Awu alengyiṙuma inyi, na inyi ngyimṙuma nyoe.”
43020022	Na oe amgambe kuṙo, kawaumuya mṟufui, kawawia, “Ambilyienyi Mumuyo Mweele.
43020023	Mndu oose mochimhooṟia wunyamaṟi nechihooṟio loi; na ulya mulamhooṟia echihooṟio-pfo.”
43020024	Kyaindi umwi o walya ikumi na wawi Tomasi, awekyelago-se, (Wana wawafee wawi mfiri umwi) awekyeri na woṙoe kyiyeri Yesu alecha-pfo.
43020025	Kyasia wanalosho walya wengyi wakammbia, “Lowona Mndumii Yesu.” Kawawia, “Inyi ngyilandewone ngoru tsa msemaari mawokonyi kokye, na iwaṙa halya-ndu msemaari ilemtocha, na iwaṙa uwarinyi kokye halya-ndu pfumu lyilemtocha, ngyechiiṙikyia maa ale-pfo.”
43020026	Kyasia, hamwiṙe mfiri nyanya, wanalosho wakye wawekyeri-se numba, na Tomasi nawekyeri hamwi nawo. Yesu kacha, na moongo iwengyishingye. Kagoṟoka makyiṙi-gawi gawo, kagamba, “Ufoṟo lukae konyu.”
43020027	Numa ya iho kawia Tomasi, “Goṟuo kuwoko kopfo; ambuya mawoko gako, waṙa uwarinyi koko; molawe mndu alaiṙikyie, indi aiṙikyie.”
43020028	Tomasi kagaluo, kammbia, “Mndumii oko na Ruwa oko!”
43020029	Yesu kammbia, “Iyoe, kyipfa ongyiwona, noiṙikyia. Wagusu walya walawonyi kyaindi wakaiṙikyia.”
43020030	Kyasia kuwoṙe shiṟiyisho shingyi shifoi Yesu aleshiwuta mbele ya wanalosho wakye, shilashiṟeie kunu kyitapunyi.
43020031	Kyaindi ishi shileṟeio, kundu muiṙime iiṙikyia kye Yesu nyi oe Kristo, Mono-Ruwa; na kui iiṙikyia muwone moo o mlungana kui rina lyakye.
43021001	Numa ya isho Yesu nalekuṟingyishia-se ko wanalosho wakye, halya nduwenyi yekyelago Tiberia. Na oe nalekuṟingyishia kuṙi:
43021002	Simion Petiro, Tomasi awekyelago-se, (Wana wawafee wawi mfiri umwi), Natanaelyi awukyie Kana ya Galyilaya, wana wa Sebedayo, na wanalosho wengyi wawi, wawekyeri hamwi na oe.
43021003	Simion Petiro kawawia, “Ngyindeṙega makunga.” Nawo wakammbia, “Na soe lochiyenda hamwi na iyoe.” Kyasia wakafuma, wakaṙooya ngalawenyi; indi kyio kyilya walewaṙa ikunga maa lyimwi-pfo.
43021004	Na lyilya kulekya, Yesu nalegoṟoka mbai ya nduwa, kyaindi wanalosho walemanya kye nyi oe-pfo.
43021005	Kyasia Yesu kawawia, “Wana wako, muwoṙe kyindo kyelya?” Wakamgaluo, wakammbia, “Ote.”
43021006	Kawawia, “Wikyenyi iṟambika ipfo mṟingyenyi ura lo kulyoe lo ngalawa, na nyoe mochiwaṙa makunga.” Wakawuta chandu Yesu alegamba indi kyiyeri-kyo walaiṙime ilyikuruo-se kyipfa kya makunga gafoi.
43021007	Kyasia manalosho ulya Yesu awemkundi kawia Petiro, “Nyi Mndumii Yesu.” Na Simion Petiro, kyiyeri aleicho kye nyi Mndumii Yesu, kakuinewa mkoṟoṟi okye (kyipfa nawei kyiṟanguoe), kashoongyia kulya nduwenyi.
43021008	Na wanalosho walya wengyi wakacha wakyeri ngalawenyi ingyi, wakyeri cha meta magana gawi wamarise iambaṙa nduwa iya, nawo wechikuruo iṟambika lyilya lyiichuo makunga.
43021009	Kyasia kyiyeri waleshika mbai ya nduwa, walewuka kulya ngalawenyi, wakawona moṙo o makaa, na iho moṙonyi hawehawikyie makunga na mkate.
43021010	Yesu kawawia, “Endenyi na iha makunga maata mogawaṙa wulalu kuṙi.”
43021011	Kyasia Simion Petiro kaṙooya ngalawenyi, kakuruo iṟambika lyilya na handu hagaṙutsu, lyiichuo makunga gang'anyi, igana makumi gataanu na gaṟaaṟu; na maa chandu gawefoi kuṙo, iṟambika lyilya lyileranduka-pfo.
43021012	Yesu kawawia, “Nnjonyi mususuo.” Maa kuwoṙe mndu kyiiṙi kya wanalosho walya alekaria immbesa oe nyi wui-pfo; waichi kye nyi Mndumii Yesu.
43021013	Yesu kayenda kaira mkate, kawaenengyia, na makunga taa.
43021014	Koikyo kyikawa Yesu nawonekyia wanalosho wakye lya kaṟaaṟu numa ya iṟuka ko wapfu.
43021015	Kyasia wamlye, Yesu kawia Simion Petiro, “Simion mana o Yohane, ungyikundi kuta iwa?” Kammbia, “Yee, Mndumii, iyoe nuichi kye ngyikukundi.” Kammbia, “Ambuya shiondo shako.”
43021016	Kammbia-se lya kawi, “Simion mana o Yohane, ungyikundi?” Kammbia, “Iye, Mndumii, iyoe nuichi kye ngyikukundi.” Kammbia, “Lyisa moondo gako.”
43021017	Kammbia-se lya kaṟaaṟu, “Simion mana o Yohane, ungyikundi?” Kammbia, “Mndumii, iyoe nuichi shoose; iyoe nuichi kye ngyikukundi.” Yesu kammbia, “Ambuya moondo gako.”
43021018	Kagamba, “Ny'kyaloi, kakuwia, kyiyeri uwekyeri manakye, muwekyekuṟeyeṟa na iyenda kundu koose ukundi; kyaindi kyiyeri ochikuo, nochigoṟuo mawoko gapfo, na mndu ungyi nechikuwutia kyilya akunda na ikuṙuo kundu ulakundi.”
43021019	Kaonguo mbonyi-tso iloṟa nyi upfu lo mbaṟe iha Petiro echipfa naenengye Ruwa kyiṟumi. Na Yesu amwonguo isho, kawia Petiro, “Ngyiosha.”
43021020	Petiro kainduka kawona manalosho ulya awemkunde nyi Yesu echiwaosha (ulya alearamia Yesu kyiyeri kya ilya kyelya kya kyukonyi, kagamba, “Mndumii, nyi wui aikuṟiinga?”)
43021021	Kyasia Petiro, kawona manalosho-cho, kawia Yesu, “Mndumii, aa ichu nechiwutio kyi?”
43021022	Yesu kammbia, “Kokooya ngyikundi ichu nawaṙe moo mṟasa kyiyeri ngyechicha, kyikuwaṟi kyi iyoe? Iyoe ngyiosha.”
43021023	Kyasia mbonyi-tso tsikaṙunganana ko walya wawekyeosha Yesu kye manalosho ulya echipfa-pfo. Kyaindi Yesu alewawia kye echipfa-pfo indi nalegamba, “Kokooya ngyikundi ichu nawaṙe moo mṟasa kyiyeri ngyechicha, ikyo kyakuenenga kuṙa wukyiwa?”
43021024	Ichu nyi manalosho ulya aṟingyishia na iṟeia mbonyi-tsi; na soe luichi kye wuṟingyishi wokye nyi loi.
43021025	Kuwoṙe shindo shingyi shifoi Yesu alewuta, shilaleṟeio, kyipfa ngakusaṟa shiweṟeio shoose wuyana uwechiwaṙa handu hewikyia shitapu-sho shoose-pfo.
44001001	Tofilo Mkunde, kyitapu kyilya kya kuwooka ngyilekuṙikyia ngyileṟeia mbonyi tsa shindo shoose Yesu alewuta na ilosha.
44001002	Mṟasa mfiri ulya aleṙoso na wuye ruwewu, amloṟe kui Mumuyo Mweele wasu walya alewasambuṟa.
44001003	Walya alekuṟingyishia kowo, kui iwuta shindo shifoi, numa ya ilyiso wukyiwa, kye nai na moo; echiwawonekyia kyiyeri kya mfiri makumi gaana, na ionguo mbonyi tsa Wumangyi wo Ruwa.
44001004	Na kyiyeri awekyeri nawo kyisanzionyi nalewawia walawukye Yerusalemu, kyaindi waweṙelyie kyiteṟio kya Awu, kyiteṟio ngyilemuongoya mbonyi tsakyo;
44001005	kye Yohane nalepatisa kui mṟinga, indi nyoe mochipatiso kui Mumuyo Mweele numa ya mfiri-i ngyaangu.
44001006	Kyasia kyiyeri wawekyeri na Yesu kyisanzionyi, wakammbesa, “Ngyesa, Mndumii kyiyeri-kyi nyi lyo-ndu uiwiyiṟia Isiraelyi Wumangyi?”
44001007	Kawawia, “Chi iṟunda lyanyu imanya shiyeri Awu awikyie sile oe amonyi-pfo.
44001008	Kyaindi mochiambilyia pfinya, Mumuyo Mweele kamcha na konyu, na nyoe mochingyiṟingyishia Yerusalemu, na urukyenyi loose lo Wayuda, na Samaria, mṟasa matsitsionyi ga uruka.”
44001009	Amgambe isho, kyiyeri waweimwambuya kairo, ipuchi lyikammbuta mbele yawo.
44001010	Kyiyeri waweiitukuya ruwewu karii, kyiyeri aweiyenda, wandu wawi wakagoṟoka kufuhi nawo, waṟee nguwo tsa uwiṟo,
44001011	wakagamba, “Nyoe wandu wa Galyilaya, ny'kyilyi muiambuya ruwewu? Yesu-chu aṙoo iwuka konyu iyenda wuye ruwewu, newuya chandu mommbona echiyenda ruwewu.”
44001012	Numa ya iho wakawuya na Yerusalemu iwuka fumvu lyiwekyelago lya Mseituni, lyikyeri kufuhi na Yerusalemu, cha kyilometa kyimwi kuṙi.
44001013	Na lyilya waleshika Yerusalemu, wakaṙooya kai, kundu wawekyekaa: Petiro, Yohane, Yakobo, Anderea, Filyipo na Tomasi, Baritolomayo na Matayo, Yakobo o Alyifayo, Simion Selote, na Yuda o Yakobo.
44001014	Iwa woose wawei kyindo kyimwi kyiiṙi kya iterewa, hamwi na waka na Maria, wama o Yesu, na wana wa wamae.
44001015	Mfiri iya Petiro kagoṟoka kyiiṙi kya walya wawekyeosha Yesu (itala lyawo cha igana na makumi gawi),
44001016	kagamba, “Wana wa wama, kyiwewaṟi shiṟeio shiele shiafukyie, shiṟeio Mumuyo Mweele aleshionguo kui ṙumbu lya Dawidi, mbonyinyi tsa Yuda, alesongoya walya walewaṙa Yesu.
44001017	Cha kyipfa nawemtale hamwi na soe, kagawio iṟunda-lyi.
44001018	(Kyasia mndu-chu naleguṟa ṙema kui woguru wo iwuta wunyamaṟi; kaoloka kapasakana, maula gakye goose gakafumia nja.
44001019	Wandu woose wekyekaa Yerusalemu wakamanya mbonyi-tsi; mṟasa ṙema lyilya lyikalago kyikowo Akyelyidama, kyimwi na igamba, ṙema lya samu).
44001020	Cha kyipfa kulya kyitapunyi kya shiimbo kyikyiṟeie kye, ‘Kyiṟaṟo kyakye kyechiwaṙa kyindo-pfo, maa kochiwaṙa mndu echikaa ho-pfo.’ Lyingyi-se kyikyiṟeie, ‘Mndu ungyi naṙuo wuṟundi wokye.’ ”
44001021	“Kyasia kyiiṙi kya wandu waleoshana na soe kyiyeri kyoose Mndumii Yesu aweicha na iwuka koṙu,
44001022	iwookyia wupatiso wo Yohane, mṟasa mfiri ulya alewuto koṙu iyenda wuye ruwewu, kyiwaṟi umwi owo nawe mṟingyishi o iṟuka lyakye hamwi na soe.”
44001023	Wakawika wandu wawi: Yosefu, awekyelago Barisaba, awewoṙe rina lya kawi Yusto, na Matiya.
44001024	Numa ya iho wakaterewa, wakagamba, “Iyoe, Mndumii, uichi mrima ya wandu woose, luloṟe nyi wui omsambuṟa kyiiṙi kya iwa wawi,
44001025	nawe msu handu ha Yuda; kyipfa Yuda nalelekana na soe kayenda handu alewutikyio kyilya kyimmbaṟi.”
44001026	Wakakapa kuṟu kuha isambuṟa Yosefu na Matiya na Matiya kasambuṟo; na oe kawiko handu hamwi na wasu walya ikumi na umwi.
44002001	Na kyiyeri mfiri o Pentekoste uleafukyia wawekyeri woose handu hamwi.
44002002	Cha ilyi iwuka ruwewu kukocha ndiṟimo cha ndiṟimo tsa mkuma o pfinya, ukoichuṟa numba iya yoose waweṙamie.
44002003	Kukowaṙa ngyuulumi tsilekanyi-lekanyi, cha ngyuulumi tsa moṙo ukokaa mṙoenyi ko orio mndu awekyeri halya.
44002004	Woose wakaichuṟo nyi Mumuyo Mweele, wakawooka iṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie ingyi, chandu Mumuyo alewaenenga wuiṙimi.
44002005	Na kuwewoṙe Wayuda wawekyekaa Yerusalemu, wandu waiṙikyie na iowuo Ruwa, wandu wawukyie orio isanga lya kunu wuyanenyi.
44002006	Kyasia kyiyeri wuingyi wo wandu wawesanzie halya waleicho ndiṟimo tsilya, wakawoṙo nyi wuowu, cha kyipfa orio umwi naleicho weṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie okye.
44002007	Wakaṟiyio woose, wakawiana, “Lanyoe-ko, iwa woose waiṙeṙa chi wandu wa Galyilaya-pfoe?
44002008	Kyawa kuṙa soe iicho orio mndu mṙeṙie yaṙu lulefeo nayo?
44002009	Wapariti na Wamedi na Waelami, na walya wekyekaa Mesopotamia, Uyuda na Kapadokyia, Ponto na Asia,
44002010	Firikyia na Pamfilyia, Misiri na ngyuura tsa Lyibia kufuhi na Kyirene, na wayenu wawukyie Roma, Wayuda na walya wekyeindia Ruwa,
44002011	Wakyirete na Waarabu; luichuoe iwa wechionguo kui mṙeṙie yaṙu mawuto gang'anyi ga Ruwa.”
44002012	Wakaṟiyio woose, wakawoṙo nyi iwuṟa iiṙikyia, wakawiana, “Shindo-shi shaloṟa kyi?”
44002013	Wengyi wakanyeṟe, wechigamba “Wawananzi.”
44002014	Kyaindi Petiro kagoṟoka hamwi na wanalosho walya ikumi na umwi, kakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi, kawawia, “Nyoe wandu wa uruka lo Uyuda, na nyoe moose mokyekaa Yerusalemu, manyenyi mbonyi-tsi muaṙanyie maṙeṙo gako.
44002015	Chandu mukusaṟie chi wuṙo-pfo. Wandu-wa wawananzi-pfo, cha kyipfa nyi saa tsiṟaaṟu tsa kyingoto tikyi;
44002016	kyaindi mbonyi-tsi nyi tsilya tsilegambo nyi moonguo shisuku Yoelyi,
44002017	‘Mfiri yefurumia, Ruwa nagamba ngyechipusia wandu woose Mumuyo oko, na wana wanyu wa kyisoṟo na wa kyika wechionguo shisuku; na wanakye wanyu wechiwona shindo shilandeafukyie; na wandu waku wechiloṙo.
44002018	Yee, na mfiri-yo ngyechipusia waṟundi wako wa kyisoṟo na wa kyika Mumuyo oko, nawo wechionguo shisuku.
44002019	Na inyi ngyechiloṟa ṟigo wuye ruwewu, na shindo sheṟiyisha wuyanenyi, samu na moṙo, na ipuchi lya mtsu ufoi.
44002020	Mnengyeṟi ochiwa meema, na mori ochiwa samu, mfiri ulya o Mndumii ulacha, mfiri ung'anyi uichio na pata.
44002021	Na orio mndu echipfula Mndumii Ruwa nechikyiṟo.’ ”
44002022	“Nyoe wasoṟo wa Isiraelyi, aṙanyienyi mbonyi-tsi: Yesu awukyie Nasareti, mndu Ruwa alemloṟa konyu kui ṟigo na shindo sheṟiyisha, Ruwa aletsiwuta amonyi, chandu nyoe muichi.
44002023	Mndu-chu aleṙiko wuyanenyi chandu Ruwa alekunda amonyi, na chandu Ruwa aweṟeyeṟie wookyia kacha, kamṙambika konyu, nyoe mukomkapia msalabenyi, mukombaaga.
44002024	Ulya Ruwa alemṟutsa, kammbuta wukyiwenyi wo ipfa, cha kyipfa kyileiṙimika wukyiwa-wo wumpaaye-pfo.
44002025	Kyipfa Dawidi naonguo mbonyi tsakye, ‘Ngyilewona Mndumii mbele yako mfiri yoose cha kyipfa nakyeri ura loko lo kulyoe ngyilasunzukye.
44002026	Koikyo mrima oko ulechihiyo ulumi loko lukochihiyo; lyingyi-se mmbiu oko ukoweṙelyia.
44002027	Cha kyipfa echiṙa mrima oko ko wapfu-pfo; maa echiṙa mndu okye msimiri napuye kyilomenyi-pfo.
44002028	Nulengyiloṟa njia tsiendie moonyi o mlungana.’ ”
44002029	“Wasoṟo, wana wa wama wako, maa mulangyisuuye, ngyionguo mbele yanyu kulawoṙe wuowu mbonyi tsa awu oṙu, Dawidi, kye nalepfa kaṟiko, na kyilome kyakye kyikyeri koṙu mṟasa inu.
44002030	Kyasia kyipfa nyi moonguo shisuku, aichi kye Ruwa nalemwenenga kyaasa, kye kyisharinyi kokye kochiwuka mangyi.
44002031	Na oe chandu alesonguo iwona mbonyi-tsi, naleonguo mbonyi tsa iṟuka lya Yesu Kristo, kye mrima okye ochiṙio ko wapfu-pfo, maa mmbiu okye ochipuya kyilomenyi-pfo.
44002032	Yesu-cho Ruwa nalemṟutsa, na soe loose lui waṟingyishi.
44002033	Kyasia oe, kamṙoso mṟasa kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa, na iambilyia ko Awu kyaasa kyilya kya Mumuyo Mweele, napusuo kyindo-kyi mukyiwonyi na ikyiicho wulalu.
44002034	Kyipfa Dawidi aleṙo na ruwewu-pfo; indi oe nalegamba, ‘Ruwa nalewia Mndumii oko, ṙamia ura loko lo kulyoe,
44002035	mṟasa kyiyeri ngyechikuenenga wuiṙimi wo ichilyia washituwa wapfo.’ ”
44002036	“Kyasia wandu woose wa Isiraelyi wamanye na pata kye Ruwa naleenenga Yesu-cho walemkapia msalabenyi wuiṙimi wo iwa Mndumii na Kristo.”
44002037	Kyiyeri wandu walya waleicho mbonyi-tso, wakaiṟewe mrimenyi kowo, wakawia Petiro na wanalosho walya wengyi, “Luwute-kyi, wana wa wama waṙu?”
44002038	Petiro kawawia, “Ṙumbuyenyi iwuta sha wunyamaṟi, mupatiso orio umwi kui rina lya Yesu Kristo, muiṙime iambilyia ihooṟio lya ngyuunyamaṟi tsanyu, na nyoe mochiambilyia kyienengo kya Mumuyo Mweele.
44002039	Cha kyipfa kyaasa-kyi nyi kyipfa kyanyu, na ko wana wanyu, na ko walya wai kuleshi, na ko woose wechilago nyi Mndumii oṙu Ruwa wache na kokye.”
44002040	Kawaṟingyishia kui maṙeṙo gengyi gafoi mnu na iwaikyimbia, echigamba, “Kaenyi kuleshi na rika-lyi lyilekyeicho.”
44002041	Na walya waleicho malosho gakye na igaosha wakapatiso; na mfiri ulya wakaengyeṟika cha wandu shiku shiṟaaṟu.
44002042	Mfiri yoose wakaosha malosho ga wanalosho, wakyeri kyindo kyimwi shindonyi shoose, na kyiiṙi kya ilya mkate handu hamwi, na kyiiṙi kya iterewa.
44002043	Wanalosho wakawuta shindo shifoi sheṟiyisha na ṟigo, orio mndu kawoṙo nyi wuowu.
44002044	Na woose waweiṙikyie Yesu wawekyekaa handu hamwi, na iwuta shindo shoose wakyeri kyindo kyimwi,
44002045	wechikumba masaa gawo, na shindo shawo wawewoṙe, na igawia wandu woose orio mndu iṙuana na chandu awekundi.
44002046	Na orio mfiri wechiyenda hekalunyi handu hamwi, wechilya mkate numba kui numba, na ilya kyelya kyawo na sia na mrima iwoṙe ilekyia,
44002047	wechiṟumisha Ruwa, na ichihiṟa wandu woose. Mndumii kapfumbutsa siṟi orio mfiri ko walya waweikyiṟo.
44003001	Kyasia Petiro na Yohane waweiṙo wechiyenda hekalunyi kyiyeri kyeterewa Ruwa, cha saa kyenda.
44003002	Na mndu umwi awei kyileeta wookyia kyiyeri alefeo nawekyeendo nyi wandu wakammbikyia orio mfiri moongonyi o hekalu uwekyelago “Moongo Mcha,” kundu naterewe isaṟio nyi walya wawekyeiṙa na ipfo hekalunyi.
44003003	Mndu-cho kyiyeri alewona Petiro na Yohane wechiiṙa na hekalunyi naleterewa naenengo kyindo kyemsaṟia.
44003004	Na Petiro, kamwitukuya karii, hamwi na Yohane, kagamba, “Ambuya kunu.”
44003005	Kawaitukuya, alangyie wamwenengye kyindo.
44003006	Kyaindi Petiro kagamba, “Inyi ngyiwoṙe heleri, maa sahapu-pfo, indi kyilya ngyiwoṙe ny'kyo ngyikuenenga. Ko rina lya Yesu Kristo awukyie Nasareti, goṟoka uyende.”
44003007	Kammbaṙa kuwoko ko kulyoe, kamwira, na cha ilyi maṙende gakye gakawaṙa pfinya.
44003008	Kaamka faṟa kawooka iyenda, kaiṙa na hekalunyi hamwi nawo, kachumia echitoola-toola, na iṟumisha Ruwa.
44003009	Wandu woose wakammbona echumia na iṟumisha Ruwa.
44003010	Wakammanya, kye oe nyi ulya awekyeṙamia na iterewa shindo shemsaṟia halya moongonyi okyelago “Mcha;” wakaṟiyio mnu kyipfa kya shilya shilewutika kokye.
44003011	Kyasia kyiyeri aweinyaia Petiro na Yohane wandu woose wakakuumbia halya-ndu hawekyelago “Itala lya Solomon,” wechiṟiyio mnu.
44003012	Na kyiyeri Petiro alewona kuṙo kagaluo wandu walya, kawawia, “Nyoe wandu wa Isiraelyi ny'kyilyi muiṟiyio kyipfa kya shindo-shi? Ang'u ny'kyilyi muluitukuya cha ilyi nyi pfinya tsaṙu tsaenenga mndu-chu wuiṙimi wo ichumia? Maa achia kyipfa soe luiṙikyie Ruwa-pfo.
44003013	Ruwa o Abrahamu na o Isakyi na o Yakobo, Ruwa o waku waṙu, nang'anyisa mṟundi okye Yesu, ulya nyoe mulemṟiinga na imkana mbele ya Pilato, kyiyeri aleṙumbuo kye nalekyio.
44003014	Indi nyoe mulekana ulya Mweele, ulya alawoṙe tewe, mukokunda ienengo mmbaagi.
44003015	Mukowaaga ulya Ang'anyi o moo o mlungana, ulya Ruwa alemṟutsa ko wapfu; na soe nyi waṟingyishi wakye.
44003016	Na kui iiṙikyia rinenyi lyakye, rina lyakye lyaenenga pfinya mndu-chu mummbonyi na immanya; na iiṙikyia lyilya lyikyeri kokye nyilyo lyamwenenga moo-chu ulakyeri mti mbele yanyu nyoe moose.
44003017	“Kyasia wulalu, wana wa wama, ngyiichi kye mulewuta isho kyipfa mulaweichi, chandu na wasongoru wanyu walewuta.
44003018	Kyaindi shindo shilya Ruwa aleshionguo wookyia kacha kui maṙumbu ga weonguo shisuku woose, kye Kristo nechilyiso wukyiwa, naafutsia isho.
44003019	Kyasia ṙumbuyenyi wunyamaṟi, muwiyilyie Ruwa, kundu ngyuunyamaṟi tsanyu tsiwuto piu, kyiyeri kyilya kyewiyiṟio moo kyipfa kya Mndumii Yesu iṙiko koṙu kyiiṙime iafukyia.
44003020	Ruwa naiṙime iṙuma Yesu Kristo ulya muleṟeyeṟio wookyia kacha.
44003021	Ulya awaṟi ikaa ruwewu mṟasa kyiyeri shindo shoose shewa shihya, kyiyeri kyikyigambe nyi Ruwa kui ṙumbu lya weonguo shisuku waele wookyia mawookyionyi ga wuyana.
44003022	Cha kyipfa loi Mose nalegamba kye Mndumii onyu nechimuenenga moonguo shisuku iwuka ko wana wa wamanyu, cha inyi; mwaṙanyienyi shindonyi shoose echimuongoya.
44003023	Na kyechiwa kye orio mndu alechiaṙanyia moonguo shisuku-cho nechirumatso na iwiko kuleshi na wandu wakye.
44003024	Yee, na weonguo shisuku woose wookyia Samolyi na walya walecha numa yakye, woose waleṙeṙa, waleonguo mbonyi tsa mfiri-i.
44003025	Nyoe mowa wana wa weonguo shisuku na wa mma iya Ruwa alelya na waku wanyu, echiwia Abrahamu, ‘Kyisharinyi kyapfo, mbaṟe tsoose tsa wandu wa wuyana tsechiwikyio mboṟa.
44003026	Ruwa, amṟutse mṟundi okye Yesu, nalemṙuma konyu kuwooka, kundu nammbikyie mboṟa kui igalutsa orio umwi onyu nakae kuleshi na wuwicho wokye.’ ”
44004001	Na kyiyeri waweiṙeṙa na wandu walya, makohanyi na wachilyi wa hekalu na Masadukayo wakacha,
44004002	weiṟewe mrimenyi mnu cha kyipfa wailosha wandu na ionguo mbonyi tsa iṟutso lya wapfu kyiiṙi kya Yesu.
44004003	Wakawawaṙa, wakawawika kyipfungonyi mṟasa ngamenyi; cha kyipfa kulekokoila.
44004004	Kyaindi wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kya walya waleicho Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa waleiṙikyia; na itala lya wasoṟo lyikawa cha shiku shitaanu.
44004005	Na kyiyeri kulekya wasongoru na wameeku na walosha wa mawawaso ga Mose walesanzia Yerusalemu,
44004006	na Anasi Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, na Kayafa taa, na Yohane na Iskanda, na woose walya wawei wa kanyi ko Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose.
44004007	Kyiyeri walewawikyia makyiṙi-gawi, wakawawesa, “Nyi kui pfinya tsiha na nyi kui rina lya wui nyoe muiwuta ishi?”
44004008	Naaho Petiro, aichuo Mumuyo Mweele, kawawia, “Nyoe wasongoru wa wandu na wameeku wa Isiraelyi;
44004009	kokooya loweso inu mbonyi tsa kyindo kyicha mndu ulya mfafa alewutio, chandu alekyiṟo,
44004010	manyenyi moose na wandu woose wa Isiraelyi kye kui rina lya Yesu Kristo awukyie Nasareti, ulya nyoe mulemkapia msalabenyi, na Ruwa kamṟutsa ko wapfu, kui rina-lyo mndu-chu nagoṟoka mbele yanyu, awoṙe pfinya.
44004011	Oe nyi oe igoe lyilya lyilemino nyi wewika numba, ‘Nalyo lyawiko iwa igoe lying'anyi lya ndumbenyi.’ ”
44004012	“Maa kuwoṙe wukyiṟo kui mndu ungyi oose-pfo, cha kyipfa kuwoṙe rina lyingyi kunu wuyanenyi soe wandu luleenengo lyelukyiṟa-pfo.”
44004013	Kyasia kyiyeri walewona wuṟango na wukari wo Petiro na Yohane, na imanya kye nyi wandu walasomie, walaichi shindo shifoi, wakaṟiyio, wakamanya kye wawekyeri hamwi na Yesu.
44004014	Na wawonyi ulya alekyiṟo agoṟokyi hamwi nawo walewona kyindo kyegamba-pfo.
44004015	Wakawawia wawukye halya mengyenyi, wakachila wawenyi
44004016	wechigamba, “Luwutie kyi wandu-wa? Kyipfa kyikyeri na pata ko wandu woose wekyekaa Yerusalemu kye walewuta kyiṟiyisho kying'anyi, maa lochiiṙima ikana-pfo.
44004017	Kyaindi kundu mbonyi-tsi tsilamanyike ko wandu, luwaoweshe walaṙeṙe na mndu oose kui rina-lyi.”
44004018	Wakawalaga, wakawawia walaṙeṙe maa ale ang'u ilosha kui rina lya Yesu.
44004019	Petiro na Yohane wakawagaluo, wakawawia, “Kye nyi sungusinyi mbele ya Ruwa imuaṙanyia nyoe kuta Ruwa, ṙumbuonyi nyoe muwenyi,
44004020	kyipfa soe lochiiṙima iṙa ionguo shindo luleshiwona na ishiicho-pfo.”
44004021	Nawo kyiyeri walemarisa iwaowesha-se wakawapfunguo, walawone kyindo kyewaenenga iwakapa, kyipfa kya iowuo wandu, cha kyipfa wandu woose waweṟumisha Ruwa kyipfa kya isho shilewutika;
44004022	kyipfa mndu ulya alewutio kyiṟigyishio kya ikyiṟo nawewoṙe maka makumi gaana na ngoseṟa.
44004023	Na kyiyeri walelekyio, wakayenda ko wandu wawo, wakawaongoya mbonyi tsa shindo shoose walewio nyi wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wameeku.
44004024	Nawo kyiyeri waleicho wakawia Ruwa kui maṟui gang'anyi na kui mrima umwi, wechigamba, “Mndumii, iyoe nyi oe Ruwa Mopfinya. Nyi iyoe ulegumba ruwewu na uruka na mapalyipalyi na shoose shikyeri pfo.
44004025	Na iyoe nuleṙeṙa kui Mumuyo Mweele kui ṙumbu lya mku oṙu Dawidi, mṟundi opfo, ‘Ny'kyilyi wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa wailang'aa, na wandu waikusaṟa shiwicho?
44004026	Wamangyi wa wuyana wakuṟeyeṟie, na wasongoru waichila handu hamwi chandu wewingana na Ruwa na Kristo okye.’ ”
44004027	“Kyipfa nyi loi, Herode na Pontio Pilato hamwi na wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa na wandu wa Isiraelyi, walesanzia kunu mṟinyi, wechichila mbonyi tsa Mṟundi opfo mweele Yesu, ulemshumbuo,
44004028	kundu wawute shoose uwekundi shiwutikye wookyia kacha.
44004029	Kyasia wulalu, Mndumii, ambuya chandu waiowesha; uenengye waṟundi wapfo ionguo Ṙeṙo lyapfo kui wuṟango na wukari,
44004030	ochigoṟuo kuwoko kopfo ikyiṟa; ṟigo na shindo sheṟiyisha shiwutikye kui rina lya Mṟundi opfo mweele Yesu.”
44004031	Na wamterewe Ruwa, handu halya wawesanzie hakasunzo-sunzo, woose wakaichuo Mumuyo Mweele, wakaonguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa kui wuṟango na wukari.
44004032	Na wandu walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wawekyeri kyindo kyimwi; maa kuwoṙe maa umwi alegamba kye kyindo kyoose awoṙe nyi kyakye amonyi-pfo; indi shindo shoose waleikanana.
44004033	Na wasu wakaṟingyishia na pfinya iṟuka lya Yesu, nawo wakaenengo mboṟa tsifoi.
44004034	Maa kuwewoṙe mndu oose kyiiṙi kyawo alawewoṙe kyindo-pfo; cha kyipfa wandu woose wawewoṙe shigamba ang'u numba, walekumba, wakaende woguru wo shindo-sho shilekumbo,
44004035	wakaenengyia wasu walya; orio mndu kagawio chandu awekundi.
44004036	Na Yosefu, wasu wawekyemlaga Barinaba, (kyimwi na igamba Mana ekyewiyiṟia moo), Mlewi, mndu awukyie Kyipiro,
44004037	nawewoṙe ṙema kalyikumba, kaende heleri, katsienengyia wasu.
44005001	Kyaindi mndu umwi awekyelago Anania, hamwi na Safira, mka okye, nalekumba masaa,
44005002	kaṟika kyifunjoe kya woguru, na mka okye aichi mbonyi-tso kaende kyifunjoe kyilya kyiletsugaa kakyienengyia wasu.
44005003	Petiro kagamba, “Anania, ny'kyilyi Satana aichuṟa mrima opfo iwia Mumuyo Mweele wongo, na iṟika kyifunjoe kya woguru wulya wo ṙema?
44005004	Kyiyeri ṙema-lyo lyiwekyeri kopfo, lyiwekyeri lyapfo-pfoe? Na lyamkumbo, woguru wolyo chi nuweiṙima iwuta nawo chandu ukundi-pfoe? Kyawa kuṙa kowuta kyindo kya mbaṟe-i iyi? Chi nowia mndu wongo-pfo, indi Ruwa.”
44005005	Kyiyeri Anania aleicho mbonyi-tsi kaoloka wanda, kapfa. Kyiyeri wandu waleicho mbonyi-tsi wakawoṙo nyi wuowu wung'anyi.
44005006	Wanakye wakafuma, wakampfunga na sanda, wakamfumiṟia nja, wakamṟika.
44005007	Hamwiṙe cha saa tsiṟaaṟu, mka okye kacha, alaichi mbonyi tsiwemmbutika.
44005008	Petiro kammbia, “Ngyiwia, iwo nyiwo woguru wo ṙema-lyo?” Safira kagaluo, kagamba, “Yee, iwo nyiwo woguru wolyo.”
44005009	Petiro kammbia, “Kyawa kuṙa moiṙikyiana iyesha Mumuyo o Mndumii? Walya waṟika mii opfo nyi iho moongonyi wagoṟokyi, nawo wekuṙuo na iyoe taa.”
44005010	Cha ilyi Safira kaoloka wanda, kapfa. Wanakye walya wakaiṙa na numba wakakooya ampfa, wakamfumiṟia nja, wakamṟika hamwi na mii okye.
44005011	Siṟi yoose ikawoṙo nyi wuowu wung'anyi hamwi na wandu woose waleicho mbonyi-tso.
44005012	Na wasu wakawuta shindo shifoi sheṟiyisha hamwi na ṟigo; nawo woose wawewoṙe makusaṟo gamwi wechisanzia kulya italenyi lya Solomon;
44005013	na kyiiṙi kya wandu woose kuwoṙe maa mndu umwi alekaria ioshana na wasu-pfo; indi wandu walewaṟumisha.
44005014	Walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wakaengyeṟika, wasoṟo na waka;
44005015	na kyikawa kye wandu wawekyefumiṟia wandu waluoe mṟaṟunyi ung'anyi na iwawikyia majamvinyi na makondoṟonyi, kundu ilyi Petiro echicha, maa kyirinje kyakye kyipaaye umwi owo.
44005016	Na wuingyi wo wandu wa mṟi ikyeri mbai ya Yerusalemu wakasanza, wechiende wandu waluoe, na walya wawekyelyiso wukyiwa nyi waṟufui wawicho; nawo woose wakakyiṟo.
44005017	Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose kafuma na wandu woose wawekyeri hamwi na oe (iwo nyi walya wawekyechilyia hamwi na Masadukayo), wawoṙo nyi wunyenyi.
44005018	Wakawaṙa wasu walya wakawawika kyipfungonyi;
44005019	kyaindi malaika o Mndumii kyiyeri kya kyio kapfunguo moongo ya numba iya wawewapfungyie, kawawuta pfo, kagamba,
44005020	“Yendenyi mundegoṟoka hekalunyi muongoye wandu mbonyi tsoose tsa Moo-chu o mlungana.”
44005021	Nawo kyiyeri waleicho wakayenda hekalunyi ngamenyi utuko, wakawooka ilosha. Mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi kuta woose kacha na walya wawekyeri hamwi na oe, wakalaga wandu na mengyenyi, na wameeku woose na wana wa Isiraelyi, wakaṙuma wandu kulya kyipfungonyi kundu waende wasu walya.
44005022	Na kyiyeri waṟundi waleshika halya kyipfungonyi walewona wasu walya-pfo wakawuya wakaende mbonyi-tso,
44005023	wechigamba, “Numba iya yepfungyia wandu loikooya ingyishingye nakamwi, na waringyi wa numba-yo wagoṟokyi mbele ya moongo; kyaindi kyiyeri lopfunguo moongo-cho lulawone pfo mndu.”
44005024	Kyasia msongoru o asikari wekyeringa hekalu na wang'anyi wa makohanyi kyiyeri waleicho mbonyi-tso, walamanye kyewuta, kye mbonyi-tso tsechiwa kuṙa.
44005025	Mndu umwi kawawia, “Wandu walya mulewawika kyipfungonyi wakyeri hekalunyi, wailosha wandu.”
44005026	Naaho-ng'u msongoru ulya o asikari wekyeringa hekalu kayenda hamwi na waṟundi, wakawaende, kui iwalemba-lemba, cha kyipfa waleowuo wandu walachewakapa na magoe.
44005027	Kyiyeri walewaende wakawawikyia halya mengyenyi. Mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi kuta woose kawawesa, echigamba,
44005028	“Ngamba lulemuima ilosha kui rina-lyi lya Yesu? Kyaindi nyoe moichuṟa mṟi oose o Yerusalemu na malosho ganyu, na mukundi luwio kye nyi soe lulembaaga.”
44005029	Petiro na wasu woṙoe wakagaluo, wechigamba, “Kyiluwaṟi iindia Ruwa kuta wandu.
44005030	Ruwa o waku waṙu naleṟutsa Yesu, ulya nyoe mulembaaga na immanyika ikyiṙinyi.
44005031	Mndu-cho Ruwa nalemng'anyisa kui kuwoko kokye ko kulyoe, nawe Ang'anyi na Mkyiṟa naenengye wandu wa Isiraelyi iṙumbuya na ihooṟio wunyamaṟi.
44005032	Na soe lui waṟingyishi wa mbonyi-tsi, hamwi na Mumuyo Mweele ulya Ruwa aleenenga woose wekyemwindia.”
44005033	Kyiyeri waleicho mbonyi-tsi wakawoṙo nyi nyashi mrimenyi kowo, wakachila chandu wewaaga wasu walya.
44005034	Kyaindi mndu umwi, Mfarisayo, ekyelago Kamalyielyi, mlosha o uwawaso, awekyeindio nyi wandu woose, kagoṟoka halya mengyenyi, kagamba wasu waṙoo nja kyiyeri kyifuhi,
44005035	kawawia, “Nyoe wasoṟo wa Isiraelyi, owuoenyi iwutia wandu kyindo kyiwicho.
44005036	Cha kyipfa mfiri ya numa Teuda nalecha, echikuloṟa kye oe nyi mndu ang'anyi, cha wandu magana gaana wakakaa ura lokye; na oe nalewoogo na woose walemwiṙikyia, wakanyanyaṟika wakawa wulya.
44005037	Numa ya mndu-cho kulecha Yuda awukyie Galyilaya, mfiri iya yeṟeia wandu marina, kagaluo wandu wafoi wakamwosha, na oe taa kaṙeka na woose walemwiṙikyia wakanyanyaṟika.
44005038	Kyasia wulalu ngammbia, kaenyi kuleshi na wandu-wa; walekyienyi; cha kyipfa kokooya mbonyi-tsi ang'u iṟunda-lyi lyiwukyie ko wandu lyechinyamaṟika,
44005039	kyaindi kokooya lyiwukyie ko Ruwa mochiiṙima ilyinyamaṟa-pfo; mulachewono cha ilyi muiwingana na Ruwa.”
44005040	Wakaiṙikyia kyilya Kamalyielyi alegamba. Nawo kyiyeri walelaga wasu walya, wakawakapa, wakawawia walaloshe kui rina lya Yesu; na numa ya iho wakawalekyia.
44005041	Nawo wakawuka halya mengyenyi, wechihiyo cha kyipfa watalo kye wawaṟi isutso kyipfa kya Rina lya Yesu.
44005042	Na orio mfiri, hekalunyi na kanyi kowo, waleṙa ilosha na ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha tsa Yesu kye nyi Kristo-pfo.
44006001	Na mfiri iya wanalosho waweiengyeṟika, Wayuda wawekyeṙeṙa mṙeṙie o Wakyiṟikyi walenunuwa kyipfa kya Wayuda walya wawekyeṙeṙa Kyiebrania; na kyitewe kyenunuwa nyi kyipfa wakusu wawo walewaṙimika ienengo kyilya wawaṟi.
44006002	Walya ikumi na wawi wakalaga wandu woose waweiṙikyie Yesu, wakagamba, “Chi kyicha soe iṙa ionguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na ikuwinisha na heleri-pfo.
44006003	Kyasia, wana wa wama, sambuṟenyi wandu mfungaaṙe kyiiṙi kyanyu, wawaṟingyishie kye wai wecha, waichuo Mumuyo, wawoṙe wuṟango, kundu luwaṙambikye iṟunda-lyi lyeambuya heleri;
44006004	na soe luwaṙe iṟunda lyeterewa na ionguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.”
44006005	Kyindo-kyi wasu walegamba kyikachihiṟa woose wawesanzie halya. Wakasambuṟa Stefano, mndu aweichuo iiṙikyia na Mumuyo Mweele, Filyipo, Prokoro, Nikanori, Timoni, Parimena, na Nikolao, mndu aiṙikyie Ruwa, awukyie Antiokyia.
44006006	Wakawawikyia mbele ya wasu, na wamterewe wakawayekyia mawoko.
44006007	Mbonyi-tsi tsikaṙunganana orio handu; na itala lya wanalosho lyikaengyeṟika mnu kulya Yerusalemu; makohanyi wafoi wakaambilyia iiṙikyia.
44006008	Na Stefano, aichuo isaṟia na wuiṙimi, nawekyewuta shindo sha maṟiyisho na ṟigo tsing'anyi mbele ya wandu.
44006009	Kyaindi wandu waata wa sinagogi lyiwekyelago sinagogi lya “Wandu walawachilyie nyi kyindo,” na lya Wakyirene, na lya Waisikanderia, na lya walya wa Kyilyikyia na Asia, wakafuma na indegaluana na Stefano;
44006010	kyaindi waleiṙima iwingana na wuṟango na Mumuyo-cho aweṙeṙa na oe-pfo,
44006011	wakawia wandu wagambe, “Luleicho mndu-chu echiṙeṙa mbonyi tselahia Mose na Ruwa.”
44006012	Kui igamba kuṙo wakaende kyituṟu wandunyi na wameeku na walosha wa mawawaso. Wakayenda kokye, wakammbaṙa, wakamṙuo mengyenyi.
44006013	Wakapfula waṟingyishi wa wongo, walegamba, “Mndu-chu mfiri yoose nawekyeṙeṙa mbonyi tselahia hekalu na uwawaso;
44006014	kyipfa luleicho echigamba kye Yesu-cho awukyie Nasareti nechinyamaṟa hekalu na igaluo miichiwie Mose aleluenenga.”
44006015	Wandu woose waweṙamie halya mengyenyi wakamwitukuya karii, wakawona kyaam kyakye kyikyeri cha kyaam kya kya malaika.
44007001	Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose kagamba, “Ngyesa mbonyi-tsi nyi wuṙo tsikyeri?”
44007002	Na oe kagamba, “Wana wa wama wako na waawu wako, aṙanyienyi. Ruwa o kyiṟumi nalecha na ko awu oṙu Abrahamu, kyiyeri awekyeri uruka lo Mesopotamia, kyiyeri alandekae uruka lo Harani,
44007003	kammbia, ‘Wuka kunu urukyenyi kopfo na ko wandu wa kyishari kyapfo, uyende mṟasa uruka ngyechikuloṟa.’
44007004	Naaho-ng'u kawuka urukyenyi lo Wakalyidayo, kakaa Harani, kawuka pfo awuye ampfe, Ruwa kamsamiṟa mṟasa uruka-lu mukyeri nyoe wulalu.
44007005	Maa alemwenenga kyioṟa maa kya kyigamba kyitung'tu-pfo; kyaindi Ruwa nalewika kyaasa kyemwenenga, kyiwe wuchilyinyi wokye, na wa ushari lokye mfiri iweicha maa chandu alawewoṙe mana.
44007006	Ruwa kagamba kuṙo, kye wandu wa kyishari kya Abrahamu wechikaa urukyenyi lo wandu wengyi, nawo wewagaluo watumo wawo, na iwawutia shindo shewatuura kyiyeri kya maka magana gaana.
44007007	Na wandu wa isanga-lyo lyechimgaluo watumo ngyechiwaanduya, Ruwa nalegamba; na numa ya isho shoose wechiwuka, nawo wechingyiindia handu-ha.
44007008	Kamwenenga mma o iṙino. Kyasia Abrahamu kafee Isakyi, kamṙina mfiri o nyanya. Isakyi kafee Yakobo. Yakobo kafee walya ikumi na wawi, waku waṙu.
44007009	“Waku-wo waṙu walewoṙo nyi wunyenyi kyipfa kya Yosefu, wakamkumba nayende uruka lo Misiri. Ruwa kakaa hamwi na oe,
44007010	kammbuta wukyiwenyi wokye woose, kamwenenga isaṟia mbele ya Farao, mangyi o Misiri; na oe kamgaluo mchilyi o Misiri na o walya wa kanyi kokye.
44007011	Kyasia kukowaṙa njaa urukyenyi loose lo Misiri na Kanaan, na ngyuukyiwa tsifoi, maa waku waṙu walewona kyelya kyewashika-pfo.
44007012	Na kyiyeri Yakobo aleicho kye kulya Misiri kuwoṙe shelya, kaṙuma waku waṙu lya kuwooka.
44007013	Na lyilya alewaṙuma lya kawi Yosefu kawia wana wa wamae kye oe nyi samu yawo Farao kamanya na wa kyishari kya Yosefu.
44007014	Yosefu kaṙuma wandu wakalaga Yakobo awuye na wandu wa kyishari kyakye woose, wandu makumi mfungaaṙe na wataanu.
44007015	Kyasia Yakobo kasoka mṟasa Misiri, kapfa oe na waku waṙu;
44007016	wakaṙoo mṟasa Shekyemu wakaṟiko kulya kyilomenyi Abrahamu alekoakyiguṟa kui woguru wo heleri tsa wana wa Hamori, kulya Shekyemu.
44007017	“Kyasia kyiyeri kya kyaasa kyilya Ruwa aleenenga Abrahamu kyiwetikyirie kufuhi, wandu walya wakaengyeṟika mnu kulya Misiri.
44007018	Naaho mangyi ungyi alaichi Yosefu kawaṙa uruka kulya Misiri.
44007019	Icho kawutia wandu waṙu shindo sha ngyeṟo, na iwutia waku waṙu shindo shiwicho, echiwawia wawiyitse wana wawo wanangu, kundu walakae wuyanenyi.
44007020	Kyiyeri-kyo Mose kafeo, na oe nawewoṙe fana ngyicha mnu, kaembeṟo mori iṟaṟu kanyi ko awuye.
44007021	Na kyiyeri alewiyitso, mana o Farao o kyika kamṙuo, kammbutia cha mono-kye.
44007022	Mose kalosho mbonyi tsoose tsa Wamisiri, kawaṙa wuṟango wo maṙeṙo na mawuto.
44007023	Kyiyeri alewaṙa cha maka makumi gaana kaṙumbuo mrimenyi kokye indeiṟikyiṟa wana wa wamae, Waisiraelyi.
44007024	Kawona umwi echikapo kamkapania, kataaya kyiṟaache ulya aweionio, kakapa Mmisiri ulya kammbaaga.
