44007025	Mose nalekusaṟa kye wana wa wamae wawemanya kye Ruwa nechiwakyiṟa kui iiṙia Mose, kyaindi walemanya-pfo.
44007026	Mfiri ulya uleosha kakooya Waisiraelyi wawi waweiluyana, kakunda iwasanza, echigamba, ‘Lanyoe wandu! Nyoe chi wana wa mka? Ny'kyilyi muiluyana? ’
44007027	Kyaindi ulya aweikapa oṙoe kamicha Mose, echigamba, ‘Nyi wui alekuwika iyoe iwa ang'anyi oṙu na moṙumbuo moondu yaṙu?
44007028	Ngyesa nukundi ingyiwaaga inyi chandu ulewaaga Mmisiri ulya ukou?’
44007029	Mose kaṙicha kyipfa kya mbonyi-tsi, kakaa cha myenu urukyenyi lo Midian, kafee pfo wana wawi.
44007030	Na kyiyeri maka makumi gaana ileiṙa, malaika o Mndumii kacha na ko Mose moṙonyi uiaka nguṙunyi, kulya nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga ya fumvu lya Sinai.
44007031	Kyiyeri Mose alewona moṙo ulya, kaṟiyio kya shindo shilandeafukyie aweiloṟo, na kyiyeri aletikyira kufuhi kundu naambuye, ṟui lya Ruwa lyikammbia,
44007032	‘Inyi nyi Ruwa o waku wapfo, Ruwa o Abrahamu, na Ruwa o Isakyi, na Ruwa o Yakobo.’ Mose kaṙeṙema, alakarie iambuya.
44007033	Mndumii Ruwa kammbia, ‘Wuta shiaṙu ipfo maṙende kopfo, cha kyipfa handu-ha ugoṟokyi nyi teri ngyiele.
44007034	Loi ngawona matuuro ga wandu wako wakyeri Misiri. Ngaicho kyifiiṟo kyawo, na inyi ngasoka na kunu wuyanenyi ngyiwawute pfo. Kyasia wulalu, ngyechikuṙuma mṟasa Misiri.’
44007035	“Mose-cho walemlega, wechigamba, ‘Nyi wui alekuwika uwe ang'anyi na moṙumbuo moondu’, nyi oe aleṙumo nyi Ruwa iwa ang'anyi na mkyiṟa, kui iiṙia malaika ulya alecha na ko Mose kyiiṙi kya moṙo ulya.
44007036	Icho nyi oe alewawuta Misiri echiwuta shindo sheṟiyisha na ṟigo urukyenyi lo Misiri, na ipalyipalyinyi lya Shamu, na nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga kyiyeri kya maka makumi gaana.
44007037	Mose-cho nyi oe alewia Waisiraelyi, ‘Mndumii Ruwa onyu nechiwasambuṟia moonguo shisuku, kyiiṙi kya wana wa wamanyu, cha inyi; mwaṙanyienyi oe.’
44007038	Oe nyi oe awekyeri siṟinyi nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga hamwi na malaika ulya aleṙeṙa na oe fumvunyi lya Sinai. Lyingyi-se hamwi na waku waṙu; nyi oe aleambilyia mbonyi tsa moo o mlungana naluwie soe.
44007039	Mndu-cho waku waṙu walekunda imwindia-pfo, indi walemmichia kuleshi, wakalanga iwuya na Misiri.
44007040	Wakawia Aron, ‘Luachikyie waruwa wengyi, wechilusongoya; cha kyipfa Mose-cho, aleluwuta urukyenyi lo Misiri, luichi ny'kyikyi kyammbutikyia-pfo.’
44007041	Wakaachikyia ifano lya igache, wakalyiendie shienengo, wakachihiyo kyipfa kya maṟunda ga mawoko gawo.
44007042	Kyasia Ruwa kailacha makusaṟo, kawaṙa kundu waterewe na iindia nyenyeri tsa ruwewu, chandu kyikyiṟeie ipfo kyitapunyi kya weonguo shisuku, ‘Ngyesa mulengyiṙasia maka makumi gaana nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga nyoe wandu wa Isiraelyi?
44007043	Na nyoe mulekuṙika Hema lya ruwa ekyelago Molekyi, na ifano lya nyenyeri tsa ruwa onyu Refani, mafano muleachikyia na igaterewa na igaindia. Na inyi ngyechimusamiṟa muyende kuleshi na Babelyi.’ ”
44007044	“Hema lyilya lya wuṟingyishi lyiwekyeri hamwi na waku waṙu kulya nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga, chandu ulya aleṙeṙa na Mose alegamba kye naachikyie hema-lyo iṙuana na mfano ulya aleuwona.
44007045	Hema lyilya waku waṙu, kui ienengyiana, walelyiitsa hamwi na Yosua wuchilyinyi wo Masanga galya Ruwa alegafuna mbele ya waku waṙu, mṟasa kyiyeri kya Dawidi;
44007046	alewona isaṟia mbele ya Ruwa, na oe naleterewa naenengye Ruwa o Yakobo handu hekaa.
44007047	Kyaindi Solomon nalechemmbikyia numba.
44007048	Indi ulya ekyekaa wuye ruwewu ekyekaa numbenyi tsingyiwikye kui mawoko-pfo; chandu moonguo shisuku agambie,
44007049	‘Ruwewu nyi kyitima kyako kya wuchilyi na uruka nyi handu heyekyia maṙende gako; nyi numba iha mochiwika nyoe kyipfa kyako?’ Ruwa nagamba,
44007050	‘Ang'u nyi hanga ngyechikaa ngyichihiyo? Chi inyi ngyilewuta ishi shoose-pfoe?’ ”
44007051	“Nyoe shichoi, mulawaṙine mrima maa maṙwi ganyu. Mfiri yoose mulelega Mumuyo Mweele; chandu waku wanyu walewuta, na nyoe nyi wuṙo.
44007052	Nyi wui kyiiṙi kya weonguo shisuku waku wanyu walalempfulutsa nyashi? Wo walewaaga walya waleṙumo nyi Ruwa ionguo mbonyi tsa icha lya ulya Msumganyi; ulya nyoe wulalu mowa waṟiingyi wakye, mukommbaaga.
44007053	Nyoe muleambilyia uwawaso-lo luleendo na konyu nyi malaika kyaindi mukomina.”
44007054	Kyasia kyiyeri wandu wawei halya mengyenyi waleicho shilya Stefano alegamba, wakawoṙo nyi nyashi mrimenyi, wakasuo mnu kyipfa kyakye.
44007055	Kyaindi oe aichuo Mumuyo Mweele, kaambuo karii, eambuya ruwewu, kawona mng'ano o Ruwa, na Yesu agoṟokyi ura lo kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa.
44007056	Kagamba, “Ngyiwonyi ruwewu iṟuukyie, na Mono-Adamu nagoṟokyi kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa.”
44007057	Wakakalagatsa na ṟui lying'anyi, wakapfinyika maṙwi gawo, wakamshoongyia woose piu,
44007058	wakamṙuo nja ya mṟi, wakamkapa na magoe. Na waṟingyishi wakawikyia nguwo tsakye maṙendenyi ga manakye umwi awekyelago Saulyi.
44007059	Wakakapa Stefano na magoe, na oe eterewa, kagamba, “Mndumii Yesu, ambilyia mrima oko.”
44007060	Kapfiria ndi, kafiiṟa na ṟui lying'anyi, echigamba, “Mndumii ulawatalyie wunyamaṟi-wu.” Amgambe kuṙo kalekyia moo. Na Saulyi nawewonyi kye iwoogo lyakye nyi necha.
44008001	Mfiri ulya kukowaṙa wukyiwa wung'anyi kulya siṟinyi ya Yerusalemu. Wandu woose wa siṟi wakanyanyaṟika urukyenyi lo Uyuda na Samaria, kyaindi wasu walenyanyaṟika-pfo.
44008002	Wandu waweiṙikyie Ruwa wakaṟika Stefano, wakakapa ṟanyi ing'anyi mnu kyipfa kyakye.
44008003	Saulyi kapfuṟukana irumatsa Siṟi, echiyenda numba kui numba kawaṙa wasoṟo na waka na iwawika kyipfungonyi.
44008004	Kyaindi wandu walya wa siṟi walenyanyaṟika wakayenda ipfo na ipfo wechionguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
44008005	Filyipo kasoka kaiṙa na mṟinyi o Samaria kaonguo mbonyi tsa Kristo.
44008006	Na wuingyi wo wandu wawesanzie halya wakyeri kyindo kyimwi wakaaṙanyia mbonyi tsilya Filyipo alelosha kyiyeri waletsiicho na iwona shiṟiyisho alewuta.
44008007	Cha kyipfa waṟufui wawicho walewuka wandu wafoi, wechilyia na ṟui lying'anyi; na wandu wafoi wawepfiie ngapfu, na shileeta, wakakyiṟo.
44008008	Kukowaṙa sia ing'anyi kulya mṟinyi.
44008009	Na kuwewoṙe mndu umwi, ekyelago Simion, mndu mfiri ya numa awei msawi, echiṟiyisha wandu wa uruka lo Samaria, kui igamba kye oe nyi mndu ang'anyi.
44008010	Wandu woose wakaaṙanyia Simion, wookyia mtutu mṟasa ang'anyi, wechigamba, “Ichu nyi wuiṙimi wo Ruwa, wokyelago ‘Wuiṙimi Wung'anyi.’ ”
44008011	Wakamwaṙanyia, cha kyipfa kyiyeri kyileshi naleṟiyisha wandu kui wusawi wokye.
44008012	Kyaindi kyiyeri waleiṙikyia Filyipo, echionguo mbonyi ngyicha tsa Wumangyi wo Ruwa, na rina lya Yesu Kristo, wakapatiso, wasoṟo na waka.
44008013	Na Simion kaiṙikyia kapatiso, kawaṙana tapu na Filyipo; kaṟiyio kyiyeri alewona ṟigo na shindo shing'anyi sheṟiyisha shiweiwutika.
44008014	Na wasu wawekyeri Yerusalemu; kyiyeri waleicho kye wandu wa Samaria waambilyia Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa, wakaṙuma Petiro na Yohane.
44008015	Na kyiyeri waleyenda, wakaterewia walya waweiṙikyie wuiṙimi wo iambilyia Mumuyo Mweele;
44008016	cha kyipfa kuwoṙe maa umwi alekoamwambilyia Mumuyo Mweele-pfo. Wawewapatise tupu kui rina lya Mndumii Yesu.
44008017	Naaho-ng'u wakawayekyia mawoko, nawo wakaambilyia Mumuyo Mweele.
44008018	Na kyiyeri Simion alewona kye wandu waienengo Mumuyo Mweele kui iyekyio mawoko na wasu, kakunda ienenga wasu heleri, echigamba,
44008019	“Ngyienengyenyi wuiṙimi-wu, kundu orio mndu ngyechimyekyia mawoko gako, naambilyie Mumuyo Mweele.”
44008020	Kyaindi Petiro kammbia, “Heleri tsapfo tsiṙekye kulu hamwi na iyoe, cha kyipfa nokusaṟa kye masaa geiṙima ikuendie kyienengo kya Ruwa.
44008021	Uwoṙe ṙombo kyienengonyi kya ienenga wandu Mumuyo Mweele-pfo cha kyipfa mbele ya Ruwa mrima opfo uwoṙe wunyamaṟi.
44008022	Kyasia ṙumbuya wunyamaṟi-wu wopfo, uterewe Mndumii, kundu uhooṟio makusaṟo-ga mawicho uwoṙe mrimenyi kopfo.
44008023	Cha kyipfa ngyikuwonyi nuwoṙe wunyenyi wukuenenga iwawio ipfo mrimenyi cha nduu; na lyingyi-se kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi nui cha mndu akyeri kyipfungonyi.”
44008024	Simion kagaluo kagamba, “Ngyiterewienyi ko Mndumii, shindo-shi mogamba shilachengyiwutikyia maa kyimwi.”
44008025	Na wasu wamṟingyishie na ionguo Ṙeṙo lya Mndumii wakawuya na Yerusalemu, wechionguo Ndumi Ngyicha shikaṟonyi shifoi sha Wasamaria.
44008026	Malaika o Mndumii kaṙeṙa na Filyipo, kammbia, “Fuma uyende ura lo kyaseri mṟasa njia iya isokyie iwuka Yerusalemu mṟasa Gaza, nayo nyi nuka ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga.”
44008027	Na oe kafuma, kayenda. Cha ilyi kawona mndu awukyie uruka lo Kushi, awoṙe wuchilyi wanda ya Kandakye, Mangyi o kyika o Kushi, ammbikye iambuya heleri tsoose. Na oe naleyenda Yerusalemu indeterewa Ruwa.
44008028	Kawa naiwuya na kanyi, aṙamie ikarinyi lyakye esoma kyitapu kya moonguo shisuku Yesaya.
44008029	Mumuyo Mweele kawia Filyipo, “Tikyira kufuhi na ikari-lyi, uwaṙane nalyo.”
44008030	Kyasia Filyipo kayenda eṙicha, kaicho mndu ulya o Kushi esoma kyitapu kya moonguo shisuku Yesaya; kammbesa, “Ngyesa numanya isho uisoma?”
44008031	Kagamba, “Ngyeiṙima kuṙa imanya mndu alandengyiloṟe?” Katerewa Filyipo naṙooye kulya ikarinyi na iṙamia hamwi na oe.
44008032	Na kyifunjoe kya shiṟeio shiele aweisoma nyi ikyi: “Naleṙoo handu heshinjia cha ondo, na chandu ondo lyekyetsia sau mbele ya ulya ailyiṙumbuo mberi, na wuṙo oe alaiṙeṙa kyindo.
44008033	Kyipfa kya ikutitiṟa aleanduyo-pfo. Nyi wui echiongoya wa kyishari kyakye? Kyipfa moo okye wuyanenyi ommbuto.”
44008034	Mndu ulya o Kushi kagaluo Filyipo, kammbia, “Ngyikuterewa ungyiwie, moonguo shisuku-chu naionguo mbonyi tsa wui; nyi mbonyi tsakye ang'u tsa mndu ungyi?”
44008035	Filyipo kamwongoya mbonyi ngyicha tsa Yesu Kristo, echiwooka na kyiṟeio kyilya kyilya mndu ulya o Kushi aweisoma.
44008036	Wakaengyeṟa iyenda, wakashika handu hawoṙe mṟinga. Mndu ulya o Kushi kagamba, “Kyeambuya mṟinga-chu; ny'kyikyi kyingyishingyia ngyilapatiso?”
44008037	Filyipo kagamba, “Koiṙikyia kui mrima opfo oose, kyechiiṙimika.” Kagaluo, kagamba, “Ngaiṙikyia kye Yesu Kristo nyi oe Mana o Ruwa.”
44008038	Kagamba ikari lyilya lyitirimisho; wakasokyia woose wewawi mṟingyenyi na oe kapatiso.
44008039	Numa ya iho, kyiyeri walewuka kulya mṟingyenyi, Mumuyo o Mndumii Ruwa karakuo Filyipo; mndu ulya o Kushi alammbone-se. Kayenda kanyi amchihiye.
44008040	Kyaindi Filyipo kawono urukyenyi lo Asoto, na kyiyeri aweiiṙa kaonguo Ndumi Ngyicha mṟi yoose, mṟasa kashika Kaisaria.
44009001	Kyaindi Saulyi, kaengyeṟa iowesha na ikusaṟa iwaaga wanalosho wa Mndumii Yesu. Kayenda ko Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose,
44009002	katerewa naenengo paruo tsa iyenda Dameskyi, tsingyiṙikye ko walya wawekyesongoya masinagogi, kundu kawona wandu walya wawekyeosha Mndumii Yesu, wasoṟo na waka, nawapfungye na iwaende na Yerusalemu.
44009003	Na kyiyeri awei kyaronyi, kyikawa nakyeri kufuhi na Dameskyi. Cha ilyi ngyeela iwukyie ruwewu ikamlyimika ngyuura tsoose.
44009004	Kaoloka wanda, kaicho ṟui lyechimmbia, “Saulyi, Saulyi, ny'kyilyi ungyilyisa wukyiwa?”
44009005	Kagamba, “Nyi wui iyoe, Mndumii?” Na oe kagamba, “Inyi nyi Yesu ungyilyisa wukyiwa.
44009006	Kyaindi goṟoka, uiṙe na mṟinyi, na iyoe nochiwio shikuwaṟi iwuta.”
44009007	Na wandu walya wawei kyaro hamwi na oe wakagoṟoka watsie sau, wechiicho ṟui, walawone mndu.
44009008	Saulyi kaamka halya wanda, na kyiyeri meso gakye galepfunguka, alewona kyindo-pfo. Wakammbaṙa kuwoko wakamwende mṟasa Dameskyi.
44009009	Alawone kyiyeri kya mfiri iṟaṟu; alailya maa inyo kyindo.
44009010	Kyasia kulya Dameskyi kuwewoṙe manalosho ekyelago Anania. Mndumii kamlaga akyeri cha mndu ailoṙo. Anania kaiṙikyia kagamba, “Nyi iha ngyikyeri, Mndumii.”
44009011	Mndumii kammbia, “Amka, yenda kulya mṟaṟunyi okyelago ‘Mṟaṟu Mgoṟotsu’ undewesa numbenyi ko Yuda mndu ekyelago Saulyi awukyie Tariso; cha kyipfa mndu-cho naiterewa.
44009012	Na oe ammbona mndu ekyelago Anania echicha, na imyekyia mawoko, naiṙime iwona-se.”
44009013	Kyaindi Anania kagaluo, kagamba, “Mndumii, ngyilemwicho mbonyi tsa mndu-chu ko wandu wafoi, kye alemmbutia wandu walya wapfo wakyeri Yerusalemu shindo shiwicho mnu.
44009014	Maa wulalu nawoṙe momu amwenengye nyi wang'anyi wa makohanyi napfungye wandu woose wekyeterewa kui rina lyapfo.”
44009015	Kyaindi Mndumii kammbia, “Yenda tupu; cha kyipfa mndu-chu nyi kyindo kyako kyikyisaangye, naonguo mbonyi tsako ko walya walangyiiṙikyie, na ko wamangyi, na ko wandu wa Isiraelyi.
44009016	Kyipfa ngyechimloṟa chandu echilyiso ngyuukyiwa tsifoi kyipfa kya iongoya wandu wengyi mbonyi tsako kundu wangyimanye.”
44009017	Anania kafuma, kaiṙa na kulya numbenyi Saulyi awekyeri, kamyekyia mawoko echigamba, “Mono-wama, Saulyi, Mndumii nangyiṙuma, Yesu ulya alecha na kopfo ukyeri njienyi icha na kunu Dameskyi, uiṙime iwona-se, uichuṟo Mumuyo Mweele.”
44009018	Cha ilyi shindo shikyeri cha masuoe shikaoloka mesonyi gakye, kaiṙima iwona.
44009019	Kagoṟoka kapatiso; kalya kyelya, kawaṙa pfinya. Kakaa kulya Dameskyi mfiri ngyaangu, hamwi na wanalosho wawekyeri pfo.
44009020	Saulyi akyeri kulya Dameskyi kaonguo mbonyi masinagoginyi, kye Yesu nyi Mana o Ruwa.
44009021	Na wandu woose waleicho wakaṟiyio, wakagamba, “Ichu chi ulya awekyelyisa wukyiwa walya wawekyeterewa kui rina lya Yesu kulya Yerusalemu-pfoe? Na alecha na kunu Dameskyi awoṙe makusaṟo igo igo, nawapfungye na iwaṙuo ko wang'anyi-pfoe?”
44009022	Saulyi kaengyeṟa iwaṙa pfinya kyiiṙi kya ionguo mbonyi tsa Yesu, kaowesha Wayuda wawekyekaa Dameskyi, echiloṟa na pata kye ulya aweionguo mbonyi tsakye nyi oe Kristo.
44009023	Na mfiri ifoi yamuiṙe, Wayuda wakachila chandu wembaaga;
44009024	kyaindi ngyeṟo tsawo Saulyi katsimanya. Wakamwotia kyingoto na kyio kundu waiṙime immbaaga.
44009025	Wanalosho wakye wakammbika mkunjenyi kyio na imsotsia wanda wechimwitsa dirishenyi.
44009026	Na kyiyeri Saulyi aleshika Yerusalemu, nalepfuṟukana ikulunga na wanalosho, nawo wawemwowuye woose walaiṙikyie kye oe nyi manalosho.
44009027	Kyaindi Barinaba kaṙuo Saulyi ko wasu, kawawia chandu alewona Mndumii Yesu njienyi, na kye naleṙeṙa na oe, na chandu aleonguo mbonyi ngyicha tsa Yesu kulya Dameskyi kui wuṟango na wukari.
44009028	Na Saulyi kakaa hamwi na wasu kulya Yerusalemu echioshana nawo kyiiṙi kya shoose waweiwuta.
44009029	Kaonguo mbonyi tsa Mndumii Yesu kui wukari, echiṙeṙa na igaluana na Wayuda wawekyeṙeṙa mṙeṙie o Kyikyiṟikyi. Nawo wakatambagana immbaaga.
44009030	Kyaindi kyiyeri walya waweiṙikyie Yesu walemanya mbonyi-tsi wakamṙuo Kaisaria, wakamṙuo nayende Tariso.
44009031	Kyasia Siṟi ikawona sia urukyenyi lo Uyuda na Galyilaya na Samaria. Siṟi ikawaṙa pfinya, ikaengyeṟika, yechiindia Mndumii Yesu na iwiyiṟio moo nyi Mumuyo Mweele.
44009032	Na kyiyeri Petiro aweitenga-tenga ngyuura tsoose kayenda ko wandu wa Ruwa wawekyekaa Lyida.
44009033	Kawona mndu umwi kulya, awekyelago Ainea. Mndu-cho nawelee kyitaṟenyi kyiyeri kya maka nyanya; kyipfa nawepfiie ngapfu ura lumwi.
44009034	Petiro kammbia, “Ainea, Yesu Kristo amkukyiṟa. Amka, uale kyitaṟa kyapfo.” Cha ilyi kaamka.
44009035	Na wandu woose wawekyekaa Lyida na Sharoni wakammbona, wakaiṙikyia Mndumii Yesu na imwosha.
44009036	Na kulya Yafa kuwewoṙe manalosho umwi ekyelago Tabita (kyimwi na igamba Dorikasi ang'u moṟinyi). Mndu mka-chu nawewoṙe mawuto mecha na ienengyia shienengo shetarama wakyiwa.
44009037	Kyiyeri kyilya Tabita kaluo, kapfa; na wamumsanje, wakamṙuo kai.
44009038	Na kyipfa mṟi o Lyida uwekyeri kufuhi na Yafa, na wanalosho waleicho kye Petiro nakyeri pfo, wakaṙuma wandu wawi kokye, imterewa wechigamba, “Ulakyelyio icha na koṙu.”
44009039	Petiro kafuma kaoshana nawo. Kyiyeri aleafukyia, wakamṙuo kulya kai; wakusu woose wakagoṟoka kufuhi na oe, welyia na imloṟa kanzu na nguwo tsilya Dorikasi alepfuma kyiyeri kyilya awekyeri hamwi nawo.
44009040	Petiro kawawia woose wafumie nja, kapfiria ndi, katerewa, numa ya iho kapaaya mnying'a ulya o Dorikasi, kagamba, “Tabita, amka.” Dorikasi ulya awepfiie kaambuo, kawona Petiro, kaamka, kaṙamia.
44009041	Petiro kalesha kuwoko, kamwira. Na amlage wandu walya wa Ruwa na wakusu kawikyia Dorikasi mbele yawo, ai na moo.
44009042	Mbonyi-tsi tsikaṙunganana ko wandu woose wa mṟi o Yafa; wandu wafoi wakaiṙikyia Yesu.
44009043	Kyasia Petiro kakaa mfiri ngyaangu kulya Yafa, kanyi ko mndu umwi ekyelago Simion, awekyeachikyia njonyi.
44010001	Kulya Kaisaria kuwewoṙe mndu awekyelago Korinelyio, mchilyi o ulyimalyi lokyelago “Kyiitalyia.”
44010002	Mndu aowuye na ikunda Ruwa, oe na wandu woose wa kanyi kokye, na oe nawekyeenengyia shienengo shifoi shesaṟia wandu, na nawekyeterewa Ruwa mfiri yoose.
44010003	Kawona na pata malaika o Ruwa akyeri cha mndu ailoṙo, cha saa kyenda tsa kyingoto, malaika o Ruwa echicha na kokye na immbia, “Korinelyio!”
44010004	Kamwitukuya mnu, kaowuo, kagamba, “Ny'kyikyi kyacha pfo, Mndumii?” Kammbia, “Ruwa naicho shiterewo shapfo na mawuto gapfo mecha gesaṟia wandu na wulalu naigaluo shilya okyemterewa.
44010005	Kyasia, wulalu ṙuo wandu Yafa, undelaga Simion, ekyelago Petiro.
44010006	Oe nyi myenu o mndu umwi, ekyelago Simion, ekyeachikyia njonyi, ulya numba yakye ikyeri mbai ya ipalyipalyi; nekuwia shindo shikuwaṟi iwuta.”
44010007	Na malaika ulya aleṙeṙa na oe amyende, Korinelyio kalaga waṟundi wawi kyiiṙi kya waṟundi wakye wa kanyi, na asikari umwi, mndu aowuye na ikunda Ruwa kyiiṙi kya walya wawekyemṟundia mfiri yoose;
44010008	na amwawie chandu shindo shoose shechiwa kawaṙuma iyenda Yafa.
44010009	Na ilya-ngama, kyiyeri wawei kyaronyi na ishika kufuhi na mṟi, Petiro naleṙooya kai indeterewa, cha saa tsiṟandaaṟu tsa kyingoto.
44010010	Kawoṙo nyi njaa, kakunda ilya; kyaindi kyiyeri waweiṟeyeṟa kyelya, kaloṟo kyindo akyeri cha mndu ailoṙo.
44010011	Kawona ngyina yeṟuguka, na kyindo kyikyeri cha nguwo ngyilandari kyesoka, kyikasotso mṟasa wuyanenyi kyii cha ilyi kyikyiwaṙe ngyuura tsoose tsiina.
44010012	Ipfo kyindonyi kyilesotso kuwewoṙe orio indo lya saka lyiwoṙe maṙende gaana, na mando ga saka gekyekukuruo na ndewu, na shileye sha ngyinenyi.
44010013	Numa ya iho kaicho ṟui lyigamba, “Amka, Petiro, ushinje ulye.”
44010014	Kyaindi Petiro kagamba, “Maa ale, Mndumii, cha kyipfa ngyilandelye kyindo kyoose kyilawaṟi na kyifanyi kyimṟumoe-pfo.”
44010015	Kaicho ṟui lya kawi, lyemmbia, “Molakusaṟe kye kuwoṙe kyindo kyilawaṟi ilyio kokooya Ruwa nagambie shoose shiwaṟi ilyio.”
44010016	Kyindo-kyi kyikawutika kaṟaaṟu. Numa ya iho kyindo kyilya kyilekokyasoka ruwewu kyikawuya napfo.
44010017	Na kyiyeri Petiro awemṟiyie mrimenyi kokye, echikuwesa shindo shilya aleloṟo akyeri cha mndu ailoṙo shiwemmbia kyi, wandu walya Korinelyio alewaṙuma, wammbese mbonyi tsa numba ya Simion, wakagoṟoka mbele ya moongo,
44010018	wakalaga; wakawesa kokooya Simion ekyelago Petiro nekyekaa pfo.
44010019	Na Petiro naweikusaṟa mbonyi tsa shindo shilya alekoaloṟo akyeri cha mndu ailoṙo. Mumuyo kammbia, “Kuwoṙe wandu waṟaaṟu waikupfula.
44010020	Kyasia fuma uoshane nawo, molapfiio nyi mṙoe, cha kyipfa nyi inyi ngyilewaṙuma.”
44010021	Petiro kayenda ko wandu walya, kagamba, “Nyi inyi mungyipfula. Mocha kyipfa kya kyikyi?”
44010022	Wakagamba, “Mchilyi Korinelyio, mndu ulya msumganyi, aowuye na ikunda Ruwa, awoṙe kyiṟumi kyicha ko isanga lyoose lya Wayuda, nalewio nyi malaika mweele iṙuma wandu kopfo, wakuwie uyende kokye, kundu naicho kyilya okyelosha.”
44010023	Petiro kaambilyia wayenu walya, wawe wayenu wakye. Na ilya-ngama, Petiro kafuma hamwi nawo, na wandu waata wawekyeosha Yesu kulya Yafa wakaoshana na oe.
44010024	Ilya-ngama wakashika Kaisaria. Na Korinelyio naweiwaweṙelyia, asanzie hamwi na wa kyishari kyakye na mbuya tsakye.
44010025	Kyiyeri Petiro aletikyira kufuhi Korinelyio kafuma indemwambilyia, kakuwiyitsa maṙendenyi gakye, kamwindia.
44010026	Kyaindi Petiro, kamwira, kagamba, “Goṟoka; inyi nyi mndu cha wandu wengyi ngyilawaṟi iindio cha malaika.”
44010027	Na echigamba kuṙo kaiṙa na numba, kawona wandu wafoi wasanzie pfo.
44010028	Kawawia, “Nyoe muichi kye chi sungusinyi mndu alakyeri Myuda naoshane na mndu o isanga lyingyi maa iyenda kokye-pfo, kyaindi Ruwa nalegyiikyimbia, ngyilagambe kye kuwoṙe mndu afanyi kyimṟumoe alawaṟi ikaa na wandu wengyi-pfo.
44010029	Kyipfa kya ikyo ngyilecha lyilya ngyilelago, ngyilalege; kyasia ngammbesa, ny'kyikyi mongyilaiya.”
44010030	Korinelyio kagamba, “Mfiri iṟaṟu ileira, kyiyeri-kyi ikyi, kyiyeri kya saa kyenda, ngyiweiterewa kanyi koko; mndu umwi kagoṟoka mbele yako, awoṙe nguwo tsiaka-aka,
44010031	kagamba, ‘Korinelyio, shiterewo shapfo shaaṙanyio na shienengo okyeenengyia shiwonio na pata mbele ya Ruwa.
44010032	Kyasia, ṙuma wandu kulya Yafa, undelaga Simion ekyelago Petiro, ekyekaa kanyi ko Simion, ekyeachikyia njonyi, kufuhi na mbai ya ipalyipalyi; na oe kacha nechiṙeṙa na iyoe.’
44010033	Cha ilyi ngaṙuma wandu kopfo, na iyoe nowuta necha icha. Kyasia soe loose lukyeri iha mbele ya Ruwa, luiṙime iaṙanyia mbonyi tsilya Mndumii alekuwia uluongoye.”
44010034	Petiro kawooka iṙeṙa, kagamba, “Loi ngyiichi kye Ruwa awoṙe ikundia-pfo;
44010035	indi kyiiṙi kya orio isanga mndu ekyeindia Ruwa na iwuta sha sungusinyi Ruwa nekyemwiṙikyia.
44010036	Mbonyi tsilya aleṙooya wana wa Isiraelyi, echionguo mbonyi ngyicha tsa ufoṟo kui Yesu Kristo (nyi oe Mndumii o woose),
44010037	kyindo-kyi nyoe mukyiichi, kyileongoyo urukyenyi loose lo Uyuda, kyechiwookyia Galyilaya, numa ya wupatiso wulya Yohane aleonguo mbonyi tsakye.
44010038	Mbonyi tsa Yesu awukyie Nasareti, chandu Ruwa alemshumbuo kui Mumuyo Mweele na pfinya; na oe katenga-tenga ipfo na ipfo, echiṟunda iṟunda lyicha na ikyiṟa woose Mokyiriinzi aweiwalyisa wukyiwa; cha kyipfa Ruwa nawekyeri hamwi na oe.
44010039	Na soe lui waṟingyishi wa shindo shoose aleshiwuta urukyenyi lo Wayuda na Yerusalemu; ulya walemmbaaga na immanyika ikyiṙinyi.
44010040	Icho Ruwa nalemṟutsa mfiri o kaṟaaṟu, kamsaṟia imanyika,
44010041	chi ko wandu woose-pfo, indi ko waṟingyishi walekowamsambuṟo nyi Ruwa, nyiwo soe, lulelya na inyo hamwi na oe numa ya iṟuka lyakye iwuka ko wapfu.
44010042	Naleluwia luongoye wandu mbonyi ngyicha na iṟingyishia kye ichu nyi oe ammbikye nyi Ruwa nawe moanduya wai na moo na wapfu.
44010043	Icho weonguo shisuku woose walemṟingyishia, kye kui rina lyakye orio momwiṙikyia nechihooṟio wunyamaṟi.”
44010044	Kyiyeri Petiro aweionguo mbonyi-tso Mumuyo Mweele kasokyia wuye ya woose waleicho kyilya alegamba.
44010045	Na Wayuda waweiṙikyie Yesu walekowacha hamwi na Petiro wawuka Yafa waleṟiyio, cha kyipfa maa wandu walaweiṙikyie Yesu walesumbo kyienengo kya Mumuyo Mweele.
44010046	Cha kyipfa waleicho weṙeṙa mṙeṙie ngyiyenu, na iṟumisha Ruwa. Naaho-ng'u Petiro kagaluo, kagamba,
44010047	“Nyi wui eiṙima ishingyia mṟinga, wandu-wa walapatiso? Wandu waambilyie Mumuyo Mweele kyimwi na soe?”
44010048	Kagamba wapatiso kui Rina lya Yesu Kristo. Naaho wakamterewa naengyeṟe ikaa kowo mfiri ngyaangu.
44011001	Kyasia wasu na wandu waweiṙikyie Yesu kulya urukyenyi lo Uyuda wakamanya kye wandu walaweiṙikyie Yesu nawo waambilyia Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
44011002	Na Petiro kyiyeri aleṙo iyenda Yerusalemu Wayuda walya wawekundi wandu walakyeri Wayuda wakundi iosha Yesu waṙino wakagaluana na oe,
44011003	wechigamba, “Nuleyenda ko wandu walawaṙine kolya nawo.”
44011004	Petiro kawooka iwaongoya necha, kagamba,
44011005	“Ngyiwekyeri mṟinyi o Yafa, ngyeterewa, ngawa cha mndu ailoṙo. Ngawona kyindo kyisoka ruwewu, cha nguwo ngyilandari yesotso iwuka ruwewu, ikyeri cha ilyi ingyiwaṙe ngyuura tsoose tsiina, kyikashika halya-ndu ngyiwei.
44011006	Ngakyiitukuya mnu, ngyekusaṟa, ngawona mando ga saka gawoṙe maṙende gaana; na mando ga nguṙunyi, na galya gekyekukuruo na ndewu, na shileye sha ngyinenyi.
44011007	Ngaicho na ṟui lyingyiwia, ‘Petiro, amka, ushinje ulye.’
44011008	Ngagamba, ‘Maa ale, Mndumii, cha kyipfa ngyilandelye kyindo kyoose kyifanyi-pfo.’
44011009	Ṟui lyilya lyawuka ruwewu lyikangyigaluo lya kawi lyikagamba, ‘Shilya Ruwa agambie shiwaṟi ilyio iyoe ulagambe kye shekyelyio-pfo.’
44011010	Kyindo-kyi kyikawutika kaṟaaṟu; numa ya iho ngawona kyindo kyakuruo shindo shilya shoose shikawuya-se na ruwewu.
44011011	Kyiyeri kyilya wandu waṟaaṟu wakagoṟoka mbele ya numba iya luwekyeri, waleṙumo koko iwuka Kaisaria.
44011012	Mumuyo kangyiwia ngyioshane nawo, ngyilapfiio nyi mṙoe. Wandu-wa waṟandaaṟu waiṙikyie Yesu wakayenda hamwi na inyi, lukoiṙa na numba ko mndu ulya.
44011013	Kaluongoya chandu alewona malaika alegoṟoka kanyi kokye na immbia, ‘Ṙuma wandu wayende Yafa, walage Simion ekyelago Petiro,
44011014	echikuongoya mbonyi tsechikukyiṟa, iyoe na walya wa kanyi kopfo woose.’
44011015	Na kyiyeri ngyilewooka iṙeṙa, Mumuyo Mweele kasokyia wuye yawo chandu alelusokyia soe ipfo mawookyionyi.
44011016	Ngakumbuo ṙeṙo lyilya lya Mndumii, chandu alegamba, ‘Yohane nalepatisa kui mṟinga loi, indi nyoe mochipatiso kui Mumuyo Mweele.’
44011017	Kyasia kokooya Mndumii Ruwa nalewaenenga wo kyienengo kyilya kyilya aleluenenga soe luiṙikyie Mndumii Yesu Kristo, inyi nyi wui ngyiiṙime iwingana na Ruwa?”
44011018	Kyiyeri waleicho mbonyi-tsi wakatsia sau, wakaṟumisha Ruwa, wechigamba, “Kyasia Ruwa naenenga walya walaiṙikyie Yesu isaṟia lya iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi, irumbuya lyekyeende moo o mlungana.”
44011019	Kyasia wandu walya walekowanyanyaṟika kyipfa kya wukyiwa wulya wulecha kyipfa kya Stefano iwoogo, wakapfunga kyaro mṟasa Foinikye na Kyipiro na Antiokyia, walaonguoe mbonyi tsa Yesu sile ko Wayuda tikyi.
44011020	Kyaindi waata kyiiṙi kya iwo walepfunga kyaro nyi-we wandu wa Kyipiro na Kyirene, nawo kyiyeri waleshika Antiokyia wakaṙeṙa na Wayuda kui mṙeṙie o Kyikyiṟikyi, wechionguo mbonyi ngyicha tsa Mndumii Yesu.
44011021	Pfinya ya Mndumii ikakaa hamwi nawo; wandu wafoi wakaiṙikyia wakagalukyia Mndumii.
44011022	Mbonyi tsa wandu-wo tsikashika ko wandu wa siṟi ya kulya Yerusalemu; wakaṙuma Barinaba, nayende mṟasa Antiokyia.
44011023	Na oe, amshikye na iwona isaṟia lya Ruwa kachihiyo, katerewa wandu woose waoshane na Mndumii kui iiṙikyia lyiwukyie mrimenyi.
44011024	Kyipfa nawekyeri mndu mcha aichuo Mumuyo Mweele na iiṙikyia; wandu wafoi wakaengyeṟika ura lo Mndumii.
44011025	Numa ya iho kafuma kayenda Tariso indepfula Saulyi;
44011026	na amummbone kamwende na Antiokyia. Kyikawa ko kyiyeri kya maka umwi wakasanza hamwi na siṟi na ilosha wandu wafoi. Na wanalosho walelago Wakristiano lya kuwooka halya Antiokyia.
44011027	Mfiri iya iya weonguo shisuku walewuka Yerusalemu wakasoka na Antiokyia.
44011028	Na kyiyeri lulesanzia handu hamwi, umwi owo ekyelago Agabo kagoṟoka, kaloṟa kui wuiṙimi wo Mumuyo Mweele kye njaa ing'anyi yeecha mfiri ya kufuhi wuyanenyi koose; na njaa-yo ikacha kyiyeri Kyilaudio awewoṙe uruka.
44011029	Na wanalosho walya, orio mndu chandu awewoṙe, wakaiṙikyia iṙuo kyindo kyetarama wana wa wamawo kyiiṙi kya iiṙikyia wawekyekaa uruka lo Uyuda.
44011030	Wakawuta kuṙo, Barinaba na Saulyi wakaṙumo ko wameeku wa siṟi waṙuṙe kyindo kyilya wanalosho waleenengyia kyetarama woṙiawo.
44012001	Kyiyeri kyilya kyilya mangyi Herode kawooka ilyisa wandu waata wa siṟi wukyiwa.
44012002	Kawaaga Yakobo, mono-wama o Yohane na ushu.
44012003	Na awonyi kye nyi kyindo kyichihiṟie Wayuda kaengyeṟa ilyisa siṟi wukyiwa, kawaṙa na Petiro. Kyiyeri-kyo kyiwekyeri kyiyeri kya mkate ilangyitarang'ishe.
44012004	Ammbaṙe Petiro, kammbika kyipfungonyi, kamṙambika ko shikosi sha asikari waana waana, wamringye, akundi immbikyia mbele ya wandu numa ya Pasaka kundu naanduyo.
44012005	Kyasia Petiro karingo kulya kyipfungonyi, na siṟi ikaterewa Ruwa kui wuragari kyipfa kyakye.
44012006	Na kyiyeri Herode awekundi iwuta Petiro kyipfungonyi, kyio kyilya nawelee makyiṙi-gawi ga asikari wawi, ampfungye na mshe iwi; waringyi wakaringa moongo o numba iya ya ipfungyia wandu.
44012007	Cha ilyi malaika o Ruwa kagoṟoka kufuhi na oe, ngyeela ikalyimika kulya kyiṟinyi, kakapa Petiro uwarinyi, kamwamtsa, echigamba, “Amka iwinyi.” Mshe iya ikawuka kulya mawoko kokye.
44012008	Malaika kammbia, “Kuṟeyeṟe, ṟaa shiaṙu shapfo.” Kawuta kuṙo. Numa ya iho kammbia, “Ṟaa nguwo tsapfo ungyioshe.”
44012009	Kafuma na nja kamwosha, maa alemanya kye nyi loi shilya shilewuto nyi malaika-pfo; indi nalekusaṟa kye nawonyi shindo cha mndu ailoṙo.
44012010	Na kyiyeri wamuiṙe handu ha kuwooka na ha hawi hawewoṙe asikari waringyi, wakacha mṟasa moongo o menya o iṙa na mṟinyi, ukoṟuguka umonyi kulawoṙe mndu aupaaya. Wakafumia nja wakyeri njienyi imwi. Cha ilyi malaika ulya kalekana nawo.
44012011	Na kyiyeri wuṟango wo Petiro wulemmbiyilyia, kagamba, “Wulalu ngyiichi na pata kye Mndumii naṙuma malaika okye na ingyiwuta wuchilyinyi wo Herode na matuuro galya Wayuda wawekusurie ingyienenga.”
44012012	Na kyiyeri aweikusaṟa isho kashika kanyi ko Mariamu, wama o Yohane, ulya rina lyakye lya kawi lyiwekyeri nyi Mariko; na wandu wafoi walekowasanzia pfo weterewa.
44012013	Na oe kyiyeri alekapa hodi halya kyichuminyi, kyisinga kyekyelago Roda, kyikacheaṙanyia.
44012014	Kyiyeri kyilemanya nyi ṟui lya Petiro, kyikaṟuguo moongo, kyipfa kya ichihiyo; indi kyikakapa mteeṟa, kyikaiṙa na numba kyikawia walya wawekyeri pfo kye Petiro nagoṟokyi halya kyichuminyi.
44012015	Wakakyiwia, “Nuisuko.” Kyaindi kyo kyikaengyeṟa igamba nyi loi kye Petiro nawekyeri halya. Wakagamba, “Nyi malaika okye.”
44012016	Petiro kaengyeṟa ikapa hodi, na wampfunguo moongo wakammbona, wakaṟiyio.
44012017	Na oe kawatsinia watsie, kawaongoya chandu Mndumii alemmbuta kyipfungonyi. Kagamba, “Ndewienyi Yakobo na wandu walya waiṙikyie Yesu mbonyi-tsi.” Kafuma, kayenda handu hengyi.
44012018	Na kyiyeri kulekya asikari wakawoṙo nyi wuowu wung'anyi, mbonyi tsa Petiro tsawa kuṙa.
44012019	Na kyiyeri Herode alempfula alammbone, nalewesa-wesa waringyi, kagamba wawoogo. Numa ya iho kawuka uruka lo Uyuda kasoka na Kaisaria, kakaa pfo.
44012020	Na Herode nawesuuye mnu kyipfa kya wandu wa Tiro na Sidon. Wakayenda kokye wakyeri kyindo kyimwi, na wammbaṙe mbuya na Blasto, awekyeambuya kyiṟi kya Mangyi Herode kyelaa, wakakunda ikaa na wandu ko ufoṟo; cha kyipfa uruka lowo lulewona kyelya iwuka urukyenyi lo Herode.
44012021	Kyasia mfiri umwi uwemṟeyeṟe, Herode, kaṟaa nguwo tsa kyimangyi, kaṙamia kyiṙinyi kya wumangyi, kaṙeṙa nawo.
44012022	Wandu wakakalagatsa, wechigamba, “Nyi ṟui lya Ruwa; chi ṟui lya mndu-pfo.”
44012023	Cha ilyi malaika o Ruwa kamkapa, cha kyipfa aleenenga Ruwa kyiṟumi-pfo. Shiwoṙoe shikamlya kapfa.
44012024	Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyikaengyeṟa imanyika ko wandu wafoi.
44012025	Na Barinaba na Saulyi, wamṟunde kyilya kyiwewaṟi iṟunda, wakacha wawuka Yerusalemu, wakacha hamwi na Yohane ekyelago Mariko.
44013001	Na kulya siṟinyi ya Antiokyia kuwewoṙe weonguo shisuku na walosha, nawo nyi Barinaba, na Simion ekyelago Nikyeri, na Lukyio awukyie Kyirene, na Manaeni aweongyie wee lyimwi na Mangyi Herode, na Saulyi.
44013002	Kyasia kyiyeri iwa waweiterewa Ruwa na ikuretekyia, Mumuyo Mweele kagamba, “Ngyisaangyienyi Barinaba na Saulyi ko iṟunda lyilya ngyilemulagia.”
44013003	Naaho-ng'u wamkuretekyie na iterewa, wakawayekyia mawoko, wakawaṙuma.
44013004	Kyasia wandu-wo, wamṙumo nyi Mumuyo Mweele, wakasoka na Seleukyia, na iwuka pfo wakaiṙa ipalyipalyinyi mṟasa Kyipiro.
44013005	Na kyiyeri wawekyeri Salami wakaonguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa masinagoginyi ga Wayuda, nawo wawekyeri na Yohane cha mṟundi owo.
44013006	Wamuiṙe kyiiṙi kya Kyipiro mṟasa Pafo, wakawona mndu umwi, msawi, moonguo shisuku o wongo, Myuda awekyelago Bar-Yesu.
44013007	Mndu-chu nawekyeri hamwi na mchilyi Serikyio Paulo, mndu mṟango. Mchilyi-cho kalaga Barinaba na Saulyi wache na kokye, kakunda iicho Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
44013008	Kyaindi Elyima, msawi ulya (kyipfa ikyo ny'kyo rina lyakye lyagamba), kagaluana nawo, akundi ilemba mchilyi ulya naṙe iiṙikyia Yesu.
44013009	Kyaindi Saulyi ang'u Paulo, aichuo Mumuyo Mweele, kamwitukuya karii,
44013010	kagamba, “Iyoe uwoṙe ngyeṟo na wuwicho woose, mana o Mokyiriinzi, mokyituwa o wusumganyi woose, okyeṙa igaluo wuloi wo Mndumii wuwe wongo?
44013011	Ruwa nechikukapa na ikuanduya; na iyoe nochipfa meso, ulewona kyindo kyoose.” Cha ilyi rundu lya meema lyikamwolokyia katenga-tenga na ipfula mndu mommbaṙa kuwoko na imsongoya.
44013012	Naaho-ng'u mchilyi ulya, kyiyeri alewona shawutika, kaiṙikyia, echiṟiyio kyipfa kya malosho ga Mndumii.
44013013	Numa ya iho Paulo na oṙoe wakawooka kyaro kya ipalyipalyinyi, wakawuka Pafo wakashika Perikye, urukyenyi lo Pamfilyia. Yohane kalekana nawo kawuya na Yerusalemu.
44013014	Kyaindi wo wakawuka Perikye, walaiṙe-se ipalyipalyinyi, wakashika Antiokyia, mṟi o uruka lo Pisidia, wakaiṙa na sinagoginyi mfiri o onyonya, wakaṙamia.
44013015	Numa ya isoma kyitumbuṟe kya uwawaso na kyitapu kya weonguo shisuku, wasongoru wa sinagogi wakaṙuma mndu kowo na iwawia, “Wana wa wama kyiiṙi kya iiṙikyia, kokooya muwoṙe ṙeṙo lyetarama wandu-wa, lyionguonyi.”
44013016	Paulo kagoṟoka, kawatsinia, kagamba, “Nyoe wasoṟo wa Isiraelyi, na nyoe muowuye na ikunda Ruwa, aṙanyienyi.
44013017	Ruwa o wandu wa Isiraelyi nalesambuṟa waku waṙu, kawaenenga mng'ano, kyiyeri wawekyekaa cha wayenu urukyenyi lo Misiri, na kui pfinya yakye kawawuta pfo, kawasongoya.
44013018	Na kyiyeri kya maka makumi gaana kakarishia mkaṟo yawo ngyiwicho kulya nukyenyi ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga.
44013019	Na amrumatse masanga mfungaaṙe urukyenyi lo Kanaan kawaenenga uruka-lo luwe kyioṟa ko kyiyeri kya maka cha magana gaana na makumi gataanu;
44013020	numa ya iho kawaenenga wamangyi wookyia kacha kyiyeri kya Samolyi.
44013021	Numa ya iho wakaterewa ienengo mowaṙa uruka. Ruwa kawaenenga Saulyi, mana o Kyishi, mndu o kyishari kya Benyamen, kyiyeri kya maka makumi gaana.
44013022	Na amwawute Saulyi, kasambuṟa Dawidi nawe mowaṙa uruka lowo, ulya alemṟingyishia, echigamba, ‘Ngawona Dawidi, mana o Yese, mndu achihiṟie ngoo yako, echiwuta shilya ngyikundi shoose.’
44013023	Kyisharinyi kya Dawidi Ruwa naleendie wandu wa Isiraelyi Mkyiṟa, Yesu, chandu alewika kyaasa.
44013024	Yohane aweiongoya wandu woose wa Isiraelyi mbonyi ngyicha tsa wupatiso wo iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi, kyiyeri oe Yesu alandeche.
44013025	Na Yohane kyiyeri aweimarisa iṟunda lyakye nalegamba, ‘Mokusaṟa inyi nyi wui? Inyi chi oe-pfo. Kyaindi kuicha umwi numa yako, ulya inyi ngyilawaṟi ituruchuo ukowa lo shiaṙu shakye.’ ”
44013026	“Wana wa wama wako, wana wa kyishari kya Abrahamu, na iwo wai konyu waowuye na ikunda Ruwa, Ṙeṙo lya wukyiṟo-wu lyaendo na koṙu nyi mndu Ruwa amṙumie.
44013027	Cha kyipfa walya wekyekaa Yerusalemu, na wasongoru wawo, kyipfa walalemmanya oe, maa imanya malosho ga weonguo shisuku gekyesomo orio mfiri o onyonya, walegaafutsia kui imwanduya.
44013028	Maa chandu walalewona kyimaṙuma kyemmbaaga wakaterewa Pilato nawoogo.
44013029	Na wammbute shoose shiweshigambe kye shechimmbutikyia, wakamsotsa halya msalabenyi, wakammbika kyilomenyi.
44013030	Kyaindi Ruwa kamṟutsa ko wapfu;
44013031	mfiri ifoi kawono akyeri na walya walecha na oe iwuka Galyilaya mṟasa Yerusalemu,walya wulalu wekyemṟingyishia mbele ya wandu.
44013032	Na soe lokyemuongoya mbonyi ngyicha tsa kyaasa kyilya waku waṙu waleenengo,
44013033	kye Ruwa naleafutsia kyaasa-kyo ko wana waṙu, kui iṟutsa Yesu; chandu kyikyiṟeie Kyiimbonyi kya Kawi, ‘Iyoe nyi oe Mono-ko, inyi inu ngawa Awuyo.’ ”
44013034	“Lyingyi-se kye nalemṟutsa ko wapfu, kundu alapfe na ipuo. Nalegamba kuṙi, ‘Ngyemuenenga nyoe shindo shiele sha Dawidi shikyeri sha loi.’ ”
44013035	“Koikyo handu hengyi nagambie, ‘Ochilekyia mweele opfo napfe na ipuo-pfo;’ ”
44013036	“Cha kyipfa Dawidi naleṟundia Ruwa kyiyeri kyakye, naaho kapfa kaṟiko hamwi na waku wakye na mmbiu okye ukopuo;
44013037	indi ichu aleṟutso nyi Ruwa nalepfa indi alepuo-pfo.
44013038	Kyasia kyimanyikye konyu, wana wa wama wako, kye kui rina lya Yesu muongoyo mbonyi tsa ihooṟio wunyamaṟi.
44013039	Na kui oe orio momwiṙikyia nekyetalo kye namsumganyi shindonyi shoose alechiiṙima italo kye namsumganyi kui uwawaso lo Mose.
44013040	Kyasia, kuringyenyi mulachewutikyio mbonyi iya ilegambo shiṟeionyi sha weonguo shisuku,
44013041	‘Aṙanyienyi, nyoe mokyemina kyilya Ruwa agambie, ṟiyionyi na ipfa cha kyipfa kyilya ngyiwuta inu nyi kyindo mulechikyiiṙikyia maa kyiyeri mndu amuongoya.’ ”
44013042	Na kyiyeri Paulo na Barinaba waweiwuka halya Sinagoginyi wakawaterewa waongoyo mbonyi-tso mfiri o kawi o onyonya.
44013043	Kyiyeri walya wawesanzie sinagoginyi walelekana, Wayuda na wandu wafoi waweowuye Ruwa na imkunda wakaoshana na Paulo na Barinaba waleṙeṙa nawo wechiwakarisha wakae isaṟienyi lya Ruwa mfiri yoose.
44013044	Na mfiri o kawi o onyonya, wandu wafoi iwuka mṟinyi koose, wakasanzia handu hamwi kundu waicho Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
44013045	Indi Wayuda, kyiyeri walewona wuingyi wo wandu, wakawoṙo wunyenyi, wakakangyila kyilya Paulo alekoagamba, wechigamba chi loi-pfo na ilahia.
44013046	Paulo na Barinaba wakaṙeṙa kui wukari, wakagamba, “Kyiwewaṟi Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyiongoyo konyu kuwooka; kyaindi kyipfa mulyitsindikyia kuleshi, na ikuicho mrimenyi konyu kye muwaṟi moo o mlungana-pfo, wulalu luyenda ko wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa.
44013047	Cha kyipfa nyi wuṙo Mndumii aleluwia, echigamba, ‘Ngakuwika uwe ngyeela ya wandu walaichi Ruwa kundu wuyana woose wuwone wukyiṟo.’ ”
44013048	Kyiyeri wandu walaichi Ruwa waleicho isho wakachihiyo, wakang'anyisa Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na walya wawewaṟeyeṟie moo o mlungana wakaiṙikyia.
44013049	Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyikaṙunganana kulya urukyenyi koose.
44013050	Kyaindi Wayuda wakaamtsa shiloyano kyiiṙi kya waka waowuye na ikunda Ruwa, waka wawoṙe rina na wasoṟo wawoṙe kyiṟumi, wakawanzia wandu wakape Paulo na Barinaba; wakawamichia nja ya uruka lulya lowo.
44013051	Nawo wakaambutsa kyilulyi maṙendenyi gawo, wakayenda mṟinyi okyelago Ikonio.
44013052	Na wanalosho waleichuo sia na Mumuyo Mweele.
44014001	Kyiyeri wawei kulya Ikonio wakaiṙa na sinagoginyi lya Wayuda; na chandu waleonguo mbonyi, Wayuda na Wakyiṟikyi wafoi wakaiṙikyia Yesu.
44014002	Kyaindi Wayuda walelega iiṙikyia Yesu wakawutia wandu walaweiṙikyie Yesu shindo sha kyinyala na ienenga walya waweiṙikyie Yesu ipfuluko mrimenyi.
44014003	Kyasia wakakaa pfo kyiyeri kyileshi, wechiṙeṙa kulawoṙe wuowu mbonyi tsa Mndumii, aleṟingyishia Ṙeṙo lya isaṟia lyakye, echiwasaṟia ṟigo na shindo sha maṟiyisho shiwutikye kui shilya aweiwuta.
44014004	Kyaindi wandu wa kulya mṟinyi walawaṙe makusaṟo gamwi. Iwa wakakaa ura lo Wayuda, na wengyi ura lo Wasu.
44014005	Na kyiyeri wandu waata walaweiṙikyie Yesu na Wayuda, hamwi na wasongoru wawo waleṙumbuo iwawutia shindo sha kyinyala na iwakapa na magoe,
44014006	nawo wakamanya mbonyi-tso, waleṙicha wakayenda Lyistira na Deribe, mṟi ya Lyikaonia, na ngyuuruka tsa mṟasenyi;
44014007	wakakaa pfo, wechionguo Ndumi Ngyicha.
44014008	Na kulya Lyistira kuwewoṙe mndu umwi, mfiri maṙende, awei kyiwete wookyia kyiyeri alefeo, alawendechumie maa ale.
44014009	Mndu-cho naleicho Paulo kyiyeri aweilosha. Paulo kamwitukuya karii na iwona kye nawoṙe iiṙikyia lya ikyiṟo,
44014010	kagamba na ṟui lying'anyi, “Goṟoka necha kui maṙende gapfo.” Mndu ulya kagoṟoka faṟa kayenda.
44014011	Na kyiyeri wuingyi wo wandu walewona kyindo Paulo awuta wakakuilenga na ṟui lying'anyi, wechigamba kui mṙeṙie o Kyilyikaonia, “Waruwa wacha na koṙu wakyeri cha wandu.”
44014012	Wakalaga Barinaba Seu na Paulo Herime, cha kyipfa nyi oe aweiṙeṙa.
44014013	Mkohanyi o Seu, ulya hekalu lyakye lyiwekyeri mbele ya mṟi, kaende umbe na oṟo tsa shiwaṟo mṟasa kyichuminyi, akundi ienengyia kyiṙaso hamwi na wuingyi wo wandu wuwekyeri halya.
44014014	Kyaindi kyiyeri Barinaba na Paulo walemanya mbonyi-tsi wakaranduo nguwo tsawo, wakayenda weṙicha wakakulunga na wuingyi wulya wo wandu, wakakalagatsa,
44014015	wechigamba, “Lanyoe, ny'kyilyi muiwuta ishi? Soe lukyeri wandu cha nyoe. Lumuongoya mbonyi ngyicha, kundu mugalukye na iṙa shindo sha wuwicho na iyenda ko Ruwa ai na moo, alegumba ruwewu na uruka na mapalyipalyi na shoose shikyeri pfo.
44014016	Ulya nyoe kyiyeri kya kacha kyileiṙa aleṙa masanga goose gawute chandu gakundi.
44014017	Kyaindi aleṙa imuṟingyishia-pfo, cha kyipfa nalewuta shindo shicha, echimuenenga mvuo iwuka ruwewu na kyiyeri kya shilyimu, echiigutsa mrima yanyu shelya na sia.”
44014018	Maa chandu wasu walegamba isho, waleiṙima ishingyia wandu walya walaweiṙikyie Yesu iwaenenga shiṙaso-pfo.
44014019	Kyaindi Wayuda wakacha wawuka Antiokyia na Ikonio, wakawanzia wuingyi wo wandu wawesanzie halya wakakapa Paulo na magoe, wakamkuruya nja ya mṟi, wakusaṟie kye ampfa.
44014020	Kyaindi kyiyeri wanalosho wawemwiṟiwie, kagoṟoka, kaiṙa na mṟinyi; na ilya-ngama kafuma, kayenda mṟasa Deribe waṙuṙanyi na Barinaba.
44014021	Na wamuonguo Ndumi Ngyicha kulya mṟinyi, na igaluo wandu wafoi wakawa wanalosho, wakawuya mṟasa Lyistira na Ikonio na Antiokyia,
44014022	wechikarisha mrima ya wanalosho na iwawia wakae kyiiṙi kya Iiṙikyia lyilya, na kye kyiluwaṟi iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa kui njia ya matuuro gafoi.
44014023	Na wamsambuṟe wameeku wa siṟi kulya siṟinyi, na iterewa hamwi na ikuretekyia, wakawawika mawokonyi ga Ruwa ulya wawemwiṙikyie.
44014024	Wakaiṙia Pisidia wakashika Pamfilyia.
44014025	Na numa ya ionguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa kulya Perikye wakayenda mṟasa Atalyia.
44014026	Na iwuka kulya Atalyia wakawuya na Antiokyia weiṙia ipalyipalyinyi. Kulya Antiokyia nyipfo waleterewio isaṟia lya Ruwa kui iṟunda lyilya walekowamlyimarisa.
44014027	Kyiyeri waleshika kulya Antiokyia walewia wandu wa siṟi wasanzie handu hamwi, wakawaongoya shindo shoose Ruwa aleshiwuta hamwi nawo, na kye Ruwa nalepfunguya moongo o iiṙikyia wandu walaweiṙikyie Yesu.
44014028	Wakakaa kulya Antiokyia kyiyeri kyileshi, hamwi na wanalosho.
44015001	Kukocha wandu wawukyie uruka lo Uyuda wakalosha walya waweiṙikyie Yesu, wechigamba, “Mulandeṙino chandu kyikyeri muichiwie o Mose mochiiṙima ikyiṟo-pfo.”
44015002	Kyasia numa ya Paulo na Barinaba iwingana na wandu-wa na igaluana nawo mnu, wandu walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wakagamba kye Paulo na Barinaba na wandu wengyi waangu waṙo iyenda Yerusalemu ko wasu na wameeku wa siṟi kyipfa kya mbonyi-tso tsa iṙino.
44015003	Kyasia, wawaṙume nyi siṟi, wakaiṙia uruka lo Foinikye na Samaria, wechionguo mbonyi tsa chandu wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu walemwiṙikyia; wakachihiṟa mnu walya waweiṙikyie Yesu.
44015004	Kyiyeri waleshika Yerusalemu wakaambilyio nyi siṟi na wasu na wameeku wa siṟi, nawo wakawaongoya shindo shoose Ruwa alewuta hamwi nawo.
44015005	Kyaindi wandu waata wawekyeri miiṙikyienyi ya Mafarisayo waweiṙikyie wakagoṟoka, wechigamba, “Kyiwaṟi iwaṙina na iwawia waoshe uwawaso lo Mose!”
44015006	Wasu na wameeku wa siṟi wakasanzia handu hamwi kundu waiṙime ikusaṟa kya mbonyi-tsi.
44015007	Na numa ya wandu wafong'ui igamba kyilya wawekusaṟie Petiro kagoṟoka, kawawia, “Wana wa wama, nyoe muichi kye wookyia mfiri ya ipfo numa Ruwa nalengyisambuṟa kyiiṙi kyanyu kundu ngyiongoye wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na ilyiiṙikyia.
44015008	Na Ruwa, aichi mrima ya wandu, kamṟingyishia, echimuenenga nyoe Mumuyo Mweele chandu aleluenenga soe.
44015009	Maa aleluwutia soe kyindo kyilafananyi na kyilya alewawutia-pfo, echiwailyisha mrima yawo kui iiṙikyia.
44015010	Kyasia wulalu ny'kyilyi muiyesha Ruwa na iṙika wanalosho ṟio lyilemeri, ṟio waku waṙu maa soe lulaiṙima ilyiṙuo?
44015011	Indi luiṙikyie kye lochikyia kui isaṟia lya Mndumii Yesu cha wo.”
44015012	Kyasia wandu walya woose wawesanzie halya wakatsia tsii, wakaaṙanyia Barinaba na Paulo wechiwaongoya mbonyi tsa ṟigo na shindo sha maṟiyisho, Ruwa alewuta kui ulogo kyiiṙi kya walya walaweiṙikyie Yesu.
44015013	Na iwo wamtsie Yakobo kagaluo, echigamba, “Wana wa wama wako ngyiaṙanyienyi,
44015014	Simion naluongoya chandu Ruwa ipfo mawookyionyi aleloṟa chandu ekyeembeṟa wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu kundu nasambuṟe wandu kyiiṙi kyawo kyipfa kya rina lyakye.
44015015	Na maṙeṙo ga weonguo shisuku gaṙuana na isho, chandu kyikyiṟeie,
44015016	‘Numa ya shindo-sho ngyechiwuya na inyi ngyechiwika-se numba ya Dawidi ileoloka. Ngyechiiwuta kyiiṙi kya ioloka lyayo, na inyi ngyechiigoṟotsa.
44015017	Kundu wandu waṙio ho wapfule Mndumii, na masanga goose galeongoyo mbonyi tsako,
44015018	Ruwa nagamba, ekyeonguo mbonyi-tsi mṟasa mlungana.’ ”
44015019	“Kyipfa kya ikyo inyi ngaṙumbuo kuṙi, lulalyise wukyiwa wandu walya walaiṙikyie Yesu kyiyeri waigalukyia Ruwa.
44015020	Indi luwaṟeie paruo kye wakushowe na ukoe lo mafano, na wuṟui, na nyama tsa mando gapfa kui ipfumbo, na samu.
44015021	Cha kyipfa wookyia kacha Mawawaso ga Mose gekyelosho orio mṟi na isomo masinagoginyi orio mfiri o onyonya.”
44015022	Kyasia kyikachihiṟa wasu na wameeku wa siṟi yoose isambuṟa wandu kyiiṙi kyawo na iwaṙika Antiokyia hamwi na Paulo na Barinaba, nawo nyi iwa: Yuda awekyelago Barisaba, na Sila, wawekyeri wasongoru kyiiṙi kya walya waweiṙikyie Yesu. Wakaṟeia paruo na iiṙuo kui mawoko gawo wawenyi. Paruo-yo ilegamba kuṙi:
44015023	“Soe wasu na wandu waku waiṙikyie Yesu, ko wana wa wamaṙu wakyeri Antiokyia na Shamu, na Kyilyikyia, wai wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu; lomuiṟikyiṟa.
44015024	Cha kyipfa luleicho kye wandu walewuka koṙu walemulyisa wukyiwa kui maṙeṙo gawo, wechiṙetsa mrima yanyu, wandu soe lulalewaṙuma.
44015025	Soe lowona nyi kyicha, lukyeri kyindo kyimwi, isambuṟa wandu na iwaṙika konyu hamwi na wakunde waṙu Barinaba na Paulo,
44015026	wandu walereka moo yawo kyipfa kya rina lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
44015027	Kyasia loṙuma Yuda na Sila, wechimuongoya mbonyi-tso itso.
44015028	Cha kyipfa kyilechihiṟa Mumuyo Mweele na soe, lulamuṙikye nyoe ṟio mulawaṟi iṙiko,
44015029	kyimwi na immbia mukushowe na shindo shoose shileṙasio mafano, na samu, na nyama tsa mando gapfa kui ipfumbo, na wuṟui. Mukowuta kuṙo, mowuta necha. Lomukundia orio kyindo kyicha.”
44015030	Na iwo wamuenengo momu wakasoka na Antiokyia; na numa ya iwia wandu woose wasanzie handu hamwi wakawaenengyia paruo iya.
44015031	Nawo wamuisome wakachihiyo kyipfa kya iwiyiṟio moo lyilya.
44015032	Lyingyi-se Yuda na Sila, cha kyipfa wo nyi weonguo shisuku, wakaongoya walya waweiṙikyie Yesu shindo shifoi shewakarisha.
44015033	Na wamkae pfo kyiyeri kyileshi taa, walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wakawaenenga momu wayende na ufoṟo, wawuye na ko walya walewaṙuma.
44015034	Kyaindi Sila kawona nyi kyicha ikaa pfo.
44015035	Na Paulo na Barinaba wakakaa kulya Antiokyia, wechilosha na ionguo Ṙeṙo lya Mndumii, hamwi na wandu wengyi wafoi.
44015036	Hamwiṙe mfiri ngyaangu Paulo kawia Barinaba, “Luwuye wulalu lundeambuya walya waiṙikyie Yesu kulya mṟinyi luleonguo Ṙeṙo lya Mndumii, lumanye mbonyi tsawo.”
44015037	Barinaba kakunda Yohane awekyelago Mariko nayende hamwi nawo.
44015038	Indi Paulo alewona nyi kyicha iyenda na icho walemṙa kulya Pamfilyia-pfo, kyipfa alalekunda ioshana nawo mṟasa mafurumionyi.
44015039	Kyasia hakaamka igaluana kyiiṙi kyawo mṟasa wakalekana. Barinaba kaṙuo Mariko, wakaiṙia ipalyipalyinyi iyenda Kyipiro.
44015040	Kyaindi Paulo kasambuṟa Sila, kafuma, walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wechimterewia, naenengo isaṟia lya Mndumii.
44015041	Kaiṙia Shamu na Kyilyikyia, echikarisha siṟi.
44016001	Kyasia kashika Deribe na Lyistira, na iho hawewoṙe manalosho umwi ekyelago Timoteo, mana o Mndu mka Myuda aweiṙikyie Yesu; kyaindi awuye nawekyeri Mkyiṟikyi.
44016002	Mndu-cho naleṟingyishio wucha na wandu waweiṙikyie Yesu wawekyekaa Lyistira na Ikonio.
44016003	Paulo kawia Timoteo naoshane na oe, kamṙuo kamṙina kyipfa kya Wayuda wawekyeri ngyuura tsilya; cha kyipfa woose waweichi kye awuye nyi Mkyiṟikyi.
44016004	Kyasia kyiyeri waweiiṙa kyiiṙi kya mṟi iya, wakawaenenga mawawaso galya galewuka ko wasu na wameeku wa siṟi wakyeri Yerusalemu, kundu wagaoshe.
44016005	Siṟi tsikawaṙa pfinya kyiiṙi kya Iiṙikyia lyilya, wandu waiṙikyie Yesu wakaengyeṟika orio mfiri.
44016006	Wakaiṙa urukyenyi lo Firikyia na Galatia, wechiimo nyi Mumuyo Mweele, walaonguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa kulya Asia.
44016007	Kyiyeri waleshika mṟasenyi na Misia, wakatambagana iyenda Bitinia, kyaindi Mumuyo o Yesu alawaenengye momu.
44016008	Wakaiṙa Misinia wakasoka na Tiroa.
44016009	Kyiyeri kya kyio Paulo kaloṟo kyindo kyilandewono, akyeri cha mndu ailoṙo. Nalewona mndu awukyie Makyedonia agoṟokyi, echimterewa, na immbia, “Ambaṙa, uche na Makyedonia ulutarame.”
44016010	Kyasia amloṟo kyindo-kyo, cha ilyi lukokunda iyenda Makyedonia, cha kyipfa lulewona na pata kye Ruwa nalulagie luwaongoye Mbonyi Ngyicha.
44016011	Lukyeri ngalawenyi lukowuka Tiroa, lukoshika Samotirakye, na ilya-ngama lukoshika Neapolyi;
44016012	na iwuka pfo lukoshika Filyipi, mṟi ung'anyi o Makyedonia, handu Waroma walekowasamia; lukokaa kyiiṙi kya mṟi-chu mfiri ngyaangu.
44016013	Na mfiri o onyonya lukoyenda nja ya mṟi, lukoyenda mbai ya mfo, handu lulekusaṟa kye hai hecha hewika kyiterewo; lukoṙamia, lukoṙeṙa na waka wawesanzie halya.
44016014	Mndu mka umwi ekyelago Lyidia, ekyekumba ṟangyi ya kyimaande-maande, mndu awukyie Tiatira, aowuye na ikunda Ruwa, kaluaṙanyia, ulya Mndumii alemwenenga imanya mrimenyi kokye, naambilyie na iiṙikyia malosho ga Paulo.
44016015	Na ampatiso, oe na walya wa kanyi kokye, kaluterewa, echigamba, “Kokooya mowona ngyiiṙikyie Ruwa, iṙenyi na kanyi koko mukae pfo. Kawatsindika wawute kuṙo.”
44016016	Kyiyeri luweiyenda handu heterewa Ruwa, kyisinga kyimwi kyiwewoṙo nyi mṟufui o ilasha kyikakarisana na soe, kyisinga kyileendie wandumii wakyo kyiira kying'anyi kui iṟunda lya ilasha.
44016017	Kyikaosha Paulo na soe, kyikakalagatsa, kyechigamba, “Wandu-wa nyi waṟundi wa Ruwa, wekyemuongoya mbonyi tsa wukyiṟo.”
44016018	Kyikawuta isho mfiri ifoi. Kyaindi Paulo kawihiyo mnu, kainduka kawia mṟufui ulya mmbicho, “Ngakuwia kui rina lya Yesu wuka mndu-chu.” Kammbuka kyiyeri kyilya kyilya.
44016019	Kyasia wandumii wa kyisinga kyilya kyiyeri walewona kyiira kyawo kyeṙeka wakawaṙa Paulo na Sila wakawakuruo mṟasa sangaṙa mbele ya wandu wa mṟi.
44016020	Wakawaṙuo ko weṙumbuo moondu, wakagamba, “Wandu-wa waifanyiṟa mnu mṟi oṙu, nawo nyi Wayuda.
44016021	Lyingyi-se waionguo mbonyi tsa miichiwie ilakyeri sungusinyi koṙu iiambilyia maa iiosha, cha kyipfa soe nyi Waroma.”
44016022	Wuingyi woose wo wandu wawekyeri halya wakafuma wakayenda halya-ndu Paulo na Sila wawekyeri, weṙumbuo moondu wakawawuta nguwo ko pfinya, wakagamba wakapo na ngowa.
44016023	Na wamuwakape mnu, wakawawiyitsa kyipfungonyi, wakawia mringyi o numba iya yepfungyia wandu nawaringye mnu.
44016024	Na mringyi ulya amwicho kyilya alewio kawawika kyiṟinyi kya makyiṙi-gawi, kapfungyia maṙende gawo matsindenyi.
44016025	Kyaindi kyiyeri kya kyio kya mayeleyele Paulo na Sila waweiterewa Ruwa na imwimbia shiimbo sha imṟumisha, na wandu wengyi wawewawikye kulya kyipfungonyi waweiwaaṙanyia.
44016026	Cha ilyi kukowaṙa mṙeṙemo ung'anyi o uruka, numba iya ikakupaaya-paya yoose, na kyiyeri kyilya kyilya moongo ikaṟuguka, na shindo shiwepfungyie walya wawei kulya kyipfungonyi shikalekyia.
44016027	Mringyi ulya o numba yepfungyia wandu kaamka, na oe kyiyeri alewona kye moongo iṟugukyie, kaira ushu kundu nakuwaage, akusaṟie kye walya wawewawikye kyipfungonyi waṙicha.
44016028	Indi Paulo kaṙeṙa na ṟui lying'anyi, echigamba, “Ulakuwaage, cha kyipfa soe loose lukyeri iha.”
44016029	Kagamba taa tsiendo, kashoongyia numba, echiṙeṙema kui wuowu, kaolokyia Paulo na Sila.
44016030	Numa ya iho kawafumiṟia nja, kagamba, “Wandumii wako, kyingyiwaṟi ngyiwute kyikyi ngyiiṙime ikyia?”
44016031	Wakammbia, “Iṙikyia Mndumii Yesu, na iyoe nochikyia hamwi na wandu wa kanyi kopfo.”
44016032	Wakamwongoya Ṙeṙo lya Mndumii, oe na wandu woose wawekyeri kanyi kokye.
44016033	Kyio kyilya kyilya kawaambilyia kanyi kokye, kawasanja shifaṟa shawo, numa kapatiso, oe na wandu wakye woose kyiyeri kyilya kyilya.
44016034	Kawaitsa na kanyi kokye, kawaenenga kyelya, kachihiyo mnu, oe na wandu wa kanyi kokye woose, kyipfa nalekoamwiṙikyia Ruwa.
44016035	Kyiyeri kulekya weṙumbuo moondu wakaṙuma wasongoru wa asikari, wechigamba, “Lekyenyi wandu walya wayende.”
44016036	Mringyi ulya o numba iya yepfungyia wandu kawia Paulo mbonyi-tsi echigamba, “Weṙumbuo moondu waṙuma wandu kundu wampfunguo; kyasia wulalu fumienyi nja, muyende kui ufoṟo.”
44016037	Paulo kammbia, “Walukapa mbele ya wandu woose kulawoṙe iluanduya, na soe lui Waroma, lyingyi-se waluwika kyipfungonyi; na wulalu wakundi iluwuta pfo kui kyiṟika? Chi wuṙo maa ale-pfo. Wache wo wawenyi wacheluwuta pfo.”
44016038	Wasongoru wa asikari wakaongoya weṙumbuo moondu mbonyi-tsi; nawo wakaowuo, kyiyeri waleicho kye iwo nyi Waroma.
44016039	Wakacha wakawaterewa; na wamuwafumiṟie nja, wakawaterewa wawukye kulya mṟinyi.
44016040	Nawo wakawuka kyipfungonyi, wakaiṙa na kanyi ko Lyidia; na wammbonane na wandu walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wakawawiyiṟia moo, wakawuka kulya.
44017001	Wamuiṙe mṟinyi ya Amfipolyi na Apolonia wakashika Tesalonikye, handu hawewoṙe sinagogi lya Wayuda.
44017002	Na Paulo chandu kyiwekyeri kyiṙo kyakye, kaiṙa na halya-ndu wawekyeri, na kyiyeri kya mfiri iṟaṙu yeonyonya kagaluana nawo, echitambuluo shiṟeio shiele,
44017003	echiwawia kye kyiwewaṟi Kristo ilyiso wukyiwa, na iṟuka ko wapfu; na kye Yesu ulya Paulo aweiwaongoya mbonyi tsakye nyi oe Kristo.
44017004	Wandu wengyi kyiiṙi kya Wayuda walya wakaiṙikyia, wakaoshana na Paulo na Sila; na Wakyiṟikyi waweiṙikyie Ruwa, wafoi mnu hamwi na waka wawoṙe rina.
44017005	Na Wayuda wakawoṙo nyi wunyenyi, wakasania wandu wa mbocha, wakaende kyituṟu mṟinyi. Wakayenda ko wandu wa kanyi ko Yason, wakakunda iwaṙuo mbele ya wandu wa mṟi.
44017006	Na kyiyeri walalewakooya kanyi, wakakuruo Yason na wandu waata wa walya waweiṙikyie Yesu, wakawaṙuo mbele ya wasongoru wa mṟi, wechikalagatsa, wechigamba, “Wandu-wa waipfuluo-pfuluo wuyana washika na kunu taa,
44017007	na Yason nawaambilyia kanyi kokye; na iwa woose waiwuta shindo shilaṙuṙanyi na mawawaso ga Kaisari, wechigamba kye kuwoṙe mangyi ungyi ekyelago Yesu.”
44017008	Wakaowesha wandu walya wawesanzie halya na wasongoru wa mṟi kyiyeri waleicho mbonyi-tsi.
44017009	Nawo wamtose Yason na oṙoe wakawaleka wakayenda.
44017010	Cha ilyi wandu walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wakaṙuma Paulo na Sila kyiyeri kya kyio, wakayenda mṟasa Beroya. Nawo kyiyeri waleshika pfo wakaiṙa na Sinagoginyi lya Wayuda.
44017011	Wandu-wa wawewoṙe ngaruo cha walya wa Tesalonikye-pfo, cha kyipfa waleambilyia ndumo iya kui mrima mkyesi, wakakulosha shiṟeio shiele orio mfiri, kundu wamanye kokooya mbonyi na wuṙo tsikyeri chandu Paulo alewawia.
44017012	Kyasia wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kyawo wakaiṙikyia, na waka wa kyikyiṟikyi wawoṙe rina, na wasoṟo waangu.
44017013	Kyaindi kyiyeri Wayuda wa Tesalonikye waleicho kye Paulo naonguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa maa kulya Beroya, wakayenda pfo, wakafoga-foga na iowesha wuingyi wo wandu wawesanzie pfo.
44017014	Kyiyeri kyilya kyilya walya waiṙikyie Yesu wakaṙuma Paulo nayende mṟasa mbai ya ipalyipalyi; indi Sila na Timoteo wakaṙio kulya Beroya.
44017015	Kyaindi walya waleimia Paulo wakayenda na oe mṟasa Atene; nawo wamuambilyie mawawaso geṙuo ko Sila na Timoteo, kye walakyelyio imwosha, wakalekana na Paulo.
44017016	Kyiyeri Paulo aweiwaweṙelyia kulya Atene na iwona chandu mri-cho uweichuo mafano, nalewihiyo mnu mrimenyi kokye.
44017017	Kyasia sinagoginyi kagaluana na Wayuda na walya waweiṙikyie Ruwa, na walya walegaluana na oe sangaṙa orio mfiri.
44017018	Na wandu waata wawekyelosha malosho ga Waepikureo na Wastoiko, wakagaluana na oe. Wengyi wakagamba, “Tondo-lyi lyikundi igamba kyi?” Wengyi wakagamba, “Nai cha mndu aionguo mbonyi tsa waruwa wengyi, cha kyipfa naweionguo mbonyi tsa Yesu na iṟutso lya wapfu.”
44017019	Wakammbaṙa, wakamṙuo Areopago, wechigamba “Ngyesa loiṙima imanya mbonyi-tsi ngyiyenu uilosha tsagamba kyi?
44017020	Cha kyipfa nuiluendie shindo shiyenu, na lukundi imanya shindo-shi shagamba kyi.”
44017021	Cha kyipfa wandu wa Atene na wayenu wawekyekaa pfo wawewoṙe kyiyeri kyeaṙanyia kyindo kyoose kyiyenu-pfo.
44017022	Paulo kagoṟoka makyiṙi-gawi ga Areopago, kagamba, “Nyoe wandu wa Atene! Kyiiṙi kya mbonyi-tsi ngyiwonyi kye nyoe nyi wandu mokyekuwinisha mnu na mbonyi tsa waruwa...
44017023	Cha kyipfa kyiyeri ngyiweiiṙa ipfo na ipfo na iwona kundu mokyeterewa waruwa, ngyilewona alyitaṟe ingyiṟeie: ‘KO RUWA LULAMWICHI’ Kyasia inyi ngyimuongoya mbonyi tsa ulya nyoe mokyemwindia kulawoṙe immanya.
44017024	“Ruwa nalegumba wuyana na shindo shoose shikyeri-pfo. Oe, cha kyipfa nyi Mndumii o ruwewu na uruka, ekyekaa mahekalunyi gamawikye kui mawoko;
44017025	maa ekyeṟundio kui mawoko ga wandu cha ilyi nauṟie kyindo kyoose-pfo; cha kyipfa nyi oe ekyeenenga wandu woose moo na mṟufui na shindo shoose.
44017026	Na oe iwuka mndu umwi nalegumba mbaṟe tsa wandu tsoose, wakae urukyenyi koose. Oe amonyi wookyia mawookyionyi kawawikyia kyiyeri kyileiṙima iilacho kyekaa kunu wuyanenyi, na iwaloṟa nyi ura luha lochiwa kanyi kowo.
44017027	Kundu wapfule Ruwa, maa kokooya nyi kui ipaaya-paya cha shipfupfuṟe, wammbone, maa chandu alekyekaa kuleshi na soe.
44017028	Cha kyipfa kui pfinya ya Ruwa lokyeenengo moo na ichumia, lukowa chandu lukyeri. Chandu wandu waata kyiiṙi kyanyu wekyeṟeia mashairi walegamba, ‘Cha kyipfa soe nyi wana wa Ruwa.’
44017029	Kyasia, cha kyipfa soe lukyeri wana wa Ruwa, kyiluwaṟi ikusaṟa kye iwa cha Ruwa nyi kyindo kyikyeri cha sahapu ang'u igoe, shindo shishiachikyie kui wuiṙimi na ngyuuṟango tsa wandu-pfo.
44017030	“Kyasia, kyiyeri kyilya kya kacha kya wutondo Ruwa nalewa cha ilyi alawonyi; indi wulalu naiwia wandu woose wa orio handu waṙumbuye wunyamaṟi.
44017031	Cha kyipfa nawikyie mfiri echianduya wandu woose kunu wuyanenyi kulawoṙe ikundia; na echianduya wandu-wo nyi ulya Ruwa amsambuṟie. Na Ruwa naloṟie wandu woose kye nechiwuta kuṙo, kui imṟutsa ko wapfu.”
44017032	Kyasia kyiyeri waleicho mbonyi tsa iṟutso lya wapfu wengyi wakanyeṟe; na wengyi wakagamba, “Lochikuaṙanyia-se lyingyi.”
44017033	Kyasia Paulo kalekana nawo.
44017034	Wandu waata wakawaṙana na oe, wakaiṙikyia Yesu. Kyiiṙi kyawo nyi-we Dionisio, mndu awukyie Areopago, na mndu mka umwi ekyelago Damari, na wandu wengyi hamwi nawo.
44018001	Numa ya iho, Paulo kawuka Atene kashika Korinto.
44018002	Kawona Myuda umwi ekyelago Akyila, amfee Ponto; na oe nacha iwuka uruka lo Italyia mfiri ngyaangu ilekoyaiṙa hamwi na mka okye awekyelago Pirisikyila, cha kyipfa Kyilaudio nalewia Wayuda woose wawukye Roma, na oe kacha na kowo.
44018003	Kyipfa iṟunda lyawo nyi-we lyimwi, kakaa kowo, kaṟunda hamwi nawo, cha kyipfa wawewoṙe wuṟango wo ipfuma mahema.
44018004	Orio mfiri o onyonya kagamba shilya awekusaṟie sinagoginyi, kapfuṟukana ikuruo Wayuda na Wakyiṟikyi wagalukyie ura lokye.
44018005	Na Sila na Timoteo wamsokye iwuka Makyedonia, Paulo alawute kyindo kyingyi kyoose sile iṟingyishia Wayuda kye Yesu nyi Kristo.
44018006	Kyiyeri walekaṟuana na oe na ilahia Ruwa, kakuta-kuta nguwo tsakye, kawawia, “Kokooya mokuṙetsa nyoe muwenyi wuwicho-wo nyi wonyu na chi wo wandu wengyi-pfo. Inyi ngyiwoṙe wuwicho-pfo na wookyia wulalu ngyindeongoya Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa wandu walya walaiṙikyie Yesu.”
44018007	Kawuka pfo kaiṙa na numbenyi ya mndu ekyelago Tito Yusto, mndu aowuye na ikunda Ruwa, mndu numba yakye iwekyeri mṟasenyi na sinagogi.
44018008	Na Krispo, ang'anyi o sinagogi, kaiṙikyia Mndumii hamwi na wandu wa kanyi kokye woose. Kyiyeri Wakorinto wengyi waleicho wakaiṙikyia Yesu, wakapatiso.
44018009	Kyiyeri kya kyio, Paulo akyeri cha mndu ailoṙo, kaicho Mndumii emmbia, “Molaowuoe, indi ṙeṙa, maa ulatsie,
44018010	cha kyipfa inyi ngyikyeri na iyoe, maa kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima ikukapa-pfo; cha kyipfa inyi ngyiwoṙe wandu wafoi kunu mṟinyi.”
44018011	Kakaa pfo kyiyeri kya maka umwi na mori iṟandaaṟu echilosha Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
44018012	Na kyiyeri Galyio awekyeri mchilyi o Akaya Wayuda woose piu wakakapa Paulo, wakamwende na handu heanduya wandu,
44018013	wechigamba, “Mndu-chu naikuruo wandu kundu waiṙikyie Ruwa kyilaṙuṙanyi na chandu kyikyeri sungusinyi.”
44018014	Na Paulo kyiyeri awekundi iṙeṙa, Galyio kawia Wayuda, “Kokooya kyiwekyeri kyindo kya kyinyala ang'u kya ngyeṟo ngyiwicho, lanyoe Wayuda, kyiwechiwa sungusinyi inyi ikaa ura lonyu.
44018015	Indi kokooya kyindo mukusaṟie nyi mbonyi tsa maṙeṙo na marina na shindo chandu shiwaṟi iwa sungusinyi konyu, ngamṙeeya kyindo-kyi, cha kyipfa inyi ngyikundi igamba nyi kyiha kyikyicha ang'u nyi kyiha kyilakyicha-pfo.”
44018016	Kawafuna wawukye mbele ya halya-ndu awekyeṙamia kaanduya wandu.
44018017	Nawo woose wakawaṙa Sostene, ang'anyi o sinagogi, wakamkapa mbele ya handu halya heanduya wandu. Maa Galyio alewona mbonyi-tso kye nyi kyindo-pfo.
44018018	Numa ya iho Paulo kaengyeṟa ikaa pfo mfiri ifoi, naaho kasamana na walya waweiṙikyie Yesu, kayenda Shamu eiṙia ipalyipalyinyi. Pirisikyila na Akyila wakayenda hamwi na oe, ammbute njui ipfo Kyenkrea; cha kyipfa nalekoalya nyamu mbele ya Ruwa iwuta kuṙo.
44018019	Wakashika Efeso, kawaṙa pfo. Oe kaiṙa na sinagoginyi, kagaluana na Wayuda.
44018020	Kyiyeri walekunda nakae kyiyeri kyileshi ngoseṟa, aleiṙikyia-pfo.
44018021	Indi nalesamana nawo, echigamba, “Ngyewuya-se na konyu, Ruwa kangyienenga wuiṙimi wo iwuta kuṙo.” Kawuka Efeso, eiṙia ipalyipalyinyi,
44018022	na amshikye Kaisaria, kaṙo na Yerusalemu, kaiṟikyiṟa siṟi naaho kasoka na Antiokyia.
44018023	Na amkae pfo mfiri ngyaangu, kafuma, kaiṙa urukyenyi lo Galatia na Firikyia, mṟi kui mṟi, echikarisha wanalosho.
44018024	Kyasia Myuda umwi ekyelago Apolo, awemfee Iskanderia, mndu aichi shindo shifoi, kashika Efeso; na oe nawoṙe wuragari wo ikulosha shiṟeio.
44018025	Mndu-cho nawemloshe mbonyi tsa Mndumii, na kyipfa mrima okye uwelangyie nakamwi, kawooka iṙeṙa na ilosha mbonyi tsa Yesu kui sungusinyi, maa kuṙo naweichi wupatiso wo Yohane tikyi.
44018026	Akyeri sinagoginyi kawooka iṙeṙa kulawoṙe wuowu; na kyiyeri Pirisikyila na Akyila waleicho eṙeṙa wakamṙuo kowo, wakamwongoya mbonyi tsa Mndumii necha ngoseṟa.
44018027	Na kyiyeri awekundi iambaṙa nayende mṟasa Akaya, wandu walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wakamtarama, wakaṟeia wanalosho walya paruo kundu wamwambilyie. Na oe kyiyeri aleshika katarama mnu walya walekowamwiṙikyia kui isaṟia lya Ruwa.
44018028	Cha kyipfa nalewinga Wayuda nakamwi mbele ya wandu woose, echiloṟa kui maṙeṙo ga shiṟeio kye Yesu nyi Kristo.
44019001	Kyiyeri Apolo awekyeri Korinto, Paulo, amwiṙie ngyuurukyenyi tsikyeri kuleshi na ipalyipalyi, kashika Efeso, kakooya wanalosho waangu wawekyeri pfo;
44019002	kawawesa, “Kyiyeri muleiṙikyia Yesu muleambilyia Mumuyo Mweele?” Wakamgaluo wakagamba, “Ote. Maa luleicho kye kuwoṙe Mumuyo Mweele-pfo.”
44019003	Kawawesa, “Kokooya nyi wuṙo mulepatiso kui wupatiso wuha?” Wakagamba, “Kui wupatiso wo Yohane.”
44019004	Paulo kagamba, “Yohane nalepatisa kui wupatiso wo itocha wunyamaṟi, echiwia wandu waiṙikyie Yesu Kristo ulya echicha numa yakye.”
44019005	Kyiyeri waleicho kuṙo wakapatiso kui rina lya Mndumii Yesu.
44019006	Na Paulo, amwayekyie mawoko, Mumuyo Mweele kasokyia wuye yawo; wakawooka iṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie ngyihya na ionguo shisuku.
44019007	Na itala lyawo nyi-we wasoṟo ikumi na wawi.
44019008	Kaiṙa na sinagoginyi, kaṙeṙa kui wukari kyiyeri kya mori iṟaṟu, echigaluana na wandu, na iwakuṙuo waiṙikyie mbonyi tsa Wumangyi wo Ruwa.
44019009	Kyaindi wengyi wakalega iiṙikyia, wechilahia Njia iya Mndumii aleloṟa. Kyasia Paulo kalekana nawo, kaṙuo wanalosho walya, kagaluana na wandu orio mfiri inumbenyi lying'anyi lyeloshia wandu lya mndu umwi ekyelago Tirano.
44019010	Mbonyi-tsi tsikawutika kyiyeri kya maka iwi, mṟasa wandu woose, Wayuda na Wakyiṟikyi, wawekyekaa Asia wakaicho Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
44019011	Ruwa kaenenga Paulo wuiṙimi wo iwuta shindo sha maṟiyisho mnu;
44019012	maa wandu waluoe wakaendio shitambaa na nguwo tsiwukyie mmbiunyi o Paulo, wakachia ndoṟe tsawo, na waṟufui wawicho wakawuka kowo.
44019013	Wayuda waata wawekyetenga-tenga, wandu wawewoṙe iṟunda lya ifuna waṟufui wawicho, wakatambagana isenda rina lya Mndumii Yesu kyipfa kya walya wawewoṙo nyi waṟufui wawicho, wechigamba, “Kui rina lya Yesu ulya Paulo ekyeonguo mbonyi tsakye wuka mndu-chu!”
44019014	Hawewoṙe wana mfungaaṙe wa mndu umwi ekyelago Skyewa, Myuda awei mkohanyi ang'anyi, walewuta kuṙo.
44019015	Mṟufui ulya mmbicho kawagaluo, kawawia, “Yesu ngyimwichi na Paulo ngyimwichi, kyaindi nyoe nyi wakyi?”
44019016	Na mndu ulya awoṙo nyi mṟufui mmbicho kashoongyia wana wawi kyiiṙi kya walya mfungaaṙe, kawawinga, mṟasa wakafuma kulya numbenyi weṙicha, wakyeri kyiṟanguoe na wawafaṟe.
44019017	Wayuda woose wakamanya mbonyi-tsi na Wakyiṟikyi woose wawekyekaa Efeso, woose wakawoṙo nyi wuowu, na rina lya Mndumii Yesu lyikang'anyiso.
44019018	Na wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kya walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wakacha wakatocha wunyamaṟi, wechiṟingyishia mawuto gawo.
44019019	Na wandu wafoi kyiiṙi kya walya wawekyewuta shindo sha wusawi wakasania shitapu shawo, wakashikoṟa mbele ya wandu woose; wakaachikyia matala ga woguru wosho, wakawona kye nyi-we cha shilyingyi shiku makumi gaṟaaṟu na shiina.
44019020	Nyi wuṙo wandu wafoi waleengyeṟa iicho Ṙeṙo lya Mndumii, lyechiwinga chandu wandu wafoi walelyiaṙanyia.
44019021	Mbonyi-tso tsamsie, Paulo kaṙumbuo mrimenyi kokye iyenda Makyedonia na Akaya mṟasa Yerusalemu, echigamba, “Ngamkaa pfo kyingyiwaṟi iwona na Roma taa.”
44019022	Kaṙuma wandu wawi kyiiṙi kya walya walemtarama iyenda Makyedonia, nawo nyi Timoteo na Erasto, oe amonyi kakaa Asia kyiyeri kyifuhi.
44019023	Kyiyeri-kyo kukoamka kyituṟu kying'anyi kyiiṙi kya Njia iya Mndumii aleilora.
44019024	Cha kyipfa mndu umwi, ekyelago Demetirio, awekyetsana heleri; na iwika shihekalu sha heleri sha Aritemi, nawekyeenenga waaria kyiira kying'anyi.
44019025	Kasania waaria-wo, hamwi na wengyi wawoṙe iṟunda lyilya, kagamba, “Lanyoe wasoṟo, muichi kye wunjama woṙu wokyewuka kyiiṙi kya iṟunda-lyi.
44019026	Lyingyi-se muwonyi na iicho kye chi kyiiṙi kya Efeso tupu-pfo indi urukyenyi loose lo Asia taa, Paulo-cho nalelemba wandu wafoi na iilacha makusaṟo gawo, echigamba kye iwo wekyeachikyio kui mawoko chi waruwa-pfo.
44019027	Chi igamba kye iṟunda lyaṙu lyikyeri ndengyenyi ya ipiṟo tikyi-pfo; indi na hekalu lya ruwa o kyika akyeri ang'anyi, Aritemi, lyiwono chi kyindo-pfo, na Aritemi naiwuto mng'ano okye, ulya wandu woose wa Asia na wuyana woose wekyemwowuo na imwindia.”
44019028	Kyiyeri waleicho isho wakawoṙonyi nyashi ing'anyi, wakakalagatsa, wechigamba, “Aritemi o Waefeso nang'anyi!”
44019029	Mṟi oose ukowaṙa kyituṟu, wakayenda weṙicha wakaiṙa na handu ha temo wakyeri kyindo kyimwi, wammbaṙe Gayo na Arisitariko, wandu wa Makyedonia wawei kyaronyi hamwi na Paulo.
44019030	Na Paulo kyiyeri awekundi iiṙa na wandunyi, wanalosho walemlekyia nawute kuṙo-pfo.
44019031	Na wasongoru waata wa Asia, wawekyeri mbuya tsakye wakaṙuma wandu kokye, wechimterewa alaiṙe na handu halya ha temo.
44019032	Kyasia wengyi waweilyia kuṙi na wengyi kuṙi; cha kyipfa kyisanzionyi kyilya kyilekokyafoika-foika, na wandu wengyi halya kyisanzionyi walemanya kyitewe kya isanzia handu hamwi-pfo.
44019033	Wakawuta Iskanda kulya kyisanzionyi, Wayuda wechimmbikyia mbele ya wandu. Iskanda kawatsinia na kuwoko, akundi iloṟa mbele ya wandu chandu alawewoṙe wuwicho woose.
44019034	Kyaindi kyiyeri walemanya kye oe nyi Myuda, wakakalagatsa woose piu kui ṟui lyimwi kyiyeri cha kya saa tsiwi, wechigamba, “Aritemi o Waefeso nang'anyi!”
44019035	Na kyiyeri kaṟanyi o mṟi ammbie wandu watsie tsii, kagamba, “Lanyoe wasoṟo wa Efeso, nyi mndu uha alaichi kye mṟi o Efeso nyi moambuya hekalu lya Aritemi akyeri ang'anyi, na moambuya igoe lyilya lyiele lyileoloka iwuka ruwewu?
44019036	Kyasia kyipfa mbonyi-tsi tsilechiiṙima igambo kye chi loi-pfo, kyimmbaṟi iololyia; mulawute kyindo mulaselyie maṙima.
44019037	Cha kyipfa moende wandu-wa walaiwie shindo sha hekalu maa ilahia ruwa oṙu o kyika.
44019038	Kyasia kokooya Demetirio na waaria wakyeri hamwi na oe wawoṙe ṙeṙo kyipfa kya mndu-chu, mengye tsikyeri-pfo, na wachilyi wakyeri pfo; koikyo waṙuane mengyenyi.
44019039	Indi mukopfula ṙeṙo lyoose shindonyi shingyi, shechiachikyio nyi kyisanzionyi kya raia, kyisanzionyi kyekyeṟunda chandu kyiwaṟi.
44019040	Cha kyipfa luwoṙe ndenga ya iṙoo mengyenyi kyipfa kya kyituṟu kya inu, kyituṟu kyaamka kulawoṙe kyimaṙuma; na kyiiṙi kya ṙeṙo-lyo, loiṙima igamba kye kuwewoṙe kyimaṙuma kyeamtsa kyituṟu-pfo.”
44019041	Amgambe isho kawia wandu wayende kanyi.
44020001	Kyiyeri mtiṟi ulya uletsia, Paulo kaṙuma wanalosho wandelago, kawakarisha na isamana nawo; numa ya iho kayenda mṟasa Makyedonia.
44020002	Na oe amwiṙie ngyuura tsilya na iwiyiṟia wandu moo kui maṙeṙo gafoi, kashika uruka lo Wakyiṟikyi.
44020003	Amkae pfo kyiyeri kya mori iṟaṟu, na Wayuda immbikyia ngyeṟo, kakunda iyenda shamu kui njia ya ipalyipalyinyi. Kyasia kaṙumbuo iwuya kui njia ya Makyedonia.
44020004	Wandu-wa wakaoshana na oe; Sopatiro, awukyie Beroya, mana o Piro, na Arisitariko na Sekundo, wandu wa Tesalonikye; na Gayo, mndu o Deribe, na Timoteo; na Tikyiko na Tirofimo, wandu wa Asia.
44020005	Indi wandu-wo walekowasonguo wakaluweṙelyia Tiroa.
44020006	Soe lukopfunga kyaro, numa ya mṟumoe o mkate ilangyitarang'ishe, lukowuka Filyipi, lukowakooya Tiroa, kyaro kya mfiri itanu, lukokaa pfo mfiri mfungaaṙe.
44020007	Na mfiri o kuwooka o juma, kyiyeri lulesanzia handu hamwi kundu lulye mkate o Mndumii, Paulo nalewalosha, akundi iyenda kyaro ilya-ngama, na oe kalosha mṟasa kyio kya mayeleyele.
44020008	Hawewoṙe taa tsifoi halya kai, handu luwesanzie.
44020009	Manakye umwi, ekyelago Eutiko, naweṙamie dirishenyi, kawoṙo nyi maṙoe mnu; na kyiyeri Paulo aleengyeṟa ilosha, kafooyo nyi maṙoe kaoloka iwuka kai ya kaṟaaṟu iyenda wuye; kairo ampfe.
44020010	Paulo kasoka kulya kai, kaarama, kamchunguṟia, kagamba, “Kutsienyi, kyipfa moo ukyeri kyiiṙi kyakye.”
44020011	Kaṙooya-se kulya kai, kapeṟenguo mkate, kalya, kaengyeṟa ilosha mṟasa ngamenyi utuko, naaho kawuka halya.
44020012	Wakaende manakye ulya, ai na moo, wakakuicho iwiyiṟio moo mnu.
44020013	Kyaindi soe lukosonguo iyenda ngalawenyi, lukoiṙa ipalyipalyinyi iyenda Aso, lukusurie iṙa pfo Paulo; cha kyipfa nyi wuṙo alekoaluwia. Oe amonyi nalekunda iyenda na maṙende.
44020014	Kyiyeri alelukooya kulya Aso, lukommbika kulya ngalawenyi, na numa ya iho lukoshika Mitilene.
44020015	Lukowuka pfo na ilya-ngama lukoshika handu haambuyanyi na mṟi okyelago Kyio. Mfiri o kaṟaaṟu lukoafukyia Samo, lukokaa Tirogilyio, mfiri o kaana lukoshika Mileto.
44020016	Paulo nawekundi iiṙa Efeso akyeri ngalawenyi, kundu alachekyelyio kulya Asia; cha kyipfa awewoṙe kyiyeri kya iretsa-pfo. Nawekundi ishika Yerusalemu iwinyi mfiri o Pentekoste, kokooya kyiwechiiṙimika.
44020017	Iwuka Mileto Yesu kaṙuma wandu iyenda Efeso, kalaga wameeku wa siṟi.
44020018	Kyiyeri waleshika kokye, kawawia, “Nyoe muichi wookyia mfiri ya kuwooka kyiyeri ngyilecha na kunu Asia, chandu ngyiwekyeri konyu mfiri yoose,
44020019	ngyechiṟundia Mndumii kui wusimiri woose, na kui mcheṟeṟe, na shiyesho shilengyichia kui ngyeṟo tsa Wayuda.
44020020	Kye ngyileṙa imuongoya kyindo kyoose kyechimuendie nyoe kyiira-pfo, kyaindi ngyilemulosha kulawoṙe iṟikyia kyindo, na numba kui numba,
44020021	ngyechiṟingyishia Wayuda na Wakyiṟikyi watochie Ruwa wunyamaṟi na iiṙikyia Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
44020022	Kyasia, wulalu ngyiyenda Yerusalemu, Mumuyo Mweele engyitsindika mrimenyi, ngyilamanya shindo shechingyiwutikyia pfo;
44020023	kyaindi Mumuyo mweele mṟi kui mṟi nekyengyiṟingyishia echigamba kye ngyuukyiwa tsifoi tsingyiweṙa.
44020024	Kyaindi ngyiwonyi moo oko kye nyi kyindo kya woguru koko kuta iafutsia iṟunda lyilya Yesu alengyienenga-pfo. Iṟunda ngyileenengo nyi ionguo Mbonyi Ngyicha tsa isaṟia lya Ruwa.
44020025	Na wulalu inyi ngyiichi kye nyoe moose ngyilemuongoya mbonyi tsa Wumangyi wo Ruwa, ngayenda ipfo na ipfo, mochingyiwona-se-pfo.
44020026	Koikyo ngamuṟingyishia moose mfiri-chu o inu, kye kokooya maa umwi onyu aṙeka ngyiwoṙo pfo-pfo.
44020027	Cha kyipfa ngyileṙa imuongoya mbonyi tsa orio kyindo Ruwa akundi-pfo.
44020028	Ringyenyi mrima yanyu, na poo-lyo lyoose, lyilya Mumuyo Mweele alemusambuṟa nyoe mulyiambuye, muiṙime ienenga Siṟi yakye kando, Siṟi aleigaluo yakye amonyi kui upfu lokye.
44020029	Ngyiichi kye ngammbuka iha, wandu walang'a cha shisii wechicha na konyu, wanyamaṟe Siṟi.
44020030	Lyingyi-se kyiiṙi kyanyu nyoe kochiwuka wandu, wechiṙeṙa shindo sha wuṙetsi, walembe wanalosho wakae ura lowo.
44020031	Koikyo laenyi kyiṙombo, mochikumbuo kye maka iṟaṟu, kyio na kyingoto, ngyileṙa iṙeṙia orio umwi onyu, ngyechilya wukyiwa wung'anyi mnu-pfo.”
44020032	“Kyasia, wulalu ngamuṙambika ko Ruwa, na kui ṙeṙo lya isaṟia lyechiiṙima imtarama na imuenenga kyioṟa hamwi na woose wawailyishe mrimenyi kowo.
44020033	Ngyilelanga heleri maa sahapu maa nguwo tsa mndu-pfo.
44020034	Nyoe muichi kye ngyileṟunda kui mawoko gako ngawona kyengyitarama hamwi na walya wawekyeri hamwi na inyi.
44020035	Kui iṟunda na wuragari ngyilemloṟa kye kyimmbaṟi itarama wandu wafofo, na ikumbuo maṙeṙo ga Mndumii Yesu, chandu alegamba, ‘Nanga ienengyia kuta iambilyia.’ ”
44020036	Kyiyeri Paulo amgambe kuṙo kapfiria ndi, katerewa hamwi nawo woose.
44020037	Wakafiiṟa woose, wakachunguṟia Paulo, wakamkomba-komba,
44020038	wechiwihiyo mnu kyipfa kya kyilya alegamba, kye wechimmbona-se-pfo. Wakamwimia mṟasa wakamsitsa ngalawenyi.
44021001	Kyiyeri lomlekane nawo, lukoiṙia ipalyipalyinyi lukoshika Kosi, na ilya-ngama lukoshika Rodo na iwuka pfo lukoshika Patara,
44021002	lukowona ngalawa iambaṙa mṟasa Foinikye lukoṙooya pfo. Lukoengyeṟa iiṙia ipalyipalyinyi na
44021003	kyiyeri lulewona kyiṟingyiti kya Kyipiro lukokyiṙa ura lo kumoso; lukoyenda mṟasa Shamu lukosoka na Tiro. Cha kyipfa ipfo nyipfo ngalawa yaṙu iweisotsia mlari oyo.
44021004	Lommbone wanalosho lukokaa pfo mfiri mfungaaṙe, nawo wakawia Paulo kui wuiṙimi wo Mumuyo alayende Yerusalemu.
44021005	Na kyiyeri mfiri mfungaaṙe ilesia lukofuma lukoyenda mṟasa nja ya mṟi, lukopfiria ndi mbai ya ipalyipalyi lukoterewa;
44021006	na lomsamane lukoṙooya ngalawenyi, nawo wakawuya na kanyi kowo.
44021007	Na kyiyeri lulemarisa kyaro kyaṙu iwuka Tiro lukoshika Tolemai; lukoiṟikyiṟa walya waweiṙikyie Yesu lukokaa kowo mfiri umwi.
44021008	Ilya-ngama ngamenyi lukofuma, lukoshika Kaisaria, lukoiṙa na kanyi ko Filyipo, mndu awekyeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha, awekyeri umwi o walya mfungaaṙe, lukokaa kokye.
44021009	Mndu-cho nawewoṙe wana waana wa kyika, wakyega, wawekyeonguo shisuku.
44021010	Kyasia kyiyeri luwekyeri pfo mfiri ifoi, moonguo shisuku umwi ekyelago Akabo kacha awuka uruka lo Uyuda.
44021011	Kyiyeri aleshika halya-ndu luwekyeri kaira mkanda o Paulo, kapfunga nacho maṙende na mawoko gakye, kagamba “Mumuyo Mweele nagamba kuṙi, ‘Nyi wuṙo Wayuda wa Yerusalemu wechipfunga monyi o mkanda-chu, nawo wechimṙambika ko wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu.’ ”
44021012	Kyasia kyiyeri luleicho kuṙo, soe na wandu wa handu halya, lukomterewa alayende Yerusalemu.
44021013	Nyi lyo-ndu Paulo alelugaluo na iluwia, “Ny'kyikyi muiwuta kui ifiiṟa na ingyienenga wuowu? Cha kyipfa inyi, hamwi na iwiko kyipfungonyi ngyikuṟeyeṟie iwoogo kulya Yerusalemu kyipfa kya rina lya Mndumii Yesu.”
44021014	Kyiyeri alelega kyilya luwemmbia, lukotsia, lochigamba, “Kyilya Mndumii akundi kyiwutikye.”
44021015	Numa ya mfiri iya lukoira shindo shaṙu lukoṙo na Yerusalemu.
44021016	Wanalosho waata wa Kaisaria wakaoshana na soe, wakaṙuo Mnasoni awukyie Kyipiro, awei manalosho o kacha ulya lulekaa kokye.
44021017	Kyiyeri luleshika Yerusalemu walya waweiṙikyie Yesu wakaluambilyia na sia.
44021018	Na ilya-ngama Paulo kayenda ko Yakobo hamwi na soe, na wameeku woose wa siṟi wawekyeri pfo.
44021019	Lomuwaiṟikyiṟe, kawaongoya shindo shoose kyimwi kyimwi Ruwa alewuta kyiiṙi kya walya walaiṙikyie Yesu kui iṟunda lya Paulo.
44021020	Nawo kyiyeri waleicho wakaṟumisha Ruwa, wakammbia, “Mono-wama oṙu, nuwonyi chandu Wayuda waleiṙikyia Yesu wakyeri shiku shifoi, na woose wawoṙe wunyenyi mnu kyipfa kya uwawaso.
44021021	Nawo wammbio mbonyi tsapfo, kye nuilosha Wayuda woose wekyekaa ngyuurukyenyi tsa wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu iṙa malosho ya Mose, ochiwawia walaṙine wana wawo, maa iosha miichiwie ya Wayuda.
44021022	Kyasia ny'kyikyi? Loi wechimanya kye nocha.
44021023	Koikyo wuta ikyi luikuwia. Kuwoṙe wandu waana kyiiṙi kyaṙu wawikyie kyaasa.
44021024	Ṙuo wandu-wo, usanjo hamwi nawo, mulawaṙe ukoe mbele ya Ruwa; na itaa kyilya kyiwaṟi itoo kundu wasanjo, wawute njui mṙoenyi yawo, wandu woose waiṙime imanya kye mbonyi tsilya tsapfo walewio chi kyindo-pfo, indi iyoe nuiwuta chandu kyiwaṟi na iosha uwawaso.
44021025	Kyaindi ko mbonyi tsa wandu walaweiṙikyie waleiṙikyia Yesu, luleṟeia na iṙumbuo kye wakushowe mrima yawo na shindo shishiṙasie mafano, na samu, na kyindo kyikyiwaage kui ipfumbo, na wuṟui.”
44021026	Naaho-ng'u Paulo kalaga wasoṟo walya, na ilya-ngama kasanja mrima okye hamwi nawo, kaiṙa na hekalulyi, echionguo kyindo kyiwaṟi iwuto mfiri iya ya isanjo, mṟasa kyienengo kyiwuto kyipfa kyawo.
44021027	Kyasia kyiyeri mfiri iya mfungaaṙe iwekyeri kufuhi na iafukyia, Wayuda wawewukyie Asia wakammbona akyeri hekalunyi, wakatuṟutsana wandu woose, wakammbaṙa,
44021028	wakakalagatsa, na igamba, “Lanyoe wasoṟo wa Isiraelyi lutaramenyi. Ichu nyi oe mndu ulya ekyelosha wandu woose orio handu, chandu kyilaṙuṙanyi na isanga lyaṙu maa uwawaso, maa miichiwie ya handu-ha. Lyingyi-se, ngoseṟa ya isho, naitsa Wakyiṟikyi na hekalunyi, kafanyiṟa kyimṟumoe handu-ha haele.”
44021029	Cha kyipfa walekowawona Tirofimo, mndu awukyie Efeso, akyeri mṟinyi hamwi na Paulo, wakakusaṟa kye Paulo namwitsa na hekalunyi.
44021030	Mṟi oose ukowa kyituṟu, cha ilyi wandu woose wakasanzia handu hamwi, wakawaṙa Paulo wakamkuruo, wakammbuta hekalunyi, na kulawoṙe iṙetsa ṙaawa moongo ikashingo.
44021031	Na kyiyeri waweipfula chandu wembaaga, mbonyi tsikashika ko msongoru o asikari wa shiṙa kye mṟi oose o Yerusalemu ofoika.
44021032	Kulawoṙe iṙetsa kyiyeri kawuta asikari na wachilyi, kayenda Yerusalemu eṙicha. Kyiyeri wandu walewona msongoru ulya o asikari wa shiṙa wakaṙa ikapa Paulo.
44021033	Numa ya iho msongoru ulya o asikari wa shiṙa katikyira kufuhi na Paulo, kammbaṙa, kagamba napfungo na mshe iwi; kawesa, “Nyi wui ichu? Ny'kyikyi awuta?”
44021034	Wengyi wuingyinyi wulya wo wandu wakakalagatsa wegamba ikyi na wengyi kyingyi. Kyasia kyiyeri msongoru ulya o asikari wa shiṙa alelemo imanya mbonyi kyipfa kya kyikalagatso kyilya, kagamba naitso na moombonyi.
44021035	Kyasia kyiyeri Paulo aleshika shitengunyi alaiṙime itikyira; koikyo asikari walya wakamyekyia mayewenyi kyipfa kya kyituṟu kya ṟiima lyilya.
44021036	Kyipfa ṟiima lying'anyi lya wandu lyilemwosha, wechikalagatsa na igamba, “Mmbaage!”
44021037	Paulo amwitso na kulya moombonyi kawia msongoru ulya o asikari wa shiṙa, “Ngyiwoṙe momu o kuwia kyindo?” Na oe kagamba, “Iyoe nuichi mṙeṙie o Kyikyiṟikyi?
44021038	Iyoe chi Mmisiri ulya mfiri ya ipfo numa aleenenga wandu shiku shiina isuana, wandu wawekyelago Wawaagi, kowasongoya iyenda kundu ko nuka ngyiumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga?”
44021039	Paulo kagamba, “Inyi nyi Myuda, mndu awukyie Tariso, mṟi o Kyilyikyia, mndu awukyie mṟinyi uwoṙe rina. Ngyikuterewa ungyienengye momu ngyiṙeṙe na wandu-wa.”
44021040	Kyasia, kyiyeri alemwenenga momu, Paulo kagoṟoka halya shitengunyi, katsinia wandu wa mṟi ulya; na kyiyeri waletsia sau, kaṙeṙa nawo kui mṙeṙie o Kyiebrania, echigamba,
44022001	“Lanyoe wasoṟo, wana wa wama wako na waawu wako, ngyiaṙanyienyi ngyechiloṟa mbele yanyu wulalu, chandu ngyilammbicho.”
44022002	Kyiyeri waleicho eṙeṙa nawo kui mṙeṙie o Kyiebrania wakaengyeṟa itsia, na oe kagamba,
44022003	“Inyi nyi Myuda, ngyilefeo Tariso, mṟi o Kyilyikyia, indi ngyileng'anyisio kunu mṟinyi, ngyikyeri manalosho o Kamalyielyi. Ngalosho chandu kyiwaṟi mawawaso goose ga waku waṙu, ngawa mndu ekyepfuṟukania Ruwa chandu nyoe mukyeri inu.
44022004	Ngalyisa wukyiwa wandu walya wekyeosha njia iya ya Mndumii ngawapfunga na iwawaaga, ngyechiwawika kyipfungonyi, wasoṟo na waka.
44022005	Chandu Mkohanyi ulya ang'anyi kuta woose aingyiṟingyishia, na wameeku woose wa mengye, walya ngyilewuta paruo kowo, ngayenda Dameskyi, kundu ngyiende wandu waiṙikyie Yesu wakyeri pfo, wawapfungye, kundu walyiso wukyiwa.”
44022006	“Kyikawa-ng'u kyiyeri ngyiwekyeri kyaronyi, ngyikyeri kufuhi na Dameskyi, kyiyeri kya saa tsiṟandaaṟu tsa kyingoto, cha ilyi ngyeela ing'anyi ilewuka ruwewu, ikangyilyimika ngyuura tsoose.
44022007	Ngaoloka wanda, ngaicho ṟui lyechingyiwia, ‘Saulyi Saulyi, ny'kyilyi ungyilyisa wukyiwa?’
44022008	Ngagaluo ngagamba, ‘Iyoe nyi wui, Mndumii?’ Kangyiwia, ‘Inyi nyi Yesu o Nasareti, ulya iyoe umlyisa wukyiwa.’
44022009	Na walya wawekyeri hamwi na inyi walewona ngyeela-yo, kyaindi waleicho ṟui lya ulya aleṙeṙa na inyi-pfo.
44022010	Ngagamba, ‘Ngyiwute kyi, Mndumii?’ Mndumii kangyiwia, ‘Goṟoka, uiṙe na Dameskyi, na ipfo nochiwio mbonyi tsa shindo shoose shishigambe ushiṟunde.’
44022011	Na kyiyeri ngyilepfa meso kyipfa kya mng'ano o ngyeela iya, walya wawekyeri hamwi na inyi wakangyiwaṙa mawoko wakangyiṙuo Dameskyi.
44022012	Kyasia mndu umwi, Anania, mndu akundi na iowuo Ruwa kui iosha mawawaso, aleṟingyishio wucha nyi Wayuda woose wawekyekaa pfo,
