44022013	kacha na koko, kagoṟoka kufuhi na inyi, kangyiwia, ‘Mono-wama oko, Saulyi, wona.’ Kyiyeri kyilya kyilya ngawona, ngamwitukuya.
44022014	Kagamba, ‘Ruwa o waku waṙu nakusambuṟa iyoe uiṙime imanya shilya akundi, na iwona ulya awoṙe wusumganyi, na iicho kyindo agamba.
44022015	Cha kyipfa nochiwa mṟingyishi okye ko wandu woose, o shindo-sho ulewona na iicho.
44022016	Kyasia wulalu, ny'kyikyi uweṙa? Goṟoka, upatiso, usanjo maṙeko gapfo, uterewe kui rina lyakye.’ ”
44022017	“Kyikawa-ng'u kyiyeri ngyiwewuya na Yerusalemu, kyiyeri ngyiweiterewa ngyikyeri hekalunyi, ngawa cha mndu ailoṙo.
44022018	Ngammbona, na oe kangyiwia, ‘Pfuṟukana uwukye Yerusalemu iwinyi, cha kyipfa wechiiṙikyia wuṟingyishi wulya wo mbonyi tsako ochiwaenenga-pfo.’
44022019	Na inyi ngagamba, ‘Mndumii, iwo waichi kye inyi ngyilewika kyipfungonyi walya wakuiṙikyie na iwakapa orio sinagoginyi.
44022020	Na kyiyeri mṟingyishi opfo Stefano alewoogo, inyi ngyiwegoṟokyi kufuhi, ngyiwonyi nyi necha kyilya waweiwuta, na iambuya nguwo tsa walya walembaaga.’
44022021	Na oe kangyiwia, ‘Yenda, cha kyipfa inyi ngyechikuṙuma uyende kuleshi ko wandu walangyiiṙikyie.”
44022022	Wakamwaṙanyia mṟasa kyiyeri alegamba kuṙo, wakaṙeṙa na ṟui lying'anyi, wechigamba, “Wuta mndu-chu iha. Nawaṟi iwoogo!”
44022023	Kyiyeri waweikalagatsa na ikucha-kucha nguwo tsawo na iputsa kyilulyi,
44022024	ang'anyi ulya o asikari wa shiṙa kagamba naitso na kulya moombonyi, echigamba, “Naweso mbonyi tsakye kui imkapa na ngowa, kundu namanye kyitewe kya imkalagatsia kuṙi.”
44022025	Na kyiyeri wamumpfungye na shigowo, Paulo kawia mchilyi ulya awegoṟokyi kufuhi, “Ngyesa nyi sungusinyi ikapa mndu ai Mroma alaanduyo?”
44022026	Kyiyeri Mchilyi ulya aleicho, kayenda kawia ang'anyi ulya o asikari wa shiṙa, echigamba, “Nukundi iwuta kyi? Cha kyipfa mndu-chu nyi Mroma.”
44022027	Ang'anyi ulya o asikari wa shiṙa kacha, kammbesa, “Kyengyiwia; iyoe nyi Mroma?” Kagamba, “Yee.”
44022028	Ang'anyi ulya o asikari wa shiṙa kagaluo, kagamba, “Inyi ngyilewa raia o uruka-lu kui ienengyia heleri tsifoi.” Paulo kagamba, “Wafee wako inyi nyi Waroma wookyia ngyilandefeo.”
44022029	Kyasia walya wawekuṟeyeṟie immbesa wakawuka halya wakamleka. Ang'anyi ulya o asikari wa shiṙa na oe kaowuo, kyiyeri alemanya kye nyi Mroma, na kyipfa alempfunga.
44022030	Ilya-ngama, ang'anyi ulya o asikari wa shiṙa akundi imanya wuloi, nyi kyikyi kyileenenga Wayuda igamba kye Paulo nammbicho, kampfunguo, kawia wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wandu woose wa mengyenyi wasanzie handu hamwi. Kaende Paulo, kammbikyia mbele yawo.
44023001	Paulo kaitukuya wandu walya wa halya mengyenyi karii, kagamba, “Wana wa wama wako, inyi kui mrima muyendelyi nakamwi ngyilekaa mbele ya Ruwa mṟasa inu.”
44023002	Anania, mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, kawia walya wawegoṟokyi kufuhi walachuoe Paulo ṙumbunyi.
44023003	Naaho Paulo kammbia, “Ruwa nechikukapa iyoe kyiambasa kyikyishie chokaa. Iyoe nukyeri iha ingyianduya chandu mawawaso gagambie, na kunu iyoe nugamba ngyikapo, kyindo mawawaso galagambie?”
44023004	Walya wawegoṟokyi kufuhi, wakagamba, “Nulahia Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose o Ruwa mcho?”
44023005	Paulo kagamba, “Ngamanya-pfo, wana wa wama, kye oe nyi Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose; cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, ‘Maa ulaṙeṙe uwicho msongoru o wandu wapfo.’ ”
44023006	Kyiyeri Paulo alemanya kye kyitumbuṟe kyimwi nyi Masadukayo, na kyitumbuṟe kyingyi nyi Mafarisayo, kakuilenga na ṟui lyakye halya mengyenyi kagamba, “Wana wa wama wako, inyi nyi Mfarisayo, mana o Mfarisayo. Inyi ngyianduyo kyipfa kya ikusuria iṟutso lya wapfu.”
44023007	Kyiyeri alemarisa igamba kuṙo Masadukayo na Mafarisayo wakaluyana, wandu walya wawesanzie halya walawaṙe makusaṟo gamwi.
44023008	Cha kyipfa Masadukayo wekyegamba kye kuwoṙe iṟutso lya wapfu maa malaika maa mumuyo-pfo; indi Mafarisayo wekyeiṙikyia isho shoose.
44023009	Hakawaṙa kyikalagatso kying'anyi. Walosha wengyi wa mawawaso ga Mose wawekyeri ura lo Mafarisayo wakagoṟoka, wakaṙeṙa, wechigamba, “Luwonyi wuwicho woose ko mndu-chu-pfo; indi kokooya mumuyo ang'u malaika naṙeṙa na oe, nyi kyikyi?”
44023010	Kyiyeri halewaṙa iluyana lying'anyi, asikari ulya o shiṙa kaowuo Paulo alachepaṟika kawi, kawia asikari wache wammbute halya ko pfinya, na imwitsa na moombonyi.
44023011	Kyio kyilya Mndumii kagoṟoka kufuhi na oe, kagamba, “Kuwanze; cha kyipfa chandu uleṟingyishia mbonyi tsako Yerusalemu, kyikuwaṟi ingyiṟingyishia kuṙo kulya Roma.”
44023012	Kyiyeri kulekya Wayuda wakawaṙa kyama, wakalya nyamu kye wechilya maa inyo kyindo kyoose mṟasa wawaage Paulo-pfo.
44023013	Na iwo walelya nyamu-yo nyi-we wandu ngoseṟa ya makumi gaana.
44023014	Nawo wakayenda ko wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wasongoru wa wandu, wakagamba, “Lolya nyamu, lulalye kyindo maa inyo kyindo kyoose mṟasa luwaage Paulo.
44023015	Kyasia wulalu nyoe na wameeku wa mengye wienyi ang'anyi o asikari wa shiṙa namsotse na konyu, cha ilyi mukundi imanya mbonyi tsakye necha ngoseṟa; na soe lukuṟeyeṟie immbaaga alashika konyu.”
44023016	Mho o Paulo kaicho mbonyi tsa imlaalyia, kayenda kaiṙa na kulya moombonyi kaongoya Paulo mbonyi-tso.
44023017	Paulo kalaga mchilyi umwi, kagamba, “Ṙuo manakye-chu ko ang'anyi o asikari wa shiṙa; kyipfa ngyiwoṙe kyindo kyemmbia.”
44023018	Kyasia kamṙuo ko ang'anyi o asikari wa shiṙa, kammbia, “Paulo, ulya ammbikye kyipfungonyi, nalengyilaga kangyiwia ngyikuendie manakye-chu kyipfa nawoṙe kyindo akundi ikuwia.”
44023019	Ang'anyi ulya o asikari wa shiṙa kammbaṙa kuwoko kayenda na oe mbai, kammbesa kui kyiṟika, “Ny'kyikyi ukundi ingyiwia?”
44023020	Kagamba, “Wayuda waṙumbuo ikuterewa usotse Paulo ngama, ummbikye mbele ya mengye, cha ilyi wakundi imanya mbonyi tsakye necha ngoseṟa.
44023021	Kyasia iyoe ulaiṙikyie; cha kyipfa wandu ngoseṟa ya makumi gaana waimlaalyia; walyiie nyamu walalye maa inyo kyindo kyoose mṟasa wammbaage; nawo wulalu wakuṟeyeṟie, wechiweṙelyia kyaasa kyapfo.”
44023022	Kyasia ang'anyi ulya o asikari wa shiṙa kalekyia manakye ulya nayende, echimmbia, “Ulawie mndu oose kye nongyiongoya ishi.”
44023023	Kalaga wachilyi watutu wawi, kawawia, “Ṟeyeṟenyi asikari magana gawi iyenda Kaisaria, na asikari makumi mfungaaṙe wekyechumia waṙamie wuye ya farasi, na asikari magana gawi wawoṙe mapfumu, lukoshika saa tsiṟaaṟu tsa kyio wawe wamkuṟeyeṟa.
44023024	Kawawia wakuṟeyeṟe iṙuo Paulo na imsitsa kyipuo ko mchilyi Filekyisi.”
44023025	Kaṟeia paruo igambie kuṙi:
44023026	“Kyilaudio Lyisia, ko Filekyisi, mchilyi awoṙe rina. Ngakuiṟikyiṟa!
44023027	Mndu-chu nalewoṙo nyi Wayuda, wakakyiṟemmbaaga; naaho-ng'u ngayenda hamwi na kyikosi kya asikari ngamkyiṟa, kyiyeri ngyilemanya mbonyi kye oe nyi Mroma.
44023028	Na inyi ngyikundi imanya kyindo kyilewaenenga imshitakyi, ngamsotsa na immbikyia mengyenyi.
44023029	Ngawona naweshitakyio kyipfa kya mbonyi tsa mawawaso ga Mose; maa aleshitakyio kyipfa kya kyindo kyoose kyechiiṙima imwenenga iwoogo ang'u iwiko kyipfungonyi-pfo.
44023030	Na kyiyeri ngyileendio mbonyi kye kuwoṙe ngyeṟo tsewaaga mndu-chu, cha ilyi ngamṙika kopfo, ngawia na walya walemshitakyi waonguo mbonyi tsakye mbele yapfo. Ngakukundia mecha.”
44023031	Kyasia asikari walya wakaṙuo Paulo chandu walewio, wakamṙuo mṟasa ko Antipatiri kyio.
44023032	Na kyiyeri kulekya wakaṙa asikari walya wekyechumia waṙamie wuye ya farasi wayende handu hamwi na oe, nawo wakawuya na kulya moombonyi.
44023033	Na walya kyiyeri waleshika Kaisaria, na ienenga mchilyi paruo iya, wakawika Paulo mbele yakye.
44023034	Na oe amwisome, kawawesa, “Mndu-chu nyi o uruka luha?” Kyiyeri alewio kye nawukyie Kyilyikyia,
44023035	kagamba, “Ngyechiicho kyindo ukundi igamba kyiyeri wechicha walya walekushitakyi.” Kagamba naringo akyeri numbenyi ya Herode ya wuchilyi.
44024001	Hamwiṙe mfiri itanu, Anania, Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose, kayenda hamwi na wasongoru wa wandu, na mndu ekyekania wandu mengyenyi ekyelago Teritulo, wakaongoya mchilyi mbonyi tsa Paulo.
44024002	Na oe kyiyeri alelago, Teritulo kawooka ishitakyi Paulo, echigamba, “Kyipfa wuchilyi wopfo wokyeluendie ufoṟo iyoe Filekyisi uwoṙe rina, na kyipfa kya wusongoru wopfo shindo shiwicho kunu urukyenyi loṙu shekyeachikyio,
44024003	kyasia lochiambilyia orio kyiyeri na orio handu, lochigamba haika.
44024004	Kyaindi ngyilakutuure nawi, ngakuterewa uluaṙanyie shindonyi shaangu kui wucha wopfo.
44024005	Cha kyipfa lowona mndu-chu kye namlang'a, nekyewooka wuṟiingyi kyiiṙi kya Wayuda woose wuyanenyi; lyingyi-se nyi msongoru o mwiṙikyie o Wanasorayo.
44024006	Na lyingyi-se naletambagana ifanyiṟa hekalu kyimṟumoe; lukommbaṙa [lukokunda imwanduya kui mawawaso gaṙu.
44024007	Kyaindi Lyisia, ang'anyi o asikari wa shiṙa, kacha, kammbuta koṙu ko pfinya,
44024008	kagamba walya wawemshitakyi wache na kopfo.] Iyoe kumonyi kui imsoruo-soruo noiṙima imanya mbonyi tsa shindo shaluenenga imshitakyi.
44024009	Wayuda nawo wakamshitakyi, wechigamba kye nyi wuṙo mbonyi-tsi tsikyeri.”
44024010	Kyiyeri mchilyi alemtsinia kundu naṙeṙe, Paulo nalegamba, “Cha kyipfa ngyiichi kye iyoe nui moṙumbuo moondu o uruka-lu ko maka ifoi, ngyiloṟa chandu ngyilammbicho kui mrima uwoṙe sia.
44024011	Kyipfa noiṙima imanya kye halandeiṙe mfiri ikumi na iwi wookyia ngyileṙo na Yerusalemu indeterewa-pfo.
44024012	Wandu-wa walengyiwona hekalunyi, ngyegaluana na mndu, ang'u iamtsa kyituṟu kyisanzionyi, maa sinagoginyi maa mṟinyi-pfo.
44024013	Maa weiṙima iṟingyishia shindo-shi shiwaenenga wulalu ingyishitakyi-pfo.
44024014	Indi kyindo ngyigamba kopfo nyi kye kui Njia iya ya Mndumii waigamba nyi ya wongo, ngyekyeindia Ruwa o waku waṙu, ngyiiṙikyie shoose shiṙuṙanyi na uwawaso na shilya shishiṟeie shitapunyi sha weonguo shisuku.
44024015	Ngyiwoṙe ikusuria ko Ruwa, ikusuria maa iwo wailyiweṙelyia, kye kochiwaṙa iṟutso lya wapfu, wasumganyi na walawasumganyi taa.
44024016	Na inyi ngyekyetambagana iichiwia kyindo-kyi ngyiwaṙe mrima ulawoṙe mti mbele ya Ruwa na mbele ya wandu mfiri yoose.
44024017	Hamwiṙe maka ifoi ngyilecha ngyiendie wandu wa uruka loko shienengo.
44024018	Wakangyiwona hekalunyi ngyepfuṟukania mbonyi-tsi, ngyimwilyi peṟu kyimṟumoe, maa ngyiwewika kyisanzionyi maa iamtsa kyituṟu-pfo; kyaindi kuwewoṙe Wayuda waata wawukyie Asia;
44024019	wawaṟi iwa iha mbele yapfo ingyishitakyi, kokooya wawoṙe kyindo kyoose kyiwicho waigamba ngyilewuta.
44024020	Ang'u wandu-wa wawenyi wagambe, nyi ṙeko lyiha walelyiwona koko kyiyeri ngyilegoṟoka mengyenyi,
44024021	sile kyipfa kya ṟui-lyi lyimwi, kyiyeri ngyilegoṟoka makyiṙi-gawi gawo, na igamba, ‘Kyipfa kya iṟutso lya wapfu ngyianduyo mbele yanyu inu.’ ”
44024022	Kyasia Filekyisi kafunja kyisanzionyi kyilya, cha kyipfa naweichi necha nakamwi mbonyi tsa Njia ya Mndumii iya Paulo aweiṙeṙa mbonyi tsayo, kagamba, “Kyiyeri Lyisia, ang'anyi o asikari wa shiṙa, echicha ngyeṙumbuo moondu onyu.”
44024023	Kawia mchilyi ulya kye Paulo naringo; indi nawaṙe ṙaawa, na mbuya tsakye waenengo momu o mmbutia kyilya akundi.
44024024	Hamwiṙe mfiri ngyaangu, Filekyisi kacha aṙuṙanyi na mka okye, Durusila, awei Myuda, kagamba Paulo nalago kaaṙanyia mbonyi tsa iiṙikyia Yesu Kristo.
44024025	Na Kyiyeri Paulo aweionguo mbonyi tsa wusumganyi, na iwa na meena, na ianduyo lyiicha, Filekyisi kaowuo kagaluo, kagamba, “Wulalu yenda, na inyi ngawona ṙaawa ngyekulaga.”
44024026	Hamwi na isho nalekusaṟa kye Paulo nechimwenenga heleri; koikyo nalemlaga kafoi kaṙeṙa na oe.
44024027	Na kyiyeri maka iwi ileiṙa Filekyisi kaambilyia Porikyio Festo nawaṙe wuchilyi handu ha Filekyisi. Na Filekyisi akundi Wayuda wamkunde kaṙa Paulo kyipfungonyi.
44025001	Hamwiṙe mfiṟi iṟaṟu wookyia Festo awa mchilyi, kawuka Kaisaria kaṙo na Yerusalemu.
44025002	Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose na wang'anyi wa Wayuda wakamwongoya mbonyi tsa Paulo,
44025003	wakamterewa nawawutie wucha kui igamba Paulo naendo na Yerusalemu, kundu waiṙime imlaalyia njienyi na immbaaga.
44025004	Kyaindi Festo kagaluo kagamba kye Paulo nairingo kulya Kaisaria; na kye oe nawekuṟeyeṟie iyenda pfo mfiri ya kufuhi.
44025005	Kagamba, “Walya wawoṙe wuchilyi konyu wasokye hamwi na inyi wandemshitakyi, kokooya mndu-chu nawoṙe ṙeko lyoose.”
44025006	Kyiyeri Festo amkae kowo cha mfiri ikumi kasoka na Kaisaria; na ilya-ngama kaṙamia halya-ndu awekyeṙamia eanduya wandu, kagamba Paulo naendo.
44025007	Kyiyeri alecha, Wayuda walya walesoka iwuka Yerusalemu wakagoṟoka kufuhi na oe wakasenda wuwicho wokye wufoi kyaindi walaleiṙima iwuṟingyishia.
44025008	Paulo, echiloṟa chandu alammbicho, kagamba, “Inyi ngyilefunja iwawaso lyoose lya Wayuda-pfo; maa lya mbonyi tsa hekalu, maa lya mbonyi tsa Kaisari-pfo.”
44025009	Kyaindi Festo akundi iloṟa kye namcha ko Wayuda kagaluo Paulo, echigamba, “Ngyesa nukundi iyenda Yerusalemu, undeanduyo pfo mbele yako kyipfa kya shindo-shi?”
44025010	Paulo kagamba, “Inyi ngyigoṟokyi iha mbele ya kyiṙi kya Kaisari kyeanduya, nyiho hangyiwaṟi ianduyo. Ngyileṙekyio Wayuda kyindo kyoose, chandu iyoe uichi mnu-pfo.
44025011	Kyasia kokooya ngyileṙeko kyindo kyeiṙima ingyienenga iwoogo, ngyilega ipfa-pfo. Indi kokooya wuwicho-wu waingyisendia chi loi-pfo, kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima ingyiṙambika kowo-pfo. Ngyikundi mbonyi-tsi tsako tsiṙoo ko Kaisari.”
44025012	Kyasia Festo kyiyeri alemarisa iṙeṙa na wandu wa mengye kagaluo, kagamba, “Kyipfa nokunda mbonyi-tsi tsapfo tsiṙoo ko Kaisari, nochiyenda ko Kaisari.”
44025013	Hamwiṙe mfiri ngyaangu mangyi Akyiṟipa na Berinikye wakashika Kaisaria, wakaiṟikyiṟa Festo.
44025014	Na wamkae pfo mfiri ifoi, Festo kaongoya mangyi mbonyi tsa Paulo, echigamba, “Kuwoṙe mndu umwi iha Filekyisi alemṙa kyipfungonyi;
44025015	ulya kyiyeri awekyeri Yerusalemu wang'anyi wa makohanyi na wasongoru wa wandu walengyiongoya mbonyi tsakye, wakundi naanduyo.
44025016	Ngawagaluo ngawawia kye chi kyiṙo kya Waroma ienengyia mndu oose ashitakyio alawonana kuwooka na walya wamshitakyi, na ienengo ṙaawa lyeloṟa chandu alawoṙe wuwicho wulya aiwio nawoṙe-pfo.
44025017	Koikyo kyiyeri walesanzia iha ngyilekyelyio-pfo; kyipfa ilya-ngama ngyileṙamia halya-ndu ngyekyeṙamia ianduya wandu ngagamba mndu-cho naendo.
44025018	Na kyiyeri walya walemshitakyi walegoṟoka, walegamba kyindo kyoose kyakye kyiwicho chandu ngyilekusaṟa-pfo.
44025019	Indi wawewoṙe shindo shifoi walewesa kyipfa kyakye na kyipfa kya mwiṙikyie owo wawenyi, mbonyinyi tsa mndu umwi ekyelago Yesu, alekoampfa, ulya Paulo alegamba kye nai na moo.
44025020	Na inyi ngyilamanye necha chandu ngyepfula wuloi wo mbonyi-tsi, ngammbesa kokooya nakundi iyenda Yerusalemu nandeanduyo pfo kyipfa kya shindo-shi.
44025021	Kyaindi kyiyeri Paulo alegamba kye nakundi naanduyo nyi Kaisari, ngagamba naringo mṟasa kyiyeri ngyechimṙuo ko Kaisari.”
44025022	Akyiṟipa kawia Festo, “Na inyi ngyiwekundi iicho mndu-chu.” Kagamba, “Nomwicho ngama.”
44025023	Kyiyeri kulekya Akyiṟipa kacha hamwi na Berinikye wekutuuta mnu, wakaiṙa na handu halya heaṙanyia moondu ya wandu. Naweṙuṙanyi taa na wachilyi wang'anyi na wandu wawoṙe rina wa mṟi ulya. Festo kagamba Paulo naendo.
44025024	Paulo amwendo Festo kagamba, “Mangyi Akyiṟipa, na nyoe moose mukyeri hamwi na soe iha, kyeambuyenyi mndu-chu, ulya wandu woose wa ipfo Yerusalemu na iha taa walekunda ngyiwatarame, wechikalagatsa kye nawaṟi iwoogo iwinyi.
44025025	Kyaindi inyi ngyilewona kye awutie kyindo kyoose kyechimwenenga iwoogo-pfo; na oe amonyi kyiyeri alekunda ianduyo nyi Kaisari, ngamṙika kokye.
44025026	Na inyi mbonyinyi tsakye ngyilewona kyindo kya loi kyeṙikyia Kaisari-pfo. Koikyo ngamwende na iha mbele yanyu, maa mbele yapfo iyoe, mangyi Akyiṟipa, kundu lukomruwa-ruwa mbonyi tsakye ngyiwone kyindo kyeṟeia.
44025027	Cha kyipfa ngyiwonyi nyi kyindo kyilawoṙe wuṟango iṙika mndu akyeri kyipfungonyi kulawoṙe iloṟa nyi wuwicho wuha awio kye nawoṙe.”
44026001	Akyiṟipa kawia Paulo, “Nuwoṙe momu ionguo mbonyi tsapfo.” Naaho Paulo kagoṟuo kuwoko kokye, kaloṟa chandu alammbicho, echigamba,
44026002	“Mangyi Akyiṟipa! Ngyikuichuoe iwaṙa isaṟia mrimenyi, kyipfa inu mbele yapfo ngyiloṟa chandu ngyilammbicho, kyiiṙi kya wuwicho wulya Wayuda walegamba kye ngyiwoṙe.
44026003	Iyoe kyipfa uichi mnu miichiwie ya Wayuda na shindo shoose wawoṙe shewesa, ngyikuterewa ungyiaṙanyie kulawoṙe iwina.
44026004	“Cha kyipfa Wayuda woose wangyiichi wookyia ngyii manakye, shindo shiwekyeri urukyenyi loko ipfo Yerusalemu wookyia mawookyionyi,
44026005	wangyiichi mnu wookyia mawookyionyi, kokooya wakunda iṟingyishia, kye ngyiwekyeri Mfarisayo kui iosha mawawaso gaṙu ga iindia Ruwa kulawoṙe iloloma maa ale.
44026006	Na wulalu ngyigoṟokyi iha ianduyo kyipfa kya iweṙelyia kyaasa waku waṙu waleenengo nyi Ruwa.
44026007	Kyaasa wandu waṙu wa mbaṟe ikumi na tsiwi waiweṙelyia ikyikooya, wechiterewa Ruwa na iana. Na inyi, mangyi mkunde, Wayuda waigamba kye ngyimmbicho kyipfa kya iweṙelyia-lyo.
44026008	Ny'kyilyi konyu kyawa kyindo kyilechiiṙimika, kye Ruwa nekyeṟutsa wapfu?
44026009	Loi, inyi ngyilewona mrimenyi koko kye kyingyiwaṟi iwuta shindo shifoi shelyisa wukyiwa walya wekyeosha Yesu awukyie Nasareti;
44026010	na inyi ngawuta isho kulya Yerusalemu; ngyilewika wandu wafoi wa Ruwa kyipfungonyi, ngamwenengo momu na wang'anyi wa makohanyi, na kyiyeri walewoogo ngyilegamba nyi sungusinyi.
44026011	Na kafoi masinagoginyi goose ngyilewalyisa wukyiwa, ngawaitika ilahia Ruwa; ngakapo nyi nyashi kyipfa kyawo cha msuko, ngawalyisa wukyiwa maa mṟinyi ya wuyenunyi.”
44026012	“Kyasia kyiiṙi kya iṟunda-lyo kyiyeri ngyiweiyenda Dameskyi, ngyiwoṙe wuchilyi wo wang'anyi wa makohanyi;
44026013	mangyi mkunde, naaho-ng'u kyiyeri kya kyingoto njienyi ngawona ngyeela yewuka ruwewu, iiṟie ngyeela ya mnengyeṟi, yengyilyimika inyi, na walya waweioshana na inyi ngyuura tsoose.
44026014	Lukooloka wanda loose, ngaicho ṟui lyeṙeṙa na inyi kui mṙeṙie o Kyiebrania, ‘Saulyi! Saulyi! Ny'kyilyi ungyilyisa wukyiwa? Nyi kyuumu kopfo ikuhuuya kyiṙinyi.’
44026015	Na inyi ngagamba, ‘Iyoe nyi wui, Mndumii?’ Mndumii kangyiwia, ‘Inyi nyi Yesu, ulya iyoe umlyisa wukyiwa.
44026016	Kyaindi amka, ugoṟokye na maṙende gapfo, cha kyipfa ngacha na kopfo kyipfa kya ikyi, ngyikuwikye uwe mṟundi na mṟingyishi o shindo-shi uleshiwona, na shindo ochishiwona koko na shilya ngyechikuloṟa.
44026017	Ngyechikukyiṟa iwuka wandu wa Isiraelyi na wandu walangyiiṙikyie wechiiṙima ikuwutia kyindo-pfo, walya ngyechikuṙuma kowo.
44026018	Uwapfunguoe meso, na iwaweṟutsa waṙe meema na iyenda saenyi, waṙe pfinya tsa Satana na iyenda ko Ruwa; naaho-ng'u Ruwa nawahooṟie ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo na wechikaa halya-ndu walya Ruwa awailyishie wechikaa kui ingyiiṙikyia inyi.’ ”
44026019	“Koikyo, mkunde mangyi Akyiṟipa, ngyilelega shindo shilya sha ruwewu ngyileloṟo ngyikyeri cha mndu ailoṙo-pfo,
44026020	indi ngyileonguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa kuwooka ko wandu wa Dameskyi na Yerusalemu, na urukyenyi loose lo Uyuda, na ko wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu, kye waṙumbuye wunyamaṟi na igalukyia Ruwa, wechiwuta shilya shiṙuṙanyi na iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi.
44026021	Kyipfa kya isho Wayuda wakangyiwaṙa ngyikyeri hekalunyi wakatambagana ingyiwaaga.
44026022	Kyasia cha kyipfa ngawona kyitarama kyiwukyie ko Ruwa ngyigoṟokyi iha inu ngyeṟingyishia wana watutu na wandu wang'anyi, maa ngyigamba kyindo sile shilya weonguo shisuku na Mose waleonguo-pfo. Shindo walegamba kye shechiwa,
44026023	kye Kristo nawaṟi ilyiso wukyiwa na kye oe kuwooka kui iṟutso ko wapfu nechionguo mbonyi tsa ngyeela ko wandu wakye na ko wandu walamwiṙikyie.”
44026024	Kyiyeri Paulo aweloṟa chandu alammbicho, Festo kaṙeṙa na ṟui lying'anyi, kagamba, “Paulo, numsuko! Isoma mnu lyilekuenenga wusuko.”
44026025	Kyaindi Paulo kagamba, “Festo monyi kyiṟumi, ngyimsuko-pfo. Ngyiṙeṙa shindo sha loi ngyilamsuko maa ale.
44026026	Cha kyipfa mangyi naichi mbonyi-tsi, na inyi ngyeiṙima iṙeṙa na oe kulawoṙe wuowu, cha kyipfa ngyiichi kye kuwoṙe kyindo maa kyimwi kyiiṙi kya mbonyi-tsi alakyiichi-pfo; kyipfa kyindo-kyo kyilewutika kyiṟika-pfo.
44026027	Mangyi Akyiṟipa, ngyesa uiṙikyie malosho ga weonguo shisuku-pfoe? Ngyiichi kye nuiṙikyie.”
44026028	Akyiṟipa kawia Paulo, “Kui maṙeṙo maangu nokusaṟa kye noiṙima ingyigaluo ngyiwe Mkristiano?”
44026029	Paulo kagaluo, kammbia, “Ngyiterewa Ruwa kye, kokooya nyi kui maṙeṙo maangu ang'u kui maṙeṙo gafoi, chi iyoe tupu-pfo indi na iwo woose waingyiaṙanyia inyi wawe cha inyi, kyaindi ngyiterewa mulawiko kyipfungonyi cha inyi.”
44026030	Mangyi na mchilyi na Berinikye na walya waweṙamie hamwi nawo wakagoṟoka.
44026031	Na kyiyeri walewuka halya wakawiana, “Mndu-chu aiwuta kyindo kyoose kyechimwenenga ipfungo ang'u iwoogo-pfo.”
44026032	Akyiṟipa kawia Festo, “Mndu-cho naweiiṙima ilekyio, kokooya alalegamba kye moondu okye uṙoo ko Kaisari.”
44027001	Kyasia kyiyeri kyilegambo kye lupfungye kyaro kya iiṙa ipalyipalyinyi mṟasa Italyia, wakaṙambika Paulo na wandu walya wengyi wawekyeri kyipfungonyi ko mchilyi umwi ekyelago Yulyio, awukyie kyikosinyi kya Agusto.
44027002	Lukoṙooya ngalawenyi ya Adiramitio iwekuṟeyeṟie iyenda mṟasa mṟi ya Asia ikyeri mbai ya ipalyipalyi. Lukowooka kyaro, Arisitariko awukyie Makyedonia mṟinyi o Tesalonikye akyeri hamwi na soe.
44027003	Ilya-ngama lukoafukyia Sidon. Yulyio kaloṟa Paulo isaṟia lying'anyi kui imwenenga momu o yenda ko mbuya tsakye kundu wamwenengye shilya awekundi.
44027004	Iwuka Sidon lukopfunga kyaro lukoyenda mṟasa Kyipiro kundu kyiwiṟi kyilakukape, cha kyipfa shiwiṟi shiweng'anyi.
44027005	Kyiyeri luleira ipalyipalyinyi ura lo Kyilyikyia na Pamfilyia, lukoshika Mira, mṟi o Lyikyia.
44027006	Na ipfo mchilyi ulya kakooya ngalawa iya ya Iskanderia, ikuṟeyeṟie iyenda Italyia; kaluṙosia pfo.
44027007	Lukoyenda kyimbung'ho mfiri ifoi, lukoshika mṟasa Nido kui ilya wukyiwa; cha kyipfa kyiwiṟi kyiwelushingyia, lukoiṙa seri ya Kyirete, lukoambuyana na Salyimone.
44027008	Lukoiṙa lochilya wukyiwa, mbaimbai ya ipalyipalyi lukoshika handu hekyelago “Handu hecha Heringa Ngalawa.” Kufuhi na handu-ho hawoṙe mṟi okyelago Lasea.
44027009	Na kyiyeri kyileshi kyamwiṙe, na kyaro wulalu kyikawaṙa ngataṟa tsifoi, cha kyipfa mfiri ya ikuretekyia ilekoyaiṙa, Paulo kawaikyimbia,
44027010	kawawia, “Wasoṟo, ngyiwonyi kye kyaro-kyi kyechiwaṙa ngataṟa na iṙetsa shifoi. Lochiṙetsa shindo na ngalawa tupu-pfo, indi na moo yaṙu taa.”
44027011	Kyaindi mchilyi ulya kaaṙanyia msongoru o ngalawa iya na monyi ngalawa kuta shilya Paulo alegamba.
44027012	Na kyipfa kyilawechiiṙimika ikaa kulya mṟinyi ukyeri kufuhi na ipalyipalyi kyiyeri kya mbeho, wandu wafoi wakagamba kye nyi kyicha iwuka pfo waiṙime ishika Foinikye, kokooya kyechiiṙimika, na ikaa pfo kyiyeri kya mbeho. Na nyi-we mṟi o Kyirete, iambuyana na ngyuura tsilya mkuma okyechia.
44027013	Na kyiyeri mkuma ulewooka ikuma, wakusaṟie kye wawona shilya wawelangyie iwona, wakawooka kyaro, wakaiṙa kufuhi na Kyirete, mbaimbai ya ipalyipalyi.
44027014	Hamwiṙe kyiyeri kyifuhi mkuma ung'anyi cha kyiwiṟi okyelago Eurakyilo ukokuma.
44027015	Ngalawa ikakapo nyi mkuma ulya, na kyipfa ilelemo iwingana na mkuma-cho, ukoiṙuo.
44027016	Na lochiiṙa iwinyi kufuhi na kyiṟingyiti kyekyelago Kauda, lukoiṙima iiṟicha kyingalawa ngalawa iya yaṙu iwekyekyikuruo, kyaindi lochilya wukyiwa mnu.
44027017	Wamuiṟiche kyingalawa kyilya kyitutu, wakapfunga ngalawa iya luwekyeri kui iitsa kyigowo wanda yayo, nawo wechiowuo walachewoṙo mlelyenyi o ipalyipalyinyi kufuhi na uruka lo Siriti, wakaenenga mkuma momu o waṙuo chandu ulekunda.
44027018	Na kyipfa luweikapo mnu nyi kyiwiṟi kyilya, ilya-ngama wakawooka iwiyitsa mlari ipalyipalyinyi.
44027019	Mfiri o kaṟaaṟu wakawiyitsa shindo sha ngalawa kui mawoko gawo wawenyi.
44027020	Mfiri ifoi mnengyeṟi maa nyenyeri shilewoneka-pfo; na kyiwiṟi kying'anyi kyikalukapa. Kyasia lukowona lokyia maa ale-pfo.
44027021	Na kyiyeri walekowamkaa kyiyeri kyileshi walalya kyelya, Paulo kagoṟoka makyiṙi-gawi gawo, kagamba, “Wasoṟo, kyiwemmbaṟi ingyiaṙanyia lulapfunga kyaro iwuka Kyirete na iwona ndenga na iṙetsa shindo shifoi kuṙi.
44027022	Wulalu ngammbia, kuwanzenyi, cha kyipfa kuwoṙe mndu maa umwi kyiiṙi kyaṙu echiṙeka sile ngalawa tupu-pfo.
44027023	Cha kyipfa kyio kya inu malaika o Ruwa ulya inyi ngyikyeri okye, na oe nyi oe ngyekyemwowuo na imterewa, nalegoṟoka kufuhi na inyi,
44027024	kangyiwia, ‘Ulaowuoe, Paulo, kyikuwaṟi igoṟoka mbele ya Kaisari. Lyingyi-se, Ruwa nakuenengyie wandu woose ukyeri kyaronyi hamwi nawo.’
44027025	Kyasia, wasoṟo, mulakuinaṙie; cha kyipfa ngyiiṙikyie Ruwa, kye shindo shechiwa wuṙo chandu ngawio.
44027026	Kyaindi mkuma ochiluṙuo kyiṟingyitinyi kyilyiwe.”
44027027	Na kyio kyimwi, hamwiṙe mfiri ikumi na ina, kyiyeri mkuma uweluwiyitsa ipfo na ipfo ipalyipalyinyi lya Adiria, cha kyio kya mayeleyele, waṟundi wa ngalawa wakakusaṟa kye wai kufuhi na handu hagaṙutsu.
44027028	Wakatonyitsa kyindo kyesenguṙa chandu ipalyipalyi lyiyendie wanda wakakooya ipalyipalyi lyiwewoṙe meta makumi gaana iyenda wanda. Wakayenda mbele kyitutu wakayesha-se wakakooya nyi meta makumi gaṟaaṟu.
44027029	Wakaowuo mkuma ulachewawiyitsa handu hawoṙe maṟaṟa, wakaolotsa kulya mringyenyi shindo shoose shiina shekyetirimisha shindo shekyeiṙa mringyenyi, wakaterewa kukye.
44027030	Na kyiyeri waṟundi wa ngalawa wawekundi iṙicha na iṙa ngalawa iya, wechisotsa kyingalawa kyiwekyepfungyio halya ngalawenyi cha ilyi wawekundi itonyitsa kulya mṟingyenyi kyindo kyekyetirimisha shindo shekeiṙa mṟingyenyi,
44027031	Paulo kawia ang'anyi o asikari wa shiṙa hamwi na asikari, “Iwa walandekae kunu ngalawenyi moiṙima ikyia-pfo.”
44027032	Kyasia asikari wakaṙumbuo shigowo shilya sha kyingalawa kyilya wakakyiṙa kyiolokye.
44027033	Na kyiyeri kuweikya Paulo katerewa woose walye kyelya, echigamba, “Inu nyi mfiri o ikumi na kaana moweṙelyia na ikuretekyia, mulalya kyindo kyoose.
44027034	Kyasia ngamuterewa mulye kyelya, cha kyipfa kyemukyiṟa; kyipfa kuwoṙe maa uchui lo mṟoe o mndu maa umwi lochiṙeka-pfo.”
44027035	Amgambe kuṙo kaira mkate, kaana Ruwa mbele yawo woose, kaupeṟenguo, kawooka ilya.
44027036	Naaho-ng'u woose walakuinaṙie-se, wakalya kyelya.
44027037	Na soe luwekyeri kulya ngalawenyi nyi-we wandu magana gawi na makumi mfungaaṙe na waṟandaaṟu.
44027038	Kyiyeri wamuiguṙe wakaanguṟa mlari ya ngalawa, kui iwiyitsa mlari-yo ipalyipalyinyi.
44027039	Kyiyeri kulekya walemanya uruka lulya-pfo, indi walewona handu hagaṙutsu kyimcholenyi kya mṟinga o ipalyipalyi, wakawiana watirimishe ho ngalawa, kokooya kyiweiṙimika.
44027040	Wakawiyitsa shindo shilya shekyetirimisha shindo shekyeiṙa mṟingyenyi, wakashiṙa ipalyipalyinyi, hamwi na iṟawisha shigowo shekyepfunga kyindo kyesongoya ngalawa, wakapfunga kyindo kyewaṙa mkuma halya ngalawenyi, wakayenda halya-ndu hagaṙutsu.
44027041	Kyaindi wakashika handu mapalyipalyi gawi gakooyanyi, wakatirimisha ngalawa, ura loyo lo mbele lukokuwaṙa lulakupaaye, indi ura loyo lo numa luweluanuoe kui pfinya tsa kyiwiṟi kya ipalyipalyinyi.
44027042	Makusaṟo ga asikari gakawa iwaaga walya wawewawikye kyipfungonyi, mndu alaiṙime iiṙa mṟingyenyi iṙicha.
44027043	Indi ang'anyi o asikari wa shiṙa, akundi ikyiṟa Paulo, kawashingyia, walawute chandu wawekusaṟie, kawia walya weiṙima iiṙa mṟingyenyi wawookye ikuwiyitsa ipalyipalyinyi, washikye handu hagaṙutsu,
44027044	na walya waletsugaa, wengyi waṙamilyie mbau na wengyi waṙamilyie shindo shingyi sha ngalawa. Na kuṙo wandu woose wakaiṙima ishika handu hagaṙutsu kyipuo.
44028001	Kyiyeri lomkyie, nyi lyo-ndu lulemanya kye kyiṟingyiti kyilya kyekyelago Melyita.
44028002	Wandu wa uruka-lo wakaluloṟa isaṟia lyilewa igamba. Cha kyipfa waleatsa moṙo, wakaluambilyia loose, kyipfa kya mvuo ilekapa na kyipfa kya mbeho.
44028003	Kyiyeri Paulo awesania mlari o ngwi na iuwika moṙonyi, njoka ikafuma kulya ngwinyi kyipfa kya moṙo ulya, nayo ikakuoṟowia kuwokonyi kokye.
44028004	Kyiyeri wandu wa kyiṟingyiti kyilya walewona njoka iya inenewie kuwokonyi ko Paulo wakawiana, “Mndu-chu aṙeeye alakyeri mmbaagi-pfo. Maa chandu alekyia ndenga tsa ipalyipalyinyi ruwa ekyelago Wusumganyi eṙa alembaaga-pfo.”
44028005	Kyaindi Paulo kakutia-kutia njoka iya moṙonyi ilammbutie kyindo kyoose.
44028006	Wo wakakusaṟa kye nechishimba ang'u ioloka wanda kui ipfa cha ilyi; na wamumwitukuye mnu, na iwona kye kuwoṙe kyindo kyoose kyiwicho kyiwemmbutikyia-pfo, wakainduka, wakagamba kye oe nyi ruwa.
44028007	Kufuhi na handu halya hawewoṙe maṙema ga msongoru o kyiṟingyiti kyilya, awekyelago Pubilyio. Mndu-chu naleluambilyia kui mrima uwoṙe umbuya, kalugaluo wayenu wakye kyiyeri kya mfiri iṟaṟu.
44028008	Kyikawa-ng'u awu o Pubilyio nawewoṙo nyi homa na iaṟaka samu. Paulo kaiṙa na halya-ndu awekyeri, katerewa, kayekyia mawoko gakye wuye yakye, na imkyiṟa.
44028009	Isho shammbutikye wandu wengyi wawewoṙe ndoṟe kulya kyiṟingyitinyi wakacha wakakyiṟo.
44028010	Nawo wakaluindia mnu. Kyasia kyiyeri lulewooka kyaro kya iiṙa ipalyipalyinyi wakawikyia ngalawenyi shindo shilya luwekundi.
44028011	Hamwiṙe mori iṟaṟu lukoyenda lukyeri ngalawenyi ya mṟi o Iskanderia, ngalawa ilekoyakaa halya kyiṟingyitinyi kyiyeri kya mbeho. Na ngalawa-yo iwekyelago “waruwa wawi.”
44028012	Lukoshika Sirakusa, lukokaa mfiri iṟaṟu.
44028013	Iwuka pfo lukotenga lukoshika Rekyio; hamwiṙe mfiri umwi mkuma ukokuma iwuka ura lo kyaseri, na ilya-ngama lukoafukyia Puteolyi.
44028014	Lukokooya pfo wandu waata waiṙikyie Yesu, wakaluterewa lukae nawo mfiri mfungaaṙe; na kuṙo lukoshika Roma.
44028015	Na iwuka pfo, kyiyeri walya waiṙikyie Yesu waleicho mbonyi tsaṙu, wakacheluambilyia, wakacha mṟasa Sangaṙa ya Apiyo na numba tsiṟaaṟu tseambilyia wayenu. Kyiyeri Paulo alewawona naleana Ruwa, kokuicho pfinya ing'anyi mrimenyi.
44028016	Kyiyeri luleiṙa na Roma Paulo naleenengo momu o ikaa amonyi hamwi na asikari alemringa.
44028017	Kyikawa-ng'u hamwiṙe mfiri iṟaṟu kalaga wang'anyi wa Wayuda wasanzie handu hamwi, na wammbute kuṙo, kawawia, “Wana wa wama wako, maa chandu ngyilalewuta kyindo kyoose kyilaṙuṙanyi na miichiwie ya wandu waṙu ang'u miichiwie ya waku waṙu, ngyilewiko mawokonyi ga Waroma, ngyimpfungye wookyia Yerusalemu.
44028018	Na iwo wamungyisoruo-soruo walekunda ingyilekyia, cha kyipfa kuwewoṙe kyimaṙuma kyoose kya inyi iwoogo-pfo.
44028019	Kyaindi kyiyeri Wayuda walegamba kyilya wawekusaṟie ngyileitiko iṙuo mbonyi-tsi ko Kaisari. Chi kye ngyiwewoṙe kyindo kyiwicho ngyeiṙima igamba kye wandu wa uruka loko walewuta-pfo.
44028020	Kyasia kyipfa kya ikyo, ngamulaga muchengyiambuya na iṙeṙa na inyi; cha kyipfa ngyimfungye na mshe-chu kyipfa kya kyilya wandu wa Isiraelyi waiweṙelyia.”
44028021	Walya wakammbia, “Soe luleambilyia paruo tsiwoṙe mbonyi tsapfo iwuka Uyuda-pfo; maa kuwoṙe maa mndu umwi aiṙikyie Yesu aleshika iha na iluendie mbonyi ang'u igamba kyindo kyoose kyiwicho kyapfo-pfo.
44028022	Kyaindi lukundi iicho chandu uwonyi iyoe; cha kyipfa mbonyi tsa wandu-wa iyoe ukyeri umwi owo kyimanyikyie koṙu kye tsiṙeṙe uwicho orio handu.”
44028023	Wamteṟiane na Paulo mfiri wechiwaṙa kyisanzionyi na oe wandu wafoi mnu wakacha na kulya numbenyi awekyekaa. Kawaongoya necha na iṟingyishia Wumangyi wo Ruwa, echiwaikyimbia kui mbonyi tsa Yesu, na mbonyi tsa mawawaso ga Mose na ga weonguo shisuku, wookyia ngamenyi mṟasa kyukonyi.
44028024	Wengyi wakaiṙikyia shilya shilegambo kyaindi wengyi waleiṙikyia-pfo.
44028025	Na kyiyeri walawewoṙe makusaṟo gamwi, wakayenda, kyiyeri Paulo amgambe kye, “Mumuyo Mweele naleṙeṙa necha na waku waṙu, kui ṙumbu lya moonguo shisuku Yesaya,
44028026	echigamba, ‘Yenda ko wandu-wa, undewawia, Iicho moicho, indi momanya-pfo, na iwona mowona, indi momanya-pfo.
44028027	Cha kyipfa mrima ya wandu-wa irumai, na maṙwi gawo nyi gamalemeri iicho, na washingyie meso gawo; walacheicho kui maṙwi gawo. Na imanya kui mrima yawo, na iilacha makusaṟo gawo, ngawakyiṟa.’ ”
44028028	“Kyasia manyenyi kye wukyiṟo-wu wo Ruwa wuleṙoo ko wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu, nawo wechiiṙikyia!” [
44028029	Amgambe kuṙo, Wayuda wakayenda, wechiwesana shindo shifoi wenyi ko wenyi.]
44028030	Paulo kakaa kyiyeri kya maka iwi kulya numbenyi awekyekaa, kaambilyia wandu woose wawekyeyenda kokye,
44028031	echionguo mbonyi tsa Wumangyi wo Ruwa, na ilosha mbonyi tsa Yesu Kristo, kulawoṙe wuowu, na kulawoṙe mndu alemshingyia.
45001001	Paruo-i yawuka koko inyi Paulo, mṟundi o Yesu Kristo, alelago nawe msu, na iteseṟo naonguoe Ndumi Ngyicha ya Ruwa;
45001002	nayo nyiyo Ruwa alekoamwenenga kyaasa kui ṙumbu lya weonguo shisuku shiṟeionyi shiele.
45001003	Mbonyi tsa Mono-kye alefeo kyisharinyi kya Dawidi,
45001004	na iṟingyishio kui wuiṙimi iwa Mana o Ruwa, kui mbaṟe ya ngoo ya wuele, kui iṟutso lya wapfu, Yesu Kristo Mndumii oṙu.
45001005	Icho ai kye kyiiṙi kyakye luleambilyia isaṟia na ndumo kundu masanga goose gaiṙime iindia kui iiṙikyia kyipfa kya rina lyakye.
45001006	Na kyiiṙi kya iwo nyoe mulewa wasambuṟe wa Yesu Kristo;
45001007	ko woose wakyeri Roma, wawakunde nyi Ruwa, walelago wawe wandu wa Ruwa. Isaṟia lyikae konyu na ufoṟo luwukyie ko Ruwa Awu oṙu, na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
45001008	Kuwooka ngyiana Ruwa oko kyiiṙi kya Yesu Kristo kyipfa kyanyu nyoe moose, kyipfa iiṙikyia lyanyu lyiongoyo wuyanenyi koose.
45001009	Kyipfa Ruwa, ichu ngyekyemterewa na imwindia kui mrima oko kyiiṙi kya Ndumi Ngyicha ya Mono-kye, nyi mṟingyishi oko chandu ngyekyemukumbuo kulawoṙe itsia,
45001010	mfiri yoose shiterewonyi shako, ngyechiterewa ngyiche na konyu mfiri ya kufuhi, Ruwa kakunda ingyigoṟokyia kyaronyi kyako.
45001011	Kyipfa ngyilangyie mnu immbona nyoe, ngyiiṙime imuenenga kyisumbo kya mrimenyi, kundu mukarisho mulalolome.
45001012	Kyimwi na igamba, luwiyiṟiane moo inyi na nyoe, orio mndu kui iiṙikyia lya oṙoe, lyanyu na lyako.
45001013	Kyaindi wana wa wama wako, ngyikundi muṙe mulamanya kye kafong'ui ngyilekunda icha na konyu; indi maa mṟasa wulalu ngyilalekyio, kundu ngyiiṙime igaluo wandu konyu wagalukyie Kristo taa. Chandu ngyiwoṙe wandu wagalukyie Kristo iwuka ko wandu wa masanga walai wa kunu Roma.
45001014	Ngyiriko nyi Wakyiṟikyi na walakyeri Wakyiṟikyi, ngyiriko nyi waṟango na matondo.
45001015	Koikyo, ko ura loko, inyi ngyikuṟeyeṟie ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha maa konyu nyoe mokyekaa Roma.
45001016	Kyipfa ngyiwonia sonu Ndumi Ngyicha-pfo; kyipfa nyi wuiṙimi wo Ruwa wokyeende wukyiṟo, ko orio mndu aiṙikyie, ko Myuda kuwooka, na ko Mkyiṟikyi taa.
45001017	Kyipfa wusumganyi wo Ruwa wuloṟo kyiiṙi kyakye; wookyia mawookyionyi ga iiṙikyia mṟasa mafurumionyi; chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Awoṙe wusumganyi nechikaa kui iiṙikyia.”
45001018	Cha kyipfa nyashi ya Ruwa ilemanyika na pata iwuka Ruwewu kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi na wuwicho woose wo wandu wekyewingana na wuloi kui wuwicho.
45001019	Kyipfa mbonyi tsa Ruwa tsiichio tsamanyika mrimenyi kowo kyipfa Ruwa nalewaloṟa na pata.
45001020	Kyipfa wookyia kyiyeri Ruwa alegumba wuyana wandu weiṙima imanya na pata kye pfinya tsakye nyi tsa mlungana na kye nai Ruwa loi. Mbonyi tsi tsekyeiṙima iwono-pfo kyaindi tsekyemanyika. Wandu weiṙima imanya mbonyi-tsi tsa Ruwa kyipfa kya shindo Ruwa agumbie. Kyipfa kya ikyo wechiiṙima ikuwaṙa na kyindo kyoose kyiiṙi kya shilya wawutie-pfo.
45001021	Cha kyipfa kyiyeri walemanya Ruwa walemṟumisha cha kye oe nyi Ruwa maa imwana-pfo; indi waleṙekyia maloshonyi gawo ga wongo, na mrima yawo iwoṙe wutondo ikawiko meema.
45001022	Wechikuloṟa kye waṟango waletondoka.
45001023	Wakagaluo kyiṟumi kya Ruwa alekyepfa kui mafano ga mndu, shileye, na ga mando ga saka, na shekyekukuruo na ndewu.
45001024	Kyipfa kya isho Ruwa nalewaṙa langonyi tsa mrima yawo, waoshe ukoe, mṟasa wakawutiana shindo sha sonu kui mmbiu yawo.
45001025	Cha kyipfa walegaluo wuloi wo Ruwa iwa wongo, wakapfiria ndi kyindo Ruwa agumbie, wakawaṙima Ruwa ekyeṟumisho mlungana. Amen.
45001026	Koikyo Ruwa nalewaṙa waoshe lango tsawo tsa sonu. Waka wakailacha mkaṟo wakawutiana mbonyi tsa wolyi kui mmbiu yawo, kyindo kyilawaṟi iwa kuṙo.
45001027	Wasoṟo nawo na wuṙo wakaṙa iwuta mbonyi tsa wolyi na waka chandu kyiwaṟi wookyia mawookyionyi, wakalangana, wasoṟo wechiwuta shilawaṟi, wakaambilyia ngapo mrimenyi kowo, ngapo ikyeri wori wawaṟi.
45001028	Na chandu walelega iwika Ruwa ngyuuṟangonyi tsawo, Ruwa nalewaṙa waoshe ngyuuṟango tsawo tsilawoṙe kyiira, wawute shilawaṟi iwuta.
45001029	Wawoṙe wuwicho wo orio mbaṟe, wunyamaṟi na lango na wuwicho. Wawoṙe wunyeng'i, na uwaagi, na wuṟiingyi, na wulembi; wandu wa makusaṟo mawicho, wekyeṙeṙa wengyi.
45001030	Wekyeiria woṙiawo wongo, wasuuye Ruwa, wawoṙe tiri, wekyekushela, wekyeṙamia kyiṙombo kyeṙeṙa wongo, walekyeindia wafee wawo.
45001031	Walaichi kyindo, walekyeafutsia shilya wateṟie, walakundi wandu wa kanyi kowo, walawoṙe isaṟia.
45001032	Waichi mnu ianduyo lya wusumganyi wo Ruwa, kye wekyewuta isho wawaṟi upfu, wekyewuta isho; maa chi isho tupu-pfo, indi wakaiṙikyiana na walya wekyewuta waṙo.
45002001	Koikyo, iyoe mndu uianduya oṙoo uwoṙe kyegamba-pfo. Kyipfa isho uanduya ungyi nukuanduya kumonyi kye nunyamaṟie; kyipfa iyoe uianduya nuiwuta shilya shilya.
45002002	Na soe luichi kye ianduyo lyiwukyie ko Ruwa nyi lya sungusinyi ko iwo wekyewuta isho.
45002003	Iyoe mndu, okyeanduya walya wekyeṟunda isho na iwuta isho isho kumonyi, nokusaṟa nochiiṙima iṙicha ianduyo lyiwukyie ko Ruwa?
45002004	Ang'u nuimina wucha wokye wufoi na wusimiri wokye na ikarishia lyakye, ulamanye kye wucha wo Ruwa wukukuruo uiṙime iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi?
45002005	Indi kyipfa kya wuumu wopfo, na kui mrima opfo ulawoṙe iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi, nuiengeṟa nyashi ya Ruwa kopfo mfiri ulya o nyashi ya Ruwa na iloṟo lya chandu Ruwa ekyeanduya kulawoṙe ikundia.
45002006	Echitaa orio mndu iṙuana na mawuto gakye.
45002007	Walya kui wusimiri kyiiṙi kya iwuta mecha waipfula mng'ano na kyiṟumi na ikaa ho mlungana, wechienengo moo o mlungana.
45002008	Na walya wawoṙe wuṟiingyi, walekyeindia wuloi, indi wakaiṙikyiana na mbaka, wewona nyashi na isuo lying'anyi;
45002009	matuuro na wukyiwa wuye ya orio mndu ekyewuta mawicho, Myuda kuwooka na Mkyiṟikyi taa.
45002010	Indi mng'ano na kyiṟumi na ufoṟo ko orio mndu ekyewuta shicha, Myuda kuwooka na Mkyiṟikyi taa;
45002011	kyipfa kuwoṙe ikundia ko Ruwa-pfo.
45002012	Kyipfa iwo woose walenyamaṟa kulawoṙe mawawaso weṙeka kulawoṙe mawawaso, na woose walemyamaṟa waichi mawawaso, weanduyo kui mawawaso.
45002013	Kyipfa chi woose wekyeicho mawawaso wai wasumganyi mbele ya Ruwa-pfo, indi nyi walya wekyewuta kyilya mawawaso gakundi wechitalyio wusumganyi.
45002014	Kyipfa ilyi wandu wa Masanga walawoṙe mawawaso wekyewuta kui mkaṟo yawo shilya shikyeri uwawasonyi, walawoṙe mawawaso wakuenenga mawawaso wawenyi.
45002015	Iwo wailoṟa iṟunda lya uwawaso luluṟeie mrimenyi kowo na kyilya kyikyeri mrimenyi kowo kyechiwaṟingyishia, na makusaṟo gawo gawenyi gechiloṟa kye wawawicho ang'u wawawicho-pfo,
45002016	mfiri ulya Ruwa echianduya makusaṟo ga kyiṟika ga wandu, iṙuana na Ndumi-i Ngyicha ya Kristo Yesu ngyilemuongoya.
45002017	Kyaindi iyoe, kokooya nuilago Myuda na ikusuria uwawaso, na ikushela kyiiṙi kya Ruwa,
45002018	na imanya kyilya akundi, na iiṙikyia mbonyi ngyicha, na iyoe numloshe mawawasonyi,
45002019	na imanya loi kye iyoe kumonyi nyi msongoru o shipfupfuṟe, ngyeela ya iwo wakyeri meemenyi,
45002020	mlosha o matondo, na wana wanangu, awoṙe wuṟango na wuloi uwawasonyi;
45002021	kyasia iyoe uilosha ungyi, okulosha kumonyi-pfoe? Iyoe uionguo kye mndu alaiwe, nuiiwa kumonyi?
45002022	Iyoe ugamba mndu alaṟuguye ang'u alaṟuguyo, nuiṟuguya ang'u iṟuguyo kumonyi? Iyoe nusuuye mafano ga waruwa na kunu nuikugaluo mnjama kui iiwa mahekalunyi ga waruwa?
45002023	Iyoe okyekushelyia mawawaso, nokyefunjia Ruwa kyiṟumi kyakye kui ifunja uwawaso?
45002024	Kyipfa rina lya Ruwa lyilahio wandunyi walaiṙikyie Ruwa kyipfa kyanyu, chandu kyikyiṟeie.
45002025	Kyipfa iṙino lyiwoṙe kyiira kokooya ui mndu okyewuta kyilya mawawaso gakundi. Kyaindi kowa mofunja mawawaso iṙino lyapfo lyawa cha ilyi ulamṙine.
45002026	Kyasia kokooya icho alamṙine nekyeosha shilya uwawaso luwawasie, ngyesa iṙa iṙino lyakye lyechitalo cha nyi iṙino-pfoe?
45002027	Na icho alamṙine wookyia kuwooka, ekyeosha kyilya uwawaso lukundi, echikuanduya iyoe umṙine, konyamaṟa uwawaso-pfoe?
45002028	Kyipfa oe chi Myuda ai Myuda kyanja tupu-pfo, maa iṙino chi lyilya lya kyanja tupu mmbiunyi-pfo.
45002029	Indi oe nyi Myuda ai Myuda o mrimenyi; na iṙino nyi lya mrima, Mumuyonyi o Ruwa, chi shiṟeionyi-pfo. Uwawaso-lo kyiṟumi kyalo kyilekyewuka ko wandu indi ko Ruwa.
45003001	Kyasia Myuda nawoṙe-kyi kya ngoseṟa? Na iṙino lyiwoṙe kyiiṙa kyiha?
45003002	Lyiwoṙe kyiiṙa ngoseṟa ko njia tsoose. Kya kuwooka nyi kyipfa wawaenengye ulogo lo Ruwa.
45003003	Nyi kyikyi-ng'u, kokooya wandu waata walaleiṙikyia? Aa ilega iiṙikyia lyawo lyechiilacha shilya Ruwa ateṟie?
45003004	Maa ale; kundu Ruwa nawono nyi o loi, na orio mndu nyi o wongo; chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Kundu umanyikye kye nuwoṙe wusumganyi maṙeṙonyi gapfo, undewinga kyiyeri kya ianduyo.”
45003005	Kyaindi kokooya wuwicho woṙu wuṟingyishia wusumganyi wo Ruwa, lugambe kyikyi? Ruwa nyi mmbicho aiende nyashi? (Ngyigamba kui mbaṟe ya kyimndu.)
45003006	Ote! Kyipfa iho Ruwa neiṙima kuṙa ianduya wuyana?
45003007	Kyaindi kokooya loi ya Ruwa yaengyeṟa iṟingyishia mng'ano okye kyipfa kya iṙeṙa wongo lyako, ny' kyilyi inyi ngyiengyeṟa ianduyo kye ngyimnyamaṟi?
45003008	Kyitewe ny' kyi lulagambe (chandu luleirio, na chandu wengyi waigamba na pfinya kye kyi wuṙo luigamba), luwute shiwicho kundu kuche mecha? Ruwa nechiwaolotsia ngapo chandu wawaṟi iwutio.
45003009	Kyasia ny' kyikyi-ng'u? Lukyeri wecha kuta wengyi? Ote! Maa ale. Cha kyipfa lomshitakyi Wayuda na Wakyiṟikyi kye wawachilyie nyi wunyamaṟi taa.
45003010	Chandu kyikyiṟeie kye, “Kuwoṙe msumganyi maa umwi-pfo.
45003011	Kuwoṙe aichi-pfo, kuwoṙe aipfula Ruwa-pfo.
45003012	Woose waṙekyie, kuwoṙe aiwuta mecha-pfo, ote! Maa umwi.
45003013	Uṟoo lowo nyi kyilome kyilakyishikyie, kui ngyuulumi tsawo walewika ngyeṟo wekyeṙeṙa shindo shikyeri cha uṟoi lo njoka.
45003014	Maṙumbu gawo gaichuo seso ngyiwicho.
45003015	Maṙende gawo gaipfuṟukana iwaaga wandu.
45003016	Wunyamaṟi na ikapa kawi shikyeri njienyi tsawo.
45003017	Maa njia ya ufoṟo waleimanya-pfo.
45003018	Maa wakuloshie iowuo na ikunda Ruwa-pfo.”
45003019	Kyasia luichi kye mbonyi tsoose uwawaso lugambie ko walya wawachilyie nyi uwawaso, kundu orio mndu nawio natsie, na wuyana woose wuchilyio nyi ianduyo lya Ruwa.
45003020	Kyipfa kuwoṙe mndu oose echitalo kye namsumganyi mbele yakye kui iwuta shilya mawawaso gakundi-pfo, kyipfa mawawaso gekyeenenga mndu imanya wunyamaṟi.
45003021	Kyaindi wulalu, wusumganyi wo Ruwa womanyika kulawoṙe mawawaso. Wuṟingyishio kui uwawaso na malosho ga weonguo shisuku.
45003022	Nyi wusumganyi wo Ruwa wukyeri kui njia ya iiṙikyia kyiiṙi kya Yesu Kristo ko woose waiṙikyie. Kyipfa kuwoṙe kya mbaṟe ingyi-pfo.
45003023	Kyipfa woose wawutie sha wunyamaṟi na mng'ano o Ruwa otitia kowo.
45003024	Waitalyio wusumganyi walaitaa kyindo kui isaṟia lyakye, kui njia ya wukyiṟo wukyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
45003025	Ichu Ruwa amwummbikye nawe kyisanza kui njia ya iiṙikyia samunyi yakye, kundu naloṟe wusumganyi wokye, kyipfa kya ilekyia wusimirinyi wo Ruwa maṙeko goose galesonguo iwuto.
45003026	Naiṙime iloṟa wusumganyi wokye kyiyeri-kyi, kundu nawe msumganyi na momtalyia wusumganyi icho aiṙikyie Yesu.
45003027	Kyasia ikushela nyi kwi lyikyeri-ng'u? Lyashingyio nja. Kui iwawaso lya mbaṟe iha? Kui iwawaso lya mawuto? Ote! Indi kui iwawaso lya iiṙikyia.
45003028	Kyasia, luwonyi kye mndu nekyetalyio wusumganyi kui iiṙikyia kulawoṙe iwuta shilya mawawaso gakundi.
45003029	Aa ngyesa Ruwa nyi Ruwa o Wayuda tupu? Chi Ruwa o wandu walakyeri Wayuda taa-pfoe? Yee, nyi Ruwa o walakyeri Wayuda taa.
45003030	Kokooya loi Ruwa nyi umwi, echitalyia wusumganyi walya wawaṙine iiṙikyienyi, na walya walawaṙine nechiwatalyia wusumganyi kui njia ya iiṙikyia-lyo ilyo.
45003031	Kyasia, ngyesa luilacha mawawaso kui iiṙikyia-lyo? Ote! Cha kyipfa luindia mawawaso chandu gawaṟi iindio.
45004001	Kyasia, lugambe luṙa mbonyi tsa Abrahamu, awu oṙu?
45004002	Kyipfa kokooya Abrahamu naletalyio wusumganyi kyipfa kya mawuto gakye, nawoṙe kyekushelyia; indi chi mbele ya Ruwa-pfo.
45004003	Kyipfa shiṟeio shagamba-kyi? Abrahamu naleiṙikyia Ruwa, kyikatalyio kokye kye nyi wusumganyi.
45004004	Kyaindi ko mndu aiṟunda, wori wokye wokyetalo nyi isaṟia-pfo, indi kye nyi sile.
45004005	Kyaindi ko mndu alaiṟunda, indi kaiṙikyia ulya aimtalyia wusumganyi mndu alakundi na iowuo Ruwa, iiṙikyia lya mndu-cho lyatalo kye nyi wusumganyi.
45004006	Chandu Dawidi alegamba agusu mndu ulya Ruwa amtalyia kye namsumganyi kulawoṙe mawuto,
45004007	“Agusu wawahooṟie maṙeko gawo na ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo tsilatsisende nyi Ruwa.
45004008	Agusu mndu ulya Mndumii alaimtalyia ngyuunyamaṟi.”
45004009	Kyasia ngyesa sia-yo nyi ko iwo wawaṙine, ang'u nyi ko iwo walawaṙine taa? Kyipfa luigamba kye ko Abrahamu iiṙikyia lyakye lyiletalo kye nyi wusumganyi.
45004010	Ngyesa naletalyio kuṙa-ng'u? Nyi kyiyeri amṙino ang'u alandeṙino? Chi numa ya iṙino-pfo, indi alandeṙino.
45004011	Na oe naleambilyia kyindo-kyi kyeloṟa kye namṙine, iṟingyishia lya wusumganyi wulya wo iiṙikyia awelyiwoṙe alandeṙino. Naiṙime iwa awu o woose waiṙikyie, maa chandu walawaṙine, kundu nawo wawetalyio wusumganyi taa.
45004012	Lyingyi-se nawe awu o wandu waṙine, na chi ko iwo waṙine tikyi-pfo, indi walya wekyeosha ndifo tsa mwiṙikyie o awu oṙu, Abrahamu, awewoṙe wookyia kyiyeri alandeṙino.
45004013	Kyipfa kyaasa kyilya kye nechiwa mokyioṟa o wuyana Abrahamu na kyishari kyakye waleenengo chi kui mawawaso-pfo indi kui wusumganyi waletalyio kui iiṙikyia.
45004014	Kyipfa kokooya walya wa mawawaso nyiwo weoṟa, iiṙikyia lyawa wulya, na kyaasa kyailachika.
45004015	Kyipfa mawawaso nyigo gekyeende nyashi, cha kyipfa kulawoṙe mawawaso kuwoṙe ṙeko-pfo.
45004016	Koikyo kyaasa kyiwukyie iiṙikyienyi, kyiwe kui njia ya isaṟia, kundu kyaasa kyilya kyilalolome ko shishari shoose. Chi ko walya wa uwawaso tikyi-pfo, indi na ko walya wai wa iiṙikyia lya Abrahamu; akyeri awu oṙu soe loose;
45004017	(chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Ngyilekuwika uwe awu o Masanga gafoi;”) mbele ya Ruwa ulya alemwiṙikyia, moenenga wapfu moo, ekyeloṟa maa shindo shilakyeri pfo.
45004018	Na oe naleiṙikyia echiweṙelyia kyindo kyilechiiṙima iweṙelyio, kundu naiṙime iwa awu o masanga gafoi, chandu kyiwekyiṙeṙe kye, “Nyi wuṙo kyechiwa kyishari kyapfo.”
45004019	Oe alawemfofo iiṙikyienyi, nalekusaṟa kya mmbiu okye ulekoompfa (ammbaṙe cha maka igana), na Sara awewoṙe wuiṙimi wo waṙa mana-pfo.
45004020	Kyaindi awonyi kyaasa kya Ruwa alekapa kawi kui iṙa iiṙikyia-pfo, indi naleenengo pfinya kui iiṙikyia, echiṟumisha Ruwa.
45004021	Echimanya kye loi Ruwa neiṙima iṟunda shilya aweteṟie.
45004022	Koikyo kyikatalyio kokye kye nyi wusumganyi.
45004023	Kyaindi kyikyiṟeie kye nyi Abrahamu tupu aletalyio wusumganyi-pfo;
45004024	indi na kyipfa kyaṙu soe lochitalyio kuṙo taa, soe luiṙikyie icho aleṟutsa Yesu Mndumii oṙu ko wapfu.
45004025	Ulya alewuto kyipfa kya maṙeko gaṙu, na iṟutso kundu luiṙime italyio wusumganyi.
45005001	Kyasia lukomtalyio wusumganyi uwukyie iiṙikyienyi luwaṙe ufoṟo na Ruwa, kui njia ya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
45005002	Ulya kui oe lulewona kui njia ya iiṙikyia ikooya isaṟia-lyi lugoṟokyi kyiiṙi kyalyo; na ichihiyo ikusurienyi lya mng'ano o Ruwa.
45005003	Maa chi wuṙo tikyi-pfo, indi luchihiyo taa ngyuukyiwenyi; luichi kye wukyiwa, iṟunda lyakye nyi iende wusimiri.
45005004	Na iṟunda lya wusimiri nyi ikarisho lya mrima. Na iṟunda lya ikarisho lya mrima nyi ikusuria.
45005005	Na ikusuria lyekyeende sonu-pfo; cha kyipfa ikunda lya Ruwa lyamletsio mrimenyi koṙu kui Mumuyo Mweele luleenengo soe.
45005006	Cha kyipfa kyiyeri kyilya lulawewoṙe pfinya, ilyi kyiyeri kyileafukyia, Kristo nalepfa kyipfa kya wanyamaṟi.
45005007	Cha kyipfa nyi kyindo kyuumu; mndu ipfa kyipfa kya mndu msumganyi. Kyaindi kyeiṙimika mndu ikaria ipfa kyipfa kya mndu awoṙe mawuto mecha.
45005008	Indi Ruwa naloṟa ikunda lyakye oe amonyi koṙu soe, kyipfa Kristo nalepfa kyipfa kyaṙu, kyiyeri luwei wanyamaṟi.
45005009	Kyasia ngoseṟa mnu lukomtalyio wusumganyi samunyi yakye, nelushingyia lulaolokyio nyi nyashi ya Ruwa.
45005010	Cha kyipfa kokooya kyiyeri luwewoṙe kyituwa na Ruwa lulesanzo kui upfu lo Mono-kye; ngoseṟa mnu lukomsanzo lochikyiṟo kui moo okye.
45005011	Maa chi wuṙo tikyi-pfo, indi na ichihiyo kyiiṙi kya Ruwa kui Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, ulya kui oe wulalu loambilyia isanzo-lyo.
45005012	Koikyo, kokooya kui mndu umwi wunyamaṟi wulecha na wuyanenyi, na kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi-wo kukocha upfu; na kuṙo upfu lukoshika ko wandu woose kyipfa woose walewuta wunyamaṟi.
45005013	Kyipfa kyiyeri mawawaso galawendewiko wunyamaṟi wuwekyeri wuyanenyi, indi wunyamaṟi wokyetalo kulawoṙe mawawaso-pfo.
45005014	Kyaindi upfu lulechilyia wookyia Adamu mṟasa Mose, nalo lulechilyia maa iwo walawekyewuta wunyamaṟi wufananyi na ṙeko lya Adamu, akyeri mfano okye oe echicha.
45005015	Kyaindi kyisumbo kyilya kyiwekyeri cha ṙeko lyilya-pfo. Cha kyipfa kokooya kyipfa kya iṙeko lya ulya umwi wafoi walepfa, ngoseṟa mnu isaṟia lya Ruwa na kyienengo kyikyeri isaṟienyi lyakye mndu umwi Yesu Kristo kyileengyeṟika kyipfa kya walya wafoi.
45005016	Maa chandu mndu ulya umwi alewuta wunyamaṟi chi kyimwi na kyienengo kyilya-pfo. Cha kyipfa ianduyo lyilecha kui njia ya mndu umwi lyikaende ngapo; indi kyisumbo kya isaṟia kyilecha kyipfa kya maṙeko gafoi, kyikaende italyio wusumganyi.
45005017	Kyipfa kokooya kui iṙeko lya mndu umwi upfu lulechilyia kyipfa kya ulya umwi, ngoseṟa mnu iwo wekyeambilyia isaṟia lyifoi, na kyienengo kyilya kya wusumganyi, wechichilyia moonyi kui ulya umwi, Yesu Kristo.
45005018	Kyasia-ng'u, kokooya kui ṙeko lyimwi wandu woose waleanduyo ngapo, na wuṙo kui iṟunda lyimwi lya wusumganyi wandu woose waletalyio wusumganyi wuwoṙe moo.
45005019	Kyipfa kokooya kui inyamaṟa lya mndu umwi wandu wafoi walewiko wandunyi wawoṙe wunyamaṟi, na wuṙo kui iindia lya mndu umwi wandu wafoi wechisanzio kyiiṙi kya wawoṙe wusumganyi.
45005020	Indi mawawaso galecha kundu ṙeko lyilya lying'ane mnu. Na kyiyeri wunyamaṟi wuleengyeṟika, isaṟia lyiwefoi ngoseṟa;
45005021	kundu kye chandu wunyamaṟi wulechilyia upfunyi, na wuṙo kui njia ya wusumganyi isaṟia lyichilyie mṟasa moo o mlungana kui Yesu Kristo Mndumii oṙu.
45006001	Kyasia lugambe kyikyi-ng'u? Lukae wunyamaṟinyi kundu isaṟia lyiengyeṟe ifo?
45006002	Maa ale! Soe lulawoṙe-se moo o wuta sha wunyamaṟi lochikaa-se luṙa wunyamaṟinyi?
45006003	Muichi kye soe loose lulepatiso kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu lulepatiso upfunyi lokye?
45006004	Kyasia luleṟiko hamwi na oe kui njia ya wupatiso upfunyi lokye, kundu luwaṙe moo ngyihya nakamwi chandu Awu aleṟutsa Kristo iwuka upfunyi kui pfinya yakye ing'anyi.
45006005	Cha kyipfa chandu lulelungana na oe mfanonyi o upfu lokye na wuṙo lowelungana na oe mfanonyi o iṟuka lyakye.
45006006	Luichi mbonyi-tsi kye, mkaṟo oṙu o kacha ulekapio msalabenyi hamwi na oe, kundu mmbiu o wunyamaṟi uilachikye lulachilyio-se nyi wunyamaṟi.
45006007	Kyipfa oe alepfa naletalyio wusumganyi kuleshi na wunyamaṟi.
45006008	Kyaindi lui kye lulepfa hamwi na Kristo, luiṙikyie kye lochiwaṙa moo hamwi na oe;
45006009	luichi kye Kristo kamṟuka ko wapfu epfa-se-pfo, maa upfu lomchilyia-se-pfo.
45006010	Kyipfa kui ipfa lyakye, wunyamaṟi woiṙima-se imchilyia-pfo; indi kulya oe iwaṙa moo, nawaṙa moo ko Ruwa.
45006011	Na wuṙo maa nyoe kutalenyi kye muwapfu ko mbonyi tsa wunyamaṟi, na wai na moo ko Ruwa kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
45006012	Kyasia, wunyamaṟi wulachilyie mmbiunyi yanyu yekyepfa mṟasa mukoosha lango tsayo.
45006013	Maa mulaengyeṟe iwuta shiwungo shanyu shiwe shisha sha mbaka ko wunyamaṟi. Indi kuwutenyi muwenyi ko Ruwa cha wai na moo numa ya ipfa, na shiwungo shanyu ko Ruwa iwa shisha sha wusumganyi.
45006014	Kyipfa wunyamaṟi wochimuchilyia nyoe-pfo, cha kyipfa muwachilyie nyi mawawaso-pfo, indi muwachilyie nyi isaṟia.
45006015	Kyasia ny'kyikyi-ngu? Luwute wunyamaṟi kyipfa lulawachilyie nyi mawawaso indi isaṟia? Ote!
45006016	Muichi kye icho muiwuta mrima yanyu kokye iwa waṟundi wakye kyiiṙi kya imwindia, mowa waṟundi wakye ulya muimwindia, kokooya nyi wuṟundi wo wunyamaṟi wokyeende upfu, ang'u kokooya nyi wuṟundi wo wuindi wokyeende wusumganyi.
45006017	Kyaindi Ruwa naano, cha kyipfa muwewachilyie nyi wunyamaṟi, indi muleindia kui mrima yanyu mbaṟe iya ya wuṟango wulewiko wumchilyie.
45006018	Na mommbiko kuleshi na wunyamaṟi, mukochilyio nyi wusumganyi.
45006019	Ngyiṙeṙa kui mbaṟe ya kyimndu kyipfa kya wufofo wo mmbiu yanyu. Cha kyipfa chandu mulewuta shiwungo shanyu shiṟunde mbonyi tsa ukoe na wunyamaṟi muiṙime iwuta wunyamaṟi, na wuṙo-ng'u wulalu wutenyi shiwungo shanyu shiṟunde sha wusumganyi muiṙime iyeṟemtso.
45006020	Kyipfa kyiyeri muwewachilyie nyi wunyamaṟi, muwekyeri kuleshi na wusumganyi.
45006021	Kyasia nyi kyiira kyiha-ng'u mulewona mfiri iya ko shindo-sho shimuriisa sonu wulalu? Kyipfa mafurumionyi ga shindo-sho nyi upfu.
45006022	Kyaindi wulalu mukomlekyio, na iwa kuleshi na wunyamaṟi, na iwa waṟundi wa Ruwa, muwoṙe kyiira kyanyu, nyikyo iilyisho, na mafurumionyi gakyo nyi moo o mlungana.
45006023	Kyipfa wori wo wunyamaṟi nyi upfu, indi kyisumbo kya Ruwa nyi moo o mlungana kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu Mndumii oṙu.
45007001	Wana wa wama wako, muichi (kyipfa ngyiṙeṙa na iwo waichi mawawaso), kye mawawaso gekyechilyia mndu ilyi akyeri na moo?
45007002	Kyipfa mndu mka awoṙe mii nampfungye nyi mawawaso ko ulya amwalyikyie kyiyeri akyeri na moo. Indi kapfa ulya amwalyikyie, nalekyio iwuka iwawasonyi lya wolyi.
45007003	Kyasia kyiyeri mii okye akyeri na moo, kokooya mka-chu awaṙa mii ungyi nekyelago mṟui. Indi mii okye kapfa, nalekyio, eshingyio-se nyi iwawaso lyilya-pfo, na oe chi mṟui-se-pfo, maa kaalyiko nyi mii ungyi.
45007004	Na wuṙo, wana wa wama wako, nyoe taa muwoṙe-se moo o osha uwawaso-pfo, kyipfa mukyeri kyoonyi kya mmbiu o Kristo, muiṙime iwa masaa ga ungyi, ulya aleṟuka ko wapfu, kundu soe lukumbie ndunda ko Ruwa.
45007005	Kyipfa kyiyeri luwekyeri na mbaṟe ya mmbiu, lango tsa wunyamaṟi tsiwekyeri pfo kyipfa kya uwawaso, tsileṟunda mmbiunyi yaṙu lukopfa.
45007006	Indi wulalu lolekyio iwuka uwawasonyi, luwoṙe-se moo o osha wunyamaṟi wulya wuleluchilyia-pfo, kundu soe luiṙime iṟunda mbaṟenyi ngyihya ya Mumuyo o Ruwa, chi mbaṟenyi ya kacha ya kyiṟeio-pfo.
45007007	Kyasia lugambe kyikyi-ng'u? Uwawaso nyi wunyamaṟi? Ote! Indi ngyiweiṙima imanya wunyamaṟi sile nyi kui mawawaso-pfo; cha kyipfa kokooya uwawaso lulalegamba “Ulalangye” gyiwechimanya ilanga-pfo.
45007008	Kyaindi wunyamaṟi wulewona ṙaawa ko iwawaso lyilya, wukowuta mrimenyi koko orio mbaṟe ya ilanga. Kyipfa wunyamaṟi kulawoṙe mawawaso upfiie.
45007009	Na inyi ngyiwekyeri na moo ipfo mawookyionyi kulawoṙe mawawaso, indi kyiyeri iwawaso lyilya lyilecha, wunyamaṟi wulewaṙa pfinya na inyi ngapfa.
45007010	Ngawona iwawaso lyilya lyekyeende moo kye koko inyi lyileende upfu.
45007011	Kyipfa wunyamaṟi, kui iwona ṙaawa ko iwawaso lyilya, wulengyilemba, koikyo wukongyiwaaga.
45007012	Kyasia uwawaso lungyiele. Na iwawaso lyilya lyilyiele, na lya wusumganyi, na lyilyicha.
45007013	Kyasia-ng'u ngyesa, lyilya lyikyeri lyicha lyiwekyeri upfu koko inyi? Ote! Indi wunyamaṟi, kundu wuwono kye nyi wunyamaṟi loi, wulengyiwaaga kui iwawaso lyilya lyicha, kundu kui iwawaso lyilya wunyamaṟi wuengyeṟe iwiha mnu.
45007014	Cha kyipfa luichi kye uwawaso mawookyionyi galo nyi mrimenyi; indi inyi nyi mndu o mmbiunyi, ngyimchilyie nyi wunyamaṟi.
45007015	Kyipfa ngyiichi kyindo ngyiwuta-pfo; cha kyipfa kyilya ngyikundi, ngyikyiwuta-pfo; indi kyilya ngyikyisuuye nyikyo ngyekyewuta.
45007016	Kyaindi kokooya ngawuta kyilya ngyilakyikundi, ngaiṙikyia kye iwawaso lyilya lyilyicha.
45007017	Kyasia wulalu chi inyi mrimenyi koko ngyiwuta ikyo-pfo, indi nyi wunyamaṟi wulya wukyeri mrimenyi koko.
45007018	Cha kyipfa ngyiichi kye mrimenyi koko, lugambe mmbiunyi oko, kokyekaa kyindo kyicha-pfo cha kyipfa ikunda ngyikundi, indi iwuta kyindo kyicha ngiiṙima-pfo.
45007019	Cha kyipfa kyilya kyicha ngyikyikundi ngyikyiwuta-pfo; indi kyilya kyiwicho ngyilakyikundi nyikyo ngyekyewuta.
45007020	Kyasia kokooya kyilya ngyilakyikundi nyikyo ngyikyiwuta, chi inyi mrimenyi koko ngyikyiwuta-pfo, indi nyi wunyamaṟi wulya wukyeri mrimenyi koko.
45007021	Kyasia ngawona iwawaso-lyi, kye koko inyi ngyikundi iwuta kyindo kyicha, kuwoṙe lyilyiwicho.
45007022	Cha kyipfa mrimenyi koko ngyimchihiye kyipfa kya iwawaso lya Ruwa.
45007023	Kyaindi shiwungonyi shako, ngyiwonyi iwawaso lyikyeri kuleshi, lyikapana shiṙa na iwawaso lyilya lya wuṟango woko, na ingyiwaṙa ko pfinya kui iwawaso lyilya lya wunyamaṟi lyikyeri shiwungonyi shako.
45007024	Ochia loko, mkyiwa inyi, nyi wui echingyiletsa na mmbiu-chu o upfu?
45007025	Ngyiana Ruwa, kui Yesu Kristo Mndumii oṙu. Kyasia, kokooya nyi wuṙo, inyi ngyimonyi kui wuṟango woko ngyiṟundia iwawaso lya Ruwa, indi kui mmbiu oko iwawaso lya wunyamaṟi.
45008001	Kyasia-ng'u, wulalu, kuwoṙe ianduyo lya ngapo ko iwo wakyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu-pfo.
45008002	Cha kyipfa iwawaso lya Mumuyo o moo ulya ukyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu lyilengyilekyia, kuleshi na iwawaso lya wunyamaṟi na upfu.
45008003	Kyipfa shilya shilekyeiṙimika kui iwawaso, kyipfa kya ilyi lyiwewoṙe wufofo kyipfa kya mmbiu, Ruwa kui iṙuma Mana okye amonyi kui mbaṟe ya mmbiu ui o wunyamaṟi, na kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi, naleanduya wunyamaṟi mmbiunyi.
45008004	Kundu shilya shishigambe mawawasonyi, shiafutsio mrimenyi koṙu soe, lulekyekaa kui iosha mbonyi tsa mmbiu, indi mbonyi tsa mrima.
45008005	Cha kyipfa walya wekyeosha mmbiu wekyekusaṟa mbonyi tsa mmbiu; indi walya wekyeosha mrima wekyekusaṟa mbonyi tsa mrima.
45008006	Cha kyipfa kyindo mmbiu ukundi nyi upfu; indi kyindo mrima ukundi nyi moo na ufoṟo.
45008007	Cha kyipfa kyilya mmbiu ukundi nyi kyituwa ko Ruwa, kyipfa kyekyeindia iwawaso lya Ruwa-pfo, maa kyeiṙima ilyiindia-pfo.
45008008	Walya wekyeosha mmbiu wechiiṙima ichihiṟa Ruwa-pfo.
45008009	Kyaindi kokooya Mumuyo o Ruwa nakyeri mrimenyi konyu, nyoe muiosha mmbiu-pfo; indi muiosha Mumuyo. Kyaindi kokooya mndu oose alawoṙe Mumuyo o Kristo, icho chi okye-pfo.
45008010	Na Kristo akyeri mrimenyi konyu, mmbiu yanyu iwoṙe-se moo o osha wunyamaṟi-pfo; indi mrima yanyu ikyeri na moo kyipfa kya wusumganyi.
45008011	Kyaindi kokooya Mumuyo okye ulya aleṟutsa Yesu ko wapfu nakyeri mrimenyi konyu, ulya aleṟutsa Kristo Yesu ko wapfu naiṟutsa na mmbiu yanyu ikyeri mbaṟenyi ya ipfa, kui Mumuyo okye akyeri mrimenyi konyu.
45008012	Kyasia, kokooya nyi wuṙo, wana wa wama, lui wasile, chi wa mmbiu lukae na moo kui iosha mbonyi tsa mmbiu-pfo.
45008013	Kyipfa kokooya mokaa na moo kui iosha mbonyi tsa mmbiu, mukundi ipfa; indi kokooya mowaaga mawuto ga mmbiu kui Mumuyo, mokaa na moo.
45008014	Cha kyipfa woose wekyesongoyo nyi Mumuyo o Ruwa, iwo nyiwo wana wa Ruwa.
45008015	Cha kyipfa Mumuyo ulya Ruwa amuenengyie omugaluo nyoe watumo na imuenenga wuowu-pfo; indi muleambilyia Mumuyo o imugaluo wana, na kui Mumuyo-cho luilaga Papa, nyi kyimwi na igamba Awu.
45008016	Mumuyo oe amonyi nekyeṟingyishia hamwi na mrima yaṙu, kye soe nyi wana wa Ruwa.
45008017	Na kokooya soe nyi wana, kyasia, soe nyi weoṟa mboṟa tsa Ruwa, wekyeoṟa hamwi na Kristo. Yee, lochituuro hamwi na oe kundu luweiṙima ing'anyiso hamwi na oe.
45008018	Cha kyipfa ngyitala matuuro ga kyiyeri-kyi kya wulalu kye chi kyindo cha mng'ano ulya ochiloṟo koṙu-pfo.
45008019	Cha kyipfa shigumbe shoose shiweṙelyia kui sia ing'anyi iloṟo lya wana wa Ruwa.
45008020	Cha kyipfa shigumbe shoose shilewiko wanda ya kyindo kyilawoṙe kyiira; chi kui ikunda lyasho-pfo, indi kyipfa kyakye oe aleshiwika kyiiṙi kya ikusuria.
45008021	Kyipfa shigumbe-sho shimonyi nasho shechiwiko handu halawoṙe ichilyio na iwuto wutumonyi wo inyamaṟika, mṟasa shiiṙe handunyi halawoṙe ichilyio ha mng'ano o wana wa Ruwa.
45008022	Cha kyipfa luichi kye shigumbe shoose taa shiwawio handu hamwi, nasho shiwoṙe fowa cha ya mndu mka aienengo mana handu hamwi maa wulalu.
45008023	Maa chi wuṙo tikyi-pfo, indi maa soe luwenyi luwoṙe shindo shikyeri ndunda tsa kuwooka tsa Mumuyo, soe taa luiwawio mrimenyi koṙu, lochiweṙelyia iwa wana, nyi kyimwi na wukyiṟo wo mmbiu yaṙu.
45008024	Cha kyipfa lulekyiṟo kui kyindo kyiweṙelyio, kyilawonio. Indi kyindo kyiweiweṙelyio kyikammboneka, kuwoṙe-se iweṙelyia-pfo. Cha kyipfa nyi wui ekyeweṙelyia kyilya akyiwonyi?
45008025	Indi lukoweṙelyia kyindo lulakyiwonyi, lokyiweṙelyia kui wusimiri.
45008026	Na wuṙo Mumuyo na oe nekyelutarama wufofo woṙu, kyipfa luichi iterewa chandu kyiluwaṟi-pfo; indi Mumuyo amonyi nekyeluterewia kui isumkyia lyilechiiṙima isendo.
45008027	Na oe ai moruwa-ruwa mrima, naichi kyilya Mumuyo akundi cha kyipfa nekyeterewia wandu wa Ruwa chandu Ruwa akundi.
45008028	Na soe luichi kye shindonyi shoose Ruwa nekyeṟunda hamwi na walya wamkundi kyiiṙi kya iwanenga mecha, kyimwi na igamba soe luwalage chandu Ruwa akundi.
45008029	Kyipfa walya awewaichi wookyia mawookyionyi, nalewasambuṟa wookyia mawookyionyi wafananyisho na mfano o Mono-kye, kundu oe nawe mmbele o wana wa wama wafoi.
45008030	Na walya alewasambuṟa wookyia mawookyionyi, iwo kawalaga; na walya alewalaga, iwo kawatalyia wusumganyi; na walya alewatalyia wusumganyi, iwo kawang'anyisa.
45008031	Kyasia lugambe kyi kyipfa kya isho? Ruwa akyeri ura loṙu, nyi wui eiṙima iluwutia kyindo kyiwicho?
45008032	Ulya alalelekyia Mono-kye amonyi, indi kammbuta kyipfa kyaṙu soe loose nechilemo kuṙa iluenenga necha shindo shoose hamwi na oe?
45008033	Nyi wui echiṙuo mengyenyi wasambuṟe wa Ruwa? Ruwa nyi oe aiwatalyia wusumganyi.
45008034	Nyi wui eiṙima igamba kye nawaṟi iolotsio ngapo? Kristo Yesu nyi oe alepfa; yee, na ngoseṟa ya isho, naleṟuka ko wapfu, na oe naṙamie kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa. Ngoseṟa nyi oe ailuterewia.
45008035	Nyi wui echiluletsana na ikunda lya Kristo? Ngyesa nyi fowa, ang'u wukyiwa, ang'u kyiwi, ang'u njaa, ang'u iwuṟa nguo, ang'u ndenga, ang'u ushu?
45008036	Chandu kyikyiṟeie kye, “Kyipfa kyapfo luiwoogo kyingoto puti, luwatale cha moondo geshinja.”
45008037	Kyaindi kyiiṙi kya mbonyi-tso tsoose luiwinga, na ngoseṟa ya iwinga, kui ulya alelukunda!
45008038	Cha kyipfa ngammanya kui wuloi kye, maa upfu, maa moo, maa malaika, maa wawoṙe wuchilyi, maa shikyeri pfo, maa shilya shechiwa pfo, maa wawoṙe wuiṙimi,
45008039	maa shikyeri wuye, maa shikyeri wanda, maa kyindo kyingyi kyoose kyikyigumbe kyechiiṙima iluletsana na ikunda lya Ruwa lyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu Mndumii oṙu-pfo.
45009001	Ngyiṙeṙa loi kyiiṙi kya Kristo, ngyiṙeṙa wongo-pfo, mrima oko ongyiṟingyishia Mumuyonyi Mweele,
45009002	kye ngyiwoṙo nyi fowa ing'anyi na mawawio galekyesia mrimenyi koko.
45009003	Kyipfa ngyiweiṙima iterewa inyi ngyimonyi iseso nyi Ruwa na iletsano na Kristo kyipfa kya wana wa wama wako, kyishari kyako kyimmbiu.
45009004	Iwo wakyeri Waisiraelyi wawoṙe kulya ilago nyi wana, na kyiṟumi kyilya; na shiteṟio, na ienengo uwawaso, na iindia na iterewa Ruwa, na shaasa shakye.
45009005	Iwo wakyeri wachuku wa waku, na kyiiṙi kya iwo kulewuka Kristo kui mbaṟe ya mmbiu. Nyi oe akyeri wuye ya shindo shoose, Ruwa, ekyeano shiyeri shoose. Amen.
45009006	Chi kye Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyailachika-pfo. Kyipfa wandu Ruwa asambuṟie chi Waisiraelyi tikyi-pfo.
45009007	Maa wailago wana kyipfa kya ilyi wakyeri wa ushari lo Abrahamu-pfo, indi, “Kyiiṙi kya Isakyi ushari lopfo lochilago.”
45009008	Kyimwi na igamba chi wana wa mmbiu wai wana wa Ruwa-pfo, indi wana wa kyaasa kyilya wekyetalo kye nyi wa ushari.
45009009	Cha kyipfa mbonyi tsa kyaasa nyi itsi: “Kyiyeri cha ikyi ngyechicha, na Sara nekoamwenengo mana.”
45009010	Maa chi wuṙo tikyi-pfo, indi Rebeka na oe, amwire mana kui mii umwi, na oe nyi Isakyi, awu oṙu,
45009011	(kyipfa walandefeo wana walya, maa walandewute kyindo kyicha ang'u kyiwicho, kundu kyindo Ruwa akundi kui isambuṟa kyigoṟokye, chi kyipfa kya mawuto-pfo, indi kyipfa kya kyilya ulya ailaga akundi),
45009012	nalewio kuṙi: “Ang'anyi nechiṟundia mtutu.”
45009013	Chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Ngakunda Yakobo, indi Esau ngamsuo.”
45009014	Kyasia lugambe kyikyi-ng'u? Kuwoṙe wuwicho ko Ruwa? Ote!
45009015	Kyipfa naiwia Mose, “Ngyehooṟia ulya ngemhooṟia; ngyesaṟia ulya ngyemsaria.”
45009016	Kyasia, kokooya nyi wuṙo, chi wuiṙiminyi wo ulya akundi, maa wo ulya aikapa mteeṟa-pfo; indi wo Ruwa ulya aihooṟia.
45009017	Kyipfa shiṟeio shagamba kya Farao kye, “Ngyilekugoṟotsa kyipfa kya ikyi, kundu ngyiloṟe pfinya tsako kopfo, rina lyako lyiongoyo urukyenyi koose.”
45009018	Kyasia, kokooya nyi wuṙo, akunda imhooṟia nekyemhooṟia, na akunda imwenenga mrima muumu nekyemgaluo muumu.
45009019	Kyasia, nongyiwia, “Ny'kyilyi Ruwa aiengyeṟa igamba kye luwoṙe tewe? Cha kyipfa nyi wui ekyewingana na kyilya oe akundi?”
45009020	Ote! Chi wuṙo-pfo, iyoe mndu. Iyoe nyi wui uigaluo Ruwa? Ngyesa kyindo kyigumbe kyiwie ulya alekyigumba, “Ny'kyilyi ongyigumba kuṙi?”
45009021	Ang'u moachikyia shinungu ngyesa achilyie teri, kui ṙombo lyimwi lya teri iachikyia kyindo kyimwi kyiwaṙe kyiṟumi na kyingyi kyilawoṙe kyiṟumi-pfoe?
45009022	Kyasia ny' kyikyi-ng'u, kokooya Ruwa kui ikunda iloṟa nyashi yakye, na iṟingyishia wuiṙimi wokye, kui ikarishia lying'anyi, naleṙuana na walya wawewaṟi inyamaṟo nyi nyashi ya Ruwa.
45009023	Lyingyi-se, kundu naṟingyishie wung'anyi wo kyiṟumi kyakye kui shindo shilya sha isaṟia, aleshiachikyia wookyia kacha shiwaṙe kyiṟumi.
45009024	Nyi soe-ng'u alelulaga. Chi wandu wai Wayuda tikyi-pfo, indi na wandu walai Wayuda taa.
45009025	Nyi chandu awegambie ipfo ko Hosea, “Ngyelaga wandu wako walya walakyeri wandu wako, na mkunde oko ulya alakyeri mkunde oko,
45009026	Lyingyi-se kyechiwa handu halya walewio, nyoe chi wandu wako-pfo, iho welago wana wa Ruwa ai na moo.”
45009027	Yesaya na oe naiṙeṙa kya Isiraelyi, echigamba, “Itala lya wana wa Isiraelyi, maa chandu lyikyeri cha mlelya o ipalyipalyi, nyi matsugaṟo gawo tikyi gechikyiṟo.
45009028	Kyipfa Mndumii kulawoṙe iṙetsa kyiyeri nechianduya wandu woose wa Wuyana, echimarisa na iṙumbuo.”
45009029	“Lyingyi-se chandu Yesaya alesonguo iṙeṙa, ‘Kokooya Mndumii o ngyuulyimalyi alaleluṙeeya ushari, luwewa cha Sodoma, luwechifananyisho na Gomora.’ ”
45009030	Kyasia lugambe kyikyi-ng'u? Kye wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa, walekyeosha wusumganyi; walewona wusumganyi; kyaindi nyi wusumganyi wulya wukyeri wo iiṙikyia.
45009031	Indi Isiraelyi wechiosha iwawaso lya wusumganyi walewona iwawaso lyilya-pfo.
45009032	Kyipfa kya kyikyi? Kyipfa walelyiosha kui njia ya iiṙikyia-pfo, indi cha ilyi kye nyi kui njia ya mawuto. Wakakapa tuulyia halya igoenyi lyekyeenenga wandu ikapa ṙende,
45009033	chandu kyileṟeio, “Ngyiwika Sion igoe lyekyeenenga wandu ikapa ṙende na iṟaṟa lyekyeolotsa. Na orio echimwiṙikyia echirigo nyi sonu-pfo.”
45010001	Wana wa wama wako, kyindo ngyilangyie mnu mrimenyi koko, na kyiterewo kyako ko Ruwa, nyi kyipfa kyawo kundu wakyiṟo.
45010002	Cha kyipfa ngyiwaṟingyishia kye wawoṙe wuragari kyipfa kya Ruwa, indi chi kyiiṙi kya wuṟango-pfo.
45010003	Cha kyipfa, walaichi wusumganyi wo Ruwa, na wakundi iṟingyishia wusumganyi wowo wawenyi, walechilyio nyi wusumganyi wo Ruwa-pfo.
45010004	Cha kyipfa Kristo amche kuwoṙe-se kyimaṙuma kya uwawaso-pfo; kundu orio aiṙikyie natalyio wusumganyi.
45010005	Cha kyipfa Mose naleṟeia kui wusumganyi wuwukyie kui mawawaso, kye mndu ekyewuta isho nechiwaṙa moo kui isho.
45010006	Indi wusumganyi wulya wokyewono kui iiṙikyia wogamba kuṙi: “Maa ulagambe mrimenyi kopfo, nyi wui echiṙo iyenda Ruwewu?” (Nyi kyimwi na isotsa Kristo na wanda).
45010007	Ang'u, “Nyi wui echisoka iyenda ko waṟumu?” (Nyi kyimwi na iṙosia Kristo wuye, iwuka ko wapfu.)
45010008	Kyaindi wusumganyi wogamba kuṙa? Ṙeṙo lyilya lyikyeri kufuhi na iyoe, ṙumbunyi lyapfo, na mrimenyi opfo, nyi ṙeṙo lyilya lya iiṙikyia lokyelyionguo.
45010009	Cha kyipfa, koṟingyishia Yesu kui ṙumbu lyapfo kye nyi Mndumii, na iiṙikyia mrimenyi kopfo kye Ruwa nalemṟutsa ko wapfu, nochikyiṟo.
45010010	Cha kyipfa kui mrima mndu nekyeiṙikyia mṟasa kawona wusumganyi, na kui ṙumbu nekyeṟingyishia kawona wukyiṟo.
45010011	Cha kyipfa kyiṟeio kyagamba, “Orio momwiṙikyia echiwona sonu-pfo.”
45010012	Cha kyipfa kuwoṙe mbaṟe ingyi ko Myuda na Mkyiṟikyi-pfo, kyipfa oe nyi Mndumii o woose, awoṙe wunjama ko woose wekyemlaga;
45010013	kyipfa orio mndu echilaga rina lya Mndumii nechikyiṟo.
45010014	Kyasia wamlage kuṙa icho walamwiṙikyie? Lyingyi-se wamwiṙikyie kuṙa icho walandemwicho? Lyingyi-se wamwicho kuṙa icho kulawoṙe moonguo mbonyi?
45010015	Lyingyi-se weonguo mbonyi kuṙa walawaṙume? Chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Gamecha cha kyikyi maṙende ga iwo wekyeonguo mbonyi tsa mecha.”
45010016	Kyaindi chi woose waleindia mbonyi iya ngyicha-pfo, kyipfa Yesaya naigamba, “Mndumii, nyi wui aleiṙikyia mbonyi tsaṙu?”
45010017	Kyasia iiṙikyia lyekyecha kui kyilya mndu aiicho; na kyilya mndu aiicho kyekyecha kui ionguo Ṙeṙo lya Kristo.
45010018	Kyaindi ngyigamba, ngyesa wo waleicho-pfoe? Yee waleicho. “Ṟui lyawo lyileṙunganana wuyanenyi koose, na maṙeṙo gawo mṟasa matsitsionyi ga wuyana.”
45010019	Indi ngyigamba, ngyesa Waisiraelyi walemanya-pfoe? Kya kuwooka Mose naigamba, “Ngyewawika wunyenyi kui wandu walakyeri Isanga, kui isanga lyilaichi kyindo ngyewapfulutsa nyashi.”
45010020	Na Yesaya awoṙe wuṟango na wukari wung'anyi, naigamba, “Ngyilekooyo nyi iwo walekyengyipfula, ngyileṟingyishio ko iwo walaiwesa mbonyi tsako.”
45010021	Indi ko Isiraelyi naigamba, “Kyingoto puti ngyilewaleshia mawoko wandu walawoṙe wuindi na walekyeicho.”
45011001	Kyasia, ngyiwesa, ngyesa Ruwa naletsindikyia wandu wakye kuleshi? Ote! Kyipfa maa inyi nyi mndu o Isiraelyi, umwi o washari wa Abrahamu, mndu o mbaṟe ya Benyamen.
45011002	Ruwa aletsindikyia wandu wakye kuleshi awewaichi wookyia mawookyionyi-pfo. Ang'u muichi kyilya kyileṙeṙo nyi shiṟeio ko mbonyi tsa Elyiya-pfoe? Chandu aishitakyi Waisiraelyi mbele ya Ruwa.
45011003	“Mndumii, wawaaga weonguo shisuku wapfo, wanyamaṟa alyitaṟe tsapfo, na inyi ngaṙio ngyimonyi, nawo waingyipfula wangyiwaage.”
45011004	Indi Ruwa nalemgaluo kuṙa? “Ngyiwoṙe wandu shiku mfungaaṙe walekyepfiria ndi mbele ya Baalyi.”
45011005	Kyasia na wuṙo kyiyeri-kyi kya wulalu, kuwoṙe mtsugaṟo o wandu wasambuṟe kui isaṟia.
45011006	Kyaindi kokooya nyi kui isaṟia, kyewa-se kui mawuto-pfo, ang'u iho isaṟia lyiwechiwa-se isaṟia-pfo.
45011007	Kyasia kyawa kuṙa-ng'u? Kyindo kyilya Isiraelyi aweikyipfula alekyiwona-pfo, indi walya walesambuṟo walekyiwona, na wengyi waleming'a.
45011008	Chandu kyiwekyiṟeie, Ruwa nalewaenenga mrima mlemeri, mṟasa maa maṙwi galaicho, mṟasa inu.
45011009	Na Dawidi naigamba, “Shelya shawo shiwe mṙego o wawaṙa, waolokye na ianduyo
45011010	Meso gawo gawiko meema walaiṙime iwona moongo yawo ilemekye shiyeri shoose.”
45011011	Kyasia ngyiwesa, ngyesa walekapa ṙende mṟasa waolokye piu? Ote! Kyaindi kui ṙeko lyawo wukyiṟo wuleafukyia ko walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa, kundu wo wawenyi wawoṙo nyi wunyeng'i.
45011012	Kyasia, kokooya ṙeko lyawo lyawa nyi wunjama wo wuyana, na wufofo wowo wo kyimrima wuleende mboṟa ing'anyi ko wandu wa masanga wengyi, ngyesa kyechiwa ngoseṟa iafutsia lyawo-pfoe?
45011013	Kyaindi ngyiṙeṙa na nyoe, mui wandu walakyeri Wayuda. Kyasia, chandu ngyikyeri msu o wandu walakyeri Wayuda, ngyiṟumisha iṟunda lyako.
45011014	Kofia ngyeiṙima iwaenenga wunyenyi wandu wa samu yako ngyimonyi na ikyiṟa wandu waata.
45011015	Kyipfa kokooya iwiyitso lyawo lyileende kyisanza kya wuyana na Ruwa, ngyesa iiṙikyio lyawo lyechiwa-kyi sile nyi moo ko walya walempfa?
45011016	Lyingyi-se kokooya kyifunjoe kyikyienengye Ruwa, na wuṙo mkate oose; na itsinde lyikawa nyi lya Ruwa, na wuṙo maa mbaga tsalyo.
45011017	Kyaindi kokooya mbaga tsingyi tsilemanyo, na iyoe mseituni o nguṙunyi nuleṙongo kyiiṙi kyatso, kowa mbumbu imwi ya ikyiṙi lya mseituni na wucha wolyo,
45011018	maa ulakushele kyiiṙi kya mbaga tsilya, ang'u kokooya nukushela, chi iyoe uṙuṙe itsinde-pfo, indi nyi itsinde lyikuṙuṙe iyoe.
45011019	Kyasia nogamba, mbaga tsilya tsilemanyo kundu ngyipario ho inyi.
45011020	Nyi kyicha. Galemanyo kyipfa kya ilemo iiṙikyia lyawo; na iyoe nugoṟokyi kui iiṙikyia lyapfo. Maa ulakushele, indi uowuo.
45011021	Cha kyipfa kokooya Ruwa alalelekyia mbaga tsa kuwooka, maa ekulekyia iyoe-pfo.
45011022	Kyasia, ambuya-ng'u, wucha na wulang'a wo Ruwa; ko walya waolokyie wulang'a; indi kopfo iyoe wucha wo Ruwa, kokaa kyiiṙi kya wucha-wo; sile nyi wuṙo, iyoe taa nowiyitso kuleshi.
45011023	Na iwo taa, wakaṙa wufofo wowo wo iiṙikyia, wechiṙongo, cha kyipfa Ruwa neiṙima iwaṙonga-se.
45011024	Cha kyipfa kokooya iyoe nulemanyo kowuto mseituninyi, ukyeri mseituni o nguṙunyi wookyia mawookyionyi, numa koṙongo mbaṟe ingyi, mseituninyi ui mcha; chi ngoseṟa walya wakyeri mseituni mcha wookyia mawookyionyi iiṙima iṙongo mseituninyi owo wawenyi-pfoe?
45011025	Cha kyipfa wana wa wama wako, ngyikundi mulamanye wuṟikyi-wu-pfo, kundu mulachekusaṟa kye mulawaṟango; kye wuumu wo Waisiraelyi nyi kundu masanga gengyi gamanye Ruwa.
45011026	Koikyo Waisiraelyi woose wechikyiṟo; chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Mkyiṟa nechicha awuka Sion, neletsana Yakobo na washituwa wakye.
45011027	Na ikyi nyikyo kyiteṟio kyako nawo, llyi ngyechiwahooṟia ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo.”
45011028	Kyasia ko mbonyi tsa Ndumi Ngyicha walewa washituwa kyipfa kyanyu; indi kyipfa kya isambuṟo walewa nyi wakunde kyipfa kya waku waṙu.
45011029	Cha kyipfa shisumbo sha Ruwa shiwoṙe isumkyia-pfo, maa ilago lyasho.
45011030	Kyipfa kokooya chandu nyoe kacha mulelega Ruwa, kyaindi wulalu mulewona isaṟia kui ilega lyawo;
45011031	na wuṙo maa wo walelega wulalu, kundu kui nyoe isaṟio nawo wasaṟio.
45011032	Kyipfa Ruwa nalewawika handu hamwi woose kyiiṙi kya ilega kundu nawasaṟie woose.
45011033	Chandu wunjama na wuṟango na imanya lya Ruwa shikyeri, ianduya lyakye lyekyemanyika-pfo, maa njia tsakye tsechiwa isoruo-soruo-pfo!
45011034	Kyipfa nyi wui aichi kyindo Mndumii akusaṟie? Ang'u nyi wui alemmba mlosha okye?
45011035	Ang'u nyi wui alemwenenga kyindo kuwooka, na oe namtae-se?
45011036	Cha kyipfa shindo shoose shiwukyie kokye, shikyeri pfo kui pfinya tsakye; lyingyi-se shiwuya na kokye. Kyiṟumi nyi kyakye shiyeri shoose. Amen.
45012001	Kyasia, wana wa wama wako, ngyimuterewa, kui ihooṟia lya Ruwa, wutenyi mmbiu yanyu iwe kyiṙaso kyiwoṙe moo, kyiele, kyechihiṟa Ruwa, ilyi nyilyo iindia na iterewa Ruwa lyilyicha na lya loi.
45012002	Maa mulaoshe mbaṟe ya wuyana-wu; indi mugalukye kundu Ruwa naiṙime igaluo makusaṟo ganyu. Iho nyi lyo-ndu moiṙima imanya kyilya Ruwa akundi, imanya kyilya kyii kyicha, kyemchihiṟa na kyikyiafutsie.
45012003	Cha kyipfa kui isaṟia ngyileenengo ngyiwia orio mndu akyeri konyu alakusurie kyindo kya ngoseṟa kuta chandu awaṟi ikusuria; indi nawaṙe meena chandu Ruwa agawie orio mndu meena o iiṙikyia.
45012004	Kyipfa chandu mmbiunyi umwi luwoṙe shiwungo shifoi, maa shiwungo shoose shekyeṟunda iṟunda lyimwi-pfo;
45012005	na wuṙo na soe chandu lukyeri wafoi lukyeri mmbiu umwi kyiiṙi kya Kristo, na shiwungo, orio umwi ko oṙoe.
45012006	Kyasia cha kyipfa luwoṙe shisumbo sha orio mndu mbaṟe yakye, iṙuana na chandu luleenengo isaṟia; kokooya nyi ionguo shisuku, luonguo shisuku iṙuana na iiṙikyia.
45012007	Kokooya nyi maṟunda lukae maṟundenyi gaṙu. Molosha, kyiiṙi kya ilosha lyakye;
45012008	motutuma, kyiiṙi kya itutuma lyakye; motarama oṙoe, kui mrima mkyesi; mogoṟokyia, kui wuragari; mosaṟia, kui sia.
45012009	Ikunda lyilawaṙe wukulembecheṟi. Suonyi kyikyeri kyiwicho, oshanenyi na kyikyeri kyicha.
45012010	Kui ikunda lya mono-wama, mukundane nyoe wenyi ko wenyi; kui kyiṟumi mochisongoṟa woṙianyu.
45012011	Kui wuragari, chi waṙoko-pfo, muwoṙe wuragari mrimenyi konyu; mochiṟundia Ruwa.
45012012	Kui ikusuria, mochichihiyo; fowenyi, mochiweṙelyia; kyiiṙi kya iterewa, kyiyeri kyoose.
45012013	Mochitarama wandu wa Ruwa shilya wakundi; kui iambilyia wayenu, mochipfuṟukana.
45012014	Wikyienyi mboṟa walya waimsuiṟa; wikyienyi mboṟa, maa mulasese.
45012015	Chihiyonyi hamwi na iwo waichihiyo; fiiṟenyi hamwi na walya waifiiṟa.
45012016	Muiṙikyiane shilya mukusurie nyoe wenyi ko wenyi. Maa mulakusurie shindo shing'anyi, indi muiṙikyie iwinisho nyi mbonyi tsifofo. Maa mulakushelyie wuṟango.
45012017	Maa mulatae mndu wuwicho ko wuwicho. Ṟundenyi shindo shicha mbele ya wandu woose.
45012018	Kokooya kyechiwa, ko ura lonyu, mukae ufoṟonyi na wandu woose.
45012019	Wakunde, maa mulatae kyiṟaache, indi seiyenyi nyashi ya Ruwa; kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, “Kyiṟaache nyi kyako inyi; inyi ngyetaa,” Mndumii nagamba.
45012020	Kyaindi, mokyituwa opfo awoṙo nyi njaa, mwenengye kyelya; amwangari, mwenengye kyindo kyenyo; kyipfa kowuta kuṙo, nowika makaa ga moṙo mṙoenyi kokye.
45012021	Wuwicho wulakuwingye, indi uwingye wuwicho kui wucha.
45013001	Orio mndu naindie wuchilyi na wang'anyi wa uruka, kyipfa kuwoṙe wuchilyi wulawukyie ko Ruwa-pfo; na wulya wukyeri pfo wuwukyie ko Ruwa.
45013002	Koikyo molega awoṙe wuchilyi urukenyi na iwingana na kyilya Ruwa awawasie, na walya wekyewingana na oe wechianduyo.
45013003	Kyipfa walya wekyechilyia wekyeowesha wandu kyipfa kya mecha-pfo, indi kyipfa kya mawuto mawicho. Kyasia nukundi ulaowuo awoṙe wuchilyi? Wuta shindo shicha na iyoe nochienengo kyiṟumi na iyoe nochiwona kyiṟumi kokye.
45013004	Cha kyipfa oe nyi mṟundi o Ruwa kopfo kyipfa kya mecha. Indi kyiyeri owuta shindo shiwicho, owuo, kyipfa aiṙuo ushu wulya-pfo; cha kyipfa nyi mṟundi o Ruwa, ekyetaa kyiṟaache ulya ekyewuta shindo shiwicho kyipfa kya nyashi.
45013005	Koikyo kyikuwaṟi iindia, chi kyipfa kya nyashi iya tupu-pfo, indi na kyipfa kya kyilya mrima ukundi.
45013006	Lyingyi-se kyipfa kya ikyo taa mokyetaa kodi; kyipfa wo nyi waṟundi wa Ruwa, wechikaa iṟundenyi-lyo ilyo.
45013007	Enengyenyi woose kyilya kyiwawaṟi, mndu o kodi, kodi; mndu o ukamba, ukamba; awaṟi iṙeṙemio, iṙeṙemio; awaṟi wuindi, wuindi.
45013008	Maa mulariko nyi mndu kyindo kyoose, sile ikundana; cha kyipfa mokunda oṙoe naafutsia mawawaso.
45013009	Kyipfa kulya igamba, Ulaṟuguye ang'u ulaṟuguyo, Ulawaage, Ulaiwe, Ulalangye; na kuwoṙe iwawaso lyingyi lyoose, lyasanzo na ṙeṙo-lyi, kye, “Kunda momṟasa opfo cha iyoe kumonyi.”
45013010	Ikunda lyekyewutia momṟasa kyindo kyiwicho-pfo. Kyasia ikunda nyilyo lyaafutsia mawawaso.
45013011	Yee, lukomanya kyiyeri, kye kyiyeri kyeamka maṙoenyi kyamwafukyia; cha kyipfa wulalu wukyiṟo woṙu wukyeri kufuhi na soe kuta lyilya lulewooka iiṙikyia.
45013012	Kyio nyi iiṙa kyii kyingoto kyamtikyira kufuhi; kyasia luṙe mawuto ga meema, na iṟaa shisha sha ngyeela.
45013013	Chandu kyiwaṟi iwuto kyingoto luchumie kui wuyendelyi wucha. Chi kui ilya na ielewetsa na wunanzi-pfo, chi kui ukoe na wuṟui-pfo, chi kui shiloyano na wunyenyi-pfo.
45013014	Indi irenyi shisha sha Mndumii Yesu Kristo, maa mulaambuye mmbiu, mṟasa muamtse lango tsacho.
45014001	Mndu awoṙe iiṙikyia lyifofo, mwambilyienyi, indi mulamwanduye makusaṟo gakye.
45014002	Mndu umwi nawoṙe iiṙikyia, nekyelya shoose; kyaindi ulya akyeri mfofo nekyelya mboka tsa maṟa.
45014003	Ulya ekyelya alaanduye ulya alailya; kyipfa Ruwa naiṙikyiana na oe.
45014004	Iyoe nyi wui uianduya mṟundi o mndu ungyi? Ko mndumii okye amonyi ulya nekyegoṟoka ang'u ioloka. Yee, nechigoṟotso cha kyipfa Mndumii neiṙima imgoṟotsa.
45014005	Mndu umwi nekyewona kye mfiri yoose ifananyi-pfo. Ungyi nekyewona mfiri yoose ifananyi. Orio mndu nawute chandu wuṟango wokye womloṟa.
45014006	Ulya mong'anyisa mfiri, nekyeung'anyisa ko Mndumii; na molya, nekyelya ko Mndumii, cha kyipfa naana Ruwa; lyingyi-se, ulya alekyelya ailya ko Mndumii-pfo, na oe taa naiana Ruwa.
45014007	Kyipfa kuwoṙe mndu kyiiṙi kyaṙu ai na moo kyipfa kyakye amonyi, maa kuwoṙe mndu ekyepfa kyipfa kyakye-pfo.
45014008	Cha kyipfa kokooya lokaa na moo, lui na moo kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, ang'u kokooya lopfa, lopfa ko Mndumii. Kyasia kokooya lokaa na moo ang'u kokooya lopfa, soe nyi masaa ga Mndumii.
45014009	Kyipfa Kristo nalepfa kawaṙa-se moo kyipfa kya ikyi, nachilyie wapfu na wai na moo taa.
45014010	Kyaindi iyoe ngyesa ny'kyilyi uianduya mono-womoo? Ang'u ngyesa iyoe ny'kyilyi uimina mono-womoo? Cha kyipfa soe loose lochigoṟoka mbele ya kyiṙi kya ianduyo kya Ruwa.
45014011	Cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, “Chandu ngyikyeri na moo, Mndumii nagamba, orio mndu nepfiria ndi mbele yako, na orio ulumi lochisenda Ruwa.”
45014012	Kyasia nyi wuṙo, orio mndu kyiiṙi kyaṙu echiwuta mbonyi tsakye amonyi mbele ya Ruwa.
45014013	Kyasia lulaengyeṟe ianduyana, indi nanga mowuta ianduya lya mbaṟe-i, mndu alawute kyindo kyetewe mono-wamae ang'u kyemwolotsa.
45014014	Ngyiichi, ngoseṟa ngyimṟingyishie mnu kyiiṙi kya Mndumii Yesu, kye kuwoṙe kyindo kyifanyi kyimṟumoe wookyia mawookyionyi gakyo-pfo; kyaindi ko ulya awona kyindo kyifanyi kyimṟumoe, ko mndu-cho kyindo kyilya kyifanyi kyimṟumoe.
45014015	Na mono-womoo kawoṙo nyi fowa kyipfa kya kyelya, noṙa ichumia ikundenyi. Kui kyelya kyapfo ulanyamaṟe mndu ulya Kristo alepfa kyipfa kyakye.
45014016	Kyasia, wucha-wo wonyu wulasendo kui wuwicho.
45014017	Kyipfa Wumangyi wo Ruwa chi ilya maa inyo-pfo, indi nyi wusumganyi na ufoṟo na sia Mumuyonyi Mweele.
45014018	Kyipfa ulya aiṟundia Kristo mbonyi-tso tsekyechihiṟa Ruwa, na lyingyi-se nekyeiṙikyio nyi wandu.
