45014019	Kyasia kokooya nyi wuṙo, luoshe mbonyi tsa ufoṟo na mbonyi tsiwoṙe kyiira kui ikarishana.
45014020	Kyipfa kya kyelya ulanyamaṟe iṟunda lya Ruwa. Loi, shoose shishicha; indi nyi uwicho ko mndu ilya na ikuicho uwicho mrimenyi.
45014021	Nyi kyicha iṙa ilya nyama maa inyo mpfinyo maa iwuta kyindo kyoose kyetewe mono-womoo naolokye.
45014022	Iiṙikyia lyilya uwoṙe ukae nalyo mrimenyi kopfo mbele ya Ruwa. Nanga mndu ulya alekyekuanduya mrimenyi kokye kui kyindo kyilya ekyekyiiṙikyia.
45014023	Kyaindi awoṙe ikapa kawi, kokooya alya naanduyo kye nanyamaṟie, kyipfa alya kui iiṙikyia-pfo. Na orio kyindo kyilawukyie iiṙikyienyi nyi wunyamaṟi.
45015001	Kyasia kyiluwaṟi soe luwoṙe pfinya iṙuo wufofo wo iwo walawoṙe pfinya, maa kyiluwaṟi iwuta shindo sheluchihiṟa soe luwenyi-pfo.
45015002	Orio mndu kyiiṙi kyaṙu nachihiṟe momṟasa okye, naambilyie wucha, kundu naiṙime ikarisha iiṙikyia lyakye.
45015003	Cha kyipfa Kristo alewuta shindo shekuchihiṟa amonyi-pfo; indi chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Shilahio shawo walekulahia iyoe shilengyikooya inyi.”
45015004	Cha kyipfa shoose shilesonguo iṟeio shileṟeio kundu shiluloshe soe; kundu kui wusimiri na iwiyiṟio moo lya shiṟeio luiṙime iwaṙa ikusuria.
45015005	Na Ruwa ai o wusimiri na iwiyiṟia moo namuenengye ikusuria kyindo kyimwi nyoe wenyi ko wenyi kui mfano o Kristo Yesu;
45015006	kundu kui mrima umwi na kui ṙumbu lyimwi muiṙime iṟumisha Ruwa, Awu o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
45015007	Koikyo muambilyiane nyoe wenyi ko wenyi, chandu na Kristo aleluambilyia, kundu Ruwa nang'anyiso.
45015008	Kyipfa ngyigamba kye Kristo ammba mṟundi o mma o iṙino kyipfa kya wuloi wo Ruwa, kundu naṟingyishie shiteṟio waku waṙu waleenengo.
45015009	Lyingyi-se kundu wandu walakyeri Wayuda waṟumishe Ruwa kyipfa kya ihooṟia lyakye; chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Koikyo ngyekuana wandunyi walakyeri Wayuda, na inyi ngyeimbia rina lyapfo.”
45015010	Lyingyi-se nagamba, “Chihiyonyi, wandu walakyeri Wayuda, hamwi na wasambuṟe wa Ruwa.”
45015011	Lyingyi-se, “Nyoe wandu moose mulakyeri Wayuda, ṟumishenyi Mndumii nyoe wandu moose, mng'anyisenyi.”
45015012	Na lyingyi-se Yesaya nagamba, “Kochiwaṙa mndu kyisharinyi kya Yese, na oe nechichilyia wandu walakyeri Wayuda, nawo wechikusuria kokye.”
45015013	Kyasia-ng'u Ruwa mokusuria namuichuṟe nyoe sia yoose na ufoṟo iiṙikyienyi, kundu muengyeṟikye mnu iwaṙa ikusuria, pfinyenyi tsa Mumuyo Mweele.
45015014	Wana wa wama wako, inyi ngyimonyi ngyileṟingyishio kui mbonyi tsanyu kye mui wandu wecha, muwaenengye wuṟango woose; lyingyi-se moiṙima itutumana.
45015015	Indi ngyimuṟeia, kui wukari ngoseṟa ngyuurenyi tsingyi tsa paruo-i, cha imukumbuṟa, kui isaṟia lyilya ngyileenengo nyi Ruwa,
45015016	kundu ngiwe mṟundi o Kristo Yesu wandunyi walakyeri Wayuda. Ngyiṟundie Ndumi Ngyicha ya Ruwa iṟunda lya wukohanyi, kundu wandu walakyeri Wayuda wawe kyiano kyechiambilyio, kyikamwilyiṟo nyi Mumuyo Mweele.
45015017	Kyasia, ngyiwoṙe kyimaṙuma kyewona kyiṟumi kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu mbele ya Ruwa.
45015018	Kyipfa ngyekaria igamba kyindo Kristo alakyiwutie kui iṟunda lyako-pfo, wandu walakyeri Wayuda waiṙime iindia kui iṙeṙa ang'u kui mawuto,
45015019	kui pfinya tsa kyiṟingyishio na maṟiyisho, pfinyenyi tsa Mumuyo Mweele; mṟasa kyikawa wookyia Yerusalemu, na mṟasenyi mṟasa Ilyiriko, ngamwonguo Ndumi Ngyicha ya Kristo chandu kyiwaṟi.
45015020	Na wuṙo-se ngyechitambagana ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha, ngyilaonguo handu rina lya Kristo lyammarise igambo, ngyilachewika numba wuye ya mndu ungyi.
45015021	Indi chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Walya walandeongoyo mbonyi tsakye wechiwona, na walya walandeicho wechimanya.”
45015022	Ny'kyo kyitewe ngyileimo kyiyeri kyifoi ngyilache na konyu.
45015023	Kyaindi wulalu, cha kyipfa kulawoṙe-se kyindo kyingyishingyie ngyuura tsa kunu, lyingyi-se wookyia maka ifoi ngyilangyie icha na konyu;
45015024	kyiyeri kyoose ngyechipfunga kyaro kyeyenda Spania [ngyeecha na konyu]. Cha kyipfa ngyikusurie immbona nyoe kyaronyi kyako, na iṙoo kyaro na nyoe, mrima oko uchihiyo kyitutu kyipfa kyanyu.
45015025	Indi wulalu ngyiyenda Yerusalemu, ngyechiṟundia wandu wa Ruwa;
45015026	kyipfa kyachihiṟa wandu wa Makyedonia na Akaya wasanie kyindo kyetarama wandu wa Ruwa wai wafofo ipfo Yerusalemu.
45015027	Yee, kyachihiṟa wandu wa Makyedonia, lyingyi-se wairiko nyi wandu walya wafofo wa Yerusalemu. Cha kyipfa kokooya wandu walakyeri Wayuda waleambilyia iwuka kowo shindo sha mrima, kyawakooya wo iwatarama kui shienengo sha kyiwuyana.
45015028	Ngammarisa iṟunda-lyo na iwaenengyia kyilya kyilesanio kyipfa kyawo, ngyeiṙia konyu ngyechiyenda Spania.
45015029	Ngyiichi kye ngacha na konyu ngyemuendie mboṟa ing'anyi ya Kristo.
45015030	Kyasia-ng'u, wana wa wama wako, ngyimuterewa kyipfa kya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, na kyipfa kya ikunda lyekyeendo nyi Mumuyo, pfuṟukanenyi hamwi na inyi shiterewonyi shanyu kyipfa kyako mbele ya Ruwa.
45015031	Terewenyi kundu ngyilakapo nyi walya walaiṙikyie Yesu urukyenyi lo Uyuda, na lyingyi-se kundu iṟunda ngyiwoṙe ipfo Yerusalemu lyiiṙikyio nyi wandu wa Ruwa.
45015032	Ngyiiṙime ishika konyu kui sia, chandu Ruwa akundi, ngyiiṙime ionyonya hamwi na nyoe.
45015033	Ruwa o ufoṟo nawe na nyoe moose. Amen.
45016001	Ngyimanyisha konyu mshikyi oṙu Foibe; akyeri mṟundi siṟinyi ya Kyenkrea.
45016002	Mwambilyienyi kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, chandu kyiwaṟi wandu wa Ruwa mumwenengye orio kyindo kyoose echikunda konyu; cha kyipfa oe nataramie wandu wafoi, kawengyitarama na inyi taa.
45016003	Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Pirisikyila na Akyila, wandu wai waṟundi hamwi na inyi kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu,
45016004	wawekuṟeyeṟie maa iwoogo kyipfa kyako. Iwo ngyiwaana, maa chi inyi tikyi-pfo, indi na siṟi tsa wandu woose walakyeri Wayuda taa. Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi na siṟi ikyeri numbenyi kowo.
45016005	Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Epaineto, mkunde oko, aleambilyia Yesu kulya Asia.
45016006	Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Maria, ulya alekulyisa wukyiwa mnu kyipfa kyanyu.
45016007	Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Andironiko na Yunia, washari wako, walepfungo hamwi na inyi, wandu waichio kyiiṙi kya wasu; nawo walengyisongoya inyi iwa Wakristiano.
45016008	Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Ampilyiato, mkunde oko kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
45016009	Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Urubano, mndu aiṟunda hamwi na inyi kyiiṙi kya Kristo, na Stakyisi, mkunde oko.
45016010	Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Apele, amwiṙikyie kyiiṙi kya Kristo. Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi wandu wa kanyi ko Aristobulo.
45016011	Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Herodioni, ushari loko. Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi wandu wa kanyi ko Narikyiso, wai kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
45016012	Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Turufaina na Turufosa, wawoṙe wuragari kyiiṙi kya Mndumii. Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Perisisi, mkunde alewika wuragari mnu kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
45016013	Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Ṟufo, msambuṟe kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, na wamae akyeri nyi wama oko taa.
45016014	Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Asinkoito, Filekoni, Herime, Patiroba, Herima, na wana wa wama wakyeri hamwi nawo.
45016015	Ngyiiṟikyiṟienyi Filoloko na Yulyia, Nerea na mshikyi okye; na Olyimpa, na wandu wa Ruwa woose wakyeri hamwi nawo.
45016016	Iṟikyiṟanenyi nyoe wenyi ko wenyi chandu wandu waiṙikyie Yesu wekyeiṟikyiṟana. Siṟi tsoose tsa Kristo tsamuiṟikyiṟa.
45016017	Wana wa wama wako, ngyimuterewa ambuyenyi walya wawoṙe wuṟiingyi na mbonyi tseolotsa wengyi kui malosho galaṙuṙanyi na shilya mulekulosha. Kushowenyi nawo.
45016018	Kyipfa wandu wa mbaṟe-yo waiṟundia Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo-pfo, indi nyi ndewu tsawo wawenyi; na kui maṙeṙo ga wulembi na maṙeṙo gekuloṟa kye wawecha kundu wakundo, wailemba wandu wanyotsu.
45016019	Kyipfa wuindi wonyu wuleshika ko wandu woose. Kyasia ngyimchihiye kyipfa kyanyu, kyaindi ngyikundi nyoe muwaṙe wuṟango shindonyi shicha na iwa matondo shindonyi shiwicho.
45016020	Na Ruwa o ufoṟo nechirumatsa Satana wanda ya maṙende ganyu iwinyi. Isaṟia lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo lyikae hamwi na nyoe [Amen.]
45016021	Timoteo, mṟundi hamwi na inyi, namuiṟikyiṟa, na Lukyio, na Yason, na Sasipatiro, washari wako.
45016022	Inyi Teritio, ngyileṟeia paruo-i, ngamuiṟikyiṟa kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
45016023	Gayo, ulya alengyiambilyia na ngyikyeri kokye hamwi na Siṟi yoose taa wamuiṟikyiṟa. Erasto, moambilyia heleri tsa mṟi, na Kwarito mono-wama oṙu, wamuiṟikyiṟa. [
45016024	Isaṟia lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo lyikae hamwi na nyoe moose. Amen.]
45016025	Wulalu naṟumisho ulya echiiṙima imukarisha, iṙuana na Ndumi Ngyicha ngyileonguo kya wucha wo Yesu Kristo, kyilyingananyi na kyilya kyiwekuṟiikyie wookyia kyiyeri kyileshi kyileiṙa. Wulalu Ruwa nashukuo
45016026	na pata kui shiṟeio sha weonguo shisuku, kyikamanyika ko masanga goose chandu Ruwa o mlungana alegamba, kundu waindie Iiṙikyia.
45016027	Nyi oe Ruwa, kulawoṙe ungyi awoṙe wuṟango cha oe. Kyiṟumi nyi kyakye kui Yesu Kristo, mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
46001001	Inyi Paulo ngyikyeri msu o Yesu Kristo, chandu Ruwa akundi, ngaṟeia paruo-i na Sositene, mono-wama oṙu,
46001002	ko siṟi ya Ruwa ikyeri Korinto. Walya wawailyishe kyiiṙi kya Yesu Kristo, wawalage wawe wandu wa Ruwa, hamwi na woose wekyeterewa kui rina lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo orio handu, Mndumii owo na oṙu.
46001003	Isaṟia lyikae konyu na ufoṟo uwukyie ko Ruwa Awu oṙu, na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
46001004	Ngyiana Ruwa mfiri yoose kyipfa kyanyu, kyipfa kya isaṟia lya Ruwa muleenengo kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
46001005	Kyipfa kyiiṙi kya orio kyindo mulewa wanjama kyiiṙi kyakye, mbonyinyi tsoose, na wuṟangonyi woose.
46001006	Chandu wuṟingyishi wo Kristo wulemanyika konyu;
46001007	mṟasa mulauṟe kyienengo kyoose, mochiweṙelyia mnu kyiyeri Ruwa echishukuo Yesu Kristo;
46001008	ulya echimukarisha nyoe mṟasa mafurumionyi, kundu mfiri ulya mulawio kye mulewuta kyindo kyiwicho.
46001009	Ruwa nekyeafutsia shilya agamba, ulya alemulaga nyoe mukae handu hamwi na Mono-kye, Yesu Kristo Mndumii oṙu.
46001010	Kyasia wana wa wama wako, ngamuterewa, kui rina lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, nyoe muṙeṙe kyindo kyimwi; maa halawaṙe nduutsano, indi muwaṙe makusaṟo gamwi.
46001011	Cha kyipfa, wana wa wama wako, walya wa kanyi ko Kyiloe wangyiwia kye kuwoṙe wuṟiingyi konyu.
46001012	Kyasia, kyindo ngyigamba nyi ikyi, kye orio mndu o konyu nekyegamba, “Inyi nyi o ura lo Paulo,” na “Inyi nyi o ura lo Apolo,” na “Inyi nyi o ura lo Kyefa,” na “Inyi nyi o ura lo Kristo.”
46001013	Ngyesa Kristo nakyeri shindo shiwi? Ngyesa Paulo nalekapio msalabenyi kyipfa kyanyu? Ang'u ngyesa mulepatiso kui rina lya Paulo?
46001014	Ngyiana, kyipfa ngyilepatisa mndu konyu sile Krispo na Gayo-pfo;
46001015	mndu alachegamba kye mulepatiso kui rina lyako.
46001016	Lyingyi-se ngyilepatisa wandu wa kanyi ko Stefano. Ngoseṟa ya iwo, ngyiichi kokooya ngyilepatisa mndu oose ungyi-pfo.
46001017	Kyipfa Kristo alengyiṙuma kundu ngyipatise-pfo, indi ngyionguo Mbonyi Ngyicha; maa chi kui wuṟango wo maṙeṙo-pfo, upfu lo Kristo msalabenyi lulacheewa lo wulya.
46001018	Cha kyipfa mbonyi tsa upfu lo Yesu msalabenyi ko walya waiṙeka nyi wutondo, indi soe luikyiṟo luichi kye nyi pfinya ya Ruwa.
46001019	Cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, “Ngyechinyamaṟa wuṟango wo walya wawoṙe wuṟango, na ngyuuṟango tsa walya wawoṙe wuṟango ngyetsilega.”
46001020	Nyi kwi awoṙe wuṟango akyeri? Nyi kwi mlosha o mawawaso akyeri? Nyi kwi moende shigaluano akyeri? Ngyesa Ruwa alegaluo wuṟango wo wuyana iwa wutondo-pfoe?
46001021	Cha kyipfa wuṟangonyi wo Ruwa, wandu wa wuyana walandeiṙime imanya Ruwa kui wuṟango wokye, Ruwa nalekunda ikyiṟa waiṙikyie Ruwa kui wutondo wo mbonyi tsilya tsilosho.
46001022	Cha kyipfa Wayuda wakundi kyiṟingyishio, na Wakyiṟikyi waipfula wuṟango;
46001023	indi soe luonguo mbonyi tsa Kristo, alekapio msalabenyi. Ko Wayuda nyi kyindo kyeolotsa mndu, na ko wandu walai Wayuda nyi wutondo;
46001024	indi ko walya wekyelago Wayuda na Wakyiṟikyi, nyi Kristo, pfinya na wuṟango wo Ruwa.
46001025	Cha kyipfa wutondo wo Ruwa wuwoṙe wuṟango ngoseṟa ya wulya wo wandu, na wufofo wo Ruwa wuwoṙe pfinya ngoseṟa ya wulya wo wandu.
46001026	Kyipfa, wana wa wama wako, kumbuonyi ilago lyanyu, kye chi wafoi wawoṙe wuṟango wo kyimmbiu-pfo; chi wafoi wawoṙe pfinya-pfo; chi wafoi wawoṙe rina wawalage-pfo.
46001027	Indi Ruwa nalesambuṟa matondo ga wuyana nariise sonu wawoṙe wuṟango. Lyingyi-se Ruwa nalesambuṟa shindo shifofo sha wuyana kundu nariise sonu shilya shiwoṙe pfinya.
46001028	Lyingyi-se Ruwa nalesambuṟa shindo shifafa sha wuyana na shishimine, yee, shindo shilai pfo, kundu shilya shikyeri pfo shilakae pfo;
46001029	orio mndu oose alachekushela mbele ya Ruwa.
46001030	Indi kui oe nyoe moiṙima iwa kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu, alefeo koṙu cha wuṟango wuwukyie ko Ruwa, na wusumganyi, na wuele, na wukyiṟo;
46001031	kundu chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Ulya aikushela na nakushele kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.”
46002001	Kyasia, wana wa wama, kyiyeri ngyilecha na konyu, ngyilecha imuongoya shiṟika sha Ruwa kui maṙeṙo mecha ang'u wuṟango-pfo.
46002002	Kyipfa ngyileṙumbuo mrimenyi ngyilamanye kyindo kyoose konyu sile Yesu Kristo, na oe nalekapio msalabenyi.
46002003	Na inyi ngyiwekyeri konyu wufofonyi na wuowunyi na iṙeṙema lying'anyi.
46002004	Na mbonyi tsako na ilosha lyako lya Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa kuwei kui maṙeṙo ga wuṟango wokyekuruo ngyuuṟango tsa wandu-pfo, indi kui iloṟa kye Mumuyo o Ruwa naweiṟunda na pfinya,
46002005	kundu iiṙikyia lyanyu lyilawe wuṟangonyi wo wandu, indi pfinyenyi tsa Ruwa.
46002006	Kyaindi kuwoṙe wuṟango luwuonguoe ko walya wapfulukyie kyimrima; indi chi wuṟango wo wuyana-wu-pfo, maa wo iwo waichilyia wuyana-wu, wekyeilachika-pfo.
46002007	Indi lokyeonguo wuṟango wo Ruwa kui kyiṟika, wuṟango wulya wuwuṟikye, wulya Ruwa awekundi luuonguo wookyia mawookyionyi, kundu lung'anyiso.
46002008	Wuṟango walya wachilyie wuyana-wu walawuichi maa umwi; kyipfa kokooya wawewuichi, wawechikapia msalabenyi Mndumii o mng'ano-pfo.
46002009	Kyaindi, chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Shindo shilya riso lyilaleshiwona, maa kuṙwi kulaleshiicho (Maa iiṙa na mrimenyi ko mndu), shindo shilya Ruwa aleṟeyeṟia wamkundi.”
46002010	Kyaindi Ruwa nalushukuya soe kui Mumuyo. Kyipfa Mumuyo nekyeruwa-ruwa shoose, maa shindo sha Ruwa shikuokyie-okyie.
46002011	Cha kyipfa nyi wui kyiiṙi kya wandu aichi mbonyi tsa wandu sile mrima o mndu ukyeri kyiiṙi kyakye? Na wuṙo na mbonyi tsa Ruwa kuwoṙe atsiichi sile Mumuyo o Ruwa-pfo.
46002012	Kyaindi soe luleambilyia mrima o wuyana-pfo, indi Mumuyo awukyie ko Ruwa, kundu luiṙime imanya shilya Ruwa akusaṟie.
46002013	Na isho lushionguo, chi kui maṙeṙo gamaloshe kui wuṟango wo kyimndu-pfo, indi gamaloshe nyi Mumuyo, lochitambuluo mbonyi tsa mrimenyi kui maṙeṙo ga mrimenyi.
46002014	Kyasia mndu alakyeri o kyimrima ekyeambilyia shindo sha Mumuyo o Ruwa-pfo; cha kyipfa kokye icho nyi wutondo, maa eiṙima ishimanya-pfo, cha kyipfa shekyemanyika kui njia ya kyimrima.
46002015	Kyaindi mndu o kyimrima nekyemanya shoose, maa oe kuwoṙe mndu ekyemmanya-pfo.
46002016	Kyipfa chandu shiṟeio shiele shigambie, “Nyi wui alemanya kyindo Mndumii akundi, namloshe?” Kyaindi soe luwoṙe makusaṟo ga Kristo, kyipfa lokyekusaṟa cha Kristo.
46003001	Kyaindi, wana wa wama wako, inyi ngyileiṙima iṙeṙa na nyoe cha wandu wawoṙe mkaṟo ya kyimrima-pfo, indi cha wandu wawoṙe mkaṟo ya kyimmbiu, cha wana wanangu kyiiṙi kya Kristo.
46003002	Ngyilemuenenga maruwa, ngyilemuenenga kyelya-pfo; cha kyipfa mulekomokyiiṙima-pfo. Yee, maa wulalu mokyiiṙima-pfo,
46003003	cha kyipfa mṟasa wulalu nyoe nyi wandu wa mkaṟo ya kyimmbiu. Kyipfa kokooya konyu kuwoṙe wunyenyi na wuṟiingyi, ngyesa nyoe chi wandu wa mkaṟo ya kyimmbiu-pfoe? Lyingyi-se mokyewuta kui mbaṟe ya kyimndu?
46003004	Kyipfa kyiyeri-kyo mndu umwi ekyegamba, “Inyi nyi o ura lo Paulo,” na ungyi, “Inyi nyi o ura lo Apolo,” ngyesa nyoe chi wandu-pfoe?
46003005	Kyasia Apolo nyi wui? Na Paulo nyi wui? Nyi waṟundi walya kui wo muleiṙikyia Ruwa na orio mndu chandu Ruwa alemuenenga wuiṙimi.
46003006	Inyi ngyilewaaya, Apolo kanyosa; indi mong'anyisa nyi Ruwa.
46003007	Koikyo mowaaya chi kyindo-pfo, maa monyosa, indi Ruwa ekyeng'anyisa.
46003008	Kyasia ulya mowaaya, na ulya monyosa nyi kyindo kyimwi, kyaindi orio mndu nechiambilyia wori wokye iṙuana na wukyiwa alelya.
46003009	Kyipfa soe lukyeri waṟundi hamwi na Ruwa; nyoe nyi ṙema lya Ruwa, nyi numba ya Ruwa.
46003010	Iṙuana na isaṟia lya Ruwa ngyileenengo, inyi cha msongoru o wewika numba wawoṙe wuṟango, ngyilewika urende, na mndu ungyi naiwika numba wuye ya urende-lo. Kyaindi orio mndu naambuye chandu aiwika numba wuye ya urende-lo.
46003011	Kyipfa urende lungyi kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima iluwika, sile nyi lulya lulemmbiko, lukyeri nyi Yesu Kristo-pfo.
46003012	Kyaindi kokooya mndu awika numba wuye ya urende-lo, sahapu ang'u heleri ang'u magoe ga woguru, ang'u mashiṙi ang'u maṟa ang'u nyatsi, iṟunda lya orio mndu lyechimanyika na pata.
46003013	Kyipfa mfiri ulya o ianduyo ochiloṟa iṟunda-lyo na pata cha kyipfa lyechiloṟo moṙonyi; na moṙo ulya ochiyesha iṟunda lya orio mndu, nyi lya mbaṟe iha.
46003014	Iṟunda lya mndu alyiwikyie wuye ya urende-lo lyilanderumatso nyi moṙo, nechiambilyia wori.
46003015	Iṟunda lya mndu lyikarumatso nyi moṙo, nechiwaṙa wanda; indi oe nechikyiṟo; kyaindi nyi cha kui moṙo.
46003016	Muichi kye nyoe mowa hekalu lya Ruwa, na kye Mumuyo o Ruwa nekyekaa mrimenyi konyu?
46003017	Kokooya mndu anyamaṟa hekalu lya Ruwa, Ruwa nechinyamaṟa mndu-cho. Cha kyipfa hekalu lya Ruwa nyi lyiele, nalyo nyi nyoe.
46003018	Mndu alakulembe amonyi. Kokooya mndu awona kye nawoṙe wuṟango kyiiṙi kyanyu kunu wuyanenyi, nawe tondo, kundu naiṙime iwa mndu awoṙe wuṟango.
46003019	Kyipfa wuṟango wo wuyana-wu nyi wutondo mbele ya Ruwa. Cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, “Oe nyi oe ekyewaṙa wawoṙe wuṟango ngyeṟonyi tsawo.”
46003020	Na lyingyi-se, “Mndumii naichi makusaṟo ga wawoṙe wuṟango kye chi ga sungusinyi-pfo.”
46003021	Kyasia, mndu oose alakushelyie wandu. Cha kyipfa shoose nyi shanyu;
46003022	kye nyi Paulo, ang'u Apolo, ang'u Kyefa; ang'u wuyana, ang'u moo, ang'u upfu; ang'u shindo shilya shikyeri pfo wulalu, ang'u shilya shekoshikyeri pfo ipfo-ndu luiyenda; shoose nyi shanyu.
46003023	Na nyoe nyi wandu wa Kristo, na Kristo nyi o Ruwa.
46004001	Mndu naluwone kye lukyeri waṟundi wa Kristo, na wandu Ruwa awaenengyie iṟunda lyeonguo wuloi wokye wukuṟiikyie.
46004002	Iho-se kyindo kyikyikunde waṟundinyi wa mbaṟe-i nyi mndu naafutsie kyilya ateṟie.
46004003	Kyaindi koko inyi chi kyindo maa ale nyoe mukongyianduya-pfo, maa kui ianduya lya kyimndu, maa ngyianduya mrima oko-pfo.
46004004	Kyipfa ngyiwoṙe kyimaṙuma kyewona kye ngyiwoṙe wuwicho mrimenyi koko-pfo, kyaindi ngyiwono kye ngyiwoṙe wusumganyi kyipfa kya ikyo-pfo; indi ekyengyianduya inyi nyi Mndumii.
46004005	Kyasia nyoe mulangyianduye kye ngyimmbicho kyipfa kya kyindo kyoose kyiyeri kyilashika, mṟasa ilyi Mndumii echicha; ulya echiloṟa shilya shikuṟiikyie meemenyi, na iloṟa makusaṟo gakyeri mrimenyi; nyi lyo-ndu orio mndu echiwona kyiṟumi kyakye ko Ruwa.
46004006	Kyasia, wandu muiṙikyie Ruwa, shindo-shi ngashiwuta kui mfano o inyi na Apolo kyipfa kyanyu, kundu kye kui mfano oṙu muiṙime ikulosha shilya shishiṟeie; kundu umwi onyu alakushele kyipfa kya ichu, na imina oṙoe.
46004007	Kyipfa nyi wui echiloṟa chandu ulafananyi na ungyi? Na iyoe nuwoṙe kyikyi ulaikyiambilyia? Kyaindi kokooya nuleambilyia, nuikushelyia kyi kye uleambilyia-pfo?
46004008	Momuiguṙa, momuwona wunjama, momchilyia soe lulakyeri ho. Yee, ngyesa muweichilyia, kundu soe na soe luchilyie hamwi na nyoe!
46004009	Kyipfa ngakusaṟa kye Ruwa nalelusambuṟa soe wasu mafurumionyi, cha wandu wawaanduye wawoogo; cha kyipfa lowa kyindo kyesetsa wandu; ko malaika na wandu.
46004010	Soe luwatondo kyipfa kya Kristo, kyaindi nyoe muwoṙe wuṟango kyiiṙi kya Kristo. Soe luwafofo, kyaindi nyoe muwoṙe pfinya; nyoe muwoṙe kyiṟumi, indi soe luindio-pfo.
46004011	Maa kyiyeri kya wulalu, luwoṙo nyi njaa na nyoṙa, lukyeri kyiṟanguoe, lukapo nzina, lyingyi-se luwoṙe kanyi-pfo.
46004012	Lya wueṟa luilya wukyiwa lochiṟunda kui mawoko gaṙu luwenyi. Lukolahiyo lokyewikyia mboṟa, lukowihiṟo lokyekarishia;
46004013	lukoirio sha wongo lokyeṙeṙa kya wandu necha. Lowa cha mboshia tsa wuyana na shindo shoose shishilege mṟasa inu.
46004014	Ngyimuṟeia ishi kundu ngyimuendie wusutsu-pfo; indi imtutuma cha wana ngyiwakundi.
46004015	Cha kyipfa maa kokooya muwoṙe walosha shiku ikumi kyiiṙi kya Kristo muwoṙe waawu wafoi-pfo. Kyipfa inyi ngyilemfee kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu kui njia ya Ndumi Ngyicha.
46004016	Kyasia, ngamterewa mungyioshe inyi.
46004017	Kyipfa kya ikyo ngaṙuma Timoteo konyu, akyeri mono-ko mkunde, ekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, echimukumbuṟa njia tsako tsoose tsikyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo, chandu ngyekyelosha orio handu kyiiṙi kya orio siṟi.
46004018	Kyasia wengyi walekushela cha ilyi ngyilaicha na konyu.
46004019	Kyaindi ngyechicha iwinyi, kokooya ngaringo, na inyi ngyechimanya, chi shindo sha walya walekushela tupu-pfo, indi na pfinya tsawo.
46004020	Cha kyipfa Wumangyi wo Ruwa wokyeloṟo moonyi ya wandu kui shilya waiwuta kuta kui shilya waiṙeṙa.
46004021	Mukundi kuṙa? Ngyiche na konyu na msengye, ang'u ngyiche ikundenyi na mrimenyi o wuhoo?
46005001	Kuwoṙe mbonyi tsiṙeṙo orio handu kye konyu kuwoṙe wuṟui, wuṟui wo mbaṟe ilakyeri maa ko walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa, kye mndu nakae na mka o awuye.
46005002	Na nyoe mokyekushela, maa mokyewoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi-pfo, kye nawuto konyu ulya awuta kyindo kya mbaṟe-yo.
46005003	Cha kyipfa loi, ngyilakyeri konyu kyimmbiu, kyaindi ngyikyeri konyu kyimrima, inyi ngyimonyi ngamwanduya ulya awuta kyindo-kyo, cha ilyi ngyikyeri pfo.
46005004	Rinenyi lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu, nyoe musanzie handu hamwi na mrima oko, hamwi na wuiṙimi wo Mndumii oṙu Yesu;
46005005	iṙambika Satana mndu-cho, kundu mmbiu ulyiso wukyiwa, kundu na mrima ukyiṟo mfiri ulya Mndumii Yesu echicha.
46005006	Ikushela lyanyu chi kyindo kyicha-pfo. Muichi kye chachu kyitung'tu yekyetarang'isha itongye lyoose?
46005007	Kyasia, kusanjenyi, muwute chachu iya ya kacha, muiṙime iwa itongye lyihya, muwe cha mulawawikye chachu. Cha kyipfa Kristo, Kyiondo kyaṙu kya mṟumoe o Pasaka amṙaso.
46005008	Kyasia luwaṙe mṟumoe, chi kui chachu ya kacha-pfo, maa kui chachu ya wuwicho-pfo, indi kui shindo shilechitarang'ia, nyiwo wuilyi wo mrima na wuloi.
46005009	Ngyilemuṟeia kyiiṙi kya paruo-i, kye mulakusanze-sanze na waṟui.
46005010	Ngyigamba maa mulakusanze-sanze maa ale na waṟui wa wuyana-wu-pfo, ang'u na wawoṙe wulanga, ang'u na wasokyi, ang'u na wekyeindia mafano-pfo; kyipfa kuṙo muwaṟi iwuka wuyanenyi.
46005011	Kyaindi, chandu mbonyi tsikyeri, ngyilemuṟeia kye mulakusanze-sanze na mndu oose ekyegamba oe nyi mndu aiṙikyie Ruwa, kokooya nyi mṟui ang'u nawoṙe wulanga ang'u nekyeindia mafano ang'u nekyelahia ang'u nekyenango ang'u msokyi; mndu o mbaṟe-i mulaiṙikyie maa ilya na oe.
46005012	Kyipfa kyingyiwaṟi kuṙa ianduya walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa? Nyoe mokyeanduya walya waiṙikyie Ruwa-pfoe?
46005013	Kyaindi walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa, oe amonyi nechiwaanduya. Nyoe wutenyi ulya mmbicho kyiiṙi kyanyu.
46006001	Ngyesa kokooya kuwoṙe mndu konyu awoṙe moondu na oṙoe nekaria iṙuo moondu-cho mbele ya wandu walawasumganyi, na chi mbele ya wandu wa Ruwa-pfo?
46006002	Ang'u muichi kye wandu wa Ruwa wechianduya wandu wa wuyana? Na kokooya wandu wa wuyana wechianduyo nyi nyoe, ngyesa muwaṟi ianduya maa shindo shitutu-pfoe?
46006003	Muichi kye lochianduya maa malaika-pfoe? Na kokooya nyi wuṙo chi loiṙima ngoseṟa ianduya shindo sha iha wuyanenyi-pfoe?
46006004	Kyasia, mukyeri handu heṙeṙia moondu ya iha wuyanenyi, mokyewika walya walawoṙe kyiira siṟinyi iwa weṙumbuo moondu yanyu?
46006005	Ngyigamba kuṙo ngyiiṙime imuriisa sonu. Ngyesa nyi wuṙo, kye konyu kuwoṙe maa mndu umwi awoṙe wuṟango eiṙima iṙumbuo moondu o wana wa wamae?
46006006	Indi mokyeṙuana mengyenyi, wandu muiṙikyie Ruwa, mbele ya walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa.
46006007	Kyasia nyi wufafa wung'anyi konyu kye muṙuana mengyenyi nyoe wenyi ko wenyi. Kyipfa chi nanga iilamo-pfoe? Kyipfa chi necha isoko masaa ganyu-pfoe?
46006008	Indi kyilaṙuṙanyi na ikyo mokyeilama wandu na iwasoka masaa gawo; yee, maa wana wa wama wanyu.
46006009	Ang'u muichi kye wandu wawicho wechioṟa Wumangyi wo Ruwa-pfo? Maa mulakulembe. Waṟui wechioṟa Wumangyi wo Ruwa-pfo. Maa wekyeindia mafano, maa wekyewuta shindo shiwicho na wandu wa nguwo tsawo,
46006010	maa mbafu, maa wawoṙe wulanga, maa wekyenango, maa wekyelahia, maa wasokyi.
46006011	Na waata kyiiṙi kyanyu wawekyeri wandu wa mbaṟe-i; kyaindi mulesanjo, kyaindi muleilyisho, kyaindi muletalo kye muwasumganyi rinenyi lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo, na Mumuyonyi o Ruwa oṙu.
46006012	Ngyiwoṙe momu o wuta kyindo kyoose ngyikundi, kyaindi chi shoose shiwoṙe kyiira-pfo. Ngyiwoṙe momu o wuta kyindo kyoose, kyaindi inyi ngyechiwa mtumo o kyindo kyoose-pfo.
46006013	Shelya shiwaṟi ikaa ndewunyi, na ndewu iwaṟi iwaṙa shelya; kyaindi Ruwa nechinyamaṟa shoose shishiwi, ndewu na shelya. Kyaindi mmbiu uwaṟi iwa o wuṟui-pfo indi o iṟundia Mndumii, na nyi Mndumii ekyeembeṟa mmbiu.
46006014	Na Ruwa naleṟutsa Mndumii, na lyingyi-se nechiluṟutsa soe kui wuiṙimi wokye.
46006015	Ngyesa muichi kye mmbiu yanyu nyi shiwungo sha Kristo-pfoe? Kyasia ngyiwute shiwungo sha Kristo na ishigaluo sha iṟai? Ote!
46006016	Ang'u muichi kye ulya amlungye na iṟai nakyeri mmbiu umwi na oe? Kyipfa shiṟeio shiele shigambie, “Iwo wawi wechiwa mmbiu umwi.”
46006017	Kyaindi ulya amlungye na Mndumii nakyeri kyindo kyimwi na oe mrimenyi kokye.
46006018	Kaenyi kuleshi na wuṟui. Orio ṙeko mndu ekyewuta nyi nja ya mmbiu okye; indi ulya awuta shindo sha wuṟui nawuta kyindo kyechinyamaṟa mmbiu okye amonyi.
46006019	Ang'u muichi kye mmbiu yanyu nyi hekalu lya Mumuyo Mweele akyeri mrimenyi konyu, muleenengo nyi Ruwa-pfoe? Maa nyoe chi masaa ganyu muwenyi-pfo;
46006020	kyipfa muleguṟo kui woguru wung'anyi. Kyasia wulalu, ṟumishenyi Ruwa kui mmbiu yanyu.
46007001	Kyasia ko mbonyi tsa shindo shilya mulengyiṟeia, nyi necha mndu msoṟo alaalyikye.
46007002	Kyaindi kyipfa kya wuṟui orio mndu msoṟo nawaṙe mka okye amonyi, na orio mndu mka nawaṙe mii okye amonyi.
46007003	Mii naenengye mka okye kyilya kyimmbaṟi, na wuṙo na mka naenengye mii okye kyilya kyimmbaṟi.
46007004	Mka eiṙima igamba kye mmbiu okye nyi okye amonyi-pfo, indi mmbiu okye nyi o mii okye. Na wuṙo mii alechiiṙima igamba kye mmbiu okye nyi okye amonyi, indi mmbiu okye nyi o mka okye.
46007005	Maa mulaimane, sile kofia kyiyeri moiṙikyiana ko kyiyeri kyifuhi, kundu muwone ṙaawa lyeterewa Ruwa; mukooyane-se kyimmbiu, Satana alachemuyesha kyipfa kya iuṟa meena.
46007006	Kyaindi ngyigamba isho, iloṟa makusaṟo gako tikyi, na chi kui imuitika-pfo.
46007007	Indi kyindo ngyikundi nyi kye wandu woose wawe chandu inyi ngyikyeri. Kyaindi orio mndu nawoṙe kyienengo kyakye amonyi kyiwukyie ko Ruwa, ichu kuṙi na ichu kuṙi.
46007008	Kyaindi ngawia walya walandealyikye, na wakusu, nyi nanga wakae chandu inyi ngyikyeri.
46007009	Kyaindi kokooya walechiiṙima ikarishia, waalyikye; kyipfa nyi nanga ialyika kuta iwaṙa lango.
46007010	Kyaindi walya walemualyika, ngawawia; maa iho chi inyi-pfo indi nyi Mndumii; mka alalekane na mii okye;
46007011	kyaindi kokooya nalekana na oe, maa alaalyiko, ang'u naiṙikyiane na mii okye; lyingyi-se mii alaṙe mka okye.
46007012	Kyaindi wandu wengyi ngawawia inyi, maa chi Mndumii-pfo; kye kokooya mndu aiṙikyie Ruwa nawoṙe mka alaiṙikyie Ruwa, na mka-cho nakundi ikaa na oe, alalekane na oe.
46007013	Na mndu mka, awoṙe mii alaiṙikyie Ruwa, na mii-cho nakundi ikaa na oe, alalekane na mii okye.
46007014	Cha kyipfa mii ulya alaiṙikyie Ruwa nekyeendo na ko wandu wa Ruwa kui njia ya isanzo na mka okye, na mka alaiṙikyie Ruwa nekyewa kyiwungo kya wandu wa Ruwa kui njia ya mii okye. Kokooya kyilawekyeri kuṙo, wana wanyu wawechiwa wana wa wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa o loi; kyaindi wulalu nyi wandu wa Ruwa.
46007015	Kyaindi ulya alaiṙikyie Ruwa kakunda ilekana na ulya aiṙikyie Ruwa, kyikuwiie kuṙo. Iho mii ang'u mka aiṙikyie Ruwa neiṙima iwuta chandu akunda. Wakulekanie ko ufoṟo kyipfa Ruwa nalelulaga luwe wandu wa ufoṟo.
46007016	Cha kyipfa nomanya kuṙa, iyoe mndu mka, kokooya nochikyiṟa mii opfo? Ang'u nomanya kuṙa, iyoe mndu msoṟo, kokooya nochikyiṟa mka opfo?
46007017	Kyaindi chandu Ruwa alegawia orio mndu, na chandu Ruwa alelaga orio mndu, nawute kuṙo. Nyi wuṙo ngawia siṟi tsoose .
46007018	Ngyesa mndu mlyiwe alelago amṙino-pfoe? Alawe cha ilyi alamṙine. Mndu mlyiwe nalelago alaṙino? Kyasia alaṙino.
46007019	Iṙino chi kyindo-pfo, na iṙa iṙino chi kyindo-pfo; kying'anyi nyi iosha mawawaso ga Ruwa.
46007020	Orio mndu nakae chandu awei lyilya alelago.
46007021	Ngyesa nulelago uwe mtumo? Maa ulawone nyi kyiwicho. Kyaindi koiṙima iwa cha mndu alaichilyio nyi kyindo, wa cha mndu alamchilyie nyi kyindo.
46007022	Cha kyipfa ulya alelago kyiiṙi kya Mndumii ai cha mtumo, icho ai mtumo kyiiṙi kya Mndumii-pfo. Na wuṙo ulya alelago alai mtumo, icho nyi mtumo o Kristo.
46007023	Muleguṟo kui woguru; maa mulawe watumo wa wandu.
46007024	Wana wa wama wako, orio mndu nakae mbele ya Ruwa akyeri chandu awei lyilya alelago.
46007025	Ko mbonyi tsa walya walawaalyikye na walaalyikyie Mndumii angyiwiie kyindo kyoose-pfo, kyaindi ngyigamba kya makusaṟo gako inyi ngyimonyi, inyi ngyileenengo isaṟia lya Mndumii iwa mndu msimiri.
46007026	Kyasia, ngyiwonyi nyi necha, kyipfa kya wukyiwa wukyeri pfo, kye nyi necha mndu nakae chandu akyeri.
46007027	Ngyesa numlungye tapu na mka opfo? Maa ulakunde iletsano. Numletsane? Maa ulapfule mka.
46007028	Kyaindi kokooya oalyika onyamaṟa-pfo; maa mana o kyika kaalyiko anyamaṟa-pfo. Kyaindi wandu cha iwo mmbiu yawo yechiwalyisa wukyiwa; na inyi ngyikundi iwashingyia walalye wukyiwa.
46007029	Kyaindi, wana wa wama, ngagamba kuṙi, kyiyeri kyitsugai kyikyileshi-pfo. Kyasia wookyia wulalu walya wawoṙe waka wawe cha ilyi walawoṙe;
46007030	na walya wailyia cha ilyi walailyia; na walya waichihiyo cha ilyi walaichihiyo; na walya waiguṟa cha ilyi walawoṙe kyindo.
46007031	Na walya wekyekuwinisha na wuyana cha ilyi walaikuwinisha mnu na wuyana; kyipfa shindo sha wuyana-wu shiiṙa.
46007032	Kyaindi ngyikundi kulawaṙe shindo shemuṟaisha. Ulya alaalyikyie nekyekuwinisha na shindo sha Mndumii, nachihiṟe kuṙa Mndumii;
46007033	indi ulya aalyikyie nekyekuwinisha na shindo sha wuyana-wu, chandu echihiṟa mka okye.
46007034	Lyingyi-se mana o kyika chi kyimwi na mndu mka mwalyikye-pfo. Ulya alamwalyikye nekyekuwinisha na mbonyi tsa Mndumii, naiṙime iwa mweele kyimmbiu na kyimrima. Kyaindi ulya amwalyikye nekyekuwinisha na mbonyi tsa wuyana-wu, chandu echichihiṟa mii okye.
46007035	Ngagamba isho kundu ngyimuenengye kyiira, chi kye ngyimuoṟowie kyigowo-pfo indi kyipfa kya shilya shichihiṟie, lyingyi-se muiṙime iṟundia Ruwa kulawoṙe shindo shingyi shimkuruo nyoe.
46007036	Kyaindi mndu oose kawona kye aiiṙima ikarishia mbele ya ulya akundi imwalyika-pfo, kokooya lango tsakye tsa mmbiu tsing'anyi, na nyi wuṙo kyiwaṟi iwa, nawute chandu akundi; waalyikane, kuwoṙe wuwicho-pfo.
46007037	Kyaindi ulya alawoṙe lango, aichi ikarishia na ikuringa, kuwoṙe mndu aimwitika ialyika-pfo. Lyingyi-se kokooya mrimenyi kokye nakusaṟie ikaa na oe cha mndu akundi imwalyika, nechiwuta necha.
46007038	Kyasia aalyika ulya akundi imwalyika nawuta necha, na ulya akuringa alaalyikye nawuta necha ngoseṟa.
46007039	Mndu mka namlungye tapu na mii okye kyiyeri mii okye ai na moo; kyaindi kokooya mii okye apfa, neiṙima ialyiko na mndu oose amkundi; kyiiṙi kya Mndumii tupu.
46007040	Kyaindi nanga oe kakaa chandu akyeri. Nyi wuṙo ngyiwonyi inyi; na inyi ngakusaṟa kye inyi ngyiwoṙe Mumuyo o Ruwa.
46008001	Na mbonyi tsa shindo shaṙasio mafano, luichi kye soe loose luwoṙe wuṟango. Wuṟango wokyeende makushelo, indi ikunda lyekyekarisha iiṙikyia.
46008002	Mndu kakusaṟa kye naichi kyindo, aichi kyindo kyoose chandu kyimmbaṟi imanya-pfo.
46008003	Kyaindi mndu kakunda Ruwa, icho Ruwa namwichi.
46008004	Kyasia ko mbonyi tsa ilya shindo shaṙasio mafano; luichi kye ifano chi kyindo kunu wuyanenyi-pfo, na kye kuwoṙe Ruwa ungyi sile umwi tupu-pfo.
46008005	Cha kyipfa maa chandu kuwoṙe wekyelago waruwa, ruwewu ang'u wuyanenyi, chandu kuwoṙe waruwa wafoi na wandumii wafoi;
46008006	kyaindi koṙu soe Ruwa nyi umwi tupu, akyeri Awu, ulya shindo shoose shiwukyie kokye, na soe lokyekaa kokye. Kuwoṙe na Mndumii umwi Yesu Kristo, ulya kui oe shindo shoose shilegumbo, na soe lulegumbo kui oe.
46008007	Indi wuṟango-wu wukyeri ko wandu woose-pfo. Kyaindi wengyi kui iichiwia ifano lyilya wekyelya cha ilyi nyi kyindo kyikyiṙasie mafano, wuṟango wowo wo imanya kyicha na kyiwicho wuwufofo, na wekyefana kyimṟumoe.
46008008	Kyaindi kyelya kyekyeluṙuo mbele ya Ruwa-pfo; kyipfa lulalye losoko kyindo-pfo; maa lukolya loengyeṟio kyindo-pfo.
46008009	Kyaindi ambuyenyi wuiṙimi-wu wonyu wo iwuta kyoose mokunda wulachetewe walya wafafa wanyamaṟe.
46008010	Cha kyipfa mndu kakuwona iyoe uwoṙe wuṟango, ochilya kyelya hekalunyi lya ifano, ngyesa wuiṙimi wokye wo imanya kyicha na kyiwicho, kookoya namfofo, kyechimanyika mṟasa oe nalye shindo shishiṙasie mafano-pfoe?
46008011	Na ulya amfofo nechirumatso kui wuṟango wopfo, na oe nyi mndu Kristo alepfa kyipfa kyakye.
46008012	Koikyo mukotewe wana wa wama wanyu wakanyamaṟa, na inyamaṟa wuiṙimi wufofo wo manya kyicha na kyiwicho, monyamaṟia Kristo.
46008013	Koikyo kyelya kyikatewe mono-wama oko nanyamaṟe, loi ngyechilya nyama mṟasa mlungana-pfo, ngyilachetewe mono-wama oko nanyamaṟe.
46009001	Ngyesa inyi chi mndu alamchilyie nyi kyindo kyoose-pfoe? Inyi chi msu-pfoe? Inyi ngyilewona Yesu Mndumii oṙu-pfoe? Nyoe chi kyilyimu kya inyi iṟundia Mndumii-pfoe?
46009002	Cha kyipfa kokooya inyi ngyilakyeri msu ko wandu wengyi, nyi msu konyu nyoe; cha kyipfa nyoe muwalungye na Mndumii kyaloṟa na pata kye inyi nyi msu.
46009003	Ikyo nyikyo kyindo ngagaluo ko walya waingyiwesa.
46009004	Ngyesa luwoṙe wuiṙimi wo ilya na inyo-pfoe?
46009005	Luwoṙe wuiṙimi wo iṙuo hamwi na soe mka mkristiano, cha wasu-wo wengyi na wana wa wama wa Mndumii na Kyefa-pfoe?
46009006	Ang'u ngyesa, nyi inyi ngyimonyi na Barinaba lulawoṙe wuiṙimi wo iṟunda?
46009007	Nyi asikari uha ekyeyenda shiṙenyi kyiyeri kyoose kulawoṙe ienengo wori? Nyi wui ekyewaaya sabibu alekyelya ndunda tsa kyilya awaaya? Ang'u nyi wui ekyelyisa shima alekyenyo maruwa ga shima shilya?
46009008	Ngyesa ngyigamba isho kyipfa kya wuiṙimi wo kyimndu? Ang'u uwawaso lokyegamba isho-pfoe?
46009009	Cha kyipfa mawawasonyi ga Mose kyikyiṟeie, “Umbe ikutarama iṟunda ulaiime ilya.” Ngyesa iho Ruwa nekyeambuya mbonyi tsa umbe?
46009010	Ang'u naigamba kuṙo kyipfa kyaṙu? Yee, shileṟeio kyipfa kyaṙu; kyipfa ulya ekyeṙema nawaṟi iṙema kulawoṙe ipfiio nyi mṙoe; na ulya aihuo shindo nawaṟi ienengo ṙombo lyakye.
46009011	Kokooya soe lulemuṙongyia shindo sha kyimrima, ngyesa nyi kyindo kying'anyi lukosambuo shindo shanyu sha kyimmbiu?
46009012	Kokooya wandu wengyi wawoṙe ugawi kyiiṙi kya wuiṙimi-wu, soe chi ngoseṟa-pfoe? Indi lulekuwinisha iiṙia kyindo kyoose iwuka konyu-pfo. Lulekarishia shindo shoose lulacheshingyia Mbonyi Ngyicha tsa Yesu Kristo.
46009013	Muichi kye walya wekyeṟunda maṟunda ga hekalunyi wekyelya shindo sha hekalu, na walya wekyeṟundia shindo alyitaṟenyi wawoṙe ṙombo lyawo shindonyi sha alyitaṟe?
46009014	Na Mndumii wuṙo nagambie kye walya wekyeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha waenengo kando kawo ipfo Nduminyi Ngyicha.
46009015	Kyaindi inyi ngyilewuta shindo-sho maa kyimwi-pfo. Maa ngyiṟeia isho kundu kyiwe kuṙo koko-pfo; kyipfa nanga ngapfa kuta mndu oose igamba kye ikushela lyako chi lya sungusinyi-pfo.
46009016	Kyipfa maa kokooya ngyekyeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha, ngyiwoṙe kyindo kyeiṙima ingyienenga ikushela-pfo; kyipfa Ruwa nangyiwiie ngyiwute kuṙo. Lyingyi-se ochia loko ngyilandeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha.
46009017	Kyipfa ngaṟunda iṟunda-lyi kulawoṙe iitiko ngyiwoṙe wori; indi kokooya nyi kui iitiko, Ruwa nangyisambuṟie ngyiringye iṟunda lyakye.
46009018	Kyasia wori woko nyi kyikyi? Nyi iwu, kye kyiyeri ngyionguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa, ngyechiwuta kuṙo kulawoṙe itosa kyindo, kyaindi kui iṟunda necha na wuiṙimi woko ngyiwoṙe Nduminyi Ngyicha.
46009019	Kyipfa, maa chandu ngyilakyeri mtumo o mndu oose, ngyekyekugaluo cha ilyi ngyikyeri mtumo o wandu woose, kundu ngyigalutsie ura lo Yesu wandu wafoi ngoseṟa.
46009020	Ngyiwekyeri cha Myuda ko Wayuda, kundu ngyigalutsie Wayuda ura lo Yesu. Ko walya wakyeri wuchilyinyi wo mawawaso, ngyilewa cha ilyi ngyichilyio nyi mawawaso (maa chandu inyi ngyimonyi ngyilamchilyie nyi mawawaso), kundu ngyigalutsie ura lo Yesu walya wakyeri wuchilyinyi wo mawawaso.
46009021	Ko walya walawoṙe mawawaso ngyilewa cha ngyilawoṙe mawawaso (chi kye ngyilawoṙe mawawaso mbele ya Ruwa-pfo, indi ngyiwoṙe mawawaso mbele ya Kristo), kundu ngyigalutsie ura lo Yesu walya walawoṙe mawawaso.
46009022	Ko wafofo ngyilewa mfofo, kundu ngyigalutsie wafofo ura lo Yesu. Ngyilewa orio kyindo ko wandu woose, kundu kui njia tsoose ngyiiṙime ikyiṟa wandu.
46009023	Na inyi ngyekyewuta shindo shoose kyipfa kya Ndumi Ngyicha kundu ngyikae handu hamwi na wandu wengyi.
46009024	Ngyesa muichi kye walya wekyeṙicha, wekyekapa mteeṟa woose, kyaindi ekyeambilyia iṟikoso nyi umwi-pfoe? Kapenyi mteeṟa kuṙo kundu muenengo iṟikoso.
46009025	Na orio mndu ekyeṙicha nekyekuima shindo shifoi. Kyasia iwo wekyewuta kuṙo kundu waambilyie iṟikoso lyekyenyamaṟika; indi soe lokyeambilyia iṟikoso lyilekyenyamaṟika.
46009026	Maa inyi ngyiṙicha kuṙo, chi cha mndu alawoṙe kundu aiṙicha napfo-pfo. Ngyikapana nzina wuṙo, chi cha mndu aikapa kyindo kyilakyeri ho-pfo;
46009027	indi ngyilyisa mmbiu oko wukyiwa na iuwinisha; kyilacheewa, ngamuongoya wandu wengyi Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa, inyi ngyiwe mndu molego.
46010001	Cha kyipfa, wana wa wama, ngyikundi mulemo imanya kye waku waṙu wawekyeri woose wanda ya ipuchi; woose wakaiṙa ipalyipalyinyi.
46010002	Woose wakapatiso wawe wa Mose ipuchinyi na ipalyipalyinyi.
46010003	Woose wakalya kyelya kyilya kyilya kya mrima.
46010004	Woose wakanyo kyindo kyilya kyilya kya mrima; cha kyipfa walenyo iwuka kulya iṟaṟenyi lyilewaosha; na iṟaṟa-lyo lyiwei nyi Kristo.
46010005	Kyaindi wafoi kyiiṙi kyawo, walechihiṟa Ruwa-pfo, koikyo wakarumatso nukyenyi ngyuumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga.
46010006	Kyasia shindo-shi shiwekyeri mfano koṙu, kundu soe lulawe wandu welanga shindo shiwicho, chandu walya nawo walelanga.
46010007	Maa mulawe weindia mafano, chandu wengyi nawo wawekyeri; chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Wandu waleṙamia ilya na inyo, na numa ya iho wakagoṟoka wateme.”
46010008	Maa lulawute shindo sha wuṟui, chandu wandu wengyi wawo walewuta, wakapfa mfiri umwi wandu shiku makumi gawi na shiṟaaṟu.
46010009	Maa lulayeshe Mndumii, chandu wengyi wawo walemyesha, wakaumaṙo nyi njoka.
46010010	Maa lulanunuwe, chandu wengyi wawo walenunuwa, wakarumatso nyi malaika o upfu.
46010011	Kyasia shindo-sho shilewutika kowo kui mfano, shikaṟeio kundu shiluikyimbie soe, wa shiyeri-shi shikyeri kufuhi na mafurumionyi.
46010012	Koikyo akusaṟie kye nagoṟokyi naambuye necha alaolokye.
46010013	Nyoe muleyesho, sile kyiyesho kyilya kyekyecha na ko wandu woose-pfo. Indi Ruwa nekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia. Ruwa ulya alechimuṙa nyoe muyesho kuta wuiṙimi wonyu. Kyaindi hamwi na kyiyesho kyilya nechiwika na moongo o fumia, kundu muiṙime ikarishia.
46010014	Kyipfa kya ikyo, wakunde wako, kushowenyi na iindia mafano.
46010015	Ngyigamba kuṙo kyipfa ngyiṙeṙa na wandu waṟango. Ngyimuitika iiṙikyia ishi ngyigamba-pfo; indi kusaṟenyi nyoe muwenyi.
46010016	Kyiṙoo kyilya kya kyilaayo kyiele lokyeana Ruwa kyipfa kyakyo chi samu ya Kristo lokyeinyo handu hamwi-pfoe? Mkate ulya lokyeupeṟenguo, chi mmbiu o Kristo lokyeulya handu hamwi-pfoe?
46010017	Cha kyipfa mkate nyi umwi, soe lui wafoi lukyeri mmbiu umwi; cha kyipfa soe loose lokyeambilyia kyifunjoe kya mkate umwi.
46010018	Wonenyi Waisiraelyi-wo chandu wawekyeri mbaṟe ya mmbiu; walya wekyelya shiṙaso. Ngyesa wekyeikanana shiṙaso-pfoe?
46010019	Kyasia ngyigambe kyi? Kye kyilya kyaṙasio mafano nyi kyindo? Ang'u kye mafano nyi kyindo?
46010020	Chi wuṙo-pfo, kyaindi shindo shoose wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu wekyeṙasa wekyeshienenga waṟufui wa Satana, maa chi Ruwa-pfo; na inyi ngyikundi muṟundie masatana-pfo.
46010021	Moiṙima inyo kyindo iwuka kyiṙoonyi kya Mndumii na kyiṙoonyi kya waṟufui wa Satana-pfo.
46010022	Ang'u lokusaṟa loiṙima imina Ruwa lulechiolotsio ngapo? Ngyesa luwoṙe pfinya kuta oe?
46010023	Kuwoṙe momu o wuta kyindo kyoose, indi chi shoose shiwoṙe kyiira-pfo. Kuwoṙe momu o wuta kyindo kyoose, indi chi shoose shekyetarama siṟi-pfo.
46010024	Mndu alapfule kyiira kyakye amonyi, indi kyiira kya oṙoe.
46010025	Orio kyindo kyekyekumbo sangaṙa lyenyi kulawoṙe iwesa-wesa; maa mulaikulyisa wukyiwa mrimenyi kui ikusaṟa nyi kyiha kyii kyicha na nyi kyiha kyii kyiwicho.
46010026	Kyipfa, “Wuyana nyi isaa lya Mndumii na shoose shikyeri pfo.”
46010027	Na mndu alaiṙikyie Ruwa kakunda muyende kanyi kokye, na nyoe mukokunda iyenda, lyenyi orio kyindo moenengo kulawoṙe iwesa-awesa; maa mulaikulyisa wukyiwa mrimenyi kui ikusaṟa nyi kyiha kyii kyicha na nyi kyiha kyii kyiwicho.
46010028	Kyaindi mndu kammbia, “Kyindo-kyi kyawuto kyiwe kyiṙaso,” maa mulalye, kyipfa kya ulya ammbia na kyipfa kya makusaṟo ga mrimenyi, nyi kyiha kyii kyicha na nyi kyiha kyii kyiwicho;
46010029	chi kyipfa kyapfo-pfo indi kyipfa kya icho ungyi ammbia mbonyi-tso. Kyipfa kulya inyi iwa mndu alamchilyie nyi kyindo kulaanduyo nyi makusaṟo ga mndu kye nyi kyiha kyii kyicha na nyi kyiha kyii kyiwicho. Chi kyipfa kyapfo-pfo indi kyipfa kya ulya ungyi ammbia mbonyi-tso. Kyipfa kulya inyi iwa mndu alamchilyie nyi kyindo kuleanduyo nyi makusaṟo ga mndu kye nyi kyiha kyii kyicha na nyi kyiha kyii kyiwicho.
46010030	Kokooya inyi ngawona kyitumbuṟe kyako kya isaṟia, kyitewe ngyilahiyo ny'kyi?
46010031	Kyasia, kyiyeri muilya, ang'u muinyo, ang'u muiwuta kyindo kyoose, wutenyi kuṙo kui ienenga Ruwa kyiṟumi.
46010032	Maa mulatewe Wayuda maa Wakyiṟikyi maa siṟi ya Ruwa wawute kyindo kyiwicho.
46010033	Nyi wuṙo chandu inyi ngyekyechihiṟa wandu woose shindonyi shoose, ngyilalepfula kyiira kyako ngyimonyi, indi kyiira kya wandu wafoi, kundu wakyiṟo.
46011001	Ngyioshenyi chandu na inyi ngyekyeosha Kristo.
46011002	Kyasia ngyimuiring'isha nyoe, cha kyipfa mulengyikumbuo shindonyi shoose, na nyoe muleosha shilya muleambilyia ko waku wanyu wuṙo chandu ngyilemuenengyia shilya ngyileambilyia.
46011003	Kyaindi ngyikundi mumanye kye msongoru o mndu msoṟo nyi Kristo, na msongoru o mndu mka nyi mndu msoṟo, na msongoru o Kristo nyi Ruwa.
46011004	Orio mndu msoṟo kyiyeri aiterewa Ruwa, ang'u kyiyeri aiṙeṙa mbele ya wandu, na oe namshikyie mṙoe, nairiisa mṟoe okye sonu.
46011005	Indi orio mndu mka kyiyeri aiterewa Ruwa, ang'u kyiyeri aiṙeṙa mbele ya wandu, mṙoe okye ulamshikyie, nairiisa mṙoe okye sonu; cha kyipfa nyi kyimwi na ulya ammbute njui.
46011006	Kyipfa mndu mka alandeshikyio nawuto njui. Ang'u kokooya nyi sonu mndu mka iwuto njui tsakye ang'u iṟemo nashikyio.
46011007	Kyipfa loi mndu msoṟo awaṟi ishikyio mṙoe-pfo, kyipfa oe nyi mfano o mng'ano o Ruwa. Kyaindi mndu mka nyi mng'ano o mndu msoṟo.
46011008	Kyipfa mndu msoṟo alewuto ko mndu mka chandu mndu mka alewuto ko mndu msoṟo-pfo.
46011009	Maa mndu msoṟo alegumbo kyipfa kya mndu mka chandu mndu mka alegumbo kyipfa kya mndu msoṟo-pfo.
46011010	Kyipfa kya ikyo mndu mka nawaṟi ishikyia mṙoe okye iloṟa kye namwenengye momu o wuta shilya malaika wekyeambuya.
46011011	Kyaindi kyiiṙi kya Mndumii kuwoṙe mndu mka kulawoṙe mndu msoṟo-pfo; maa kuwoṙe mndu msoṟo kulawoṙe mndu mka-pfo.
46011012	Kyipfa chandu mndu mka alewuka ko mndu msoṟo, na wuṟo mndu msoṟo na oe nekyefeo nyi mndu mka; na shindo shoose shiwukyie ko Ruwa. Anduyenyi nyoe muwenyi mrimenyi konyu.
46011013	Ngyesa kyichihiṟie mndu mka naterewe Ruwa mṙoe okye ulamshikyie?
46011014	Ngyesa chandu mndu amugumbe kyimlosha kye mndu msoṟo kawaṙa njui tsileshi nyi sonu kokye-pfoe?
46011015	Kyaindi mndu mka kawaṙa njui tsileshi nyi kyiṟumi kokye. Cha kyipfa namwenengye njui-tso tsileshi kundu tsikae handu ha nguwo.
46011016	Kyaindi mndu oose kakunda iende wuṟiingyi, soe luwoṙe mkaṟo cha iyo-pfo, maa siṟi tsa Ruwa.
46011017	Kyaindi kyiiṙi kya immbia ishi, ngyimuiṟing'isha nyoe-pfo, kyipfa kyiyeri-kyo mokyesanzia handu hamwi mokyewuta kuṙo kyipfa kya wucha-pfo indi kyipfa kya wuwicho.
46011018	Cha kyipfa kuwooka kyiyeri mokyesanzia handu hamwi cha siṟi ngyiichuoe kye mukyeri kyindo kyimwi-pfo; na inyi ngyiiṙikyie ikyo piu-pfo;
46011019	cha kyipfa kyiwaṟi konyu kuwaṙe iṙeṙa wongo; kundu walya wawalage loi wamanyikye konyu.
46011020	Kyasia kyiyeri mosanzia handu hamwi moiṙima ilya kyilaayo kya Mndumii-pfo;
46011021	cha kyipfa orio umwi nekyesonguo iwuta kyelya kyakye kyiiṙi kya ilya-lyo; mṟasa kyikawa ichu nawoṙo nyi njaa na ichu namnanzi.
46011022	Ngyesa muwoṙe numba yelyiia kyelya kya Mndumii na yenyooya shindo shenanza-pfoe? Ang'u mumina Siṟi ya Mndumii, na iriisa sonu iwo walawoṙe kyindo? Ngyimmbie? Ngyimuiring'ishe nyoe? Ote! Ngyimuiring'isha kyipfa kya isho-pfo.
46011023	Cha kyipfa inyi ngyileambilyia ko Mndumii shilya ngyilemuenenga nyoe. Kye Mndumii Yesu kyio kyilya aleṟiingo naleira mkate,
46011024	na oe amwane Ruwa kaupeṟenguo, kagamba, “Ichu nyi mmbiu oko ummbute kyipfa kyanyu; wutenyi kuṙi kui ingyikumbuo inyi.”
46011025	Na wuṙo numa ya ilya kaira kyiṙoo, echigamba, “Kyiṙoo-kyi nyi mma mhya samunyi yako; wutenyi kuṙi orio kyiyeri muinyo, kui ingyikumbuo.”
46011026	Kyipfa orio kyiyeri muilya mkate-chu na inyo iwuka kunu kyiṙoonyi, muonguo mbonyi tsa upfu lo Mndumii mṟasa kyiyeri echicha.
46011027	Kyasia orio mndu alawaṟi alya mkate-cho, ang'u inyo iwuka ipfo kyiṙoonyi kya Mndumii, nalahia Ruwa ko mbonyi tsa upfu lo Yesu msalabenyi.
46011028	Kyaindi mndu nakuwese mrimenyi kokye kokooya mbonyi tsikyeri necha, naaho nalye mkate na inyo iwuka kyiṙoonyi.
46011029	Kyipfa alya na inyo, nekyelya na inyo ianduyo lya mrima okye, kokooya alemo imanya mmbiu o Mndumii nyi kyikyi.
46011030	Kyipfa kya ikyo kuwoṙe wandu wafoi konyu waluoe na wafafa, na waata walempfa.
46011031	Kyipfa kokooya loambuya kuwooka kyilya kyikyeri mrimenyi koṙu kuwoṙe kyindo kyeiṙima iluenenga ianduyo kyiyeri-kyo luilya Kyilaayo kya Mndumii-pfo.
46011032	Indi kyiyeri loanduyo, lotoṟisho nyi Mndumii, kundu nyashi ya Ruwa wawaṟi wandu wa wuyana ilacheluolokyia.
46011033	Koikyo, wana wa wama wako, kyiyeri mosanzia handu hamwi muiṙime ilya, muweṙane.
46011034	Mndu kawoṙo nyi njaa, nalye kanyi kokye; kundu kyiyeri-kyo mosanzia handu hamwi mulachewuta shindo shechienenga Ruwa imuolotsia ngapo yakye. Na isho shatsugaa ngyechishiachikyia kyiyeri-kyo ngyechicha.
46012001	Kyasia, wana wa wama wako, ko mbonyi tsa shisumbo sha mrimenyi, ngyikundi muṙe mulamanya-pfo.
46012002	Muichi kye kyiyeri muwei wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu, muwekyeosha mafano galekyeṙeṙa, chandu muwekyesongoyo nyi makusaṟo ganyu.
46012003	Koikyo ngammbia kye kuwoṙe mndu ekyeṙeṙa Mumuyonyi o Ruwa igamba, “Yesu namsese,” maa mndu eiṙima igamba, “Yesu nyi Mndumii,” sile Mumuyonyi Mweele-pfo.
46012004	Kyasia kuwoṙe mbaṟe tsifoi tsa shisumbo indi Mumuyo nyi ulya ulya.
46012005	Lyingyi-se kuwoṙe mbaṟe tsifoi tsa maṟunda, na Mndumii nyi ulya ulya.
46012006	Naaho-ng'u kuwoṙe mbaṟe tsifoi tseṟunda, indi Ruwa nyi ulya ulya ekyeṟunda maṟunda goose kyiiṙi kya woose.
46012007	Kyaindi orio mndu nekyeenengo nyi Ruwa imanya kye Mumuyo nakyeri ho, kui ienengana kyiira.
46012008	Kyipfa mndu umwi kui Mumuyo namwenengye wunyotsu; na ungyi iṙeṙa kui wuṟango chandu Mumuyo ulya ulya akundi.
46012009	Ungyi iiṙikyia Mumuyonyi ulya ulya; na ungyi shisumbo shekyiṟa waluoe Mumuyonyi ulya umwi.
46012010	Na ungyi mawuto ya maṟiyisho; na ungyi ionguo shisuku na ungyi wuiṙimi wo manya nyi shisumbo shiha shiwukyie ko Mumuyo na nyi shiha shilawukyie ko Mumuyo; ungyi mbaṟe tsa mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi; na ungyi itambaluo mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi.
46012011	Kyaindi maṟunda-ga goose gekyeṟundo nyi Mumuyo-cho umwi, ulya ekyegawia orio mndu chandu akundi oe.
46012012	Chandu mmbiu ukyeri umwi, nacho uwoṙe shiwungo shifoi, na shiwungo shoose sha mmbiu-cho, maa chandu shifoi, nyi mmbiu umwi, nyi wuṙo na Kristo.
46012013	Cha Kyipfa Mumuyonyi umwi soe loose lulepatiso iwa mmbiu umwi. Kye lui Wayuda, ang'u kye lui Wakyiṟikyi; kokooya lui watumo ang'u wandu lulawachilyie nyi mndu; na soe loose luleletsio Mumuyo umwi.
46012014	Cha kyipfa mmbiu chi kyiwungo kyimwi-pfo, indi nyi shifoi.
46012015	Kuṙende kukogamba, “Kyipfa inyi ngyilai kuwoko, inyi chi o mmbiu-pfo;” ngyesa kuṙende-ko koṙa iwa kyiwungo kya mmbiu kyipfa kya ikyo-ng'ue?
46012016	Na kuṙwi kukogamba, “Kyipfa inyi ngyilai riso, inyi chi o mmbiu-pfo;” ngyesa kuṙwi-ko koṙa iwa kyiwungo kya mmbiu kyipfa kya ikyo-ng'ue?
46012017	Kokooya mmbiu oose owa riso, ny'kyikyi kyeaṙanyia? Kokooya mmbiu oose owa kuṙwi ny'kyikyi kyepfaamiṟa?
46012018	Indi Ruwa nawikyie shiwungo orio kyimwi mmbiunyi chandu alekunda.
46012019	Kyaindi kokooya shiwungo shoose shiwei kyiwungo kyimwi, mmbiu uwekaa kwi?
46012020	Kyaindi wulalu shiwungo nyi shifoi, indi mmbiu nyi umwi.
46012021	Na riso lyeiṙima iwia kuwoko, “Ungyiwoṙie kyiiṙa-pfo;” maa lyingyi-se mṙoe oiṙima iwia maṙende, “Mungyiwoṙie kyiira-pfo.”
46012022	Indi ngoseṟa mnu shiwungo shilya sha mmbiu shekyekusaṟo kye shishifofo mnu shiwoṙe kyiira ngoseṟa.
46012023	Na shiwungo shilya sha mmbiu shekyekusaṟo kye nyi sha wusutsu, shiwungo-sho lokyeshienenga mng'ano ngoseṟa; na shiwungo shaṙu shilawoṙe wucha nyi shiwoṙe wucha ngoseṟa mnu.
46012024	Cha kyipfa shiwungo shaṙu shiwoṙe wucha shiwoṙe kyiira-pfo; indi Ruwa nagumbie mmbiu, na ienenga mng'ano ngoseṟa kyiwungo kyilakyicha,
46012025	kundu mmbiu ulaṙe iwa kyindo kyimwi, indi shiwungo shitaramane, orio kyiwungo na oṙoe.
46012026	Na kyiwungo kyimwi kyikawawio, shiwungo shoose shekyewawio hamwi nakyo; na kyiwungo kyimwi kyikang'anyiso, shiwungo shoose shekyechihiyo hamwi nakyo.
46012027	Kyasia nyoe mowa mmbiu o Kristo, na shiwungo orio kyimwi handu hakyo.
46012028	Na Ruwa nawikyie wengyi Siṟinyi, wa kuwooka wasu, wa kawi weonguo shisuku, wa kaṟaaṟu walosha; numa ya iho shindo sheṟiyisha, shisumbo sha ikyiṟa waluoe, na itaramana, na wusongoru, na mbaṟe tsa iṙeṙa mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi.
46012029	Ngyesa woose nyi wasu? Woose nyi weonguo shisuku? Woose nyi walosha? Woose wekyewuta shindo sheṟiyisha?
46012030	Woose wawoṙe shisumbo shekyiṟa waluoe? Woose wekyeṙeṙa mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi? Woose wekyetambuluo mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi?
46012031	Kundenyi mnu mrimenyi konyu iwona shisumbo shicha kuta isho. Maa kuṙo ngyimuloṟa nyoe njia ngyicha.
46013001	Ngaṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie ya wandu na ya malaika, kokooya ngyilawoṙe ikunda, ngawa cha menya iwuta ṟui na mmanga uiṙeṙa.
46013002	Lyingyi-se ngaiṙima ionguo shisuku na imanya shiṟika shoose na wuṟango woose; ngawaṙa iiṙikyia lying'anyi ngaiṙima maa isamiṟa fumvu, kokooya ngyilawoṙe ikunda, inyi chi kyindo-pfo.
46013003	Lyingyi-se ngawuta masaa gako goose iigutsa wakyiwa; lyingyi-se ngaenengyia mmbiu oko ukoṟo nyi moṙo, kokooya ngyilawoṙe ikunda, ngyeiria ho kyindo-pfo.
46013004	Ikunda lyekyekarishia, lyekyesaṟia. Ikunda lyiwoṙe wunyeng'i-pfo. Ikunda lyekyekutuuta maa lyekyekushela-pfo.
46013005	Lyekyeṙa iwaṙa wupfereri-pfo; lyekyepfula shindo shalyo lyimonyi-pfo; lyiwoṙe isuo-pfo; lyekyetala mawicho-pfo.
46013006	Lyekyechihiyo kyipfa kya wuwicho-pfo, indi lyekyechihiyo hamwi na wuloi.
46013007	Lyekyekarishia shoose; lyekyeiṙikyia shoose; lyiwoṙe ikusuria; lyekyekarishia shoose.
46013008	Ikunda lyekyekaa mlungana; indi kuwoṙe ionguo shisuku ionguo-lyo lyechiiṙa. Kukowaṙa iṙeṙa mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi mṙeṙie-yo yechisia. Kukowaṙa ngyuuṟango, tsechisia.
46013009	Cha kyipfa lokyemanya mbashu-mbashu; na lokyeonguo shisuku mbashu-mbashu;
46013010	kyaindi kyiyeri-kyo kyilya kyilakyeri mti kyechicha, kyilya kyii mbashu-mbashu kyechisia.
46013011	Kyiyeri ngyiwei mana mnangu, ngyileṙeṙa cha mana mnangu, ngyilemanya cha mana mnangu, ngyilekusaṟa cha mana mnangu. Wookyia kyiyeri ngyilewa mndu apfulukyie, ngyileṙa shindo shilya sha wututu.
46013012	Kyipfa kyiyeri kya wulalu luwonyi kui kyiyewo cha maushe-ushe. Kyiyeri kyilya lochiwona ushangu kui ushangu. Kyiyeri kya wulalu ngyiichi mbashu-mbashu. Kyiyeri kyilya ngyechimanya mnu chandu inyi ngyiichio mnu.
46013013	Kyasia, wulalu hatsugaa iiṙikyia, ikusuria na ikunda; ishi shiṟaaṟu, na kyiiṙi kya isho kying'anyi kuta shoose nyi ikunda.
46014001	Pfulenyi ikunda, na ikunda mnu iwona shisumbo sha mrimenyi, kyaindi ngoseṟa muiṙime ienengo kyisumbo kyeonguo shisuku.
46014002	Cha kyipfa ulya ekyeṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi, ekyeṙeṙa na wandu-pfo, indi nekyeṙeṙa na Ruwa. Kyipfa kuwoṙe ekyemanya-pfo; kyaindi naṙeṙa mbonyi tsa shiṟika mrimenyi kokye.
46014003	Indi ulya ekyeonguo shisuku, naṙeṙa na wandu mbonyi tsewatarama, na iwawiyiṟia moo, na iwakarisha.
46014004	Ulya ekyeṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi nekyekarisha iiṙikyia lyakye amonyi; indi ekyeonguo shisuku nekyetarama siṟi.
46014005	Na inyi ngyikundi nyoe moose muṙeṙe kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi, kyaindi ngoseṟa muiṙime ionguo shisuku; kyipfa ulya ekyeonguo shisuku nang'anyi kuta ulya ekyeṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi, sile kokooya nekyetambuluo, kundu siṟi iiṙime itaramika.
46014006	Indi wulalu, wana wa wama, ngacha na konyu na iṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi, ngyemtarama kyi, sile kokooya ngyiṙeṙa na nyoe kui njia ya itambuluo, ang'u kui njia ya wuṟango, ang'u kui njia ya ionguo shisuku, ang'u kui njia ya malosho?
46014007	Maa shindo shilawoṙe moo kyiyeri shekyewuta ṟui, kokooya nyi mtoṟiṟo, kokooya nyi kyinubi, shikawuta maṟui gafananyi kyemanyika kuṙa kyiimbo kyiimbo kui mtoṟiṟo ang'u kui kyinubi?
46014008	Cha kyipfa iraa lyikawuta ṟui lyilamanyikyie, nyi wui echikuloṟa kye nakuṟeyeṟie ikapana shiṙa?
46014009	Na wuṙo nyoe, mulandeṙeṙe kyindo kyilawoṙe wuṟikyi, kyindo-kyo kyiṙeṙa kyemanyika kuṙa? Kyipfa mowa muiṙeṙa wulya tupu.
46014010	Loi kuwoṙe maṟui ga mbaṟe tsifoi wuyanenyi, maa kuwoṙe maa lyimwi lyilawoṙe kyindo lyikundi igamba-pfo.
46014011	Kyasia ngyilandemanye kyindo ṟui lyilya lyigamba ngyewa cha tondo ko ulya aiṙeṙa; na ulya aiṙeṙa newa tondo koko.
46014012	Nyi wuṙo na nyoe, kyipfa mulangyie mnu iwa wandu wawoṙe shisumbo sha mrima, kundenyi kye muengyeṟe mnu iwaṙa shisumbo-sho kundu siṟi itaramikye.
46014013	Kyipfa kya ikyo ulya ekyeṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi naterewe ienengo wuiṙimi wo itambuluo.
46014014	Kyipfa ngaterewa Ruwa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi, mrima oko okyeterewa, kyaindi wuṟango woko wuwoṙe ndunda-pfo.
46014015	Kyasia kyawa-ng'u kuṙa? Ngyechiterewa kui mrima, lyingyi-se ngyeterewa kui wuṟango taa. Ngyechiimba kui mrima, lyingyi-se ngyechiimba kui wuṟango taa.
46014016	Cha kyipfa iyoe kowikyia mboṟa kui mrima, ulya aṙamie handu ha tondo nechiiṙikyia kuṙa, “Amen,” numa ya iana lyapfo, alaichi isho ugamba?
46014017	Kyipfa nyi loi, iyoe nuana necha, indi ulya ungyi aitaramika-pfo.
46014018	Ngyiana Ruwa kye ngyiṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi kuta nyoe moose.
46014019	Kyaindi siṟinyi ngyikundi iṙeṙa maṙeṙo gataanu kui wuṟango woko, ngyiiṙime ilosha wengyi, ngoseṟa ya iṙeṙa maṙeṙo shiku ikumi kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi.
46014020	Wana wa wama wako, wuṟango wonyu wulawe cha wo wana watutu; kyaindi ko mbonyi tsa wuwicho wenyi cha wana wanangu, indi wuṟango wonyu wuwe cha wo wandu wapfulukyie.
46014021	Kyikyiṟeie uwawasonyi, “Ngyechiṙeṙa na wandu-wa kui wandu wa mṙeṙie ingyi, na kui maṙumbu ga wayenu, maa kuṙo wechingyiaṙanyia-pfo, Ruwa nagamba.”
46014022	Kyasia, mṙeṙie-i nyi kyiṟingyishio, chi ko walya waiṙikyie-pfo, indi ko walya walaiṙikyie. Kyaindi ionguo shisuku chi kyipfa kya walya walaiṙikyie-pfo, indi kyipfa kya walya waiṙikyie.
46014023	Kokooya siṟi yoose isanzie handu hamwi, na wandu woose waṙeṙe kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi naaho kukocha wandu walaiṙikyie na matondo, ngyesa wechigamba kye muwasuko-pfoe?
46014024	Kyaindi woose wakaonguo shisuku, na mndu alaiṙikyie, ang'u mtondo kacha, kyilya kyigambo kyechimloṟa wunyamaṟi wokye, na nechianduyo nyi walya aichuoe weonguo shisuku.
46014025	Shiṟika sha mrima okye shechimanyika; na kuṙo nechiterewa na iana Ruwa, echioloka na ndewu, na igamba kye Ruwa nakyeri konyu loi.
46014026	Kyasia, wana wa wama, kyawa kuṙa? Kyiyeri-kyo mosanzia handu hamwi, orio umwi nawoṙe Kyiimbo, nawoṙe malosho, nawoṙe kyindo Ruwa amshukuya, nawoṙe mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi, nawoṙe itambuluo mṙeṙie iya wandu walaiichi. Shindo shoose shiwutikye kui kyimaṙuma kya ikarisha iiṙikyia.
46014027	Kokooya mndu aiṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi, waṙeṙe wandu wawi ang'u waṟaaṟu, chi ngoseṟa ya iho-pfo. Lyingyi-se orio mndu naṙeṙe kyiyeri kyakye, na umwi natambuluo.
46014028	Kyaindi kokooya kulawoṙe motambuluo, mndu natsie alaṙeṙe siṟinyi, naṙeṙe na mrima okye; lyingyi-se na Ruwa.
46014029	Na weonguo shisuku waṙeṙe wawi, ang'u waṟaaṟu, na wengyi watambuluo.
46014030	Kyaindi ungyi aṙamie kashukuyo kyindo, ulya o kuwooka natsie.
46014031	Cha kyipfa nyoe moose moiṙima ionguo shisuku umwi umwi, kundu woose waiṙime ikulosha, na woose wawiyiṟio moo.
46014032	Na mumuyo ya weonguo shisuku yekyeindia weonguo shisuku.
46014033	Cha kyipfa Ruwa chi Ruwa o kyituṟu na ngapano-pfo indi o ufoṟo; wuṙo chandu kyiwaṟi iwa siṟinyi tsa wandu wa Ruwa.
46014034	Waka watsie siṟinyi; kyipfa wawoṙe momu o ṙeṙa-pfo; indi waindie, chandu uwawaso logamba.
46014035	Nawo wakakunda ikulosha kyindo kyoose, wawese wamii wawo kanyi kowo; kyipfa nyi sonu mndu mka iṙeṙa siṟinyi.
46014036	Ang'u, ngyesa Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyilewuka konyu ang'u icha na konyu nyoe muwenyi?
46014037	Mndu kakuwona kye oe nyi moonguo shisuku ang'u mndu o kyimrima, namanye isho ngamuṟeia, kye nyi mawawaso ga Mndumii.
46014038	Kyaindi mndu kawa tondo, na nawe tondo.
46014039	Kyipfa kya ikyo, wana wa wama, kundenyi mnu ienengo ionguo shisuku, maa mulashingyie iṙeṙa kui mṙeṙie wandu walaiichi.
46014040	Kyaindi shindo shoose shiwutikye kui wucha na kui wuyendelyi.
46015001	Kyasia, wana wa wama wako, ngamukumbuṟa mbonyi tsa Ndumi Ngyicha ngyilemuongoya; iya muleiambilyia, na kyiiṙi kyayo mugoṟokyi;
46015002	na kui yo muikyiṟo; kokooya muiosha mbonyi tsilya ngyilemuongoya; sile kokooya muleiṙikyia kya wulya.
46015003	Cha kyipfa ngyilemuenenga iho mawookyionyi shilya ngyileambilyia inyi ngyimonyi, kye Kristo nalepfa kyipfa kya ngyuunyamaṟi tsaṙu, chandu shiṟeio shiele shagamba.
46015004	Na kye naleṟiko; na kye naleṟuka mfiri o kaṟaaṟu, chandu shiṟeio shiele shagamba.
46015005	Na kye nalewonekyia Kyefa; lyingyi-se na walya ikumi na wawi.
46015006	Numa ya iho nalewonekyia wandu wekyeosha Yesu ngoseṟa ya magana gataanu; na kyiiṙi kya iwo wafoi wai na moo mṟasa wulalu; indi waata walempfa.
46015007	Numa ya iho kachia Yakobo; lyingyi-se na wasu woose.
46015008	Na mafurumionyi ga wandu woose nalengyichia inyi, cha mndu alefeo kyilakyeri kyiyeri kyakye.
46015009	Kyipfa inyi ngyimtutu kuta wasu woose, ngyilawaṟi ilago msu, cha kyipfa ngyilelyisa Siṟi ya Ruwa wukyiwa.
46015010	Kyaindi kui isaṟia lya Ruwa ngawa kuṙi chandu ngyikyeri; na isaṟia lyikyeri koko chi wulya-pfo, indi ngyileengyeṟa mnu iṟunda kuta wo woose; maa chi inyi-pfo, indi nyi isaṟia lya Ruwa hamwi na inyi.
46015011	Kyasia, kokooya nyi inyi, kokooya nyi walya, nyi wuṙo lokyeonguo mbonyi, na nyi wuṙo muleiṙikyia.
46015012	Kyasia, kokooya mbonyi tsa Kristo tsigambo kye naleṟuka ko wapfu, ny'kyilyi wandu waata kyiiṙi kyanyu waigamba kye kuwoṙe iṟutso lya wapfu-pfo.
46015013	Kyaindi kokooya kulawoṙe iṟutso lya wapfu, Kristo na oe aleṟuka-pfo.
46015014	Lyingyi-se kokooya Kristo alaleṟuka, kyasia ionguo mbonyi lyaṙu nyi wulya na iiṙikyia lyanyu nyi wulya.
46015015	Yee, na soe lowa cha waṟingyishi wa wongo wa Ruwa; cha kyipfa luleṟingyishia kye Ruwa naleṟutsa Kristo, ulya alalemṟutsa, kokooya wapfu walekyeṟutso.
46015016	Kyipfa kokooya wapfu walekyeṟutso, Kristo na oe aleṟuka-pfo.
46015017	Na kokooya Kristo alaleṟuka, iiṙikyia lyanyu nyi lya wulya; muwekyeri ngyuunyamaṟinyi tsanyu.
46015018	Na iho walya walepfa waiṙikyie Kristo waleṙeka.
46015019	Kokooya nyi kyiiṙi kya moo-chu tikyi lulekusuria Kristo, soe nyi wakyiwa kuta wandu woose.
46015020	Kyaindi wulalu Kristo naṟuka ko wapfu, iloṟa na pata kye na wuṙo Ruwa echiṟutsa walya wapfiie.
46015021	Kyipfa kokooya upfu luleendo nyi mndu, na wuṙo iṟutso lya wapfu lyileendo nyi mndu.
46015022	Cha kyipfa kyiiṙi kya Adamu woose wekyepfa, na wuṙo kyiiṙi kya Kristo woose wechienengo moo.
46015023	Kyaindi orio umwi handu hakye; o kuwooka iṟuka ko wapfu nyi Kristo; numa walya wakyeri wa Kristo, kyiyeri echicha.
46015024	Iho nyiho mafurumionyi, kyiyeri echienenga Ruwa Awu Wumangyi wokye; kyiyeri echiwinga pfinya tsa mumuyo yekyechilyia wuyana.
46015025	Cha kyipfa kyiwaṟi nachilyie oe, mṟasa nawingye washituwa woose.
46015026	Mokyituwa o mafurumionyi echiwingo nyi upfu.
46015027	Chandu shiṟeio shiele shagamba, “Nalewika shindo shoose wanda ya wuchilyi wokye.” Kyaindi kyiyeri echigamba, “Shindo shoose shawingo,” nyi kyindo kyii na pata kye ulya alemmbingyia shindo shoose akyeri ho-pfo.
46015028	Kyasia, shindo shoose shikammbingo na iwiko wanda yakye, nyi lyo-ndu Mana o Adamu amonyi na oe echiwiko wanda ya ulya alewika shindo shoose wanda yakye, kundu Ruwa nawe shoose kyiiṙi kya shoose.
46015029	Ang'u ngyesa walya wekyepatiso kyipfa kya wapfu wewika kuṙa? Kokooya wapfu walekyeṟutso maa ale, kyitewe kyepatiso kyipfa kyawo nyi kyikyi?
46015030	Na soe kyitewe lukyeri ngataṟenyi orio saa ny'kyi?
46015031	Yee, wana wa wama, ikushela-lyi lyako ngyikyeri nalyo kyipfa kyanyu kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu Mndumii oṙu, ngyekyepfa orio mfiri.
46015032	Kokooya, kui mboṟa ya kyimndu, kulya Efeso ngyilekapana na wandu wawicho cha mando ga saka, ngyiwoṙe kyiiṙa kyiha? Wapfu walandeṟutso, lulye na inyo, kyipfa ngama lochipfa.
46015033	Maa mulalembo nyi wandu. Wandu wawicho wekyenyamaṟa mkaṟo mcha.
46015034	Ambuyenyi necha; maa mulawute kya wunyamaṟi; cha kyipfa wengyi waichi Ruwa-pfo. Ngyigamba isho kundu ngyimuriise sonu.
46015035	Kyaindi kofia mndu negamba, “Wapfu wekyeṟutso kuṙa? Nawo wekyecha na mmbiu uha?”
46015036	Iyoe tondo! Kyilya okyeṙonga kyekyewaṙa moo kyilandepfe-pfo.
46015037	Na kyilya okyekyiṙonga, okyeṙonga mmbiu ulya uicha-pfo, indi nokyeṟonga mbeu tikyi, kokooya nyi ya nganu ang'u ingyi;
46015038	kyaindi Ruwa nekyeienenga mmbiu chandu akundi, na orio mbeu mmbiu oyo.
46015039	Mmbiu yoose chi mmbiu umwi-pfo; indi mmbiu ingyi nyi ya wandu, ingyi nyi ya mando ga saka, ingyi nyi ya shileye, ingyi ya makunga.
46015040	Lyingyi-se kuwoṙe mmbiu ya ruwewu, na mmbiu ya wuyanenyi; kyaindi mng'ano o iya ya ruwewu wufananyi na mng'ano o iya ya wuyanenyi-pfo.
46015041	Kuwoṙe mng'ano o mnengyeṟi, na mng'ano o mori, na mng'ano ungyi o nyenyeri; kyipfa mng'ano o nyenyeri imwi na ingyi ufananyi-pfo.
46015042	Na wuṙo na iṟutso lya wapfu. Kyekyeṙongo kyinyamaṟikyie, kyekyeṟutso kyilanyamaṟikyie.
46015043	Kyekyeṙongo sonunyi, kyekyeṟutso mng'anonyi. Kyekyeṙongo wufafenyi, kyekyeṟutso pfinyenyi.
46015044	Kyekyeṙongo mmbiu o teri, kyekyeṟutso mmbiu o mumuyo. Kokooya kuwoṙe mmbiu o teri, na o mumuyo taa ukyeri pfo.
46015045	Nyi wuṙo kyikyiṟeie, “Mndu o kuwooka, Adamu, nalewa kyindo kyiwoṙe moo, Adamu o mafurumionyi nyi mumuyo okyeende moo.”
46015046	Kyaindi okyesongoya ulya o mumuyo-pfo, indi ulya o teri; numa ya iho okyecha ulya o mumuyo.
46015047	Mndu o kuwooka nalewuka urukyenyi, nyi o teri. Mndu o kawi nalewuka ruwewu.
46015048	Chandu akyeri ulya o teri, nyi wuṙo wakyeri walya wa teri; na chandu akyeri ulya o ruwewu, nyi wuṙo wakyeri walya wa ruwewu.
46015049	Na chandu luleṙuo fana yakye ulya o teri, na wuṙo lochiṙuo fana yakye ulya akyeri o ruwewu.
46015050	Wana wa wama wako, shindo ngyigamba nyi ishi, kye mmbiu na samu sheiṙima ioṟa Wumangyi wo Ruwa-pfo. Maa kyindo kyinyamaṟikyie ioṟa kyindo kyilanyamaṟikyie-pfo.
46015051	Ngammbia kui kyiṟika; lochipfa loose-pfo, kyaindi loose lochiilachika,
46015052	na cha mndu akyema, kyiyeri kya iraa lya mafurumionyi; kyipfa iganda lyechikapo, na wapfu wechiṟutso, walanyamaṟikye, na soe lochiilachika.
46015053	Kyipfa kyiwaṟi mmbiu-chu okyenyamaṟika ulanyamaṟikye, na ichu okyepfa ulapfe.
46015054	Kyasia kyiyeri mmbiu-chu okyenyamaṟika ulechinyamaṟika, na mmbiu-chu okyepfa ulechipfa, nyi lyo-ndu kyeafukyia kyindo kyilya kyikyiṟeie, “Upfu lulemeṟo kui iwinga.
46015055	Iwinga lyapfo nyi kwi lyikyeri iyoe upfu? Iwawio lyapfo nyi kwi lyikyeri, iyoe upfu?
46015056	Iwawio lya upfu nyi wunyamaṟi, na pfinya ya wunyamaṟi nyi uwawaso.”
46015057	Kyaindi Ruwa naano, ekyeluenenga iwinga kui Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
46015058	Kyasia, wana wa wama wakunde, kuwanzenyi, mulalolome, muengyeṟe mnu iṟundia Mndumii mfiri yoose, cha kyipfa muichi kye iṟunda lyanyu chi wulya kyiiṙi kya Mndumii-pfo.
46016001	Ko mbonyi tsa isania heleri tsetarama wandu wa Ruwa walya waiṙikyie Yesu, chandu ngyilewia siṟi tsa Galatia, na nyoe wutenyi kuṙo.
46016002	Orio mfiri o Ruwa orio mndu konyu nakoome kyiseyesoe, iṙuana na chandu awona; kundu heleri-tso tsilasanio kyiyeri ngyechicha.
46016003	Na inyi ilyi ngyeafukyia ngyeṙuma walya mochiwasambuṟa waṙuṙe paruo, waṙuo Yerusalemu heleri tsilya mosania.
46016004	Na kyikachia na inyi ngyiyende, wechiyenda na inyi.
46016005	Kyaindi ngyechicha na konyu, ngamuiṙia uruka lo Makyedonia; kyipfa ngyiiṙia Makyedonia.
46016006	Kofia ngyechikaa konyu. Yee, kofia kyiyeri kyoose kya mbeho, muiṙime ingyiṙuo kundu koose ngyechiyenda.
46016007	Kyipfa ngyikundi iwonana na nyoe wulalu-pfo, nyi ikuiṙia tupu, cha kyipfa ngyikusaṟie ikaa konyu kyiyeri kyitutu, Mndumii kangyienenga wuiṙimi wo wuta kuṙo.
46016008	Kyaindi ngyechikaa Efeso mṟasa kyiyeri kya Pentekoste;
46016009	cha kyipfa ngaenengo ṙaawa lying'anyi na lyicha mnu, na kuwoṙe wengyi waiwingana na inyi.
46016010	Kyaindi Timoteo kacha, nakae konyu kulawoṙe wuowu; kyipfa naiṟundia Mndumii cha inyi ngyimonyi.
46016011	Kyasia mndu oose alammine, kyaindi muimienyi kui ufoṟo, kundu nache na koko; kyipfa ngyimmbeṙelyia nawuye hamwi na wana wa wama waṙu.
46016012	Kyaindi ko mbonyi tsa Apolo, mono-wama oṙu, ngyilemterewa mnu nayende konyu hamwi na wana wa wama-wo waṙu; ulya kyilakyeri makusaṟo gakye iyenda wulalu; indi nechicha ilyi ewona ṙaawa.
46016013	Laenyi kyiṙombo, mulalolome Iiṙikyienyi, waṙenyi wukari wo kyisoṟo; muwaṙe wuṟango.
46016014	Shindo shanyu shoose shiwutikye ikundenyi.
46016015	Lyingyi-se, wana wa wama, ngamterewa; (muichi wandu wa kanyi ko Stefana kye nyi wandu wa kuwooka kulya Akaya walegalutso wakaiṙikyia Yesu. Wandu-wa wakuwikyie nakamwi iṟundenyi lyetarama wandu wa Ruwa.)
46016016	Indienyi wandu cha iwo, na orio mndu ekyeṟunda na ikulyisa wukyiwa hamwi nawo.
46016017	Na inyi ngachihiyo kyipfa kya icha lya Stefana na Foritunato na Akaiko; kyipfa iwa walengyienenga kui mrima shilya mulalengyienenga.
46016018	Kyipfa walechihiṟa mrima oko, na mrima yanyu taa; kyasia manyenyi mnu wandu cha iwo.
46016019	Siṟi tsa Asia tsamuiṟikyiṟa. Akyila na Pirisikyila wamuiṟikyiṟa mnu kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, hamwi na siṟi ikyeri kanyi kowo.
46016020	Wana wa wamanyu wekyeosha Yesu iha wamuiṟikyiṟa. Iṟikyiṟanenyi chandu walya waiṙikyie Yesu wekyeiṟikyiṟana.
46016021	Ikyi nyi kyiiṟikyiṟo kyako Paulo ngaṟeia ngyimonyi.
46016022	Mndu oose alakundi Mndumii nawe namsese. Maranata (kyimwi na igamba Mndumii oṙu naicha.)
46016023	Isaṟia lya Mndumii Yesu lyiwe na nyoe.
46016024	Ikunda lyako lyiwe hamwi na nyoe moose kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
47001001	Inyi Paulo, ngyikyeri msu o Kristo Yesu chandu Ruwa akundi, na Timoteo mono-wama oṙu; ngaṟeia paruo-i ko siṟi ya Ruwa ikyeri Korinto, hamwi na wandu wa Ruwa woose wakyeri urukyenyi loose lo Akaya.
47001002	Isaṟia lyikae konyu na ufoṟo, shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu oṙu na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
47001003	Ruwa naṟumisho, Awu o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, Awu o isaṟia, Ruwa o iwiyiṟia moo lyoose;
47001004	ekyeluwiyiṟia moo ngyuukyiwenyi tsaṙu tsoose kundu na soe luiṙime iwawiyiṟia moo walya wakyeri ngyuukyiwenyi tsa mbaṟe tsoose, kui iwiyiṟio moo-lyo, lokyewiyiṟio moo nyi Ruwa.
47001005	Kyipfa chandu matuuro ga Kristo gaiengyeṟika koṙu, na wuṙo iwiyiṟio moo lyaṙu lyiengyeṟika kui rina lya Kristo.
47001006	Kyaindi kokooya soe lukyeri wukyiwenyi wung'anyi, nyi kyipfa kya iwiyiṟio moo lyanyu na wukyiṟo wonyu; ang'u kokooya lowiyiṟio moo, nyi kyipfa kya nyoe iluwiyiṟia moo; lyekyeṟunda iṟunda lyayo kui ikarishia matuuro galya galya lokyetuuro soe.
47001007	Na ikusuria lyaṙu kyipfa kyanyu lyilolomie-pfo, lochimanya kye chandu muwekyeri wandu walewetuuro nyi matuuro galya, na wuṙo mulewewutio iwiyiṟio moo lyilya.
47001008	Kyipfa, wana wa wama, lukundi muṙe mulamanya mbonyi tsa wukyiwa wulya wung'anyi wulelukooya kulya Asia-pfo. Kye lulelemio mnu kuta chandu luwechiiṙima, mṟasa lukopfiiyo nyi mṙoe kye luwechiiṙima-se ikaa na moo-pfo.
47001009	Yee, soe luwenyi luwewoṙe ianduyo lya upfu mrimenyi koṙu, kundu lulachekusuria kya mrima yaṙu, indi lukusurie Ruwa, moṟutsa wapfu.
47001010	Alelukyiṟa soe upfunyi lung'anyi kuṙo; lyingyi-se nelukyiṟa. Ulya lulekusuria kye neengyeṟa ilukyiṟa.
47001011	Na nyoe mukotaramana na soe kyipfa kyaṙu kyiiṙi kya iterewa, kundu kyipfa kya kyisumbo kyilya luenengo soe kui itarama wandu wafoi, wandu wafoi waane kyipfa kyaṙu.
47001012	Cha kyipfa ikushela lyaṙu nyi ilyi, iṟingyishia lya kyilya mrima yaṙu iwonyi kye kyikyicha, kye kui wuele na ngoo ngyiilyi iwukyie ko Ruwa; chi kui wuṟango wo mmbiu-pfo, indi kui isaṟia lya Ruwa; lulewaṙa mchumie wuyanenyi, na ngoseṟa konyu nyoe.
47001013	Kyipfa luimuṟeia nyoe kyindo, sile kyilya muisoma, na ikyiṟingyishia-pfo; na inyi ngyikusurie kye mochiṟingyishia isho mṟasa mafurumionyi.
47001014	Na wuṙo chandu muleṟingyishia mbonyi tsaṙu kyitutu, kye soe nyi kyimaṙuma kya ikushela lyanyu, chandu nyoe mukyeri koṙu, mfiri ulya Mndumii oṙu Yesu echicha lya kawi.
47001015	Na inyi ngiwoṙe ikusuria-lyo ngiwekundi ishika konyu iho kuwooka, kundu muwone kyisumbo kya kawi;
47001016	na iiṙa konyu ngyiyende mṟasa Makyedonia. Na lyingyi-se iwuka Makyedonia ngyiwuye na konyu muṙuo ṟio lya kyaro kyako kya iyenda Uyuda.
47001017	Kyasia, kyiyeri ngyilekunda iwuta isho, ngyesa ngyileilacha kyilya ngyiweteṟie? Ang'u isho ngyikundi iwuta ngyikundi ishiwuta kui mbaṟe ya mmbiu kye shiwe kuṙi koko, igamba “Yee, yee,” na chi “Ote, ote-pfo?”
47001018	Kyaindi chandu Ruwa ai msimiri, ṙeṙo lyaṙu konyu chi “Yee” na “Ote-pfo.”
47001019	Kyipfa Mana o Ruwa, Kristo Yesu, ulya mbonyi tsakye muleongoyo nyi soe, kyimwi na igamba, “Inyi na Silyiwano na Timoteo,” awekyeri “Yee” na “Ote-pfo;” indi kyilaṙuṙanyi na ikyo oe nyi “Yee” ya Ruwa.
47001020	Kyipfa shaasa shoose sha Ruwa shikyeri kokye nyi “Yee.” Lyingyi-se kyipfa kya ikyo kokye oe nyi “Amen;” Ruwa naiṙime iṟumisho kui soe.
47001021	Kyasia ulya ekyelukarisha hamwi na nyoe kui Kristo, na ilushia mafuṙa, nyi Ruwa,
47001022	na oe nyi oe aleluwika kyiṟingyishio kyiwoṙe mfano okye kyaluenenga Mumuyo mrimenyi yaṙu.
47001023	Kyaindi inyi ngyilaga Ruwa nawe mṟingyishi o mrima oko, kye, kui iwawonia wukyiwa ngyilandeshikye Korinto-pfo.
47001024	Chi kye luichilyia iiṙikyia lyanyu-pfo; indi lukyeri watarami wa sia yanyu; kyipfa kui iiṙikyia lyanyu mugoṟokyi.
47002001	Kyaindi mrimenyi koko ngyilekusuria kuṙi, ngyilache-se na konyu kui ikuinaṙia.
47002002	Kyipfa inyi ngamtewe mukokuinaṙia, kyasia nyi wui engyichihiṟa inyi sile nyi ulya inyi ngamwenenga ikuinaṙia?
47002003	Na inyi ngyilemṟeia kyindo-kyo ikyo, kundu kyiyeri ngyechicha ngyilacheenengo ikuinaṙia nyi walya kyiwengyiwaṟi ichihiyo kyipfa kyawo; ngyechimukusuria nyoe moose kye sia yako nyi yanyu moose taa.
47002004	Ngyilemuṟeia paruo kui mcheṟeṟe ifoi na mrima uwoṙe fowa na ikuinyṙia lying'anyi. Chi kye muwaṙe ikuinaṙia-pfo, indi muiṙime imanya ikunda lyako konyu chandu lying'anyi.
47002005	Kyaindi kokooya mndu atewe oṙoe iwaṙa ikuinaṙia, angyitewe inyi tikyi-pfo, indi kui ura lumwi (ngyilacheewa ṟio mnu ko mndu), namutewe nyoe moose iwaṙa ikuinaṙia.
47002006	Ianduyo lyilya mndu-cho aleenengo iwuka ko wandu wafoi lyimshikyie.
47002007	Maa kyilaṙuṙanyi na isho, nyi nanga mumhooṟie na immbiyiṟia moo, mndu cha icho alachemeṟo nyi ikuinaṙia lyakye lying'anyi mnu.
47002008	Koikyo ngyimuterewa mumṟingyishie ikunda lyanyu.
47002009	Kyipfa ngyileṟeia kyipfa kya ikyo taa, kundu ngyimanye na pata konyu kye muleindia shindo shoose.
47002010	Kyaindi kokooya mohooṟia mndu kyindo kyoose, na inyi ngyewemhooṟia; kyipfa maa inyi, kookoya ngahooṟia mndu kyindo kyoose, ngamhooṟia kyipfa kyanyu mbele ya Kristo.
47002011	Satana alaenengo ṙaawa lyelulemba; cha kyipfa lolemo imanya ngyeṟo tsakye-pfo.
47002012	Kyasia kyiyeri ngyileshika Tiroa kyipfa kya Ndumi Ngyicha ya Kristo, Mndumii kangyipfunguya moongo.
47002013	Ngyilewona sia mrimenyi koko-pfo, kyipfa ngyilewona mono-wama oko Tito-pfo, indi ngyilesamana nawo, ngafuma iyenda Makyedonia.
47002014	Kyaindi Ruwa naano, ekyeluenenga ichihiyo kyipfa kya wuwinzi kyiiṙi kya Kristo, na iloṟa mpfaamo mcha o ulogo lo Kristo handu hoose kui iṟunda lyaṙu.
47002015	Cha kyipfa soe nyi mafuṙa ga Kristo, gekyepfaama necha, mbele ya Ruwa, ko iwo waikyiṟo, na ko iwo waiṙeka.
47002016	Ko iwo wa kawi mpfaamo o upfu okyeende upfu; ko iwo wa kuwooka mpfaamo o moo okyeende moo. Na oe nyi wui echiiṙima shindo-sho?
47002017	Cha kyipfa soe chi kyimwi na wandu wafoi wekyekapa mbucha na ulogo lo Ruwa-pfo. Soe luonguo ulogo lo Ruwa kui wuwaṙami wo mrima cha wandu waleṙumo nyi Ruwa, luwalungye na Kristo.
47003001	Ngyesa luwooka-se ikushela luwenyi? Ang'u lukundi-se cha iwo wengyi, paruo tsiwoṙe kyiṟumi tsiche na konyu, ang'u iwuka konyu?
47003002	Nyoe nyi paruo yaṙu yeloṟa soe luwaṙume nyi siṟi, ingyiṟeie mrimenyi koṙu, imanyikyie na pata na isomo nyi wandu woose.
47003003	Muṟingyishio kye mowa paruo iwukyie ko Kristo lulemṙambika nyoe, ingyiṟeie chi kui wiino-pfo, indi na Mumuyo o Ruwa ai na moo; chi shibaunyi sha magoe-pfo; indi shibaunyi shikyeri nyi mrima ya nyama.
47003004	Na ikusuria-lyo lulyiwoṙe mbele ya Ruwa kui njia ya Kristo.
47003005	Chi kye soe lochiiṙima iwuta kyindo kyoose kui pfinya tsaṙu luwenyi-pfo, wuiṙimi woṙu woose wuwukyie ko Ruwa.
47003006	Na oe nyi oe alelutarama iwa waṟundi wa mma mhya; chi wa kyiṟeio-pfo, indi wa Mumuyo; cha kyipfa kyiṟeio kyekyewaaga, indi Mumuyo okyekyiṟa.
47003007	Kyasia, kokooya iṟunda lya upfu lyilekolyaṟeio na itaricho magoenyi, lyilecha mng'anonyi, mṟasa Waisiraelyi walaiṙime iitukuya kyaam kya Mose karii, kyipfa kya mng'ano o kyaam kyakye, nacho nyi-we mng'ano uweiilachika.
47003008	Ngyesa iṟunda lya Mumuyo lyechiengyeṟika iwa mng'anonyi-pfoe?
47003009	Cha kyipfa kokooya iṟunda lya ianduyo lyiwoṙe mng'ano, iṟunda lya wusumganyi lyiwoṙe mng'ano o ngoseṟa.
47003010	Kyipfa maa lyilya lyileng'anyiso lyiwewoṙe mng'ano kuṙi-pfo, kyipfa kya mng'ano uiengyeṟika mnu.
47003011	Cha kyipfa kokooya lyilya lyiweilachika lyiwewoṙe mng'ano, ngoseṟa mnu lyilya lyekyekaa ho mlungana lyiwoṙe mng'ano ung'anyi ngoseṟa.
47003012	Kyasia, kyipfa luwoṙe iweṙelyia lya mbaṟe-i luwika wuragari na wukari wung'anyi.
47003013	Na soe chi chandu Mose alewika kyindo wuye ya kyaam kyakye, kundu Waisiraelyi walaitukuye mnu mafurumionyi ga kyilya kyiweilachika-pfo;
47003014	indi makusaṟo gawo galewiko meema. Kyipfa maa mṟasa inu, kyiyeri Mma Mku okyesomo, kyindo-kyo kyeshikyia kyaam kyekyeweṙio ho. Kyimwi na igamba kye, kyileloṟo kye kyindo-kyo kyeshikyia kyewuto ho kyiiṙi kya Kristo-pfo.
47003015	Indi mṟasa inu, kyiyeri uwawaso lo Mose lokyesomo, kyindo-kyo kyekyeṙio mrimenyi kowo.
47003016	Indi kyiyeri kyoose wechigalukyia Mndumii, kyindo kyilya kyeshikyia kyaam kyewuto ho.
47003017	Kyasia “Mndumii” nyi oe Mumuyo; kyaindi handu akyeri Mumuyo o Mndumii, iho nyi ho-ndu hawoṙe ikaa kulawoṙe ichilyio nyi kyindo.
47003018	Kyaindi soe loose, kui kyaam kyilakyishikyie nyi kyindo, luloṟa mng'ano o Mndumii, cha mng'ano uwukyie kyiyewonyi, lokyeilacho luwe cha mfano-cho icho, iwuka mng'ano mṟasa mng'ano ung'anyi ngoseṟa cha mng'ano uwukyie ko Mndumii, akyeri Mumuyo.
47004001	Kyipfa kya ikyo, cha kyipfa luwoṙe iṟunda-lyi, chandu lulewona isaṟia, luiloloma-pfo.
47004002	Kyaindi lulelega mbonyi tsa sonu tsikuṟiikyie, maa luichumia kui mtambo-pfo, maa isanza-sanza Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na wongo, indi kui iṟingyishia loi lukuloṟa kye luwoṙe wusumganyi, kyilya mrima ya wandu iwonyi kye kyikyicha kyeluṟingyishia mbele ya Ruwa.
47004003	Kyaindi kookoya Ndumi-i Ngyicha luionguo ikuṟiikyie, yakuṟiika ko iwo waiṙeka;
47004004	wakyeri kye kyiiṙi kyawo ruwa o wuyana-wu naleshingyia makusaṟo ga iwo walaiṙikyie, walachekooyo nyi ngyeela ya Ndumi Ngyicha ya mng'ano okye Kristo akyeri fana ya Ruwa.
47004005	Cha kyipfa lukuongoya mbonyi luwenyi-pfo, indi Kristo Yesu kye nyi Mndumii; na soe luwenyi kye lukyeri waṟundi wanyu kyipfa kya Yesu.
47004006	Cha kyipfa Ruwa, icho alegamba, “Ngyeela yewaa iwuka meemenyi,” nyi oe alewaa mrimenyi koṙu, naluenengye ngyeela ya wuṟango wo mng'ano o Ruwa kyaamunyi kya Yesu Kristo.
47004007	Kyaindi luwoṙe wunjama-wu shindonyi sha teri, kundu pfinya ing'anyi ya wuiṙimi iwe ko Ruwa, maa chi iwuka koṙu-pfo.
47004008	Ngyuura tsoose luilya wukyiwa, indi luiwingo-pfo; lukapa kawi, indi luiloṟa lupfiiyo nyi mṙoe-pfo.
47004009	Lusuiṟo, indi luṙio kulawoṙe itaramo-pfo; luwiyitso wanda, indi luirumatso-pfo.
47004010	Mfiri yoose luṙuṙe mmbiunyi yaṙu iwoogo lya Yesu, kundu moo o Yesu uṟingyishio mmbiunyi yaṙu.
47004011	Kyipfa soe lukyeri na moo, mfiri yoose lokyewuto lupfe kyipfa kya Yesu, kundu moo o Yesu uṟingyishio mmbiunyi yaṙu yekyepfa.
47004012	Kyasia iho upfu lokyeṟunda, mrimenyi koṙu, indi moo mrimenyi konyu.
47004013	Kyaindi cha kyipfa luwoṙe Mumuyo ulya ulya o iiṙikyia; chandu kyileṟeio, “Ngyileiṙikyia, na kyipfa kya ikyo ngyileṙeṙa.” Soe na soe luiṙikyie, na kyipfa kya ikyo luṙeṙa.
47004014	Luichi kye ulya aleṟutsa Mndumii Yesu nechiluṟutsa na soe hamwi na Yesu, na iluende na mbele yakye hamwi na nyoe.
47004015	Cha kyipfa mbonyi tsoose nyi kyipfa kyanyu, kundu isaṟia-lyo lyikaengyeṟika mnu, ko iwo wakyeri wafoi kyiano kyiengyeṟikye, na Ruwa nang'anyiso.
47004016	Koikyo luiloloma-pfo; indi maa chandu kyanja mmbiu yaṙu iloṟa iuṟa pfinya; mrimenyi koṙu lukokohoka orio mfiri.
47004017	Kyipfa matuuro gaṙu gai maangu, gakyeri ga kyiyeri kyifuhi tikyi, gekyeluwutia mng'ano o mlungana uingyikyie mnu.
47004018	Lulaambuye shekyewono indi shilya shilekyewono. Shilya shekyewono shekyekaa kyiyeri kyifuhi, indi shilya shilekyewono shekyekaa mlungana.
47005001	Cha kyipfa luichi kye mmbiu yaṙu lukyeri nayo iha wuyanenyi ikamnyamaṟika, luwoṙe numba iwukyie ko Ruwa, numba ilangyiwikye kui mawoko, ikyeri ya mlungana ruwewu.
47005002	Kyipfa kyiiṙi kya numba-i luiwawio lochilanga mnu ienengo kanyi koṙu kuwukyie ruwewu;
47005003	kundu lukomṟiko mmbiu ungyi lochiwono lui-se kyiṟanguoe-pfo.
47005004	Cha kyipfa soe lukyeri kyiiṙi kya mmbiu-i luwawio, lochilemio; chi kye lukundi iwuta mmbiu-chu okyepfa-pfo, indi lulangyie iṟiko ulya ulekyepfa, kundu kyilya kyekyepfa kyimeṟo piu nyi moo.
47005005	Kyasia ulya aleluṟeyeṟia isho nyi Ruwa, na oe naleluenenga Mumuyo okye moluringa.
47005006	Kyasia mfiri yoose luwoṙe wukari; lyingyi-se luichi kye, kyiyeri lukyeri iha na mmbiu-chu, lukyeri kuleshi na Mndumii.
47005007	(Kyipfa lokyekaa kui iiṙikyia, chi kui iwona-pfo.)
47005008	Kyaindi luwoṙe mrima ngyikarishe; na soe luwonyi nyi nanga ilekana na mmbiu-i na ikaa hamwi na Mndumii.
47005009	Koikyo-se, kokooya lukyeri iha ang'u lukyeri iha-pfo, luipfuṟukana imchihiṟa oe.
47005010	Kyipfa kyalukooya soe loose iloṟo halya kyiṙinyi kya ianduyo kya Kristo, kundu orio mndu naambilyie wori wo shindo alewuta kyimmbiu, chandu alewuta, kye shicha ang'u shiwicho.
47005011	Kyasia lukomanya iowuo Ruwa, lukuruo wandu; indi loṟingyishio mbele ya Ruwa. Na inyi ngyikusurie kye luwaṟingyishie mrimenyi konyu taa.
47005012	Kyipfa luikushela luwenyi mbele yanyu-se-pfo, indi lumuenenga kyimaṙuma kya ikushela kyipfa kyaṙu, kundu muiṙime iwaṙa kyindo kyeloṟa mbele ya iwo waikushela ko shindo sha nja tikyi, maa chi shindo sha mrimenyi-pfo.
47005013	Kyipfa kokooya luwasuko nyi kyipfa kya Ruwa; ang'u kokooya lulawasuko, nyi kyipfa kyanyu.
47005014	Kyipfa ikunda lya Kristo lyiluchilyia kyipfa lowona kuṙi, kye umwi nalepfa kyipfa kya woose, kyasia walepfa woose.
47005015	Lyingyi-se nalepfa kyipfa kya woose, kundu wai na moo walawe-se na moo kyipfa kya mrima yawo wawenyi, indi kyipfa kyakye oe alepfa kaṟuka kyipfa kyawo.
47005016	Na kyawa soe wookyia wulalu luichi mndu oose kui mbaṟe ya mmbiu-pfo. Maa chandu soe lulemanya Kristo kui mbaṟe ya mmbiu, kyaindi wulalu lumwichi-se kuṙo-pfo.
47005017	Na kyawa kye, mndu kakaa kyiiṙi kya Kristo nawa mndu mhya; sha kacha shaiṙa, shoose shawa shihya.
47005018	Kyaindi shoose taa shiwukyie ko Ruwa alelusanza soe na oe kui Kristo. Na oe naleluenenga iṟunda lyesanza wandu na Ruwa.
47005019	Ulogo loṙu nyi kye Ruwa naisanza wandu woose na oe kui Kristo. Ruwa aletala ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo-pfo. Na naluenenga ulogo lo sanza washituwa.
47005020	Kyasia soe luiṙeṙa handu ha Kristo, cha ilyi Ruwa naiterewa kui maṙumbu gaṙu, lumuterewa nyoe kyipfa kya Kristo musanzo na Ruwa.
