47005021	Oe alaichi wunyamaṟi nalemmbuta kyipfa kyaṙu, kundu soe luiṙime iwa wusumganyi wo Ruwa kui oe.
47006001	Na soe lukoṟunda handu hamwi na oe lumuterewa maa mulaambilyie isaṟia lya Ruwa wulya.
47006002	(Cha kyipfa naigamba, “Kyiyeri kyiiṙikyie ngyilekuaṙanyia, mfiri o wukyiṟo ngyilekutarama.” Kyiyeri kyiiṙikyie nyi wulalu; mfiri o wukyiṟo nyi wulalu.)
47006003	Maa lulawe wandu wetewe wengyi ioloka kyindonyi kyoose, kundu ṙeko lyilawono iṟundenyi lyaṙu.
47006004	Indi orio kyindonyi luiwuta luwone kyiṟumi kyicha, cha waṟundi wa Ruwa; kui wusimiri wung'anyi, wukyiwenyi, fowenyi, matuuronyi.
47006005	Ngaponyi, shipfungonyi, wuṟiingyinyi, ilya wukyiwa, ilaa kyiṙombo, ikuretekyia.
47006006	Mkaṟonyi ngyicha, wuṟangonyi, isimiria, wupfererinyi, Mumuyonyi Mweele, ikundenyi lyilawoṙe wukulembecheṟi.
47006007	Ṙeṙonyi lya loi, pfinyenyi ya Ruwa; kui shisha sha wusumganyi sha kuwoko ko kulyoe na sha kuwoko ko kumoso.
47006008	Kui kyiṟumi na sonu; kui iṙeṙo uwicho na iṙeṙo necha; cha wandu wailemba, indi lukyeri wandu wa loi.
47006009	Cha walaichio, indi waichio mnu; cha waipfa, ate lukyeri na moo; cha waitoṟisho, indi walaiwoogo.
47006010	Cha wandu wawoṙo nyi fowa, indi mfiri yoose luwoṙe sia; cha wakyiwa indi lochiiritsa wafoi; cha walawoṙe kyindo, indi luwoṙe shido shoose.
47006011	Luilosha kulawoṙe wuowu konyu nyoe Wakorinto. Mrima yaṙu yaloṟa ikunda konyu.
47006012	Mrima yaṙu yamukunda nyoe, indi mrima yanyu mukoishinga.
47006013	Kyasia kundu mutae iṙuana na chandu muleambilyia (ngaṙeṙa na nyoe cha wana watutu) na mrima yanyu iweloṟe ikunda taa.
47006014	Maa mulasanzo hamwi na walaiṙikyie, chandu kyilai sungusinyi; kyipfa kuwoṙe umbuya o mbaṟe iha kyiiṙi kya wusumganyi na wunyamaṟi? Lyingyi-se hawoṙe isanza lya mbaṟe iha kyiiṙi kya ngyeela na meema?
47006015	Kuwoṙe iiṙikyiana lya mbaṟe iha kyiiṙi kya Kristo na ulya Mmbicho? Ang'u ulya aiṙikyie nawoṙe kyi hamwi na ulya alaiṙikyie?
47006016	Lyingyi-se hawoṙe iiṙikyiana lya mbaṟe iha kyiiṙi kya hekalu lya Ruwa na ifano? Cha kyipfa soe nyi hekalu lya Ruwa akyeri na moo; chandu Ruwa alegamba kye, “Ngyechikaa mrimenyi kowo na ichumia kyiiṙi kyawo na inyi ngyewa Ruwa owo, nawo wechiwa wandu wako.”
47006017	Koikyo, “Wukyenyi kyiiṙi kyawo, mukae kuleshi nawo, Mndumii nagamba, Maa mulapaaye kyindo kyifanyi, na inyi ngyemuambilyia.
47006018	Ngyewa Awu konyu, na nyoe mochiwa wana koko wa kyisoṟo na wa kyika, Mndumii Mopfinya nagamba.”
47007001	Kyasia-ng'u, wakunde wako, cha kyipfa luwoṙe shaasa-sho, lusanje mrima-i yaṙu ilekane na ukoe loose lo mmbiu na mrima, kunu lochiafutsia wuele kui iindia Ruwa.
47007002	Luenengyenyi ṙaawa mrimenyi. Lulelyiiya mndu oose mbaka-pfo, maa lulenyamaṟa mndu-pfo, maa lulandewutie mndu kyindo kundu luwone ho kyiira-pfo.
47007003	Ngyiṙeṙa kyindo-kyo kundu ngyimuanduye nyoe kye muwoṙe ṙeko-pfo; cha kyipfa ngamsonguo igamba kye, nyoe mukyeri mrimenyi koṙu maa kui ipfa handu hamwi, na ikaa na moo handu hamwi.
47007004	Ngyiwoṙe wukari wung'anyi konyu; ngyiwoṙo nyi ikushela lying'anyi kyipfa kyanyu. Ngyiichuo nyi iwiyiṟio moo, wukyiwenyi woṙu woose ngaichuo sia ya ngosera.
47007005	Cha kyipfa maa kyiyeri luleshika Makyedonia wukyiwa wulya mmbiu yaṙu iweilya wuleanguha-pfo, indi lulewona wukyiwa ngyuura tsoose. Nja kuwewoṙe shiṙa, na mrimenyi fowa.
47007006	Kyaindi Ruwa, ekyewiyiṟia wafofo moo, naleluwiyiṟia moo kui icha lya Tito.
47007007	Maa chi kui icha lyake tikyi-pfo, indi chandu alewiyiṟio moo nyi nyoe, echiluwia mbonyi tsa ilanga lyanyu, na ṟanyi yanyu, na wuragari wonyu kyipfa kyako, mṟasa ngaengyeṟa ichihiyo.
47007008	Cha kyipfa maa chandu paruo iya yako ilemuendie fowa ngyiwihiyo mrimenyi-pfo; maa kokooya ngyilewihiyo mrimenyi, ngyiwonyi kye paruo iya ilemuendie fowa, kyiyeri kyifuhi tikyi.
47007009	Wulalu ngyimchihiye, chi kyipfa kya nyoe iwona fowa-pfo, indi kyipfa kya ilyi mulewona fowa, mṟasa mukoṙumbuya wunyamaṟi. Kyipfa mulewona fowa kyipfa kya Ruwa, kundu mulaṙetse kyindo kyipfa kya kyindo lulewuta soe.
47007010	Iwona fowa lyikyeri kui mbaṟe ya Ruwa lyekyeende iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi wokyeende wukyiṟo wulawoṙe isumkyia indi fowa ya wuyana yekyeende upfu.
47007011	Wulalu moiṙima iwona kyindo kyekyeendo nyi iwona fowa chandu Ruwa akundi. Nyoe moiṙima wulalu iwa wandu wawoṙe ipfuṟukana, wawoṙe kyindo kyegamba. Mokyeṙumbuko nyi maṙima na iowuo; mokyepfuṟukana na iwona kye kya wusumganyi kyiṟundo. Nyoe moloṟa na pata kye muwoṙe ṙeko kyiiṙi kya ikyi ngyigamba-pfo.
47007012	Kyasia, maa chandu ngyilemuṟeia paruo, ngyileṟeia kyipfa kya ulya alenyamaṟa, maa chi kyipfa kya ulya alewutio kuṙo-pfo, indi ipfuṟukana lyanyu kyipfa kyaṙu lyiiṙime iṟingyishio konyu mbele ya Ruwa.
47007013	Koikyo lulewiyiṟio moo. Lyingyi-se kyiiṙi kya iwiyiṟio moo lyaṙu lulechihiyo mnu ngoseṟa kyipfa kya sia ya Tito; kyipfa nyoe moose mulechihiṟa mrima okye.
47007014	Cha kyipfa kokooya ngyilekushela mbele yakye kyindonyi kyoose kyipfa kyanyu, ngyilewona sonu-pfo; indi chandu lulemmbia mbonyi tsoose kui wuloi, na wuṙo ikushela lyaṙu mbele ya Tito lyiwei lya loi.
47007015	Na ikunda lyakye konyu lyekyeengyeṟika ngoseṟa, kyiyeri ekyekumbuo iindia lyanyu nyoe moose, chandu mulemwambilyia kui wuowu na iṙeṙema.
47007016	Ngachihiyo, kyipfa kyiiṙi kya orio kyindo ngyechiiṙima ikusuria konyu.
47008001	Lyingyi-se, wana wa wana waṙu, lummbia ulogo lo isaṟia lya Ruwa, siṟi tsa Makyedonia tsileenengo;
47008002	kyipfa kyiyeri waweiyesho kui wukyiwa wung'anyi, sia yawo na wufofo wowo wung'anyi mnu wuleengyeṟa wunjama wo ilekyia lyawo.
47008003	Kyipfa ngyimuṟingyishia kye, kui pfinya tsawo, na ngoseṟa ya pfinya tsawo, kulawoṙe iitiko nyi mndu walewuta shindo shawo;
47008004	wechiluterewa mnu ko mbonyi tsa isaṟia-lyi, na iṟunda-lyi lyeṟundia wandu wa Ruwa.
47008005	Lyingyi-se walewuta kuṙi chi chandu luwekusurie tikyi-pfo, indi kuwooka waleṙambika mrima yawo ko Mndumii; na koṙu taa, iṙuana na chandu Ruwa akundi.
47008006	Mṟasa lukoikyimbia Tito naafutsie isaṟia-lyi konyu chandu oe alekoalyiwooka.
47008007	Kyaindi chandu muwoṙe shindo shifoi, iiṙikyia, iṙeṙa, na wuṟango, na wuragari woose, na ikunda lyanyu koṙu soe; kyasia na wuṙo muambilyie wuingyi wo isaṟia-lyi taa.
47008008	Ngyiṙeṙa kundu ngyimutsindikye-pfo, indi kui wuragari wo wandu wengyi ngyimanye wusimiri wo ikunda lyanyu.
47008009	Kyipfa mommanya isaṟia lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, maa chandu awekyeri mnjama, kyipfa kyanyu, nalewa mkyiwa kundu nyoe muiṙime iwa wanjama kui wufofo wokye.
47008010	Na inyi kyipfa kya ikyo, ngyigamba kuṙi, kyachia ko ura lonyu muwookye iwuta shilya mulewooka maka ulesia. Nyoe muwekyeri wa kuwooka iwuta kuṙo.
47008011	Kyaindi wulalu afutsienyi kyindo-kyo; kundu chandu muwelangyie itarama, pfuṟukanenyi kuṙo chandu mochiiṙima, muafutsie.
47008012	Kyipfa kokooya mndu awoṙe mrima o tarama, Ruwa nekyeambilyia kyilya echiiṙima iwuta, ekyerika kya ngoseṟa-pfo.
47008013	Kyipfa ngyigamba isho, kundu wengyi wachihiyo na nyoe muwone wukyiwa-pfo;
47008014	indi mbonyi tsiwe necha; kyiyeri-kyi kya wulalu wuingyi wonyu wutarame iuṟa lyawo, kundu na wuingyi wowo wumutarame nyoe kyiyeri nyoe mulawoṙe; kundu mbonyi tsiwe necha.
47008015	Chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Alesania shifoi, aleengyeṟikyio-pfo, maa ulya alesania shitutu aleuṟa kyindo-pfo.”
47008016	Kyaindi Ruwa naṟumisho, ulya mowika wuragari wulya wulya kyipfa kyanyu mrimenyi ko Tito.
47008017	Kyipfa naleambilyia loi iikyimbio lyilya ngoseṟa. Lyingyi-se echiwika wuragari, nalepfunga kyaro kya iyenda konyu kulawoṙe iitiko.
47008018	Na hamwi na oe lukoṙuma mono-wama ulya kyiṟumi kyakye Nduminyi Ngyicha kyileṙunganana siṟinyi koose.
47008019	Maa chi wuṙo tikyi-pfo, indi nalesambuṟo nyi siṟi na iyenda kyaro hamwi na soe mbonyinyi tsa isaṟia-lyi, lulyiṟundia, kundu Mndumii naṟumisho, ikuṟeyeṟa lyaṙu lyimanyikye.
47008020	Lochikuringa na kyindo-kyi, mndu alachewona ṙeko lyaṙu mbonyinyi tsa kyisumbo-kyi lukyiṟundia;
47008021	lukosonguo ikusaṟa gai mecha, chi mbele ya Mndumii tikyi-pfo, indi na mbele ya wandu.
47008022	Na soe hamwi nawo loṙuma mono-wama oṙu lulemmbona kyiyeri kyileshi kye nawoṙe wuragari, na wulalu nawoṙe wuragari ngoseṟa mnu kyipfa kya ikusuria lying'anyi awoṙe konyu.
47008023	Kyasia mndu kakunda mbonyi tsa Tito, oe nyi mongari oko, na mndu ngyekyeṟunda na oe kyipfa kyanyu; na mndu kakunda mbonyi tsa wana wa wama waṙu, wo nyi wandu wawaṙume nyi siṟi, na mng'ano o Kristo.
47008024	Kyasia waloṟenyi mbele ya siṟi wuloi wo ikunda lyanyu, na ikushela lyaṙu kyipfa kyanyu.
47009001	Ko mbonyi tseṟundia wandu wa Ruwa kuwoṙe kyimaṙuma ngyimuṟeie-pfo.
47009002	Kyipfa ngyiichi ikuṟeyeṟa lyanyu; ikuṟeyeṟa ngyekyekushelyia kyipfa kyanyu ko wandu wa Makyedonia, kye Akaya iwekuṟeyeṟie maka oose; na wuragari wonyu wulekarisha wafoi.
47009003	Kyaindi ngyileṙuma wana wa wama-wo, kundu ikushela lyaṙu kyipfa kyanyu lyilailachikye kyiiṙi kya kyindo-kyi; muiṙime ikuṟeyeṟa chandu ngyilegamba,
47009004	kundu wandu wa Makyedonia wakacha hamwi na inyi, wakamukooya mulakuṟeyeṟie, soe lulacherigo nyi sonu (lulagambe nyoe), kyiiṙi kya mbaṟe-yo iyo ya ikusuria.
47009005	Kyasia ngyilewona kyangyikooya ngyitutume wana wa wama-wa wasonguoe ishika konyu, na iachikyia iwinyi kyisumbo kyanyu mulekyiteṟia wookyia kacha, kundu kyiwe kyamuṟeyeṟo, na kuṙi kyiwe cha kyienengo, maa chi cha kyindo kyekyeenengyio kui iitiko-pfo.
47009006	Kyaindi ngyigamba kyindo-kyi, “Mowaaya shaangu nesambuo shaangu; mowaaya kui ilekyia nesambuo kui ilekyia.”
47009007	Orio mndu nawute chandu akusurie mrimenyi kokye, chi kui ikuinaṙia, maa chi kui iitiko-pfo; kyipfa Ruwa nakundi ulya ekyeenengyia kui mrima mkyesi.
47009008	Na Ruwa neiṙima imuenenga orio mboṟa iingikyie, kundu nyoe mfiri yoose muiṙime iwaṙa orio kyindo mukundi, na muwoṙe orio kyindo mukundi muiṙime ienengyia kulawoṙe iehia.
47009009	Chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Oe nekyeenengyia kui ilekyia, kaenenga wakyiwa wusumganyi wokye wokaa mlungana.”
47009010	Na ulya ekyeenenga mbeu mndu mowaaya, na mkate uwe kyelya, nemuenenga mbeu tsewaaya na itsiengyeṟa, na oe nechiengyeṟa shilyimu sha wusumganyi wonyu.
47009011	Mochiiritso shindonyi shoose muiṙime iwaṙa ilekyia lyoose, lyekyeenenga Ruwa wandu wafoi waimmbia haika kyipfa kya shienengo shanyu wekyeambilyia iwuka koṙu.
47009012	Kyipfa iṟunda-lya iṟunda-lyi chi lyetarama wandu wa Ruwa shindo shilya wauṟie tikyi-pfo, indi lyekyeengyeṟika mnu iwaṙa kyiira kui iana lying'anyi Ruwa ekyeenengo.
47009013	Cha kyipfa mukoyesho kui iṟunda-lyo, waiṟumisha Ruwa kyipfa kya wuindi wonyu kui iṟingyishia Ndumi Ngyicha ya Kristo, na kyipfa kya ilekyia lyanyu mulewaambutsia wo na wandu woose.
47009014	Nawo wawenyi, wechiterewa kyipfa kyanyu, wamukundi mnu mrimenyi kowo kyipfa kya isaṟia lya Ruwa lyileingyikyi mnu konyu.
47009015	Ruwa naano kyipfa kya kyienengo kyakye, lulawoṙe maṙeṙo geonguo mbonyi tsakyo.
47010001	Kyasia, inyi Paulo ngyimonyi ngyimuterewa kui wuhoo na wuyendelyi wo Kristo, inyi ngyikyeri msimiri ngyikyeri hamwi na nyoe, indi ngyilakyeri ho ngyiwoṙe wuṟango na wukari konyu.
47010002	Yee, ngyiterewa kye ngyikyeri ho ngyilawaṙe wuṟango na wukari cha wulya ngyiwoṙe ko walya wekyelushitakyi kye soe lokyeosha shindo sha kyiwuyana.
47010003	Kyipfa maa chandu luosha shindo sha kyiwuyana, lokyekapana shiṙa kui mbaṟe ya kyiwuyana-pfo;
47010004	(kyipfa shisha sha shiṙa shaṙu chi sha kyiwuyana-pfo, indi shiwoṙe pfinya kyiiṙi kya Ruwa mṟasa iunduo moombo;)
47010005	lochinyamaṟa makusaṟo na orio kyindo kyekyeshingyia, kyekyeshingyia wuṟango wo Ruwa, na lochichilyia orio mndu naiṙime iindia Kristo.
47010006	Lyingyi-se lukowa lukuṟeyeṟie itaa kyiṟaache wuwicho woose, kyiyeri iiṙikyia lyanyu lyeafukyia.
47010007	Ambuyenyi shikyeri mbele ya meso ganyu. Mndu kawona oe amonyi kye nyi mndu o Kristo, nawekusaṟe kuṙi taa mrimenyi kokye, kye chandu oe akyeri mndu o Kristo, nyi wuṙo na soe.
47010008	Kyipfa maa ngakushela ngoseṟa kyitutu kyipfa kya wuchilyi woṙu (luleenengo nyi Ruwa, luiṙime imugoṟotsa maa chi imuolotsa-pfo), ngyerigo nyi sonu-pfo;
47010009	ngyilachewono cha ilyi kye ngyikundi imuowesha kui paruo tsako.
47010010	Kyipfa wekyegamba, paruo tsakye tsingyikari na tsioweshie; indi akyeri amonyi kyimmbiu namfofo, na maṙeṙo gakye chi kyindo-pfo.
47010011	Mndu o mbaṟe-yo iyo nakusaṟe kuṙi, kye kyindo kyilya lokyeṟeia paruonyi lulakyeri na nyoe nyikyo lochiwuta lukyeri na nyoe.
47010012	Cha kyipfa lochikaria ikutala hamwi na wandu waata wa iwo wekyekushela wawenyi, maa ikulyingatsana nawo-pfo. Wandu wekyekuloṟa kye wo nyi kyiyeṟo kyekuyeṟa, na wandu wekyekulyingatsana wo wenyi ko wenyi nyi matondo.
47010013	Kyaindi soe luikushela ngoseṟa ya chandu kyiwaṟi koṙu-pfo; indi chandu kyiwaṟi kyiyeṟo kyilya kyikyiwikye nyi Ruwa, nakyo nyi ishika mṟasa konyu.
47010014	Kyipfa luikulandaṟa luwenyi kuta chandu kyiwaṟi-pfo, cha ilyi lulaishika konyu nyoe; cha kyipfa lulesonguo ishika mṟasa konyu Nduminyi Ngyicha ya Kristo.
47010015	Maa luikushela kuta chandu kyiwaṟi, kyipfa kya iṟunda lya wandu wengyi-pfo; indi ikusuria lyaṙu nyi kye chandu iiṙikyia lyanyu lyiengyeṟika, iṟunda lyaṙu konyu lyeng'ana,
47010016	kundu luiṙime ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha ngyuurukyenyi tsingyi kuleshi na nyoe; kulawoṙe ikushelyia iṟunda lyiṟunde nyi wandu wengyi.
47010017	Kyaindi ulya mokushela, nakushele kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
47010018	Kyipfa mndu moiṙikyio chi ulya ekyekushela-pfo, indi nyi ulya ekyeṟumisho nyi Mndumii.
47011001	Nanga muweṙuana na inyi wutondonyi woko kyitutu! Yee, muṙuane na inyi.
47011002	Kyipfa ngyimunyeng'ia, wunyeng'i wo Ruwa; kyipfa ngyilemukosia msoṟo umwi, kundu ngyiendie Kristo mana mkyega mcha.
47011003	Kyaindi ngyiowuo; chandu njoka iya ilelemba Eva kui ngyeṟo tsayo, ilachenyamaṟa makusaṟo ganyu, mukoṙa wunyotsu na wucha wonyu ko Kristo.
47011004	Kyipfa mndu oose kacha eonguo Yesu ungyi lulalemwonguo soe, ang'u mukoambilyia mumuyo ungyi alakyeri cha ulya muleambilyia, ang'u ndumi ngyicha ingyi ilakyeri cha iya muleambilyia, muwuta necha iṙuana na oe!
47011005	Kyipfa ngakusaṟa kye kuwoṙe kyindo wasu wang'anyi wawoṙe ngyilakyiwoṙe inyi-pfo.
47011006	Kyaindi maa kokooya inyi nyi mndu alaichi iṙeṙa, ikyo chi mbaṟe yako wuṟangonyi-pfo, indi ko orio kyindo luleṟingyishio konyu.
47011007	Ngyesa ngyilenyamaṟa kui iindia kundu nyoe mung'anyiso, kyipfa kya ilyi ngyilewaongoya Ndumi Ngyicha kulawoṙe wori?
47011008	Ngyilesoka siṟi tsingyi masaa gawo, ngawuta kowo kyindo kyako kyelyio kundu ngyimuṟundie nyoe.
47011009	Na inyi kyiyeri ngyiwekyeri hamwi na nyoe na ipfula kyindo kyengyitarama, ngyilewa ṟio ko mndu-pfo. Kyipfa wana wa wama walewuka Makyedonia walengyienenga orio kyindo ngyiwekundi; na inyi mbonyinyi tsoose ngyilekuringa ngyilacheewa ṟio konyu maa ale. Lyingyi-se ngyekuringa.
47011010	Chandu loi iya ya Kristo ikyeri mrimenyi koko, kuwoṙe mndu echiiṙima ingyiima ikushela mṟasenyi ya Akaya-pfo.
47011011	Kyitewe ny' kyi? Ngyesa nyi kyipfa nygilamukundi nyoe? Ruwa naichi.
47011012	Kyaindi kyindo ngyiwuta ngyekyiwuta, kundu ngyiwingane na iwo waipfula ṙaawa walawone, kundu kyindo-kyo waikushelyia wawono wakyeri cha soe.
47011013	Kyipfa wandu wa mbaṟe-yo-iyo nyi wasu wa wongo, wekyeṟunda kui ngyeṟo, wekyekuloṟa cha ilyi nyi wasu wa Kristo.
47011014	Maa chi kyindo kyeṟiyio-pfo. Kyipfa Satana oe amonyi nekyekuloṟa cha ilyi nyi malaika o ngyeela.
47011015	Kyasia chi kyindo kying'anyi waṟundi wakye ikuloṟa cha ilyi nyi waṟundi wa wusumganyi wakyeri kye ifurumia lyawo lyechiwa kyimwi na maṟunda gawo-pfo.
47011016	Ngyigamba-se, mndu alakusaṟe kye inyi ngyimtondo. Kyaindi maa mukokusaṟa kyako kuṙo, mungyiambilyie cha tondo; kundu na inyi ngyiiṙime ikushela kyitutu.
47011017	Kyindo ngyiṙeṙa kyiwukyie ko Mndumii-pfo, indi nyi cha kya wutondo, kui wukari-wu wo ikushela.
47011018	Cha kyipfa wafoi waikushela kui mbaṟe ya kyimndu na inyi ngyekushela.
47011019	Nyoe, kyipfa muwaṟango, mokyeṙuana na matondo kui sia.
47011020	Kyipfa mokyeṙuana na mndu echimmbika wutumonyi, na immbutia shindo shiwicho sha orio mbaṟe maa imukapa ipfo kyaam.
47011021	Ngyiṙeṙa kui mbaṟe ya wufofo cha ilyi luwewafofo. Kyaindi kokooya mndu awoṙe wuṟango na wukari kyindonyi kyoose (ngyiṙeṙa kyitondo), maa inyi ngyiwoṙe wuṟango na wukari.
47011022	Wo nyi Waebrania? Na inyi taa. Wo nyi Waisiraelyi? Na inyi taa. Wo nyi wa kyishari kya Abrahamu? Na inyi taa.
47011023	Wo nyi waṟundi wa Kristo? (Ngyiṙeṙa cha msuko), inyi nyi ngoseṟa. Wukyiwenyi nyi ngoseṟa mnu; shipfungonyi nyi ngoseṟa mnu; kyiiṙi kya ikapo nyi ngoseṟa na kuta; kyiiṙi kya ikyia upfu kyiyeri kyileshi.
47011024	Ko Wayuda kataanu ngyilekapo ka makumi gaṟaaṟu na kyenda.
47011025	Kaṟaaṟu ngyilekapo na upoi; lyimwi ngyilekapo magoe; kaṟaaṟu ngyilenyamaṟikyio nyi ngalawa; kyingoto puti na kyio taṟaṟa ngyikyeri mṟingyenyi.
47011026	Kui iyenda kyaro kafoi; ngataṟa tsa mfo; ngataṟa tsa wasokyi; ngataṟa iwuka ko Wayuda woṙia; ngataṟa iwuka ko wandu wa masanga gengyi; ngataṟa tsa mṟinyi; ngataṟa tsa nukyenyi ngyuumu suwa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga; ngataṟa tsa ipalyipalyinyi; ngataṟa tsa wambuya wa wongo.
47011027	Wukyiwenyi na matuuronyi; ilaa kyiṙombo kafoi; njaenyi na wuangarinyi; kyiiṙi kya ikuretekyia kafoi; mbehonyi na iṙio kyiṟanguoe.
47011028	Kulawoṙe ionguo shindo shingyi shifoi, orio mfiri ngyiwoṙe maṟunda ga iambuya siṟi tsoose.
47011029	Nyi wui akyeri mfofo, na inyi ngyilawe mfofo? Nyi wui aletewo na mndu inyamaṟa na inyi ngyilawihiyo?
47011030	Kyikangyikooya ikushela, ngyekushelyia wufofo woko.
47011031	Ruwa, Awu o Mndumii Yesu, awaṟi kyiṟumi mṟasa mlungana, naichi kye ngyiṙeṙa wongo-pfo.
47011032	Ipfo Dameskyi mchilyi o mangyi Areta naweiringa mṟi o Wadameskyi, kundu nangyiwaṙe;
47011033	na inyi ngasotso dirishenyi lya kyiambasa ngyikyeri kyikapunyi, ngakyiṟo iwuka mawokonyi gakye.
47012001	Kyangyikooya ikushela, maa chandu kyilakyicha; kyaindi ngyegamba shindo Mndumii alengyiloṟa ngyikyeri cha mndu ailoṙo na ingyishukuya.
47012002	Ngyiichi mndu umwi kyiiṙi kya Kristo, hamsia cha maka ikumi na ina wulalu (kye nawekyeri kyiiṙi kya mmbiu ngyiichi-pfo; kye nawekyeri nja ya mmbiu ngyiichi-pfo; Ruwa naichi). Mndu-cho naleirio wuye mṟasa ngyinenyi ya kaṟaaṟu.
47012003	Na inyi ngyiichi mndu-cho, (kye nawekyeri kyiiṙi kya mmbiu ngiichi-pfo; kye nawekyeri nja ya mmbiu ngiichi-pfo; Ruwa naichi).
47012004	Kye naleiro mṟasa Paradiso, kaicho maṙeṙo galekyeiṙima iṙeṙo, galakyeri sungusinyi mndu igaṙeṙa.
47012005	Ko mbonyi tsa mndu cha icho ngyekushela; kyaindi kyipfa kyako ngyekushela-pfo, sile mbonyinyi tsa wufofo woko.
47012006	Kyipfa kokooya ngyiwekundi ikushela ngyiwechiwa tondo-pfo, kyipfa ngyegamba loi. Kyaindi ngyekushela-pfo, kundu mndu alachengyitalyia ngoseṟa ya isho awonyi koko ang'u ishiicho koko.
47012007	Na kyimaṙuma ngyilaiṙime ikushela na ielewetsa kyipfa kya shilya ngyileshukuyo, ngyileenengo kyindo kyewawiṟa mmbiu mbaṟe ya msha, kyindo kyikyeri cha mndu amṙume nyi Satana kundu nangyikape, ngyilachekushela na ielewetsa.
47012008	Kyipfa kya kyindo-kyo ngyileterewa Mndumii kaṟaaṟu kye kyingyiwukye.
47012009	Na oe kangyiwia, “Isaṟia lyako lyikushikyie; kyipfa wuiṙimi woko wokyeafukyia wufofonyi.” Kyasia ngyekushelyia wufofo woko kui sia ing'anyi, kundu wuiṙimi wo Kristo wukae na inyi.
47012010	Koikyo ngyichihiṟo nyi wufofo, shilahio, ngyuukyiwa tsa orio mbaṟe, kyipfa kya Kristo. Kyipfa kyiyeri ngyikyeri mfofo nyi lyo-ndu ngyiwoṙe pfinya.
47012011	Ngawa tondo, nyi nyoe mulengyitewe. Kyipfa kyiwekyiwaṟi nyoe mungyiṟumishe, kyipfa kuwoṙe kyindo wasu wang'anyi walengyiiṟa nakyo-pfo, maa chandu ngyilakyeri kyindo.
47012012	Nyi loi shiṟingyishio shekyeoshana na wasu shileṟundika konyu kui wusimiri woose, kui shiṟingyishio na maṟiyisho na ṟigo.
47012013	Kyipfa nyi kyikyi muleuṟa kuta siṟi tsingyi, sile nyi ilyi ngyilalewa ṟio konyu? Ngamuterewa mungyihooṟie wuwicho-wu.
47012014	Ambuyenyi kye nyi lya kaṟaaṟu inyi ngyikuṟeyeṟie icha na konyu, maa ngyechiwa ṟio konyu-pfo. Kyipfa ngyipfula masaa ganyu-pfo, indi ngyimupfula nyoe; kyipfa kyiwaṟi wana ikooma kyiseyesoe ko wafee-pfo, indi wafee ko wana.
47012015	Na inyi kui sia ing'anyi ngyikuṟeyeṟie iwuta kyoose ngyiwoṙe, maa ikuwuta inyi ngyimonyi kyipfa kya mrima yanyu. Ngyesa mongyikunda kyitutu kyipfa kya ilyi inyi ngyimukundi mnu-pfoe?
47012016	Kyaindi kyikuwiie kuṙo, inyi ngyilewa ṟio konyu-pfo; indi nyoe muigamba kye kui iwa mṟango ngyilewawaṙa kui ngyeṟo.
47012017	Ngyesa kuwoṙe mndu oose ngyilemṙuma konyu, ngammbia namtose kyindo?
47012018	Ngyileikyimbia Tito, ngaṙuma mono-wama ulya hamwi na oe. Ngyesa Tito nalemtosa kyindo? Ngyesa lulechumia kui Mumuyo ulya ulya na ndifonyi tsilya tsilya-pfoe?
47012019	Mokusaṟa kye maa wulalu luṙeṙa mbonyi tsekuringa konyu! Mbele ya Ruwa luiṙeṙa kyiiṙi kya Kristo. Na isho shoose, wakunde, nyi kyipfa kya imukarisha nyoe.
47012020	Kyipfa ngiowuo, ngyilachemukooya chandu ngyilakundi imukooya mukongyiwona konyu chandu mulawekusurie ingyiwona ngyilachekooya kofia nyi wuṟiingyi na wunyeng'i, na nyashi, na maluyano, na iiriana wongo, na iṙeṙana, na makushelo, na kyituṟu.
47012021	Na inyi ilyi ngyechicha-se, Ruwa oko alachengyienenga irigo nyi sonu konyu, na inyi ngyisuo kyipfa kya wafoi waleṙeko wookyia iho, walaṙumbuye wunyamaṟi wo ukoe, na wuṟui, na lango tsingyi tsa sonu.
47013001	Nyi kamba lya kaṟaaṟu inyi icha na konyu. Kui maṙumbu ga waṟingyishi wawi ang'u waṟaaṟu orio ṙeṙo lyechimanyika na pata.
47013002	Ngasonguo immbia, na chandu ngyiwekyeri ho lya kawi, na wuṙo maa wulalu ngyilakyeri ho, ngyimmbia na pata iwo walewuta sha wunyamaṟi wookyia kyiyeri-kyo, na wengyi woose, kye ngacha, ngyehooṟia-pfo.
47013003	Cha kyipfa muipfula chandu Kristo akyeri, icho aiṙeṙa mrimenyi koko, ulya alakyeri mfofo konyu, indi nawoṙe pfinya mrimenyi konyu.
47013004	Kyipfa nalewoogio msalabenyi, wufafenyi, kyaindi nai na moo kui pfinya tsa Ruwa. Kyipfa maa soe lukyeri wafafa kyiiṙi kyakye; indi lochikaa na moo hamwi na oe kui pfinya tsa Ruwa.
47013005	Kuruwe-ruwenyi muwenyi kye mukyeri iiṙikyienyi. Kuṟingyishienyi muwenyi. Ang'u muichi muwenyi kye Yesu Kristo nakyeri mrimenyi konyu? Sile molego.
47013006	Kyaindi ngyikusurie kye momanya kye soe lulelego-pfo.
47013007	Na soe luiterewa Ruwa, maa mulawute kyindo kyoose kyiwicho. Chi kundu soe lukuloṟe kye luwaiṙikyie-pfo, indi nyoe muwute kyilya kyikyicha, maa chandu soe lukyeri cha wandu walelego.
47013008	Kyipfa loiṙima iwuta kyindo kyoose kyilakyeri kya loi-pfo, indi kyipfa kya wuloi.
47013009	Kyipfa luchihiyo, kokooya soe lukyeri wafofo, na nyoe muwoṙe pfinya. Lyingyi-se loterewa muwe wandu waafutsie kyiiṙikyia.
47013010	Kyipfa kya ikyo, ngyiṟeia ishi ngyilakyeri ho, kundu ngyikyeri ho, ngyilaṟunde kui wuchilyi wulya ngyileenengo nyi Mndumii, kui ikarisha mrima maa chi iinyamaṟa-pfo.
47013011	Numa ya iho, wana wa wama, nakonyu. Muafutsie, muwiyiṟio moo. Kusurienyi kyimwi, mukae ufoṟonyi. Na Ruwa o ikunda na ufoṟo nechikaa hamwi na nyoe.
47013012	Iṟikyiṟanenyi chandu walya waiṙikyie Yesu wekyeiṟikyiṟana.
47013013	Wandu wa Ruwa woose wamuiṟikyiṟa.
47013014	Isaṟia lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo, na ikunda lya Ruwa, na isanza lya Mumuyo Mweele, lyikae na nyoe moose.
48001001	Inyi Paulo, ngaṟeia paruo-i, ngyikyeri msu (chi msu o wandu maa amṙume nyi mndu-pfo, indi amṙume nyi Yesu Kristo, na Ruwa Awu alemṟutsa iwuka ko wapfu),
48001002	na woose waiṙikyie Yesu wakyeri hamwi na inyi loiṟikyiṟa siṟi tsoose tsa Galatia.
48001003	Isaṟia lyikae konyu, na ufoṟo, shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu, na ko Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
48001004	Ulya alereka mrima okye kyipfa kya ngyuunyamaṟi tsaṙu, kundu nalukyiṟe mawicho ga kunu wuyanenyi lukyeri wulalu, chandu Ruwa, Awu oṙu, alekunda.
48001005	Kyiṟumi kyikae na oe, mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
48001006	Ngyimṟiyie kyipfa muiṙa iwinyi kuṙo ulya alemulaga isaṟienyi lya Kristo, na igalukyia malosho ga mbaṟe ingyi gaigambo kye nyi ndumi ngyicha.
48001007	Kuwoṙe ndumi ngyicha ingyi-pfo; kyaindi kuwoṙe wandu waipfuṟukana wakundi iilacha Ndumi Ngyicha ya Yesu Kristo.
48001008	Kyaindi kokooya soe ang'u malaika o ruwewu amulosha shindo shingyi shilakyeri shilya lumuongoya, nawusio kyiseso.
48001009	Chandu lulesonguo igamba, na wulalu ngyigamba-se, mndu oose kamuongoya ndumi ngyicha ingyi ilakyeri iya muleambilyia koṙu, mndu-cho nawusio kyiseso.
48001010	Kyipfa wulalu ngyesa ngyikundi ikundo nyi wandu? Ote! Kyindo ngyikundi nyi ikundo nyi Ruwa. Kyipfa kokooya ngyiwekundi mṟasa wulalu ichihiṟa wandu, ngyiwechiwa mṟundi o Kristo-pfo.
48001011	Cha kyipfa, wana wa wama wako, Ndumi-yo Ngyicha ngyilemuongoya, ngyimmbia kye ilewuka ko wandu-pfo.
48001012	Cha kyipfa ngyileiambilyia ko wandu, maa ilosho nyi mndu-pfo, indi kui ishukuyo nyi Yesu Kristo.
48001013	Kyipfa muleicho mbonyi tsa mkaṟo yako wookyia mawookyionyi kyiyeri ngyiwekyeindia Ruwa chandu Wayuda wekyemwindia; kye ngyilelyisa Siṟi ya Mndumii wukyiwa wuelewetsie, ngyetambagana iinyamaṟa.
48001014	Na inyi wandunyi wa rika lyako inyi ngyiwekyeri mbele kuta wengyi kyipfuṟukanionyi kyeindia Ruwa chandu Wayuda wekyemwindia, ngatambagana mnu iosha shilya ngyileambilyia ko waku wako.
48001015	Kyaindi Ruwa alengyisaanga wookyia wosinyi ko wama oko, kangyilaga kui isaṟia lyakye;
48001016	kyiyeri alewona nyi necha iṟingyishia Mono-kye mrimenyi koko, kundu ngyiongoye walya walaiṙikyie Yesu mbonyi tsakye; maa ngyileyenda ko mndu oose immbesa kyindo-pfo.
48001017	Maa ngyilekunda iyenda Yerusalemu ko walya walengyisongoya iwa wasu-pfo; indi ngyileyenda uruka lo Waarabu na numa ya iho ngawuya-se na Dameskyi.
48001018	Numa ya iho; hamwiṙe maka iṟaṟu, ngaṙo iyenda Yerusalemu kundu ngyiwonane na Kyefa, ngakaa kokye mfiri ikumi na itanu.
48001019	Kyaindi ngyilewona msu ungyi sile Yakobo, mono-wama o Mndumii-pfo.
48001020	Na isho ngyimuṟeia nyoe, ambuyenyi, mbele ya Ruwa, ngyiṙeṙa wongo-pfo.
48001021	Numa ya iho ngyileyenda ngyuura tsa Shamu na Kyilyikyia.
48001022	Kyaindi ngyilewono kyaam kyako nyi siṟi tsa Uyuda tsiwekyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo-pfo;
48001023	indi waleicho tupu kye icho mfiri ya ipfo numa awekyewalyisa wukyiwa, wulalu naionguo mbonyi tsa iiṙikyia alelyinyamaṟa ilyi kacha.
48001024	Wakaṟumisha Ruwa kyipfa kyako.
48002001	Numa ya iho, hamwiṙe maka ikumi na ina, ngaṙo-se iyenda Yerusalemu ngyiṙuṙanyi na Barinaba na Tito.
48002002	Na inyi ngyileyenda kyipfa ngyileshukuyo ngawia wandu Ndumi Ngyicha iya ngyekyeongoya walya walakyeri Wayuda, kyaindi kui kyiṟika ko walya wawoṙe kyiṟumi, kyilacheewa kofia ngyiṙicha wulya, ang'u ngyileṙicha wulya.
48002003	Kyaindi Tito awekyeri hamwi na inyi, na oe nyi Mkyiṟikyi, aleitiko iṙino-pfo.
48002004	Indi kyipfa kya wandu walekuloṟa kye waiṙikyie Yesu na kunu waweiṙikyie-pfo, wandu walekulunga na soe kui kyiṟika kundu wamanye mbonyi tsaṙu soe lulawachilyie nyi kyindo kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu, kundu ilyi numa waluwikye wusingyenyi.
48002005	Kyaindi kyipfa kya iringa ulogo lo Ndumi Ngyicha luleiṙikyia waluchilyie maa ale-pfo, kundu wuloi wo Ndumi Ngyicha wukae na nyoe.
48002006	Kyaindi walya wawoṙe kyiṟumi na kye wawoṙe rina (ngyilesaṟa wawei kuṙa-pfo kyipfa koko shilyingananyi shoose; na Ruwa ekyeambuya kyaam kya mndu-pfo); ngagamba iwo wawoṙe kyiṟumi walengyiengyeṟia kyindo-pfo.
48002007	Indi kyilaṙuṙanyi na isho, kyiyeri walewona kye ngyimṙambikye Ndumi Ngyicha ya wandu walakyeri Wayuda, chandu Petiro aleṙambiko Ndumi Ngyicha ya Wayuda;
48002008	(kyipfa ulya aleenenga Petiro wuiṙimi wo iwa Msu o Wayuda nyi oe alengyienenga na inyi wuiṙimi wo iyenda ko walya walakyeri Wayuda.)
48002009	Lyingyi-se kyiyeri walemanya isaṟia lyilya ngyileenengo; Yakobo, na Kyefa, na Yohane, wawoṙe kyiṟumi kye nyi ngoe, waleiṙikyia iṟunda hamwi na inyi na Barinaba; kundu soe luyende ko walya walakyeri Wayuda, nawo wayende ko Wayuda.
48002010	Indi waleluwia luwute kyindo kyimwi, lutarame wakyiwa, na ikyo ngyilekyiṟunda kui wuragari.
48002011	Kyaindi kyiyeri Kyefa alecha na Antiokyia, ngyilegaluana na oe ushangu kui ushangu, kyipfa nawewaṟi ianduyo.
48002012	Cha kyipfa kyiyeri wandu waata wawukyie ko Yakobo walawendeche, naweilya handu hamwi na wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu; kyaindi kyiyeri wo walecha, kawuya na numa, kalekana nawo, kunu echiowuo Wayuda.
48002013	Na Wayuda-wo, wengyi wakaowuo hamwi na oe, mṟasa na Barinaba kawaṙa wukulembecheṟi chawo.
48002014	Kyaindi, kyiyeri ngyilewona kye mkaṟo yawo iṙuṙanyi necha na wuloi wo Ndumi Ngyicha-pfo, ngyilewia Kyefa mbele ya wandu woose, “Kokooya iyoe ukyeri Myuda nuosha miichiwie ya wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu, maa chi ya Wayuda-pfo, ny'kyilyi uitika wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu iosha miichiwie ya Wayuda?”
48002015	Soe lukyeri Wayuda kui ifeo, maa chi waṙeko wawukyie ko walya walakyeri Wayuda-pfo,
48002016	luichi kye mndu ekyetalyio wusumganyi kui mawuto ga mawawaso-pfo, indi kui iwaṙa iiṙikyia kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu. Soe luleiṙikyia Kristo Yesu kundu lutalyio wusumganyi kui iiṙikyia Kristo, maa chi kui mawuto ga mawawaso-pfo; kyipfa kui mawuto ga mawawaso kuwoṙe mndu echitalyio wusumganyi-pfo.
48002017	Kyaindi kokooya soe luwenyi, kui ipfula italyio wusumganyi kyiiṙi kya Kristo, lulewono kye luwanyamaṟi, ngyesa Kristo nawa mṟundi o wunyamaṟi? Ote!
48002018	Kyipfa ngawika-se shilya ngyilemshiunduo, ngaloṟa kye inyi ngyimonyi nyi mṙeko.
48002019	Kyipfa inyi ko mbonyi tsa mawawaso ngyipfiie kundu ngyiwaṙe moo kyipfa kya Ruwa.
48002020	Ngyilekapio msalabenyi hamwi na Kristo; kyaindi ngyiwoṙe moo; maa chi inyi-se-pfo, indi Kristo nai na moo mrimenyi koko. Na moo ngyiwoṙe wulalu mmbiunyi ngyiuwoṙe kyiiṙi kya iiṙikyia Mana o Ruwa, ulya alengyikunda kareka moo okye kyipfa kyako.
48002021	Ngyikundi iwiyitsa kuleshi ikunda lya Ruwa ko wandu-pfo; kyipfa kokooya wusumganyi wokyewono kui njia ya mawawaso, kyasia Kristo nalepfa wulya.
48003001	Lanyoe Wagalatia mulawoṙe wuṟango, nyi wui alemloga, nyoe walya Yesu Kristo alemuloṟa na pata kye nalekapio msalabenyi?
48003002	Ngyikundi ikulosha kyindo kyimwi konyu. Ngyesa muleambilyia Mumuyo Mweele kui mawuto ga mawawaso ang'u kui iicho Ndumi Ngyicha na iiṙikyia Yesu?
48003003	Ngyesa mulewa matondo mbaṟe-i iyi? Mommbookye kui Mumuyo, mukundi iafutsia kui pfinya tsanyu muwenyi?
48003004	Ngyesa molya wukyiwa wung'anyi kuṙi wulya? Loi chi wulya-pfo. Kyilya kyilemmbutikyia kyiwaṟi imuenenga ikusaṟa chandu kyiweng'anyi.
48003005	Kyasia, ulya ekyemuenenga Mumuyo na iwuta shindo sha maṟiyisho kyiiṙi kyanyu, ngyesa nekyewuta kuṙo kui mawuto ga mawawaso, ang'u kui iicho Ndumi Ngyicha yekyeende iiṙikyia Yesu?
48003006	Chandu Abrahamu aleiṙikyia Ruwa katalyio wusumganyi.
48003007	Kyasia manyenyi-ng'u kye walya wawoṙe iiṙikyia, iwo nyiwo wana wa Abrahamu.
48003008	Na kyiṟeio kyiele, chandu kyilewona wookyia kacha kye Ruwa nechitalyia wusumganyi walya walaiṙikyie Yesu kui iiṙikyia, kyileongoya Abrahamu Mbonyi Ngyicha kyiyeri kya kacha igamba, “Kyiiṙi kyapfo iyoe walya walaiṙikyie Yesu wechiwona mboṟa.”
48003009	Kyasia iwo wakyeri wa iiṙikyia wekyewona mboṟa hamwi na Abrahamu awekyeri mndu awoṙe iiṙikyia.
48003010	Cha kyipfa woose wakyeri wa mawuto ga mawawaso, wakyeri kyisesonyi; kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, “Namsese ulya alekyeosha shindo shoose shikyeri kyitapunyi kya uwawaso.”
48003011	Nyi kyindo kyiichio na pata kye kuwoṙe mndu ekyetalyio wusumganyi mbele ya Ruwa kui mawawaso-pfo; cha kyipfa, “Mndu msumganyi nechiwaṙa moo kui iiṙikyia.”
48003012	Na uwawaso lulecha kui iiṙikyia-pfo, indi, “Ekyewuta isho nechiwaṙa moo kyiiṙi kya isho.”
48003013	Kristo naleluwuta kyisesonyi kya uwawaso, cha kyipfa naleseso kyipfa kyaṙu; kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, “Orio mndu amkapie msalabenyi namsese.”
48003014	Kundu kye mboṟa ya Abrahamu ikooye walya walaiṙikyie Yesu kyiiṙi kya Yesu Kristo, luiṙime iambilyia kyaasa kya Mumuyo kui njia ya iiṙikyia.
48003015	Wana wa wama wako, ngyiṙeṙa kyimndu. Maa chandu kyikyeri nyi kyaasa kya wandu, kyaasa kyikammbiko, kuwoṙe mokyiilacha ang'u ikyiengyeṟa-pfo.
48003016	Kyasia Abrahamu naleenengo shaasa hamwi na ulya alemfee. Aigamba, “Ko walya alefee” cha ilyi nyi wafoi-pfo, indi cha ilyi nyi umwi, “Ko ulya ochimfee,” kyimwi na igamba Kristo.
48003017	Kyindo ngyigamba nyi ikyi, kyaasa kyilewiko mawookyionyi nyi Ruwa, uwawaso lulecha maka magana gaana na makumi gaṟaaṟu numa ya kyaasa-kyo loiṙima iilacha kyaasa-kyo-pfo.
48003018	Cha kyipfa kyioṟa kyikawa nyi kui mawawaso, kyikyewa-se kyaasa-pfo; kyaindi Ruwa nalesaṟia Abrahamu kui njia ya kyaasa.
48003019	Kyasia uwawaso nyi kyikyi-ng'u? Uwawaso luleṙiko kyipfa kya maṙeko, mṟasa nache icho amwenengye kyaasa-kyo; kyaasa kyileendo nyi malaika kyiyeri Mose alewa mndu Ruwa alemṙuma ko wandu.
48003020	Kyasia ulya akyeri moṙumo chi moṙumo ko mndu umwi-pfo; indi Ruwa nyi umwi.
48003021	Kyasia, ngyesa uwawaso lokyewingana na shaasa sha Ruwa? Ote! Cha kyipfa kokooya mawawaso gekyeende moo galaleṙiko, loi wusumganyi wuwechiwono kui mawawaso.
48003022	Kyaindi kyiṟeio kyiele kyagamba kye wuyana woose wuwuchilyie nyi wunyamaṟi kundu iwo waiṙikyie waenengo kyaasa kui iiṙikyia waenengo kyaasa-kyo kui iiṙikyia Yesu Kristo.
48003023	Kyaindi kyiyeri iiṙikyia lyilya lyilawendeche luwewachilyie nyi mawawaso, lukowa cha wandu wakyeri kyipfungonyi, mṟasa kyiyeri kyeiṙikyia Yesu kyechicha, kyiyeri Ruwa echiloṟa.
48003024	Koikyo uwawaso lowa msongoru moluende na ko Kristo, kundu lutalyio wusumganyi kui iiṙikyia.
48003025	Kyaindi kokooya iiṙikyia lyilemcha, lukyeri-se wanda ya msongoru-pfo.
48003026	Cha kyipfa nyoe moose mowa wana wa Ruwa kui njia ya iiṙikyia Kristo Yesu.
48003027	Kyipfa nyoe moose muwapatise kyiiṙi kya Kristo muṟee Kristo.
48003028	Kuwoṙe-se Myuda maa Mkyiṟikyi-pfo. Kuwoṙe-se mtumo ang'u alakyeri mtumo-pfo. Kuwoṙe-se mndu msoṟo maa mndu mka-pfo. Kyipfa nyoe moose mowa kyindo kyimwi kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
48003029	Na kokooya nyoe nyi wandu wa Kristo, kyasia mowa wana wa Abrahamu, na weoṟa iṙuana na kyaasa.
48004001	Kyaindi ngagamba kye mokyioṟa, kyiyeri kyoose ai mana, nakyeri cha mtumo, kyiyeri awuye ammbiie kyindo echioṟa.
48004002	Indi nakyeri wuchilyinyi wo walya wawawikye wamwambuye na imwenenga shilya akundi mṟasa kyiyeri awuye echigamba kye kuwoṙe-se kyimaṙuma kyewika wandu weambuya mokyioṟa-cho-pfo.
48004003	Na wuṙo na soe, kyiyeri luwekyeri wana watutu, lukowa watumo wa mumuyo ichilyie wuyana.
48004004	Na lyilya kyiyeri kyilya kyiwekyikunde kyileafukyia, Ruwa naleṙuma Mono-kye, ulya alefeo nyi mndu mka, nafeo wuchilyinyi wo mawawaso,
48004005	kundu nakyiṟe walya wawewachilyie nyi mawawaso, kundu soe luiṙime iambilyia iwa wana.
48004006	Na kyipfa nyoe mowa wana, Ruwa naleṙuma Mumuyo o Mono-kye mrimenyi konyu, ekyegamba, “Aba,” kyimwi na igamba Awu.
48004007	Kokooya nyi wuṙo, iyoe chi mtumo-se-pfo indi nukyeri mana; na kokooya nukyeri mana, kyasia nukyeri mokyioṟa ko Ruwa.
48004008	Kyaindi kyiyeri kyilya, kyipfa mulaweichi Ruwa, muleṟundia shindo shilakyeri waruwa.
48004009	Indi wulalu mommanye Ruwa, ang'u ngoseṟa Ruwa imumanya nyoe, nyi kyikyi kyitewe kyewiyilyia malosho ga mawookyionyi gamafofo, gai mti, galya mukundi igaṟundia-se?
48004010	Mokyekuwinisha na mfiri, na mori, na shiyeri, na maka.
48004011	Ngyikusaṟa mnu kyipfa kyanyu, kyilawe kofia ngyilekuwinisha wulya kyipfa kyanyu.
48004012	Wana wa wama wako, ngamterewa, muwe cha inyi, kyipfa inyi nyi cha nyoe. Mulengyilyiia mbaka kyindonyi kyoose-pfo.
48004013	Kyaindi muichi kye ngyilemuongoya Ndumi Ngyicha lya kuwooka kyipfa kya wufafa wo mmbiu.
48004014	Na kyiyesho kyilempaaya nyoe mmbiunyi oko mulekyimina maa ikyilega-pfo, indi mulengyiambilyia cha malaika o Ruwa, cha Kristo Yesu.
48004015	Kyasia, nyi kyikyi kyammbutikye kyeiṙima igaluo ishi shoose? Kyipfa ngyiṟingyishia kye, kokooya kyiwechiiṙimika, muwekuluo meso ganyu, mungyienengye inyi.
48004016	Ngyesa ngawa mokyituwa onyu kyipfa ngyimmbia shikyeri sha loi?
48004017	Iwo wawoṙe ilanga lying'anyi kyipfa kyanyu, kyaindi chi kui njia ngyicha-pfo, indi wakundi imshingyia nja, kundu kye nyoe muwalangye wo.
48004018	Na nyi kyindo kyicha iwaṙa wunyeng'i kyipfa kya kyindo kyicha mfiri yoose, maa chi kyiyeri ngyikyeri na nyoe tupu-pfo.
48004019	Mbuya tsako wakunde, walya kyipfa kyawo ngyiwoṙe iwawio lying'anyi mrimenyi mṟasa muwe cha Kristo;
48004020	ngyilangyie kui mrima oko oose ikaa halya-ndu mukyeri wulalu, kundu ngyiilachikye na iloṟa lyako chandu ngyimukundi.
48004021	Ngyiwienyi, nyoe mukundi ichilyio nyi mawawaso. Ngyesa mokyeicho kyindo mawawaso gagamba-pfoe?
48004022	Cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie kye Abrahamu nawewoṙe wana wawi, umwi alefee na kyisinga, na umwi na mka o wolyi.
48004023	Kyaindi mana ulya o kyisinga nalefeo kui mmbiu, na ulya o mka o wolyi kui kyaasa.
48004024	Shindo-shi shekyeṙeṙo kui mfano; cha kyipfa iwa wawi nyi cha mma ya mbaṟe tsiwi; mma umwi iwuka fumvu lya Sinai, okyewaṙa wana kui wusinga, na mma-cho nyi Hajiri.
48004025	Kyipfa Hajiri nyi cha fumvu lya Sinai lyikyeri urukyenyi lo Waarabu, lyilyingananyi na Yerusalemu ya wulalu; cha kyipfa nekyeṟunda hamwi na wana.
48004026	Indi Yerusalemu ya wuye nyi mka ulya o wolyi, na oe nyi oe wama oṙu soe.
48004027	Cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, “Chihiyo, iyoe muumba, ulekyewaṙa wana; kuilengye na ṟui lying'anyi, ufiiṟe, iyoe ulawoṙe fowa cha ya mndu mka aienengo mana. Kyipfa wana wa ulya amṙe amonyi nyi wafoi kuta wa ulya awoṙe mii.”
48004028	Kyasia, wana wa wama wako, cha Isakyi, soe nyi wana wa kyaasa.
48004029	Kyaindi chandu kyiyeri kyilya ulya alefeo kui mmbiu alelyisa wukyiwa ulya alefeo kui Mumuyo, nyi wuṙo kyikyeri maa wulalu.
48004030	Kyaindi kyiṟeio kyiele kyagamba kuṙa? “Funa kyisinga na mono-kyo, cha kyipfa mana o kyisinga echioṟa maa ale hamwi na mana o mka o wolyi-pfo.”
48004031	Koikyo, wana wa wama wako, soe chi wana wa kyisinga-pfo indi nyi wana wa ulya ai mka o wolyi.
48005001	Kyiiṙi kya iwa wana wa mka o wolyi Kristo nalelugaluo wandu walakyeri wuchilyinyi wo kyindo kyoose. Koikyo maa mulalolome, maa ichilyio-se nyi wutumo.
48005002	Inyi Paulo ngammbia nyoe kye, mukoṙino, Kristo echiwaṙa kyiira konyu-pfo.
48005003	Lyingyi-se ngyiṟingyishia orio mndu ekyeṙino kye nyi iṟunda lyakye iafutsia uwawaso loose.
48005004	Muwasaangye nyi Kristo, nyoe mukundi italyio wusumganyi kui mawawaso, mooloka na iwuka isaṟienyi.
48005005	Kyipfa soe kui Mumuyo luiweṙelyia ikusuria lya wusumganyi kui njia ya iiṙikyia.
48005006	Kyipfa kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu iṙino, maa iṙa iṙino lyiwoṙe kyiira kyoose-pfo, indi iiṙikyia lyekyeṟunda kui ikunda.
48005007	Muweitambagana necha; nyi wui alemushingyia mulaindie wuloi?
48005008	Chi Ruwa alemushingyia-pfo, kyipfa nyi oe ekyemlaga muyende kokye.
48005009	Chachu kyitung'tu yekyetarang'isha itongye lyoose.
48005010	Kyiiṙi kya Mndumii ngyikusaṟie kye moiṙima iwaṙa makusaṟo ga mbaṟe ingyi-pfo. Kyaindi mndu oose aimuenenga wuowu nechianduyo.
48005011	Na inyi, wana wa wama wako, kokooya ngyionguo mbonyi tsa iṙino, ny'kyilyi ngyilyiso wukyiwa mṟasa wulalu? Kokooya ngyiweionguo kuṙo ilosha lyako kye Kristo nalepfa msalabenyi lyiwewa lya wulya.
48005012	Ngyiwechihiyo mnu kokooya iwo waimfoga-foga wawekuletsana na nyoe nakamwi.
48005013	Kyipfa nyoe, wana wa wama, mulelago muwe wandu mulawachilyie nyi kyindo. Kyaindi kulya iwa wandu walawachilyie nyi kyindo kulawe kyimaṙuma kyeosha lango tsa mmbiu, indi ṟundianenyi kui ikunda.
48005014	Kyipfa uwawaso loose lukyeri kyindonyi kyimwi tupu, nakyo nyi ikyi, “Ukunde momṟasa opfo chandu ukukundi kumonyi.”
48005015	Kyaindi mukowika cha mando ga saka, ambuyenyi mularumatsane.
48005016	Kyasia ngagamba, chilyionyi nyi Mumuyo Mweele; maa mulawute kyilya mrima yanyu ikundi tupu.
48005017	Cha kyipfa mmbiu okyelanga ochiwingana na Mumuyo, na Mumuyo iwingana na mmbiu; kyipfa ishi shekyeṙuana-pfo, na moiṙima iwuta shilya mukundi-pfo.
48005018	Kyaindi mukosongoyo nyi Mumuyo, mukyeri wuchilyinyi wo mawawaso-pfo.
48005019	Kyasia mawuto ga mmbiu gai na pata, nyigo iga: wuṟui, ukoe na lango tsa sonu,
48005020	iindia mafano, wusawi, isuana, iluyana, wunyeng'i, nyashi, wuṟiingyi, nduutsano, iṙeṙa wongo.
48005021	Wunanzi, ilya na ielewetsa, na shindo shifananyi na isho; kyiiṙi kya isho ngammbia kulawoṙe ikyelyio, chandu ngyilemummbia kye wandu wekyewuta shindo sha mbaṟe-yo wechioṟa Wumangyi wo Ruwa-pfo.
48005022	Kyaindi ndunda tsa Mumuyo nyi ikunda, sia, ufoṟo, ikarishia, kyiṙo kyicha, itarama wakyeri wukyiwenyi, iwuta kyilya mndu ateṟia,
48005023	wuhoo, iwaṙa meena. Kuwoṙe iwawaso lya mbonyi tsa shindo cha isho-pfo.
48005024	Na iwo wakyeri wa Kristo Yesu wekyechilyio-se nyi lango tsa mmbiu yawo-pfo.
48005025	Mumuyo naluenengyie moo, koikyo lumwenengye momu o iluchilyia.
48005026	Maa lulakushele wulya, lochisouana na iwoniana wunyeng'i.
48006001	Wana wa wama wako, mndu kaasha kyindonyi kyoose, nyoe mukyeri wa Mumuyo mmbiyiṟenyi kui ngoo ya wuhoo, ochikuringa mrima opfo ulacheyesho.
48006002	Taramanenyi na iosha iwawaso lya Kristo.
48006003	Kyipfa mndu kakuwona kye nyi kyindo, na oe chi kyindo-pfo, nakulemba mrimenyi kokye.
48006004	Kyaindi orio mndu naeneng'ene iṟunda lyakye amonyi, nyi lyo-ndu eiṙima iwaṙa kyimaṙuma kyekushela mrimenyi kokye tupu, maa chi ko oṙoe-pfo.
48006005	Kyipfa orio mndu nechikuṙika mlari okye amonyi.
48006006	Manalosho naongoye mlosha okye shindo shicha shoose.
48006007	Maa mulakulembe, Ruwa chi tondo-pfo; cha kyipfa kyilya mndu awaaya nyikyo echisambuo.
48006008	Kyipfa ulya awaaya kui mmbiu okye, mmbiunyi okye nechisambuo wunyamaṟi; indi ulya awaaya kui Mumuyo, Mumuyonyi nechisambuo moo o mlungana.
48006009	Lyingyi-se maa lulalemo iwuta shindo shicha; kyipfa lochisambuo ilyi kyiyeri kyechishika, lulandewine.
48006010	Koikyo iṙuana na chandu lowona ṙaawa luwutie wandu shindo shicha; ngoseṟa walya waiṙikyie Yesu.
48006011	Chandu inyi ngyimonyi ngyimuṟeia paruo wulalu,
48006012	woose wakundi iwono kye nyi wandu wecha ko mbonyi tsa mmbiu nyiwo waimuitika iṙino; kundu walalyiso wukyiwa nyi msalaba o Kristo tikyi.
48006013	Cha kyipfa maa walya wawaṙine wekyeosha kyilya mawawaso gakundi-pfo; indi wakundi nyoe muṙino, waiṙime ikushelyia mmbiu yanyu.
48006014	Kyaindi inyi, ote, ngyilakushelyie kyindo kyoose sile msalaba o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, ulya ulengyienenga inyi iṙa iosha mbonyi tsa wuyana.
48006015	Cha kyipfa iṙino ang'u iṙa iṙino chi kyindo-pfo, indi kyindo kying'anyi nyi iwa mndu mhya.
48006016	Na woose wechiwaṙa mkaṟo iṙuṙanyi na ikyo, ufoṟo lukae kowo na iwoniana wukyiwa, yee ko wandu woose wa Ruwa.
48006017	Wookyia wulalu mndu alangyilyise wukyiwa; cha kyipfa ngyiṙuṙe ngoru tsa Kristo mmbiunyi koko.
48006018	Wana wa wama wako, isaṟia lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo lyikae hamwi na mrima yanyu. Amen.
49001001	Inyi Paulo, ngyikyeri msu o Kristo Yesu chandu Ruwa akundi, ngaṟeia paruo-i konyu nyoe wandu wa Ruwa wakyeri [Efeso] waiṙikyie Kristo Yesu.
49001002	Isaṟia lyikae konyu na ufoṟo shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu oṙu na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
49001003	Ruwa naṟumisho, Awu o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, aleluwikyia mboṟa kui mboṟa tsoose tsa mrimenyi, wuyanenyi wo mumuyo, kyiiṙi kya Kristo.
49001004	Chandu alelusambuṟa kyiiṙi kyakye kyiyeri wuyana wulawendegumbo, kundu luwe wandu wa Ruwa, wandu walawoṙe mti mbele yakye ikundenyi.
49001005	Cha kyipfa nalesonguo ilusambuṟa, kundu nalugaluo wana wakye kui njia ya Yesu Kristo, iṙuana na kyilya akundi.
49001006	Mng'ano o isaṟia lyakye uṟumisho, alelusaṟia kyiiṙi kya icho Mkunde.
49001007	Kyiiṙi kyakye kui samu yakye, luwoṙe wukyiro woṙu, ihooṟio wunyamaṟi, iṙuana na isaṟia lyakye lying'anyi.
49001008	Na oe naleluengyeṟia ikyo wuṟangonyi woose na wunyotsu;
49001009	amluloṟe kyiṟika kya kyilya akundi, iṙuana na kyilya akundi kyiiṙi kya icho.
49001010	Nyi kyimwi na igamba kye, iende wusongoru wo kyiyeri kyiafukyie nesanzia handu hamwi shindo shoose kyiiṙi kya Kristo, shindo sha ruwewu na shindo sha wuyanenyi taa. Yee, kyiiṙi kya icho.
49001011	Na kyiiṙi kyakye soe taa lulewiko kyioṟa, kunu lochisambuṟo wookyia mawookyionyi iṙuana na kyilya oe akundi, ekyewuta shindo shoose iṙuana na kyilya akundi.
49001012	Na soe kyiiṙi kya icho luiṙime iwa kyiṟumi kya mng'ano okye, soe lulesonguo iwikyia Kristo ikusuria lyaṙu.
49001013	Na nyoe taa kyiiṙi kya icho momuicho ulogo lo loi, Ndumi Ngyicha ya wukyiṟo wonyu. Lyingyi-se momumwiṙikyia oe, na iwiko fana nyi Mumuyo ulya o kyaasa akyeri Mweele.
49001014	Nyi oe akyeri mogoṟokyia kyioṟa kyaṙu, kundu naende wukyiṟo wo Wumangyi wokye, wuwe kyiṟumi na mng'ano okye.
49001015	Kyipfa kya ikyo maa inyi, wookyia ngyileicho mbonyi tsa iiṙikyia lyanyu kyiiṙi kya Mndumii Yesu, na ikunda lyanyu ko wandu wa Ruwa woose,
49001016	ngyekyeṙa iana kyipfa kyanyu-pfo; ngyemukumbuo shiterewonyi shako.
49001017	Ruwa o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, Awu o mng'ano, namuenengye nyoe Mumuyo o wunyotsu na o ishukuyo kui Mumuyo kyiiṙi kya immanya oe.
49001018	Ruwa naṟuguo mrima yanyu iiṙime iwona, mumanye ikusuria lya ilaga lyakye chandu lyikyeri; na wusuṟi wo mng'ano wo kyioṟa kyakye wandunyi wa Ruwa chandu wukyeri.
49001019	Na wucha wo wung'anyi wo wuiṙimi wokye mrimenyi koṙu luiṙikyie chandu wukyeri; kui iṙuana na iwuta lya pfinya tsa wuiṙimi wokye;
49001020	alewuta kyiiṙi kya Kristo lyilya alemṟutsa ko wapfu, kammbika kuwoko kokye ko kulyoe ruwewu;
49001021	wuye mnu kuta Wumangyi woose, na wuchilyi na pfinya, na orio rina lyekyesendo, maa chi kunu wuyanenyi tupu-pfo, indi wulya wuicha taa.
49001022	Kawika shindo shoose wuchilyinyi wo Kristo, kammbika nawe mṙoe wuye ya shindo shoose kyipfa kya Siṟi; ikyeri
49001023	nyiyo mmbiu okye, na iafutsia lyakye oe ekyeenenga shindo shoose iafutsio koose.
49002001	Na nyoe muwewapfu kyipfa kya iuṟa wuindi na ngyuunyamaṟi tsanyu.
49002002	Ngyuunyamaṟi muletsiwuta kacha kui iosha mchilyi ang'anyi o waṟufui wa ngyinenyi, mṟufui ulya o Satana aiṟunda maṟunda wulalu kyiiṙi kya walya waiwingana na Ruwa;
49002003	wakyeri kye kacha, soe loose luleweṟunda kui isanza nawo, langonyi tsa mmbiu yaṙu, kyiyeri luleosha lango tsa mmbiu na makusaṟo gaṙu, lukowa kui mwichiwie oṙu wana wa nyashi kyimwi na iwo wengyi.
49002004	Kyaindi Ruwa kyipfa akyeri o isaṟia lying'anyi, kui ikunda lyakye lying'anyi alelukunda;
49002005	mṟasa kyiyeri kyilya luwekyeri wapfu kyipfa kya maṙeko gaṙu; naleluṟutsa hamwi na Kristo; kyimwi na igamba kye, mulekyiṟo kui isaṟia.
49002006	Kaluṟutsa hamwi na oe, kaluṟamiṟa hamwi na oe wuyanenyi wo ruwewu, kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
49002007	Kundu kyiiṙi kya shiyeri-sho shiicha naloṟe ielewetsa lya isaṟia lyakye kui wucha wokye koṙu soe kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
49002008	Cha kyipfa mulekyiṟo kui isaṟia, kui njia ya iiṙikyia; chi kui ipfuṟukana lyanyu-pfo, nyi kyisumbo kya Ruwa;
49002009	maa chi kui mawuto-pfo, mndu oose alachekushela.
49002010	Kyipfa nyi wuṙo luwagumbe, lulegumbo kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu, luwute mawuto mecha, igo wookyia kacha Ruwa alegaṟeyeṟa kundu luwute luṙo.
49002011	Kyipfa kya ikyo kumbuonyi kye kacha nyoe, muwewafee cha wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa. Wayuda wekyemulaga, “Wandu walawaṙine,” Wayuda walya wekyegamba kye wo nyi “Wandu waṙine,” kyimwi na igamba kye, nyi iṙino lya mmbiu lyilyiwute kui mawoko.
49002012	Kyiyeri-kyo kya kacha mulawewoṙe Kristo, muwelekanyi na mbaṟe ya Isiraelyi, wayenu walawoṙe shiteṟio sha kyaasa kyilya. Muwewoṙe ikusuria-pfo, maa muweichi Ruwa-pfo.
49002013	Kyaindi wulalu, kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu, nyoe muwekyeri kuleshi iho mawookyionyi, mowa kufuhi kui samu ya Kristo.
49002014	Kyipfa oe nyi oe ufoṟo loṙu, aleluwutia soe luwekyeri wawi lukowa umwi; kafunja kyiambasa kya makyiṙi-gawi kyiweluletsanie.
49002015	Na oe ammbute kyituwa kyilya kui mmbiu okye; nyigo mawawaso ga shindo wandu wawaṟi iwuta na walawaṟi iwuta; kundu nawikye iwo wawi wawe mndu umwi mhya kyiiṙi kyakye; kaende ufoṟo.
49002016	Kawasanza woose wewawi na Ruwa mmbiunyi umwi, kui njia ya msalaba, amrumatse kyituwa kyilya kui msalaba-cho.
49002017	Kacha kacheonguo ufoṟo konyu nyoe muwekyeri kuleshi, na ufoṟo ko walya wawekyeri kufuhi.
49002018	Cha kyipfa kokye soe loose lulewona njia yetikyira kufuhi na Awu Mumuyonyi umwi.
49002019	Kyasia wookyia wulalu nyoe chi wayenu maa wandu waikuiṙia-pfo, indi nyoe nyi wandu walakyeri wayenu hamwi na wandu wa Ruwa, wandu wa kanyi ko Ruwa.
49002020	Muwawikye urendenyi lo wasu na weonguo shisuku, na Kristo Yesu amonyi nyi igoe lying'anyi lya ndumbenyi.
49002021	Kyiiṙi kyakye numba yoose iwaṙanyi necha na ing'ana mṟasa iwe hekalu lyiele kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
49002022	Kyiiṙi kyakye nyoe muwawikye handu hamwi ikaa kanyi ko Ruwa Mumuyonyi.
49003001	Kyipfa kya ikyo inyi Paulo nyi mpfungo o Kristo Yesu kyipfa kyanyu nyoe wandu mulaiṙikyie Ruwa;
49003002	kokooya mulemuicho mbonyi tsa isaṟia lya Ruwa ngyileenengo kyipfa kyanyu.
49003003	Kye kui ishukuyo nyi Mumuyo ngyileloṟo kyiṟika-kyo chandu ngyilesonguo iṟeia kui maṙeṙo maangu.
49003004	Koikyo mukogasoma, moiṙima imanya shindo ngyiichi kyiiṙi kya wuṟikyi-wu wo Kristo.
49003005	Kyiṟika-kyo kyilaleloṟo wandu wa marika gengyi; chandu waleloṟo kui Mumuyo wasu wakye waele na weonguo shisuku kyiyeri-kyi kya wulalu Mumuyonyi.
49003006	Kye wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa nyi weoṟa handu hamwi na soe wa kyioṟa kyimwi, na wa mmbiu umwi, na iambilyia hamwi kilya Ruwa aleteṟia, kyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu kui njia ya Ndumi Ngyicha.
49003007	Ndumi-yo Ngyicha ngyilewiko mṟundi oyo, iṙuana na kyisumbo kya isaṟia lya Ruwa ngyileenengo iṙuana na iṟunda lya wuiṙimi wokye.
49003008	Inyi, ngyikyeri mtutu kuta ulya akyeri mtutu o wandu wa Ruwa woose, ngyileenengo isaṟia-lyi lyeongoya wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa wunjama wo Kristo wulekyeiṙima iyeṟo;
49003009	na iloṟa ngyeela ko wandu woose wamanye mbonyi tsa wuchilyi wo kyiṟika-kyo kyikyeri kye wookyia shiyeri shoose kyiwekyiṟikye kyiiṙi kya Ruwa alegumba shindo shoose.
49003010	Kundu wulalu, kui njia ya Siṟi, wunyotsu wo Ruwa wukyeri wo mbaṟe tsifoi wumanyikye na ngyuumangyi na wuchilyi wuyanenyi wo Mumuyo,
49003011	iṙuana na ikusuria lya mlungana alelyikusuria kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu Mndumii oṙu.
49003012	Kyiiṙi kyakye luwoṙe wuṟango na wukari na wuiṙimi wo tikyira kufuhi ikusurienyi kui njia ya imwiṙikyia.
49003013	Kyasia ngyiterewa maa mulapfiiyo nyi mṙoe kyipfa kya ngyuukyiwa tsako kyipfa kyanyu, tsikyeri mng'ano konyu.
49003014	Koikyo ngyipfiria Awu ndi,
49003015	icho akyeri kye kui rina lyakye wuawu woose wo ruwewu na wo wuyanenyi wuisendo.
49003016	Namutarame, iṙuana na wunjama wo mng'ano okye, ikarisha kui pfinya, kui iṟunda lya Mumuyo okye, naengyeṟe imukarisha.
49003017	Kristo nakae mrimenyi konyu kui iiṙikyia, muwakarishe ikundenyi.
49003018	Kundu muiṙime imanya handu hamwi na wandu wa Ruwa woose chandu ikunda lya Kristo lyilyilandari, na chandu lyiwoṙe wuleshi wo iyenda wuye na wo iyenda wanda.
49003019	Na imanya ikunda lya Kristo lyieṟie wuṟango woose chandu lying'anyi, muiṙime iafutsia kui iafutsio lyoose lya Ruwa.
49003020	Kyasia naṟumisho oe ekyeiṙima iṟunda shindo sha maṟiyisho mnu kuta shoose lokyeterewa na ikusaṟa, iṙuana na pfinya iṟunda maṟunda mrimenyi koṙu.
49003021	Yee, naṟumisho Siṟinyi na kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu mṟasa marika goose ga mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
49004001	Koikyo ngyimuterewa, inyi ngikyeri mpfungo kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, mukae chandu kyiwaṟi kyilya mulelagio.
49004002	Kui wuindi woose na wuhoo, kui wusimiri, mochiwanzana ikundenyi;
49004003	na ipfuṟukana iwa mbumbu imwi kui iwaṙana kui ufoṟo.
49004004	Mmbiu umwi, na Mumuyo umwi, chandu mulewelago ikusurienyi lyimwi lya kyilya mulelagio.
49004005	Mndumii umwi, iiṙikyia lyimwi, wupatiso wumwi.
49004006	Ruwa umwi, na oe nyi Awu o wandu woose, akyeri Mndumii o shoose, ekyeṟunda kyiiṙi kya shoose na akyeri shindonyi shoose.
49004007	Kyaindi orio umwi oṙu naleenengo isaṟia iṙuana na kyiyeṟo kya kyisumbo kya Kristo.
49004008	Chandu shiṟeio shiele shigambie, “Lyilya aleṙo na ruwewu, nalewinga na isoka Satana walya awewachilyie kaenenga wandu shienengo.”
49004009	Kyasia ṙeṙo-lyo, “Iṙo na ruwewu,” lyagamba-kyi kokooya sile nyi igamba kye na oe taa nalesoka mṟasa wanda ya uruka?
49004010	Na icho alesoka nyi oe aleirio wuye mnu kuta ngyina tsoose, kundu naichuṟe shindo shoose.
49004011	Na oe nalesambuṟa wengyi iwa wasu; na wengyi iwa weonguo shisuku; na wengyi iwa wainjilisti; na wengyi iwa walyisi na walosha;
49004012	kyipfa kya iafutsia wandu wa Ruwa, kundu maṟunda getaramana gaṟundikye, mṟasa mmbiu o Kristo ukarisho.
49004013	Mṟasa na soe loose luiṙime iwa mbumbu imwi kui iiṙikyia na imanya mnu Mana o Ruwa, mṟasa iwa wandu waafutsie kyiiṙikyia, na wapfulukyie cha Kristo.
49004014	Kundu lulawe-se wana watutu, lochiwiyitso ipfo na ipfo, na iṙoo nyi orio mkuma o malosho geṙetsa, kui ngyeṟo tsa wandu, kui mbiṟi, lochiosha njia tsa wulembi.
49004015	Kyaindi luṙeṙe loi ikundenyi na ing'ana mṟasa lumkooye shindonyi shoose, oe akyeri mṙoe, Kristo.
49004016	Kui oe mmbiu oose ochilungo na iwaṙana kui wutarami wo orio kyiwungo, iṙuana na iṟunda lya orio kyiwungo; iṟunda lyekyeṙosa mmbiu uiṙime ikukarisha umonyi ikundenyi.
49004017	Kyasia ngyigamba kuṙi, lyingyi-se ngyiṟingyishia kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, wookyia wulalu maa mulawute chandu wandu wekyewuta, wuwichonyi wo makusaṟo gawo.
49004018	Walya ngyuuṟango tsawo tsilewiko meema, nawo walewiko kuleshi na moo o Ruwa, kyipfa kya wutondo wukyeri mrimenyi kowo, kyipfa kya wuumu wo mrima yawo.
49004019	Wakyeri kye wakampfa ngapfu wekyekuwika mbonyinyi tsa ukoe waiṙime iwuta orio kyindo kya wunyamaṟi kui ilanga.
49004020	Indi nyoe, chi wuṙo mulekulosha ko Kristo-pfo.
49004021	Mulemuicho mukolosho kyiiṙi kyakye, chandu loi ikyeri kyiiṙi kya Yesu.
49004022	Ṙenyi mbonyi tsa mchumie o kuwooka o mndu o kacha, okyenyamaṟika kui iosha lango tsekyelemba.
49004023	Mugalutso muwe wandu wahya ikusurienyi lya mrima yanyu.
49004024	Muwaṙe mchumie o mndu mhya, ulegumbo kui mbaṟe ya Ruwa wusumganyinyi na wuelenyi wo loi.
49004025	Kyasia ṙenyi wongo, muṙeṙe loi orio mndu na momṟasa okye; kyipfa soe lukyeri shiwungo, orio umwi kyiwungo kya oṙoe.
49004026	Kaponyi nyi nyashi, indi mulanyamaṟe; mnengyeṟi ulaolokyie nyashi ilandesie.
49004027	Maa mulaenengye Mokyiriinzi ṙaawa.
49004028	Mwiwi alaiwe-se; indi nanga apfuṟukana, echiwika wuragari wo iṟunda lyicha kui mawoko gakye amonyi, nawaṙe kyindo kyetarama mndu alawoṙe.
49004029	Ṙeṙo lyoose lyiwicho lyilawukye maṙumbunyi ganyu, indi lyilyicha lyeiṙima itarama ulya alangyie ṙeṙo lyicha, kundu lyienengye isaṟia walya wechilyiicho.
49004030	Maa mulaenengye ikuinaṙia Mumuyo ulya Mweele o Ruwa; akyeri kye kokye mulewiko fana yeṟingyishia mṟasa mfiri o ikyiṟo.
49004031	Isuo lyoose lying'anyi na nyashi tsoose na ikalagatsa na shilahio shilakae konyu, hamwi na wuwicho wo orio mbaṟe.
49004032	Lyingyi-se taramanenyi nyoe wenyi ko wenyi mochiwoniana fowa mrimenyi, muhooṟiane chandu na Ruwa kyiiṙi kya Kristo alemuhooṟia nyoe.
49005001	Koikyo oshenyi Ruwa, cha wana wakunde.
49005002	Muchumie ikundenyi, chandu na Kristo alemukunda nyoe, lyingyi-se kareka moo okye kyipfa kyaṙu, kyiano na kyiṙaso ko Ruwa, iwa mpfaamo o kyindo kyekyepfaama necha.
49005003	Kyaindi wuṟui wulawono konyu maa ale, maa ukoe loose, maa ilanga, chandu kyiwaṟi wandu wa Ruwa.
49005004	Maa sonu, maa maṙeṙo ga wutondo, maa ngaruo; isho shekyechihiṟa-pfo; indi nanga iana.
49005005	Kyipfa mbonyi-tsi mutsiichi necha, kye kuwoṙe mṟui maa mndu o wuilala wo wolyi, maa mndu awoṙe wulanga, nyi oe moindia ifano, awoṙe kyioṟa Wumangyinyi wo Kristo na Ruwa-pfo.
49005006	Mndu alamulembe kui maṙeṙo galawoṙe kyiira; cha kyipfa, kyipfa kya ikyo nyashi ya Ruwa yekyeolokyia wana wa wunyamaṟi.
49005007	Kyasia mulakae handu hamwi nawo.
49005008	Cha kyipfa kacha nyoe muwekyeri meema, indi wulalu mowa ngyeela kyiiṙi kya Mndumii. Wutenyi cha wana wa ngyeela;
49005009	kyipfa ndunda ya ngyeela nyi wuchenyi woose na wusumganyinyi na loi;
49005010	mochipfuṟukana ikulosha nyi kyikyi kyekyechihiṟa Mndumii.
49005011	Mulakae handu hamwi na wandu wawoṙe mawuto ga meema galawoṙe ndunda, indi mugaṙeṙie.
49005012	Kyipfa isho shiwutika kowo kui kyiṟika, nyi sonu maa ishigamba.
49005013	Kyaindi shoose shishiṙeṙie shekyeloṟo nyi ngyeela; kyipfa orio kyindo kyikyiloṟe nyi ngyeela.
49005014	Koikyo shiṟeio shagamba, “Amka, iyoe uirengyera, uṟukye ko wapfu, na Kristo nekulyimikyia.”
49005015	Kyasia ambuyenyi necha chandu muiwuta; chi cha wandu walawaṟango-pfo indi cha wandu waṟango.
49005016	Mochiwuta necha mfiri-i cha kyipfa shiyeri-shi sha wulalu nyi sha mawicho.
49005017	Kyipfa kya ikyo mulawe matondo, indi mumanye ny'kyikyi Mndumii akundi.
49005018	Lyingyi-se mulanango mpfinyo, kyipfa wuwoṙe mbonyi tsa ukoe, indi muichuṟo nyi Mumuyo.
49005019	Ṙeṙenyi kui shiimbo shetembecheṟa mrima. Imbienyi Mndumii na ianga mrimenyi konyu;
49005020	na iana Ruwa Awu mfiri yoose kyipfa kya shindo shoose, rinenyi lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo;
49005021	orio mndu echiṟundia oṙoe necha kyiiṙi kya iindia Kristo.
49005022	Lanyoe waka, indienyi wamii wanyu cha iindia Mndumii oṙu.
49005023	Cha kyipfa mii nyi mṙoe o mka, chandu Kristo na oe nyi mṙoe o Siṟi; na oe nyi mkyiṟa o mmbiu.
49005024	Kyaindi chandu Siṟi yekyeindia Kristo, nyi wuṙo waka nawo waindie wamii wawo shindonyi shoose.
49005025	Lanyoe wasoṟo, kundenyi waka wanyu, chandu Kristo na oe alekunda Siṟi, kareka moo okye kyipfa kyayo;
49005026	kundu nailyishe Siṟi na iisanja kui mṟinga Ṙeṙonyi.
49005027	Naiṙime ikuenenga oe amonyi Siṟi iwoṙe kyiṟumi ilawoṙe ṙeko ang'u kyindo kyoose kyiwicho, indi iwe ngyiele ilawoṙe maṙeko.
49005028	Wuṙo wuṙo wasoṟo kyawakooya ikunda waka wawo cha mmbiu yawo wawenyi. Akunda mka nakukunda amonyi.
49005029	Kyipfa kuwoṙe mndu asuuye mmbiu okye handu hoose-pfo; indi nekyeuenenga kyelya na iuambuya necha, chandu Kristo na oe aiwutia Siṟi.
49005030	Kyipfa soe lukyeri shiwungo sha mmbiu okye.
49005031	Kyipfa kya ikyo mndu nechiṙa awuye na wamae, naoshane na mka okye, na iwo wewawi wechiwa mmbiu umwi.
49005032	Wuṟikyi-wu wung'anyi; indi inyi ngyiṙeṙa mbonyi tsa Kristo na Siṟi.
49005033	Kyaindi orio mndu nakunde mka okye chandu akukundi amonyi, maa mka alaṙe iindia mii okye.
49006001	Lanyoe wana, indienyi wafee wanyu kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, kyipfa iwu nyiwo wusumganyi.
49006002	India awuyo na womoo. Iwawaso-lyi nyilyo iwawaso lya kuwooka lyiwoṙe kyaasa,
49006003	uwone ona, ukae mfiri ifoi wuyanenyi.
49006004	Na nyoe waawu, maa mulasouoe wana wanyu; indi waṙosenyi kyiiṙi kya iowuo na iindia Mndumii.
49006005	Nyoe watumo, indienyi iwo wai wandumii wanyu kui mbaṟe ya mmbiu, kui wuowu na iṙeṙema, kui ikutitiṟa mrimenyi, cha iindia Kristo.
49006006	Maa chi kui wutumo wo meso tikyi cha waikukomba ko wandu-pfo; indi cha watumo wa Kristo, mowuta shechihiṟa Ruwa kui mrima.
49006007	Kui ikusuria lyicha cha iṟundia Mndumii maa chi mndu-pfo.
49006008	Mochimanya kye orio kyindo kyicha mndu echiwuta neenengo ikyo ikyo nyi Mndumii, kokooya nyi mtumo ang'u ote.
49006009	Na nyoe wandumii wawutienyi wo isho isho, mochiṙa iwaowesha, kunu mochimanya kye oe akyeri Mndumii owo na onyu nakyeri ruwewu, maa kokye kuwoṙe ikundia-pfo.
49006010	Mafurumionyi, engyeṟenyi iwaṙa wukari kyiiṙi kya Mndumii na wuiṙiminyi wo pfinya tsakye.
49006011	Ṟaenyi shisha shoose sha Ruwa, muiṙime iwingana na ngyeṟo tsa Satana.
49006012	Kyipfa ikapana lyaṙu soe chi na wandu-pfo; indi nyi na ngyuumangyi na pfinya, na wang'anyi wa meema-chu, nguulyimalyi tsa waṟufui wawicho wuyanenyi wo waṟufui.
49006013	Kyipfa kya ikyo irenyi shisha shoose sha Ruwa, muiṙime iwingana mfiri ya mawicho na mukommarisa shoose, igoṟoka.
49006014	Kyasia goṟokyenyi, mukuinewie loi shitsinyi, na iṟaa wusumganyi kyipootenyi,
49006015	na iwa wandu wakuṟeyeṟie iyenda ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha ya ufoṟo.
49006016	Ngoseṟa ya shoose mochiambilyia ngawo ya iiṙikyia, iya kui iyo mochiiṙima irumisha mfi yoose ya moṙo ya mmbicho ulya.
49006017	Lyingyi-se ambilyienyi wukyiṟo wukyeri cha kofia yanyu ya menya, na Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa cha ushu muenengo nyi Mumuyo.
49006018	Kui shiterewo shoose mochiterewa orio kyiyeri Mumuyonyi, mochilaa kyiṙombo kyipfa kya kyindo-kyo, mochiterewia wandu wa Ruwa woose;
49006019	na kyipfa kyako taa, ngyienengo pfinya yeonguo kundu ngyiiṙime iloṟa wandu kyiṟika kyilya kya Ndumi Ngyicha.
49006020	Ndumi Ngyicha iya kyipfa kyayo inyi ngyiṙeṙa handu ha Kristo maa chandu ngyimpfungye, ngyiwaṙe wuṟango na wukari wo ionguo chandu kyingyiwaṟi ionguo.
49006021	Kyasia kundu nyoe muiṙime imanya mbonyi tsako, Tikyiko, mono-wama mkunde, aiṟunda na soe, akyeri msimiri kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, nemumanyisha shindo shoose.
49006022	Ulya ngyimṙuma konyu kyipfa kya ikyo muiṙime imanya mbonyi tsaṙu, na oe nawiyiṟie mrima yanyu moo.
49006023	Ufoṟo lukae na wana wa wama waiṙikyie Yesu, na ikunda, hamwi na iiṙikyia, shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
49006024	Isaṟia lyikae na woose wakundi Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo kui njia ilawoṙe inyamaṟika.
50001001	Paulo na Timoteo, waṟundi wa Kristo Yesu, lomuṟeia paruo nyoe wandu wa Ruwa moose kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu, mukyeri Filyipi, hamwi na maaskofu na mashemasi.
50001002	Isaṟia lyiwe konyu na ufoṟo luwukyie ko Ruwa Awu oṙu na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
50001003	Ngyiana Ruwa oko orio kyiyeri ngyekyemukumbuo,
50001004	mfiri yoose orio kyiyeri ngyekyemuterewia nyoe moose, ngyechiterewa kui sia,
50001005	kyipfa kya iwaṙana lyanyu iṟundenyi lyeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha, wookyia mfiri ulya o kuwooka mṟasa inu.
50001006	Na inyi ngyikyiiṙikyie nyikyo ikyi, kye ulya alewooka iṟunda lyicha mrimenyi konyu nechilyiafutsia mṟasa mfiri Yesu Kristo echiwuya.
50001007	Wuṙo wuṙo chandu kyikyeri iṟunda lyako ikusaṟa ishi kyipfa kyanyu moose; cha kyipfa nyoe mukyeri mrimenyi koko; cha kyipfa kyipfungonyi kyako na iṟundenyi lyeringa kyiṟumi kya Ndumi Ngyicha, na iiṟingyishia, nyoe moose muleambilyia isaṟia-lyi hamwi na inyi.
50001008	Kyipfa Ruwa nyi mṟingyishi oko, ngyimkundi nyoe chandu Yesu Kristo amkundi.
50001009	Na ikyi nyikyo kyiterewo kyako, kye ikunda lyiengyeṟikye, wuṟangonyi na imanya lyoose;
50001010	muiṙime iambilyia gai mecha; kundu muiṙime iwaṙa mrima ilawoṙe ukoe, kulawoṙe ṙeko, mṟasa mfiri ulya Yesu Kristo echiwuya;
50001011	muwaichuṟe shindo shicha shilya Yesu tikyi eiṙima imuenenga wuiṙimi wo ishiwuta, kui mng'ano na kyiṟumi kya Ruwa.
50001012	Kyaindi, wana wa wama wako, ngyikundi mumanye kye shindo shoose shilengyiwutikyia nyi kyipfa kya ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha.
50001013	Kyipfa kya ikyo, maa asikari woose wekyeringa numba iya Kaisari ekyekaa ilyi ai maṟundenyi na wandu wengyi woose waichi kye inyi ngyikyeri kyipfungonyi kyipfa ngyii mṟundi o Kristo.
50001014	Na wana wa wama wengyi wakyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo, wechikarisho nyi iwiko lyako kyipfungonyi, waleengyeṟa mnu ionguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa kulawoṙe wuowu.
50001015	Wengyi waionguo mbonyi tsa Kristo, kyipfa kya wunyeng'i na wuṟiingyi; na wengyi kui makusaṟo mecha.
50001016	Iwa wekyeonguo mbonyi tsa Kristo kui ikunda, waichi kye ngyimmbikye ngyiringye kyiṟumi kya Ndumi Ngyicha.
50001017	Indi wengyi wekyeonguo mbonyi tsa Kristo kui wuṟiingyi, maa chi kui mrima mwilyi-pfo, wakusaṟie kye kui iwuta kuṙo wechiengyeṟa ngyuukyiwa tsa iwiko lyako kyipfungonyi.
50001018	Ikyo wakundi ingyiwutia koko chi kyindo-pfo. Kyaindi ko orio njia, kokooya nyi kui ngyeṟo, ang'u kokooya nyi kui wuloi, mbonyi tsa Kristo tsigambo; koikyo ngyichihiyo, yee, na inyi ngyechichihiyo.
50001019	Kyipfa ngyiichi kye ishi shengyigalukyia shiwe wukyiṟo woko, kyipfa kya shiterewo shanyu na kyitarama kyiwukyie ko Mumuyo o Yesu Kristo ngyechiwa mndu alamchilyie nyi kyindo;
50001020	chandu ngyileweṙelyia mnu, na ikusuria, kye ngyechirigo nyi sonu maa ale-pfo, indi kui wusimiri woose, cha mfiri yoose, na wulalu nyi wuṙo Kristo echienengo kyiṟumi mmbiunyi koko; kokooya ngyii na moo, ang'u ngyipfiie.
50001021	Cha kyipfa koko inyi iwaṙa moo nyi Kristo, na ipfa nyi kyiira.
50001022	Indi kokooya iengyeṟa iwaṙa moo kyimmbiu koko inyi nyi ndunda tsa iṟunda lyicha, kyasia, ngyiichi nyi kyindo kyiha ngyesambuṟa-pfo.
50001023	Kuwoṙe shindo shiwi shingyikuruo. Ngyikundi iyenda ngyikae na Kristo; kyipfa nyi necha ngoseṟa.
50001024	Indi iengyeṟa ikaa iha wuyanenyi nyi kyindo kying'anyi ngoseṟa kyipfa kyanyu.
50001025	Na inyi ngyikusurie isho, ngyiichi kye ngyechikaa hamwi na nyoe, kundu muiṙime ichihiyo iiṙikyienyi;
50001026	mṟasa muengyeṟe ikushela kyiiṙi kya Kristo kyipfa kyako, kyipfa kya ikaa lyako hamwi na nyoe-se.
50001027	Kyaindi mkaṟo yanyu iwe chandu malosho ga Ndumi Ngyicha ya Kristo gakundi, kundu ngacha na immbona nyoe, maa ngyilakyeri ho, ngyiicho mbonyi tsanyu, kulawoṙe iloloma kye mugoṟokyi Mumuyonyi umwi, kui mrima umwi mochikapania iiṙikyia lya Ndumi Ngyicha;
50001028	maa muowuye washituwa wanyu kyindonyi kyoose-pfo. Kowo iwo nyi kyiṟingyishio kya iṙeka, indi konyu nyoe nyi kyiṟingyishio kya wukyiṟo, wulya wuwukyie ko Ruwa.
50001029	Kyipfa muwaenengye kyipfa kya Kristo, chi imwiṙikyia tupu-pfo, kyaindi na ilyiso wukyiwa kyipfa kyakye;
50001030	mochiwaṙa iwingana lyilya lyilya mulelyiwona koko, na iicho kye ngyiwoṙe mṟasa wulalu.
50002001	Kyasia kokooya kuwoṙe iwiyiṟiana moo kyiiṙi kya Kristo, kokooya kuwoṙe ikarishana kui ikunda, kokooya kuwoṙe iwaṙana Mumuyonyi, kokooya kuwoṙe iwoniana wukyiwa,
50002002	ngyienengyenyi sia ing'anyi, kundu muwe na makusaṟo gamwi, wandu muwoṙe ikunda lyimwi, wawoṙe mrima umwi, mochikusaṟa iwuta kyindo kyimwi.
50002003	Maa mulawute kyindo kyoose kui iwingana ang'u kui makushelo; indi kui wupfereri, orio mndu nawone oṙoe kye nawoṙe kyiira kuta oe.
50002004	Mndu alakuwinishe kyipfa kya shindo shakye amonyi, indi nakuwinishe kyipfa kya shindo sha oṙoe.
50002005	Waṙenyi makusaṟo galya galya Yesu Kristo awewoṙe;
50002006	ulya ipfo mawookyionyi awei Ruwa, kyaindi alalewona kulya iwa kyimwi na Ruwa kye nyi kyindo kyemwenenga ikuyeṟa na Ruwa;
50002007	kyaindi nalekuloṟa kye awoṙe mng'ano oose-pfo, kawa cha mtumo, kafanana na mndu.
50002008	Lyingyi-se, kyiyeri alewono ai cha mndu, nalepfereria, kawaṙa wuindi mṟasa upfunyi, yee, upfu lo msalabenyi.
50002009	Koikyo lyingyi-se Ruwa nalemwiria wuye, kamwenenga Rina lyiiṟie orio rina;
50002010	kundu kui iiṙia ko Yesu shindo shoose shipfirie ndi, sha ruwewu, sha wuyanenyi, na sha wanda ya wuyana;
50002011	na kundu orio mndu nagambe kye YESU KRISTO NYI MNDUMII, kui mng'ano o Ruwa Awu.
50002012	Kyasia wakunde wako, chandu mulepfereria mfiri yoose, chi kyiyeri inyi ngyiwekyeri ho tupu-pfo, indi wulalu ngoseṟa mnu ngyilakyeri ho, afutsienyi wukyiṟo wonyu muwenyi kui iowuo na iṙeṙema.
50002013	Cha kyipfa nyi oe Ruwa aiṟunda maṟunda mrimenyi konyu, iambilyia lyanyu na iṟunda lyanyu, kui iafutsia makusaṟo gakye mecha.
50002014	Ṟundenyi shindo shoose kulawoṙe inuṟia maa iwingana,
50002015	muiṙime iwa wana wa Ruwa walaiwio kye wawawicho, maa walekyelemba, walawoṙe tewe rikyenyi lyilekyeicho, lyilakyeri njienyi ya sungusinyi. Walya kyiiṙi kyawo muwonekanyi cha ilyi mukyeri shimii wuyanenyi,
50002016	mochiosha mbonyi tsekyeende moo, ngyiwone kyimaṙuma kya ikushela mfiri ulya Kristo echiwuya, kye ngyileṙicha wulya maa ikuwinisha wulya-pfo.
50002017	Yee, maa kokooya ngyechiwoogo na kuṙo ngyiwe cha samu yawuto iwe kyiṙaso kyilya iiṙikyia lyanyu lyekyeenenga Ruwa. Ngachihiyo; lyingyi-se ngachihiyo hamwi na nyoe moose.
50002018	Na nyoe wuṙo chihiyonyi; lyingyi-se chihiyonyi hamwi na inyi.
50002019	Kyaindi ngyikusaṟie kyiiṙi kya Yesu Kristo iṙuma Timoteo nache na konyu mfiri ya kufuhi, na inyi ngyiwiyiṟio moo, ngyiichi mbonyi tsanyu.
50002020	Kyipfa ngyiwoṙe mndu ungyi awoṙe makusaṟo gamwi na inyi, echikuwinisha mnu na nyoe-pfo.
50002021	Kyipfa woose waikuwinisha na mbonyi tsawo wawenyi, chi sha Kristo Yesu-pfo.
50002022	Kyaindi muichi kyiṟumi kyakye, kye naleṟunda handu hamwi na inyi iṟundenyi lyeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha, cha mana o awu okye.
50002023	Kyasia, ngyikusaṟie iṙuma icho iwinyi, kyiyeri-kyo ngyechimanya shindo shechingyiwutikyia.
50002024	Na inyi ngyiiṙikyie kyiiṙi kya Mndumii kye na inyi ngyechicha mfiri ya kufuhi.
50002025	Kyaindi ngyilewona kyingyiwaṟi iṙuma Epafurodito konyu, mono-wama oko, alewuka konyu icheṟunda handu hamwi na inyi.
50002026	Cha kyipfa nalangyie mnu immbona nyoe na nalewihiyo mnu mrimenyi kyiyeri aleicho kye momanya mbonyi tsa ndoṟe yakye.
50002027	Cha kyipfa naweluoe nakamwi, ai kufuhi na ipfa; kyaindi Ruwa nalemmbonia wukyiwa; maa chi oe amonyi tupu-pfo, indi na inyi taa; ngyilawaṙe ikuinaṙia lyielewetsie.
50002028	Koikyo ngapfuṟukana mnu imṙuma, kundu ilyi mochimmbona-se muiṙime ichihiyo, na inyi ngyianguhiṟio ikuinaṙia lyako.
50002029	Kyasia muambilyienyi kyiiṙi kya Mndumii kui sia yoose, mochiwona wandu cha ichu kye nyi wandu wawoṙe rina.
50002030	Cha Kyipfa kyipfa kya iṟunda lya Kristo nalekyiṟe-pfa; na nalewuta isho shoose kundu ngyienengo kyitarama nyoe mulaleiṙima ingyienenga.
50003001	Numa ya iho, wana wa wama wako, chihiyonyi kyiiṙi kya Mndumii. Imuṟeia mbonyi tsilya tsilya chi kyindo kyilengyienenga nyashi-pfo, indi nyi kyindo kyechimuenenga kyiira nyoe.
50003002	Kushowenyi na wandu wakyeri cha shite, walya wekyewuta shindo shiwicho. Kaenyi kuleshi na walya wekyeitika wandu iṙino.
50003003	Kyipfa soe luwaṙine loi, soe lokyeana na iterewa Ruwa kui Mumuyo, na ikushela kyipfa kya Kristo Yesu, maa lokyekusuria mmbiu-pfo.
50003004	Kyaindi inyi ngyeiṙima ikusuria mmbiu. Mndu oose kawona kye nawoṙe kyimaṙuma kya ikusuria mmbiu, inyi ngyekusuria mmbiu ngoseṟa.
50003005	Ngyileṙino mfiri o nyanya, nyi Mwisiraelyi, o mbaṟe ya Benyamen, waku wako woose nyi-we Waebrania, na ko mbonyi tsa iosha uwawaso inyi nyi Mfarisayo.
50003006	Ko mbonyi tsa ipfuṟukana, ngyilepfuṟukana loi ilyisa Siṟi wukyiwa, na kui iwaṙa wusumganyi kyipfa kya iosha kyilya mawawaso gakundi ngyiwewoṙe tewe-pfo.
50003007	Kyaindi shindo shilya shiwewoṙe kyiiṙa koko ngyileshiwona nyi shindo sha wulya kyipfa kya Kristo.
50003008	Yee, ngoseṟa ya isho, ngyiwonyi shindo shoose nyi sha wulya kyipfa kya wucha wung'anyi mnu wo imanya Kristo Yesu, Mndumii oko; ulya kyipfa kyakye ngyileṙetsa shindo shoose ngyechishiwona kye nyi mboshia kundu ngyiwone Kristo.
50003009	Lyingyi-se ngyilungo tapu na oe, ngyilawaṙe wusumganyi woko ngyimonyi wulya mndu ekyewona kui iosha mawawaso, indi ngyiwaṙe wusumganyi wulya wokyewono kui iiṙikyia lyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo, wusumganyi wulya wuwukyie ko Ruwa, kui iiṙikyia.
50003010	Kundu ngyimmanye oe, na wuiṙimi wo iṟuka lyakye, na ilya wukyiwa wulya alelya, ngyechifananyisho na ipfa lyakye;
50003011	kundu ngyiiṙime kui njia yoose ishika mfiri o iṟutso lya wapfu.
50003012	Chi kye ngamshika, ang'u ngamwafutsia-pfo; indi ngyipfuṟukana iṙicha kundu ngyiiṙime irakuo iṟikoso lyilya Yesu Kristo awelyikusaṟie mṙoenyi kokye kyiyeri alengyigaluo ngawa mndu okye.
50003013	Wana wa wama, ngyikusaṟie mrimenyi koko kye ngamrakuo iṟikoso-lyo-pfo; indi ngyiwuta kyindo kyimwi tupu; ngyechiwaṙima shilya shikyeri numa na ipfuṟukania shilya shikyeri mbele.
50003014	Ngyiengyeṟa iṙicha, ngyikooye iṟikoso lya moo mhya, ulya Ruwa alengyilagia kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
50003015	Kyasia soe lukyeri wandu waafutsie kyimrima lukusaṟe isho; na maa mukokusaṟa shindo shingyi kyindonyi kyoose, Ruwa nechimushukuya na ilyo.
50003016	Kyaindi luengyeṟe iwuta iṙuana na shilya luleosha mṟasa iho.
50003017	Wana wa wama wako, ngyioshenyi inyi, muambuye na iosha walya wekyewuta shilya lulemummbia.
50003018	Kyipfa ngyilemummbia kafoi na wulalu ngyimmbia-se kui mcheṟeṟe kye kuwoṙe wandu wafoi mkaṟo yawo yekyenyamaṟa kyimaṙuma kya Yesu ipfa halya msalabenyi.
50003019	Mafurumionyi gawo nyi irumatso, ruwa owo nyi lango tsa mmbiu, wekyekushelyia shindo sha sonu, na iwinia shindo sha kunu wuyanenyi.
50003020	Cha kyipfa soe nyi wandu wa ruwewu; lyingyi-se luiweṙelyia na macha gang'anyi, Mkyiṟa Mndumii Yesu Kristo;
50003021	echiilacha mmbiu oṙu o wufofo, uiṙime ifanana na mmbiu okye o kyiṟumi, kui wuiṙimi wulya echiiṙima ichilyia nawo shindo shoose.
50004001	Kyasia, wana wa wama wako, wakunde wako, ngyiwoṙe ilanga lying'anyi kyipfa kyanyu, sia yako na iṟikoso lyako, koikyo goṟokyenyi kyiiṙi kya Mndumii kulawoṙe iloloma, wakunde wako.
50004002	Ngaterewa Euodia, ngaterewa na Sintikye, wawaṙe makusaṟo gamwi kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
50004003	Yee, ngyikundi na iyoe taa, mongari o loi, utarame waka-wo; cha kyipfa walepfuṟukana hamwi na inyi ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha, na Kyilementi, na walya wengyi waleṟunda hamwi na inyi, walya marina gawo gakyeri kyitapunyi kyiwoṙe marina ga walya wawoṙe moo o loi uwukyie ko Ruwa.
50004004	Chihiyonyi kyiiṙi kya Mndumii mfiri yoose; lyingyi-se ngagamba, chihiyonyi.
50004005	Wuhoo wonyu wumanyikye ko wandu woose. Mndumii nakyeri kufuhi.
50004006	Maa mulakuwinishe kyipfa kya kyindo kyoose; indi kyiyeri muiterewa Ruwa kyilya mukundi wutenyi kuṙo muwoṙe mrima iwoṙe iana.
50004007	Na ufoṟo lo Ruwa, luiṟie wuṟango woose lochiringa mrima yanyu na makusaṟo ganyu kyipfa muwalungye na Kristo Yesu.
50004008	Naaho-ng'u, wana wa wama, kyindo kyoose kyikyeri kya loi, kyoose kyilai kya sonu, kyoose kyikyeri kya wusumganyi, kyoose kyilawoṙe ukoe, kyoose kyechihiṟa, kyoose kyiwoṙe kyiṟumi kyicha; kokooya kuwoṙe wucha woose, kukowaṙa kyiṟumi kyoose kyicha, kusaṟenyi kyipfa kya shindo sha mbaṟe-yo.
50004009	Shindo mulekulosha koko na ishiambilyia, na ishiicho na ishiwona koko, shiwutenyi; na Ruwa o ufoṟo nechikaa hamwi na nyoe.
50004010	Ngyilechihiyo mnu kyipfa kya Mndumii, cha kyipfa mafurumionyi mowiyiṟa-se makusaṟo ganyu kyipfa kyako, chandu muwekyekusaṟa mbonyi tsako; kyaindi mulawone ṙaawa.
50004011	Chi ngyigamba kuṙo kyipfa ngyiuṟie kyindo-pfo; kyipfa ngyikuloshie ishiko na shilya ngyiwoṙe.
50004012	Ngyiichi iuṟa nyi kyikyi na ngyiichi iwaṙa nyi kyikyi. Kyiiṙi kya shindo shoose ngyilelosho iiguṙa na iicho njaa, iwaṙa shindo shifoi na iuṟa.
50004013	Ngyekyeiṙima shindo shoose kyiiṙi kya ulya ekyengyienenga pfinya.
50004014	Kyaindi mulewuta necha, kyiyeri mulelya wukyiwa hamwi na inyi.
50004015	Na nyoe taa, nyoe muwenyi muichi, lanyoe Wafilyipi, kye mawookyionyi ga Ndumi ngyicha, kyiyeri ngyilewuka Makyedonia, kuwoṙe siṟi ingyi ilekaa hamwi na inyi kyiiṙi kya ienengyia na iambilyia, sile nyoe-pfo.
50004016	Cha kyipfa maa kulya Tesalonikye mulengyiendie shindo shengyitarama kafong'ui.
50004017	Chi kye ngyikundi iambilyia shisumbo tikyi-pfo indi ngyikundi iwona ngoseṟa ya shindo shilya shicha mulemmbuta.
50004018	Kyaindi ngyiwoṙe shindo shoose na ielewetsa; lyingyi-se ngyiichuo pacha. Ngyileambilyia ko Epafurodito shindo shoose shilewuka konyu, mpfaamo o shindo shekyepfaama necha, kyienengo kyikyiiṙikyie na kyichihiṟie Ruwa.
50004019	Na Ruwa oko nechimuenenga na imuichuṟia pacha orio kyindo muuṟie iṙuana na wunjama wokye, kyiṟuminyi kya Yesu Kristo.
50004020	Wulalu Ruwa naṟumisho, Awu oṙu, mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
50004021	Kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu iṟikyiṟenyi orio mndu o Ruwa. Walya waiṙikyie Yesu wakyeri hamwi na inyi wamuiṟikyiṟa.
50004022	Wandu wa Ruwa woose wamuiṟikyiṟa, ngoseṟa walya wa kanyi ko Kaisari.
50004023	Isaṟia lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo lyikae na mrima yanyu.
51001001	Inyi Paulo, ngyikyeri msu o Kristo Yesu, chandu Ruwa akundi, na Timoteo, mono-wama oṙu,
51001002	ngamuṟeia paruo nyoe wana wa wama wai wandu wa Ruwa, waafutsie kyilya Ruwa ateṟie kyiiṙi kya Kristo, wakyeri Kolosai. Isaṟia lyikae konyu, na ufoṟo, shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu oṙu.
51001003	Luiana Ruwa, Awu o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, mfiri yoose lochimuterewia,
51001004	wookyia luleicho mbonyi tsa iiṙikyia lyanyu kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu, na ikunda muwoṙe ko wandu wa Ruwa woose.
51001005	Kyipfa kya ikusuria mulewikyio kyiseyesoe ruwewu; muleicho mbonyi tsalyo kacha ko mbonyi tsa loi tsa Ndumi Ngyicha;
51001006	ileshika konyu, chandu kyikyeri wuyanenyi koose; na ikumbia ndunda na ing'ana, chandu ing'ana konyu taa, wookyia mfiri ulya muleicho mukomanya mnu isaṟia lya Ruwa kyiiṙi kya loi.
51001007	Chandu mulelosho na Epafura, mongari oṙu mkunde iṟundenyi, akyeri mṟundi ekyeafutsia kyilya Ruwa ateṟie ko Kristo kyipfa kyanyu;
51001008	na oe naleluongoya ikunda lyanyu Mumuyonyi.
51001009	Kyipfa kya ikyo maa soe, wookyia mfiri ulya luleicho, luwika shiterewo kyipfa kyanyu, kundu muichuṟio imanya lya mrimenyi ko ikunda lyakye wuṟangonyi woose na imanyisho lya mrimenyi.
51001010	Mukae chandu Mndumii akundi, mochimchihiṟa piu; mochikumbia ndunda kui orio iṟunda lyicha, na iengyeṟika wuṟangonyi wo Ruwa.
51001011	Mochitaramo kui wuiṙimi woose, iṙuana na pfinya ya mng'ano okye, muiṙime iwaṙa wusimiri wo orio mbaṟe na ikarishia hamwi na ichihiyo.
51001012	Mochiana Awu, alemuenenga iambilyia kyitumbuṟe kya kyioṟa kya wandu wa Ruwa ngyeelenyi.
51001013	Na oe nalelukyiṟa iwuka pfinyenyi tsa meema, kalusamiṟa na iluṙuo Wumangyinyi wo Mana o ikunda lyakye;
51001014	akyeri kye kyiiṙi kyakye luwoṙe wukyiṟo, nyi kyimwi na igamba kye, ihooṟio lya wunyamaṟi.
51001015	Kristo nyi mfano o Ruwa alekyewono, mmbele o shindo shoose shishigumbe.
51001016	Cha kyipfa kyiiṙi kyakye shindo shoose shilegumbo; shikyeri ruwewu na shikyeri urukyenyi, shekyewono na shilekyewono; kokooya nyi shiṙi sha mng'ano, ang'u wumangyi, ang'u wuchilyi; shindo shoose shilegumbo kui njia yakye na kyipfa kyakye.
51001017	Na oe nawekyeri pfo kyiyeri shindo shoose shilawendegumbo, na shindo shoose shekyewaṙana kyiiṙi kyakye.
51001018	Na oe nyi oe mṙoe o mmbiu, o Siṟi; na oe nyi mawookyionyi, nyi o kuwooka iṟutso ko wapfu, kundu nawe msongoru kyiiṙi kya shoose.
51001019	Cha kyipfa kyilechihiṟa iafutsio lya Ruwa lyoose lyikae kyiiṙi kya Kristo.
51001020	Na kyiiṙi kyakye isanza shindo shoose na oe amonyi, amwende ufoṟo kui samu ya msalaba okye; kokooya nyi shindo shikyeri urukyenyi, ang'u shikyeri ruwewu.
51001021	Na nyoe muwekyeri ipfo mawookyionyi kuleshi na Ruwa, lyingyi-se washituwa wakye makusaṟonyi ganyu, kui mawuto ganyu mawicho, namusanza wulalu;
51001022	mmbiunyi o nyama yakye, kui ipfa lyakye, kundu namuende na mbele yakye, nyoe wandu wa Ruwa, mulawoṙe maṙeko maa italyio kyindo kyiwicho.
51001023	Mukokuwaṙa na isaṟia lyilya tikyi, muwawikye wuye ya urende, mukokarisho; mulandeilacho na iṙa ikusuria lya Ndumi Ngyicha muleicho mbonyi tsayo, ileongoyo ko shindo shoose shigumbe shikyeri wuyanenyi, ikyeri kye inyi Paulo ngyiwekyeri mṟundi oyo.
51001024	Wulalu ngyimchihiye kyipfa kya matuuro ngyiwoṙe kyipfa kyanyu. Lyingyi-se ngyiafutsia mmbiunyi koko shilya shilaleafutsio sha matuuro ga Kristo, kyipfa kya mmbiu okye, kyimwi na igamba kye nyi Siṟi yakye.
51001025	Siṟi inyi ngyikyeri mṟundi oyo, iṙuana na iṟunda lya Ruwa, alengyiṙambika, na ngyileenengo kyipfa kya kyiira kyanyu, ngyiafutsie Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
51001026	Wuṟikyi wulya wuwewuṟikye shiyeri shoose sha kacha na wookyia shishari shoose, indi wulalu woloṟo ko wandu wa Ruwa.
51001027	Iwo Ruwa alekunda iwamanyisha chandu wukyeri wunjana wo mng'ano wo wuṟikyi-wu kyiiṙi kya walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa nawo nyi Kristo mrimenyi konyu, ikusuria lya mng'ano.
51001028	Icho luionguo mbonyi tsakye, lochiikyimbia orio mndu, na ilosha orio mndu wuṟangonyi woose, luiṙime iende orio mndu aafutsie iiṙikyia kyiiṙi kya Kristo.
51001029	Na inyi ngyikuwinisha kui kyindo-kyo ikyo, ngyechipfuṟukana iṙuana na pfinya ing'anyi iwukyie ko Kristo, ekyeṟunda kyiiṙi kyako.
51002001	Kyipfa ngyikundi mumanye chandu ngyiwoṙe ipfuṟukana lying'anyi kyipfa kyanyu, na kyipfa kya walya wa Laodikyia, na walya walandengyiwone kyaam kyako kyimmbiu.
51002002	Kundu wawiyiṟio moo mrima yawo, wechisanzo ikundenyi wawone wunjama woose wo imanya kui wuloi, waiṙime imanya nakamwi wuṟikyi wo Ruwa, kyimwi na igamba kye nyi Kristo;
51002003	akyeri kye kyiiṙi kyakye oe shiseyesoe shoose sha wuṟango na imanya shishiṟikye.
51002004	Ngyigamba mbonyi-tsi, mndu alachemulemba kui maṙeṙo ga wulembi.
51002005	Kyipfa maa chandu ngyilakyeri ho kyimmbiu, kyaindi ngyikyeri hamwi na nyoe kyimrima, ngyechihiyo na iwona wuyendelyi wonyu na igoṟoka lyanyu kulawoṙe iloloma lya iiṙikyia lyanyu kyiiṙi kya Kristo.
51002006	Kyasia chandu muleambilyia Kristo Yesu, Mndumii, wutenyi kuṙo kyiiṙi kyakye;
51002007	muwalungye tapu na oe, muwakarishe kui iiṙikyia, chandu mulelosho, mochiengyeṟa iana.
51002008	Mndu alachemuṙetsa kui wuṟango wokye na wulembi wulawoṙe kyiira, kui mbaṟe ya malosho ga shilya wandu wekyeambilyia ko waku wawo, kui mbaṟe ya malosho ga kuwooka ga wuyana, maa chi kui mbaṟe ya Kristo-pfo.
51002009	Kyipfa kyiiṙi kyakye nyi pfo-ndu iafutsia lyoose lya Ruwa lyikyeri, kui mbaṟe ya kyimmbiu.
51002010	Na nyoe muafutsie iiṙikyia kyiiṙi kyakye oe akyeri mṙoe o wumangyi woose na wuchilyi.
51002011	Kyiiṙi kyakye muleṙino kui iṙino lyilekyewuto kui mawoko, kui iṙa lango tsa mmbiu, kui iṙino lya Kristo.
51002012	Mukoṟiko hamwi na oe wupatisonyi, na kyiiṙi kya wupatiso-wo mukoṟutso hamwi na oe, kui iiṙikyia pfinya tsa Ruwa alemuṟutsa ko wapfu.
51002013	Na nyoe kyiyeri muwepfiie kyipfa kya maṙeko ganyu na kyipfa kya ilyi mulawekyeri Wayuda, nalemuṟutsa hamwi na oe, amluhooṟie maṙeko goose.
51002014	Amfurunje kyiṟeio kyiwekyiṟeie kyeluṙuo mengyenyi kui ianduya lyakye, lyiwewoṙe kyituwa koṙu; kalyiwuta lyilakae-se ho, kalyikapia msalabenyi,
51002015	amsokye wachilyi wa meema wumangyi na wuchilyi wowo, na iwamichia numa yakye kui wukari kundu orio mndu nawone, echiloṟa chandu alewawingyia msalabenyi.
51002016	Kyasia, mndu alamuanduye nyoe shelyenyi ang'u shindonyi shenyo, ang'u kyipfa kya mfiri ung'anyi ang'u iiṙa lya mori, ang'u mfiri o onyonya.
