51002017	Mbonyi-tso nyi kyirinje kya mbonyi tsiicha, indi mmbiu nyi o Kristo.
51002018	Mndu alamusokye wori wonyu, kui iindia chandu akukundia amonyi tikyi, na iindia malaika, echikuloṟa shindonyi amloṟe indi shilai sha loi echikushela, kui wuṟango wokye wo kyimmbiu.
51002019	Maa alawaṙe Mṙoe, ukyeri kye kui icho mmbiu oose uigutso na isanzo kui shiwungo na mri ya mmbiu, okyeng'ana kui chandu Ruwa akundi.
51002020	Kyasia kokooya mulepfa hamwi na Kristo mukoṙa malosho galya ga kuwooka ga wuyana, ny'kyilyi muichilyio nyi mawawaso cha wandu wakyeri wuyanenyi, kunu mochiosha mawawaso na malosho ga wandu?
51002021	Mulawaṙe, mulasonje, mulapaaye!
51002022	(Shindo-sho shoose shiwoṙe kyiira kawi-pfo.)
51002023	Mbonyi-tso tsiloṟie cha ilyi tsiwoṙe wuṟango, mbaṟenyi ya wuyendelyi wo iterewa Ruwa muleachikyia muwenyi, na kyiiṙi kya ipfereria, na kyiiṙi kya ichilyia mmbiu kui wulang'a nakamwi, kyaindi tsiwoṙe kyiira kyoose kyiiri kya ichilyia lango tsa mmbiu-pfo.
51003001	Kyasia, mukyeri kye muleṟutso hamwi na Kristo, pfulenyi shindo shikyeri ruwewu, kundu Kristo akyeri, naṙamie kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa.
51003002	Kusaṟenyi shikyeri wuye, chi shikyeri urukyenyi-pfo.
51003003	Cha kyipfa mulepfa, na moo onyu umṟikye hamwi na Kristo kyiiṙi kya Ruwa.
51003004	Ilyi Kristo echiloṟo na pata, akyeri moo oṙu, nyi lyo-ndu na nyoe mochiloṟo hamwi na oe mng'anonyi.
51003005	Kyasia, lekanenyi na shindo wandu wa wuyana wawoṙe: wuṟui, ukoe, lango ngyiwicho, makusaṟo mawicho, na ilanga iwaṙa sha ngoseṟa, nyiwo wuyendelyi wo iindia mafano.
51003006	Kyipfa kya shindo-sho nyashi ya Ruwa yekyeolokyia walya walekyemwindia.
51003007	Kyiiṙi kya isho maa nyoe taa mulewuta kyiyeri kya kacha, kyiyeri shilemuchilyia.
51003008	Kyaindi wulalu wikyienyi kuleshi na nyoe ishi shoose: nyashi, na isuo lying'anyi, na uwicho, na shilahio, na maṙeṙo ga wusutsu ṙumbunyi konyu.
51003009	Maa mulawiane wongo, cha kyipfa moṙa nakamwi mkaṟo o kacha, hamwi na mawuto gacho,
51003010	mochiṟaa mkaṟo mhya. Ikyi nyikyo kyindo kyihya Ruwa ulya alekyigumba aikyigumba orio mfiri kui mfano okye, kundu namuenengye pfinya ya immanya nakamwi.
51003011	Iho kuwoṙe Mkyiṟikyi maa Myuda-pfo, iṙino maa iṙa iṙino-pfo, muyenu maa tondo, mtumo maa ulya alakyeri mtumo-pfo, indi Kristo nyi shoose, na kyiiṙi kya shoose.
51003012	Kyasia, kyipfa mommbe wasambuṟe wa Ruwa, wandu wa Ruwa wakunde, ṟaenyi mrima o isaṟia, mkaṟo mcha, wupfereri, wuhoo, ikarishia.
51003013	Mochiṙuana na ihooṟiana, mndu awoṙe kyimaṙuma kyesuuya oṙoe, chandu Mndumii alemuhooṟia nyoe, nyi wuṙo na nyoe.
51003014	Ngoseṟa ya isho shoose waṙenyi ikunda, lyikyeri nyilyo lyaafutsia iiṙikyia.
51003015	Na ufoṟo lo Kristo luloṟe kyilya kyiwaṟi mrimenyi konyu, nyikyo mulelagio mmbiunyi umwi; lyingyi-se muwe wandu wekyeana.
51003016	Ṙeṙo lya Kristo lyiingyikye mrimenyi konyu na wuṟangonyi woose, mochiloshana na itutumana kui shiimbo, na shiimbo shetembecheṟa mrima; kunu mochiimbia Ruwa kui iana mrimenyi konyu.
51003017	Na orio kyindo mochiwuta, kui ṙeṙo ang'u kui iṟunda, wutenyi shoose rinenyi lya Mndumii Yesu, mochiana Ruwa Awu kui oe.
51003018	Nyoe waka, indienyi wamii wanyu, chandu kyichihiṟie kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
51003019	Nyoe wasoṟo, kundenyi waka wanyu maa mulawihiyo kyipfa kyawo.
51003020	Nyoe wana, indienyi wafee wanyu shindonyi shoose, kyipfa kyindo-kyi kyichihiṟie kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
51003021	Nyoe waawu, mulasouoe wana wanyu, walachepfiiyo nyi mṙoe.
51003022	Nyoe watumo, indienyi iwo wakyeri kye kui mmbiu nyi wandumii wanyu, mbonyinyi tsoose. Chi kui wutumo wo meso, cha waikulembecheṟa ko wandu-pfo, indi kui mrima ukutitiṟie, mochiindia Mndumii.
51003023	Kyoose mochiwuta, wutenyi kui mrima, cha iṟundia Mndumii, maa chi cha iwutia wandu-pfo,
51003024	muichi kye moambilyia ko Mndumii wori wo kyioṟa. Muiṟundia Mndumii Kristo.
51003025	Kyipfa molya mbaka netoo wori wo ilya mbaka, maa kuwoṙe ikundia-pfo.
51004001	Nyoe wandumii, enengyenyi watumo wanyu kyikyeri kya sungusinyi na kya wuloi, muichi kye maa nyoe muwoṙe Mndumii ruwewu.
51004002	Mfiri yoose terewenyi, mochilaa kyiṙombo kyiterewonyi na iana.
51004003	Mochiluterewia na soe taa, kye Ruwa nalupfunguye moongo kui Ṙeṙo lyilya lyakye, luonguo wuṟikyi wo Kristo, ngyimpfungye kyipfa kya wuṟikyi-wo,
51004004	kundu ngyiwuloṟe na pata, chandu kyingyiwaṟi iṙeṙa.
51004005	Kaenyi kui wuṟango mbele ya iwo walaiṙikyie Yesu, mochiambuya mndu alaṙetse kyiyeri.
51004006	Maṙeṙo ganyu gawaṙe wuindi mfiri yoose, gai mecha, muiṙime imanya chandu kyimmbaṟi igaluo orio mndu.
51004007	Tikyiko, mono-wama mkunde, mṟundi ekyeapfutsia kyilya ateṟia, mongari oko kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, nemuongoya mbonyi tsako tsoose.
51004008	Icho ngamṙuma konyu kyipfa kya kyindo-kyo ikyo, kundu mumanye mbonyi tsaṙu, na oe nammbiyiṟie moo mrima yanyu.
51004009	Hamwi na Onesimo, mono-wama mkunde ekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia, akyeri mndu o konyu. Iwo wemuongoya mbonyi tsoose tsa iha koṙu.
51004010	Arisitariko, ampfungye hamwi na inyi, namuiṟikyiṟa; na Mariko, washiṙie o Barinaba, icho muleambilyia mawawaso kui mbonyi tsakye; kashika konyu mwambilyienyi.
51004011	Na Yesu ekyelago Yusto; iwa nyi Wakristiano wa Kyiyuda. Lyingyi-se iwo nyiwo wawenyi waiṟunda hamwi na inyi kyipfa kya Wumangyi wo Ruwa; nawo walengyiwiyiṟia moo.
51004012	Epafura, akyeri mndu o konyu, mṟundi o Yesu Kristo, namuiṟikyiṟa, echipfuṟukana mfiri yoose kyipfa kyanyu shiterewonyi shakye, kundu kye mugoṟokye muafutsie iiṙikyia na iṟingyishio mnu shindonyi shoose Ruwa akundi.
51004013	Kyipfa ngyimṟingyishia kye nawoṙe wuragari wung'anyi kyipfa kyanyu, na kyipfa kya iwo wakyeri Laodikyia, na kyipfa kya iwo wakyeri Hierapolyi.
51004014	Luka mganga ulya mkunde, na Dema, wamuiṟikyiṟa.
51004015	Iṟikyiṟenyi wana wa wama wakyeri Laodikyia, na Nimfa, na Siṟi ikyeri numbenyi yakye.
51004016	Paruo-i ikamsomo konyu wonenyi kye yasomo siṟinyi ya Walaodikyia taa; na iya ya Laodikyia isomo nyi nyoe.
51004017	Wienyi Arikyipo, “Ringa mnu iṟunda lyilya uleenengo kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, kundu ulyiafutsie.”
51004018	Kyiiṟikyiṟo kyako inyi Paulo, ngaṟeia ngyimonyi. Kumbuonyi ipfungo lyako. Isaṟia lyikae hamwi na nyoe.
52001001	Inyi Paulo na Silyiwano na Timoteo lumuṟeia paruo nyoe siṟi ya Watesalonikye, ikyeri kyiiṙi kya Ruwa Awu, na kyiiṙi kya Mndumii Yesu Kristo. Isaṟia lyikae konyu na ufoṟo.
52001002	Lokyeana Ruwa mfiri yoose kyipfa kyanyu nyoe moose, lochimusenda shiterewonyi shaṙu.
52001003	Maa lokyeṙa ikumbuo iṟunda lyanyu lya iiṙikyia, na wukyiwa wonyu ikundenyi, na wusimiri wonyu na ikusuria lyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, mbele ya Ruwa Awu oṙu-pfo.
52001004	Cha kyipfa, wana wa wama muwakunde nyi Ruwa, luichi kya wusambuṟe wonyu.
52001005	Kye Ndumi Ngyicha lulemuongoya iwekyeri kui maṙeṙo tikyi-pfo, indi na kui pfinya, na Mumuyonyi Mweele, kui iṟingyishia na pata kye ulogo-lu nyi lo loi. Chandu muichi chandu mkaṟo yaṙu iwekyeri konyu, kyipfa kyanyu.
52001006	Na nyoe mukoluosha na iosha Mndumii, momuambilyie Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa kyiiṙi kya ilya wukyiwa, hamwi na sia ya Mumuyo Mweele.
52001007	Mṟasa mukowa mfano mcha ko wandu woose waiṙikyie Yesu urukyenyi lo Makyedonia na Akaya.
52001008	Kyipfa iwuka konyu Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyileṟuma, chi Makyedonia na Akaya tupu-pfo, indi na orio handu iiṙikyia lyanyu muwoṙe ko Ruwa lyileshika; maa kuwoṙe kyimaṙuma soe ionguo kyindo kyoose-pfo.
52001009	Cha kyipfa wo wawenyi waionguo mbonyi tsaṙu, chandu mbonyi tsaṙu tsilewa kyiyeri lulecha na konyu; na chandu muleindukyia Ruwa mukolekana na mafano, kundu muṟundie Ruwa ai na moo, o loi.
52001010	Na iweṙelyia Mono-kye iwuka Ruwewu, ulya alemṟutsa iwuka ko wapfu, na oe nyi Yesu, echilushingyia lulaolokyio nyi nyashi ya Ruwa iya iicha.
52002001	Kyipfa nyoe muwenyi, wana wa wama, muichi chandu lulecha na konyu, kye kulewa wulya-pfo.
52002002	Kyaindi kuwooka lomulyiso wukyiwa na iinyalo, chandu muichi, kulya Filyipi, lulekaria kyiiṙi kya Ruwa imuongoya nyoe Ndumi Ngyicha ya Ruwa, kui iikapania mnu.
52002003	Cha kyipfa imterewa lyaṙu muambilyie ulogo lokyeonguo chi lya wuṙetsi, maa chi lya ukoe, maa lya ngyeṟo-pfo;
52002004	indi chandu luleenengo momu o ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha, nyi wuṙo luonguo. Chi cha wandu waichihiṟa wandu-pfo, indi waichihiṟa Ruwa ekyeluyeṟa mrimenyi koṙu.
52002005	Kyipfa chandu muichi lulewaṙa maṙeṙo gepfula ikundo maa kyiyeri kyifuhi-pfo. Maa maṙeṙo gemuiring'ishia kya wongo gawewoṙe kyimaṙuma kyeṟika wuehi wo mrima yaṙu-pfo, na Ruwa nyi oe mṟingyishi.
52002006	Lulepfula kyiṟumi ko wandu, maa konyu, maa ko wandu wengyi kyiyeri luwewoṙe wuiṙimi wo iwa ṟio konyu cha wasu wa Kristo-pfo.
52002007	Indi luwekyeri wandu wahoo kyiyeri luwekyeri na nyoe, chandu mfee ekyeambuya wana wakye amonyi.
52002008	Na wuṙo na soe lochiṙuana na nyoe kui ikunda lying'anyi, lulewoṙo nyi sia imuenenga, chi Ndumi Ngyicha tupu-pfo, indi na moo yaṙu taa, cha kyipfa mowa wakunde waṙu.
52002009	Kyipfa wana wa wama, mukumburie wukyiwa woṙu na iṟaisho lyaṙu; cha kyipfa kyingoto na kyio luleṟunda lulacheewa ṟio ko mndu o konyu oose, lukomuongoya kuṙo Ndumi Ngyicha ya Ruwa.
52002010	Nyoe nyi waṟingyishi, na Ruwa taa, chandu lulekaa konyu nyoe muiṙikyie Yesu, kui wuele, na kui wusumganyi, kulawoṙe igamba kye lowuta kyindo kyiwicho.
52002011	Na wuṙo, chandu muichi, chandu luleṙeṙia orio umwi onyu chandu Awu ekyeṙeṙia wana wakye amonyi, lochimukarisha na imuṟingyishia nyoe,
52002012	kundu mkaṟo yanyu iṙuane na chandu Ruwa akundi, ulya ekyemulaga nyoe kundu muiṙe na Wumangyinyi wokye na kyiṟumi kyakye.
52002013	Kyipfa kya ikyo na soe lokyeana Ruwa orio kyiyeri, cha kyipfa kyiyeri muleambilyia ndumo ya Ruwa muleiicho koṙu, muleiambilyia chi cha ulogo lo wandu-pfo, indi cha ulogo lo Ruwa; na nyi wuṙo ulogo-lo lukyeri; lokyeṟunda taa mrimenyi konyu nyoe muiṙikyie.
52002014	Kyipfa nyoe, wana wa wama, muwekyeri wandu wa siṟi tsa Ruwa tsikyeri urukyenyi lo Uyuda, kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu; cha kyipfa mulelyiso wukyiwa wulya wulya iwuka ko wandu wa uruka lonyu muwenyi, wukyiwa mulelyiso nyi Wayuda.
52002015	Walya walewaaga Mndumii Yesu, na weonguo shisuku, na ilulyisa soe wukyiwa; maa wekyechihiṟa Ruwa, maa iṙuana na wandu-pfo.
52002016	Kunu wechilushingyia lulaṙeṙe na wandu walaiṙikyie Yesu waiṙime ikyiṟo; kundu waafutsie ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo mfiri yoose. Kyaindi Ruwa naiwaanduya kui nyashi.
52002017	Kyaindi soe, wana wa wama, lulekanyi na nyoe kyiyeri kyifuhi, lulekanyi na nyoe kyimmbiu indi chi kyimrima-pfo, lulelanga mnu immbona nyoe.
52002018	Koikyo lulekunda icha na konyu, yee, inyi Paulo, lya kuwooka na lya kawi Satana kalushingyia.
52002019	Kyipfa ikusuria lyaṙu ang'u sia yaṙu, ang'u iṟikoso lya ikushela, nyi kyikyi? Ngyesa chi nyoe, mbele ya Mndumii oṙu Yesu kyiyeri kya icha lyakye-pfoe?
52002020	Kyipfa nyoe nyi kyiṟumi kyaṙu, na sia yaṙu.
52003001	Kyasia kyiyeri lulaleiṙima ikarishia ngoseṟa, lulewona nyi kyicha iṙio Atene soe luwenyi.
52003002	Lukoṙuma Timoteo mono-wama oṙu, mṟundi o Ruwa iṟundenyi lyeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha ya Kristo, kundu namukarishe nyoe na immbiyiṟia moo ko mbonyi tsa iiṙikyia lyanyu;
52003003	mndu alaowesho nyi ngyuukyiwa-tsi; kyipfa nyoe muwenyi muichi kye luwaṟi ikooyana natso.
52003004	Cha kyipfa kyiyeri luwekyeri konyu lulesonguo immbia kye lochilya wukyiwa, chandu kyilewutika, na nyoe muichi.
52003005	Koikyo na inyi kyiyeri ngyilaleiṙima ikarishia-se, ngyileṙuma mndu kundu ngyimanye iiṙikyia lyanyu, Satana alache namuyeshe, na ilya wukyiwa lyanyu lyikawa lyiwoṙe kyiira-pfo.
52003006	Kyaindi kyiyeri Timoteo alecha na koṙu iwuka konyu, naleluendie mbonyi ngyicha tsa iiṙikyia lyanyu na ikunda lyanyu na kye mokyelukumbuo necha mfiri yoose, mulangyie iluwona chandu soe lulangyie immbona.
52003007	Kyipfa kya ikyo, wana wa wama, mbonyi tsanyu tsileluwiyiṟia moo, ngyuukyiwenyi tsaṙu tsoose, kui iiṙikyia lyanyu.
52003008	Cha kyipfa wulalu luwoṙe moo, kokoooya nyoe mulaloloma kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
52003009	Kyipfa nyi kyikyi loiṙima iana nakyo Ruwa imtaa kyilya alemmbutia nyoe, kui sia iya luichihiyo kyipfa kyayo, kyipfa kyanyu mbele yanyu na mbele ya Ruwa;
52003010	kyio na kyingoto kyiyeri lokyeterewa kui ipfuṟukana lying'anyi luiṙime immbona nyoe, na iichuṟia shilya iiṙikyia lyanyu lyilashiwoṙe?
52003011	Kyasia Ruwa amonyi, Awu oṙu, na Mndumii oṙu Yesu, nalusongoye njienyi lushikye konyu.
52003012	Mndumii namusongoye nyoe na imuengyeṟia ikunda, nyoe wenyi ko wenyi, na ko wandu woose chandu na soe lumkundi nyoe.
52003013	Naiṙime itarama mrima yanyu ilalolome ilawaṙe kyindo kyoose mndu eiṙima igamba kye ingyiwicho, wuelenyi mbele ya Ruwa, Awu oṙu, kyiyeri kya icha lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu hamwi na wandu wa Ruwa woose.
52004001	Kyatsugaa ho, wana wa wama, luimuterewa na imuikyimbia kye muwaṙe mkaṟo iṙuṙanyi na shilya Mndumii Yesu akundi; chandu mulewona na ishiicho koṙu nyi wuṙo muwaṟi iwuta muchihiṟe Ruwa; chandu mokyewuta, wutenyi kuṙo na ngoseṟa.
52004002	Cha kyipfa muichi nyi shindo shiha lulemmbia mushiwute kyiiṙi kya Mndumii Yesu.
52004003	Kyipfa isho nyisho Ruwa akundi shiwutikye, iilyisho lyanyu, mukushowe na wuṟui.
52004004	Orio umwi onyu naiṙime ichilyia lango tsa mmbiu okye wuelenyi na wuindi;
52004005	chi kui mkaṟo ya lango ngyiwicho, cha wandu walaichi Ruwa-pfo.
52004006	Mndu alalembe oṙoe maa imṙekyio kyiiṙi kya kyindo-kyi-pfo; cha kyipfa Mndumii nyi oe ekyetaa kyiṟaache kya ishi shoose; chandu lulemmbia kuwooka, lukoṟingyishia mnu.
52004007	Kyipfa Ruwa alelulagia wuṟui-pfo, indi luwe wandu wawailyishe.
52004008	Kyasia ulya ailega, ailega mndu-pfo indi Ruwa, ekyemuenenga nyoe Mumuyo okye Mweele.
52004009	Ko mbonyi tsa ikundana, kuwoṙe kyimaṙuma kya imuṟeia-pfo; kyipfa nyoe muwenyi muwaloshe nyi Ruwa ikundana.
52004010	Cha kyipfa mukundi wana wa wama woose wakyeri urukyenyi loose lo Makyedonia. Kyaindi lomuterewa, wana wa wama, muengyeṟe ikundana.
52004011	Lyingyi-se mutambagane iṙa iṙicha-ṙicha, na iṟunda maṟunda ganyu, na iṟunda kui mawoko ganyu muwenyi, chandu lulemmbia;
52004012	kundu muwaṙe mkaṟo ngyicha mbele ya walya walakyeri poonyi lya walya waiṙikyie Yesu, maa mulatengye-tengye mochieṟeṟa.
52004013	Kyaindi, wana wa wama, lukundi muṙe mulamanya mbonyi tsa iwo wapfiie-pfo, mulachewuta ho iwihiyo mrimenyi cha wengyi walawoṙe ikusuria.
52004014	Kyipfa kokooya loiṙikyia kye Yesu nalepfa kaṟuka, na wuṙo walya wapfiie waiṙikyie Yesu, Ruwa nechiwaṟutsa cha Yesu.
52004015	Koikyo lummbia ishi kui Ṙeṙo lya Mndumii, kye soe lui ho na moo, lochitsugaa ho mṟasa kyiyeri kya icha lya Mndumii; ny'kyaloi lochisongoya walya walempfa-pfo.
52004016	Cha kyipfa Mndumii amonyi nechisoka iwuka ruwewu, na wandu wechiicho ṟui lying'anyi lyilaga, na ṟui lya msongoru o malaika, na iganda lya Ruwa; na walya walepfa waiṙikyie Kristo wechiṟutso kuwooka.
52004017	Naaho-ng'u soe lui ho na moo, luletsugaa ho, Ruwa nechilurakuo na iluṙosia handu hamwi mapuchinyi; kundu luambilyie Mndumii ruwewu; na kuṙo lochikaa hamwi na Mndumii mlungana.
52004018	Kyasia, wiyiṟianenyi moo kui maṙeṙo-ga.
52005001	Kyaindi, wana wa wama, ko mbonyi tsa shiyeri, kuwoṙe kyimaṙuma kyemuṟeia-pfo.
52005002	Kyipfa nyoe muwenyi muichi na pata kye Mndumii nechicha kyiyeri mulakusaṟie chandu mbafu yekyecha kyio.
52005003	Kyiyeri wandu waigamba, “Kuwoṙe ufoṟo na kuwoṙe ndenga-pfo,” nyi lyo-ndu irumatso lyechicha kulawoṙe mndu akusaṟie, chandu fowa yekyecha na ko mndu mka mnene, na kya loi wechikyia-pfo.
52005004	Indi nyoe, wana wa wama, mukyeri meemenyi, mṟasa Yesu nache kyiyeri mulakyikusaṟie chandu mbafu yekyewuta-pfo.
52005005	Cha kyipfa nyoe moose mowa wandu wekyewuta shindo cha ilyi orio kyindo kyekyeṟundo ngyeelenyi; soe chi wandu wekyewuta shindo meemenyi-pfo.
52005006	Kyasia lulalae maṙoe cha wandu wengyi, indi lulae kyiṙombo, na iwaṙa meena.
52005007	Kyipfa walya wekyelaa maṙoe wekyelaa kyio, na walya wekyenango taa wekyenango kyio.
52005008	Kyaindi soe lokyewuta shindo cha ilyi orio kyindo kyekyewuto ngyeelenyi, luwaṙe meena, kunu lochiwaṙa iiṙikyia na ikunda na lukusurie nakamwi ikyiṟo nyi Ruwa, na ikyo kyechiwa kyindo kyeringa mṙoe yaṙu ilakapo nyi kyindo.
52005009	Cha kyipfa Ruwa alalekunda ilukapa kui nyashi yakye, indi luwone wukyiṟo, kui Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo;
52005010	ulya alepfa kyipfa kyaṙu, kundu luwaṙe moo hamwi na oe, kokooya lulee kyiṙombo ang'u kokooya lulee maṙoe.
52005011	Kyasia, wiyiṟianenyi moo na iloshana orio mndu na oṙoe, chandu muiwuta.
52005012	Kyaindi, wana wa wama, lukundi mumanye walya wekyekutuura kyipfa kyanyu, na imugoṟokyia nyoe kyiiṙi kya Mndumii, na imuikyimbia;
52005013	muwaindie mnu ikundenyi, kyipfa kya maṟunda gawo. Waṙenyi ufoṟo nyoe wenyi ko wenyi.
52005014	Wana wa wama, lomuterewa, ṙeṙienyi walya walawoṙe wuyendelyi wucha; karishenyi wafofo, iṟichenyi wafafa; karishienyi wandu woose.
52005015	Kuringyenyi mndu oose alatae oṙoe kyiwicho awutio; indi mfiri yoose oshenyi kyilya kyikyicha, nyoe wenyi ko wenyi na ko wandu woose.
52005016	Chihiyonyi mfiri yoose;
52005017	terewenyi kulawoṙe itsitsia;
52005018	anenyi kyipfa kya orio kyindo; kyipfa isho nyisho shilya Ruwa akundi shiwutikye konyu kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
52005019	Mularumishe Mumuyo Mweele;
52005020	mulamine ionguo shisuku;
52005021	yeshenyi shindo shoose; wutenyi kyilya kyikyicha.
52005022	Kushowenyi na wuwicho wa orio mbaṟe.
52005023	Ruwa o ufoṟo amonyi namuilyishe nakamwi, na nyoe mrima yanyu na ngoo tsanyu na mmbiu yanyu, muwe wandu mulawoṙe ṙeko, kyiyeri kya icha lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
52005024	Ulya alemulaga nyoe nechiwuta, kyipfa nekyewuta shilya ateṟia.
52005025	Wana wa wama, luterewienyi.
52005026	Iṟikyiṟenyi wana wa wama chandu walya waiṙikyie Yesu wekyeiṟikyiṟana.
52005027	Ngammbia kui wuchilyi wo Mndumii, woose waiṙikyie Yesu wasomio paruo-i.
52005028	Isaṟia lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo lyikae hamwi na nyoe.
53001001	Inyi Paulo hamwi na Silyiwano, na Timoteo, loṟeia paruo-i ko siṟi ya Watesalonikye, ikyeri kyiiṙi kya Ruwa Awu, na kyiiṙi kya Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
53001002	Isaṟia lyikae konyu na ufoṟo uwukyie ko Ruwa Awu, na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
53001003	Wana wa wama, kyalukooya iana Ruwa mfiri yoose kyipfa kyanyu, chandu kyiwaṟi, cha kyipfa iiṙikyia lyanyu lyiengyeṟika mnu, na ikunda lya orio mndu konyu ko oṙoe lyang'ana.
53001004	Mṟasa na soe luwenyi lukushela kyipfa kyanyu siṟinyi tsa Ruwa kyipfa kya isimiria lyanyu, na iiṙikyia muwoṙe fowenyi tsanyu tsoose na wukyiwa wung'anyi muikarishia.
53001005	Nyikyo kyiṟingyishio kya sungusinyi kya ianduyo lyikyeri wusumganyi wo Ruwa, kundu mutalyio kye kyimmbaṟi iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo Ruwa, iwo womuenenga ilyiso wukyiwa.
53001006	Cha kyipfa nyi necha mbele ya Ruwa ilyisa wukyiwa walya waimulyisa wukyiwa nyoe;
53001007	na imutaa nyoe muilyiso wukyiwa sia hamwi na soe; kyiyeri kya iloṟo lya Mndumii Yesu iwuka ruwewu hamwi na malaika wa wuiṙimi wokye.
53001008	Nesoka moṙonyi wuiaka; kunu echitaa kyiṟaache iwo walaichi Ruwa, na iwo walaindie Ndumi Ngyicha ya Mndumii oṙu Yesu.
53001009	Wechianduyo kui irumatso lya mlungana, iwiko kuleshi na kyaam kya Mndumii na mng'ano o pfinya tsakye.
53001010	Oe kyiyeri echicha kundu nang'anyiso wandunyi wa Ruwa, na kochiwaṙa iṟiyio lying'anyi kyiiṙi kya woose waleiṙikyia mfiri ulya (kyipfa wuṟingyishi woṙu wuleiṙikyio konyu.)
53001011	Koikyo lumuterewia nyoe mfiri yoose, kundu Ruwa oṙu namutale kye muwaṟi ilago lyanyu, kaafutsia orio njia ya wucha na orio iṟunda lya iiṙikyia kui pfinya.
53001012	Rina lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu lying'anyiso mrimenyi konyu, na nyoe kyiiṙi kyakye, kui isaṟia lya Ruwa oṙu na lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
53002001	Kyasia, wana wa wama, lumuterewa, ko mbonyi tsa icha lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, na ikuumbia lyaṙu mbele yakye,
53002002	kye maa mulaiṟewe iwinyi mṟasa iṙa iwuta kyilya mukundi, maa mulaowesho, kui mumuyo, maa kui ṙeṙo, maa kui paruo ikusaṟo kye nyi yaṙu, cha ilyi kye mfiri Mndumii aicha lya kawi ulemcha.
53002003	Mndu oose ulamulembe kui mbaṟe yoose; kyipfa mfiri-cho uicha-pfo, mṟasa kuche kuwooka Ikana Ruwa, kaloṟo na pata mndu ulya molega kilya Ruwa awawasie, mana ekyekana Ruwa.
53002004	Ulya ekyewingana, ekyekuiria oe amonyi wuye ya orio kyindo kyekyelago Ruwa ang'u ikundo na iindio; mṟasa oe amonyi iṙamia hekalunyi lya Ruwa, kakuloṟa oe amonyi cha ilyi kye oe nyi oe Ruwa.
53002005	Ngyesa mukumburie kye kyiyeri ngyiwekyeri hamwi na nyoe ngyilemmbia isho-pfoe?
53002006	Na wulalu kyishingyie mukyiichi, ulya naiṙime iloṟo na pata kyiyeri kyakye.
53002007	Kyipfa wuṟikyi wulya wo iwingana wuiṟunda wulalu; kyaindi kuwoṙe ashingyie wulalu mṟasa kyiyeri ewuto ho.
53002008	Iho nyi ho-ndu eloṟo-ng'u ulya alewie Ruwa, ulya Mndumii Yesu emmbaaga kui mṟufui o ṙumbu lyakye, na imrumatsa kui iloṟo lya oe ikaa pfo.
53002009	Ulya akyeri kye icha lyakye nyi kui pfinya ya Satana, kui wuiṙimi woose, na shiṟingyishio na maṟiyisho ga wongo.
53002010	Na wulembinyi woose wo wunyamaṟi ko iwo waiṙeka; cha kyipfa waleiṙikyia ikunda loi iya waiṙime ikyiṟo-pfo.
53002011	Koikyo Ruwa naiwaendie pfinya ya iṙeka, waiṙikyie wongo;
53002012	kundu waanduyo woose walaleiṙikyia loi, indi wawechihiyo kyipfa kya iwuta wunyamaṟi.
53002013	Kyaindi kyalukooya soe iana Ruwa mfiri yoose kyipfa kyanyu, wana wa wama mulekundo nyi Mndumii, cha kyipfa Ruwa nalemusambuṟa wookyia mawookyionyi muambilyie wukyiṟo, kyiiṙi kya iilyisho nyi Mumuyo, na iiṙikyia loi;
53002014	alemulagia nyoe kui Ndumi Ngyicha yaṙu, kundu luambilyie mng'ano o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
53002015	Kyasia, wana wa wama waṙu, goṟokyenyi kulawoṙe iloloma, muoshe shilya muleambilyia kui malosho gaṙu, kokooya nyi kui maṙeṙo, ang'u kui paruo yaṙu.
53002016	Na Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo amonyi, na Ruwa Awu oṙu, alelukunda kaluenenga iwiyiṟio moo lya mlungana na ikusuria lyicha, isaṟienyi,
53002017	namuwiyiṟie moo na imukarisha orio ṙeṙonyi na iṟundenyi lyicha.
53003001	Lyefurumia, wana wa wama, luterewienyi, Ṙeṙo lya Mndumii lyiengyeṟikye na ing'anyiso chandu kyikyeri konyu.
53003002	Lundekyiṟo iwuka ko wandu wulawoṙe wusumganyi, wawicho, kyipfa chi woose wawoṙe iiṙikyia-pfo.
53003003	Kyaindi Mndumii nekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia, echimukarisha na imuringa mulatewo nyi mmbicho ulya.
53003004	Na soe lukusurie Mndumii ko mbonyi tsanyu, kye muiwuta shilya lulemmbia, lyingyi-se kye mochishiwuta.
53003005	Mndumii namusongoye mrima yanyu muambilyie ikunda lya Ruwa na wusimiri wo Kristo.
53003006	Wana wa wama waṙu, lummbia rinenyi lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo, kaenyi kuleshi na mono-wama alaiosha kyilya muleambilyia koṙu.
53003007	Muichi muwenyi chandu kyimmbaṟi iluosha; cha kyipfa lulewaṙa mkaṟo mmbicho konyu-pfo.
53003008	Maa lulelya kyelya ko mndu oose kui imteng'elyia-pfo indi kui wukyiwa na matuuro, kyio na kyingoto luleṟunda, kundu mndu oose o konyu alaluenengye kyindo kulawoṙe imtaa.
53003009	Chi kye lulawewoṙe pfinya ya imuitika muluenengye shindo-pfo, kundu nyoe mukuloshie koṙu, muluoshe.
53003010	Cha kyipfa maa kyiyeri kyilya luwekyeri konyu lulemmbia kyindo-kyi, kye kokooya mndu alakundi iṟunda kyindo, kyasia, alalye kyelya.
53003011	Kyipfa luichuoe kye kuwoṙe wandu konyu walawoṙe mkaṟo mcha, wawoṙe maṟunda-pfo, kyaindi wekyekuwinisha na mbonyi tsa wandu wengyi.
53003012	Kyasia luwia iwo na iwatutuma kyiiṙi kya Mndumii Yesu Kristo, waṟunde maṟunda kui wuramiri na ilya kyelya kya msino owo wawenyi.
53003013	Kyaindi nyoe, wana wa wama, maa mulapfiiyo nyi mṙoe kyiiṙi kya iwuta shindo shicha.
53003014	Na kokooya mndu oose alaosha malosho gaṙu gakyeri iha paruonyi kushowenyi na mndu-cho, maa mulaṙeṙe na oe, naiṙime irigo nyi sonu;
53003015	kyaindi mulamtale cha mokyituwa, kyaindi mtutumenyi cha mono-wama.
53003016	Wulalu, Mndumii o ufoṟo amonyi namuenengye ufoṟo kyiyeri kyoose kui njia tsoose. Mndumii nawe hamwi na nyoe moose.
53003017	Shiiṟikyiṟo shako inyi Paulo, inyi ngyimonyi. Ikyi nyikyo kyindo kyeloṟa orio paruo; nyi kuṙo ngyekyeṟeia.
53003018	Isaṟia lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo lyikae na nyoe moose.
54001001	Inyi Paulo, msu o Kristo Yesu, kui iwawaso lya Ruwa Mkyiṟa oṙu na Kristo Yesu, ulya lukuwoṙe na oe tapu;
54001002	ngaṟeia paruo-i ko Timoteo, mana oko mkunde iiṙikyienyi. Isaṟia lyikae kopfo, na ihooṟia, na ufoṟo, shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu na ko Kristo Yesu Mndumii oṙu.
54001003	Ngyilekuterewa ukae Efeso, kyiyeri ngyiweiyenda Makyedonia, kundu uime wandu wengyi walaloshe shindo shingyi.
54001004	Walaṙetsie shiyeri shawo mbonyinyi tsa wongo na marinenyi gafoi ga waku wawo, shekyeenenga wandu iwesa shindo shifoi sha wutondo. Shindo-sho shiwoṙe ṙaawa kyindonyi Ruwa aluṟeyeṟie-pfo, kyindo lukyiichi kui iiṙikyia.
54001005	Kyaindi kyimaṙuma kya iwawaso-lyo nyi ikunda lyiwukyie mrimenyi mwilyi na makusaṟonyi mecha, na iiṙikyia lyilawoṙe wukulembecheṟi.
54001006	Wengyi walaichi isho waleosha shindo shiwicho;
54001007	wakundi iwa walosha wa mawawaso, maa chandu walaichi shilya waigamba maa shindo shilya waionguo kulawoṙe wuowu.
54001008	Kyaindi luichi kye mawawaso nyi kyindo kyicha, kokooya mndu agakusuria kui njia ikyeri ya sungusinyi.
54001009	Aichi kyindo-kyi kye mawawaso chi galeṙiko kyipfa kya wandu wasumganyi-pfo indi kyipfa kya wanyamaṟi, na walakyeri wayendelyi, na wekyefunja mawawaso ga Ruwa, na walya walekyeindia shindo shiele, na wekyewaaga wafee wawo, na wawaagi.
54001010	Na waṟui, na wekyelaa na wandu wa nguwo tsawo, na wekyeiwa wandu, na wekyeṙeṙa wongo, na wekyelya nyamu kui wongo; na kuwoṙe kyindo kyingyi kyoose kyilaṙuṙanyi na malosho gawoṙe moo.
54001011	Chandu kyikyionguoe Nduminyi Ngyicha ya kyiṟumi kya Ruwa ekyeṟumisho, Ndumi Ngyicha ngyileenengo iṟunda lyeionguo.
54001012	Na inyi ngyiana Kristo Yesu Mndumii oṙu, alengyienenga pfinya cha kyipfa alengyiwona kye ngyekyeafutsia shilya ngateṟia, kangyiwika iṟundenyi lyakye.
54001013	Maa chandu ipfo mawookyionyi ngyiwekyelahia, mndu ekyelyisa wandu wukyiwa, ngyilekyeaṙanyia shilya ngyiwio; kyaindi ngyileenengo isaṟia cha kyipfa ngyilewuta kuṙo kui wutondo, na kyipfa kya iuṟa iiṙikyia.
54001014	Na isaṟia lya Mndumii oṙu lyileengyeṟika mnu, hamwi na iiṙikyia na ikunda lyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
54001015	Nyi kyindo kya loi, na kyiwaṟi iiṙikyio nakamwi, kye Kristo Yesu nalecha na wuyanenyi nakyiṟe wanyamaṟi; walya o kuwooka ai nyi inyi.
54001016	Kyaindi kyipfa kya ikyo ngyilewona isaṟia, kundu mrimenyi koko inyi o kuwooka, Yesu Kristo naṟingyishie wucha wokye wulekyesia; ngyiwe kyindo walya wechimwiṙikyia wechikyiambuya, wawone moo o mlungana.
54001017	Wulalu ko Mangyi o shiyeri shoose, alekyerumatso, alekyewono na meso, Ruwa alawoṙe ungyi ai cha oe, kokye kuwaṙe wuindi na kyiṟumi mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
54001018	Mono-ko, Timoteo, gakuenenga iwawaso-lyi lyiwe kyiseyesoe, kyipfa kya mbonyi tsapfo tsa ionguo shisuku, kundu kyiiṙi kya isho ukapane shiṙa shilya shicha.
54001019	Uwe mndu awoṙe iiṙikyia na makusaṟo mecha, galya wandu wengyi walegatakulyia kuleshi, wakarumara ko mbonyi tsa iiṙikyia.
54001020	Kyiiṙi kya iwo kuwoṙe Himenayo na Iskanda, walya ngyilewaṙambika Satana, kundu nawakape, na kui iwutio kuṙo wakuloshe walalahie Ruwa.
54002001	Kyasia kyindo kying'anyi kuta shoose nyi iterewiana, iterewa Ruwa shilya lukundi, na iana Ruwa kyipfa kya mboṟa tsakye. Isho shiwutikye kyipfa kya wandu woose;
54002002	kyipfa kya wamangyi na wawoṙe wuchilyi, luwe wandu walakyeri ndengyenyi na wawoṙe ufoṟo, kyiiṙi kya iindia Ruwa na wandu woose.
54002003	Ikyi nyi kyindo kyicha, nakyo nyi kyindo kyikyikunde mbele ya Ruwa Mkyiṟa oṙu,
54002004	ulya akundi wandu woose wakyiṟo, na iiṙima imanya shikyeri sha loi.
54002005	Cha kyipfa Ruwa nyi umwi, na ulya ekyesanza Ruwa na wandu nyi umwi, mndu ulya ai Kristo Yesu.
54002006	Ulya alekuwuta amonyi kundu naendie wandu woose wukyiṟo; ikuwuta lyileloṟa kyiyeri Ruwa akundi ikyiṟa wandu woose.
54002007	Na inyi kyipfa kya wukyiṟo-wo ngyilewiko ngyiwe moonguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na msu (ngyiṙeṙa loi, ngyiṙeṙa wongo-pfo), mlosha o wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa iiṙikyienyi na wuloi.
54002008	Kyasia ngyikundi wasoṟo waloshe siṟinyi, wawoṙe mrima ngyiwaṙami. Waire mawoko ilyi waiterewa Ruwa, kulawoṙe ikapo nyi nyashi ang'u igaluana.
54002009	Na wuṙo waka wakuchope kui nguwo, wakushikyie necha, hamwi na wupfereri wucha, na mrima uwoṙe meena; chi kui ioka njui, maa iṟaa shindo sha sahapu na lulu, maa nguwo tsa woguru wung'anyi-pfo;
54002010	indi kui mawuto mecha, chandu kyiwaṟi waka wekyeloṟa kye waowuye na ikunda Ruwa.
54002011	Mndu mka nakuloshe alaiamtsa kyituṟu, echipfereria nakamwi.
54002012	Ngyienenga mndu mka momu o ilosha maa o ichilyia mndu msoṟo-pfo, indi nawe mndu alaiamtsa kyituṟu.
54002013	Cha kyipfa Adamu nyi oe alegumbo kuwooka, na Eva kagumbo numa.
54002014	Maa Adamu alelembo-pfo, indi mndu mka nalelembo nakamwi kaṙeko.
54002015	Kyaindi mndu mka nechikyiṟo kui iwaṙa wana, kokooya awaṙa iiṙikyia Yesu na ikunda na iilyisho, hamwi na mrima uwoṙe meena.
54003001	Nyi kyindo kya loi kye mndu kakunda iṟunda lya askofu, nalanga kyindo kyicha.
54003002	Kyasia kyiwaṟi askofu nawe mndu alekyegambo kye nawoṙe wuwicho woose, mii o mka umwi, awoṙe meena na wuṟango, mndu muyendelyi, ekyeambilyia wandu, aichi ilosha.
54003003	Chi mndu aichiwie wunanzi-pfo, chi mndu ekyekapa wandu-pfo; indi nawe mhoo. Chi mndu mogaluana kui maṙeṙo, maa mndu akundi heleri-pfo.
54003004	Mndu ekyechilyia necha kanyi kokye, aichi itoṟisha wana;
54003005	(kyimwi na igamba, mndu alawoṙe wuiṙimi wo ichilyia kanyi kokye, neiṙima kuṙa iambuya Siṟi ya Ruwa?)
54003006	Maa alawe mndu aleilachika na iosha Yesu mfiri ya kufuhi, alachekushela kaanduyo chandu Mokyiriinzi alekushela kaanduyo.
54003007	Lyingyi-se nawaṟi iṟingyishio wucha na wandu walya walakyeri poonyi lya walya waiṙikyie Yesu, kundu alachewuta shindo sha sonu na iwingo nyi Mokyiriinzi.
54003008	Na wuṙo mashemasi wawe wandu wawoṙe mkaṟo yechienenga wandu iwaindia. Chi wandu wekyegamba ikyi inu na kyingyi ngama-pfo. Chi wandu wekyenyo mpfinyo mnu-pfo. Chi wandu wawoṙe wulanga wo masaa ga sonu-pfo.
54003009	Wechiosha malosho ga iiṙikyia Yesu kui mrima ngyiwaṙami.
54003010	Iwa taa wayesho kuwooka, naaho waṟunde iṟunda lya mashemasi; wammbono kye wawoṙe tewe-pfo.
54003011	Na wuṙo waka wawo wawaṙe mkaṟo yechienenga wandu iwaindia. Chi wandu wekyeiria wengyi shindo sha wongo-pfo. Wandu wawoṙe meena, wekyeafutsia shoose wateṟia.
54003012	Mashemasi wawe mamii wa mka umwi, wechitoṟisha wana wawo necha, na kanyi kowo.
54003013	Cha kyipfa wekyeṟunda necha iṟunda lya ushemasi wekyewona rina lyicha, na wekyeiṙima ionguo kulawoṙe wuowu mbonyi tsa iiṙikyia lyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
54003014	Ngyikuṟeia isho ngyikusaṟie icha na kopfo mfiri ya kufuhi.
54003015	Kyaindi ngakyelyio, umanye chandu kyiwaṟi wandu iwuta kyiyeri-kyo wakyeri numbenyi ya Ruwa, ikyeri Siṟi ya Mndumii ai na moo, ngoe na urende lo loi.
54003016	Na loi kyiṟika kya iowuo na ikunda Ruwa nyi kyindo kying'anyi. “Ruwa naleṟingyishio mmbiunyi, kamanyika nawoṙe wusumganyi Mumuyonyi, kawono nyi malaika. Mbonyi tsakye tsikagambo ko walya walaiṙikyie Yesu, wandu wa wuyana wakamwiṙikyia, kaṙoo wuye ruwewu kyiṟuminyi.”
54004001	Kyasia Mumuyo naiṙeṙa na pata kye shiyeri sha mafurumionyi wandu wengyi wechikuletsana na iiṙikyia, wechiaṙanyia mumuyo ngyiwicho yekyelemba, na malosho ga wandu waikuloṟa cha ilyi wawoṙe Mumuyo o Ruwa kyaindi wawachilyie nyi Satana.
54004002	Kui wukulembecheṟi wo wandu wekyeṙeṙa wongo, na mrima ipfiie ngapfu kyipfa ingyichilyie nyi Satana.
54004003	Wechilosha kye wandu walaalyikye ang'u ialyiko, na iwawia walalye shelya shilyiwe, shilya Ruwa aleshigumba, na soe luiṙikyie Yesu imanya wuloi kye luwaṟi iana Ruwa kyiyeri loambilyia shindo-sho.
54004004	Cha kyipfa orio kyindo Ruwa agumbie kyikyicha, maa kuwoṙe kyiwaṟi ilego-pfo, kokooya kyaambilyio kui iana.
54004005	Kyipfa kyikyiilyishe kui Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa na kui iterewa.
54004006	Ukumbuṟe wandu shindo-sho, na iyoe nochiwa mṟundi mcha o Kristo Yesu, na mndu uichiwie mbonyi tsa iiṙikyia, na malosho mecha galya uleosha.
54004007	Indi malosho galaṙuṙanyi na galya ya Ndumi Ngyicha ugalege, na iyoe ukuichiwiṟe iwaṙa iowuo na ikunda Ruwa.
54004008	Cha kyipfa ikuichiwiṟa iwaṙa pfinya tsa mmbiu kuwoṙe kyiira kyitutu, kyaindi iowuo na ikunda Ruwa shindonyi shoose nyi kyindo kyicha. Kyimwi na igamba, nuwoṙe kyiteṟio kya moo o wulalu, na ulya ochikouipfo mfiri-yo iicha.
54004009	Nyi kyindo kya loi nakamwi, na kyiwaṟi iiṙikyio nyi woose wekyeosha Yesu,
54004010	kye lokyekulyisa wukyiwa na itambagana kyipfa kya ikyo, na luwikyie ikusuria lyaṙu ko Ruwa ai na moo, akyeri Mkyiṟa o wandu woose, ngoseṟa o walya waiṙikyie.
54004011	Shindo-sho ushigambe na ishilosha.
54004012	Mndu oose alamine wundaka wopfo, indi uwaṙe mkaṟo mcha mbele ya walya waiṙikyie Yesu, kyiiṙi kya iṙeṙa na ikundenyi na ufoṟo na mkaṟonyi ulawoṙe ukoe lo wuṟui.
54004013	Mṟasa kyiyeri ngyechicha, upfuṟukane kyiiṙi kya ikulosha shiṟeio shiele na iikyimba na ilosha.
54004014	Ulaṙe iṟunda na kyisumbo kyilya uwoṙe, umwenengye kui ionguo shisuku na kui iyekyio mawoko nyi wameeku wa siṟi.
54004015	Isho ukusaṟe kyipfa kyasho; ushioshe; kundu wandu woose wamanye handu ushikyie.
54004016	Ringa mrima opfo, na malosho gapfo. Ulalekane na shindo-sho; kyipfa kui iwuta kuṙo nochikyiṟa mrima opfo na mrima ya walya wechiicho shilya uilosha.
54005001	Ulaṟoṟome mndu meeku, indi ṙeṙa na oe cha awu opfo; na ndaka cha wana wa womoo.
54005002	Ṙeṙa na wakyeku cha wamama wapfo; wana wa kyika cha washikyi wapfo; kui mkaṟo ulawoṙe ukoe lo wuṟui.
54005003	Uindie wakusu wai wakusu wa loi.
54005004	Kyaindi mkusu kokooya nawoṙe wana ang'u wachuku, wakuloshe kuwooka iwuta shilya wawaṟi iwutia wa kanyi kowo, na itaa wafee wawo. Cha kyipfa nyi kyindo kyichihiṟie mbele ya Ruwa.
54005005	Kyasia, ulya ai mkusu o loi, namṙe amonyi, icho nakusurie Ruwa, na oe orio mfiri nekyeterewa kyingoto na kyio.
54005006	Indi, ulya alekyeringa mrima okye napfiie maa chandu ai na moo.
54005007	Shindo-sho taa ushigambe, kundu mndu oose alagambe kye walya owawia wawoṙe ṙeko.
54005008	Kyaindi mndu oose alekyeambuya walya wakyeri wakye, ngoseṟa walya wa kanyi kokye, nakana Iirikyia, lyingyi-se nammbicho kuta mndu alaiṙikyie Yesu.
54005009	Mkusu alatalo nyi mkusu sile awaṙa maka makumi gaṟandaaṟu; na oe nai mka o mii umwi.
54005010	Na oe naṟingyishio kye nawoṙe mawuto mecha; kokooya naleambuya na iṙosa wana necha, kokooya naleambilyia wayenu, kookoya nalekutitiṟa mṟasa kaanguo wandu wa Ruwa maṙende, kokooya naletarama wandu wailyiso wukyiwa, kokooya nalewika wuragari iṟundenyi lyicha.
54005011	Indi wakusu wakoho ulawatale kye nyi wakusu, kyipfa wakang'anyio nyi lango kyilaṙuṙanyi na malosho ga Kristo, wakundi ialyiko.
54005012	Nawo wechianduyo kyipfa waṙa iiṙikyia lyilya lyawo lya kuwooka.
54005013	Lyingyi-se, hamwi na isho, wekyekulosha iṙokuo, wechitenga-tenga numba kui numba. Maa chi waṙoko tupu-pfo; kyaindi wekyeṙeṙa shindo shekyeende kyituwa na wekyesuma-suma shindo sha wandu wengyi wechiṙeṙa shindo shilawawaṟi iṙeṙa.
54005014	Kyasia ngyikundi wakusu, walawaku, waalyiko, wafee wana, wachilyie kanyi kowo; kundu walaenengye mokyituwa ṙaawa lyegamba kye luwoṙe ṙeko.
54005015	Cha kyipfa wengyi wamuilachika na iosha Satana.
54005016	Mndu mka aiṙikyie, kokooya nawoṙe wakusu, nawatarame oe amonyi, kundu siṟi ilalemio; kundu siṟi itarame walya wakyeri wakusu wa loi.
54005017	Wameeku wa siṟi wekyechilyia necha na watalo kye wawaṟi iindio ngoseṟa, ngoseṟa walya wekyekuwinisha iṙeṙa mbele ya wandu na ilosha.
54005018	Kyipfa kyiṟeio kyiele kyagamba, “Maa ulaime umbe ilya ilyi ikutarama ihuo nganu.” Na lyingyi-se, “Mṟundi nawaṟi wori wokye.”
54005019	Molaiṙikyie kyiyeri oicho kye mndu meeku nawuta kyindo kyiwicho, sile kokooya noicho waṟingyishi wawi ang'u waṟaaṟu wegamba kuṙo.
54005020	Walya wekyewuta sha wunyamaṟi orio kyiyeri uwaṟoṟome mbele ya wandu woose kundu na wengyi waowuo.
54005021	Ngakuwia mbele ya Ruwa, mbele ya Kristo Yesu, na mbele ya malaika wasambuṟe, uwute isho kulawoṙe ianduya kui iṙimaṙima. Ulawute kyindo kyoose kui ikundia.
54005022	Ulayekyie mndu mawoko kui iṙimaṙima, maa ulakuwikye ngyuunyamaṟinyi tsa wandu wengyi. Uringye mrima opfo ulafanyiṟo nyi ukoe.
54005023	Wookyia wulalu ulanyo mṟinga tupu-pfo kyaindi nyo mpfinyo kyitutu, kyipfa kya ndewu yapfo, na ndoṟe-tso tsekyekutuura orio kyiyeri.
54005024	Ngyuunyamaṟi tsa wandu wengyi tsiwonio na pata, na tsiwasongoya iyenda kyianduyonyi, kyaindi ngyuunyamaṟi tsa wandu wengyi tsechiwono kyiyeri kyilya kyeanduya kyilashika-pfo.
54005025	Na wuṙo mawuto mecha gawonio na pata; maa kokooya galawonio nyi wandu chi kyindo kyeiṙima ikuṟiika-pfo.
54006001	Wandu woose waiṙikyie Yesu wawapfungye nyi mshe ya wusinga, wawone wandumii wawo kye wawaṟi iindio mnu, rina lya Ruwa lyilamino hamwi na malosho gaṙu.
54006002	Na walya wawoṙe wandumii waiṙikyie Yesu walawamine cha kyipfa nyi wana wa wama kyiiṙi kya Yesu; indi nyi kyicha wawaṟundie, cha kyipfa wandumii-wo wekyewona kyiira kya iṟunda lyawo wawa wandu wakunde.
54006003	Uloshe na itutuma shindo-shi. Mndu oose kalosha mbonyi tsingyi, alaiṙikyie mbonyi tsiwoṙe moo o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, maa malosho galaṙuṙanyi na iowuo na ikunda Ruwa,
54006004	mndu-cho nakushela. Maa aichi kyindo kyoose-pfo; indi nawoṙe wusuko wo ikunda igaluana na iluyana kui maṙeṙo, maṙeṙo gekyeende wunyeng'i, shiloyano, shilahio, na ikusaṟa kye mndu ungyi nawuta kyindo kyiwicho.
54006005	Na igaluana lya maṙeṙo lya wandu wanyamaṟikyie mṙoe yawo, walaichi wuloi, kunu wechikusaṟa kye iowuo na ikunda Ruwa nyi njia ya iwona kyiira.
54006006	Kyaindi iowuo na ikunda Ruwa hamwi na iṙa ilanga shindo shifong'ui nyi kyindo kyiwoṙe kyiiṙa kying'anyi.
54006007	Cha kyipfa lulecha na wuyanenyi luwoṙe kyindo-pfo; lyingyi-se lochiwuka pfo luwoṙe kyindo-pfo.
54006008	Indi lukowaṙa kyelya na nguwo lulapfule-pfule-se shindo sha ngoseṟa.
54006009	Kyaindi iwo wakundi iwaṙa masaa wekyeoloka shiyeshonyi na mṙegonyi, na langonyi tsingyi tsa maai, tsekyelyisa wukyiwa, tsekyeolotsa wandu wuṙetsinyi na wunyamaṟinyi.
54006010	Kyipfa mri o mawicho ga orio mbaṟe nyi ikunda heleri. Nyi kui ikunda mnu heleri wandu waata walelekana na iiṙikyia wechikulyisa ngyuukyiwa tsifoi.
54006011	Indi iyoe mndu o Ruwa, uṙiche shindo-sho; uoshe wusumganyi, iowuo na ikunda Ruwa, iiṙikyia, ikunda, wusimiri, na wuhoo.
54006012	Kapana shiṙa shilya shicha sha iiṙikyia. Waṙa moo ulya o mlungana ulelagio nyi Ruwa kyiyeri ulegamba na pata iiṙikyia lyapfo mbele ya waṟingyishi wafoi.
54006013	Ngakuwia mbele ya Ruwa ekyeringa shindo shoose, na mbele ya Kristo Yesu, alegamba iiṙikyia lyakye mbele ya Pontio Pilato,
54006014	kye uringye iwawaso-lyi kulawoṙe tewe, kulawoṙe mndu igamba kye nowuta kyindo kyiwicho, mṟasa kyiyeri Ruwa echishukuo Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
54006015	Kyiyeri oe amonyi echikuṟingyishia kyiyeri kyikashika, ulya aleṟumisho, awoṙe pfinya oe amonyi, Mangyi o wamangyi, Mndumii o wandumii.
54006016	Ulya alekyepfa, akyeri ngyeelenyi ilekyeiṙima irumisho; maa kulawoṙe mndu alemummbona, maa eiṙima immbona. Kyiyeri kyoose naenengo kyiṟumi na pfinya mṟasa mlungana. Amen.
54006017	Walya wakyeri wanjama wa wuyana wo wulalu uwawie walakushele, maa walakusurie wunjama wowo wukyeri cha mboshia, indi wakusurie Ruwa ekyeluenenga shindo shoose kulawoṙe iehia kundu luṟunde nasho kui sia.
54006018	Wawute shindo shicha, wawe wanjama kui iwuta wucha, waenengyie masaa gawo, wakae na wandu wengyi kui mrima;
54006019	kunu wechikooma kyiseyesoe kyiwe urende lucha ko kyiyeri kyiicha, kundu wawone moo o loi.
54006020	Iyoe Timoteo, ringa kyilya Ruwa alekuṙambika, ukushowe na malosho galaṙuṙanyi na galya ga wandu wekyeindia Ruwa, ga wutondo, na maṙeṙo ga wutondo gekyelago malosho kui wongo;
54006021	galya wengyi wekyegaṙeṙa wakaasha Iiṙikyia. Isaṟia lyikae na nyoe moose.
55001001	Inyi Paulo, msu o Kristo Yesu, iṙuana na chandu Ruwa akundi, kyipfa kya kyaasa kya moo ukyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu;
55001002	ngaṟeia paruo-i ko Timoteo, mono-ko mkunde. Isaṟia lyikae kopfo, na ufoṟo, shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu na ko Kristo Yesu Mndumii oṙu.
55001003	Ngyiana Ruwa, ngyekyemwindia na imterewa kui mrima mmbaṙami wookyia kacha lya waku wako, chandu ngyekyekukumbuo iyoe kyiyeri kyoose, kyiiṙi kya iterewa lyako kyio na kyingoto.
55001004	Na inyi ngyilangyie mnu ikuwona, ngyechikumbuo mcheṟeṟe yapfo, kundu ngiichuo sia;
55001005	ngyechikumbuo iiṙikyia uwoṙe lyilawoṙe wukulembecheṟi lyiwekyeri kuwooka ko wakyekuyo ekyelago Loisi, na ko womoo ekyelago Eunikye, na inyi ngyiichi kye maa iyoe nulyiwoṙe.
55001006	Kyipfa kya ikyo ngyikukumbuṟa, ulanyamaṟe kyisumbo kya Ruwa, kyikyeri mrimenyi kopfo kui iyekyio mawoko gako.
55001007	Kyipfa Ruwa aleluenenga mrima o wuowu-pfo, indi o pfinya na o ikunda na uwoṙe meena.
55001008	Kyasia ularigo nyi sonu kyipfa kya iṟingyishia lyaṙu. Ularigo nyi sonu kyipfa kyako inyi mpfungo okye, indi ukarishie mawicho hamwi na inyi kyipfa kya Ndumi Ngyicha, iṙuana na pfinya ya Ruwa.
55001009	Ulya alelukyiṟa kalulaga kui ndago ngyiele; chi iṙuana na mawuto gaṙu soe-pfo; indi na kyilya oe akundi na isaṟia lyakye. Isaṟia-lyo luleenengo kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu wookyia mlungana.
55001010	Na wulalu lyiṟingyishio kui iloṟo lya Mkyiṟa oṙu Kristo Yesu; alegalutsa upfu, na ishukuo moo na kulawoṙe inyamaṟika, kui Ndumi iya Ngyicha;
55001011	ikyeri kye kyipfa kyayo ngyilewiko ngyiwe moonguo mbonyi na msu na mlosha.
55001012	Kyipfa kya ikyo ngyileolokyio matuuro-ga maa ngyirigo nyi sonu-pfo; kyipfa ngyiichi icho ngyimwiṙikyie, na imanya piu kye neiṙima iringa kyilya ngyilekooma kokye mṟasa mfiri ulya.
55001013	Osha necha kui wuragari mbonyi tsiwoṙe moo uletsiicho koko, iiṙikyienyi lya ikunda lyikyeri kyiiri kya Kristo Yesu.
55001014	Ringa kyindo kyilya kyicha kui Mumuyo Mweele ekyekaa mrimenyi koṙu.
55001015	Nuichi kyindo-kyi, kye woose wakyeri wa Asia walengyiṙicha. Kyiiṙi kyawo kuwoṙe Fikyelo na Herimokyene.
55001016	Mndumii naenengye isaṟia walya wa ura lo Onesifoṟo, kyipfa kafoi nalengyichihiṟa, maa alerigo sonu nyi kyipfa kya ilyi ngyiwempfungye-pfo,
55001017	indi kyiyeri awekyeri iha Roma, nalengyipfula kui wuragari kangyiwona.
55001018	Mndumii namwenengye iwona isaṟia mbele ya Mndumii mfiri ulya o ianduyo. Na chandu alengyiṟundia kulya Efeso, iyoe nuichi mnu.
55002001	Kyasia iyoe, mono-ko, uwaṙe wukari isaṟienyi lyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
55002002	Na shindo shilya uleshiicho koko mbele ya waṟingyishi wafoi, isho ushiṙambikye wandu wasimiri wechiiṙima ilosha wengyi.
55002003	Ulye wukyiwa hamwi na inyi, cha asikari mcha o Kristo Yesu.
55002004	Kuwoṙe mndu ekyekapana shiṙa ekyekuwika shindonyi sha wuyana-pfo, kundu nachihiṟe ulya alemṟeia nawe asikari.
55002005	Maa mndu kawingana temonyi ekyeenengo kyindo kyeloṟa nammbinzi, sile awingana kulawoṙe ngyeṟo-pfo.
55002006	Kyiwaṟi mṙemi awoṙe wukyiwa wo maṟunda nawe o kuwooka iambilyia ṙombo lya ndunda.
55002007	Manya mnu isho ngyigamba, cha kyipfa Mndumii nekuenenga wuṟango mbonyinyi tsoose.
55002008	Kumbuo Yesu Kristo aleṟuka ko wapfu, o mbaṟe ya Dawidi chandu malosho gako ga Ndumi-i Ngyicha gaigamba.
55002009	Na inyi kyiiṙi kyayo ngyiletuuro mṟasa ipfungo cha mndu awutie mawicho; kyaindi Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyekyepfungo-pfo.
55002010	Kyipfa kya ikyo ngyikarishia mbonyi tsoose, kyipfa kya wasambuṟe, kundu nawo waambilyie wukyiṟo wulya wukyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu, hamwi na mng'ano o mlungana.
55002011	Nyi mbonyi iwaṟi iiṙikyio, cha kyipfa kokooya lopfa hamwi na oe, lochiwaṙa moo hamwi na oe taa.
55002012	Kokooya losimiria, lochichilyia hamwi na oe. Kokooya lomkana oe, na oe nelukana soe.
55002013	Kokooya soe lulaiṙikyie, oe nekyeṙio ho kui iiṙikyio; cha kyipfa echiiṙima ikukana amonyi-pfo.
55002014	Uwakumbuṟe mbonyi-tso, ochiwaikyimbia mbele ya Ruwa, walawaṙe iwingana kui maṙeṙo, galawoṙe kyiira, indi gekyenyamaṟa walya wekyegaicho.
55002015	Pfuṟukana iloṟa kye numwiṙikyie nyi Ruwa, mṟundi alawoṙe kyitewe kyerigo nyi sonu, na ilosha necha Ndumi Ngyicha.
55002016	Kaa kuleshi na mbonyi tsilawoṙe kyiira, tsilakyeri tsa mwiṙikyie o india Ruwa; kyipfa wechiengyeṟika ngoseṟa kyiiṙi kya iwuta shiwicho
55002017	na mbonyi tsawo tseṙunganana cha pee lyilekyechia. Kyiiṙi kya iwo kuwoṙe Himenayo na Fileto,
55002018	waleguṟa wuloi wulya wo Ndumi Ngyicha wechigamba kye mfiri o furumia ulemcha, mṟasa iilacha iiṙikyia lya wandu wafoi.
55002019	Kyaindi urende lo Ruwa luluikare, na mbonyi tsa Ndumi Ngyicha tsingyiṟeie wuye yalo: “Mndumii naichi wai wakye na lyingyi-se, orio mndu ekyesenda Rina lya Mndumii naṙe wunyamaṟi.”
55002020	Kyasia numbenyi kuwoṙe shindo sha sahapu na heleri tikyi-pfo, indi na sha shiṙi, na sha teri. Shingyi shiwoṙe kyiṟumi, shingyi shiwoṙe-pfo.
55002021	Kyasia kokooya mndu nakuilyisha kui ikushowa na isho, nechiwa kyindo kyewona kyiṟumi, kyikyisanje, kyiwoṙie Mndumii kyiira, kyikyiachikyie kui orio iṟunda lyicha.
55002022	Kyaindi ṙicha lango tsa wundakyenyi, undeosha wusumganyi, na iiṙikyia, na ikunda, na ufoṟo, hamwi na walya wekyeindia Mndumii kui mrima mmbaṙami.
55002023	Kyaindi ulege maṙeṙo gesoruo-soruo ga kyitondo, galawoṙe wuṟango, ochimanya kye gekyeende maluyano.
55002024	Lyingyi-se kyiwaṟi mṟundi o Mndumii iwa mndu moluyana-pfo; indi iwa muoloru ko wandu woose, eiṙima ilosha, aichi ikarishia;
55002025	echiikyimbia kui wuoloru iwo waiwingana na oe, kundu kokooya kyaiṙimika, Ruwa nawaenengye iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi na imanya wuloi wo Ndumi Ngyicha.
55002026	Waiṙime-se iwiyiṟio makusaṟo mecha, na ikuashuo mṙegonyi o Mokyiriinzi, walya waleṙego nyi Mokyiriinzi, mṟasa iwuta shilya akundi.
55003001	Kyaindi umanye mbonyi-tsi kye mfiri ya mafurumionyi kowaṙa shiyeri sha ngataṟa.
55003002	Kyipfa wandu wechiwa nyi wandu wakukundi wawenyi, wakundi heleri, wekyekuiring'isha, wawoṙe tiri, wekyelahia, walekyeindia wafee wawo, walekyeana, wa kyiwuyana.
55003003	Walakundi wandu wa kanyi kowo, walakundi isanzo na walya waluyanyi nawo, wekyeiria woṙoe shindo sha wongo, walekyeiṙima ichilyia lango, walang'a, walakundi mecha.
55003004	Wekyeṟiinga woṙoe, walekyeicho, wekyekushela, wakundi sia tsa wuyana kuta ikunda Ruwa.
55003005	Wawoṙe mbaṟe ya iowuo na ikunda Ruwa, kyaindi wechikana pfinya tsakye. Iwo taa ukushowe nawo.
55003006	Cha kyipfa kyiiṙi kya iwo kuwoṙe walya wekyekuwika numbenyi tsa wandu, na iwaṙa pfo waka wai matondo wawoṙe maṟio ga wunyamaṟi, waleṙoo nyi lango tsa orio mbaṟe;
55003007	wechikulosha mfiri yoose, indi walaiṙime maa ale iwaṙa wuṟango wo loi.
55003008	Na chandu Yane na Yambre walewingana na Mose, na wuṙo na iwa waiwingana na wuloi wo Ndumi Ngyicha. Nyi wandu wanyamaṟikyie mṙoe yawo, wawalege kyipfa kya iuṟa iiṙikyia.
55003009	Kyaindi wechishika kuleshi nawi-pfo, kyipfa wutondo wowo wochimanyika na pata ko wandu woose, chandu na wutondo wo iwo wulewemanyika.
55003010	Indi iyoe noosha malosho gako, na mchumie oko, na kyilya ngyikundi, na iiṙikyia, na wusimiri,
55003011	na ikunda, na ikarishia. Lyingyi-se na ngyuukyiwa na matuuro gako. Shindo shilengyikooya kulya Antiokyia, kulya Ikonio, na kulya Lyistira. Orio mbaṟe ya wukyiwa wung'anyi ngyilekarishia; na Mndumii nalengyikyiṟa iwuka isho shoose.
55003012	Yee, na woose wakundi iwaṙa mkaṟo yeowuo na ikunda Ruwa kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu wechipfulutso nyashi.
55003013	Kyaindi wandu wawicho na walya wekyelemba wechiengyeṟika, na iengyeṟa iwa wawicho, wechilemba na ilembo.
55003014	Indi iyoe ukae kyiiṙi kya shindo shilya ulelosho na iṟingyishio, cha kyipfa nuichi nyi wakyi ulekulosha kowo.
55003015	Na kye wookyia wututu nulemanya shiṟeio shiele, isho shechiiṙima ikuṟangusha mṟasa uambilyie wukyiṟo kui iiṙikyia lyikyeri kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu.
55003016	Orio kyiṟeio kyiwoṙe mṟufui o Ruwa, kyikyicha kyelosha, na iikyimbia wandu kyipfa kya maṙeko gawo, na kui ilosha wandu wawe wusumganyinyi.
55003017	Kundu mṟundi o Ruwa nawe mndu aafutsie echiiṙima iṟunda orio iṟunda lyicha.
55004001	Ngyikuwia mbele ya Ruwa na Kristo Yesu, echianduya wai na moo na wapfiie; kui iloṟo lyakye na kui Wumangyi wokye,
55004002	onguo Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa ukuṟeyeṟe kyiyeri kyicha na kyiyeri kyilakyicha kopfo. Ṟoṟoma kui pfinya, na iikyimbia kui wusimiri woose na malosho.
55004003	Kyipfa kuicha kyiyeri wechilega malosho gawoṙe moo; indi kui iosha kyilya wakundi wawenyi wepfula walosha wawo wafoi, cha kyipfa wawoṙe maṙwi gesoruo-soruo shindo.
55004004	Nawo wekaa kuleshi walacheicho mbonyi tsa loi, na iindukyia malosho ga wongo.
55004005	Indi iyoe uwaṙe meena shindonyi shoose. Karishia mawicho, ṟunda iṟunda lyeonguo Ndumi Ngyicha, ṟunda kyilya kyikuwaṟi cha mṟundi o Ruwa.
55004006	Cha kyipfa wulalu inyi ngyiambilyia matuuro ga upfu, na kyiyeri kya ipfa lyako kyashika.
55004007	Ngyilekapana shiṙa ngyicha, kyaro ngamkyimarisa, Iiṙikyia ngyilelyiringa.
55004008	Numa ya iho Ruwa nangyikoomie oṟo ya wusumganyi, iya Mndumii moanduya awoṙe wusumganyi echingyienenga mfiri ulya, maa chi inyi tupu-pfo, indi na wandu woose taa wakundi iwona iloṟo lyakye.
55004009	Pfuṟukana icha na koko iwinyi.
55004010	Kyipfa Dema nalengyiṙa echikunda wuyana-wu wo wulalu, kapfunga kyaro iyenda Tesalonikye. Kyiresikye nayenda Galatia; Tito nayenda Dalyimatia.
55004011	Nyi Luka amonyi tikyi akyeri iha hamwi na inyi. Uwute Mariko uche na oe, kyipfa nangyiwoṙie kyiira iṟundenyi.
55004012	Kyaindi Tikyiko ngyilemṙuma Efeso.
55004013	Ijoho lyilya ngyileṙa ko Karipo ipfo Tiroa, kyiyeri uicha ulyiende, na shitapu shilya, ngoseṟa shilya sha njonyi.
55004014	Iskanda, ulya akyeri mnganya, naleloṟa wuwicho wung'anyi koko; Mndumii nemtaa iṙuana na mawuto gakye.
55004015	Na iyoe ukushowe na oe, cha kyipfa nalelega mnu maṙeṙo gaṙu.
55004016	Kyiyeri kyilya ngyilegoṟotso mengyenyi lya kuwooka kuwoṙe mndu alegoṟoka ura loko-pfo, indi woose walengyiṙa. Ngyiterewa walatalyio ṙeko kyipfa kya kyindo-kyo.
55004017	Kyaindi Mndumii nalegoṟoka ura loko kangyienenga pfinya, kundu kui iṟunda lyako mbonyi tsilya tsigambo nakamwi, mṟasa woose walaiṙikyie Ruwa waicho; na inyi ngakyiṟo iwuka upfunyi.
55004018	Mndumii nengyikyiṟa na orio kyindo kyiwicho, na ingyiringa mṟasa ngyishikye Wumangyinyi wo Ruwewu. Mng'ano ukyeri kokye mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
55004019	Ngyiiṟikyiṟia Pirisikyila na Akyila, na walya wa kanyi ko Onesifoṟo.
55004020	Erasto nalekaa Korinto. Tirofimo ngyilemṙa kulya Mileto, aluoe.
55004021	Pfuṟukana uche kyiyeri mbeho ilandeche. Eubulo, Pude, Lyino, Kyilaudia na wana wa wama waiṙikyie Yesu woose taa wakuiṟikyiṟa.
55004022	Mndumii nakae hamwi na mrima opfo. Isaṟia lyikae hamwi na nyoe.
56001001	Inyi Paulo, mṟundi o Ruwa, na msu o Yesu Kristo; kyipfa kya ionguo iiṙikyia lya wasambuṟe wa Ruwa, na wuṟango wo wuloi wulya wokyeende iowuo na ikunda Ruwa.
56001002	Kyiiṙi kya ikusuria lya moo o mlungana, ulya Ruwa alekyeṙeṙa wongo aleluteṟia wookyia wuyana wulagumbo.
56001003	Kashukuo Ṙeṙo lyakye kui kyiyeri kyakye kyiiṙi kya ulogo lulya ngyileṙambiko inyi kui iwawaso lya Mkyiṟa oṙu Ruwa.
56001004	Ngaṟeia paruo-i ko Tito, mono-ko nakamwi iiṙikyienyi lyaṙu. Isaṟia lyikae kopfo na ufoṟo shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu na Kristo Yesu Mkyiṟa oṙu.
56001005	Kyipfa kya ikyo ngyilekuṙa Kyirete, kundu uachikyie shindo shilya shiwewaṟi iachikyio, na iwika wameeku wa siṟi kyiiṙi kya orio mṟi chandu ngyilekuwia,
56001006	kokooya mndu alalegambo kye nawoṙe wuwicho woose, na oe nyi mii o mka umwi, nawoṙe wana waiṙikyie, walekyegambo kye nyi waṟui ang'u walawoṙe wuindi.
56001007	Kyipfa kyiwaṟi askofu nawe nyi mndu alekyegambo kye nawoṙe wuwicho woose. Alawe mndu mokushela, cha kyipfa nyi mndu ekyeringa iṟunda lya Ruwa. Alawe mndu ekyepfula ichihiṟa mrima okye. Alawe mwanguhu ikapo nyi nyashi, alawe mnanzi ang'u mndu moluyana. Alawe mndu awoṙe wulanga wo sonu wo masaa ga sonu.
56001008	Indi nawe mndu ekyeambilyia wandu, akundi iwuta kyilya kyikyicha, awoṙe meena, awoṙe wusumganyi, mweele, aichi ichilyia lango tsa mrima okye.
56001009	Iiṙikyia chandu amloshe naiṙime ikarisha wandu kui malosho gawoṙe moo, na iwinga walya wekyekana ulogo-lo.
56001010	Cha kyipfa kuwoṙe wandu wafoi walawoṙe wuindi, wawoṙe mbonyi tsa wutondo, walembi, na ngoseṟa Wayuda waiṙikyie Yesu.
56001011	Wawaṟi iimo walaṙeṙe. Iwo wekyefoga-foga woose wa kanyi ko wandu, wechilosha shindo shilawawaṟi kyipfa kya ipfula masaa ga sonu.
56001012	Mndu awukyie kowo, moonguo shisuku owo wawenyi, nagambie, “Wakyirete nyi wandu wekyeṙeṙa wongo mfiri yoose, mando mawicho ga saka, wawang'anyie ndewu na wawaṙoko.”
56001013	Wuṟingyishi-wo nyi loi. Kyipfa kya ikyo uwaṙeṙie kui wulang'a, kundu wawe wandu wapfulukyie iiṙikyienyi;
56001014	walaaṙanyie malosho ga Kyiyuda, maa mawawaso ga wandu wekyekaa kuleshi na shilya shikyeri sha loi.
56001015	Shindo shoose shishicha ko walya wawecha; kyaindi kuwoṙe kyindo kyikyicha ko walya wafanyi kyimṟumoe-pfo, walya walawoṙe iiṙikyia; indi ngyuuṟango tsawo tsifanyi kyimṟumoe, na makusaṟo gawo taa.
56001016	Waigamba kye waichi Ruwa, indi mawuto gawo gaimkana. Wawoṙe shindo shekyesuiṟa, wawoṙe wuindi-pfo, maa wawoṙe kyiira kyindonyi kyoose-pfo.
56002001	Kyaindi iyoe onguo shindo shiwaṟi malosho galamasanze-sanze na shindo shingyi.
56002002	Kye wameeku wawe wandu wawoṙe meena, wawoṙe mkaṟo yechienenga wandu iwaindia, wawoṙe wuṟango, wapfulukyie kyiiṙikyia na ikundenyi na wusimirinyi.
56002003	Na wuṙo na wakyeku wawaṙe mkaṟo o wuele. Walawe wandu wekyeiria wandu shindo sha wongo, walawe wandu wekyenyo mpfinyo wufoi, indi wawe wandu wekyelosha shindo shicha.
56002004	Kundu waenengye waka wakoho wuṟango, wakunde wamii wawo, na ikunda wana wawo;
56002005	na iwa wandu wawoṙe meena, iṙa wuṟui, wekyeṟunda kanyi kowo, wekyewuta kyilya kyikyicha, iindia wamii wawo; kundu Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyilamino.
56002006	Na wuṙo na wanakye uwatutume iwa na meena;
56002007	shindonyi shoose, iyoe kumonyi ochiloṟa mfano o mawuto mecha, na maloshonyi gapfo ochiloṟa wuloi na kulawoṙe temo,
56002008	na mbonyi tsiwoṙe moo tsilechiiṙima igambo kye tsiwoṙe tewe, kundu ulya ekyekana narigo nyi sonu, cha kyipfa awoṙe kyindo eiṙima igamba kyipfa kyaṙu-pfo.
56002009	Walya wakyeri shisinga waindie wandumii wawo, wechiwachihiṟa shindonyi shoose. Walawe wandu wekyegaluo kyiyeri wawio kyindo.
56002010	Walawe wandu wekyeiwa; indi waafutsie kyilya wateṟia, kundu wachope malosho ga Mkyiṟa oṙu Ruwa shindonyi shoose.
56002011	Kyipfa isaṟia lya Ruwa lyekyekyiṟa wandu woose lyamloṟo.
56002012	Nalyo lyilulosha ilega wuwicho na lango tsa kyiwuyana; luiṙime iwaṙa moo na meena, na wusumganyi, na iowuo na ikunda Ruwa, kyiiṙi kya wuyana-wu wo wulalu.
56002013	Lochiambuya ikusuria lyiwoṙe mboṟa na iloṟo kyiṟumi kya Kristo Yesu, Ruwa ang'anyi na Mkyiṟa oṙu;
56002014	ulya alereka moo okye kyipfa kyaṙu, kundu nalukyiṟe lulaolokyio nyi mawicho ga mbaṟe tsoose, na iilyisha wandu wawe wakye oe amonyi, walya wawoṙe wuragari mawutonyi mecha.
56002015	Onguo shindo-sho, ikyimbia na iṟoṟoma kui wuchilyi woose; mndu oose alakumine.
56003001	Ukumbuṟe wandu ipfereria ko walya wawoṙe pfinya na wuchilyi, na iindia, na orio kyiyeri ikuṟeyeṟa ko orio iṟunda lyicha.
56003002	Walalahie mndu oose, walaluyane, wawe wandu wekyewuta kyilya kyikyicha, wechiloṟa wuhoo woose ko wandu woose.
56003003	Kyipfa mfiri ya ipfo numa maa soe luwewoṙe wuṟango-pfo. Luwewanyamaṟi, luwalembe, kunu lochiosha lango na shindo sha mamoona sha mbaṟe tsifoi, lochiwaṙa mkaṟo ya wuwicho na wunyeng'i, lochisuiṟana na isuana.
56003004	Kyaindi wucha wo Mkyiṟa oṙu Ruwa, na ikunda lyakye ko wandu, kyiyeri lyileloṟo, nalelukyiṟa.
56003005	Chi kyipfa kya mawuto ga wusumganyi lulewuta soe-pfo; indi kui isaṟia lyakye, kui isanjo na ifeo lya kawi na kui iwa wahya Mumuyonyi Mweele.
56003006	Ulya alelupusia kulawoṙe iehia, kui njia ya Yesu Kristo Mkyiṟa oṙu;
56003007	kundu lukotalyio wusumganyi kui isaṟia lyakye, luiṙime iwa weoṟa wa moo o mlungana, chandu ikusuria lyaṙu lyikyeri.
56003008	Nyi kyindo kya loi; na shindo-sho ngyikundi ushionguo na pfinya, kundu walya waleiṙikyia Ruwa wakumbuo ikaa mawutonyi mecha. Isho shishicha; lyingyi-se shiwoṙe kyiira ko wandu.
56003009	Kyaindi kushowe na maṙeṙo ga wutondo, shindo shileambilyio ko waku, shiluyano na ikapana kyipfa kya uwawaso. Kyipfa isho shiwoṙe kyiira-pfo. Lyingyi-se nyi shindo sha wulya.
56003010	Mndu ekyelosha shindo sha wongo komumṙeṙia lya kuwooka na lya kawi, mlege;
56003011	uichi kye mndu cha icho naṙekyie; lyingyi-se naiwuta kya wunyamaṟi, kyipfa nakuanduya oe amonyi.
56003012	Kyiyeri ngyechiṙuma Aritema kopfo ang'u Tikyiko, tambagana icha na koko kunu Nikopolyi; cha kyipfa ngyikusaṟie ikaa kunu kyiyeri kya mbeho.
56003013	Sena, ulya aichi mbonyi tsa iṙeṙa moondu, na Apolo, uwatarame kyaronyi kyawo, walauṟe kyindo kyoose.
56003014	Wandu waṙu nawo wakuloshe iwuta shindo shicha orio kyiyeri, ko shindo shilya shiwaṟi tikyi; walacheewa wandu waiṟunda wulya.
56003015	Wandu woose wakyeri hamwi na inyi wakuiṟikyiṟa. Luikanyie iiṟikyiṟa walya walukundi iiṙikyienyi. Isaṟia lyikae hamwi na nyoe moose.
57001001	Inyi Paulo, mpfungo o Kristo Yesu, na Timoteo akyeri mono-wama oṙu, ngaṟeia paruo-i ko Filemon, mkunde oṙu, mṟundi hamwi na soe,
57001002	na ko Afia, mono-wama oṙu, na ko Arikyipo, asikari oṙiaṙu, na ko siṟi ikyeri numbenyi yapfo.
57001003	Isaṟia lyikae konyu, na ufoṟo, shiwukyie ko Ruwa, Awu oṙu, na ko Mndumii Yesu Kristo.
57001004	Ngyiana Ruwa oko mfiri yoose, ngyechikukumbuo shiterewonyi shako;
57001005	ngyechiicho mbonyi tsa ikunda lyapfo na iiṙikyia uwoṙe ko Mndumii Yesu na ko wandu wa Ruwa woose;
57001006	kundu kui iwaṙana lya iiṙikyia lyaṙu na iyoe luṟunde iṟunda lyakye; kyiiṙi kya orio imanya kyindo kyicha kyikyeri koṙu, kyiiṙi kya Kristo.
57001007	Kyipfa ngyiwewoṙe sia ing'anyi na iwiyiṟio moo kyipfa kya ikunda lyapfo, cha kyipfa mrima ya wandu wa Ruwa ilewiyiṟio moo nyi iyoe, mono-wama oṙu.
57001008	Koikyo, maa chandu ngyiwoṙe wukari kyiiṙi kya Kristo ikuwia kyikuwaṟi;
57001009	kyaindi kyipfa kya ikunda ngyikuterewa, cha kyipfa nyi chandu ngyikyeri, Paulo ngyikyeri meeku, na wulalu mpfungo o Kristo Yesu taa.
57001010	Ngyikuterewa kyipfa kya mono-ko kyiiṙi kya Kristo, Onesimo;
57001011	akyeri kye kacha awewoṙe kyiira kopfo-pfo, indi wulalu nawoṙe kyiira mnu kopfo, iyoe na inyi taa.
57001012	Ngyilemṙuma kopfo, oe amonyi, kyipfa ngyimkundi mnu.
57001013	Inyi ngyiwekundi nakae koko, naiṙime ingyiṟundia handu hapfo kyiiṙi kya iwiko kyipfungonyi kyipfa kya ionguo Ndumi Ngyicha.
57001014	Kyaindi ngyilekunda iwuta kyindo kyoose ulakyikundi iyoe-pfo, kundu kye wuindi wopfo wulacheewa wuitiko, indi kui iiṙikyia kumonyi.
57001015	Kyipfa, kofia nyikyo kyitewe alewiko kuleshi na iyoe ko mfiri ngyaangu, kundu ukae na oe-se mlungana.
57001016	Wookyia wulalu, chi cha mtumo-pfo, indi ngoseṟa ya mtumo, mono-wama mkunde; koko inyi mnu, na kopfo iyoe ngoseṟa mnu, mmbiunyi na kyiiṙi kya Mndumii.
57001017	Kyasia kokooya ongyiwona inyi ngyiwoṙe iwaṙana na iyoe, ambilyia ichu kyimwi na inyi ngyimonyi.
57001018	Na kokooya nakuwutia kyindo kyiwicho, ang'u nuimrika kyindo, ungyiwese inyi.
57001019	Inyi Paulo ngaṟeia kui kuwoko koko ngyimonyi, inyi ngyechitaa. Ngyikuwia kye nuwoṙe sile yako kyipfa ngyilekukyiṟa kyimrima-pfo.
57001020	Yee, mono-wama oko, ngyiwone kyiira kopfo kyiiṙi kya Mndumii; uwiyiṟie moo mrima oko kyiiṙi kya Kristo.
57001021	Kyipfa kya ilyi ngyiiṙikyie wuindi wopfo ny'kyo kyimaṙuma ngakuṟeia, ngyiichi kye nochiwuta ngoseṟa ya isho ngyigamba.
57001022	Na hamwi na isho ungyiṟeyeṟie handu hekaa; kyipfa ngyikusurie kye kui shiterewo shanyu mochitaramo ingyiwona.
57001023	Epafura, ampfungye hamwi na inyi kyiiṙi kya Kristo Yesu, nakuiṟikyiṟa;
57001024	na Mariko, Aristariko, Dema, na Luka, wekyeṟunda hamwi na inyi.
57001025	Isaṟia lya Mndumii Yesu Kristo lyikae hamwi na mrima yanyu.
58001001	Kyiyeri kya kacha Ruwa naleṙeṙa na waku waṙu kafong'ui na kundu kufong'ui, iiṙia ko weonguo shisuku;
58001002	mafurumionyi ga mfiri-i naleṙeṙa na soe kyiiṙi kya Mono-kye alemmbika nawe mokyioṟa o shindo shoose, lyingyi-se kui oe nalegumba wuyana.
58001003	Oe nekyeloṟa chandu Ruwa awoṙe mng'ano, fana ya mrima okye, echiṙuo shindo shoose kui iwawaso lya wuiṙimi wokye, amwende ihooṟio lya ngyuunyamaṟi tsa wandu, naleṙamia ura lo kulyoe lo ulya ang'anyi kuta woose.
58001004	Ruwa nalesambuṟa Mono-kye nawe ang'anyi kuta malaika, chandu rina lyilya Ruwa alemwenenga lying'anyi kuta lya malaika.
58001005	Cha kyipfa nalewia malaika uha kyiyeri kyoose, “Iyoe nyi mono-ko, inyi inu ngakufee?” Na lyingyi-se, “Inyi ngyechiwa awu kokye, na oe nechiwa mana koko?”
58001006	Na lyingyi-se, kyiyeri aende Mono-kye o kuwooka na wuyanenyi nagamba, “Malaika woose wa Ruwa wampfirie ndi.”
58001007	Na ko mbonyi tsa malaika nagamba, “Ekyegaluo malaika wakye iwa cha shiwiṟi, na waṟundi wakye iwa cha moṙo mlang'a.”
58001008	Kyaindi ko mbonyi tsa Mana nagamba, “Kyitima kyapfo kya wuchilyi, hoi Ruwa, nyi kya mlungana na mlungana. Na upoi lo Wumangyi wopfo nyi upoi lo wusumganyi.
58001009	Nukundi wusumganyi nosuo shituṟu koikyo Ruwa, Ruwa opfo, nakushumbuo, kakuenenga kyiṟumi kying'anyi kuta woṙoo.”
58001010	Na lyingyi-se, “Iyoe, Mndumii, ipfo mawookyionyi nulewika ngyuurende tsa uruka, na ruwewu nyi iṟunda lya mawoko gapfo.
58001011	Isho shechinyamaṟika, Indi iyoe nochikaa mlungana. Na shoose shechikuo cha nguwo.
58001012	Na cha nguwo nochishilema-lema, natso tsechiilachika. Kyaindi iyoe nyi ulya ulya na mfiri yapfo yechisia-pfo.”
58001013	Ngyesa kuwoṙe malaika alemmbia kyiyeri kyoose “Uṙamie kuwoko koko ko kulyoe, mṟasa kyiyeri ngyechiwika washituwa wapfo wuchilyinyi wopfo?”
58001014	Ngyesa malaika nyi wakyi? Chi walya wekyeṙumo iṟundia walya wekyeoṟa wukyiṟo-pfoe?
58002001	Koikyo kyiluwaṟi iosha nawi shilya luleicho lulacheṙeko.
58002002	Cha kyipfa kokooya kyindo kyilya kyilegambo nyi malaika kyilawelolomie, na orio mndu alemina kyindo-kyo naleanduyo chandu kyiwaṟi,
58002003	ngyesa soe, loiṙima kuṙa ikyia ianduyo lukomina ulogo-lu lung'anyi kuṙi lo wukyiṟo? Ulogo lulegambo kuwooka nyi Mndumii, naaho lukomanyika koṙu na ko walya waleicho.
58002004	Ruwa na oe echiṟingyishia hamwi nawo kui ṟigo na shiṟiyisho na pfinya tsa mbaṟe tsifoi, na kui igawa shisumbo sha Mumuyo Mweele, chandu alekunda oe amonyi.
58002005	Kyipfa Ruwa alewika malaika wachilyie uruka lulya luicha na luionguo mbonyi tsalo-pfo, indi mndu umwi naleṟingyishia kuṙi handu halyiwe echigamba,
58002006	“Mndu nyi kyikyi tane omkumbuo? Ang'u mana o mndu mṟasa umwambuye?
58002007	Nulemgumba kawa mtutu kuta malaika, numwenengyie kyiṟumi na mng'ano, nummbikyie wuye ya maṟunda goose.
58002008	Na imgaluo mchilyi o shindo shoose.” Cha kyipfa kyiiṙi kya iwika shindo shoose wuchilyinyi wokye uletsugaṟa kyindo ulalekyiwika wuchilyinyi wokye-pfo. Kyaindi wulalu lulandewone shindo shoose shechiwiko wuchilyinyi wokye-pfo;
58002009	indi lowona ulya alegumbo kawa mtutu kuta malaika, Yesu, kyipfa kya mawawio ga upfu, amwenengye kyiṟumi na mng'ano, kundu kui isaṟia lya Ruwa napfe kyipfa kya orio mndu.
58002010	Cha kyipfa kyiwemmbaṟi oe, ulya kyipfa kyakye na kui oe shindo shoose shilegumbo, kundu naenengye wandu wafoi wekyemwosha wuiṙimi wo iwona kyiṟumi kyakye, iafutsia msongoru ang'anyi o wukyiṟo wowo kui njia ya ilya wukyiwa.
58002011	Kyipfa ulya ekyeilyisha na walya wekyeilyisho woose wawukyie ko mndu umwi. Kyipfa kya ikyo ekyerigo nyi sonu iwalaga wana wa wamae-pfo.
58002012	Nekyegamba, “Ngyechionguo mbonyi tsapfo ko wana wa wama wako, siṟinyi ngyechikuṟumisha.”
58002013	Na lyingyi-se, “Ngyechiwa ngyikumsurie oe.” Na lyingyi-se, “Inyi ngyikyeri iha na wana-wa ngyileenengo nyi Ruwa.”
58002014	Kyasia, cha kyipfa wana-wa nyi wandu wawoṙe mmbiu na samu, maa oe nalewewa wuṙo, kundu kui njia ya upfu nanyamaṟe ulya awewoṙe pfinya tsa upfu, Mokyiriinzi,
58002015	na kui iwuta kuṙo nalekyie walya wawei watumo kyipfa kya iowuo upfu moo yawo yoose.
58002016	Kyipfa nyi loi kye ekyetarama malaika-pfo indi nekyetarama walya wa kyishari kya Abrahamu.
58002017	Koikyo kyiwemmbaṟi ifananyisho na wana wa wamae shindonyi shoose, naiṙime iwa mkohanyi ang'anyi awoṙe isaṟia, ekyeafutsia kyilya ateṟia iṟundenyi lya Ruwa, nahooṟie wandu wakye ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo.
58002018	Na cha kyipfa oe amonyi nalelyiso wukyiwa kyiyeri aleyesho, neiṙima itarama walya wekyeyesho.
58003001	Koikyo wana wa wama mui wandu wa Ruwa, muleiṙikyia ndago ya ruwewu, kusaṟenyi mnu mbonyi tsa msu na Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose o shilya lokyeṟingyishia. Yesu,
58003002	awekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia ko ulya alemsambuṟa naṟunde iṟunda lyakye, chandu Mose na oe awekyeri, kyiyeri alesongoya wandu wa Ruwa.
58003003	Kyipfa Yesu natalo kye nawaṟi kyiṟumi ngoseṟa kuta Mose, chandu ulya ekyewika numba awoṙe woguru kuta numba-yo.
58003004	Kyipfa orio numba ingyiwikye nyi mndu; indi ulya aleachikyia shindo shoose nyi Ruwa.
58003005	Na Mose loi naleafutsia shilya aleteṟia kyiyeri alesongoya wandu woose wa Ruwa cha mṟundi, nawe wuṟingyishi wo shindo shechigambo numa ya iho,
58003006	indi Kristo, cha mana ekyechilyia numba ya Ruwa; ulya numba yakye ikyeri nyi soe, kokooya loengyeṟa iwaṙa wuṟango na wukari na ikushela lya iweṙelyia lyaṙu mṟasa mafurumionyi.
58003007	Koikyo, chandu Mumuyo Mweele agamba, “Inu, kokooya moicho ṟui lyakye.
58003008	Maa mulaumiṟe mrima yanyu, chandu waku wanyu walelega Ruwa, kyiyeri kya iyesho kulya nukyenyi ngyuumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga,
58003009	Kyiyeri-kyo waku wanyu walengyiyesha, wakawona mawuto gako maka makumi gaana.
58003010	Koikyo rika-lyi lyilengyipfulutsa nyashi, ngagamba, mfiri yoose nyi wandu wawoṙe mrima iṙekyie; walemanya mbonyi tsako-pfo.
58003011	Chandu ngyilelya nyamu kui nyashi, ‘Wechiiṙa na handu hako heonyonyia-pfo.’ ”
58003012	Ambuyenyi, wana wa wama, maa umwi onyu alawaṙe mrima mmbicho ulawoṙe iiṙikyia; kui ikuletsana na Ruwa ai na moo.
58003013	Kyaindi mututumane orio mfiri; kundu maa umwi onyu alawaṙe mrima muumu kui wulembi wo wunyamaṟi.
58003014	Cha kyipfa lowa wandu wekyekaa handu hamwi na Kristo, kokooya lokuwaṙa tapu na kyilya luleloṟa kyiyeri lulewooka iiṙikyia Yesu mṟasa mafurumionyi.
58003015	Iho-ndu kyekyegambo, “Inu kokooya moicho ṟui lyakye Maa mulaumiṟe mrima yanyu, cha kyiyeri kyilya kyelega Ruwa.”
58003016	Kyipfa nyi wakyi walengyipfulutsa nyashi, kyiyeri waleicho? Chi walya walewuka Misiri wechisongoyo nyi Mose-pfoe?
58003017	Lyingyi-se nyi wakyi walepfulutsa Ruwa nyashi maka makumi gaana? Chi walya waleṙeko, walya mnying'a yawo ileoloka nukyenyi ngyuumu suwaa ilawoṙe maa mṟinga?
58003018	Lyingyi-se nyi wakyi Ruwa alewalyiia nyamu kye wechiiṙa na handu hakye heonyonyia, sile walya walemlega?
58003019	Kyasia, lowona kye waleiṙima iiṙa na kulya urukyenyi-pfo kyipfa walelega iiṙikyia Ruwa.
58004001	Kyasia, kokooya kuwoṙe kyaasa kya iiṙa na handu ha Ruwa heonyonyia, luowuoe, maa umwi oṙu alechewono kye nawuṟa kyaasa-kyo.
58004002	Kyipfa nyi loi, maa soe taa luleongoyo mbonyi ngyicha chawo. Kyaindi mbonyi-tso wandu waleicho tsilewatarama kyindo-pfo kyipfa tsileṙuana na iiṙikyia lya mrimenyi ko walya waleicho-pfo.
58004003	Kyipfa soe luiṙikyie luiṙa na handu ho heonyonyia; chandu alegamba, “Chandu ngyilelya nyamu kui nyashi, wechiiṙa na handu hako heonyonyia-pfo.” Maa chandu maṟunda galya galemarisika wookyia kyiyeri ngyuurende tsa wuyana tsilewiko.
58004004	Cha kyipfa handu halyiwe nagambie kuṙi ko mbonyi tsa mfiri o mfungaaṙe, “Mfiri o mfungaaṙe naleonyonya, kaṙa maṟunda gakye goose.”
58004005	Na iho naho taa, “Wechiiṙa na handu hako heonyonyia-pfo.”
58004006	Kyasia kyipfa ṙeṙo-lyi lyatsugaa ho kye kuwoṙe wandu wechiiṙa na handu-ho heonyonyia, na walya waleongoyo mbonyi-tso kyiyeri kya kacha, walelemo iiṙa na handu ho heonyonyia kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi wowo,
58004007	nawika-se mfiri mlyiwe, echigamba, kyiiṙi kya Dawidi numa ya kyiyeri kyileshi kuṙi, “Inu; chandu kyikyigambe wookyia kacha, ‘Inu kokooya moicho ṟui lyakye, Maa mulaumiṟe mrima yanyu.’ ”
58004008	Kyipfa kokooya Yosua alewaenenga sia, awechiionguo-se mfiri ungyi kyiyeri kya numa-pfo.
58004009	Kyasia, hatsugae sia ya mfiri o onyonya ko wandu wa Ruwa.
58004010	Kyipfa oe aleiṙa na halya-ndu heonyonyia naonyonya amonyi iṟundenyi lyakye, chandu Ruwa aleonyonya iṟundenyi lyakye.
58004011	Kyasia, lupfuṟukane iiṙa na kyiiṙi kya sia-yo, kundu kye mndu oose alacheoloka cha wandu-wo walaleindia Ruwa.
58004012	Kyipfa Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyiwoṙe moo, lyingyi-se lyiwoṙe pfinya; lyingyi-se lyilyiohi kuta ushu loose lo mmbega kuwi; lyingyi-se lyekyekoṟa mṟasa lyikaiṙima iletsana mrima na ngoo, na shiwungo na mafuṙa gakyeri ipfo shiwungonyi; lyingyi-se lyilyianguhu imanya makusaṟo na kyilya mrima ukundi.
58004013	Maa kuwoṙe kyindo kyikyeri na moo kyilakyishukuoe mbele ya Ṙeṙo-lyo-pfo, kyaindi shindo shoose shikyeri kyiṟanguoe na shishishukuoe mesonyi gakye ulya awoṙe shindo shaṙu.
58004014	Kyasia, kokooya luwoṙe Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose aleiṙa na ruwewu, Yesu Mono-Ruwa, luoshe mnu shilya lokyeṟingyishia.
58004015	Cha kyipfa luwoṙe mkohanyi alechiiṙima iṙuana na soe shindonyi shaṙu sha wufofo-pfo; kyaindi oe naleyesho kyimwi na soe shindonyi shoose, indi alewuta kya wunyamaṟi-pfo.
58004016	Kyasia, lutikyire kyitimenyi kya isaṟia kulawoṙe wuowu, kundu luenengo isaṟia, na iwona isaṟia lyelutarama kyiyeri lulawoṙe shindo shilushikyie.
58005001	Kyipfa orio Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose amsambuṟe iwuka ko wandu nammbikye kyipfa kya wandu mbonyinyi tsa Ruwa, kundu nawute shienengo kyipfa kya ngyuunyamaṟi.
58005002	Echiiṙima iṙuana kui wuhoo na walya walaichi na walya waiṙeka, cha kyipfa oe amonyi nawoṙe mbaṟe ya wufofo;
58005003	na kyipfa kya ikyo kyimmbaṟi, cha kyipfa kya wandu, wuṙo kyipfa kya mrima okye amonyi, iwuta shienengo kyipfa kya ngyuunyamaṟi.
58005004	Na kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima ikuenenga amonyi kyiṟumi-kyi-pfo, sile ulya ekyelago nyi Ruwa, cha Aron.
58005005	Na wuṙo Kristo na oe alekuṙosa mrimenyi kokye na iṙuo kyiṟumi kya iwa Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose-pfo, kyaindi nyi Ruwa alemmbia, “Iyoe nyi Mono-ko inu ngawa Awu opfo.”
58005006	Chandu agambie handu hengyi, “Nochiwa mkohanyi mlungana cha Melyikyisedekyi.”
58005007	Yesu, mfiri-yo awei na moo, naleeṟeṟia Ruwa, echifiiṟa na itonyitsa mcheṟeṟe, Ruwa echiiṙima imkyiṟa na immbuta upfunyi, kaaṙanyio chandu awekyeri mndu aowuye na ikunda Ruwa;
58005008	na, maa chandu akyeri Mana, nalekulosha iindia kui wukyiwa alelya.
58005009	Na oe amṟingyishio kye naafutsio, kawa ulya ekyekyiṟa wandu mlungana ko wandu woose wekyemwindia.
58005010	Numa ya iho namsende na Ruwa iwa Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose cha Melyikyisedekyi.
58005011	Ulya luwoṙe shindo shifoi sheonguo kyipfa kyakye; na nyi kyindo kyuumu ishionguo cha kyipfa mowa wandu waṙoko iaṙanyia.
58005012	Cha kyipfa, kokooya kyimmbaṟi iwa walosha, (kyipfa kyiyeri kying'anyi kyamwiṙa), muwaṟi ilosho na mndu malosho ga kuwooka ga mbonyi tsa Ruwa. Na nyoe kyipfa mukyeri cha wana wanangu muwewaṟi maruwa maa chi kyelya kyikari-pfo.
58005013	Cha kyipfa orio mndu ekyenyo maruwa aichi mnu mbonyi tsa wusumganyi-pfo, cha kyipfa nyi mana mnangu.
58005014	Kyaindi kyelya kyikari nyi ko wandu wapfulukyie kyiiṙikyia, walya wekyeiṙima imanya kyicha na kyiwicho.
58006001	Kyipfa kya ikyo, lukoṙa ionguo malosho ga kuwooka ga Kristo, lupfuṟukane lushikye masiionyi ga kyaro. Maa lulaṙeṙe-se mbonyi tsa malosho-go ga kuwooka, lulaiwuta-se shindo shilawoṙe kyiiṙa na iiṙikyia Ruwa,
58006002	na ga malosho ga ngyuupatiso, na iyekyia mawoko, na iṟutso wapfu, na ianduyo lya mlungana.
58006003	Na isho lochishiwuta Ruwa kaluenenga wuiṙimi wo iwuta kuṙo.
58006004	Cha kyipfa walya walemuenengo ngyeela, na isonja kyisumbo kya ruwewu, na iambilyia ṙombo lya Mumuyo Mweele,
58006005	na isonja mbonyi ngyicha tsa Ruwa, na pfinya tsa shiyeri shiicha,
58006006	wakaṙa iiṙikyia numa ya iho, kyechiiṙimika-se iwagaluo waṙumbuye wunyamaṟi-pfo; cha kyipfa wakapia Mono-Ruwa msalabenyi lya kawi kui mrima yawo, na imriisa sonu na pata.
58006007	Kyipfa uruka lokyenyo mvuo yekyekapa ho kyiyeri kui kyiyeri, na iṙosa maṟa gawoṙe kyiira ko walya galeṙemo kyipfa kyawo, wekyewona mboṟa tsiwukyie ko Ruwa;
58006008	indi uruka-lo lukoṙosa msha na makacha lokyelego na ikyiṟeseso nyi Ruwa na mafurumionyi galo nyi irumatso.
58006009	Kyaindi, wakunde, maa chandu lokyeonguo isho, mbonyinyi tsanyu luleiṙikyia mbonyi ngyicha ngoseṟa, na tsiwoṙe wukyiṟo.
58006010	Cha kyipfa Ruwa ammbicho mṟasa nawaṙime iṟunda lyanyu-pfo, na ikunda lyilya mulelyiṟingyishia kui rina lyakye, cha kyipfa muleṟundia wandu wa Ruwa, na mṟasa wulalu muwaṟundia.
58006011	Na soe lukundi orio umwi onyu naṟingyishie wuragari wulya wulya, mṟasa mafurumionyi;
58006012	kundu mulaṙokuoe, indi muwe wandu wekyeosha walya wekyeoṟa shiteṟio kui iiṙikyia na wusimiri.
58006013	Cha kyipfa Ruwa, kyiyeri aleenenga Abrahamu kyaasa kyipfa alawewoṙe ang'anyi kuta ulya alemlyiia nyamu, nalelya nyamu kui mrima okye,
58006014	echigamba, “Ny'kyaloi ngyechikuwikyia mboṟa, na ikupfumbutsa.”
58006015	Na kuṙo kui isimiria kawona kyaasa kyilya.
58006016	Kyipfa wandu wekyelya nyamu kui ulya akyeri ang'anyi kuta wo; na kowo matsitsionyi ga iwingana kui maṙeṙo nyi nyamu, iloṟa kye maṙeṙo-go nyi ga loi,
58006017	kyiiṙi kya mbonyi-tso Ruwa, akundi iloṟa ngoseṟa mnu walya wekyeoṟa kyaasa kyilya, chandu shilya akundi shilechiiṙima iilachika.
58006018	Shilya kyiiṙi kyasho Ruwa alechiiṙima iṙeṙa wongo, luwone iwiyiṟio moo lyilalolomie, soe lulalekyelyio iosha na isimiria shilya shilewiko mbele yaṙu.
58006019	Lushiwoṙe cha kyindo kyetirimisha mrima ulakupaaye-paye, kyindo kyiwoṙe wuringyi wung'anyi, kyiwoṙe pfinya, na ulya lokyewika ikusuria lyaṙu nyi Yesu, ulya ekyeiṙa nguwonyi yeshingyia ya hekalu lya ruwewu na halya-ndu ha kyiiṙi haele.
58006020	Handu Yesu aleiṙa naho kyipfa kyaṙu, msongoru oṙu, nawa Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose mṟasa mlungana cha Melyikyisedekyi.
58007001	Cha kyipfa Melyikyisedekyi-cho, mangyi o Salemu, mkohanyi o Ruwa ai wuye ruwewu, nalekarisana na Abrahamu kyiyeri aweiwuya ikapa wamangyi-wo, kammbikyia mboṟa.
58007002	Ulya Abrahamu alemgawia kyifunjoe kya ikumi kya shindo shoose; (rina lyakye lya kuwooka nyi mangyi o wusumganyi, lyingyi-se nyi mangyi o Salemu, kyimwi na igamba, mangyi o ufoṟo.
58007003	Awoṙe awu-pfo, awoṙe wamae-pfo, awoṙe wafee-pfo, awoṙe kyiyeri alefeo, maa kyiyeri alepfa-pfo, indi namfananyishe na Mono-Ruwa). Icho nyi mkohanyi mṟasa mlungana.
58007004	Kyasia, ambuyenyi chandu mndu-cho aweng'anyi, ulya Abrahamu, mku oṙu ang'anyi, alemwenenga kyifunjoe kya ikumi kya shilya aleende shiṙenyi.
58007005	Na kyiiṙi kya wana wa Lewi nawo, walya wekyeenengo wukohanyi, wawoṙe wuchilyi wo iṙuo kyifunjoe kya ikumi iwuka ko wandu wawo, wana wa wamawo, chandu mawawaso gagambie, maa chandu wakyeri wa kyishari kya Abrahamu.
58007006	Indi oe, ulya kyishari kyakye kyilaletalo kye kyiwukyie kowo, nalewuta kyifunjoe kya ikumi iwuka ko Abrahamu, kammbikyia mboṟa ulya awoṙe kyaasa-kyo.
58007007	Maa kyeiṙima ilego nakamwi kye mtutu nekyewikyio mboṟa nyi ang'anyi-pfo.
58007008	Na makohanyi wekyepfa wekyewuta kyifunjoe kya ikumi; indi iha Melyikyisedekyi ekyeambilyia kyifunjoe kya ikumi ekyepfa-pfo.
58007009	Lyingyi-se kyeiṙima igambo kye, kui njia ya Abrahamu, maa Lewi ekyeambilyia kyifunjoe kya ikumi naleenengyia kyifunjoe kya ikumi;
58007010	cha kyipfa alekoafeo kyiyeri-kyo Melyikyisedekyi alekarisana na oe-pfo.
58007011	Kyasia, kokooya kulawewoṙe wufofo wukohanyinyi wo Lewi; (kyipfa wandu waleenengo mawawaso kyipfa kya wukohanyi-wo), kuwewoṙe-se kyimaṙuma kya kyikyi kuwaṙe mkohanyi ungyi, ai cha Melyikyisedekyi, maa aletalo cha ilyi nai cha Aron?
58007012	Kyipfa wukohanyi wulya wukoilachika, kyiwaṟi na mawawaso gailachikye.
58007013	Kyipfa oe mbonyi tsakye tsilegambo kuṙo, nyi-we o wandu wa mbaṟe ingyi, mbaṟe kulawoṙe mndu o mbaṟe-yo aleṟunda alyitaṟenyi.
58007014	Kyipfa kyikyeri na pata kye Mndumii oṙu nalewuka kyisharinyi kya Yuda, mbaṟe ya wandu walya Mose alaleonguo kyindo kyawo kyoose ko mbonyi tsa wukohanyi.
58007015	Lyingyi-se isho luiṙeṙa shikyeri na pata mnu ngoseṟa, kokooya nawoneka mkohanyi ungyi ai cha Melyikyisedekyi;
58007016	alakyeri mkohanyi ko mawawaso ga kyimndu, indi kui pfinya tsa moo tsilekyesia.
58007017	Kyipfa namṟingyishie kye, “Iyoe nyi mkohanyi mlungana cha Melyikyisedekyi.”
58007018	Kyipfa kuwoṙe iilachika lya iwawaso lyilya lyilesonguo, kyipfa kya wufafa wolyo, na iuṟa kyiira lyayo;
58007019	(cha kyipfa iwawaso lyilya lyileafutsia kyindo-pfo); na hamwi na isho kulewiko ikusuria lyilyicha ngoseṟa, ikusuria lyekyeluenenga itikyiria Ruwa.
58007020	Na kyipfa nyamu ilaleuṟika,
58007021	(kyipfa walya walesambuṟo makohanyi kulawoṙe nyamu; indi oe, hamwi na nyamu, kui ulya alemmbia, “Mndumii nalya nyamu maa echiilacha nyamu-yo-pfo, iyoe nyi mkohanyi mlungana.”)
58007022	Kyasia, iṙuana na wuloi-wu Yesu nawa mloṟi o mma ulya mcha ngoseṟa.
58007023	Lyingyi-se walya walesambuṟo makohanyi wafoi, kyipfa waleshingyio nyi upfu walakae ho;
58007024	indi oe, kyipfa ekyekaa mlungana, nawoṙe wukohanyi wulekyewuka ho.
58007025	Na oe, kyipfa kya ikyo, neiṙima ikyiṟa nakamwi walya wekyecha na ko Ruwa kui oe; kyipfa nakyeri na moo mfiri yoose kundu nawaterewie.
58007026	Kyipfa luwewaṟi soe luwaṙe mkohanyi ang'anyi mbaṟe-i akyeri mweele, alawoṙe wuwicho, alawoṙe tewe lyoose, amletsane na walya wekyeṙeko, Ruwa alemwiria wuye ruwewu.
58007027	Ulya alakundi kyindo orio mfiri, cha makohanyi walya wengyi wang'anyi, kuwooka iwuta kyiṙaso kyipfa kya ngyuunyamaṟi tsakye amonyi, numa ya iho kyipfa kya ngyuunyamaṟi tsa wandu-wo; kyipfa oe nalewuta kuṙo lyimwi, kyiyeri alereka moo okye.
58007028	Kyipfa uwawaso luwikyie wandu wawoṙe wufafa iwa makohanyi wang'anyi; indi mbonyi-tso tsa nyamu ilecha numa ya uwawaso tsilemsambuṟa iwa Mana aafutsie mlungana na mlungana.
58008001	Kyasia, kyiiṙi kya isho luionguo, kyindo kying'anyi kuta shoose nyi ikyi, luwoṙe Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose mbaṟe-i, aṙamie kuwoko ko kulyoe ko kyitima kya wuchilyi kya Ruwa Mopfinya.
58008002	Mṟundi o handu haele, na o tengo lyilya lya loi, lyilya Mndumii alelyiwika, maa chi mndu-pfo.
58008003	Kyipfa orio Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose nekyesambuṟo kundu nawute shiṙaso, kyiwaṟi ichu na oe nawaṙe kyindo kyeṙasa.
58008004	Kokooya awekyeri urukyenyi, awechiwa mkohanyi-pfo; kyipfa kuwoṙe wekyewuta shienengo chandu mawawaso gagambie.
58008005	Wekyeṟundia kyindo kyikyeri cha kyirinje kya ruwewu; chandu Mose alewio nyi Ruwa nawute, kyiyeri awekuṟeyeṟie iwika tengo lyilya; kyipfa nagamba, “Achikyia shindo shoose kui mfano ulya uleloṟo kulya fumvunyi.”
58008006	Kyaindi wulalu nawona iṟunda lyicha ngoseṟa, chandu akyeri mndu aṙuṙe ndago ya mma mcha, Ruwa nagambie kye wandu wakye wechiwona shindo shicha kuta isho.
58008007	Kyipfa kokooya mma ulya o kuwooka ulawewoṙe tewe, mrima ya wandu iwechipfulo nyi ulya o kawi-pfo.
58008008	Kyipfa kyiyeri ekyegamba kye wawoṙe tewe, nekyegamba, “Mfiri iicha, Ruwa nagamba, na inyi ngyechiwika Mma Mhya na wandu wa numba ya Isiraelyi na wandu wa numba ya Yuda.
58008009	Ochiwa mma cha ulya ngyilewika na waku wawo mfiri iya ngyilewateteṟa ngyiwawute urukyenyi lo Misiri-pfo. Cha kyipfa walalekaa mmenyi oko, ngyilekulyisa wukyiwa kyipfa kyawo-pfo.
58008010	Kyipfa ichu nyicho mma ngyechiwika na wandu wa Isiraelyi numa ya mfiri iya, Ruwa nagamba, ‘Ngyechiwika mawawaso gako makusaṟonyi gawo, na ngyechigaṟeia mrimenyi kowo. Na inyi ngyechiwa Ruwa kowo, nawo wechiwa wandu wako.’
58008011	Nawo wechiloshana orio mndu na momṟasa okye-pfo, Maa orio mndu na mono-wamae, echigamba, ‘Manya Mndumii-pfo.’ Cha kyipfa woose wechingyimanya, wookyia mtutu owo mṟasa ang'anyi.
58008012	Cha kyipfa ngyechiwahooṟia mawicho gawo, na ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo ngyechitsikumbuo-se-pfo.”
58008013	Kui igamba, “Mma Mhya” nagaluo lyilya lya kuwooka iwa lyiku. Kyaindi kyindo kyawooka ikuo nyi iwuka ho kyii.
58009001	Kyasia, maa mma o kuwooka uwewoṙe mawawaso ga mbonyi tsa iindia na iana Ruwa, na handu ha kyiwuyana heterewa Ruwa.
58009002	Kyipfa tengo lyileachikyio, lyilya lya ipfo kyanja, handu hawewoṙe handu heyekyia taa, na mesa, na mkate ngyiele; nyiho halelago “Haele.”
58009003	Na numa ya mkoṟoṟi o kawi o ishingyia handu, tengo lyilya lyekyelago “Haele ha haele,”
58009004	lyiwoṙe alyitaṟe ya sahapu, na sanduku ya mma ingyishikyie nyi sahapu ngyuura tsoose, sanduku iwewoṙe ikopo lya sahapu lyiwoṙe manna iya, na upoi lulya lo Aron lulekolooṟia maṟa, na shibau shilya sha mma;
58009005	na wuye yasho makyerubi ga kyiṟumi, gechiwikyia kyirinje halya-ndu Ruwa ekyehooṟia ngyuunyamaṟi. Kyasia luwoṙe ṙaawa wulalu lyeonguo mbonyi tsa shindo-shi kyimwi kyimwi-pfo.
58009006	Kyasia, shindo-shi shikamuachikyio kuṙo, makohanyi wekyeiṙa na ipfo tengonyi lya ipfo kyanja mfiri yoose, wechiwuta shindo sha iindia na iana Ruwa.
58009007	Kyaindi kyiiṙi kya tengo-lyo lya kawi Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose nekyeiṙa napfo amonyi, lyimwi orio maka; aṙuṙe samu iwukyie kyindonyi kya kyiṙaso kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi wokye amonyi na wo wandu wengyi kyiyeri walalemanya kye kyilya waweiwuta nyi wunyamaṟi.
58009008	Mumuyo Mweele kaloṟa kyindo-kyi, kye njia ya iiṙa na halya-ndu haele ilekoyammanyika-pfo, kyiyeri-kyo tengo lya ipfo kyanja lyilalekolyammbuka ho.
