58009009	Lyilya lyikyeri mfano o kyiyeri-kyi kyikyeri pfo wulalu; kyiyeri-kyo shienengo sheṙasa shiwuto, shilechiiṙima kui chandu mndu akuichuoe mrimenyi kokye iafutsia mndu aiindia na iterewa Ruwa.
58009010	Kyipfa nyi mawawaso ga mbaṟe ya mmbiu tupu, shelya na shindo shenyo na mbaṟe tsesamba kyimṟumoe, shilegambo kye shiṟundo mṟasa kyiyeri-kyo Ruwa echiilacha shindo shoose shiwe shihya.
58009011	Kyaindi Kristo kamcha, akyeri Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose o mbonyi tsicha tsechicha, ko tengo lyilya lying'anyi ngoseṟa na lyiafutsie, lyilalyiachikyie nyi wandu, kyimwi na igamba lyilakyeri lya wuyana-wu,
58009012	maa chi kui samu ya mburu na magache-pfo, indi kui samu yakye ulya aleiṙa lyimwi tupu na handu Haele, na iluwuta wusingyenyi mlungana.
58009013	Cha kyipfa kokooya samu ya mburu na mapung'a na ifui lya igache lya umbe walya wafanyi kyimṟumoe walepusio yekyeilyisha mṟasa mmbiu ukowuka ukoe;
58009014	kyasia chi ngoseṟa samu ya Kristo, ulya kye kui Mumuyo o mlungana alereka moo ko Ruwa iwa kyienengo kyilawoṙe tewe, kyechisanja shilya mukusaṟie mrimenyi konyu na mṟumoe ilawoṙe kyiira, muiṙime iindia na iterewa Ruwa ai na moo?
58009015	Na kyipfa kya ikyo nyi ulya ekyeende Mma Mhya, Yesu ulya alepfa, na ipfa lyakye lyilewuta wandu maṙekonyi ga mma ulya o kuwooka, wandu walelago waambilyie kyaasa kya kyioṟa kya mlungana.
58009016	Kyipfa handu mma o kyioṟa ukyeri, hawaṟi hakae na upfu lo ulya alewika mma-cho.
58009017	Cha kyipfa mma o kyioṟa uwoṙe pfinya handu halewaṙa ipfa lya mndu; cha kyipfa lyiwoṙe pfinya maa ale kokooya ulya aleuwika ai na moo-pfo.
58009018	Koikyo maa mma ulya o kuwooka ulewooko kulawoṙe samu-pfo.
58009019	Kyipfa kyiyeri orio iwawaso lyilegambo nyi Mose ko wandu-wo woose, chandu mawawaso gawekundi, nalewuta samu ya magache na mburu, hamwi na mṟinga na kyiṙi kya hisopo kyikyipfungyie mamberi ga kyimaande ga moondo, kanyanyatsia kyitapu kyilya kya mawawaso, na wandu woose,
58009020	echigamba, “Iyi nyi samu yamlunga nyoe na mma ulya Ruwa alemmbia mumwindie.”
58009021	Na tengo lyilya nalyo na shindo shoose sha iindia na iterewa Ruwa aleshinyanyatsia samu wuṙo.
58009022	Na Uwawasonyi shindo shoose shilesanjo kui samu, na kulawoṙe ipusuo samu kuwoṙe iwuto wunyamaṟi-pfo.
58009023	Kyasia, kyiwewaṟi nakala tsa shindo shikyeri ruwewu tsisanjo chandu kyamugambo, kyaindi shindo sha ruwewu imonyi shisanjo kui shiṙaso shishicha kuta isho.
58009024	Cha kyipfa Kristo aleiṙa na handu haele haleachikyio nyi wandu-pfo, nyicho mfano o handu haele ha loi; indi naleiṙa na ruwewu ya loi nawono wulalu mbele ya Ruwa kyipfa kyaṙu.
58009025	Maa chi kye nakuwute kafoi, chandu Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose ekyeiṙa na handu haele orio maka kui samu ilakyeri yakye-pfo.
58009026	Kokooya nyi wuṙo, kyiwemmbaṟi ilyiso wukyiwa kafoi wookyia wuyana wulagumbo. Kyaindi wulalu, lyimwi tupu, mafurumionyi ga shiyeri, nawoneka lya kuwooka na lya mafurumionyi, ihooṟia ngyuunyamaṟi kui kyiṙaso kya mrima okye.
58009027	Na chandu wandu wekyeṟeyeṟio ipfa lyimwi tupu, na numa ya ipfa ianduyo;
58009028	na wuṙo Kristo na oe, ammbuto iwa kyiṙaso lyimwi tupu na iṙuo ngyuunyamaṟi tsa wandu wafoi; nechicha-se lya kawi, kulawoṙe wunyamaṟi, ko walya waimmbeṙelyia nachewakyiṟa.
58010001	Kyasia uwawaso, kyipfa nyi kyirinje kya mecha gechicha, maa chi fana ya mecha-go-pfo, kui shiṙaso shilya shilya waleenengyia orio maka, shechiiṙima kyiyeri kyoose igaluo walya wekyecha iindia na iana Ruwa iwa wandu waafutsie-pfo.
58010002	Kokooya nyi wuṙo, ngyesa shiṙaso shechiṙa ienengyio; cha kyipfa waiindia na iana Ruwa wakamuilyisho lyimwi tupu, walawechikuwona-se wo wawenyi kye wawoṙe wunyamaṟi?
58010003	Kyaindi kyiiṙi kya shiṙaso-sho kuwoṙe ikumbuo lya wunyamaṟi orio maka.
58010004	Kyipfa kyeiṙimika samu ya mapung'a na mburu iwuta wunyamaṟi-pfo.
58010005	Koikyo ilyi echicha na wuyanenyi, nagamba, “Shiṙaso na shienengo ulekunda-pfo; kyaindi mmbiu nulengyiṟeyeṟia;
58010006	Shiṙaso shewuta alyitaṟenyi na shilya sheenengyia ngyuunyamaṟi ulechihiṟo nasho-pfo;
58010007	Nyi lyo-ndu ngyilegamba, ambuya, ngacha (ngyimṟeie kyitapunyi kya mawawaso) ngyiwute shilya ukundi, Ruwa.”
58010008	Iho mawookyionyi nalegamba, “Okyechihiṟo maa ikunda shiṙaso na shienengo shishienengyie alyitaṟenyi na shilya shewuta ngyuunyamaṟi-pfo” (shishienengyie chandu uwawaso lugambie).
58010009	Nyi lyo-ndu alegamba, “Ambuya, ngacha ngyiwute shilya ukundi.” Naienengyia kyiṙaso kya kuwooka, kundu nawikye ho kyiṙaso kya kawi.
58010010	Kyiiṙi kya shilya Ruwa akundi lowona iilyisho, kui iwuto mmbiu o Yesu Kristo lyimwi tupu.
58010011	Na orio mkohanyi nekyegoṟoka orio mfiri echiṟunda cha mkohanyi, na ienengyia shiṙaso shilya shilya kafong'ui; shiṙaso shilechiiṙima maa ale iwuta wunyamaṟi.
58010012	Kyaindi ichu, kyiyeri amwenengyie kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi kyiṙaso kyimwi kyechikaa mṟasa mlungana, naleṙamia kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa;
58010013	wookyia iho echiweṙelyia mṟasa nawingye washituwa wakye.
58010014	Kyipfa kui kyiṙaso kyakye kyimwi nalewagaluo wandu waafutsie mlungana walya waiilyisho maṙeko gawo.
58010015	Na Mumuyo Mweele na oe nailuṟingyishia; cha kyipfa numa ya igamba,
58010016	“Ichu nyi mma ngyechiwika nawo numa ya mfiri iya, Ruwa nagamba, ‘Ngyechiwika mawawaso gako mrimenyi kowo, na igaṟeia makusaṟonyi gawo.’ ” Nyi lyo-ndu ekyegamba,
58010017	“Ngyuunyamaṟi tsawo na mawuto gawo mawicho ngyechigakumbuo-se maa ale-pfo.”
58010018	Kyasia ihooṟio lya isho lyikacha, kuwoṙe kyiṙaso-se kyipfa kya iwuta ngyuunyamaṟi-pfo.
58010019	Kyasia, wana wa wama, kyipfa luwoṙe wukari wo iiṙa na handu Haele kui samu ya Yesu,
58010020	njia iya aleluwookyia ikyeri ngyihya, na ii na moo, njia iiṙie halya nguwonyi yeshingyia ikyeri nyi mmbiu okye;
58010021	na iwaṙa Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose achilyie hekalu lya Ruwa lya ruwewu;
58010022	lutikyirie Ruwa luwoṙe mrima mmbaṙami; kui imwiṙikyia nakamwi, luwailyishe mrima luṙe makusaṟo mawicho; luwasanje mmbiu kui mṟinga mcha.
58010023	Lukuwaṙe tapu na ikusuria lyaṙu, lyilailachikye; kyipfa ulya aleteṟia nekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia.
58010024	Luambuye chandu lochitaramana na iwutiana shindo shicha na itutumana kui ikunda na iṟunda lyicha.
58010025	Maa lulaṙe isanzia handu hamwi, chandu kyikyeri kyiṙo kya wandu wengyi; indi luikyimbiane; na iengyeṟa iwuta kuṙo, kui chandu muwonyi kye mfiri ulya o Yesu ianduya ukyeri kufui.
58010026	Kyipfa kokooya lowuta wunyamaṟi lukomuambilyia wuṟango wo wuloi wulya, kuwoṙe-se kyimaṙuma kya kyiṙaso kyipfa kya ngyuunyamaṟi-pfo.
58010027	Indi kuwoṙe iweṙelyia ianduyo lyioweshie, na wulang'a wo moṙo ukuṟeyeṟie irumatsa walya wakyeri washituwa wa Ruwa.
58010028	Mndu alemina mawawaso ga Mose nekyewoogo kulawoṙe iwonio wukyiwa, kyiyeri waṟingyishi wawi ang'u waṟaaṟu wagamba kye nammbicho.
58010029	Muwonyi kuṙa? Kyiwemmbaṟi ngapo ing'anyi ngoseṟa mndu ulya alemina Mono-Ruwa, na igamba kye samu iya ya mma ilemuilyisha chi kyindo-pfo, na ilahia Mumuyo o isaṟia-pfoe?
58010030	Kyipfa lumwichi ulya alegamba, “Itaa kyiṟaache nyi iṟunda lyako, inyi ngyechitaa.” Na lyingyi-se, “Mndumii nechianduya wandu wakye.”
58010031	Nyi kyindo kyioweshie iolokyio nyi ngapo ya Ruwa ai na moo.
58010032	Kyaindi kumbuonyi mfiri ya mawookyionyi, iya kyiyeri mulewona ngyeela, mulekarishia iwingana lying'anyi lya fowa.
58010033	Shiyeri shingyi kulawoṙe iiṟikyiṟo mulekulunga na walya waweilahio na iwutio shindo shiwicho.
58010034	Kyipfa mulewonia wukyiwa walya wawewapfungye. Lyingyi-se mukoiṙikyia kui sia isoko masaa ganyu, muichi kye mrimenyi konyu kuwoṙe masaa gai mecha ngoseṟa, galekyesia.
58010035	Kyasia mulaṙe wukari maa wuṟango wonyu, cha kyipfa wuwoṙe wori wung'anyi.
58010036	Kyipfa muwaṟi iwaṙa wusimiri, kundu kye mukommbuta shilya Ruwa akundi muambilyie kyaasa kyilya.
58010037	“Cha kyipfa hatsugae kyiyeri kyifuhi mnu ulya aicha nechicha, maa echikyelyio-pfo.
58010038	Kyaindi msumganyi oko nechiwaṙa moo kui iiṙikyia. Na oe kaiya-iya mrima oko ochiwaṙa sia kyipfa kyakye-pfo.”
58010039	Kyaindi soe lukyeri kyiiṙi kya walya waiiya-iya na iṙeka-pfo, indi lukyeri kyiiṙi kya walya wawoṙe iiṙikyia na ikyiṟa mrima yaṙu.
58011001	Kyasia, iiṙikyia nyi iambilyia shindo shiweṙelyio kulawoṙe iiya-iya. Nyi iiṙikyia nakamwi shindo shilekyewono.
58011002	Kyipfa kui iiṙikyia waku waṙu waleṟingyishio.
58011003	Kui iiṙikyia luichi kye wuyana wulegumbo kui Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa, maa shindo shekyewono shilegumbo kui shindo shiwonio-pfo.
58011004	Kui iiṙikyia Abelyi naleenenga Ruwa kyiṙaso kyicha kuta kyilya kya Kaini. Koikyo naleṟingyishio kye namsumganyi; Ruwa kaṟingyishia shienengo shakye, na kyipfa kya iiṙikyia lyakye, Abelyi naiṙeṙa maa chandu alempfa.
58011005	Kui iiṙikyia Enokyi nalesamiṟo, kundu alapfe. Maa alewono-pfo, cha kyipfa Ruwa nalemsamiṟa, kyipfa alawendesamiṟo nalekoaṟingyishio kye nachihiṟa Ruwa.
58011006	Kyaindi kulawoṙe iiṙikyia kyeiṙimika imchihiṟa-pfo; cha kyipfa mndu ekyeyenda ko Ruwa kyiwaṟi naiṙikyie kye Ruwa nakyeri pfo, na kye nekyeenenga wori walya wekyempfula.
58011007	Kui iiṙikyia Noe amwikyimbio nyi Ruwa ko mbonyi tsa shindo shilandewonekye, kui chandu aleindia na iowuo Ruwa, naleachikyia safina, naiṙime ikyiṟa wandu wa kanyi kokye. Na kui kyilya alewuta naleloṟa wandu wa wuyana kye wawoṙe ṙeko, kawa mokyioṟa o wusumganyi wokyewono kui iiṙikyia.
58011008	Kui iiṙikyia Abrahamu naleiṙikyia kyiyeri alelago, nawukye nayende handu halya echihaenengo iwa kyioṟa; kafuma alaichi kundu aiyenda.
58011009	Kui iiṙikyia nalekaa wuyenunyi kulya urukyenyi lo kyaasa, cha urukyenyi lulai lokye, echikaa tengonyi hamwi na Isakyi na Yakobo, wai weoṟa hamwi na oe wa kyaasa kyilya kyilya.
58011010	Kyipfa Abrahamu naweiweṙelyia mṟi Ruwa aleukusaṟa na iuwika, mṟi ochikaa ho mlungana.
58011011	Kui iiṙikyia maa Sara amonyi naleambilyia wuiṙimi wo iira mana, ilyi kyiyeri kyakye kyilekokyamwiṙa; cha kyipfa naletala ulya aleteṟia kye nekyeafutsia kyilya ateṟia.
58011012	Na kyipfa kya ikyo wakafeo nyi mndu umwi, na oe nawei cha apfiie, wandu wafoi cha nyenyeri tsa ruwewu, na cha mlelya ukyeri mbai ya ipalyipalyi, uleiṙima italo.
58011013	Iwa woose wakapfiia iiṙikyienyi, walaambilyia shaasa shilya, indi wakashiwona wai kuleshi na ichihiyo kyipfa kyasho, na igamba kye wawekyeri wayenu, na wakyaro urukyenyi.
58011014	Cha kyipfa iwo wekyegamba mbonyi cha itso wailoṟa na pata kye waipfula uruka lowo wawenyi.
58011015	Na kokooya wawekumbuo uruka lulya walewuka, wawewona ṙaawa lyewuya.
58011016	Kyaindi wulalu wailanga uruka lucha ngoseṟa, uruka lo ruwewu. Koikyo Ruwa ekyerigo nyi sonu ilago Ruwa owo-pfo; kyipfa nalewawikyia mṟi.
58011017	Kui iiṙikyia Abrahamu kyiyeri aleyesho, nalewuta Isakyi nawe kyiṙaso; na oe aleambilyia shaasa-sho naweiwuta mono-kye, mana kyimuumwi.
58011018	Yee, ulya alewio, “Kui njia ya Isakyi kyishari kyapfo kyechilago,”
58011019	echiwona kye Ruwa neiṙima imṟutsa iwuka ko wapfu; Abrahamu kawona-se Isakyi iwuka upfunyi kui mfano.
58011020	Kui iiṙikyia Isakyi nalewikyia Yakobo na Esau mboṟa, maa ko mbonyi tsa shindo shechicha kyiyeri kya numa.
58011021	Kui iiṙikyia Yakobo, kyiyeri aweipfa, kawikyia mboṟa orio mana o Yosefu, kaana na iterewa Ruwa akuyekyie mṙoenyi o upoi lokye.
58011022	Kui iiṙikyia, Yosefu kyiyeri aleshika mafurumionyi gakye, naleonguo mbonyi tsa wana wa Isiraelyi iwuka Misiri, kagamba kyindo mmbiu okye ochiwutio.
58011023	Kui iiṙikyia, Mose kyiyeri alefeo, kaṟiko mori iṟaṟu na wafee wakye, cha kyipfa walewona kye nyi mana mcha, maa waleowuo iwawaso lya mangyi-pfo.
58011024	Kui iiṙikyia, kyiyeri Mose alewa mndu apfulukyie, nalelega ilago mana o mana o kyika o Farao.
58011025	Kawona nyi nanga ilyiso wukyiwa hamwi na wandu wa Ruwa kuta ipfula sia ya wunyamaṟi wo kyiyeri kyifuhi;
58011026	echiwona kye imino kyipfa kya Kristo kokye nyi wunjama wung'anyi kuta masaa ga Misiri; cha kyipfa naleweṙelyia wori-wo.
58011027	Kui iiṙikyia kawuka Misiri, alaowuoe nyashi ya mangyi, kyipfa nalekarishia cha mndu awonyi ulya alekyewono.
58011028	Kui iiṙikyia kaachikyia Pasaka, na kulya inyanyatsa samu, kundu ulya morumatsa wana wambele alawapaaye wo.
58011029	Kui iiṙikyia wakaiṙa ipalyipalyinyi lya Shamu, cha ilyi waiiṙa handu hagaṙutsu; kyiyeri Wamisiri waletambagana iwuta kuṙo wakaṙoo nyi mṟinga, wakapfa.
58011030	Kui iiṙikyia shiambasa sha Yeriko shileoloka, kyiyeri shileiṟiwio mfiri mfungaaṙe.
58011031	Kui iiṙikyia Rahabu, iṟai lyilya, alerumara hamwi na walya walenyamaṟa-pfo; cha kyipfa naleambilyia kui ufoṟo walya waleṙumo iowelyia mbonyi tsa uruka.
58011032	Na inyi ngyigambe kyi-se? Kyipfa kyiyeri kyiwengyishika ionguo mbonyi tsa Kyedion, Baraka, Samson, Yefuta, Dawidi, Samolyi na tsa weonguo shisuku-pfo.
58011033	Walya kui iiṙikyia walewinga ngyuuchilyi tsa wamangyi, walewuta sha wusumganyi, waleambilyia kyaasa, waleshinga maṙumbu ga simba,
58011034	walerumisha pfinya tsa moṙo, walekyia iwoogo nyi ngyuushu. Waleenengo pfinya numa ya iwa wafafa, walewaṙa wuragari shiṙenyi, walewinga wamesa wa wayenu.
58011035	Waka waleambilyia wapfu wawo waleṟutso. Kyaindi wengyi walekapo uwicho mṟasa iwoogo, wengyi wakagamba wakundi iwuto wusingyenyi-pfo, kundu wawone wuṟutsi wuwucha ngoseṟa.
58011036	Wengyi waleyesho kui imino na ikapo. Yee, kui shipfungo, na kui iwiko kyipfungonyi.
58011037	Walekapo na magoe, wakamanyo kui msemeno, waleyesho, walewoogo kui ushu; waletenga-tenga waṟee njonyi tsa moondo na tsa mburu. Waweuṟie shindo shifoi, wechilyiso wukyiwa, wechiwutio shindo shiwicho;
58011038	(wandu walya wuyana wulawewaṟi wakae pfo.) Wawetenga-tenga nguṙunyi na mafumvunyi na mbakonyi na mṟeshenyi ya urukyenyi.
58011039	Na wandu-wo woose wamṟingyishio kyipfa kya iiṙikyia lyawo, waleambilyia kyaasa-pfo;
58011040	cha kyipfa Ruwa naweisonguo iluṟeyeṟia soe kyindo kyicha, kundu soe lulakyeri ho walaiṙime iafutsio chandu Ruwa akundi wawe.
58012001	Kyasia na soe taa, cha kyipfa luwaiṟiwie nyi waṟingyishi wafoi mbaṟe-i, luwikyie mbai orio ṟio lyilemeri, na wunyamaṟi wulya wokyeluwaṙa tapu. Lupfuṟukane kui wusimiri kulya iṟundenyi lyilyiṙambikye koṙu,
58012002	lochiambuya Yesu, ulya ekyewooka na iafutsia iiṙikyia lyaṙu. Ulya alekarishia mawawio ga halya msalabenyi. Kyipfa kya sia iya iweimmbeṙa, alekusaṟa maa ale kya sonu ya iwoogo msalabenyi-pfo. Na wulalu naṙamie kuwokonyi ko kulyoe ko kyiṙi kya mng'ano kya Ruwa.
58012003	Kusaṟenyi mnu mbonyi tsa ulya alekarishia iwingana lying'anyi mbaṟe-i lya walya wekyewuta sha wunyamaṟi. Koikyo maa mulaiṙikyie iloloma na ipfiiyo nyi mṙoe.
58012004	Mulandekapane shiṙa mṟasa samu ipusuke, mochiwingana na wunyamaṟi-pfo.
58012005	Lyingyi-se mulewaṙima shilya muleikyimbio, shekyeṙeṙa na nyoe cha iṙeṙa na wana, “Mono-ko, ulamine kyiyeri Ruwa akugalutsa mkaṟo yapfo, Maa ulaṙe iaṙanyia kyiyeri oe akuṟoṟoma. Kyipfa ulya Ruwa amkundi nekyemwilacha mkaṟo yakye.
58012006	Na nekyekapa orio mndu amwiṙikyie cha mana.”
58012007	Muwaṟi kyipfa kya iilacho mkaṟo, Ruwa nammbutie nyoe cha wana; kyipfa nyi mana uha awuye alekyemwilacha mkaṟo?
58012008	Kyasia kokooya mulawoṙe iilacho mkaṟo, kukyeri ṙombo lya woose, nyi lyo-ndu mochiwa wana wa nja, maa chi wana wa mka o wolyi-pfo.
58012009	Hamwi na isho luwewoṙe waawu waṙu wa iha wuyanenyi waleluilacha mkaṟo, na soe lukowaindia.
58012010	Kyasia chi nanga mnu ikaa wuchilyinyi wo Awu o mrima na iwaṙa moo?
58012011	Orio ngapo ikyeri kyindo kyekyeende sia-pfo, indi kya fowa; kyaindi kyiyeri kya numa yekyeendie walya wawatoṟishe nyi ngapo-yo ndunda tsa wusumganyi tsiwoṙe ufoṟo.
58012012	Koikyo goṟuonyi mawoko gailoloma na ndi tsiluoe tsiṙeṙema,
58012013	muachikyie maṙende ganyu njia tsigoṟotsu, kundu kyindo kyikyeri kyileeta kyilaṙetso, indi kyikyiṟo.
58012014	Pfulenyi kui wuragari iwaṙa ufoṟo na wandu woose, na wuele, wulya kulawoṙe mndu echiwona Mndumii alauwoṙe,
58012015	mochiambuya mnu mndu alauṟe isaṟia lya Ruwa. Na mndu oose alawe cha iṟa lyekyewawa, namulyise nyoe wukyiwa na ifanyiṟa mkaṟo ya wandu.
58012016	Kulawaṙe mndu mṟui maa alaowuye na iindia Ruwa, cha Esau, alekumba kyioṟa kyakye kya mana mmbele kyipfa kya kyelya.
58012017	Kyipfa muichi kye maa lyilya kyiyeri kya numa alekunda ioṟa mboṟa nalelego (kyipfa alewona ṙaawa lyeṙumbuya wunyamaṟi-pfo), maa chandu alepfula ṙaawa-lyo kui mcheṟeṟe.
58012018	Maa mulekooya fumvu lyeiṙima ipooyo-pfo, lyileaka moṙo, maa ipuchi lya njuu, na meema, na kyiwiṟi,
58012019	na ṟui lya iganda na ṟui lya maṙeṙo; galya walya waleicho waleterewa walawio kyindo kyoose kyingyi.
58012020	Kyipfa waleiṙima ikarishia kyindo kyilya walewio, “Maa indo lya saka lyikapaaya fumvu-lyo lyekapo na magoe.”
58012021	Na isho shilewono chandu shiwekyeri shindo sheowesha, mṟasa Mose kagamba, “Ngawoṙo nyi wuowu na iṙeṙema.”
58012022	Indi nyoe mukokooya fumvu lya Sion, na mṟi o Ruwa ai na moo, Yerusalemu ya ruwewu, kundu kuwoṙe shiku sha malaika,
58012023	kyisanzionyi na siṟi ya wandu wakyeri cha wana wambele wa Ruwa wawaṟeie ruwewu, na Ruwa moṙumbuo moondu o wandu woose, na mrima ya wandu wasumganyi wamarisie kyaro,
58012024	na Yesu alewika Mma Mhya, na samu yakye ilepusuka, yekyeonguo shindo shicha kuta iya ya Abelyi.
58012025	Ambuyenyi mulalege ulya ekyeonguo. Kyipfa kokooya walalekyia walya walelega ulya alewaikyimbia urukyenyi, ngoseṟa mnu lochikyia soe lukokushowa na ulya ekyeluikyimbia ai ruwewu-pfo.
58012026	Ulya ṟui lyakye lyileṙeṙemsha uruka kyiyeri kyilya; kyaindi wulalu nateṟia egamba, “Lyimwi-se ngyechiṙeṙemsha, chi uruka tikyi-pfo, indi na ruwewu taa.”
58012027	Kyaindi ṙeṙo lyilya, “Lyimwi-se,” lyaṟingyishia isamiṟo shilya sheiṙima iṙeṙemsho, cha shindo shilegumbo, kundu shindo shilechiiṙima iṙeṙemsho shikae.
58012028	Kyasia, cha kyipfa luiambilyia Wumangyi wulechiiṙima iṙeṙemsho, luwaṙe isaṟia, lyilya kyipfa kya ikyo luterewe Ruwa na imwindia kui njia yechimchihiṟa, hamwi na wupfereri na wuowu;
58012029	kyipfa Ruwa oṙu nyi moṙo okyerumatsa.
58013001	Ikundana cha wana wa mka lyikae ho.
58013002	Mulawaṙime iambilyia wayenu; kyipfa kui iwuta kuṙo wandu wengyi waleambilyia malaika kulawoṙe imanya.
58013003	Kumbuonyi walya wakyeri kyipfungonyi cha ilyi muwapfungye hamwi nawo; na iwo wailyiiyo mbaka, chandu na nyoe muilyiiyo mbaka.
58013004	Wandu woose wawone kye wolyi nyi kyindo kyicha, na mii ang'u mka alakuwinishe na wandu wengyi; cha kyipfa waṟui Ruwa nechiwaolotsia ngapo.
58013005	Mulawaṙe mkaṟo o kunda heleri; wenyi cha wandu walauṟie kyindo.
58013006	Cha kyipfa oe amonyi nagambie, “Ruwa nyi oe ekyengyitarama ngyechiowuo-pfo, mndu nechingyiwutia kyi?”
58013007	Kumbuonyi walya wawekyemusongoya, walemuongoya Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa; lyingyi-se, kui iambuya mnu mafurumionyi ga mkaṟo owo, oshenyi iiṙikyia lyawo.
58013008	Yesu Kristo nyi oe ulya, ukou na inu na mṟasa mlungana.
58013009	Maa mulaṟaisho nyi malosho ga mbaṟe tsingyi, na mayenu; kyipfa nyi kyicha mrima ukarisho kui isaṟia, maa chi kui shelya shilya walya waleyenda nasho walalewona kyiira-pfo.
58013010	Luwoṙe alyitaṟe walya wekyeṟundia tengo lyilya walawoṙe momu o ilya shindo shayo.
58013011	Kyipfa shindo shilya samu yasho ileendo nyi Mkohanyi ang'anyi kuta woose na handu haele kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi, kyaindi nyama tsa shindo-sho tsekyeṙasio nja ya handu wandu wekyekaa.
58013012	Kyipfa kya ikyo, Yesu na oe, kundu nailyishe wandu kui samu yakye amonyi, nalelyiso wukyiwa nja ya mṟi.
58013013	Kyasia lufume luyende kokye nja ya handu wandu wekyekaa, na imino hamwi na oe.
58013014	Kyipfa iha luwoṙe mṟi ochikaa ho mlungana-pfo, indi luipfula mṟi ulya uicha.
58013015	Kyasia, kui njia yakye oe, luenengye Ruwa kyiṙaso kya kyiṟumi mlungana, maṙeṙo gaṙu nyi kyienengo kyaṙu.
58013016	Kyaindi mulawaṙime iwuta shindo shicha na ikaa handu hamwi; kyipfa shienengo cha isho nyisho shekyechihiṟa Ruwa.
58013017	Indienyi walya wekyemusongoya, na iwapfereria; kyipfa wo wekyelaa kyiṙombo kyipfa kya mrima yanyu. Kyipfa wechiwia Ruwa mbonyi tsa wuṟundi wowo, kundu kye wawute kuṙo kui sia maa chi kui fowa-pfo; kyipfa kyiwechimuenenga nyoe kyiira-pfo.
58013018	Luterewienyi; kyipfa luiṙikyie kye luwoṙe makusaṟo mecha mrimenyi, lukundi iwaṙa mkaṟo mcha shindonyi shoose.
58013019	Na inyi ngyimuterewa ngoseṟa mnu iwuta isho kundu ngyiwiyiṟo na konyu iwinyi.
58013020	Kyasia, Ruwa o ufoṟo aleende-se iwuka ko wapfu Mlyisi Ang'anyi o moondo, kui samu ya mma o mlungana, oe Mndumii oṙu Yesu,
58013021	namuenengye nyoe iafutsia kyaro orio iṟundenyi lyicha, muiṙime iwuta shilya akundi; na oe echiwuta mrimenyi koṙu kyilya kyichihiṟie mbele yakye, kui Yesu Kristo; kyiṟumi kyikae na oe mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
58013022	Kyaindi ngyimuterewa, wana wa wama, muaṙanyie necha ulogo-lu lo iikyimbiana; kyipfa ngamuṟeia paruo-i kui maṙeṙo maangu.
58013023	Manyenyi kye mono-wama oṙu Timoteo ammbuto kyipfungonyi; ulya, kacha iwinyi, ngyechiwonana na nyoe hamwi na oe.
58013024	Iṟikyiṟenyi woose wekyemusongoya nyoe, na wandu wa Ruwa woose; iwo wakyeri wa Italyia wamuiṟikyiṟa.
58013025	Isaṟia lyikae na nyoe moose.
59001001	Yakobo, mtumo o Ruwa, na o Mndumii Yesu Kristo, ko wandu woose wa Ruwa wanyanyaṟikyie ipfo na ipfo; ngamuiṟikyiṟa.
59001002	Wana wa wama wako, talenyi kye nyi sia tikyi, mukooloka shiyeshonyi sha orio mbaṟe;
59001003	mochimanya kye iyesho lya iiṙikyia lyanyu lyekyeende wusimiri.
59001004	Wusimiri wuwaṙe iṟunda lyiafukyie, muiṙime iwa wandu muafutsie kui maṟunda na wuyendelyi wucha.
59001005	Kyaindi mndu o konyu kauṟa wuṟango, naterewe ko Ruwa, ekyeenenga woose kui ilekyia, maa ekyeṟoṟoma-pfo; na oe nechienengo.
59001006	Indi naterewe kui iiṙikyia, kulawoṙe ikapa kawi maa ale, kyipfa mokapa kawi nyi kyimwi na mṟinga oiṙa ipalyipalyinyi ukoṙoo nyi mkuma, na iwiyitso kunu na kunu.
59001007	Kyipfa mndu cha icho alakusaṟe kye neambilyia kyindo ko Mndumii.
59001008	Mndu o makusaṟo galagoṟokyi nekyekapa kawi njienyi tsakye tsoose.
59001009	Kyaindi mono-wama alawoṙe kyiṟumi kya maṟunda nachihiyo cha kyipfa naenengo kyiṟumi;
59001010	na mnjama nachihiyo kyipfa nasotso; cha kyipfa nechiṙeka cha kyiwaṟo kya maṟa.
59001011	Kyipfa mnengyeṟi okyeṙo na mrikye, ukoumiṟa iṟa, na kyiwaṟo kya iṟa-lyo kyekyeoloka, na wucha wolyo woose wokyenyamaṟika. Nyi wuṙo mnjama echirumatso njienyi tsakye tsoose.
59001012	Agusu mndu ekyekarishia shiyesho; cha kyipfa kamwiṙikyio neambilyia wori wo moo, wulya Mndumii aṟeyeṟie walya wamkundi.
59001013	Kyiyeri mndu ayesho, alagambe, “Ngyiyesho nyi Mndumii;” kyipfa Ruwa eiṙima iyesho nyi wunyamaṟi, maa oe amonyi ekyeyesha mndu-pfo.
59001014	Kyaindi orio umwi nekyeyesho nyi lango tsakye amonyi na kunu tsechimkuruo na imlemba.
59001015	Numa ya iho lango ngyiwicho tsekyeende wunyamaṟi, na wunyamaṟi wukomng'ana wokyeende upfu.
59001016	Wana wa wama wako wakunde, mulalembo.
59001017	Orio ienengyia lyikyeri lyicha, na orio kyindo kyekyewuto kyiafutsie, kyekyewuka wuye, kyekyesoka ko Awu agumbie mnengyeṟi, mori na nyenyeri. Kokye kuwoṙe iilachika lyekyeende meema-pfo.
59001018	Kui ikunda lyakye amonyi nalelufee kui Ṙeṙo lya loi, luwe cha wana wawagumbe nyi oe.
59001019	Isho muichi, wana wa wama wako wakunde. Kyasia orio mndu nawe mwanguhu iaṙanyia indi chi mwanguhu iṙeṙa maa ikapo nyi nyashi-pfo; maa moṙeṙa-pfo.
59001020	Cha kyipfa nyashi ya mndu yekyeṟunda wusumganyi wo Ruwa-pfo.
59001021	Koikyo wikyienyi kuleshi ukoe loose na wuwicho wuingyikyie, na iambilyia kui wuhoo Ṙeṙo lyilya lyilewooyo konyu, lyechiiṙima ikyiṟa mrima yanyu.
59001022	Kyaindi wenyi wandu mokyewuta kyilya mokyeicho, maa chi wandu weaṙanyia tikyi kunu mochikulemba muwenyi-pfo.
59001023	Cha kyipfa mndu kawa moaṙanyia tikyi maa ekyewuta kyilya aiicho-pfo, mndu-cho nyi kyimwi na mndu aikuambuya kyiyewonyi.
59001024	Kyipfa nekyekuambuya, numa kayenda, cha ilyi kawaṙima chandu akyeri.
59001025	Kyaindi mndu moambuya mawawaso gaafutsie galakyeri ga wutumo, na ikaa kyiiṙi kyago, alawe mndu ekyeaṙanyia na iwaṙima indi mowuta kyilya aiicho, icho nechiwa agusu kyiiṙi kya iwuta lyakye.
59001026	Mndu kakusaṟa kye nawoṙe mwiṙikyie, indi ekyeringa ulumi lokye-pfo, kunu echilemba mrima okye, mwiṙikyie o mndu-cho chi kyindo-pfo.
59001027	Mwiṙikyie mcha ulawoṙe kyindo kyifanyi mbele ya Mndumii Ruwa nyi ichu: indesaia ngoṙa na wakusu wukyiwenyi wowo, na ikushowa na wuyana kulawoṙe wunyamaṟi.
59002001	Wana wa wama wako, iiṙikyia lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, Mndumii o mng'ano, maa mulawe nalyo kui ikundia wandu.
59002002	Kyipfa mndu aṟee peti ya sahapu na nguwo ngyicha kaiṙa na sinagoginyi lyanyu na numa ya iho mkyiwa aṟee masaṟa kaiṙa;
59002003	na nyoe mukokundia ulya aṟee nguwo ngyicha, na immbia, “Ṙamia iha handu hecha;” na iwia mkyiwa ulya, “Goṟoka halya,” ang'u “Ṙamia maṙendenyi gako,”
59002004	ngyesa mowuta uwicho mrimenyi konyu mukowa weanduya wawoṙe makusaṟo mawicho-pfoe?
59002005	Wana wa wama wako wakunde, aṙanyienyi, “Ngyesa Ruwa alesambuṟa wakyiwa wa wuyana wawe wanjama wa iiṙikyia na weoṟa Wumangyi aleteṟia wamkundi-pfoe?”
59002006	Indi nyoe mulemina mkyiwa. Ngyesa wanjama chiwo waimulyisa wukyiwa na imuṙuo kyianduyonyi-pfoe?
59002007	Chiwo wailahia rina lyilya lyicha muleenengo-pfoe?
59002008	Kyaindi mukoafutsia iwawaso lyilya lya Wumangyi chandu kyikyiṟeie, “Kunda momṟasa opfo cha iyoe kumonyi,” muiwuta necha.
59002009	Indi mukokundia wandu, muiwuta wunyamaṟi na ianduyo nyi uwawaso kye mui wanyamaṟi.
59002010	Kyipfa mndu oose echiosha mawawaso goose, indi kakapa ṙende kyindonyi kyimwi, naṙeko kyiiṙi kya goose.
59002011	Cha kyipfa icho alegamba, “Ulaṟuguye na Ulaṟuguyo,” nalewegamba taa, “Ulawaage.” Kyasia kokooya ulaṟuguya ang'u iṟuguyo, kyaindi kowaaga, nofunja uwawaso.
59002012	Ṙeṙenyi na iwuta cha wandu wechianduyo kui uwawaso lulawoṙe wutumo.
59002013	Kyipfa Ruwa echiwoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi kyiyeri aianduya mndu alekyewoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi-pfo. Kyipfa iwoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi lying'anyi kuta ianduya.
59002014	Wana wa wama wako, kuwoṙe kyiira kyiha, mndu kagamba nawoṙe iiṙikyia, kyaindi awoṙe mawuto-pfo? Ngyesa iiṙikyia lyilya lyechiiṙima imkyiṟa?
59002015	Kokooya mono-wama o kyisoṟo ang'u o kyika namkuuye na awoṙe kyindo kyelyio-pfo,
59002016	na mndu o konyu kawawia, “Yendenyi na ufoṟo, mundeoṙa moṙo na iiguṙa,” kyaindi alawaenengye sha mmbiu, kyawaṙa kyiira kyiha?
59002017	Nyi wuṙo na iiṙikyia, lyilandewaṙe mawuto, lyapfa kyiiṙi kyalyo.
59002018	Kyaindi mndu negamba, “Iyoe nuwoṙe iiṙikyia, na inyi ngyiwoṙe mawuto. Ngyiloṟa iiṙikyia lyapfo kulawoṙe mawuto, na inyi ngyekuloṟa iiṙikyia lyako kui mawuto gako.”
59002019	Iyoe nuiṙikyie kye Ruwa nyi umwi; nowuta necha. Masatana nago gaiṙikyie na iṙeṙema.
59002020	Kyaindi nukundi imanya, iyoe mndu ulai kyindo, kye iiṙikyia lyilawoṙe mawuto lyiwoṙe ndunda-pfo?
59002021	Ngyesa awu oṙu Abrahamu aletalyio kye nawoṙe wusumganyi kui mawuto, lyilya alewuta Isakyi mono-kye mesenyi ya Mndumii-pfoe?
59002022	Ommbona kye iiṙikyia lyilewuta maṟunda hamwi na mawuto gakye, na kye iiṙikyia lyilya lyileafutsio kui njia ya mawuto galya.
59002023	Shiṟeio shilya shikaafutsio; shiṟeio shilegamba, “Abrahamu naleiṙikyia Ruwa, kyikatalo kokye kye nyi wusumganyi;” na oe nalelago mbuya ya Ruwa.
59002024	Muwonyi kye mndu nekyetalo kye nawoṙe wusumganyi kui mawuto gakye; chi kui iiṙikyia lyimonyi-pfo.
59002025	Nyi wuṙo na Rahabu ulya awei iṟai. Ngyesa aletalo kye nawoṙe wusumganyi kui mawuto, lyilya aleambilyia wandu walya waweowelyia mbonyi tsa Waisiraelyi, kawafumiṟia nja kui njia ingyi-pfoe?
59002026	Kyipfa chandu kyikyeri kye mmbiu ulawoṙe mrima upfiie, nyi wuṙo na iiṙikyia lyilawoṙe mawuto lyipfiie.
59003001	Wana wa wama wako, mulawe walosha wafoi, muichi kye soe walosha lochiambilyia ianduyo lying'anyi kuta.
59003002	Kyipfa lokyekapa ṙende soe loose shindonyi shifoi. Mndu alekyekapa ṙende kyiiṙi kya iṙeṙa, icho nyi mndu aafutsie, echiiṙima itirimisha mmbiu okye oose cha kui kyindo kyilya kyekyetirimisha shindo.
59003003	Ambuyenyi, lokyewika kyindo kyetirimisha shindo maṙumbunyi ga farasi, kundu tsiluindie, na kuṙo lukoweṟuo mmbiu yatso yoose.
59003004	Lyingyi-se ambuyenyi ngalawa; maa chandu tsing'anyi cha kyikyi, na iṙoo nyi shiwiṟi shing'anyi, tsekyeweṟutso nyi kyindo kyitung'tu kyeweṟutsa shindo, tsikayenda kundu koose ulya ekyetsiṙuo akunda tsiyende.
59003005	Na wuṙo taa ulumi nyi kyiwungo kyitutu, nalo lokyekushela ikushela lying'anyi. Ambuyenyi chandu moṙo mtung'tu okyekoṟa nguṙu ing'anyi mnu.
59003006	Na ulumi nyi moṙo; wuyana wulya wo wunyamaṟi, ulumi lulya, lulewiko shiwungonyi shaṙu, nalo nyilo lokyefanyiṟa mmbiu oose. Lokyeatsa moṙo ulya uwukyie Ngyehenenyi na ilurumatsa piu.
59003007	Kyipfa orio mbaṟe ya indo lya saka, na ya shileye, na ya shindo shekyekukuruo na ndewu, na ya shindo shikyeri ipalyipalyinyi, shekyeiṙima ichilyio, nasho shilemchilyio nyi wandu.
59003008	Indi ulumi kuwoṙe mndu eiṙima iluchilyia-pfo; nyi wuwicho wulekyetsia, wuichuo wuṟoi wokyeende upfu.
59003009	Kui ulumi lokyeṟumisha Ruwa Awu oṙu, na kui ulumi lokyesesa wandu walegumbo kui fana ya Ruwa.
59003010	Kyiiṙi kya ṙumbu lyilya lyilya kokyewuka mboṟa na seso. Wana wa wama wako, kyiwaṟi mbonyi-tso tsiwe kuṙo-pfo.
59003011	Ngyesa, shoka ṟukonyi lyimwi yechiiṙima iwuta mṟinga okyeloṙa na mṟinga okyesuka?
59003012	Wana wa wama wako, ngyesa, mfumu ochiiṙima iwika seituni, ang'u msabibu iwika nduo? Nyi wuṙo shoka yechiiṙima iwuta mṟinga okyesuka na mṟinga okyeloṙa-pfo.
59003013	Nyi wui awoṙe wuṟango na imanya konyu? Naloṟe maṟunda gakye kui wuyendelyi wokye mcha, wuhoonyi wo wuṟango.
59003014	Kyaindi mukowaṙa wunyeng'i wo nyashi na maluyano mrimenyi konyu, maa mulakuiring'ishe, maa mulaṙeṙe wongo kui iwingana na loi.
59003015	Wuṟango-wo chi wulya wuwukyie wuye-pfo, indi nyi wo wuyana, wo mbaṟe ya kyimndu na Satana.
59003016	Kyipfa handu hawoṙe wunyeng'i na maluyano, nyi ho-ndu hawoṙe kyituṟu, na orio kyindo kyiwicho.
59003017	Kyaindi wuṟango wuwukyie wuye, kya kuwooka wuwucha, ngoseṟa nyi wo ufoṟo, nyi wo wuhoo, wukuṟeyeṟie iaṙanyia maṙeṙo ga wandu, wuichuo isaṟia na ndunda ngyicha, wuwoṙe wuṟiingyi maa wuwoṙe wukulembecheṟi-pfo.
59003018	Na ndunda tsa wusumganyi tsekyeṙongo ufoṟonyi na walya wekyewuta sha ufoṟo.
59004001	Shiṙa nyi kwi shiwuka, na ngapano tsikyeri konyu nyi kwi tsiwukyie? Chi kunu langonyi tsanyu tsekyeende shiṙa shiwungonyi shanyu-pfoe?
59004002	Muilanga maa muwoṙe kyindo-pfo; muiwaaga na inyeng'a, maa mochiiṙima iwona-pfo. Muiende shiṙa na ikapana, maa muwoṙe kyindo-pfo kyipfa muiterewa-pfo.
59004003	Muiterewa mulawone cha kyipfa muiterewa uwicho, kundu muṟunde nasho ko lango tsanyu.
59004004	Lanyoe waṟui, muichi kye iwaṙa mbuya na wuyana nyi iwaṙa kyituwa na Ruwa-pfoe? Kyasia orio mndu akundi iwaṙa mbuya na wuyana nekyewa nawaṙa kyituwa na Ruwa.
59004005	Ang'u mokusaṟa kye shiṟeio shiṙeṙa wulya? Mumuyo-cho ekyekaa mrimenyi koṙu chi nekyelulanga mṟasa iluwaṙia wunyeng'i-pfoe?
59004006	Kyaindi nekyelutarama soe isaṟia lyiengyeṟikyie; koikyo nekyegamba, “Ruwa nekyewingana na walya wekyekuṙosa, indi nekyeenenga isaṟia wekyekutitiṟa.”
59004007	Kyasia indienyi Ruwa. Legenyi Satana, na oe nemṙicha.
59004008	Tikyirenyi ko Ruwa, na oe netikyira kufuhi na nyoe. Sanjenyi mawoko ganyu kyimṟumoe, nyoe wanyamaṟi, na isanja mrima yanyu nyoe wakulembecheṟi.
59004009	Sokyionyi nyi fowa na ikapa ṟanyi na ifiiṟa. Iseka lyanyu lyiilachikye lyiwe ikapa ṟanyi, na ichihiyo lyanyu lyiilachikye lyiwe iwihiyo.
59004010	Kutitiṟenyi ushangunyi lo Ruwa kyiyeri muiterewa na oe nemuenenga kyiṟumi.
59004011	Wana wa wama, maa mulairiane wongo. Moiria mono-wamae wongo, ang'u ianduya mono-wamae, nekyeiria wongo na ianduya uwawaso. Kyaindi koanduya uwawaso, noṙa iindia na iwooka ianduya.
59004012	Nyi Ruwa amonyi tikyi ekyewika uwawaso na nyi oe moanduya wandu. Nyi oe echiiṙima ikyiṟa na irumatsa. Iyoe nyi wui uianduya mndu ungyi?
59004013	Kyasia-ng'u, nyoe mokyegamba, “Inu ang'u ngama luiṙa na mṟinyi mlyiwe na ikaa pfo maka umwi, na ikapa mbucha na iwona kyiira;”
59004014	kyaindi muichi kyindo kyiwutika ngama-pfo. Moo onyu nyi kyikyi? Nyoe nyi kyimwi na mtsu okyewono kyiyeri kyifuhi, numa ulawono-se.
59004015	Kyiwechia igamba, “Mndumii kakunda, lulandepfe lochiwika kuṙi ang'u kuṙi.”
59004016	Kyaindi wulalu muikuiring'isha makushelonyi ganyu. Ikushela lya mbaṟe-i iyi nyi lyiwicho.
59004017	Kyasia ulya aichi iwuta mecha, indi alawute kuṙo, icho nanyamaṟia Ruwa.
59005001	Kyasia-ng'u, nyoe wanjama! Fiiṟenyi, mugambe kyelewui kyipfa kya matuuro gaicha na konyu.
59005002	Masaa ganyu gamaporu, na nguwo tsanyu tsingyilye nyi mashinu.
59005003	Sahapu tsanyu na shindo shanyu sha woguru wung'anyi shikyindie ukoe, na ukoe-lo lomuṟingyishia, na mmbiu yanyu yechinyamaṟika cha ilyi nyi ikoṟo nyi moṙo. Mulekooma kyiseyesoe mfirinyi ya mafurumionyi.
59005004	Kumbuonyi wori wo waṟundi walesambuo shilyimu shanyu mulalewataa. Aṙanyienyi chandu waifiiṟa. Kyifiiṟo kyawo kyileaṙanyio nyi Ruwa.
59005005	Ikaa lyanyu wuyanenyi nyi lya ichihiyo na ikushela. Mulekuwegia cha mfiri ulya Ruwa echianduya wandu woose.
59005006	Muleanduya mndu msumganyi na immbaaga, maa chandu alaiwingana na nyoe.
59005007	Koikyo, wana wa wama, karishienyi, mṟasa icha lya Mndumii. Ambuyenyi chandu mṙemi ekyeweṙelyia shilyimu sha woguru wung'anyi. Nekyekarishia kyipfa kyasho mṟasa mvuo tsa kuwooka na tsefurumia tsikape.
59005008	Na nyoe karishienyi muṟingyishie mrima yanyu, cha kyipfa icha lya Mndumii lyatikyira kufuhi.
59005009	Wana wa wama, maa mulanunuwiane, mulacheanduyo. Ambuyenyi moanduya nagoṟokyi mbele ya moongo.
59005010	Wana wa wama wako, weonguo shisuku walya waleende ndumo ya Ruwa nyi mfano mcha o wandu walekarishia matuuro.
59005011	Ambuyenyi, lokyegamba wagusu walya walesimiria. Muleicho mbonyi tsa wusimiri wo Yobu, mulewona mafurumionyi ga Mndumii kye Mndumii nyi nawoṙe isaṟia na iwoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi.
59005012	Kyaindi ngoseṟa ya shoose, wana wa wama wako, mulalye nyamu, kui Ruwewu maa kui uruka; maa kui mbaṟe ingyi yoose; indi yee yanyu iwe yee, na ote yanyu iwe ote, kundu Ruwa alamuanduye.
59005013	Kokooya mndu o konyu naolokyio nyi fowa naterewe ko Ruwa. Kokooya nawoṙe mrima mkyesi naimbe shiimbo sheana.
59005014	Kokooya mndu o konyu naluoe nalage wameeku wa siṟi; wamterewie na imshia mafuṙa kui rina lya Mndumii.
59005015	Kokooya wameeku-wo waiṙikyia kye Ruwa neaṙanyia kyiterewo kyawo, ulya aluoe nechikyiṟo. Ruwa nemmbiyiṟia pfinya maa kokooya anyamaṟie nechihooṟio.
59005016	Tochianenyi ngyuunyamaṟi tsanyu nyoe wenyi ko wenyi, na iterewiana, muiṙime ikyiṟo. Iterewa lya mndu msumganyi lyiwoṙe kyiira mnu.
59005017	Elyiya nawei mndu o mbaṟe imwi cha soe, kapfuṟukana iterewa ko loi kundu mvuo ilakape, na mvuo ilekapa ko maka iṟaṟu na mori iṟandaaṟu-pfo.
59005018	Katerewa-se na mvuo tsikakapa na shilyimu shikaṙo.
59005019	Wana wa wama wako, kokooya mndu o konyu aṙetsa njia ya wukyiṟo, na mndu ungyi kamtarama iwuya;
59005020	manyenyi kye ulya motarama mṙeko iwuka njienyi ya wuṙetsi, nechikyiṟa mrima okye na upfu, na ishikyia wuingyi wo ngyuunyamaṟi.
60001001	Inyi Petiro, ngyikyeri msu o Yesu Kristo, ngaṟeia paruo-i ko wasambuṟe wanyanyaṟikyie ipfo na ipfo, wekyekaa cha wayenu ngyuurukyenyi tsa Ponto, na Galatia, na Kapadokyia, na Asia, na Bitinia.
60001002	Chandu Ruwa Awu alesonguo imumanya kui imuilyisha nyi Mumuyo, mṟasa mukoiṙima iindia na inyanyatsio samu ya Yesu Kristo. Isaṟia na ufoṟo shiengyeṟo konyu.
60001003	Ruwa naṟumisho, Awu o Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, ulya kui isaṟia lyakye alelufee lya kawi kundu luwone ikusuria lyiwoṙe moo kui iṟuka lya Yesu Kristo iwuka ko wapfu.
60001004	Luwone na kyioṟa kyilekyenyamaṟika, kyilawoṙe ukoe, kyilekyesia, kyilekoomo ruwewu kyipfa kyanyu.
60001005	Na nyoe mokyeringo nyi pfinya tsa Ruwa kui njia ya iiṙikyia mṟasa muiṙime iwona wukyiṟo wuwuṟeyeṟe wuloṟo kyiyeri kya mafurumionyi.
60001006	Muichihiyo mnu kyiyeri-kyo, maa chandu wulalu ko kyiyeri kyifuhi, kokooya kyiwaṟi iwa kuṙo, mowoṙo nyi fowa mrimenyi kui shiyesho sha mbaṟe tsifoi.
60001007	Kundu kye iyesho kui iiṙikyia lyanyu, lyilya lyiwoṙe woguru wung'anyi kuta sahapu yekyenyamaṟika, maa chandu sahapu-yo yekyeyeṟo kui moṙo; muambilyie iṟumisho na kyiṟumi mfiri ulya Yesu Kristo echiloṟo.
60001008	Na oe mumkundi, maa chandu mulammbonyi; ulya maa chandu mulammbonyi wulalu, mumwiṙikyie; na ichihiyo mnu, kui sia ilekyewono, iwoṙe kyiṟumi.
60001009	Kyiiṙi kya ichihiyo lyanyu wulalu Ruwa naimukyiṟa, ikyiṟo lyikyeri ndunda tsa iiṙikyia lyanyu lyikyeri kui Yesu Kristo.
60001010	Ko mbonyi tsa wukyiṟo-wo weonguo shisuku walepfula-pfula na isoruo-soruo, walya waleonguo shisuku ko mbonyi tsa isaṟia lyechimukooya nyoe.
60001011	Wakapfula nyi kyiyeri kyiha, na nyi kyiyeri kya mbaṟe iha kyileikyimbo nyi Mumuyo o Kristo awekyeri mrimenyi kowo, ulya alesonguo iṟingyishia matuuro Kristo echienengo, na kyiṟumi kyekokyikyeri pfo numa ya isho.
60001012	Wakaloṟo kye chi kyipfa kyawo wawenyi-pfo, indi kyipfa kyanyu waleṟunda ipfo shindonyi, shilya wulalu shalosho konyu na walya walemuongoya nyoe Ndumi Ngyicha kui Mumuyo Mweele aleṙumo iwuka ruwewu. Shindo-sho malaika walangyie ishimanya.
60001013	Koikyo kuṟeyeṟenyi na iwaṙa meena; mochiweṙelyia nakamwi isaṟia lyilya mochiwona kyiyeri Yesu Kristo echiloṟo.
60001014	Cha wana wa wuindi mulakufananyishe na lango tsanyu tsa mawookyionyi, tsa wutondo wonyu;
60001015	indi chandu ulya alemulaga nyoe ai mweele, nyoe na nyoe wenyi waele mkaṟonyi onyu oose.
60001016	Cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie, “Mochiwa waele kyipfa inyi ngyimweele.”
60001017	Na kokooya mokyemlaga Awu, ulya ekyeanduya wandu kulawoṙe ikundia, iṙuana na iṟunda lyakye, chumienyi kui wuowu kyiyeri kya ikaa lyanyu iha cha wayenu.
60001018	Na nyoe manyenyi kye mulekyiṟo chi kui shindo shekyenyamaṟika cha heleri ang'u sahapu-pfo; muiṙime iwuka mkaṟonyi onyu ulawoṙe kyiira muleuambilyia ko waku wanyu;
60001019	indi kui samu ya woguru, cha ya kyiondo kyilawoṙe tewe, ya Kristo.
60001020	Na oe nalemanyika loi wookyia mawookyionyi, wuyana wulandegumbo; kyaindi naleloṟo mafurumionyi ga shiyeri kyipfa kyanyu.
60001021	Ulya kui oe mowa wandu waiṙikyie Ruwa, alemṟutsa iwuka ko wapfu kamuenenga kyiṟumi; mṟasa iiṙikyia lyanyu na ikusuria lyanyu lyiwe ko Ruwa.
60001022	Mukomuilyisha mrima yanyu kui iindia wuloi, mṟasa iwaṙa ikundana cha wana wa wama kulawoṙe wukulembecheṟi, kyasia pfuṟukanenyi ikundana kui mrima.
60001023	Cha kyipfa muwafee lya kawi; chi kui mbeu yekyenyamaṟika-pfo indi kui iya ilekyenyamaṟika; kui Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyiwoṙe moo, lyekyekaa ho mṟasa mlungana.
60001024	Kyipfa, “Mmbiu oose nyi cha maṟa, na mng'ano ocho nyi cha kyiwaṟo. Maṟa gekyeuma na shiwaṟo shekyeoloka.
60001025	Indi Ṙeṙo lya Mndumii lyechikaa mlungana.” Na Ṙeṙo-lyo nyi mbonyi tsilya ngyicha tsileongoyo konyu.
60002001	Kyasia, ṙenyi wuwicho na ngyeṟo, na wukulembecheṟi na wunyeng'i na iiria wengyi shindo sha wongo.
60002002	Chandu wana waionga wakundi maruwa ga wamawo, muwaṟi orio mfiri ilanga kyelya kya mrima kyilakyisanze-sanze na kyindo kyingyi. Mukolya kyelya-kyo kya mrima moching'ana na ikyiṟo,
60002003	kokooya mosonja kye Mndumii nyi monyi isaṟia.
60002004	Yendenyi kokye oe, ai igoe lyiwoṙe moo, lyilelego nyi wandu, indi ko Ruwa nyi lyilyisambuṟe, lyiwaṟi iindio.
60002005	Na nyoe, cha magoe Ruwa agaenengyie moo, muwawikye muwe numba ya Mumuyo, wukohanyi wuele, muwute shiṙaso sha mrima, shichihiṟie Ruwa, kui njia ya Yesu Kristo.
60002006	Cha kyipfa kyikyiṟeie shiṟeionyi shiele, “Ngawika kulya Sion igoe lying'anyi lya ndumbenyi, lyilyisambuṟe, lyiwaṟi iindio, na orio mndu amwiṙikyie echirigo nyi sonu-pfo.”
60002007	Kyasia, iindio-lyi nyi konyu nyoe muiṙikyie. Indi ko walya walaiṙikyie kyikyiṟeie, “Igoe lyilelego nyi wewika numba, lyawa igoe lying'anyi lya ndumbenyi.”
60002008	Lyingyi-se, “Ilyi nyi igoe lyeenenga wandu ikapa ṙende, na iṟaṟa lyeolotsa wandu.” Cha kyipfa kui Ṙeṙo lyilya wekyekapa ṙende, walalyiiṙikyie nawo walewiko ho kundu waambilyie shindo sha mbaṟe-yo iyo.
60002009	Indi nyoe nyi kyishari kyisambuṟe, wukohanyi wo kyimangyi, isanga lyiele, wandu wa wuchilyi wo Ruwa, muiṙime ionguo mbonyi tsa mawuto gakye ga maṟiyisho. Ulya alemulaga muwukye meemenyi muiṙe na ngyeelenyi yakye ya maṟiyisho.
60002010	Nyoe ipfo mawookyionyi muwei chi isanga-pfo, kyaindi wulalu nyi isanga lya Ruwa; mukyeri wandu mulawoṙe isaṟia, indi wulalu mowona isaṟia.
60002011	Wakunde, ngyimuterewa cha wandu waiiṙa na wakyaro, lekanenyi na lango tsa mmbiu tsekyewingana na mrima.
60002012	Muwaṙe mkaṟo mcha kyiyeri mukyeri na walya walaiṙikyie Yesu, kundu kokooya wekyemuiria kye mowuta shindo shiwicho, wakaambuya mawuto ganyu mecha, waṟumishe Ruwa kyiyeri-kyo Yesu echicha lya kawi.
60002013	Oshenyi orio kyindo walya wawoṙe wuchilyi wagamba, kyipfa kya Mndumii. Kokooya nyi mangyi, muindienyi cha mndu awoṙe wuchilyi wung'anyi.
60002014	Kokooya nyi wasongoru waindienyi cha wandu Ruwa awaṙumie itaa kyiṟaache walya wekyewuta shindo shiwicho na iṟumisha walya wekyewuta shindo shicha.
60002015	Cha kyipfa nyisho shindo Ruwa akundi. Kye kui iwuta shindo shicha mushingye maṙumbu ya wutondo ga matondo.
60002016	Cha wandu walawachilyie nyi kyindo, kyaindi walekyekusuria ikyo kui iṟika wuwicho, indi cha waṟundi wa Ruwa.
60002017	Indienyi wandu woose. Kundenyi woose waiṙikyie Yesu. Terewenyi na iowuo Ruwa. Enengyenyi mangyi kyiṟumi.
60002018	Lanyoe waṟundi, indienyi wandumii wanyu kui wuowu wung'anyi. Chi walya wawecha na wahoo tupu-pfo, indi maa walya walang'a.
60002019	Kyipfa iwu nyiwo wucha wukundio, mndu echikarishia fowa kui ikumbuo Ruwa, kyiyeri alyiso wukyiwa kui ionio.
60002020	Cha kyipfa nyi kyiṟumi kyiha ikarishia? Nyi ilyi monyamaṟa na ikapo ngofi? Kyaindi ikarishia, kyiyeri mowuta shindo shicha na ilyiso wukyiwa, iwu nyiwo wucha wuwukunde mbele ya Ruwa.
60002021	Cha kyipfa nyiwo mulelagio; kyipfa Kristo na oe nalelyiso wukyiwa kyipfa kyanyu, kamuṙeea mfano, muoshe ndifo tsakye.
60002022	Oe alenyamaṟa, maa iwaṙa ngyeṟo-pfo.
60002023	Oe kyiyeri alelahio, alelahia-pfo; kyiyeri alelyiso wukyiwa, aletaa kyiṟaache-pfo; indi nalekuṙambika ko ulya ekyeanduya kui wusumganyi.
60002024	Oe amonyi naleṙuo ngyuunyamaṟi tsaṙu mmbiunyi kokye msalabenyi o wunyamaṟi na ikaa chandu Ruwa akundi; kyipfa Kristo alekapio msalabenyi nyoe mowaṙa moo o kyimrima.
60002025	Cha kyipfa muweiṙeka cha moondo; kyaindi wulalu mowiyilyia Mlyisi na Moambuya mrima yanyu.
60003001	Nyoe waka, indienyi wamii wanyu; kundu kokooya kuwoṙe walaiṙikyie Ṙeṙo, waiṙime ilyiiṙikyia kui mkaṟo ya waka wawo kulawoṙe igamba kyindo;
60003002	wechiambuya mkaṟo onyu mcha, na o wuowu.
60003003	Ikuchopa lyanyu, lyilawe ikuchopa lya kyanja, cha ioka njui, iṟaa sahapu na iṟaa nguwo.
60003004	Indi lyiwe wucha wo mrimenyi wulekyewono; shindonyi shekuchopa shilekyenyamaṟika; wucha wo mrima o wuhoo na wuramiri, wuwoṙe woguru wung'anyi ushangyunyi lo Ruwa.
60003005	Kyipfa kuṙo nyi wuṙo walekuchopa waka waele wa kacha, walekusuria Ruwa, na iindia wamii wawo.
60003006	Chandu Sara aleindia Abrahamu, kamlaga Mndumii; na nyoe nyi wana wakye, kyiyeri mowuta shindo shicha, maa muleowesho nyi wuowu woose-pfo.
60003007	Nyoe wasoṟo, kaenyi na waka wanyu kui wuṟango, muichi kye mka nyi kyiiya kyifafa; na muwe cha weoṟa hamwi na isaṟia lya moo, kundu iterewa lyanyu lyilashingyio nyi kyindo.
60003008	Ulogo lo furumia nyi ilu, muwaṙe makusaṟo gamwi, mukyeri wandu wekyewoniana wukyiwa, wakundanyi cha wana wa mka, mochiwihiyo kyipfa kya wukyiwa wo mndu ungyi, wapfereri.
60003009	Wandu mulekyetaa kyiṟaache ang'u ilahia ulya amulahia indi wandu wekyewikyia mboṟa; cha kyipfa isho nyisho mulelagio kundu muoṟe mboṟa.
60003010	Cha kyipfa, “Ulya akundi ikaa na sia, na iwaṙa mfiri ngyicha, naringye ulumi lokye lulaṙeṙe shindo shiwicho, na mshimbo yakye ilaṙeṙe ngyeṟo.
60003011	Na naṙe mawicho, nawute shicha, napfule ufoṟo mnu.
60003012	Kyipfa meso ga Mndumii gekyeambuya wasumganyi, na maṙwi gakye gekyeaṙanyia shiterewo shawo. Indi Ruwa akundi wekyewuta mawicho-pfo.”
60003013	Na nyi wui echimmbutia kyindo kyiwicho, kokooya mopfuṟukana iwuta shindo shicha?
60003014	Kyaindi kokooya molyiso wukyiwa kyipfa kya iwa wasumganyi muwoṙe sia ing'anyi. Maa mulaowuo iowesha lyawo, maa mulaiṟewe mrimenyi; indi ilyishenyi Kristo Mndumii mrimenyi konyu.
60003015	Mukuṟeyeṟe orio mfiri igaluo orio mndu ammbesa mbonyi tsa ikusuria lyikyeri mrimenyi konyu; kyaindi kui wuhoo na wuowu.
60003016	Na nyoe muwaṙe makusaṟo mecha mrimenyi, kundu orio kyindo mochiirio, warigo nyi sonu walya wekyegamba kye mkaṟo onyu ummbicho maa chandu mulandewute kyindo kyoose kyiwicho.
60003017	Kyipfa nyi nanga ilyiso wukyiwa kyipfa kya iwuta shindo shicha, kokooya isho nyisho Ruwa akundi, kuta ilyiso wukyiwa kyipfa kya iwuta shindo shiwicho.
60003018	Cha kyipfa Kristo na oe nalelyiso wukyiwa lyimwi tupu kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi woṙu, amsumganyi kyipfa kya walya walawasumganyi, kundu naluende na ko Ruwa; mmbiu okye ukowoogo, indi mrima okye ukoenengo moo.
60003019	Na kui mrima-cho kayenda ko mrima iwekyeri kyipfungonyi kawaongoya Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa;
60003020	wandu walawewoṙe wuindi kyiyeri kya ipfo numa, kyiyeri Ruwa alewaweṙelyia kulawoṙe iwina lyilya Noe aleachikyia safina; safina ileenenga wandu nyanya ikyia iwoogo nyi mṟinga.
60003021	Mfano o shindo-sho nyi wupatiso, wokyemukyiṟa nyoe taa mfiri ya wulalu; (chi kui iwikyia kuleshi ukoe o mmbiu-pfo, indi kyaasa kyilya lokyewikyia Ruwa kya iafutsia shilya loteṟia, lukyeri wandu wekyeosha Yesu), kui iṟuka lya Yesu Kristo.
60003022	Na oe nakyeri kuwoko ko kulyoe ko Ruwa, nayenda ruwewu, echichilyia malaika na shindo shingyi shoose shiwoṙe pfinya kulya ruwewu.
60004001	Kyasia kyipfa mmbiu o Kristo ulelyiso wukyiwa, na nyoe ṟaenyi shisha sha makusaṟo galya galya awewoṙe; cha kyipfa oe mmbiu okye ulelyiso wukyiwa nalekana na wunyamaṟi.
60004002	Wookyia wulalu mulaengyeṟe iosha lango tsa mmbiu, indi oshenyi shilya Ruwa akundi, kyiyeri kyanyu kyitsugai kyekaa iha wuyanenyi.
60004003	Kyipfa kyiyeri kya moo yaṙu kyileiṙa kyishikyie iwuta shilya wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa wekyewuta; iwuta shindo shiwoṙe ukoe, na lango, na wunanzi, na shelya sha ilya na ielewetsa, na shindo shekyenanza, hamwi na iindia na iterewa mafano chandu kyilakyeri kya sungusinyi.
60004004	Shindo shekyeenenga wandu-wo walaiṙikyie iṟiyio chandu mulekyepfuṟukana iwuta shindo shilya shilya sha ukoe wung'anyi, wechimulahia.
60004005	Nawo wechionguo shindo walewuta ko ulya akuṟeyeṟie ianduya wai na moo na wapfu.
60004006	Kyipfa kya ikyo maa walya wapfiie waleongoyo Ndumi Ngyicha, kundu kye waanduyo kyimmbiu chandu wandu wekyeanduyo; indi wawaṙe moo kyimrima chandu Ruwa ai na moo.
60004007	Kyaindi mafurumionyi ga shindo shoose gakyeri kufuhi. Kyasia ṟanguonyi, mulae kyiṙombo mochiterewa.
60004008	Ngoseṟa ya isho shoose pfuṟukanenyi nakamwi ikundana; kyipfa ikunda lyekyeshikyia ngyuunyamaṟi tsifoi.
60004009	Muambilyiane nyoe wenyi ko wenyi kulawoṙe inuṟia;
60004010	orio umwi iṙuana na chandu aleambilyia kyisumbo, ṟundianenyi nakyo; cha waringyi wecha wa isaṟia lya mbaṟe tsifoi lya Ruwa.
60004011	Mndu kaṙeṙa, naṙeṙe chandu Ruwa akundi; mndu kaṟunda, naṟunde kui pfinya amwenengye nyi Ruwa; kundu Ruwa naṟumisho shindonyi shoose kui Yesu Kristo. Kyiṟumi na pfinya shikae na oe mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
60004012	Wakunde, mulaṟiyio kya wukyiwa wulya wukyeri konyu, wokyemukoṟa nyoe cha moṙo imuyesha, cha ilyi nyi kyindo kyiyenu kyacha na konyu.
60004013	Kyaindi chandu mulelya wukyiwa wo Kristo, chihiyonyi; kundu na kyiyeri kyiṟumi kyakye kyechiloṟo muchihiyo kui ikapa ngulyilyi na ngoru.
60004014	Mukowio kye mowuta shiwicho kyipfa kya rina lya Kristo nyi nanga; cha kyipfa Mumuyo o kyiṟumi na o Ruwa nakyeri na nyoe.
60004015	Mndu o konyu alalyiso wukyiwa cha mmbaagi, ang'u mbafu, ang'u mndu ekyewuta shindo shiwicho, ang'u cha mndu ekyekuwinisha na shindo sha wandu wengyi.
60004016	Kyaindi kyipfa nyi Mkristiano alarigo nyi sonu, indi naṟumishe Ruwa kui rina-lyo.
60004017	Cha kyipfa kyiyeri kyamshika kya ianduyo iwooka wandunyi wa Ruwa; na ianduyo lyikawooka koṙu soe, mafurumionyi ga walya walekyeaṙanyia Ndumi Ngyicha ya Ruwa gechiwa kuṙa?
60004018	Na kokooya kyechiwa kyuumu ko mndu msumganyi ikyia, ulya alaowuye na iindia Ruwa na mnyamaṟi nechiwono kwi?
60004019	Kyasia walya wailyiso wukyiwa kui shilya Ruwa akundi waṙambikye mrima yawo ko Ruwa, kyiiṙi kya iwuta shindo shicha, cha ilyi nyi ko ulya agumbie shindo, ekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia.
60005001	Ngyiterewa wameeku wa siṟi wakyeri konyu, inyi ngyikyeri meeku oṙiawo, na mṟingyishi o wukyiwa Kristo alelyiso, na ienengo kyiṟumi kyechiloṟo ipfo-ndu luiyenda;
60005002	lyisenyi poo lya Mndumii lyikyeri konyu, na ilyigoṟokyia. Chi kui iitiko-pfo, indi kulawoṙe iitiko, chandu Ruwa akundi, chi kui ikunda iwona heleri tsa sonu-pfo, indi kui ikuwuta nakamwi.
60005003	Maa chi cha wandu waikugaluo wandumii shikaṟonyi shawo-pfo, indi kui iloṟa mkaṟo mcha ko poo-lyo.
60005004	Na kyiyeri Mlyisi ang'anyi echiloṟo, mochiambilyia iṟikoso lya kyiṟumi, lyilya lyilekyenyamaṟika.
60005005	Na wuṙo nyoe wanakye, indienyi wameeku. Yee, nyoe moose waṙenyi wupfereri, muiṙime iṟundiana; cha kyipfa Ruwa nekyekapa walya wekyekuira, kyaindi nekyeenenga wapfereri isaṟia.
60005006	Kyasia pfererienyi wuchilyinyi wo Ruwa wuwoṙe pfinya, kundu namuṙose kui kyiyeri kyakye;
60005007	kunu mochimṙambika fowa tsanyu tsoose, cha kyipfa oe nekyekuwinisha mnu na shindo shanyu.
60005008	Muwaṙe meena na ilaa kyiṙombo; cha kyipfa mokyituwa onyu Mokyiriinzi, cha simba isepfuo, nekyetenga-tenga, echipfula mndu nammeṟe.
60005009	Na nyoe mmbingyenyi, mulailoloma iiṙikyienyi, muichi kye wukyiwa wulya wulya wukyeri ko wana wa wamanyu wakyeri wuyanenyi.
60005010	Na Ruwa o isaṟia lyoose, alemulaga nyoe iiṙa na kyiṟuminyi kyakye kya mlungana kyiiṙi kya Kristo, mukomlyiso wukyiwa kyiyeri kyitutu, oe amonyi nechimmbutia-se orio kyindo muwaṟi iwutio, na imuenenga pfinya.
60005011	Wuchilyi wo Ruwa wukae ho mlungana na mlungana. Amen.
60005012	Silyiwano, mono-wama ekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia, naṟeia paruo-i handu hako. Ngamuṟeia shindo shaangu, iikyimbia na iṟingyishia kye ilyi nyilyo isaṟia lya loi lya Ruwa. Goṟokyenyi isaṟienyi lya Ruwa kulawoṙe iloloma.
60005013	Oṙianyu msambuṟe iha Babelyi namuiṟikyiṟa, na Mariko, mono-ko.
60005014	Iṟikyiṟanenyi chandu walya waiṙikyie Yesu wekyeiṟikyiṟana. Ufoṟo lukae konyu nyoe moose, muwalungye na Kristo. Amen.
61001001	Inyi Simion Petiro, ngyikyeri mṟundi na msu o Yesu Kristo, ngaṟeia paruo-i ko walya walewona iiṙikyia lyimwi na soe, lyiwoṙe woguru, wusumganyinyi wo Ruwa oṙu, na Mkyiṟa Yesu Kristo.
61001002	Isaṟia lyikae konyu na ufoṟo luengyeṟo kyiiṙi kya imanya Ruwa na Yesu Mndumii oṙu.
61001003	Cha kyipfa wuiṙimi wokye wo kyiRuwa wuleluenenga shindo shoose shiwaṟi moo na iowuo hamwi na iindia Ruwa, kui immanya oe alelulaga kui mng'ano okye na wucha wokye amonyi.
61001004	Lyingyi-se ko isho naleluenenga shaasa shing'anyi mnu, sha woguru, kundu kye kui ikyo muiṙime iwa hamwi na walya wawoṙe mkaṟo o kyiRuwa, mochikyiṟo iwuka wunyamaṟinyi wukyeri wuyanenyi kyipfa kya lango.
61001005	Yee, na kyipfa kya ikyo mochipfuṟukana mnu ura lonyu, iiṙikyienyi lyanyu, wikyenyi ho na wucha, na wuchenyi wonyu wuṟango.
61001006	Na wuṟangonyi wonyu meena, na meenenyi onyu wusimiri; na wusimirinyi wonyu iowuo na iindia Ruwa.
61001007	Na kyiiṙi kya iowuo na iindia Ruwa, ikundana lya wana wa mka; na kyiiṙi kya ikundana lya wana wa mka, ikunda.
61001008	Kokooya shindo sha mbaṟe-i-iyi shakaa konyu na iingyikyi, shemuenenga nyoe iwaṙa wuragari na ikumbia ndunda ngyicha, kui imanya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
61001009	Kyipfa ulya alawoṙe isho nyi kyipfupfuṟe, echiiṙima iwona shindo shikyeri kuleshi-pfo, nawaṙima kulya iyeṟemtso maṙeko gakye ga kacha.
61001010	Koikyo wana wa wama, pfuṟukanenyi ngoseṟa ikarisha ilago lyanyu na isambuṟo lyanyu; kyipfa mukowuta isho mochikapa ṙende-pfo.
61001011	Kyipfa kuṙi mochitaramo ienengo iiṙa na Wumangyinyi wo mlungana wo Mndumii oṙu, Mkyiṟa oṙu Yesu Kristo.
61001012	Koikyo ngyikusurie imukumbuṟa isho mfiri yoose, maa chandu mushiichi na iṟingyishio kyiiṙi kya loi mukyeri nayo.
61001013	Na inyi ngyiwonyi nyi sungusinyi, ko kyiyeri-kyi ngyikyeri na moo, iwapaaya-paya kui iwakumbuṟa.
61001014	Ngyiichi kye ipfa lyako lyiafukyia iwinyi, chandu Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo alengyiloṟa.
61001015	Kyaindi ngyechipfuṟukana, kye ngampfa inyi muiṙime ikumbuo mbonyi-tso.
61001016	Kyipfa luleosha shindo shileṟeio kui wuṟango na ngyeṟo kyiyeri lulemmanyisha nyoe pfinya tsa Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo na icha lyakye-pfo; indi lulekolowona luwenyi wung'anyi wokye.
61001017	Kyipfa naleambilyia iwuka ko Ruwa Awu kyiṟumi na mng'ano, iho-ndu aleendio ṟui lyilewuka mng'anonyi ung'anyi, “Ichu nyi Mana oko, mkunde oko, ngyimchihie kyipfa kyakye.”
61001018	Na ṟui-lyo soe lulelyiicho lyechiwuka Ruwewu kyiyeri luwekyeri na oe fumvunyi lyilya lyiele.
61001019	Na soe luiṙikyie necha shilya weonguo shisuku wagambie, shilya nyoe mukoshiambuya necha, cha taa ilyimika meemenyi, mowuta necha mṟasa kyiyeri kochikya na nyenyeri ya ngamenyi iwaa mrimenyi konyu.
61001020	Mochimanya ulogo-lu kuwooka kye kuwoṙe ionguo shisuku shiṟeionyi lokyetambuluo chandu mndu mlyiwe akunda tupu-pfo.
61001021	Kyipfa ionguo shisuku lyichie na handu hoose chandu mndu akundi-pfo; indi wandu waleṙeṙa mbonyi tsiwukyie ko Ruwa, wechisongoyo nyi Mumuyo Mweele.
61002001	Kyaindi kulewuka weonguo shisuku wa wongo kyiiṙi kya wandu walya, chandu na konyu kochiwuka walosha wa wongo, wechiende kui wuṟango wo wuṙetsi malosho mawicho, wechilega maa Mndumii ulya alewakyiṟa, wechikuendie inyamaṟo lyiwukyie ko Ruwa.
61002002	Wafoi waiṙikyie wewuta shindo shifananyi na walosha-wo wa wongo. Na walya walaiṙikyie wakawona kuṙo, weṙeṙa mawicho kyipfa kya iiṙikyia lya Kyikristiano.
61002003	Kui lango tsawo ngyiwicho wechiwona kyiira kyipfa kya imuongoya mbonyi tsa wongo. Wookyia kacha Ruwa alemuwaanduya na iṙumbuo kya inyamaṟo lyawo. Ruwa ekyelaa-pfo, nechiwaanduya chandu agambie.
61002004	Mukumburie kye Ruwa naleanduya malaika walya walenyamaṟa. Nalewawiyitsa moṙonyi, kawawika shipfungonyi sha meema, waringo mṟasa kuche mfiri ulya o ianduyo.
61002005	Maa Ruwa alehooṟia wuyana wulya wo kacha-pfo, indi naleende Mfu onyamaṟa wuyana wo walya walaiṙikyie Ruwa. Walekyiṟo nyi Noe amonyi awekyeri msumganyi, na wandu wengyi mfungaaṙe.
61002006	Lyingyi-se, kaanduya mṟi ya Sodoma na Gomora echiinyamaṟa kui moṙo, kaiwika iwe kyiṟingyishio ko wandu walechiiṙikyia Ruwa numa ya ishi,
61002007	kakyiṟa Loti, ulya msumganyi alesokyio nyi fowa mnu kyipfa kya wuwicho wo wanyamaṟi-wo.
61002008	Kyipfa mndu-chu msumganyi akyeri kyiiṙi kyawo, kui iwona na iicho, nalekutuura mrima okye uwoṙe wusumganyi, mfiri kui mfiri, kui mawuto gawo galawoṙe uwawaso.
61002009	Kyasia, Mndumii naichi ikyiṟa wandu waowuye na ikunda Ruwa iwuka shiyeshonyi, na ikooma walawoṙe wusumganyi kyiiṙi kya iweṙelyia ianduyo mṟasa mfiri ulya o ianduyo.
61002010	Na ngoseṟa walya wekyeosha mmbiu langonyi tsa mbonyi ngyiwicho na imina wawoṙe wuchilyi.
61002011	Walosha-wo wa wongo wawoṙe wukari na makushelo, wekyelahia malaika wa Ruwa maa wekyewaindia-pfo. Indi malaika wawoṙe pfinya kuta walosha-wo maa wekyegamba shindo shawo mbele ya Mndumii-pfo.
61002012	Kyaindi iwo kyimwi cha mando ga saka galawoṙe wuṟango, walefeo cha mando ga saka tikyi wakyeri nyi wewaṙa na iwoogo, wechilahia Ruwa shindonyi walashiichi, wechirumatso irumatsonyi lyawo.
61002013	Wechiwona mawicho gakyeri wori wo wuwicho wowo, wakusaṟie kye iosha lango tsa mmbiu kulawoṙe wuowu nyi ichihiyo. Wawa nyi wunyamaṟi na sonu, wechilosha lango tsa wuyana tsilawoṙe meena shelyenyi shawo sha ikunda, ilyi wekyeachikyia shelya hamwi na nyoe.
61002014	Wawoṙe meso gaichuo wuṟui, wandu walekyeṙa iwuta wunyamaṟi, wekyelemba mrima ilangyikarishe, wawoṙe mrima ingyiichiwiṟe ilanga, wana wa seso.
61002015	Wechiṙa njia ngyigoṟotsu, wakaṙeka; wechiosha njia ya Balaamu, mana o Beori, alekunda wori wo wuwicho;
61002016	kyaindi naleṙeṙio kyipfa kya wunyamaṟi wokye amonyi. Nzoi ilaichi iṙeṙa, yechiṙeṙa kui ṟui lya mndu, ileshingyia wusuko wo moonguo shisuku ulya.
61002017	Iwa nyi kyimwi na shoka tsilawoṙe mṟinga na mapuchi gaiṙoo nyi kyiwiṟi. Ruwa nawaṟeyeṟie handu mlungana meemenyi ung'anyi.
61002018	Kyipfa wekyeṙeṙa maṙeṙo gekushela na galawoṙe kyiira, na kui lango ngyiwicho tsa mmbiu yawo wekyelemba walya waleṙicha mawicho na lango tsa wuyana.
61002019	Wechienenga kyiteṟio kya wongo wandu wengyi nawo wawenyi nyi watumo wa wuwicho, kyipfa mndu kawingo nyi mndu ungyi nekyewa mtumo o mndu ulya.
61002020	Cha kyipfa walya walemṙicha mawicho ga wuyana kui imanya Mndumii na Mkyiṟa Yesu Kristo, kokooya wawoṙo-se na iwingo, mbaṟe yawo ya mafurumionyi gawo nyi ingyiwicho kuta iya ya kuwooka.
61002021	Kyipfa nyi-we nanga kowo walawechimanya njia ya wusumganyi, kuta iimanya, numa iṙa iwawaso lyilya lyiele waleenengo.
61002022	Kyaindi kyawa kowo kyimwi na mfano ulya o loi, kyite kyawiyilyia mṙeeko okyo kyimonyi, na nguwe ilesanjo yawuya ikufoga-foga toombonyi.
61003001	Wakunde, paruo-i nyi ya kawi ngyimuṟeia nyoe. Ipfo paruonyi tsiwi ngyilepfuṟukana iamtsa makusaṟo mecha mṙoenyi konyu kui imukumbuṟa mbonyi-tsi.
61003002	Ngyikundi muiṙime ikumbuo shindo shilya shileṙeṙo kacha nyi weonguo shisuku waele; na iwawaso lyilya lya Mndumii na Mkyiṟa lyileendo nyi wasu wanyu.
61003003	Mochimanya kuwooka kyindo-kyi kye mfirinyi yefurumia wandu wekyetaluo wechicha na italuo lyawo, wekyeosha lango tsawo wawenyi,
61003004	na igamba, “Nyi kwi kyikyeri kyaasa kyilya kya icha lyakye? Cha kyipfa wookyia kyiyeri-kyo waku waṙu walepfa, shindo shoose shikyeri chandu shiwei, wookyia wuyana wulegumbo.”
61003005	Kyipfa wekyeshinga meso gawo walawone kyindo-kyi kye kuwewoṙe ngyina wookyia kacha, na uruka taa, lulugumbe iwuka mṟingyenyi, kui Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa.
61003006	Ko isho wuyana wulya wo kyiyeri kyilya wulenyamaṟo nyi mṟinga, wukorumara.
61003007	Kyaindi ngyina tsa wulalu na uruka shingyikoome kyiseyesoe kui moṙo, kui Ṙeṙo-lyo ilyo, shechiringo mṟasa mfiri o ianduyo, na kui irumara lya wandu walaiṙikyie Ruwa.
61003008	Kyaindi, wakunde, mulawaṙime kyindo-kyi, kye ko Mndumii mfiri umwi nyi kyimwi na maka kyiku, na maka kyiku nyi kyimwi na mfiri umwi.
61003009	Mndumii ekyekyelyio iafutsia kyaasa kyakye, chandu wandu wengyi wekyekusaṟa kya ikyelyio-pfo, kyaindi nekyesimiria konyu, kyipfa akundi mndu oose naṙekye-pfo, indi woose waiṙime iwona iṙumbuya wunyamaṟi.
61003010	Kyaindi mfiri o Mndumii ochicha cha mbafu. Mfiri-cho ngyina tsechirumatso kui ndiṟimo tsing'anyi, na orio kyindo kya wuyana kyechikoṟo na irumatso, na wuyana na shoose shikyeri pfo shesenekyia.
61003011	Kyasia, cha kyipfa shindo-shi shoose sherumatso kuṙo, kyamukooya nyoe muwe wandu wa mkaṟo ya mbaṟe iha kyiiṙi kya ichumia lyanyu lya wuele na iowuo na ikunda Ruwa,
61003012	mochiweṙelyia mṟasa mfiri ulya o Ruwa uche, mochiuitika, na kyiiṙi kya mfiri-cho ngyina tserumatso tsechiunguo, na shindo sha wuyana shechisenekyia na isalaa?
61003013	Kyaindi chandu kyikyeri kyaasa kyakye, luiweṙelyia ruwewu ngyihya na uruka luhya, shikyeri kye wusumganyi wochikaa kyiiṙi kyasho.
61003014	Koikyo, wakunde, kyipfa muiweṙelyia mbonyi-tso, pfuṟukanenyi kundu muwono ufoṟonyi kye muwoṙe ṙeko maa sonu mbele yakye-pfo.
61003015	Na nyoe talenyi wusimiri wo Mndumii oṙu kye nyi wukyiṟo, chandu na mono-wama oṙu mkunde Paulo aleṟeia kui wuṟango aleenengo.
61003016	Na wuṙo paruonyi tsakye taa, echionguo pfo mbonyi-tso. Kyiiṙi kya paruo-tso kuwoṙe mbonyi tsikyeri kye nyi kyuumu itsimanya, na mbonyi-tso wandu walawoṙe wuṟango, walagoṟokyi sungusinyi, wekyetsionguo mbaṟe ingyi, chandu wekyeweonguo mbaṟe ingyi shiṟeio shingyi, kui irumatso lyawo wawenyi.
61003017	Kyasia, wakunde, mukosonguo imanya isho, kuringyenyi mrima yanyu, mulacheṙoo nyi maṙeko ga wanyamaṟi-wo, mukooloka na iṙa kyilya muiṙikyie.
61003018	Kyaindi ng'anenyi isaṟienyi, na kyiiṙi kya imanya Mndumii oṙu na Mkyiṟa Yesu Kristo. Mng'ano ui kokye wulalu na mlungana.
62001001	Lumuṟeia nyoe mbonyi tsa Ṙeṙo lyekyeende moo, lyiwekyeri pfo wookyia mawookyionyi. Ṙeṙo lyilya lulelyiicho, lulelyiwona kui meso gaṙu, lukolyiambuya, na mawoko gaṙu gakalyipaaya-paya.
62001002	(Na moo-cho uleloṟo, na soe luleuwona; lyingyi-se luiṟingyishia, na imuongoya nyoe moo ulya o mlungana, uwekyeri ko Awu, ukoloṟo koṙu.)
62001003	Lumuongoya nyoe Ṙeṙo lyilya lulelyiwona na ilyiicho, kundu na nyoe taa muiṙime ikaa hamwi na soe; na ikaa lyaṙu handu hamwi nyi hamwi na Awu, hamwi na Mono-kye Yesu Kristo.
62001004	Na ishi lushiṟeia, kundu sia yaṙu iafutsio.
62001005	Na itsi nyitso mbonyi luleicho ko Yesu, na itsionguo konyu, kye Ruwa nyi ngyeela, maa meema oose ukyeri kokye-pfo.
62001006	Lukogamba kye lukyeri handu hamwi na oe, kyaindi lukowaṙa mkaṟo ya meema, loṙeṙa wongo, maa luiwuta kyikyeri kya loi-pfo.
62001007	Indi lukowaṙa mkaṟo ya ngyeela, chandu oe akyeri ngyeelenyi, lokaa handu hamwi soe, na samu ya Kristo, Mono-kye, yalusanja wunyamaṟi woose.
62001008	Lukogamba kye luwoṙe wunyamaṟi-pfo, lokulemba luwenyi, maa kuwoṙe wuloi koṙu-pfo.
62001009	Lukotochia Ruwa ngyuunyamaṟi tsaṙu, oe nekyeafutsia shilya ateṟia na namsumganyi mṟasa naluwute ngyuunyamaṟi tsaṙu, na ilusanja wuwicho woose.
62001010	Lukogamba kye lunyamaṟie-pfo, lomgaluo oe mndu ekyeṙeṙa wongo, maa kyilya agamba kyikyeri koṙu-pfo.
62002001	Wana wako, ngyimuṟeia ishi kundu mulawute sha wunyamaṟi. Na kokooya mndu awuta kya wunyamaṟi luwoṙe Moluterewia ko Awu, Yesu Kristo awoṙe wusumganyi.
62002002	Na oe nyi oe moluwuta ngyuunyamaṟi tsaṙu; chi ngyuunyamaṟi tsaṙu tupu-pfo indi na tsa wandu wa wuyanenyi koose.
62002003	Na kyipfa kya ikyo luichi kye lomanya Ruwa, kokooya loosha shilya mawawaso gakye gagamba.
62002004	Ulya aigamba, “Ngyimwichi,” kyaindi alaoshe shilya mawawaso gakye gagamba, nekyeṙeṙa wongo, maa wuloi wukyeri mrimenyi kokye-pfo.
62002005	Kyaindi ulya ekyeosha malosho ga Ṙeṙo lyakye, icho mrimenyi kokye ikunda lya Ruwa lyikyeri pfo loi. Kyipfa kya ikyo luichi kye luwalungye na oe.
62002006	Ulya aigamba kye namlungye na Ruwa, kyimmbaṟi iwuta kuṙo chandu Yesu alewuta.
62002007	Wakunde, ngyimuṟeia iwawaso lyihya-pfo, kyaindi iwawaso lya kacha muwekyeri nalyo wookyia mawookyionyi. Na iwawaso-lyo lya kacha nyi mbonyi tsilya muleicho.
62002008	Lyingyi-se ngamuṟeia iwawaso lyihya; mbonyi tsikyeri loi kokye na konyu; kyipfa meema uiṙa na ngyeela iya ya loi yamlyimika.
62002009	Ulya aigamba kye nakyeri ngyeelenyi, na oe nasuuye mono-wama okye, nakyeri meemenyi mṟasa wulalu.
62002010	Ulya akundi mono-wama okye, nekyekaa ngyeelenyi, maa mrimenyi kokye kuwoṙe kyindo kyetewe-pfo.
62002011	Indi ulya asuuye mono-wama okye nakyeri meemenyi, lyingyi-se naichumia meemenyi, maa aichi kundu aiyenda-pfo, cha kyipfa meema omgaluo kyipfupfuṟe.
62002012	Ngyimuṟeia nyoe wana wako, cha kyipfa mohooṟio ngyuunyamaṟi tsanyu kyipfa kya rina lyakye.
62002013	Ngyimuṟeia nyoe waawu, cha kyipfa momanya ulya akyeri pfo wookyia mawookyionyi. Ngyimuṟeia nyoe wanakye, cha kyipfa mowinga ulya mmbicho. Ngamuṟeia nyoe wana, cha kyipfa momanya Awu.
62002014	Ngamuṟeia nyoe waawu, cha kyipfa muichi ulya akyeri pfo wookyia mawookyionyi. Ngamuṟeia nyoe wanakye, cha kyipfa muwoṙe pfinya, na Ṙeṙo lya Ruwa lyikeri mrimenyi konyu, na nyoe mowinga ulya mmbicho.
62002015	Maa mulakunde wuyana, maa shindo shikyeri wuyanenyi. Mndu kakunda wuyana, ikunda Ruwa kukyeri mrimenyi kokye-pfo.
62002016	Orio kyindo kyikyeri wuyanenyi, lango tsa mmbiu, na lango tsa meso, na moo okyeenenga wandu ikushela, shekyewuka ko Awu-pfo, indi shekyewuka wuyanenyi.
62002017	Na wuyana wuisia, hamwi na lango tsa wuyana-wo, indi ulya ekyewuta shilya Ruwa akundi nechikaa ho mṟasa mlungana.
62002018	Wana wako, nyi kyiyeri kya mafurumionyi; na chandu muleicho kye mowingana na Kristo naicha, maa wulalu wewingana na Kristo wafoi wamuwoneka. Kyipfa kya ikyo luichi kye nyi kyiyeri kya mafurumionyi.
62002019	Walewuka koṙu, indi wawei wa koṙu-pfo. Kyipfa kokooya wawei wa koṙu, wawekaa hamwi na soe. Kyaindi walecha kundu waloṟo kye chi woose wai wa koṙu-pfo.
62002020	Muwapusie Mumuyo Mweele na nyoe moose muichi.
62002021	Ngyilemuṟeia nyoe kyipfa mulaichi kyikyeri loi-pfo, indi cha kyipfa muichi kyilya kyikyeri loi, lyingyi-se kye kuwoṙe kyoose kya wongo kyekyewuka ipfo kyindonyi kyikyeri loi-pfo.
62002022	Nyi wui ai moṙeṙa wongo sile ulya ekyekana kye Yesu nyi Kristo? Icho nyi oe mowingana na Kristo, ulya ekyekana Awu na Mana.
62002023	Orio mokana Mana awoṙe Awu-pfo. Moiṙikyia Mana nawoṙe Awu taa.
62002024	Kyasia nyoe, ikyo mulekyiicho wookyia mawookyionyi, kyikae mrimenyi konyu. Kokooya ikyo mulekyiicho wookyia mawookyionyi kyikyeri mrimenyi konyu na nyoe mochikaa ko Mana, na ko Awu.
62002025	Na ikyi nyikyo kyaasa aleluenenga, moo o mlungana.
62002026	Ngamuṟeia ishi ko mbonyi tsa wandu walya wakundi imuṙetsa nyoe.
62002027	Na nyoe, Mumuyo Mweele muleambilyia kokye ukyeri mrimenyi konyu, maa kuwoṙe kyimaṙuma kya mndu imulosha nyoe-pfo; kyaindi chandu Mumuyo okye uimulosha mbonyi tsa shindo shoose, lyingyi-se nyi loi maa chi wongo-pfo, na chandu ulemulosha, kaenyi kokye.
62002028	Na wulalu, wana wako, kaenyi kokye, kundu ilyi echiloṟo, luwaṙe wukari na wuṟango, maa lularigo nyi sonu mbele yakye kyiyeri kya icha lyakye lya kawi.
62002029	Kokooya momanya kye oe nyi msumganyi, manyenyi kye orio mndu ekyewuta shindo sha wusumganyi namfee nyi oe.
62003001	Kumbuonyi nyi ikunda lya mbaṟe iha Awu aleluenenga, kye lulago wana wa Ruwa; na nyi wuṙo lukyeri. Kyipfa kya ikyo wandu wa wuyana waluichi-pfo, cha kyipfa walemanya Ruwa-pfo.
62003002	Wakunde, wulalu lukyeri wana wa Ruwa, maa kyilandemanyikye chandu lochiwa-pfo; kyaindi luichi kye kyiyeri Kristo echiloṟo, lochiwa cha oe; cha kyipfa lochimmbona chandu akyeri.
62003003	Na orio mndu awoṙe ikusuria-lyi kui Kristo nekyekuilyisha, chandu oe akyeri mweele.
62003004	Orio mndu ekyewuta sha wunyamaṟi, nawuta kyindo kyiwicho; cha kyipfa wunyamaṟi nyi kyindo kyiwicho.
62003005	Na nyoe muichi kye Kristo naleloṟo, kundu naluwute ngyuunyamaṟi; na wunyamaṟi wukyeri kokye-pfo.
62003006	Orio mndu ekyekaa kokye ekyewuta kyindo kya wunyamaṟi-pfo; orio mndu ekyewuta kyindo kya wunyamaṟi, ammbonyi maa amwichi-pfo.
62003007	Wana wako, mndu alamulembe. Mndu ekyewuta sha wusumganyi nawoṙe wusumganyi, chandu Kristo awoṙe wusumganyi.
62003008	Mndu ekyewuta sha wunyamaṟi nyi o Satana; cha kyipfa Satana nekyewuta sha wunyamaṟi wookyia mawookyionyi. Kyipfa kya ikyo Mono-Ruwa naleloṟo, kundu nanyamaṟe maṟunda ga Mokyiriinzi.
62003009	Orio mndu amfee nyi Ruwa ekyewuta sha wunyamaṟi-pfo, kyipfa kyishari kyakye kyikyeri kokye; maa echiiṙima iwuta sha wunyamaṟi-pfo kyipfa namfee iwuka ko Ruwa.
62003010	Kyipfa kya ikyo wana wa Ruwa waichio na pata, na wana wa Mokyiriinzi taa. Mndu oose alekyewuta sha wusumganyi awukyie ko Ruwa-pfo, maa ulya alakundi mono-wama okye.
62003011	Kyipfa itsi nyitso mbonyi muletsiicho wookyia mawookyionyi, kye lukundane.
62003012	Lulawe cha Kaini awekyeri o Satana, kawaaga mono-wama okye-pfo. Na oe nalemmbaaga kyipfa kya kyikyi? Cha kyipfa mawuto gakye gawemawicho, na galya ga mono-wamae gawei ga wusumganyi.
62003013	Wana wa wama wako, mulaṟiyio, wandu wa wuyana wakamusuo.
62003014	Soe luichi kye lomuiṙa iwuka upfunyi iiṙa na moonyi, cha kyipfa lukundi wana wa wama kyiiṙi kya Kristo. Ulya alakundi, nakyeri upfunyi.
62003015	Orio mndu mosuo mono-wama okye nyi mmbaagi; na nyoe muichi kye orio mmbaagi awoṙe moo o mlungana mrimenyi kokye-pfo.
62003016	Kui ikyo lomanya ikunda, cha kyipfa Kristo nalereka moo okye kyipfa kyaṙu. Kyiluwaṟi na soe ireka moo oṙu kyipfa kya wana wa wama-wo.
62003017	Kyaindi mndu kawaṙa kando ka kunu wuyanenyi, naaho kawona mono-wama okye alawoṙe kyindo, alamtarame, ngyesa ikunda lya Ruwa lyakaa kuṙa mrimenyi ko mndu-cho?
62003018	Wana wako, lulakunde kui ṙeṙo, maa kui ulumi-pfo, indi kui mawuto na wuloi.
62003019	Kyipfa kya ikyo lochimanya kye lukyeri wa loi, na soe lochiwiyiṟia mrima yaṙu moo mbele yakye,
62003020	kokooya mrima yaṙu iluanduya; cha kyipfa Ruwa nang'anyi kuta mrima yaṙu na oe naichi shoose.
62003021	Wakunde, mrima yaṙu ilandeluanduye, luwoṙe wukari na wuṟango ko Ruwa.
62003022	Na orio kyindo loterewa lochikyiambilyia kokye, cha kyipfa lokyeosha shilya mawawaso gakye gakundi, na iwuta shichihiṟie mbele yakye.
62003023	Na ilyi nyilyo iwawaso lyakye, kye luiṙikyie rina lya Mono-kye Yesu Kristo, na ikundana, chandu aleluenenga iwawaso.
62003024	Na oe ekyeosha shilya mawawaso gakye gagamba namlungye na Ruwa, na Ruwa namlungye na oe. Na kyipfa kya Mumuyo ulya Ruwa aleluenenga luichi kye Ruwa namlungye na soe.
62004001	Wakunde, mulaiṙikyie orio mndu agamba kye nawoṙe Mumuyo, indi wayeshenyi mumanye kokooya mumuyo-yo waigamba wawoṙe iwukyie ko Ruwa; cha kyipfa weonguo shisuku wa wongo wafoi wammboneka wuyanenyi.
62004002	Kui ikyo muichi Mumuyo o Ruwa, orio mndu aiṙikyie kye Yesu Kristo nalecha ai cha mndu nawoṙe mumuyo uwukyie ko Ruwa.
62004003	Na oṙio mndu alaiṙikyie Yesu awoṙe mumuyo uwukyie ko Ruwa-pfo. Na iyi nyiyo ngoo ya mowingana na Kristo, ngoo iya muleicho kye iicha; na wulalu yammbono wuyanenyi.
62004004	Nyoe, wana watutu, muwoṙe mumuyo uwukyie ko Ruwa; na nyoe mowawinga; cha kyipfa ulya akyeri mrimenyi konyu nang'anyi kuta ulya akyeri wuyanenyi.
62004005	Iwo nyi wa wuyana; koikyo wekyeṙeṙa shindo sha wuyana na wandu wa wuyana wekyewaaṙanyia.
62004006	Soe luwoṙe mumuyo uwukyie ko Ruwa. Ulya aichi Ruwa nekyeluaṙanyia; ulya alawoṙe mumuyo uwukyie ko Ruwa ekyeluaṙanyia-pfo. Kyipfa kya ikyo luichi Mumuyo o loi, na mumuyo o wuṙetsi.
62004007	Wakunde lukundane; cha kyipfa ikunda lyiwukyie ko Ruwa, na orio mndu awoṙe ikunda namfee nyi Ruwa; na oe naichi Ruwa.
62004008	Oe alawoṙe ikunda, aichi Ruwa-pfo, cha kyipfa Ruwa nyi ikunda.
62004009	Kyipfa kya ikyo ikunda lya Ruwa lyilewoneka koṙu, kye Ruwa naleṙuma Mono-kye kyimuumwi wuyanenyi, kundu luwaṙe moo kui oe.
62004010	Ilyi nyilyo ikunda, chi kye soe lulekunda Ruwa-pfo, indi kye oe nalelukunda soe kaṙuma Mono-kye iwa mndu moluhooṟia ngyuunyamaṟi tsaṙu.
62004011	Wakunde, kokooya Ruwa nalelukunda soe kuṙi, kyiluwaṟi na soe ikundana.
62004012	Kuwoṙe mndu alemmbona Ruwa kyiyeri kyoose-pfo. Lukokundana, Ruwa nekyekaa mrimenyi koṙu, na ikunda lyakye lying'anyi mnu mrimenyi koṙu.
62004013	Kyipfa kya ikyo luichi kye lukyeri kokye, na oe nakyeri koṙu, cha kyipfa naluenengyie Mumuyo okye.
62004014	Na soe lowona na iṟingyishia kye Awu naleṙuma Mana iwa Mkyiṟa o wuyana.
62004015	Orio mndu aiṙikyie kye Yesu nyi Mono-Ruwa, Ruwa nekyekaa kokye, na oe nekyekaa ko Ruwa.
62004016	Na soe lomanya ikunda Ruwa awoṙe koṙu soe, na ilyiiṙikyia. Ruwa nyi ikunda, na ulya ekyekaa ikundenyi, nekyekaa ko Ruwa, na Ruwa nekyekaa kokye.
62004017	Kyipfa kya ikyo ikunda lying'anyi lyikyeri koṙu, kundu luwaṙe wukari na wuṟango mfiri ulya o ianduyo; cha kyipfa, chandu oe akyeri, nyi wuṙo lukyeri na soe kunu wuyanenyi.
62004018	Ikundenyi kuwoṙe wuowu-pfo; kyaindi ikunda lya loi lyekyewiyitsa wuowu nja, cha kyipfa wuowu wuwoṙe ngapo; na awoṙe wuowu awoṙe ikunda lying'anyi-pfo.
62004019	Soe lukundi cha kyipfa oe nalelukunda soe kuwooka.
62004020	Mndu kagamba, “Ngyikundi Ruwa,” na oe nasuuye mono-wama okye, nai moṙeṙa wongo; cha kyipfa alakundi mono-wama okye ulya ammbonyi, eiṙima ikunda Ruwa ulya alandemmbone-pfo.
62004021	Na iwawaso-lyi luleenengo nyi Kristo, kye ulya akundi Ruwa, nakunde na mono-wama okye.
62005001	Orio mndu aiṙikyie kye Yesu nyi oe Kristo namfee nyi Ruwa. Na orio mndu akundi mfee, nakundi maa ulya amfee nyi mfee-cho.
62005002	Kyipfa kya ikyo luichi kye lukundi wana wa Ruwa kyiyeri lokunda Ruwa, na iosha shilya mawawaso gakye gagamba.
62005003	Cha kyipfa ipfo nyipfo ikunda Ruwa, kye luoshe shilya mawawaso gakye gagamba; maa mawawaso gakye gamalemeri-pfo.
62005004	Cha kyipfa orio mndu amfee nyi Ruwa nekyewinga wuyana; na kunu nyipfo iwinga lyiwingyie wuyana kui iiṙikyia-lyo lyaṙu.
62005005	Awingyie wuyana nyi wui, sile nyi ulya aiṙikyie kye Yesu nyi Mono-Ruwa?
62005006	Ichu nyi oe alecha kui mṟinga o wupatiso wokye na samu, Yesu Kristo; chi kui mṟinga tupu-pfo, indi kui mṟinga na kui samu. Na Mumuyo nyi oe ekyeṟingyishia, cha kyipfa Mumuyo nyi oe loi.
62005007	Wakyeri waṟaaṟu waiṟingyishia:
62005008	Mumuyo, mṟinga, na samu. Na ishi shoose shiwoṙe wuṟingyishi wulya wulya.
62005009	Lukoambilyia wuṟingyishi wo wandu, wuṟingyishi wo Ruwa nyi wung'anyi ngoseṟa; cha kyipfa wuṟingyishi wo Ruwa nyiwo iwu, kye naṟingyishia Mono-kye.
62005010	Ulya aiṙikyie Mono-Ruwa nawoṙe wuṟingyishi-wo mrimenyi kokye. Alaiṙikyie Ruwa namgaluo mndu ekyeṙeṙa wongo, cha kyipfa aiṙikyia wuṟingyishi-wo Ruwa aṟingyishia Mono-kye-pfo.
62005011	Na iwu nyiwo wuṟingyishi, kye Ruwa naleluenenga moo o mlungana; na moo-chu ukyeri ko Mono-kye.
62005012	Ulya awoṙe Mana mrimenyi kokye, nawoṙe moo; ulya alawoṙe Mana mrimenyi kokye awoṙe moo-cho-pfo.
62005013	Ngamuṟeia nyoe shindo-sho, kundu mumanye kye muwoṙe moo o mlungana, nyoe muiṙikyie Rina lya Mono-Ruwa.
62005014	Na iwu nyiwo wukari na wuṟango luwoṙe kokye, kye lukoterewa kyindo chandu akundi, nekyeluaṙanyia.
62005015	Na kokooya lomanya kye nekyeluaṙanyia, kyoose loterewa, luichi kye luwoṙe shilya lokyeterewa.
62005016	Mndu kawona mono-wama okye ewuta kyindo kyiwicho kyilekyeende upfu, neterewa Ruwa, na Ruwa nechimwenenga moo. Moo-cho nyi ko walya wekyewuta shindo shiwicho shilekyeende upfu. Kuwoṙe kyindo kyiwicho kyekyeende upfu. Ngyigamba kye nechiterewa Ruwa kyipfa kya ikyo-pfo.
62005017	Orio kyindo kyilakyeri kya wusumganyi nyi wunyamaṟi, na kuwoṙe wunyamaṟi wulekyeende upfu.
62005018	Luichi kye orio mndu amfee nyi Ruwa ekyewuta kyindo kya wunyamaṟi-pfo; indi ulya amfee nyi Ruwa nekyekuṟumaa, maa Satana ekyempaaya-pfo.
62005019	Luichi kye soe lukyeri wana wa Ruwa; na wandu wa wuyana woose taa wekyekaa ko Satana.
62005020	Na soe luichi kye Mono-Ruwa amcha, na oe naluenengyie wuṟango kye lumanye Ruwa o loi, na soe lokyekaa ko Ruwa ulya akyeri o loi. Kyimwi na igamba ko Mono-kye Yesu Kristo. Ichu nyi oe Ruwa o loi, na ichu nyi moo o mlungana.
62005021	Wana wako, wikyienyi mrima yanyu kuleshi na mafano.
63001001	Inyi meeku, ngyikuṟeia iyoe paruo-i, wama msambuṟe, na wana wakye ngyiwakundi kyiiṙi kya loi; maa chi inyi ngyimonyi-pfo, indi na woose waichi loi iya,
63001002	kyipfa kya loi-yo ikyeri mrimenyi koṙu, nayo yechikaa hamwi na soe mṟasa mlungana.
63001003	Isaṟia na iwonio wukyiwa, na ufoṟo, shiwukyie ko Ruwa Awu na ko Yesu Kristo Mana o Awu, shechikaa hamwi na soe kyiiṙi kya loi na ikunda.
63001004	Ngyilechihiyo mnu kyipfa kya ilyi ngyilewona wana wapfo waata wechichumia kyiiṙi kya loi, chandu luleambilyia iwawaso ko Awu.
63001005	Na wulalu, mama, ngyikuterewa, chi kye ngyikuṟeia iwawaso lyihya-pfo, indi lyilya luwei nalyo wookyia mawookyionyi, kye lukundane.
63001006	Na ilyi nyilyo ikunda, luchumie lochiosha mawawaso gakye. Ilyi nyilyo iwawaso lyilya, chandu muleicho wookyia mawookyionyi, kye muchumie kyiiṙi kya ilyo,
63001007	cha kyipfa walembi wafoi wammboneka wuyanenyi, walaiṙikyie kye Yesu Kristo naicha kyiiṙi kya mmbiu. Icho nyi oe mlembi ulya na mowingana na Kristo.
63001008	Ringyenyi mrima yanyu mulaṙetse shilya mulewuta, indi muambilyie wori wuafutsie.
63001009	Orio mndu alailosha na ikaa maloshonyi ga Kristo, indi nekyegalega, awoṙe Ruwa-pfo. Indi icho ekyekaa ipfo maloshonyi, nawoṙe Awu na Mana taa.
63001010	Mndu kacha na konyu, na oe aiende malosho-go-pfo, maa mulamwambilyie kanyi konyu, maa imwiṟikyiṟa.
63001011	Kyipfa icho momwiṟikyiṟa naoshana na oe mawutonyi gakye mawicho.
63001012	Cha kyipfa ngyiwoṙe shindo shifoi, ngyikundi ishiṟeia kui karitasi na wiino-pfo, kyaindi ngyikusurie icha na konyu, na iṙeṙa na nyoe ṙumbu kui ṙumbu, kundu sia yaṙu iafutsio.
63001013	Wana wa mono-wama opfo ai msambuṟe, wakuiṟikyiṟa.
64001001	Inyi meeku ngyikuṟeia paruo-i iyoe Gayo mkunde, ngyikukundi mnu.
64001002	Mkunde, ngyiterewa uwone kyiira shindonyi shoose na iwaṙa wukyesi wo mmbiu, chandu uwoṙe wukyesi wo mrima.
64001003	Kyipfa ngyilechihiyo mnu kyiyeri wana wa wama waiṙikyie Ruwa waleṟingyishia chandu okyeafutsia shilya oteṟia na chandu okyewuta shindo sha wuloi.
64001004	Ngyiwoṙe sia ing'anyi kuta iicho kye walya wakyeri cha wana wako waiwuta shindo sha wuloi-pfo.
64001005	Mkunde, kyindo-kyo uwutia wana wa wama-wo waiṙikyie Ruwa na wayenu taa nyi kyindo kyilawoṙe ngyeṟo;
64001006	wandu waleṟingyishia ikunda lyapfo mbele ya siṟi. Nochiwuta necha kokooya owatarama kyaronyi chandu kyiwaṟi ko Ruwa.
64001007	Cha kyipfa, kyipfa kya Rina-lyo, walefuma, walaambilyie kyindo ko walya walaiṙikyie Yesu.
64001008	Kyasia kyiluwaṟi soe iambilyia wandu cha iwo, kundu luwe waṟundi hamwi na wuloi.
64001009	Ngyileṟeia siṟi paruo, kyaindi Diotirefe, akundi iwa o kuwooka kyiiṙi kyawo, aleluaṙanyia-pfo.
64001010	Koikyo ngacha ngyechikumbuo mawuto gakye, chandu awoṙe maṙeṙo mawicho galawoṙe kyiira; maa isho shekyemshika-pfo, kyipfa oe amonyi ekyeambilyia wana wa wama-wo waiṙikyie Ruwa-pfo; na walya wakundi iwaambilyia nekyewashingyia, na iwawuta siṟinyi.
64001011	Mkunde, ulakunde wuwicho, indi kunda wucha. Ulya ekyewuta wucha nyi o Ruwa, indi ulya ekyewuta mawicho alandewone Ruwa-pfo.
64001012	Demetirio naṟingyishio nyi wandu woose, lyingyi-se na wuloi wulya wumonyi. Na soe taa loṟingyishia, na iyoe nuichi kye wuṟingyishi woṙu nyi loi.
64001013	Ngyiwewoṙe shindo shifoi shekuṟeia kyaindi ngyikundi ikuṟeia kui wiino na kalamu-pfo.
64001014	Kyaindi ngyikusaṟie ichekuwona mfiri ya kufuhi, na soe lochiṙeṙa ṙumbu kui ṙumbu.
64001015	Ufoṟo kopfo. Mbuya tsaṙu tsakuiṟikyiṟa. Iṟikyiṟa mbuya-tso tsaṙu, orio mndu kui rina lyakye.
65001001	Inyi Yuda, mṟundi o Yesu Kristo, na mono-wama o Yakobo, ngyimuṟeia paruo-i nyoe muwalage nyi Ruwa, mulekundo nyi Ruwa Awu, na ikoomo kyipfa kya Yesu Kristo.
65001002	Muengeṟio iwonio wukyiwa na ufoṟo na ikunda.
65001003	Wakunde, kyiyeri ngyiwepfuṟukana mnu imuṟeia mbonyi tsa wukyiṟo wukyeri nyi woṙu loose, ngyilewona kyangyikooya imuṟeia, kundu ngyimtutume kye mukapanie iiṙikyia lyileenengo wandu wa Ruwa lyimwi tikyi.
65001004	Kyipfa kuwoṙe wandu walekuwika pfo kui kyiṟika, wandu waleṟeio wookyia kacha ianduyo-lyi, mando mawicho, gekyegaluo isaṟia lya Ruwa oṙu lyiwe ukoe, nawo wekyemkana icho akyeri Ruwa amonyi tikyi, na Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo.
65001005	Lyingyi-se ngyikundi imukumbuṟa maa chandu mommanye isho shoose kye Mndumii, amkyiṟe wandu urukyenyi lo Misiri, nalewarumatsa numa ya iho walya walaiṙikyie.
65001006	Na malaika walaleringa wuchilyi wowo wawenyi, kyaindi wakaṙa kanyi kowo kuwewaṟi nalewawika shipfungonyi sha mlungana kundu ko meema ko ianduyo lya mfiri ulya ung'anyi.
65001007	Chandu kyiwei Sodoma na Gomora hamwi na mṟi iwekyeri mṟasenyi, waleosha wuṟui kui mbaṟe imwi na iwa, wakandeosha mbonyi tsa kyimmbiu tsilawaṟi wookyia kacha, kyilewiko kyiwe kyiṟingyishio, wechianduyo moṙonyi o mlungana.
65001008	Nyi wuṙo na iwa, ndoṙo tsawo tsekyewasongoya kyiiṙi kya ifanyiṟa mmbiu yawo wawenyi, imina wuchilyi wo Ruwa, na ilahia shigumbe shiwoṙe mng'ano sha Ruwa ai wuye.
65001009	Kyaindi Mikaelyi, malaika ang'anyi, kyiyeri alewingana na Mokyiriinzi, na igaluana na oe kyipfa kya mmbiu o Mose, alekaria imshitakyi-pfo, indi nalegamba, “Mndumii nakuṟoṟome.”
65001010	Kyaindi wandu-wa wekyelahia shindo walashiichi; shindo shilya shilya washiichi wookyia kacha nyisho shiwarumatsa cha mando ga saka.
65001011	Ochia lowo! Kyipfa waleosha njia ya Kaini, na iosha ṙeko lya Balaamu kyipfa kya heleri. Walenyamaṟa chandu na Kora alenyamaṟa, nawo walerumatso cha oe.
65001012	Wandu-wa nyi wandu wa ngataṟa, wekyefanyiṟa shelya shanyu mokyelya kyiyeri mosanzia handu hamwi, wechilya kulawoṙe wuowu. Nyi mapuchi galawoṙe mṟinga, gekyeṙoo nyi mkuma. Nyi mashiṙi galawoṙe maṟa, galawoṙe ndunda, gapfiie kawi, na gamakuluo piu.
65001013	Nyi shiwiṟi sha ipalyipalyinyi shilekyewa ishingyia, mawuto gawo ga sonu gakyeri cha iwia lyifanyi lya ipalyipalyi lyifoikyie. Nyi nyenyeri tsikyama-kyama, walya Ruwa awaṟeyeṟie handu mlungana meemenyi ung'anyi.
65001014	Na Enokyi, mndu o mfungaaṙe numa ya Adamu, naleonguo shisuku kyipfa kyawo, echigamba, “Ambuya, Mndumii nalecha na waele wakye, shiku kui shiku,
65001015	kundu naanduye wandu woose, na itoṟisha woose walaiṙikyie Ruwa, kyipfa kya mawuto gawo goose ga wuṙetsi, walewuta kulawoṙe iowuo na ikunda Ruwa na kyipfa kya maṙeṙo goose malemeri galeṙeṙo nyi iwo wanyamaṟi walekyeindia Ruwa.”
65001016	Wandu-wa wekyenunuwa, wekyeyenda kui lango tsawo, na maṙumbu gawo gekyeṙeṙa maṙeṙo gang'anyi ga tiri, wechikundia wandu wawoṙe kyiṟumi kyipfa kya iwona kyiira.
65001017	Indi nyoe, wakunde, kumbuonyi maṙeṙo galeṙeṙo kacha nyi wasu wa Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo,
65001018	kye walemmbia, “Kyiyeri kyefurumia kowaṙa wandu wetaluo, wechiosha lango tsawo wawenyi tsa wuṙetsi.”
65001019	Wandu-wo iwo nyiwo wekyeende nduutsano, wandu wa wuyana-wu tikyi, walawoṙe Mumuyo.
65001020	Indi nyoe, wakunde, mochikukarisha kui iiṙikyia lyanyu lyikyeri lyiele mnu, na iterewa Mumuyonyi Mweele,
65001021	kuringyenyi ikundenyi lya Ruwa, kunu mochiweṙelyia iwonio wukyiwa lya Mndumii oṙu Yesu Kristo, mṟasa muambilyie moo o mlungana.
